verse_text: Jisos Kraist wey dem born for David and Abraham famili, na em stori bi dis.
Abraham born Izik, Izik kon born Jakop. Na Jakop born Juda and en brodas,
Juda born Perez and Zera (wey en mama bi Tamar), Perez born Hezron and Hezron kon born Ram,
Ram na Amminadab papa, Amminadab born Nahshon, Nahshon kon born Salmon,
Salmon born Boaz (wey Rahab bi en mama), na Boaz bi Obed papa (wey Rut bi en mama), Obed kon born Jesse,
Jesse born David wey bi Izrel pipol king. David born Solomon (wey Uria wife bi en mama),
Solomon born Rehoboam, Rehoboam naim bi Abija papa and Abija kon born Asa,
Asa born Jehoshaphat, Jehoshaphat kon born Joram, Joram born Uzzia,
Uzzia born Jotham, Jotham kon born Ahaz, wey born Hezekia,
Hezekia born Manasse, Manasse naim bi Amon papa and Amon kon born Josia.
Josia born Jeconia and en brodas for di taim wey dem kari Izrel pipol go bi slave for Babylon.
Afta dem kari Izrel pipol go Babylon, Jeconia kon born Shealtiel, Shealtiel kon bi Zerubabel papa,
Zerubabel born Abiud, Abiud naim bi Eliakim papa, Eliakim kon born Azor,
Azor born Zadok, Zadok naim bi Achim papa, Achim kon born Eliud,
Eliud born Eleazar wey bi Matthan papa, Matthan kon born Jakop,
Jakop born Josef wey bi Mary husban, dis Mary naim bi Jisos Kraist mama.

So, from Abraham go rish David taim, na fourteen generashon dey and from David taim go rish wen dem kari Izrel pipol go Babylon, na fourteen tu and from dat taim go rish wen dem born Jisos Kraist, na fourteen generashon e bi.
Dis na haw dem born Jisos Kraist. Wen Mary en mama don redi to mari Josef, bifor dem bigin slip togeda, Mary kon si sey e don get bele wit Holi Spirit pawa.
Josef wey won mari am, na pesin wey dey fear God wel-wel and bikos e nor won disgrace am, e kon tink for en maind sey e nor go mari Mary again.
As e dey tink haw e go liv am, God angel show ensef to am for dream kon tel am sey, "Josef, David pikin, mak yu nor fear to mari Mary, bikos di pikin wey dey en bele, na Holi Spirit gi-am.
"E go born boy and yu go kol am Jisos Kraist, bikos e go save en pipol from dia sin."
Dis tins go hapun as God profet tok:
"Si! Di wuman wey neva slip wit man bifor go get bele and e go born boy and dem go kol am, 'Emmanuel' wey min, 'God dey wit us.'"
Wen Josef wak-up, e kon du wetin God angel tel am. So, e kon mari Mary,
bot e nor slip wit am ontil Mary born di pikin. Den e kon name am, Jisos Kraist.
Afta dem born Jisos Kraist for Betlehem wey dey Judea, for di taim wey Herod bi king, som wise men from east, kon go Jerusalem
dey ask, "Wer di Ju king wey dem jos born dey? Wi si di star wey tok abaut am, so wi kom woship am."
Wetin dem tok so, ves King Herod and Jerusalem pipol.
So, di king gada all di prist oga dem and di pipol wey sabi di law, kon ask dem, "Wer una tink sey dem go for born Kraist?"
Dem kon ansa, "Na for Betlehem, wey dey Judea, jos as Profet Isaia rite sey:
'Betlehem pipol, una wey smol pas for all di pipol wey dey rule Juda, na from among una di pesin wey go lid all my pipol for Izrel, go from kom.'"
Den Herod kon kol di wise men go kona, mak dem for tel am wen dem si di star.
E kon sey, "Mak una go luk for di pikin wel-wel. Wen una don si-am, mak una kom tel mi, so dat mi tu, go-go woship am.”
Wen di king tok finish, di wise men kon dey go and di star wey dem si bifor, kon dey lid dem ontil e stop on-top di haus wer di pikin dey.
Wen dem si di star, dem kon dey hapi.
Dem enta di haus, si di pikin wit en mama kon nil dan woship am. Den dem opun dia bag kon gi-am som gifts wey bi, gold, frankincence and myrrh.
Bikos God warn dem for dream mak dem nor go bak go mit Herod, dem kon pas anoda road go dia haus.
Wen di wise men don go, God angel kon tel Josef for dream, "Get up, kari di pikin and en mama run go Egypt, mak una stay der ontil I go tel yu wetin una go du, bikos Herod won kil di pikin."
Dat same nite, Josef wak-up, kari di pikin and en mama kon run go Egypt.
Dem stay der til Herod die. Dis tin mak wetin God profet tok hapun sey, "I kol my pikin komot from Egypt."

Wen Herod si sey di wise men disiv am, e ves wel-wel, so e send sojas mak dem go kil all di boys wey don rish tu years kom dan, bikos e don rish tu years wen di wise men kom mit am sey, dem si di star.
Dis won mak wetin Profet Jeremia tok hapun sey,
"Pipol hear krai and shaut for Rama. Rashel dey krai for en pikin dem wey don die and nortin wey pipol tok fit mak en heart strong."
Afta Herod die, God angel apier to Josef for dream wen e stil dey Egypt,
kon tel am, "Mak yu get up, kari di pikin and en mama go Izrel, bikos di pesin wey won kil-am, don die."
So, e kari di pikin and en mama go bak to Izrel.
Bot wen e hear sey Arkelaus dey rule for Judea, afta Herod en papa don die, Josef kon fear to go der. Afta God don warn am for dream, e kon go Galili.
Wen e rish Nazaret, e kon stay der. Dis won mak wetin Profet Jeremia tok hapun sey, "Dem go sey Jisos Kraist, na Nazaret e from kom."
For dat taim, Jon di Baptist dey prish insaid desert for Judea sey,
"Mak una turn from sin kom mit God, bikos God Kindom don near."
Na dis Jon Profet Isaia tok abaut sey, "Won pesin dey shaut insaid desert sey, 'Mak una mak God road strate.'"
Jon wear klot wey dem yuz camel hair mak, e yuz leda belt tie waist and na locust and honi for bush, e dey chop.
Pipol from Jerusalem, Judea and all di tawn wey dey near Jordan kon dey run go mit am
and e kon baptaiz dem insaid Jordan Riva, afta dem konfes dia sins.
Bot wen e si meni Farisi and Sadusi pipol dey kom mak e baptaiz dem, e kon tel dem, "Una, snake shildren! Hu warn una abaut God jojment wey dey kom?
"Naw, mak una du wetin go show sey una don turn from sin kom mit God,
mak una nor tink sey una don fri bikos una sey, 'Abraham na awa papa.' Mak I tel una, God fit turn all dis stone to Abraham shildren!
"Naw sef, dem don put di axe for di tri botom and eni tri wey nor bear beta frut, dem go kut am trow insaid fire.

"I dey baptaiz una wit wota mak una for turn from sin kom mit God, bot di pesin wey go kom afta, strong pas mi. I nor big rish to luz di rope wey dey en shu, na-im go baptaiz una wit Holi Spirit and fire.
"Di fan wey e go tak blow kanda from corn dey en hand and e go burn di dirti for fire wey nor dey kwensh."
Jisos kom from Galili mak Jon for baptaiz am for Jordan Riva.
Bot Jon won kon stop am sey, "Na yu sopoz baptaiz mi, insted yu kom mit mi mak I baptaiz yu?"
Jisos ansa, "Mak e bi so naw, e beta mak wi du evritin wey God wont." So, Jon kon baptaiz am.
As Jisos dey kom out from di wota afta Jon don baptaiz am, hevun opun and Jon kon si God Spirit wey bi laik dove, stay on-top Jisos head.
Naim won vois from hevun kon sey, "Dis na My pikin wey I luv and e dey mak bele swit mi."
Di Holi Spirit tak Jisos go insaid desert mak devol for tempt am.
Afta Jisos don fast for forti days and forti nites, e kon dey hungri.
Den devol kon mit am sey, "If yu bi God pikin, komand dis stone mak e turn to bread."
Jisos kon ansa, "God wod sey, 'Nor bi onli fud man go tak sovaiv, bot na wit evri wod wey God tok.'"
Den, devol show Jisos di tawn wey dey holi, kon mak am stand on-top di place wey high pas for di Tempol
and e tel Jisos, "If yu rili bi God pikin, jump go dan, bikos dem rite for God wod sey, 'God go komand en angels mak dem du evritin for yu and dem go kash yu mak yor leg nor nak stone.'"
Jisos ansa am, "God wod sey, 'Mak yu nor trai God wey bi yor Oga.'"
Den devol tak Jisos go won mountin wey high wel-wel, kon show am all di kindom for dis wold and all di beta tins insaid am.
Devol kon tel am, "I go giv yu all dis tins, if yu go fal for groun woship mi."
Jisos ansa, "Komot here, devol! Bikos dem rite for God wod sey, 'Na onli God wi sopoz to serv and woship.'"
So, devol kon liv Jisos and God angels kon bigin help am.
Wen Jisos hear sey dem don put Jon insaid prizin, e kon go bak to Galili.
From der, Jisos komot from Nazaret go Kapanum wey near di sea, wer Zebulun and Naphtali pipol dey stay,
so dat wetin Profet Isaia tok, go hapun:
"Zebulun and Naphtali, di place wer riva for kros Jordan go Galili, wer pipol wey nor bi Ju dey stay,
una wey dey daknes, don si big lite and una wey don nearli die, don get life."
From dat taim, Jisos bigin prish sey, "Mak una turn from sin kom mit God, bikos God Kindom don kom mit una."
As Jisos dey waka for Galili wotasaid, e si tu brodas: Saimon wey dem dey kol Pita and Andru en broda, dem dey trow net insaid di riva dey kash fish.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una folo mi and I go mak una kash pipol."
At wons, dem liv dia net kon folo Jisos.
As Jisos komot from der, e kon si tu brodas, James and Jon, wit Zebedi dia papa, dey ripair net insaid dia boat. Den Jisos kol di brodas.
Kwik-kwik dem run liv dia papa insaid di boat, kon folo Jisos.
Jisos kon dey waka for Galili dey tish insaid dia sinagog. E prish abaut God Kindom and dey heal pipol wey get difren-difren diziz and siknes.

So di news abaut Jisos kon spread go evriwer for Syria. Dem kon bring pipol wey nor wel, wey nor fit waka, pipol wey devol dey wori and di pipol wey dim on dey insaid dem, kom mit am and e heal all of dem.
Meni pipol from Galili, Dekapolis, Jerusalem, Judea and pipol wey dey stay near Jordan Riva, kon folo am.
Wen Jisos si di pipol, e kon klimb go di mountin top and en disaipols folo am. Afta e sidan,
e kon bigin tish dem sey;
"God go bless una wey dey poor for spirit, na una go get hevun.
"God go bless una wey dey mourn, bikos e go mak una hapi.
"God go bless una wey nor dey kari bodi up, una go enjoy en promis for dis wold.
"God go bless una wey dey laik to du gud tins, e go giv una evritin wey una wont.
"God go bless una wey dey sori for pipol, una go risiv mesi.
"God go bless una wey get pure heart, na una go si God.
"God go bless una wey dey mak peace, pipol go kol una God shildren.
"God go bless una wey dey sofa bikos una dey du wetin dey rite, na una go enjoy God Kindom for hevun.
"God go bless una wey pipol dey kos, dey sofa and lai for una head bikos of mi.
"Mak una hapi and mak bele swit una, bikos na big tin dey wait una for hevun. Mak una rimemba sey, na so di profets wey kom bifor una, sofa tu."
"Na una bi salt for dis eart. Bot if salt nor get taste; haw e go bi for pipol mout? E beta mak dem trowey-am and mak pipol mash-am.
"Na una bi lite for dis wold and tawn wey dey on-top mountin, nor dey hide.
"Pesin nor dey lite lamp kon kova am wit bazin, insted e go put am for wer evribodi wey dey insaid di haus go si-am.
"Laik dat tu, mak yor lite shine wel-wel for wer pipol dey, so dat dem go si di gud tins wey yu dey du, wey go mak dem praiz yor Papa wey dey hevun."
"Mak una nor tink sey I kom spoil Mosis Law and di tins wey di profets tish. Nor bi so, misef kom obey dem.
"I tel una tru wod, bifor dis wold go end, evritin wey dey insaid di Law, ivun di smol-smol won, go hapun.

"So enibodi wey nor du wetin God komand and dey tish odas to du as e dey du, naim go smol pas for God Kindom. Bot pesin wey obey God and tish odas to du wetin di Law tok, na big pesin e go bi for God Kindom.
"I tel yu di trut, if di gud wey yu du, nor beta pas wetin di Farisi and di pipol wey dey tish di Law du, yu nor go fit enta God Kindom."
"Yu hear as God tel awa papa dem bifor-bifor sey, 'Nor kil and enibodi wey kil, God go joj am.'
"Bot I tel una, enibodi wey ves for en broda, God go joj am tu. Enibodi wey kos en broda, go face di konsol and enibodi wey kol pesin, 'Mumu', go-go hell fire.
"If yu tak gift go altar and yu kon rimemba sey yor broda get bad bele for yu,
mak yu liv di gift for di altar, first go setol wit yor broda, den yu go fit kom bak kon giv yor gift.
"Kwik setol wit hu dey akiuz yu bifor una rish kourt, if not, e go giv yu to di joj and di warda go trow yu insaid prizin.
"I tel una di trut, yu nor go komot from dat trobol ontil yu pay all di moni!"
"Yu hear wey pipol sey, 'Mak yu nor slip wit hu yu nor mari.'
"Bot I dey tel una naw sey, 'Enibodi wey luk wuman kon get di maind to slip wit am, don alredi komit sin for en heart.'
"If yor rite eye go mak yu sin, mak yu plok am komot. E beta sey won part for yor bodi nor dey, dan sey all yor bodi enta hell fire.
"If yor rite hand go mak yu du bad tin, mak yu kut am trowey! E beta sey won part for yor bodi nor dey, dan sey all yor bodi enta hell fire."
"Pipol dey sey, 'Enibodi wey driv en wife, must gi-am paper sey e nor won mari am again.'

"Bot I dey tel una naw sey, enibodi wey driv en wife komot from marage, wey nor bi sey di wuman slip wit anoda man, don mak di wuman komit adultri and eni man wey mari di wuman, don komit adultri tu."
"Again, yu don hear sey dem tel pipol bifor-bifor sey, 'Mak yu nor break yor promis, bot du wetin yu promis God.'
"Bot I dey tel una naw sey, mak una nor eva yuz hevun swear at all, bikos na God throne e bi,
or wit eart, bikos naim God dey put en leg, or yuz Jerusalem, bikos na di big king tawn e bi.
"Nor ivun yuz yor head swear, bikos yu nor fit mak won singol hair white or blak.
"Wen yu sey, 'Yes,' mak yu min am and wen yu sey 'No,' mak yu min am tu. Eni oda tin wey yu tok pas dis, na devol e from kom."
"Una hear sey, 'Enitin enibodi du una, mak una du-am bak.'
"Bot I tel una, mak una nor fite, if enibodi slap yor face, turn di oda side gi-am tu.
"If enibodi drag yor shirt wit yu, mak yu gi-am yor koat join.
"And if enibodi fos yu waka won mile, mak yu folo am waka tu mile.
"Giv pipol enitin wey dem ask from yu and nor driv enibodi wey kom boro somtin from yu."
"Una hear sey, 'Mak una luv una nebor and hate una enemi.'
"Bot I tel una naw sey, 'Mak una luv una enemis and pray for pipol wey dey sofa una,
so dat una go bi laik una Papa for hevun wey dey alow sun to shine and rain to fal on-top bad and gud pipol.
"If una luv onli di pipol wey luv una, wetin una go gain?Na so bad pipol dey du tu, abi nor bi so?
"If una dey grit onli una brodas, una nor beta pas odas, bikos pipol wey nor no God stil dey du laik dat, abi nor bi so?
"So mak una dey pafet as una Papa wey dey for hevun, pafet."
"Mak una nor dey du gud bikos una wont mak pipol si una; if una du so, God nor go pay una for di gud wey una du .
"Enitiam una giv somtin to pipol, mak una nor show unasef as pritendas dey du for dia sinagog and road, so dat oda pipol go praiz dem. I tel una tru wod, dem don alredi get dia riwod.
"Bot wen una dey giv, mak una nor let una left hand no wetin una rite hand giv.
"So dat una gift, go dey sikrit and una Papa wey dey si for sikrit, go riwod una for pipol present."
"Enitiam wey una dey pray, mak una nor du laik pipol wey dey pritend, wey laik to dey stand pray insaid sinagog and for road, so dat pipol go si dem. I tel una tru wod, dem don alredi get dia riwod.
"Bot wen una dey pray, mak una go insaid room, klose di door and pray to una Papa for sikrit. And una Papa wey dey si for sikrit, go riwod una for pipol present.
"Wen una dey pray, mak una nor tok won wod meni taims as pipol wey dey serv juju dey du, bikos dem tink sey dia juju go hear dem wen dia tok plenti.
"Mak una nor bi laik dem. Una Papa no wetin una nid bifor una bigin ask am.
"So mak una pray laik dis: 'Awa Papa wey dey for hevun, wi praiz yor name,
mak yor Kindom kom, mak wetin yu wont, hapun for dis wold as e bi for hevun.
'Giv us di fud wey wi go chop evriday,
forgiv us all di bad-bad tins wey wi don du, as wi sef dey forgiv odas di bad tins wey dem du us.
'Nor alow us enta temtashon bot mak yu save us from bad tins.'
"If una forgiv oda pipol di bad tins wey dem du una, una Papa wey dey for hevun go forgiv una tu.
"Bot if una nor forgiv odas, una Papa sef nor go forgiv una."
"Wen una dey fast, mak una nor skwiz una face laik pipol wey dey pritend, so dat pipol go si sey dem dey fast. I tel una tru wod, dem don alredi get dia ful riwod.
"Bot wen una dey fast, mak una wosh and rub pomade for una face,
so dat odas nor go no sey una dey fast, bot onli una Papa wey dey for sikrit go no. And una Papa wey dey si for sikrit, go riwod una for pipol present."
"Mak una nor jos gada propati for dis wold, bikos ant go chop dem or dem go rust, or tif fit enta insaid di haus tif dem.
"Bot mak una gada beta tins for unasef for hevun, wer ant nor go fit chop dem and dem nor go rust and tif nor go fit enta,
bikos, wer una properti dey, na der una heart go dey tu.
"Na eye bi di lite for pesin bodi. If pesin eye dey okay, lite go ful en bodi.
"Bot if pesin eye blind, den daknes go ful en bodi. If di lite wey dey insaid una na daknes, di daknes big wel-wel!
"Nobodi go fit serv tu oga, e go hate won kon luv di oda won, or e go serv won wit all en heart and nor respet di oda won. Nobodi go fit serv God and moni for di same taim.
"So I tel una, mak una nor wori abaut una life, wetin una go chop or drink and wetin una go wear for bodi. Life nor big pas fud? Abi bodi nor beta pas klot?
"Mak una luk di birds wey dey flai for skai, dem nor dey plant or put enitin wey dem gada insaid store, bot una Papa for hevun dey fid dem. Una nor beta pas dem?
"Hu among una wey dey wori go fit add won hour join en life?
"Why una dey wori abaut klot wey una go wear? Mak una tink haw flawa dey grow for field; dem nor dey wok or mak klot wey dem dey wear.
"I tel una tru wod, ivun Solomon, upon all di moni wey e get, e nor wear klot wey fine rish di wons wey dis flawa dem dey wear!
"If God mak gras fine laik dis, gras wey una go si today and tumoro dem go trow am for fire, E nor go dress una pas dem? Una fate smol wel-wel o-o.
"So mak una nor wori kon dey sey, 'Wetin wi go chop' or 'Wetin wi go drink?' or 'Wetin wi go wear?'
"Na dis kaind tins pipol wey nor no God dey porshu and una Papa for hevun no sey una nid dem.
"Bot mak una first du di gud tins wey God wont and evri oda tin go bi una own.
"So mak una nor wori abaut tumoro, bikos tumoro get en own wahala. Today trobol don du."
"Mak una nor dey joj pipol enihaw, so dat God nor go joj una.
"Bikos, na as una joj, na so God go tak joj una and as una du oda pipol, na so dem go du una tu.
"Why yu dey si di smol dirti wey dey yor broda eye, bot yu nor dey si di big wud wey dey for yor own eye?
"Haw yu won tak tel yor broda sey, 'Mak I rimov di dirti wey dey yor eye, wen big wud dey yor own?'
"Yu wey dey pritend, first rimov di big wud wey dey yor eye, den yu go fit si di smol dirti for yor broda own.
"Mak una nor giv dog wetin bi God own or trow yor gold giv pig, bikos dem go mash am wit leg, turn face yu, den kon tear yu to pieces.
"Wen yu ask for somtin, God go giv am to yu; wen yu luk for somtin, yu go si-am and wen yu knok, di door go opun for yu.
"Enibodi wey ask for somtin, go get-am; enibodi wey dey faind somtin, go si wetin e dey faind and pesin wey knok door, dem go opun for am.
"E get eni of una wey en pikin ask am for bread and e kon gi-am stone?
"Or if di pikin ask for fish, yu go gi-am snake?
"If yu wey bad fit giv yor pikin gud tin, yu tink sey God wey dey hevun nor go giv beta tin to pipol wey ask am?
"Bikos of dis, mak yu trit pipol as yu wont mak dem trit yu, bikos na so dem rite am for di Profets and for Mosis law.
"Mak yu pas di smol gate enta, bikos di gate wey pipol go pas go sofa, wide wel-wel and meni pipol dey waka enta.
"Bot di gate wey pipol dey pas enta life, smol wel-wel and e hard to enta and na onli few pipol go fit si-am.
"Mak yu shine yor eye, bikos lai-lia profets go kom laik ship, bot for insaid dia heart, dem bi wiked anima wey dey kil.
"Yu go no dem wit wetin dem dey du. Pipol nor dey gada grape or fig from shuku-shuku.
"So tu, evri gud tri go bear gud frut, bot bad tri, go bear bad frut.
"Gud tri nor go fit bear bad frut and bad tri nor go fit bear gud frut.
"Eni tri wey nor bear gud frut, dem go kut-am dan kon trow am insaid fire.
"So, yu go no di lai-lia profets wit wetin dem dey du."
"Nor bi evribodi wey dey kol God, 'Oga, Oga, go enta God Kindom, bot na onli di pipol wey dey du wetin my Papa for hevun wont.
"For dat day wey God go joj evribodi, meni pipol go sey, 'Oga, wi yuz yor name prish God mesage, driv meni dimon komot from pipol bodi and du meni mirakol.'
"Dat taim, I go sey, 'I nor no yu. Mak yu komot from wer I dey, yu wey wiked wel-wel!'"
"Enibodi wey hear my wod and du wetin I tok, e bi laik wise man wey build en haus on-top rock.
"Wen rain fal, wota kon ful di groun, den strong briz kon blow di haus, e nor go fal, bikos dem build am on-top rock.
"Bot enibodi wey hear my wod and e nor du-am, e bi laik foolish man wey build en haus on-top sand.
"Wen rain fal, wota kon ful di groun, den strong kon briz blow di haus, na wons e go fal skata for groun."
Afta Jisos don tok all dis tins, di pipol kon sopraiz haw e dey tish,
bikos e tish dem laik pesin wey get authoriti and nor bi as dia law tishas dey du.
Afta Jisos kom dan from di mountin, plenti pipol kon folo am.
Won lepa kon mit am, nil dan for en front, kon sey, 'Oga, if yu wont, yu go fit heal mi, so dat my bodi go wel?
Jisos tosh di man kon sey, "Yes, I wont mak yu wel!" At wons, di siknes komot from di man bodi.
Den, Jisos tel am, "Nor tel enibodi, bot go mit di prist, mak e luk yu. Afta, go giv di offrin wey Mosis komand."
Wen Jisos enta Kapanum, won Roman ofisa kon mit am dey beg mak e help am.
Di ofisa sey, "Oga, my savant dey wey nor wel for haus, e nor fit get up and en bodi dey pain am wel-wel."
Jisos kon ansa, "I go kom heal am."
Bot di ofisa sey, "Oga, I nor big rish hu yu go enta en haus, insted jos tok and my savant go wel.

"Mi-sef, I bi man wey get oga and I stil get sojas wey dey unda mi. If I komand won sey mak e 'Go', e go-go, if I komand anoda won sey mak e 'Kom', e go kom and if I komand my savant mak e 'Du dis tin', e go du-am."
Wen Jisos hear wetin e tok, e sopraiz, den e tel di pipol wey dey folo am, "I tel una tru wod, I neva si enibodi wey get dis kaind fate for Izrel!
"Meni pipol from east and west go kom folo Abraham, Izik and Jakop chop insaid God Kindom.
"Bot, dem go trow di pipol wey sopoz enta di Kindom for daknes, wer dem go dey krai and grind dia tit."
Den Jisos kon tel di ofisa, "Go, since yu biliv, na so e go bi for yu." Na dat same taim di savant wel.
Wen Jisos enta Pita haus, e kon si sey Pita wife mama nor wel.
Den e tosh di wuman and di fiva komot from en bodi. So, di wuman get up kon bigin serv dem.
Wen evenin rish, dem bring meni pipol wey dimon dey insaid dem kom mit Jisos. E driv di wiked spirits komot kon heal all di pipol wey nor wel.
Dis won mak wetin Profet Isaia tok bi tru, "E rimov awa siknes and kari awa diziz komot"
Wen Jisos si plenti pipol gada am, e kon komand en disaipols mak dem kros go di oda side for di riva.
Won law tisha kon tel Jisos, "Tisha, I go folo yu go eniwer wey yu dey go."
Jisos kon ansa am, "Rabbit and bird get dia own haus, bot Man Pikin nor get wer e go fit res en head."
Anoda disaipol kon sey, "Oga, mak I first go bere my papa."
Jisos ansa am, "Folo mi, mak doz wey don die bere dia dead bodi."
As Jisos enta di boat, en disaipols kon folo am.
At wons, strong briz kon dey blow for di sea and wave won sink di boat. Bot Jisos Kraist dey slip.
So en disaipols wak-am kon sey, "Oga, save us! Na die wi dey die so o-o!"
Jisos ansa dem, "Una fate smol o-o. Wetin mak una dey fear?" Den e get up, komand di briz and di wave sey mak dem stop and evriwer kon kwayet at wons.
Di men sopraiz wel-wel kon dey ask ish oda, "Wish kaind man bi dis? Ivun briz and wave dey obey am!"
Wen Jisos rish di oda side wer Gadarene pipol dey stay, tu men wey get dimon, run from di beria groun kom mit am. Nobodi dey fit pas dat road bikos di men wiked wel-wel.
Di dimons kon hala, "God Pikin, yu nor go liv us, abi yu kom sofa us wen taim neva rish?"
For wer dem dey, plenti pig dey chop near der.
Den di dimons kon beg Jisos, "If yu driv us komot, mak yu send us go enta insaid di pigs."
So Jisos tel dem, "Mak una go!" At wons, dem kon komot enta insaid di pigs and all di pigs rush go enta di riva, kon die.
Di pipol wey dey luk di pigs, run go di tawn kon tel pipol evritin wey hapun to di men wey get dimons.
Den evribodi for di tawn kon dey faind Jisos. Wen dem si-am, dem kon beg am mak e komot from dia aria.
Jisos enta boat, kon kros go en home-tawn for di oda side.
Some pipol kon bring won man wey nor fit waka kom mit am. Wen Jisos si as dia fate strong rish, e kon tel di man wey nor fit waka, "My pikin, mak yu nor fear! God don forgiv yu all yor sins."
Den som law tishas kon dey tink for dia maind sey, "Si as dis man dey shalenge God."
Wen Jisos no wetin dem dey tink, e kon ask dem, "Wetin mak una dey tink dis kaind bad tin for una maind?
"Wish won eazi pas to tok, 'I forgiv yu yor sins' or 'Stand up mak yu dey waka?'
"Bot mak una no sey Man Pikin get pawa for dis wold to forgiv pipol dia sin." So e kon tel di man wey nor fit waka, "Stand up, kari yor bed, mak yu dey go yor haus."
Den di man stand up kon waka go en haus.
Wen di pipol si wetin hapun, dem sopraiz wel-wel, kon bigin praiz God wey giv dis kaind pawa to humanbin.
As Jisos komot from der, e si won man wey en name bi Matiu, wey sidan for wer dem for dey pay tax. Jisos kon tel am, "Folo mi." At wons, di man kon get up folo am.
As Jisos dey chop for Matiu haus, meni tax koletors and sinas folo en and en disaipols dey chop tu.
Wen di Farisi si wetin dey hapun, dem kon bigin ask di disaipols, "Wetin mak una tisha dey folo tax koletors and sinas dey chop?"
Wen Jisos hear wetin dem dey tok, e kon ansa dem, "Pesin wey wel nor nid doktor to kior am, bot na onli hu nor wel, nid am.
"Mak una go learn wetin dis wod min, 'Na mesi I wont, nor bi sakrifais, na sinas I kom save, nor bi gud pipol."
Jon disaipols kom mit Jisos kon ask am, "Why e bi sey wi and di Farisi pipol dey fast evritaim and yor disaipols nor dey fast?"

Jisos kon ansa, "Pipol wey kom marage dey mourn if di man wey dey mari dey wit dem? E nor dey hapun laik dat! Bot di day go kom wen dem go tak di man wey dey mari komot from wer dem dey, dat taim, dem go fast.
"Nobodi dey tak new klot pash di hole wey dey for old klot, bikos wer dem pash for di old klot go tear more and di hole wey go dey der, go big pas di won wey dey bifor.

"Nobodi go pour new wine insaid old wine bag, bikos di bag go burst and di wine go pour trowey, den di wine bag go tear. Na dis mak dem dey put new wine insaid new wine bag, so dat di wine nor go trowey and di wine bag nor go tear."
As Jisos dey tok dis tins, won oga kom nil dan for en front kon sey, "My dota jos die, mak yu kom tosh am and e go wak-up."
So Jisos and en disaipols kon folo am.
Won wuman wey blood dey rush komot for en bodi for twef years kon tosh Jisos klot.
Bikos di wuman tink for en maind sey, "If I go fit tosh en klot kona, I go wel."
Wen Jisos turn round si di wuman, e kon tel am, "My pikin, mak yu nor wori! Yor fate don mak yu wel." From dat taim, di wuman kon wel.
Wen Jisos enta di oga haus, e si pipol dey play mizik and plenti pipol dey mak nois for der.
E kon tel dem, "Mak evribodi komot, di girl nor die, e jos dey slip." Den, dem kon bigin laff am.
Afta di pipol don go outsaid, Jisos go hol di girl for hand and di girl kon stand up!
Pipol kon bigin tok wetin hapun so for evriwer.
As Jisos komot for der, tu blind men kon folo am dey shaut, "David pikin, mak yu sori for us!"
Wen Jisos don enta di haus, di tu blind men kom mit am. Den e ask dem, "Una biliv sey I fit mak una si?" Dem kon ansa, "Yes, yu fit."
Den Jisos tosh dia eyes kon sey, "Mak e hapun to una as una fate strong rish."
At wons, dia eyes kon opun and dem kon bigin si. Jisos kon warn dem sey, "Mak una nor tel enibodi wetin hapun so."
Bot dem kon go evriwer, bigin tok abaut di tin wey Jisos du for dem.
As dem komot, som pipol bring won man wey get dimon and e nor fit tok, kom mit Jisos.
Wen Jisos don driv di dimon komot, di man kon bigin tok. Di pipol wey gada for di place sopraiz wel-wel and dem kon sey, "Nobodi don si dis kaind tin for Izrel bifor."
Bot di Farisi pipol sey, "Na devol pawa Jisos dey yuz tak driv dimon komot from piopl bodi."
Jisos waka go all di tawn and vilage, dey prish di Gud News abaut God Kindom for dia sinagog and dey heal difren diziz and siknes.
Wen e si haw pipol plenti rish, e kon sori for dem, bikos nobodi dey to help dem and dem kon dey waka enihaw laik ship wey nor get hu dey luk dem.
Den e tel en disaipols, "Wetin pipol go havest plenti wel-wel, bot di pipol wey go du di wok nor plenti rish.
So, mak una pray mak di Oga wey get di farm, send pipol wey go wok for en farm, kom.”
Jisos kol en twef disaipols kon giv dem pawa to driv dimons and heal all diziz and siknes.
Dis na di twef disaipols name: Saimon Pita; Andru, wey bi Pita broda; James wey bi Zebedi pikin and en broda Jon.
Filip and Batlomi; Tomas; Matiu, wey bi tax koletor; James, wey bi Afius pikin and Tadius.
Saimon wey bi Zilot (pesin wey dey fite for en kontri) and Judas Iskarot wey sel Jisos Kraist.
Jisos send dem and tel dem, "Mak una nor go Gentai aria go prish and mak una nor enta Samaria pipol tawn,
bot mak una go mit Izrel pipol, wey bi God ship, wey loss.
"As una dey go, mak una prish di mesage sey; 'God Kindom don near!'
"Mak una heal pipol wey nor wel, wak pipol wey don die, kior lepas and driv dimons komot from pipol bodi. Na fri God giv una dis pawa, so mak una gi-am fri to oda pipol tu.
"Mak una nor kari eni moni folo bodi,
or kari bag or extra dress, sandal or wokin stick, bikos di pipol wey una go mit, go giv una evritin wey una nid.
"Wen una enta eni tawn or vilage, mak una luk for pesin wey redi to risiv una for en haus, mak una stay wit am ontil una komot from dat tawn.
"Eni haus wey una enta, mak una grit di pipol wey dey insaid.
"And if di pipol insaid di haus welkom una, mak una peace stay wit dem, bot if dem nor welkom una, una peace go kom bak to una.
"If di pipol nor welkom or listin to una mesage, mak una shake dia sand komot from una leg as una dey liv dat haus or tawn.
"I tel una tru wod, e go beta for Sodom and Gomorra pipol for jojment day, pas di pipol wey dey dat tawn."
"Si! I dey send una go laik ship for wer plenti wiked animas dey, so mak una dey wise laik snake and gentol laik dove.
"Mak una redi, bikos pipol go arres una kari go kourt and flog una for dia sinagog.
"Bikos of mi, dem go drag una go mit rulas and kings, so dat una go tok abaut mi giv dem and di Gentai pipol.
"Mak una nor wori abaut wetin una go tok wen dem drag una go kourt, bikos God go giv una wetin to tok wen dat taim rish.
"Nor bi una go dey tok, bot na una Papa spirit go dey yuz una mout tok.
"Broda go sel en own broda giv pipol mak dem kil-am and na so papa go sel en own pikin tu. Shildren go fite and kil dia papa and mama.
"Evribodi go hate una bikos of mi. Bot enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, God go save am.
"Enitiam dem sofa una for won tawn bikos of mi, mak una run go anoda tawn. I tel una tru wod, una nor go run pas all di tawn for Izrel, bifor Man Pikin go kom bak.
"Nobodi big pas en tisha and no savant big pas en oga.
"E gud mak disaipol bi laik en tisha and mak savant bi laik en oga. If dem dey kol oga for en haus 'Belzibub (wey min dimon oga),' wot of di pipol wey dey di haus? Dem nor go kol dem bad name tu?"
"Mak una nor fear man, bikos nortin wey hide wey nor go kom out and no sikrit wey pipol nor go no.
"Wetin I tel una for daknes, mak una tok am for day taim and wetin I tok for una ear, mak una shaut am mak pipol hear.
"Mak una nor fear hu go fit kil di bodi and nor fit kil di soul. Insted, mak una fear God wey fit distroi pesin soul and bodi for hell fire.
"Nor bi won penni dem dey sel tu sparo bird? Bot no-one go fal rish groun, esept God alow am.
"Si! God no haw meni hair dey for una head.
"So, mak una nor fear, una beta pas meni sparo.
"Enibodi wey tok for publik sey en no mi, na so mi tu go tok abaut am giv my Papa for hevun.
"Bot enibodi wey denai mi for publik, misef go denai am for hevun."
"Mak una nor tink sey, I bring peace kom dis wold. No! Na war I bring.
"I kom mak boy pikin nor gri wit en papa and mak girl nor gri wit en mama. Wife nor go gri wit en husban mama,
and pesin wos enemi, go bi en own famili pipol.
"Enibodi wey luv en papa, mama and pikin pas mi, nor go fit bi my disaipol.
"And enibodi wey nor kari en kros folo mi, nor go fit bi my disaipol.
"Enibodi wey hol en life tait, go luz am, bot enibodi wey luz en life bikos of mi, go gain am."
"Enibodi wey welkom yu, welkom mi tu and enibodi wey welkom mi, welkom di Pesin wey send mi.
"Enibodi wey risiv profet, bikos na profet e bi, go get profet riwod. Enibodi wey risiv gud pesin, bikos na gud pesin e bi, go get gud pesin riwod.
"And enibodi wey giv kold wota to di pesin wey smol pas among my disaipols, I tel una tru wod, e nor go eva luz en riwod."
Wen Jisos don tish en disaipols finish, e kon komot from der go tish and prish for difren tawns for Galili.
Naw, wen Jon hear for insaid prizin abaut di tins wey Jisos dey du, e kon send en disaipols go ask am:
"Na yu bi di Mesaya wey wi dey espet or mak wi wait for anoda pesin?"
Jisos kon ansa dem, "Mak una go tel Jon wetin una dey hear and si.
"Blind pipol dey si, pipol wey nor fit waka dey waka, God dey kior lepa, deaf pipol dey hear, pipol wey don die dey wak-up and poor pipol dey hear di Gud News.
"God go bless di pesin wey nor dey ves for mi."
As Jon disaipols dey go, Jisos kon tel di pipol abaut Jon: "Wetin una go desert go si? Na seeds wey briz dey blow?
"Hu una go outsaid go si? Abi na man wey wear fine dress? Pipol wey dey wear fine dress laik dat, nor bi king palise dem dey stay?
"Wetin una go si for outsaid? Na profet? Yes! I tel una, e ivun big pas profet.
"Na Jon bi di pesin wey dem rite for God wod abaut sey: 'Si, I dey send pesin go yor front, mak e go priper di way for yu.'
"I tel una tru wod, among all di pipol wey wuman born, e nor get enibodi wey big rish Jon di Baptist. Bot di pesin wey smol pas for God Kindom, big pas am.
"From Jon di Baptist taim kon rish naw, pipol dey strogol to enta God Kindom, bot na onli doz wey dey strogol wel-wel, dey fit enta.
"Bifor Jon kom, Mosis law and di profets dey prish abaut wetin go hapun.
"And if una gri wit wetin I dey tok, Jon, na-im bi Elija wey sopoz to kom.
"Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear!
"Wetin I go sey dis taim pipol bi laik? Dem bi laik shildren for market wey dey hala for ish oda sey,
'Wi blow flute for una, bot una nor gri dance, wi dey krai for awa pesin wey die, bot una nor folo us krai.'
"Wen Jon di Baptist kom, e nor chop, drink or enjoy life bot una sey, 'E get dimon!'
"Bot wen Man Pikin kom, e chop and drink and una sey, 'Si-am, long-trot, drunkaman, tax koletors and sinas frend!' Bot God wisdom dey show by wetin e dey du."
Jisos kon dey kos all di tawn wer e for du meni mirakols, bikos di pipol nor gri turn from sin kom mit God.

"E nor go beta for Korazin and Betsaida pipol! If to sey di mirakols wey dem du among una hapun for Tyre and Sidon, dem for don turn from dia sin kom mit God, kon kari ashes put for head and wear tear-tear klot,
bot I tel una tru wod, e go eazi for Tyre and Sidon for jojment day pas una.

"Una wey bi Kapanum pipol, una feel sey una fit kari unasef go hevun? No! God go trow una for hell fire, bikos if to sey dem du di mirakols wey dem du for una, for insaid Sodom, di tawn for stil dey til today.
"Bot I tel una, God go get mesi for Sodom pas una for jojment day!"
For dat taim, Jisos kon sey, "I praiz yu Papa, Oga wey get hevun and eart, bikos yu hide dis tins from pipol wey get sense and doz wey no book wel-wel, bot yu show dem to smol shildren.
"Yes! Papa, na so yu wont mak e bi.
"My Papa put evritin for my hand. Nobodi no di pikin, bot na onli en Papa no-am. Nobodi no di Papa, bot na onli di pikin and enibodi wey di pikin shuz to show.
"Una wey don taya and kari heavi load, mak una kom mit mi and I go giv una res.
"Mak una folo mi and learn from mi, bikos I gentol, I nor dey kari bodi up and I go giv una peace for una maind.
"My way eazi to folo and my load nor heavi to kari."
Dat taim, Jisos kon waka pas won corn farm for Sabat Day. En disaipols kon dey plok di corn chop, bikos dem dey hungri.
Bot wen di Farisi pipol si dem, dem kon tel Jisos, "Si, yor disaipols dey break di law for Sabat Day."
Jisos kon ansa, "Una neva read wetin David du wen en and en pipol dey hungri,
haw dem enta God haus kon chop di holi bread wey ordinari pipol nor sopoz chop, bikos na onli prists sopoz to chop am?
"Or una neva read for Mosis law sey, prists dey wok for Sabat Day, bot nobodi dey sey dem komit sin?
"I tel una, pesin wey big pas di Tempol dey here wit una naw.
"If to sey una no wetin dis tin min: 'Na mesi I wont, nor bi sakrifais', una nor for kondem pesin wey nor komit sin.
"Man Pikin na-im bi di Oga for Sabat Day."
Den Jisos komot der, kon enta dia sinagog.
Won man wey en hand die dey der. Som pipol wey dey faind as dem go tak akiuz Jisos kon ask, "E dey rite to heal for Sabat Day?"
Jisos ansa, "If eni of una get ship wey fal insaid pit for Sabat Day, en nor go-go kari am out?
"Humanbin beta pas ship! So, e dey rite to du gud for Sabat Day."
Den Jisos tel di man, "Stresh yor hand." Naim di man stresh en hand and di hand kon strong laik di oda won.
Bot di Farisi pipol kon go plan as dem go tak kil Jisos.
Wen Jisos hear sey dem dey plan to kil-am, e kon komot from der. Meni pipol folo am and e kon heal all of dem wey nor wel.
Bot e warn dem sey, mak dem nor tel enibodi hu e bi.
Dis mak wetin Profet Isaia tok, hapun:
"Na my Savant wey I shuz bi dis, di Won wey I luv, wey I dey hapi wit. I go put my spirit insaid am and e go joj di wold.
"E nor go kworel or shaut, nobodi go hear en vois for publik, e nor go tosh pesin wey wik,
or kwensh di smol hope wey pesin get, ontil dem go stop to opres pipol.
"And en name go giv hope to Gentai and oda pipol for dis wold."
So dem kon bring won blind man wey get dimon and nor fit tok kom mit Jisos. Jisos heal am and di man kon dey si and tok.
Di pipol sopraiz wel-wel kon dey ask, "Dis nor bi David pikin wey wi dey wait for?"
Bot wen di Farisi pipol hear wetin dem dey tok, dem kon ansa, "Na Belzibub (wey bi dimon oga) pawa e dey yuz tak driv dimons komot from pipol bodi."
Wen Jisos no wetin dem dey tink for dia maind, e kon sey, "Evri kindom wey dey fite wit ensef go skata and no tawn or famili wey dey fite demsef, go fit stand.
"So if Satan dey driv Satan komot, e don divide ensef bi dat. Haw en kindom go fit stand?
"And if na Belzibub pawa I dey tak driv dimons komot, na wish pawa una shildren dey tak driv dimon tu? Bikos of dis, una shidren go joj una.
"Bot if na God Spirit I tak dey driv dimons, naim bi sey God Kindom don alredi kom mit una.
"Haw pesin go fit break enta strong man haus kon tif en propati, unles e first tie di strong man? Den e go get shanse tif wetin dey di haus.
"Enibodi wey nor dey wit mi, dey against mi and enibodi wey nor join mi, dey skata my wok.
"Naim mak mi dey tel una sey, 'God go forgiv pipol dia sin and all di bad wod wey dem tok, bot enibodi wey kos or tok bad wod against di Holi Spirit, God nor go forgiv am.'
"Enibodi wey tok bad against Man Pikin, God fit forgiv am. Bot enibodi wey tok bad against di Holi Spirit, God nor go eva forgiv am, weda for dis life or di won wey dey kom."
"Gud tri dey bear gud frut and bad tri dey bear bad frut. Na di frut wey tri bear, naim pipol tak dey no di kaind tri wey e bi.
"Una, snake shildren! Haw una won tak tok gud wod, since una wiked? Na wetin ful pesin heart, naim en mout go tok.
"As gud pesin dey bring gud tins from en heart, na so bad pesin dey bring bad tins from en heart tu.
"I tel una tru wod, for jojment day, pipol go ansa God for all di yeye wod wey dem tok.
"Na di wod wey yu dey tok, naim go fit fri or kondem yu for God front."
Some of dem wey bi law tisha and Farisi pipol kon tel Jisos, "Tisha, wi wont mak yu show us sign."
Jisos ansa, "Si dis bad and wiked pipol for dis taim wey dey ask for sign, I nor go show una eni sign, esept Profet Jona own.
"As Jona dey insaid big fish bele for tiri days and nites, na so Man Pikin go dey for grave for tiri days and nites tu.
"For jojment day, Nineve pipol go kondem di pipol for dis taim, bikos wen Jona prish giv dem, dem turn from sin kom mit God. And naw, sombodi wey big pas Jona dey here wit una!
"For jojment day, Sheba queen go kondem di pipol for dis taim, bikos e travol from far place kom hear Solomon wisdom. And naw, sombodi wey big pas Solomon dey here wit una!"
"Wen evil spirit don komot from pesin bodi, e dey pas wer wota nor dey, dey faind wer e go res, bot if e nor si,
e go tel ensef, 'I go-go bak to di haus wer I from komot.' Wen e go bak kon si sey di haus empti and dem don swip and arange am,
e go-go bring sevun spirit wey wiked pas am, kom. Dem go enta di pesin kon sidan for der, so di pesin kondishon go kon bad pas as e bi bifor. Na laik dis e go hapun to evil pipol for dis taim."
As Jisos stil dey tok, en mama and brodas kon stand for outsaid, bikos dem won si-am.
So sombodi for der kon tel Jisos, "Si, yor mama and brodas dey outsaid bikos dem won tok to yu."
Jisos kon ask di pesin, "Hu bi my mama and brodas?"
Den Jisos point to en disaipols kon sey, "Si, na dis pipol bi my mama and brodas.
"Pesin wey du wetin my Papa for hevun wont, na dat pesin bi my broda, sista and mama."
Dat same day, Jisos komot from di haus go sidan for Galili wotasaid.
Meni pipol gada round am, so e enta won boat and all di pipol stand for groun near di wota.
E kon yuz parabol tish dem meni tins: "Si! E get won farma wey go plants for en farm.
"As e dey plant, som seed fal for road and bird kon chop dem.
"Some fal for sand wey get big-big stone. Di sids kwik grow bikos di sand nor deep.
"So wen sun kom out, e burn dem and bikos dia root nor deep wel, dem kon die.
"Some sid fal for shuku-shuku. Dem grow bot di shuku-shuku, shuk dem die.
"Bot som sid fal for beta groun. Dem grow wel kon bear oda sids, som bear rish ondred, som sisti and som tati.
"Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear!"
Den di disaipols kom mit Jisos ask am, "Why yu dey tok to dis pipol wit parabol?"
Jisos kon ansa dem, "God don mak una no all di sikrit tins abaut en kindom, bot dis pipol nor no.
"Pesin wey get somtin, dem go gi-am more and wetin e get go kon plenti. Bot pesin wey nor get enitin, ivun di smol won wey e get, dem go tak am from am.
"Naim mak I dey tok wit parabol sey: Dis pipol get eye, bot dem nor dey si, dem get ear, bot dem nor dey hear or undastand.
"Na dis tin mak wetin Profet Isaia tok hapun, 'Una go listin wel-wel, bot una nor go undastand. Una go luk wel-wel, bot una nor go si enitin,

'Dis pipol nor go fit undastand; dem nor won hear enitin, dem klose dia eyes mak dem nor for fit si and hear wit dia ear, dia maind don blok, so dem nor go fit undastand, bot if to sey dem fit turn kom mit mi, I for heal dem.'
"Bot God go bless una eye, bikos dem dey si wel and una ear, bikos dem dey hear wod.
"I tel una tru wod, meni profets and gud-gud pipol don wait taya mak dem for hear and si wetin una dey si, bot dem nor si or hear am.
"So, mak una undastand wetin di farma parabol min:
'Wen pesin hear God wod and e nor undastand am, di devol go kom tif di wod wey dem plant for en heart, dis na di sid wey fal for road.
'Di sid wey fal for sand wey get big-big stone, na pesin wey hear di wod kon risiv am wit joy,
bot di sid nor get root, bikos di wod wey e hear nor strong for en heart, so wen trobol kom, e nor go fit bear-am.
"Di sid wey fal for shuku-shuku, na pesin wey hear God wod, bot wahala, long-trot and to kwik get moni for dis wold kon shuk di wod die for en heart and e nor kon bear frut.
'Bot di sid wey fal for beta groun, na pesin wey hear and undastand di wod. E kom bear frut wey rish ondred, sisti and tati."'
Jisos kon tel en disapols anoda parabol, "God Kindom bi laik wen pesin plant gud sid for en land.
"Bot for nite wen evribodi dey slip, di enemi go plant grass join dem.
"Wen di sids grow kon dey bear frut, di grass kon dey grow tu.
"So di savants kon tel dia oga sey, 'Nor bi gud sid wi plant for yor farm? Na wer di grass from kom?'
"Di oga kon ansa, 'Na enemi plant am.' So en savants sey, 'Yu wont mak wi go root dem komot?'
"Bot e kon tel dem, 'No, if una go pul di grass komot, una fit mak mistak pul som from di gud sids tu.
"Mak di gud sids and di grass grow togeda ontil havest. Dat taim, I go tel di pipol wey dey havest sey, 'Mak una first root all di grass, tie and burn dem, den gada di gud sids put insaid my store.'"
Jisos kon tel dem anoda parabol: "God Kindom bi laik mustard sid wey won man plant for en farm.
Na di sid smol pas bot wen e grow, na di plant big pas oda plants for di farm and difren-defren birds kon build haus for en bransh."
Jisos stil tel dem anoda parabol: "God Kindom bi laik yist wey won wuman tak bake bread. E mix am wit plenti flawa and di smol yist kon mak di bread raiz wel-wel."
Jisos tok all dis tins for parabol to di pipol. Evritin wey e tel dem, na parabol e yuz.
E du-am so dat wetin di profet tok, go hapun: "I go opun my mout tok parabol, I go tok evritin wey bi sikrit since God kreate dis wold."
Den Jisos kon liv di pipol enta insaid haus. En disaipols kon tel am, "Tel us wetin di grass parabol for farm min."
Jisos ansa dem, "Di Pesin wey plant di gud sid na God Pikin;
di farm na di wold and di gud sid na di kindom pipol. Di grass na devol shildren,
and di enemi wey plant dem, na di devol. Di havest na di last days and di havest wokas na di angels for hevun.
"Jos as dem gada di grass burn dem for fire, na so e go bi for di last day,
"God Pikin go send en angels mak dem go rimov evritin insaid en kindom wey dey mak pipol sin and break God law.
"Dem go trow dem insaid fire wey nor dey kwensh, wer dem go krai and grind dia tit.
"Den, God pipol go shine laik sun insaid dia Papa Kindom. Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear!
"God Kindom bi laik gold wey dem bere for field. Won pesin wey si-am, kon hide am. Wit hapines, e go sel evritin wey e get buy di land.
"Again, God Kindom bi laik trada wey dey luk for beta gold to buy.
"Wen e si won gold wey dear wel-wel, e kon go sel evritin wey e get buy am.
"Again, God Kindom bi laik net for sea wey kash difren-defren fish.
"Wen di net ful, dem drag am komot from di wota, kon sidan bigin put di gud fish insaid difren kontaina and trowey all di bad won.
"Na so e go bi for di day wen di wold go end. Angels go kom seprate evil pipol from di gud won
and dem go trow di evil pipol insaid hell fire, wer dem go krai and grind dia tit.
Jisos ask dem, "Una undastand all dis tins?" Dem kon ansa, "Yes."
Den Jisos kom tel dem, "Enibodi wey dey tisha di law and e bi disaipol for God Kindom, go bi laik pesin wey get haus, kon bring new and old tins kom out from insaid di haus."
Wen Jisos tok di parabol finish, e kon komot for der.
Den e rish en vilage kon bigin tish di pipol for dia sinagog. Dem sopraiz wel-wel kon sey, "Wer dis man from get dis kaind sense and pawa wey e tak dey du mirakol sef?"
"Nor bi di karpenta pikin bi dis? Nor bi Mary bi en mama? James, Josef, Saimon and Judas, nor bi dia broda e bi?
"Nor bi all en sistas dey stay here wit us so? Na from wer e for get all dis pawa?"
So dem kon dey ves for am. Bot Jisos tel dem, "Profet dey get respet for evriwer, esept for en own vilage and among en famili."
So Jisos nor du meni mirakol for der, bikos dem nor biliv am.
Dat taim, Herod wey dey rule hear abaut Jisos,
so e kon tel en savants, "Dis na Jon di Baptist wey wak-up from deat! Naim mak am get pawa to du all dis mirakol."
Bifor dis taim, Herod don arres Jon put for prizin, bikos Jon dey akuiz am sey,
"E mari Herodias wey bi en broda Filip wife.
Herod kon get maind to kil Jon, bot e dey fear di pipol bikos dem biliv sey, Jon na profet.
So, for Herod betday, Herodias dota dance wel-wel kon mak Herod hapi.
Sotey Herod swear sey e go gi-am enitin wey e ask for.
Jos as en mama tel am, di girl kon ask, "Giv mi Jon di Baptist head for tray."
Di tin pain di King wel-wel, bot as e don swear and bikos of di pipol wey kom di parti, e kon komand mak dem go kil Jon.
So e send en sojas go kut Jon head for insaid prizin.
Dem bring di head for tray kon giv di girl and e kari am go giv en mama.
Den, Jon disaipols kon kari en bodi go bere and dem go tel Jisos wetin hapun.
Wen Jisos hear wetin hapun, e komot der enta boat go wer pipol nor dey. Bot wen pipol from difren-difren tawn hear wer e go, dem kon folo am.
As e kom dan from di boat, e si plenti pipol, so e sori for dem kon heal all di pipol wey nor wel among dem.
Wen evenin rish, en disaipols kom mit am sey, "Dis place na desert and day don dey dak. Mak yu send dis pipol go faind fud buy for demsef insaid di vilage."
Jisos ansa, "Dem nor nid to go, mak una faind somtin giv dem chop."
Dem kon tel am, "Na onli faiv bread and tu fish wi get for here."
Jisos ansa dem again, "Mak una bring di bread and fish kom."
Den e tel di pipol mak dem sidan for di grass. E tak di faiv bread and tu fish face hevun kon tank God. Afta e don tank God, e share di bread giv en disaipols mak dem giv di pipol.
All of dem chop beleful and wen dem gada di fud wey rimain, e rish twef basket.
Di pipol wey chop na abaut faiv tazon men, ivun doh dem nor kount wimen and shildren join.
Afta Jisos send di pipol go dia haus, e kon tel en disaipols mak dem enta boat kros go di oda side.
Afta di pipol don go, Jisos kon klimb go mountin go pray. E stay der go rish evenin.
By dis taim, di boat don go far from land. Strong wave kom dey kari di boat up and dan bikos heavi briz dey blow.
For earli mornin, Jisos kon dey waka go mit en disaipols on-top di wota.
Wen di disaipols si-am dey waka on-top wota, fear kash dem. Dem kon dey shake dey shaut, "Na ghost-o-o!"
Bot Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una heart strong! Na mi, mak una nor fear."
Naim Pita kon ansa, "Oga, if na yu tru-tru, kol mi mak I kom mit yu for di wota."
So, Jisos kon tel am, "Kom!" Pita kon komot from di boat, dey waka on-top di wota go mit Jisos.
Bot wen e si as di briz strong wel-wel, fear kash am and e kon bigin sink. So e shaut, "Oga, save mi o-o!"
At wons, Jisos kon stresh en hand kash am. E kon tel am, "Yor fite tu smol. Why yu dey doubt mi?"
Wen di tu of dem don enta di boat, di briz kon stop.
Den di oda disaipols for di boat kon bow-down for Jisos front woship am sey, "Tru-tru, yu bi God Pikin."
Wen dem don kros di riva go di oda side, dem kon land for Genesaret.
Wen di pipol for der no sey na Jisos, dem send mesage go all dia vilage, den dem kon bring all dia sik pipol kom mit am,
dey beg am sey, "Mak di sik pipol tosh yor dress" and all of dem wey tosh am, kon wel.
Some Farisi pipol and law tishas kom mit Jisos for Jerusalem ask am,
"Why yor disaipols nor dey obey awa eldas tradishon? Dem nor dey wosh dia hand bifor dem chop."
Jisos kon ansa dem, "Why una nor dey obey God komandment, na bikos una won kip una tradishon?
"God sey, 'Respet yor papa and mama, enibodi wey kos en papa or mama, dem must kil-am.'
"Bot una sey, 'If enibodi tel en papa or mama, "Wetin I won giv yu bifor, I don gi-am to God",
den e nor nid to respet en papa again.' Bikos of una tradishon, una don mak God wod yeye.
"Una wey dey pritend! Tru-tru, na una Profet Isaia tok abaut wen e sey,
'Dis pipol dey praiz mi wit dia mout, bot dia heart dey far from mi
and di woship wey dem dey giv mi, dey yuzles, bikos dem dey tish tradishon wey humanbin get.'"
Den Jisos gada di pipol kon dey tish dem, "Mak una listin so dat una go undastand.
"Nor bi wetin pesin chop dey mak am dirti, bot na wetin e tok from en mout."
Den di disaipols kon mit am sey, "Yu no sey di Farisi pipol dey ves bikos of wetin yu tok?"
Jisos kon ansa, "Eni plant wey my Papa for hevun nor plant, dem go root am komot.
"Leav dem! Dem bi blind pipol wey dey show blind pipol road. If pesin wey blind dey show anoda blind pesin road, tu of dem go fal insaid gutta."
Bot Pita tel Jisos, "Tel us wetin yu min."
Jisos ansa, "Afta evritin wey I don tok so, una nor stil undastand?
"Una nor no sey enitin wey pesin chop enta bele, e go shit-am kom out?
"Bot di tins wey dey kom out from pesin mout, dey kom from en heart and na dis tins dey mak di pesin dirti.
"Na from pesin heart bad-bad tins dey kom out and dis tins dey mak dem kil, slip wit hu dem nor mari, tif, lai and to joj pesin for en bak.
"Na all dis tins dey mak pesin dirti, nor bi bikos pesin chop wit en hand wey e nor wosh."
Afta Jisos komot der, e kon go Tyre and Sidon aria.
For der, won Kanan wuman krai kom mit am sey, "Oga, David Pikin, mak yu sori for mi! My dota nor wel, bikos dimon dey trobol am!"
Bot Jisos nor tok. So en disaipols kon beg am, "Driv dis wuman komot for here, bikos e dey disturb us."
Jisos kon tel di wuman, "Na di ship wey loss among Izrel pipol, naim God send mi kom faind."
Di wuman nil dan for en front kon dey beg am sey, "Oga, mak yu help mi!"
Jisos kon tel am, "E nor gud to giv dog di bread wey shildren sopoz to chop."
Den di wuman ansa, "Yes Oga, Bot di dog demsef dey chop di smol-smol bread wey dey fal from dia oga tabol."
So Jisos tel am, "Madam, yor fate big wel-wel! Mak wetin yu dey faind rish yor hand." Dat same taim, di pikin kon wel.
Jisos komot from der go Galili wotasaid. Den e klimb won mountin go sidan.
Meni pipol kon kari pipol wey nor fit waka, blind, paralaiz, dumb and odas wey get difren siknes kom en front and e heal all of dem.
Di pipol kon sopraiz wel-wel wen dem si hu nor fit tok, dey tok, hu nor fit waka, dey waka, hu blind bifor, dey si naw and all of dem kon praiz Izrel pipol God.

Jisos kol en disaipols kon tel dem, "I dey sori for dis pipol bikos dem don dey here wit mi for tiri days and dem nor get enitin to chop. I nor wont mak dem go bak wit hunga, mak dem nor go faint for road."
Di disaipols kon ansa, "As dis pipol plenti so, wer wi go fit get fud wey go rish dem chop for dis desert?"
Jisos kon ask dem, "Haw meni bread una get?" Dem ansa, "Na sevun and som smol-smol fish."
So, Jisos tel di pipol mak dem sidan for groun,
kon tak di sevun bread and di fish. Afta e don tank God, e divid di bread giv en disaipols mak dem share am for di pipol.
Di pipol chop kon beleful and di fud wey rimain, ful sevun basket.
Di men wey chop na for tazon, ivun doh dem nor kount wimen and shildren join dem.
Afta Jisos Kraist don send di pipol go dia haus, e kon enta boat go Magadan aria.
Di Farisi and Sadusi pipol kom test Jisos. Dem ask am mak e show dem sign from hevun.
Bot Jisos tel dem, "Wen evenin rish, una go sey, 'Di weda go gud bikos di skai red,'
and for mornin, una go sey, 'Rain go fal bikos di skai red and dak.' Una sabi yuz di skai no haw weda go bi, bot una nor fit no di signs abaut di taim wey God tok for en wod.
"Wiked and evil pipol of dis taim dey ask for sign, bot dem nor go get eni, esept Jona sign." Den Jisos kon waka liv dem.
Wen di disaipols kros go di oda side, dem forget to tak bread folo bodi.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una gaid unasef against di Farisi and Sadusi pipol yist."
So dem kon dey tok among demsef sey, "Na bikos wi nor bring bread, naim mak am dey tok laik dis."
Wen Jisos no wetin dem dey tok, e kon tel dem, "Una fite smol o! Wetin mak una dey kworel wit unasef sey una nor tak bread folo bodi?
"So una neva stil undastand? Una nor rimemba di faiv bread wey I tak fid faiv tazon men and haw meni basket una gada afta dem don chop finish?
"Or di sevun bread for di for tazon men and haw meni basket una gada afta dem don chop finish tu?
"Why una nor undastand sey I nor dey tok to una abaut bread? Bot na mak una for gaid unasef against wetin di Farisi and Sadusi pipol dey tish!"
Den di disaipols kon no sey nor bi bikos of bread mak am dey warn dem, bot na bikos of di tins wey di Farisi and Sadusi pipol dey tish.
Wen Jisos Kraist rish Sizeria for Filippi aria, e kon ask en disaipols, "Na hu pipol sey Man Pikin bi?"
Dem kon ansa, "Some pipol sey yu bi Jon di Baptist, odas sey yu bi Elija and som dey sey na Jeremia or won oda profet naim yu bi."
Jisos kon ask dem, "Hu una sey I bi?"
Saimon Pita kon ansa, "Yu bi di Mesaya, God Pikin wey dey alaif."
Den Jisos tel am, "God go bless yu, Saimon, Jona pikin, bikos na my Papa for hevun show yu dis tin, nor bi humanbin.
"And I tel yu, yu bi Pita, wey min rock, and on-top dis rock, I go build my shosh and di gate for hell nor go fit skata am.
"I go giv yu hevun key, so dat enitin wey yor praya tie for eart, dem go tie am for hevun and enitin wey yor praya luz for dis eart, dem go luz am for hevun."
Den Jisos orda en disaipols mak dem nor tel enibodi sey, na-im bi di Mesaya.
From dat taim go, Jisos kon dey tel en disaipols sey, en must enta Jerusalem wer di eldas, prist oga dem and di law tishas go sofa and kil-am, bot for di ted day, e go wak-up.
So Pita tak Jisos go won kona kon tel am, "Oga! God forbid! Dis kaind tin nor go eva hapun to yu!"
Bot Jisos turn face Pita kon sey, "Satan, komot for my front! Yu bi stone wey blok road, bikos yor maind nor dey for wetin God wont, bot na wetin man wont."
Den Jisos tel en disaipols, "If enibodi won folo mi, e must denai ensef, kari en kros and folo mi.
"Enibodi wey won save en life, go luz am, bot enibodi wey luz en life bikos of mi, go gain am.
"Wetin pesin go gain, if di hol wold bi en own, bot e luz en soul? Or wetin pesin go fit giv tak pay for en soul?
"God Pikin and en angels go kom wit en Papa glori, den e go riwod evribodi akordin to dia wok.
"I tel una tru wod, som of una dey here wey nor go die, bifor God Pikin go kom bak wit en kindom."
Afta sis days, Jisos tak Pita, James and Jon (wey bi James broda), go on-top won high mountin.
Jisos bodi kon shange. En face kon dey shine laik sun and en dress kon white.
At wons Mosis and Elija kon apier dey tok to Jisos.
So Pita kon tel Jisos, "Oga, e gud mak wi stay here. If yu laik, I go build tiri canopi- won for yu, won for Mosis and won for Elija."
As e stil dey tok, won brite kloud kon kova dem and won vois kon sey, "Dis na my Pikin wey I luv. Mak una listin to am!"
Wen di disaipols hear di vois, dem fear kon fal face groun.
Bot Jisos tosh dem kon sey, "Stand up! Mak una nor fear."
Wen dem luk up, di onli pesin wey dem si, na Jisos.
As dem dey kom dan from di mountin, Jisos warn dem sey, "Mak una nor tel enibodi dis vishon wey una si ontil God go wak Man Pikin from deat."
Di disaipols kon ask am, "Why di law tishas dey tish sey na Elija go first kom?"
Jisos ansa, "Na tru sey Elija go first kom and e go ripair evritin.
"And I tel una sey, dat Elija don kom, bot pipol nor no am, insted dem du-am as dem laik. Na so tu, God Pikin go sofa for dia hand."
Den di disaipols kon no sey e dey tel dem abaut Jon di Baptist.
Wen Jisos and en disaipols mit di pipol, won man kon nil dan for Jisos front
beg am sey, "Oga, mak yu sori for my son, bikos siknes dey sofa am and meni taims, di siknes dey trow-am insaid fire and wota.
"I bring am kom mit yor disaipols, bot dem nor fit heal am."
Jisos kon ansa, "Una wey nor get fate and wey nor no wetin to du! Haw long I go dey wit una? Haw long I go bear wit una? Mak una bring di boy kom here."
Den Jisos komand di dimon komot from di boy bodi and at wons, di boy kon wel.
Wen onli di disaipols dey wit Jisos, dem kon ask am, "Why wi nor fit driv di dimon komot from di boy bodi?"

Jisos ansa dem, "Na bikos una fate tu smol and I tel una tru wod, 'If una get fate wey smol laik mustard sid, una go tel dis mountin, "Mak yu move from here go yonda" and e go move and nortin go hard una to du.
"Dis kaind dimon nor go gri komot from pesin bodi esept wit fastin and praya.'"
Wen dem enta Galili, Jisos kon tel dem, "Sombodi go sel Man Pikin giv wiked pipol.
"Dem go kil-am and for di ted day, God go wak-am up." Bot di disaipols nor hapi, bikos of wetin Jisos tok.
Wen Jisos and en disaipols rish Kapanum, di pipol wey dey kolet tax for di Tempol kom mit Pita, kon ask am, "Yor oga dey pay Tempol tax?"
Pita ansa, "Yes." As Pita enta di haus, Jisos kon ask am, "Wetin yu tink, Saimon? Hu dey pay tax giv kings for dis wold? Na pipol for di kontri or strenjas?"
Pita ansa, "Na strenjas dey pay tax." So Jisos kon tel am, "Den dia own kontri pipol dey fri.
"Bot, mak dem nor for kause trobol, go trow hook for riva. Tak di first fish wey yu go kash, wen yu opun en mout, yu go si moni for insaid. Tak di moni pay di tax for mi and una."
Dat taim, di disaipols kon ask Jisos, "Na hu big pas for God Kindom?"
Jisos kon kol won pikin stand for dia front,
den e ansa, "I tel una tru wod, unles una bi laik smol pikin, una nor go fit enta God Kindom!
"Enibodi wey bring ensef dan laik dis smol pikin, naim big pas for God Kindom.
"Enibodi wey welkom won pikin laik dis won for my name, welkom mi.
"Bot if enibodi mak won of dis smol shildren wey biliv mi komit sin, e beta mak dem tie grindin stone for en neck, mak e for sink insaid riva.
"Wahala dey for dis wold, bikos of di sin wey pipol dey komit! Na tru sey trobol must kom, bot e go bad for di pesin wey go kause di trobol.
"If yor hand or leg dey mak yu sin, mak yu kut am trowey. E beta mak yu enta God Kindom witout hand or leg, dan sey God trow yu insaid fire wey nor dey kwensh.
"If yor eye dey mak yu sin, mak yu pul am trowey. E beta mak yu enta God Kindom wit won eye, dan sey God trow yu enta hell fire wit tu eyes."
"Mak sure sey una nor porshu eni of dis smol shildren komot. I tel una di trut, dia angels dey my Papa front for hevun evritaim.
"Bikos Man Pikin kon save pipol wey loss.
"Wetin yu tink? If pesin get ondred ship and won waka loss, e nor go liv di ninety-nine for di bush go faind di won wey loss?
"I tel una tru wod, wen e si-am, e go hapi for dat won pas di ninety-nine wey nor loss.
"Na laik dis tu yor Papa for hevun nor wont mak eni of en shildren loss."
"If yor broda du yu bad, mak yu go tel am wetin e du. If e asept wetin yu tel am, yu don win yor broda bak bi dat.
"Bot if e nor asept wetin yu tok, tak won or tu pipol folo bodi go mit am, bikos mata wey tu or tiri pipol tok put, naim beta pas.
"If e nor asept wetin dem tok, mak yu tel di shosh lidas. If e nor gri listin to wetin di shosh lidas tok, den mak una trit am laik sina or tax koletor.
"I tel una tru wod, enitin wey una tak praya tie for eart, God go tie am for hevun and enitin wey una tak praya tie luz for eart, God go luz am for hevun.
"Again, I tel una tru wod, if tu of una for dis wold gri and pray for enitin, my Papa for hevun go du-am for una.
"Eniwer tu or tiri pipol gada for my name, I go dey der wit dem."
Den Pita kon ask Jisos, "Oga, haw meni taims I go forgiv my broda wey du mi bad? Na sevun taims?"
Jisos ansa am, "Nor bi onli sevun taims I tel yu, bot na for-ondred and ninety taims!"
"God Kindom bi laik wen won king won no haw en savants dey manage en biznes.
"As di king dey shek di account, dem kon bring won savant, wey dey hol ten tazon koins kom.
"Bikos e nor fit pay wetin e hol, di king kon orda mak dem sel di man, en wife, en shildren and evritin wey e get, to pay di debt.
"So, di savant fal for di king front dey beg, 'Oga, mak yu dey patient wit mi, I go pay yu evritin.'
"Di king sori for di savant, kon riliz am sey mak e nor pay again.
"Afta, di same savant kon si anoda savant wey dey hol am ondred silva koins. E kon seize am for trot nearli kil-am, kon tel am, 'Pay mi my moni.'
"Di savant wey e seize for trot kon fal for groun dey beg am, 'Mak yu dey patient wit mi, I go pay yu yor moni.'
"Bot e nor gri. Insted e kari am go put for prizin, ontil e go pay wetin e hol.
"Wen di oda savants si wetin hapun, dem nor hapi at all, so dem kon go tel di king evritin wey hapun.
"So di king kol di first savant kon tel am, 'Yu wiked savant! I forgiv yu di big debt wey yu hol mi, bikos yu beg!
'Wetin mak yu nor sori for anoda savant laik yu, jos as I sori for yu?'
"Wit vesnashon, di king kon giv di savant to polis mak dem sofa am wel-wel, ontil e pay evritin wey e dey hol.
"So, na laik dis my Papa for hevun go du una, if una nor forgiv una brodas from una heart."
Wen Jisos tok finish, e kon komot from Galili go Judea aria for di oda side for Jordan Riva.
Plenti pipol folo am and e heal all of dem.
Some Farisi pipol kom test and ask am sey, "E dey rite for man to driv en wife at all?"
Jisos kon ansa, "Yu neva read am from di biginin sey na man and wuman God mak
and bikos of dat, "Man go liv en papa and mama go join en wife and di tu of dem go kon bi won?
"So dem nor bi tu again, bot won. Diafor, wetin God don join togeda, mak enibodi nor skata am."
Di Farisi pipol kon ask am again, "Wetin mak Mosis sey mak wi driv awa wife?"
Jisos ansa, "Mosis sey mak una driv una wife, bikos una heart dey wiked, bot nor bi so God plan am from biginin.
"Naw I tel una, enibodi wey driv en wife, wey nor bi sey e slip wit anoda man, bot kon mari anoda wuman, don komit adultri."
Di disaipols kon tel Jisos, "If na so husban and wife mata bi, e beta mak pesin nor mari at-all?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Nor bi evribodi go fit asept dis wod, bot na onli di pipol wey God giv di pawa.
"Meni men nor fit slip wit wuman, bikos na so dem born dem, som na humanbin du dem laik dat, bot odas na bikos of God Kindom. Enibodi wey fit asept wetin I tok, mak e tak am laik dat."
Some pipol bring shildren kon mit Jisos mak e put hand for dia head pray for dem. Bot di disaipols kon bigin kworel wit di pipol wey bring di shildren.
Bot Jisos tel di disaipols, "Mak una liv di smol shildren mak dem kom mit mi, nor stop dem, bikos na dem get God Kindom."
So e put en hand for dia head, bless dem, den e waka komot der.
Won man kom mit Jisos, ask am, "Tisha, wetin I go du mak I for fit enta God Kindom.
Jisos ansa am, "Why yu dey ask mi abaut wetin gud? Na onli God gud. So if yu wont enta hevun, mak yu kip God komandments."
Di man kon ask, "Wish won for di komandment?" Jisos ansa, "Mak yu nor kil, nor slip wit pesin wey nor bi yor wife, nor tif, nor tok wetin yor eye nor si,
respet yor papa and mama and mak yu luv yor nebor as yu luv yorsef."
Di young man kon ansa, "I dey obey all dis law wit my heart. Wetin stil rimain wey I go du?"
Jisos kon tel am, "If yu won dey pafet, go sel evritin wey yu get, den giv di moni to poor pipol and yu go get beta tins for hevun. Wen yu don du so, mak yu kom folo mi."
Wen di young man hear wetin Jisos tok, e kon ves waka komot, bikos e get moni wel-wel.
Den Jisos tel en disaipols, "I tel una tru wod, e go hard for pesin wey get moni wel-wel to enta God Kindom!
"Again I sey, e go eazi for camel to pas tru nido hol, dan for pesin wey get moni wel-wel to enta God Kindom."
Di disaipols sopraiz wen dem hear dis tins and dem kon ask, "Den hu go fit dey save?"
Jisos luk dem kon ansa, "E nor posibol for humanbin, bot evritin dey posibol wit God."
Den Pita kon tel Jisos, "Luk, wi don liv evritin wey wi get, kon folo yu! Wetin dey for us naw?"

Jisos ansa am, "I tel yu tru wod, for dat taim wen evritin go dey new, Man Pikin go sidan for en throne wey get glori and una wey dey folo mi, go sidan for twef thrones, dey joj di twef tribes wey dey Izrel.
"And enibodi wey liv en haus, brodas, sistas, papa or mama and land bikos of mi, go get am bak ondred taims and e go get life wey nor dey end.
"So meni pipol wey bi first naw, go bi last and dem wey bi last, go bi first."
"God Kindom bi laik wen pesin komot for earli mornin go hire pipol wey go wok for en farm.
"Afta en and di wokas don agri haw mush dem go get for dia wok, e kon send dem go wok for en farm.
"Wen nain o' klok rish for mornin, e kon si pipol wey nor get wok stand for market.
"E kon tel dem, 'Mak una go wok for my farm, I go pay una wel.'
"So dem kon go. Wen e go out around twef and tiri o' klok for aftanun, e stil tel oda pipol mak dem go wok for di farm.
"Wen faiv o' klok for evenin don nearli rish, e si som pipol wey nor get wok and e kon ask dem, 'Why una nor dey wok and today don nearli finish?'
"Dem ansa am, 'Na bikos nobodi hire us.' E kon tel dem, 'Mak una enta my farm go wok.'
"Wen evenin rish, di owna of di farm tel en managa, 'Kol di wokas mak yu pay dem, start from di last pipol wey I hire.
"Pipol wey dem hire for faiv o' klok, kolet ful day salari.
"And wen di pipol wey dem first hire kom, dem tink sey di oga go pay dem pas laik dat. Bot dem get di same amount.
Wen di first pipol kolet dia moni, dem bigin komplain to di farm owna,
'Dis last pipol wok for onli won hour and wi wok for di hol day insaid hot sun, bot yu pay all of us di same amount.'
"Di farm owna kon ansa won of dem, 'My frend, I nor du yu bad. Nor bi wetin wi agri, dem pay yu?'
'Mak yu tak yor moni dey go. I laik giv dis last pipol di same amount wey I giv yu.
'I nor fit yuz wetin bi my own as I laik? Or yu dey jelos bikos I dey du gud tin?'
"So, di pesin wey bi last, go bi first and di first, go bi last."
As Jisos dey go Jerusalem, e tak en twef disaipols go won kona kon tok to dem.
"Mak una luk, wi dey go Jerusalem and dem go sel Man Pikin giv di prist oga dem and di law tishas. Dem go sey mak dem kil-am
and dem go gi-am to Gentai pipol mak dem laff and flog am wel-wel, den dem go nail am for kros. Bot for di ted day, God go wak-am up."
Den Zebedi wife wit en shildren- James and Jon kom mit Jisos. Dia mama kon nil dan dey beg Jisos.
Jisos kon ask am, "Wetin yu wont?" Di wuman ansa, "Mak yu alow dis my tu boys sidan for yor kindom, won for yor rite side and di oda for yor left."
Jisos ask dem again, "Una no wetin una dey ask for so? Una go fit drink from di cup wey I won drink from?" Dem ansa am, "Wi go fit."
Jisos kon tel dem, "Na tru sey una go fit drink from my cup, bot e nor dey my hand to shuz hu go sidan for my rite and left. Bot na pipol wey my Papa don shuz."
So wen di oda ten disaipols hear dis mata, dem kon dey ves wit di tu brodas.
Bot Jisos kon kol and tel dem, "Una no sey Gentai pipol oga and pipol for big posishon dey kontrol and opres dia pipol.
"Mak e nor bi laik dat among una! Insted, enibodi wey won bi oga among una, must serv di res pipol
and enibodi wey wont bi first among una, must bi savant to di odas,
jos as Man Pikin nor kom mak pipol serv am, bot mak e for serv and giv en life to save meni pipol."
As Jisos dey komot from Jeriko, meni pipol kon dey folo dem.
Tu men wey blind sidan for di road kona. Wen dem hear sey Jisos dey pas, dem kon bigin shaut, "David Pikin, mak yu sori for us!"
Pipol kon dey shaut for dem mak dem kwayet. Bot dem kon dey shaut more-more, "David Pikin, mak yu sori for us."
Jisos kon stop, kol and ask dem, "Wetin una wont mak I du for una?"
Dem ansa, "Oga, mak awa eye opun again."
Jisos sori for dem, so e tosh dia eye. At wons, dem bigin si and dem kon folo Jisos.
As Jisos and en disaipols near Jerusalem, dem kom rish Betpage for Mount Olives, so Jisos kon send tu disaipols
kon tel dem, "Mak una go di vilage wey dey una front. Una go si won donkey and en pikin wey dem tie for der. Luz dem and bring dem kon mit mi.
"If enibodi ask, 'Why una dey luz di donkey dem?' Mak una ansa, 'Di oga nid dem and e go riton dem bak naw naw.'"
Dis hapun so dat wetin di profet tok go bi tru:
"Tel Zion pipol, 'Si! Una king dey kom mit una, e humbol ensef kon sidan on-top donkey.'"
Di disaipols kon go du as Jisos tel dem.
Dem bring di donkey kon put dia klot mak Jisos for sidan on-top.
Meni pipol spread dia klot for di road. Odas kut palm leaf kon spread dem for di road tu.
Pipol wey dey go for Jisos front and dem wey dey folo am kon dey shaut, "Praiz David Pikin! Di pesin wey kom wit God name, God go bless am! Mak wi praiz God wey dey hevun!"
As Jisos enta Jerusalem, di tawn skata and pipol kon dey ask, "Hu bi dis?"
Pipol wey dey folo Jisos kon sey, "Dis na Jisos, di profet from Nazaret for Galili."
Den Jisos enta di Tempol aria kon driv all di pipol wey dey buy and sel insaid di Tempol, e skata di tabol and chair wey di pipol dey tak shange moni and sel dove.
Jisos kon tel dem, "God wod sey, 'Dem go kol my haus, 'Praya Haus', bot una don turn am to wer tif dey hide put!"
Jisos heal pipol wey blind and doz wey nor fit waka insaid di Tempol yard.
Bot wen di prist oga dem and di law tishas si di wondaful tins wey Jisos dey du and hear shildren dey shaut, "Praiz, David Pikin" for insaid di Tempol, dem kon dey ves.
So di prist oga dem and di tishas kon ask Jisos, "Yu dey hear wetin dem dey tok?" Jisos ansa dem, "Yes! Una neva read sey, 'Na shildren and smol pikin wey dey suck breast go praiz God?"
Jisos kon liv dem go Betani kon stay der til day break.
For earli mornin, as Jisos dey go bak to di tawn, e kon dey hungri.
E si won fig tri for di road kon waka go wer e dey, bot e nor si enitin plok, bikos na onli leaf di tri get. So e kon tel di tri, "Yu nor go eva bear frut again!" At wons, di fig tri kon bigin die.
Wen di disaipols si wetin hapun, dem sopraiz kon sey, "Haw dis fig tri kwik die laik dis?"
Jisos ansa dem, "I tel una tru wod, if una get fite and una nor doubt, una nor go onli du wetin hapun to dis fig tri, bot if una tel dis mountin, 'Mak yu move go insaid di sea, e go-go.'
"If una biliv, una go get enitin wey una ask for, wen una pray."
Afta Jisos enta di Tempol, di prist oga dem and di eldas kon ask am wen e dey tish sey, "Na wish pawa yu tak dey du all dis tins and hu giv yu di pawa?"
Jisos ansa dem, "I won ask una won kweshon. If una ansa mi, den misef go tel una wish pawa I tak dey du dis tins.
"Wer Jon baptism from kom? Na from hevun or pipol?" Dem kon dey tok abaut di mata among demsef sey, "If wi sey, 'Na from hevun,' E go sey, 'Den why una nor biliv am?'
Bot if wi sey, 'Na from man,' wi dey fear di pipol, bikos dem biliv sey na profet Jon bi."
So dem kon ansa Jisos, "Wi nor no." Jisos kon tel dem, "Misef nor go tel una wish pawa I tak dey du all dis tins.
Wetin una tink? Won man get tu boys. E tel won, 'My pikin, go wok for my farm today.'
"Di boy ansa, 'I nor go-go.' Bot afta, e shange en maind kon go.
"Di papa kon tel di oda boy di same tin. Dis won kon ansa, 'I go-go sir,' bot e nor go.
"Wish of di tu shildren du wetin dia papa wont?" Dem ansa, "Di first won." Jisos kon tel dem, "I tel una tru wod, tax koletors and ashawo dem go first una enta God Kindom!
"Jon di Baptist kom show una di tru road and una nor biliv am. Bot tax koletors and ashawo dem biliv am. Ivun wen una si all dis tins wey I du, una stil nor shange una maind kon biliv God."

"Mak una hear anoda parabol: Won man plant vine for en farm, fence am round, dig pit wer dem go for press di frut wey dem go tak mak wine and build wer securiti go stay. Den e rent di farm giv farmas kon travol go far place.
"Wen havest taim don rish, e send en savants go mit di farmas mak dem gi-am en own share.
"Bot di farmas seize di savants, beat won, kil won and stone di oda won.
"Den di man kon send oda savants wey plenti pas di first one go mit di farmas and dem du di same tin to dem.
"At last, e send en own pikin go, dey tink sey, 'May-bi dem go respet my pikin.'
"Bot wen di farmas si di boy, dem kon tel ish oda, 'Di landlord pikin wey go inherit en papa propati, afta e don die, na-im dey kom so. Mak wi kil-am and kolet wetin go bi en own.'
"So dem seize am, trow am komot from di farm kon kil-am.
"Wen di owna of di farm go kom, 'Wetin una tink sey e go du doz farmas?'"
Dem kon ansa Jisos, "E go distroi doz evil pipol! Den e go hire di farm giv oda farmas wey go gi-am wetin bi en own, wen havest taim rish."
Jisos kon tel dem, "Una neva read God wod wey sey: 'Di stone wey di buildas rejet don bikom di pila? Dis na God wok and e dey wondaful for awa eye.'
"Na dis mak mi tel una sey, 'Dem go tak God Kindom from una and dem go gi-am to pipol wey go bear di kaind frut wey E wont.'
"Di pesin wey fal for dis stone go skata and di pesin wey dis stone go fal on-top, go grind to powda.
"Wen di prist oga dem and di Farisi pipol hear Jisos parabols, dem kon no sey e dey tok abaut dem.
"So dem kon dey trai to arres Jisos, bot dem dey fear, bikos di pipol biliv sey na profet e bi."
Jisos kon tok to dem again for parabol sey:
"God Kindom bi laik wen won king du marage for en son.
"E send en savant go kol di pipol wey dem invite kom di parti, bot dem nor gri kom.
"Den e send oda savants sey, 'mak una go tel di pipol wey wi invite sey, "Si! Di parti go soon start. I don kil big melu and oda animas and evritin don redi, so mak una kom for di marage."'
"Bot di pipol nor gri listin to wetin di savants tok, insted won go en farm and di oda kon go du en biznes.
"Di oda wons seize di savants, beat dem enihaw and kil som of dem.
"Di king ves wel-wel kon send en sojas mak dem go kil di pipol wey kil en savants and mak dem burn evritin for di tawn.
"Den e kon tel en savants. 'Di marage don start,' di pipol wey I invite bifor, nor bi di pipol wey sopoz kom.
"So mak una go di streets and invite evribodi wey una si kom di parti.
"So di savants go di streets kon gada all di pipol wey dem si, both bad and gud, kom di marage and di hal kon ful.
"Wen di king si di pipol wey kom di parti, e kon si won man wey nor wear marage klot.
"So di king kon ask am, 'My frend, haw yu tak enta here wen yu nor wear marage klot?' Bot di man nor fit ansa am.
"Den di king kon tel en savants, 'Mak una tie en hand and leg trow am outsaid for daknes, wer e go krai and grind en tit.'
"Na onli few pipol God shuz from di meni wey e kol."
Den di Farisi pipol komot go plan haw dem go tak kash Jisos wit wetin e go tok.

So dem kon send dia disaipols, wit som pipol wey dey sopot Herod, go mit Jisos sey, "Tisha, wi no sey yu dey tok trut wel-wel and yu dey tish wetin God wont. Yu nor dey favor enibodi, bikos yu nor dey play wayo.
"Wetin yu tink? E gud mak wi pay tax giv Caesar?"
Bot Jisos no dia wiked plan, so e kon tel dem, "Una wey dey pritend! Why una won set trap for mi?
"Mak una show mi di moni wey una dey tak pay tax." So dem kon bring di moni kom.
Jisos kon ask dem, "Wish pesin face and name dem stamp put for di moni?"
Dem ansa, "Na Caesar own." Jisos kon tel dem, "Den, mak una giv Caesar wetin bi Caesar own and giv God, wetin bi God own."
So wen dem hear wetin e tok, dem kon waka liv am.
For di same day, di Sadusi pipol (wey biliv sey resureshon nor dey) kom mit and ask Jisos,
"Tisha, Mosis tok sey, 'If man wey nor get pikin die, en broda must mari en wife, so dat e go fit born pikin for en broda wey don die.'
"Yu si, e get sevun brodas wey dey stay here wit us. Di first won mari, lata e kon die, since e nor get pikin, en broda kon mari en wife.
"Di same tin hapun to di sekon broda and di ted won, go rish di numba sevun.
"At last, di wuman kon die tu.
"Wen piopl wey don die go kom bak to life, wish pesin wife di wuman go bi out of di sevun brodas wey mari am?"
Jisos kon ansa dem, "Una dey mak mistak, bikos una nor no God wod and en pawa.
"For resureshon day, pipol nor dey mari or giv wuman out for marage, bikos dem go bi laik angel for hevun.
"Konsanin weda pesin wey don die go kom bak to life, una neva read wetin God tel una?
"God sey, 'I bi Abraham, Izik and Jakop God. I nor bi God for pipol wey don die, bot I bi God for pipol wey dey alaif!'"
Wen di crowd hear as Jisos dey tok, dem sopraiz for wetin e dey tish.
Wen di Farisi pipol hear sey Jisos don mak di Sadusi pipol kwayet, dem kon gada.
Won of dem wey bi law tisha kon ask Jisos won kweshon to tak trai am.
"Tisha, wish komandment big pas?"
Jisos kon ansa, "Mak pesin luv God wit all en heart, wit all en soul and wit all en maind.
"Na dis bi di first komandment and naim big pas.
"Di sekon won bi laik di first won: 'Mak pesin luv en nebor as e luv ensef.'
"Na dis tu komandments, Mosis law and wetin di profets tish, dey folo."
As di Farisi pipol gada, Jisos kon ask dem won kweshon.
"Wetin una tink abaut Kraist, wey bi di Mesaya? Wish pesin pikin e bi?" Dem kon ansa, "Na David Pikin."
Jisos kon ask dem again, "Den, haw kom David kol am, 'Oga', tru God Spirit, wen e sey,
"Di OGA tel my Oga sey,'Sidan for my rite hand, ontil I go put all yor enemis unda yor leg.'
"If David kol am, 'Oga,' den, haw e kom tak bi en pikin?"
Non of dem fit ansa Jisos, so from dat day go, nobodi trai to ask am kweshon again.
Jisos kon tel di pipol and en disaipols sey,
"Na di law tishas and Farisi pipol dey tok wetin Mosis law min.
"So mak una listin to wetin dem dey tel una and du-am. Bot nor du wetin dem dey du, bikos dem nor dey du wetin dem dey tish.
"Dem dey put heavi load for pipol shoulda and dem nor redi to help dem.
"All wetin dem dey du, na mak pipol for si dem. Dem dey tie tins wey dem rite God wod put for dia forehead and hand, mak pipol for si dem.
"Dem laik beta place for parti and beta chair for insaid sinagog.
"Dem laik mak pipol dey grit dem wit respet for market and mak pipol dey kol dem, 'Tisha.'
