"Nor let enibodi kol yu 'Tisha,' bikos na onli won tisha una get and all of una na brodas.
"Mak una nor kol enibodi for dis wold "Papa", bikos na onli won ril Papa una get and e dey for hevun.
"Mak yu nor let pipol kol yu 'Leada,' bikos na onli won lida una get and na-im bi Kraist.
"Di pesin wey big pas among una, go bi una savant.
"Enibodi wey dey kari bodi up, God go bring am dan and enibodi wey nor dey kari bodi up, God go raiz-am up.
"Bot e go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una klose door mak pipol nor for fit enta God Kindom! Unasef nor go enta and una nor won mak odas enta.
"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una dey yuz long praya shit wimen wey dia husban don die, bikos of dis, God go ponish una wel-wel."

"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una dey travol go evriwer jos to win won pesin kon mit God and afta una don win am, una go kon mak am bad wel-wel laik devol pikin, jos as una bi!
"E go bad for una, lidas wey blind, una sey, 'Enibodi wey tak di Tempol swear, nortin go du-am. Bot if e tak di gold for Tempol swear, kos go dey for en head.'
"Una bi fools wey blind! Wish won big pas, na di gold or di Tempol wey mak di gold holi?
"Una dey tish sey, 'Enibodi wey tak di altar swear, nortin go du-am, bot if pesin tak wetin dey for di altar swear, e must du wetin e tok.'
"Una blind o-o! Wish won big pas, na di gift or di altar wey mak di gift holi?
"So, enibodi wey tak di altar swear, na both di altar and evritin wey dey insaid, e tak swear.
"And enibodi tak wey di Tempol swear, na both di Tempol and God wey dey stay insaid, e tak swear.
"Enibodi wey tak hevun swear, na both God throne and di Pesin wey sidan put, e tak swear.

"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una dey giv won out of evri ten tins wey una get, bot una nor dey du di important tin wey di law tok, wey bi to giv koret jojment, to trit pipol wel and to du wetin dey gud! Una sopoz to dey du dis tins join di oda wons.
"Una wey bi oga wey blind! Una dey rimov flai from una drink, bot una dey swalow melu!
"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una dey wosh cup and plate bodi mak dem for klin, bot bad bele and long trot ful insaid una.
"Una Farisi pipol wey blind! Mak una first wosh insaid di cup, den di outsaid go klin tu!
"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una bi laik grave wey fine for outsaid, bot di pesin bodi for insaid, don rotin.
"Na so e bi wit una tu, for outsaid, una bi laik gud pipol, bot for insaid, na wayo and sin ful una life.
"E go bad for una wey dey tish di law and una Farisi pipol, una wey dey pritend! Una build grave for di profet wey don die kon dekorate coffin for pipol wey fear God.
"And una sey, 'If to sey wi dey alaif for awa gran-gran papa dem taim, wi nor for help dem wen dem dey kil di profets.'
"So na una gran-gran papa dem kil di profets.
"Mak una go finish di wok wey una gran-gran papa start!
"Una bi snake! Wiked snake shildren! Haw una go tak eskape hell?
"I go send profets, wise pipol and law tishas kom mit una and una go kil and nail som for kros, flog som insaid una sinagog, den porshu di odas from won tawn go anoda.
"So all God pipol blood wey una kil for dis wold, go dey una head. From Abel blood go rish Zecharia wey bi Barachia pikin, wey una kil for insaid di Tempol.
"I tel una tru wod, pipol for dis generashon go sofa di ponishment for dis tins wey una du!"

"O! Jerusalem pipol, O! Jerusalem pipol! Una wey kil di profets and stone di pipol wey God send kom mit una! I don dey trai to gada una shildren as fawo dey gada en shildren unda am, bot una nor let mi du-am.
"Si, from today go, una go skata and una haus go empti.
"Mak una no sey, una nor go si mi again ontil una go sey, 'Mak God bless di pesin wey kom wit God name!'"
As Jisos dey komot from di Tempol, en disaipols kon show am haw di Tempol buildin bi.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Una dey si all dis tins? I tel una tru wod, wen di taim rish, won blok nor go dey on-top anoda won, bikos di buildin go skata finish!"
As Jisos sidan for Mount Olives, en disaipols kom mit am for kona ask am, "Mak yu tel us wen dis tins go hapun? Haw wi go tak no sey di taim wen yu go kom, don rish?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Mak una shine una eye, so dat nobodi go fit disiv una.
"Meni pipol go kom wit my name dey sey, 'I bi Kraist wey bi di Mesaya' and dem go disiv meni pipol.
"Una go dey hear rumor sey war dey hapun for difren place. Mak una nor fear, bikos e must hapun, bot di taim wey I go kom, neva rish.
"Won kontri go fite wit anoda kontri and won kindom go fite wit anoda kindom. Hunga go dey evriwer and eart-quake go hapun for difren place.
"Wen dis tins go dey hapun, e go bi laik wen bele dey pain wuman wey won born."
"Dem go kari una wey bi my disaipols giv pipol wey go sofa and kil una. Bikos of mi, pipol for difren tawn wey nor no God, go hate una.
"Meni pipol nor go gri folo mi again and dem go dey lai and hate ish oda.
"Meni wayo profets go kom and dem go disiv meni pipol.
"Bikos pipol nor go obey God law, di luv wey meni pipol get for God, nor go strong again.
"Bot God go save di pesin wey go bear go rish end.
"Bifor di wold go end, my pipol go prish abaut God Kindom go rish evriwer."
"As Profet Daniel tok, 'Bad tins go hapun for di holi place, insaid di Tempol' (Enibodi wey hear dis wod, mak e undastand wetin e min).
"Pipol for Judea go run go on-top mountin.
"Pesin wey dey on-top roof, mak e nor kom dan kon tak enitin from en haus
and pesin wey dey farm, mak e nor go bak to en haus go tak en klot.
"For dis taim, e go hard wel-wel for wimen wey get bele and doz wey get smol pikin for hand.
"Mak una pray sey, e nor go bi for Sabat Day or Rainin Season naim all dis tins go hapun,
bikos for dat taim, di sofa wey go dey, go strong pas eni sofa wey don hapun since wen God kreate di wold kom rish naw and dis kaind sofa, nor go dey again.
"And if God nor reduce di days wen dis tins go hapun, evribodi go die finish. Bot bikos of di pipol wey God shuz, e go reduce di days.
"So if enibodi kon tel una sey, 'Luk o-o, Kraist dey here or e dey der!' Mak una nor biliv am.
"Lia-lia mesayas and profets go kom du big-big mirakols tak disiv pipol. If e posibol sef, dem go disiv pipol wey God shuz.
"Mak una rimemba wetin I dey tel una so, bifor dem go hapun.
"So if enibodi tel una sey, "Luk, Kraist dey insaid bush,' mak una nor go, or 'Luk, e dey insaid haus,' mak una nor biliv.
"Jos as thunda lite dey kom from east go west, na so e go bi wen Man Pikin go kom.
"Bikos na wer dead bodi dey, na der vultures dey gada put."
"Afta di wahala wey go hapun for dat taim, di sun go kon dak and di moon nor go shine; stars go fal from hevun and hevun go dey shake.
"Den Man Pikin sign go apier for hevun and all di tribes for dis wold, go krai. Dem go si God Pikin dey kom from insaid di kloud for hevun wit pawa and beta glori.
"God go send en angels go blow loud trumpet and dem go gada di pipol wey e shuz from evriwer for di wold."
"Mak una hear di parabol abaut fig tri: Enitaim en bransh dey bring leaf kom out, pipol go no sey dry season don near.
"So wen una si all dis tins dey hapun, mak una no sey di taim don rish and e dey near una domot.
"I tel una tru wod, di pipol wey dey di wold for dis taim, nor go die finish bifor all dis tins go hapun.
"Hevun and eart go vanish, bot my wod go stil dey.
Nobodi no dat day or di taim, ivun di angels for hevun nor no am, esept my Papa.
"Jos laik e hapun for Noah taim, na so Man Pikin go tak kom.
"For Noah taim, bifor di flood kom, pipol dey chop and drink, dey mari and dey giv dia pikin out for marage, ontil di day wen Noah enta di ark.
"Dem nor no wetin dey hapun ontil wota kom kari dem go. Na laik dat e go bi wen Man Pikin go kom.
"Dat taim, tu men go dey for farm; won go vanish liv di oda won.
"Tu wimen go dey grind corn for engine, won go vanish liv di oda won.
"So, mak una shine una eye, bikos una nor no di day wen Kraist go kom.
"Bot mak una rimemba sey: If pesin wey get haus no di taim wen tif go kom for nite, e go redi ensef mak di tif nor for enta en haus.
"So, mak una dey redi, bikos Man Pikin go kom for di taim wen una nor tink sey e go kom."
"Hu bi di savant wey wise and gud? Na di pesin wey en oga mak lida among di oda savants, to giv dem fud for di koret taim.
"E go gud for dat savant wen en oga go kom bak and e si-am dey wok.
"I tel una tru wod, di oga go sey, 'Mak yu kare for di hol haus.'
"Bot if na wiked savant, e go tel ensef, 'My oga nor go kwik kom bak',
so e go bigin beat di oda savants and e go dey chop and drink wit drunkards.
"Wen di oga go kom bak for di day wen di savant nor espet and di taim wen e nor no,
e go kut di savant to pisis kon trow am put for wer pritendas dey, wer e go dey krai and grind en tit."
"God Kindom bi laik wen ten virgins kari dia lamps go mit man wey won mari wife.
"Faiv get sense and faiv nor get sense.
"Wen di wons wey nor get sense kari dia lamps, dem nor tak extra kerosine folo bodi.
Bot di wons wey get sense kari extra kerosine.
"E kon hapun sey di man wey won mari, nor kwik kom, so all di virgins kon slip.
"For mid-nite, sombodi kon shaut, 'Mak una wak-up, di man wey won mari dey kom-o-o! Mak una kom mit am.'
So all di virgins wak-up, kon inkrease dia lite.
Bot di wons wey nor get sense kon tel di wise wons sey, 'Mak una giv us som kerosine, bikos awa lite won kwensh.'
Bot dem ansa, 'No! Wetin wi get nor go rish wi share, insted mak una go buy for unasef.'
"Wen dem go buy, di man wey won mari kon kom and di wons wey dey redi kon enta di parti wit am and dem kon lock di door.
"Afta, di oda virgins kon kom dey sey, 'Oga, Oga! Mak yu alow us enta.
"Bot e ansa dem, 'No -o -o!, I nor no una!'
So, mak una dey redi, bikos una nor no di day or taim wen Kraist go kom."
"Won man wey dey travol kon kol all en savants divide en propati giv dem.
"E giv won faiv koins, giv anoda tu koins and di last, won koin. E giv ish savant wetin e go fit yuz, den e kon travol.
"Di savant wey get faiv koins kwik-kwik go yuz en moni trade kon gain faiv koins join wetin e get.
"Di same way, di savant wey get tu koins, gain tu extra koins join en own.
"Bot di savant wey get won koin kon go dig hol for outsaid, hide di moni wey en oga gi-am.
"Afta, dia oga kon kom bak mak e for no haw dem yuz di moni wey e giv dem.
"Di savant wey e giv faiv koins, kon bring anoda faiv koins join en own, sey, 'Oga yu giv mi faiv koins. Si, I don gain faiv koins join dem.'
"En oga kon tel am, 'Yu bi gud and wise savant and yu du wel! Since yu fit yuz di smol tins wey I giv yu, e show sey yu go fit kontrol big-big tins. Mak yu kom enjoy wit mi!'
"Di won wey dem giv tu koins stil sey, 'Oga yu giv mi tu koins. Si, I don get tu koins join dem.'
"En oga kon tel am, 'Yu bi gud and wise savant and yu du wel! Since yu fit yuz di smol tins wey I giv yu, e show sey yu go fit kontrol big-big tins. Mak yu kon enjoy wit mi!'
"Den di savant wey e giv won koin kon sey, 'Oga, I no sey yu bi wiked man, yu dey havest wetin yu nor plant and dey pack fruts wey yu nor plok,
so fear kash mi and I kon hide yor moni for groun. So oga, mak yu tak wetin yu giv mi'
En oga kon tel am, 'Yu wiked and lazi savant! Since yu no sey I dey havest wetiin I nor plant and dey pack fruts wey I nor plok,
yu for put my moni for bank, so dat wen I kom bak, I go kolet my moni bak wit intres.
Mak una tak di moni from am and gi-am to di savant wey get ten.
Bikos di pesin wey get somtin go get more and wetin e get go plenti. Bot di pesin wey nor get, ivun di smol won wey e get, dem go tak am from am.
Mak una trow dat wiked savant insaid daknes for outsaid, wer e go krai and grind en tit.
"Wen Man Pikin and en angels go kom wit en glori, e go sidan for en king throne .
"Evribodi for di wold go gada for en front ande go seprate pipol as shepad dey seprate ship from goat.
"E go kip di ship for en rite hand and di goat for en left.
"Den di king go tel di pipol wey dey en rite hand, 'Mak una kom, una wey my Papa don bless and mak una inherit di kindom wey God priper for una bifor di wold start.
"Wen I dey hungri, una giv mi fud, wen I dey thirsti, una giv mi somtin drink and wen I bi strenja, una let mi enta una haus.
"I dey naked and una giv mi klot wear, wen I nor wel, una kare for mi, wen I bin dey prizin, una kom visit mi.'
"Den di raitious pipol go ansa, 'Oga, wish taim wi si yu hungri and dey thirsti, kon fid and giv yu somtin drink?
"Wish taim wi si yu as strenja, kon tak yu enta awa haus, or naked, kon giv yu klot wear?
"Wish taim wi si yu wen yu nor wel or dey for prizin kon visit yu?'
"Den di king go ansa, 'I tel una tru wod, jos as una du-am giv di pesin wey smol pas among my brodas and sistas, una don du-am for mi.
"Di king go tel di pipol wey dey en left hand, 'Mak una komot from my side, una wey God don kos! Mak una enta hell fire wey dem priper for devol and en wiked angels.
"Bikos di taim wey I dey hungri and thirsti, una nor giv mi fud and wota drink.
"Di taim wen I bi strenja, una nor let mi enta una haus, wen I dey naked, una nor giv mi klot wear, wen I sik and dey for prizin, una nor kom visit mi."

Den, dem go ansa, "Oga, wish taim wi si yu dey hungri or won drink and wi nor giv yu fud or somtin to drink, wish taim yu bi strenja or naked or sik or dey for prizin and wi nor giv yu wetin yu wont?"
Den, di king go ansa dem, "I tel una tru wod, jos as una nor du-am for di pesin wey smol pas among my brodas and sistas, una nor du-am for mi."
So wiked pipol go enta ponishment wey nor go end, bot raitious pipol go get life wey nor go end tu."
Wen Jisos tish finish,e kon tel en disaipols,
"Mak una no sey na tu days remain bifor di Passova go start and dem go giv Man Pikin to pipol wey go nail am for kros."
Di prist oga dem and di eldas kon hol mitin wit Kaifas, di High Prist, for en palise.
Dem kon plan for sikrit to arres Jisos mak dem for kil-am.
Bot dem kon sey, "Mak wi nor du-am wen di Fist don start, so dat pipol nor go mak trobol."
Naw, as Jisos dey Betani for Saimon, wey bi lepa, haus,
won wuman bring kontaina wey get oil wey dear wel-wel, kon pour di oil for Jisos head as e sidan for tabol dey chop.
Wen di disaipols si wetin hapun, dem kon ves wel-wel, ask di wuman, "Why yu dey waste dis oil?
"E for beta pas sey dem sel am kon giv di moni to poor pipol!"
Wen Jisos hear wetin dem tok, e kon sey, "Why una dey trobol dis wuman? Na beta tin e du for mi -o-o!
"Poor pipol dey wit una evritaim, bot mi, I nor go dey wit una always!
"Wen di wuman pour dis oil for my bodi, e dey priper mi for my beria.
"I tel una tru wod, eniwer dem go dey prish di gospol, dem go tak dis tin wey di wuman du so tak rimemba am for di hol wold.
Den Judas Iskarot, wey dey among di twef disaipols go mit di prist oga dem,
kon tel dem, "Wetin una go giv mi, if I sel Jisos Kraist giv una?" So dem kon kount tati (30) silva koins gi-am.
From dat taim, Judas kon dey faind haw e go tak sel Jisos Kraist.
For di day wen dem start di Fist for di Bread wey nor get yist, di disaipols kom mit Jisos Kraist tel am, "Tel us wer yu for wont chop di Passova Fud, so dat wi go-go priper di place."
Jisos tel dem, "Mak una go insaid di tawn and una go mit won man. Mak una tel am, 'Di tisha sey, "My taim don rish. I go chop di Passova Fud wit my disaipols for yor haus.'"
So di disaipols du as Jisos tel dem, den dem kon go priper di Passova Fud.
Wen evenin rish, Jisos sidan for di tabol wit en twef disaipols.
As dem dey chop, e kon sey, "I tel una tru wod, won of una go sel mi"
Wetin e tok kon wori dem wel-wel, so dem kon bigin ask am, "Oga, na mi?"
Jisos kon ansa, "Na di pesin wey go put hand insaid plate wit mi, na-im go sel mi.
"Man Pikin go die as dem rite abaut am, bot kos dey di pesin head wey go sel am! E for beta sey dem nor born di pesin at-all."
Den Judas, di pesin wey go sel am, kon sey, "Tru-tru, Oga, na mi yu dey tok abaut?" Jisos kon ansa am, "Yu don tok am."
As dem dey chop, Jisos tak bread kon tank God, afta e divide am, e giv en disaipols, kon sey, "Mak una chop, dis na my bodi."
Afta, e tak di cup kon tank God, e giv dem, kon sey, "Mak all of una drink from am,
bikos dis na my blood, wey bi di kovenant wey go mak God forgiv pipol dia sins.
I tel una, from naw go, I nor go drink dis wine ontil di day wey I go drink di new wine wit una for my Papa kindom.
Afta dem sing won hymn, dem komot kon go Mount Olives.
Den Jisos kon tel dem, 'Dis nite all of una go run liv mi, bikos dem rite for God wod sey, 'I go kil di shepad and di ship go skata.'
Bot afta God don raiz mi up from deat, I go-go Galili, go wait for una."
Pita kon ansa am, "If odas run liv yu, mi, I nor go eva liv yu!"
Jisos kon tel am, "I tel yu di trut, for dis nite, bifor fawo go du 'Kukuruku', yu go denai mi tiri taims."
Pita stil ansa, "Ivun if I go die, I nor go eva denai yu". And all di disaipols tok di same tin.
Den Jisos kon go Getsemani wit en disaipols, kon tel dem, "Mak una sidan here bikos I wont kros go di oda side go pray."
E tak Pita, James and Jon, wey bi Zebedi tu shildren, wit am. Bot bikos of wetin won hapun, bele nor swit am.
Den e tel dem, "My heart heavi and e bi laik sey I won die. Mak una stay here and wosh wit mi."
E waka go front smol, kon laidan face groun, den kon pray, "My Papa, if yu wont, yu go fit rimov dis deat from mi! Bot nor bi as I wont, na as yu wont am."
Wen Jisos kom bak, e kon si sey all en disaipols dey slip. Den e ask Pita, "So yu nor fit stay mak yu nor slip for won hour?
"Opun yor eye mak yu pray, so dat yu nor go fal insaid temtashon. Yor spirit won du-am, bot yor flesh dey wik."
Jisos kon go pray for di sekon tiam, "My Papa, if Yu nor won tak dis deat komot unles I die, den mak wetin Yu wont hapun."
E kom bak kon si en disaipols dey slip again; dem nor fit opun dia eyes.
So e liv dem, go pray di same way for di ted taim.
Den e kon mit di disaipols ask dem, "Una stil dey slip and res? Si, di taim don dey rish wen dem go sel Man Pikin giv sinas.
"Mak una stand up, mak wi dey go. Si! Di pesin wey won sel mi, don dey kom!"
As Jisos stil dey tok, Judas wey bi won of di disaipols, kon kom. Plenti pipol wey di prist oga dem and eldas send and wey kari gun and big stick folo am kom.
(Naw, di pesin wey sel am, don giv dem sign sey, "Di pesin wey I go kiss, naim bi di man. Mak una arres am!")
At wons, e go mit Jisos, grit am, kon sey, "Tisha", den e kon kiss am.
Jisos kon tel am, "My frend, du wetin mak yu kom". Den dem hol Jisos kon arres am.
Bot won of di disaipols wey dey wit Jisos draw en sword kom out, kon kut di High Prist slave ear komot.
Den Jisos tel am, "Put yor sword for wer e dey bifor! Bikos enibodi wey dey kari sword, na sword go kil-am.
"Yu tink sey, I nor fit kol my Papa sey mak e send meni angels kom help mi naw-naw?
"Bot if I du-am, wetin dem rite for God wod abaut dis mata, nor go hapun?"
By dis taim, Jisos tel di pipol, "Una kari sword and stick kon arres mi laik sey I bi tif? I dey tish insaid di Tempol evriday, bot una nor arres mi."
Dis won hapun so dat wetin di profets rite for book go bi tru. Den all di disaipols kon run liv am.
Naw di pipol wey arres Jisos tak am go mit Kaifas di High Prist, wey di law tishas and eldas don gada for en haus.
Bot Pita folo dem go rish di High Prist yard. E kon sidan wit di gaids to si wetin go hapun.
Di prist oga dem and di Sanhedrin kon dey faind wetin dem go tak hol Jisos, mak dem for fit kil-am.
Bot dem nor si enitin to tak hol am, ivun doh meni pipol kom lai against am. At last, tu pipol kom out
kon sey, "Dis man sey, 'I go fit distroi God Tempol and build am again for tiri days'".
So, di High Prist kon stand up ask am, "Yu nor get eni ansa? Wetin bi dis wey dem dey tok against yu so?"
Bot Jisos kwayet. Den di High Prist kon tel am, "I tak God name komand yu to tel us if yu bi Kraist, wey bi God Pikin."
Jisos ansa am, "Yu don tok am. Bot I tel yu, from naw go, yu go si Man Pikin sidan for God rite hand dey kom dan for kloud from hevun."
Den di High Prist tear en klot, kon sey, "E don tok against God! Why wi stil nid anoda witnes? Una don hear as e tok against God!
Wetin una tink?" Dem kon ansa, "E du bad and e sopoz to die."
Dem kon spit for en face, beat am and som slap am,
dey sey, "Mak yu tel us wetin go hapun, Yu wey bi Kriast! Na hu beat yu?"
As Pita sidan outsaid for di yard. Won girl wey bi savant kon tel am, "Yu sef bin dey wit Jisos Kraist wey kom from Galili."
Bot Pita denai am for evribodi front kon sey: "I nor no wetin yu dey tok abaut!"
Wen e komot go outsaid, anoda girl wey bi savant si-am, kon tel di pipol wey dey der, "Dis man sef dey wit Jisos wey kom from Nazaret".
Pita kon swear denai again, "I nor no di man!"
Afta somtaim, pipol wey stand for der, kom mit Pita tel am, "Yu rili bi won of dem, ivun di way yu dey tok show sey yu dey wit am!"
As e hear dis won, Pita kon dey swear, "I nor no di man!" Dat same taim, fawo kon mak "Kukuruku".
Den Pita kon rimemba wetin Jisos tel am, "Bifor fawo go mak 'Kukuruku', yu go denai mi tiri taims." Den Pita kon go outsaid bigin krai.
For earli mornin, di prist oga dem and di eldas kon dey plan as dem go tak kil Jisos.
Dem tie am kon tak am go mit Pilate, wey bi di govnor.
Wen Judas wey sel Jisos si sey dem kondemn am, en maind kon dey joj am for wetin e du, so e riton di tati silva koins giv di prist oga dem and eldas,
e kon sey, "I don sin as I sel dis inosent man mak dem kil-am!" Bot dem sey, "Haw dat won tak konsan us? Na yor biznes bi dat."
So Judas kon trow di silva koins insaid di Tempol, den e komot go hang ensef.
Di prist oga dem tak di moni kon sey, "Mosis law sey mak dem nor put blood moni for di Tempol purse."
Afta dem don tok di mata, dem kon tak di moni buy won land wey di name bi "'Potta" and na strangas dem dey bere for der.
Na bikos of dis mak dem dey kol di land "Blood Field" kon rish today.
So wetin profet Jeremia tok kon hapun: "Dem tak tati silva koins, di moni wey Izrel pipol don agri to tak sel Jisos,
den dem yuz di moni tak buy 'Di Potta land', jos as God tel mi."
As Jisos stand for di govnor front, di govnor kon ask am, "Na yu bi di Ju pipol king?" Jisos ansa, "Na as yu tok!
Wen di prist oga dem and di eldas dey akiuz Jisos, e nor ansa dem.
Den Pilate kon tel Jisos, "Yu nor hear all di tins wey dem dey tok sey yu du?"
Bot Jisos nor ansa and di govnor kon sopraiz wel-wel.
For Passova Fist, di govnor dey always riliz won prizina giv di pipol.
Dat taim, e get won wiked prizina wey en name na (Jisos) Barabbas.
So, wen dem don gada, Pilate ask dem, "Hu una wont mak I riliz giv una? (Jisos) Barabbas or Jisos Kraist?"
(Bikos Pilate no sey na jelosi mak dem bring Jisos Kraist kom mit am.)
As Pilate sidan for di jojment sit, en wife send mesage go mit am sey, "Nor put hand for dat inosent man mata, bikos last nite, I dream bad dream abaut am."
Bot di prist oga dem and di eldas sey mak di pipol ask for Barabbas, so dat dem go fit kil Jisos Kraist.
Di govnor kon ask dem, "Wish won for dis tu pipol una wont mak I riliz giv una?" Dem ansa, "Barabbas!"
So, Pilate ask dem again, "Den wetin I go du wit Jisos wey dem dey kol Kraist?" All of dem kon ansa, "Nail am for kros!"
Pilate kon ask, "Why? Wish bad tin e du?" Bot dem kon dey shaut more-more, "Nail am for kros!"
Wen Pilate si sey di pipol nor gri and trobol won start, e kon tak wota, wosh en hand for di pipol front dey sey, "Dis man blood nor dey my head. Mak onli una go kil-am!"
Di pipol kon ansa, "Mak en blood dey awa head and awa shildren own!"
Den Pilate riliz Barabbas giv dem. Afta dem flog Jisos Kraist, Pilate kon giv-am to dem mak dem nail am for kros.
Di sojas tak Jisos Kraist enta di govnor haus and all of dem kon gada am.
Dem rimov en klot, kon wear am klot wey mak-am bi laik king.
Dem kon tak shuku-shuku mak krawn wear-am for en head, kon put wokin stick for en hand, den nil dan for en front kon dey laff am dey sey: "Mak una hail Ju pipol king -o-o!"
Dem spit for en bodi, kon tak wokin stick nak en head meni taims.
Wen dem laff am finish, dem rimov di king klot wey dem wear am kon wear am en own klot. Den dem kon tak am go nail for kros.
As dem dey go outsaid, dem si won man from Syrene wey en name na Saimon and dem kon fos am mak e kari Jisos Kraist kros.
Wen dem rish won place wey dem dey kol Golgota (wey min "Skul Place"),
dem kon giv Jisos Kraist bita wine mak e drink. Bot wen e taste am, e nor gri drink am.
Wen dem don nail am for kros, dem kon gambol tak davaid en klot.
Dem kon sidan der dey luk mak enibodi nor tosh am.
On-top of en head for di kros, dem rite wetin dem tak akiuz am: "Dis na Jisos Kraist, Ju pipol king."
Dem stil nail tu tif near Jisos Kraist for kros, won for en rite and di oda for in left hand.
So di pipol wey dey pas wer Jisos Kraist dey kon laff am and dey shake dia head
dey sey, "Yu wey sey yu go distroi di Tempol kon build am bak for tiri days, mak yu save yorsef! If yu rili bi God Pikin, mak yu kom dan from di kros!"
Na laik dis tu, di prist oga dem, di law tishas and di eldas dey laff am sey,
"E save oda pipol bot e nor fit save ensef! If e kom dan naw from di kros, wi go biliv sey, Na-im bi Izrel King!!
Since e trust God, mak God kon save am naw, bikos e sey, "I bi God Pikin!"
Di tu tif wey dem nail for kros near Jisos Kraist stil dey kos am tu.
E kon hapun sey, from twef go rish tiri o' klok for aftanun, daknes kon kovadi hol land.
Wen tiri o' klok won rish, Jisos Kraist kon shaut, "Eli, Eli, lama Sabachthani?", wey min, "My God, My God, wetin mak Yu abandon mi?"
Some of di pipol wey hear di wod kon sey, "Dis Man dey kol Elija mak e kom help am."
At wons, won of dem run go bring sponge kon soak am for wine wey don sawa, put am for stick, den kon giv Jisos mak e drink.
Bot di rimainin pipol sey, "Leav am! Mak wi si weda Elija go kom save am".
So Jisos Kraist krai again, den e kon die.
At wons, di Tempol kotin kon tear from up go rish botom. Di groun bigin shake and rocks kon skata for evriwer.
Graves kon opun God pipol wey don die kom wak-up.
Afta Jisos raiz from grave, God pipol wey don die folo am raiz, den dem kon enta di Holi Tawn wit am and meni pipol si dem
Wen di soja oga and di pipol wey dey gaid Jisos Kraist si di eart-quake and wetin hapun, dem fear wel-wel kon sey, "Tru-tru dis man na God Pikin."
Meni wimen wey folo Jisos Kraist from Galili and wey dey help am, dey der tu. Dem dey luk wetin dey hapun for der.
Mary Magdalene, Mary, wey bi James and Josef mama and Zebedi shildren mama, dey der tu.
Wen evenin rish, Josef, won rish man from Arimatia, wey bi Jisos Kraist disaipol
go mit Pilate, kon ask am for Jisos Kraist bodi. So Pilate kon sey mak dem gi-am di bodi.
Josef kon tak di bodi, wrap am wit klin white klot.
E put am insaid en own new grave wey e dig insaid rock. Den e rol won big stone kova di grave mout.
(Mary Magdalene and di oda Mary sidan for di oda side wey face di grave).
Di next day (wey bi Sabat) di prist oga dem and di Farisi pipol kon gada for Pilate front
kon sey "Oga! wi rimemba sey wen dat wayo man stil dey for dis wold, e tok sey, 'Afta tiri days, e go wak-up.'

"So mak yu giv orda mak dem gaid di grave ontil di tiri day rish. If not, en disaipols go-go tif en bodi kon tel pipol sey, 'E don wak-up from deat' and dis go mak di last wayo wors pas di first won."
So Pilate tel dem, "Mak una tak plenti sojas go gaid di place as una wont."
So dem kari sojas go gaid di grave and dem kon blok di grave mout, so dat Jisos Kraist nor go fit kom out.
Wen day break for Sabat Day, wey bi di first day for di wik, Mary Magdalene and di oda Mary kon go luk di grave.
At wons, strong eart-quake kom hapun, bikos God angel kom dan from hevun, rol di stone komot, kon sidan on-top am.
En face bi laik thunda lite and en klot white laik snow.
Di gaids kon dey shake and dem kon bi laik pipol wey won die, bikos fear kash dem wel-wel
Bot di angel kon tel di wimen, "Mak una nor fear, I no sey una dey luk for Jisos Kraist, wey dem nail for kros.
"E nor dey here, bikos God don wak-am up, jos as God promis. Mak una kom si di place wer e laidan bifor.
"Den mak una kwik go tel en disaipols sey, 'God don raiz-am from deat and e dey go wait for una for Galili. Una go si-am for der.' Mak una rimemba sey I tel una so!"
So fear mak dem run komot for di grave and dem kon dey hapi go tel en disaipols.
Bot Jisos Kraist mit dem for road kon tel dem, "I grit una o-o!" Dem kon dress near am, hol en leg kon woship am.
Den Jisos Kraist tel dem, "Mak una nor fear, bot tel my brodas mak dem go Galili and dem go si mi for der".
As dem dey go, som of di gaids go insaid di tawn go tel di prist oga dem evritin wey hapun.
Afta dem don gada and plan wit di eldas, dem kon giv di sojas plenti moni,
kon tel dem, "Mak una tok sey, 'Jisos Kraist disaipols kom tif en bodi for nite wen wi dey slip.'
If di govnor hear abaut dis mata, wi no wetin to tel am and una nor go enta trobol."
So dem tak di moni and dem du as di eldas tel dem. Pipol stil dey tok dis stori for evriwer wey Ju pipol dey, kom rish today.
So di ilevun disaipols kon go Galili for di mountin wey Jisos Kraist tel dem.
Wen dem si-am, dem woship am, bot som of dem kon dey doubt.
Den Jisos Kraist waka near kon tel dem, "God don giv mi all di pawa wey dey hevun and eart.
"So mak una go mak pipol my disaipols for di hol wold, dey baptaiz dem wit di Papa, di Pikin and di Holi Spirit name,
dey tish dem to du evritin wey I tish una. I go always dey wit una ontil di wold go end."
Na so di gospol abaut Jisos Kraist, God Pikin tak start.
As Profet Isaia tok for di book wey e rite, "I dey send my mesenja for front, go priper di way for yu."
Won pesin dey shaut insaid desert sey, "Mak una priper Oga way for am, mak una mak en road strate."
For insaid desert, Jon di Baptist kon bigin prish sey, mak pipol liv di bad tins wey dem dey du, mak e for baptaiz dem, so dat God go forgiv dem dia sins.
Pipol for Judea and all di aria wey near am and doz wey dey Jerusalem, dey go mit Jon and e kon baptaiz dem for Jordan Riva afta dem konfes dia sins.
Jon wear klot wey dem tak kamel hair mak, tie leda belt for waist and e dey chop lokust and honi for insaid bush.
E kon sey, "Pesin wey big pas mi dey kom for my bak and I nor big rish hu go luz di rope wey dey en shu.
"I dey yuz wota baptaiz una, bot e go baptaiz una wit di Holi Spirit."
Dat taim, Jisos kom from Nazaret wey dey for Galili and Jon kon baptaiz am for Jordan Riva.
As Jisos dey kom out from di wota, hevun opun and God Spirit kom dan laik dove kon land for en head.
Den won vois tok from hevun sey, "Yu bi My Pikin wey I luv and yu dey mak bele swit Mi wel-wel."
At wons, God Spirit kon tak am go insaid di desert.
E stay insaid di desert wer Satan tempt am for forti days. E dey der wit wiked animas and God angels kon gi-am evritin wey e wont.
Afta dem don put Jon for prizin, Jisos kon enta Galili dey prish di Gud News sey,
"Di taim wey God promis sey en kindom go kom don rish. So mak una liv di sins wey una dey du kon biliv di Gud News."
As Jisos dey waka for Galili wotasaid, e kon si Saimon and en broda Andru wey dey trow net insaid riva, (bikos dem bi fishamen.)
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una folo mi and I go giv una pawa to kash pipol."
At wons, dem liv dia net kon folo Jisos.
As dem waka go front smol, dem si James and Jon, wey bi Zebedi shildren insaid boat dey ripair dia net.
At wons, Jisos kol dem, so dem liv dia papa, Zebedi, wit di men wey dem haya for insaid di boat, kon folo Jisos.
Jisos wit en disaipols kon go Kapanum. Wen Sabat Day rish, Jisos kon enta di sinagog bigin tish.
Di pipol sopraiz, bikos e sabi tish pas di law tishas.
For insaid di sinagog, won man wey evil spirit dey insaid en bodi kon shaut dey sey,~
"Mak yu liv us o-o, Jisos wey kom from Nazaret! Abi, yu don kom distroi us? I no hu yu bi. Yu bi God Pikin wey dey holi."
Bot Jisos komand am, "Shut up and kom out from di man!"
Afta di evil spirit don shake di man wel-wel, e shaut kon kom out from di man bodi.
Evribodi sopraiz dey ask ish oda, "Wish won bi dis? Dis new tishin strong o-o! Ivun wiked spirit dey obey en komand."
So, di stori abaut wetin Jisos dey du kon spread kwik-kwik for evriwer for Galili.
As Jisos, James and Jon komot from di sinagog, dem kon enta Saimon and Andru haus.
Saimon wife mama nor wel, so dem kon tel Jisos abaut am.
Jisos go mit am, hol en hand and di wuman kon stand-up. Den di fiva komot from en bodi and e kon dey serv dem.
Wen sun don dey go dan for evenin, dem kon bring all di pipol wey nor wel and wey get dimon kom mit Jisos.
Di hol tawn kon gada for di domot.
So, Jisos heal meni pipol wey nor wel wit difren-difren diziz and e driv meni dimon komot from pipol bodi. Bot e nor let di dimons tok, bikos dem no hu e bi.
For earli mornin wen evriwer stil dak, Jisos kon liv di haus go won kwayet place go pray.
Saimon and di pipol wey dey wit am kon dey faind am.
Wen dem si-am, dem kon sey, "Evribodi dey faind yu."
Jisos tel dem, "Mak wi go anoda vilage, so dat I go prish for der tu. Bikos na wetin I kom du, bi dat."
So e kon go evriwer for Galili dey prish for dia sinagog and dey driv dimon komot from pipol bodi.
Won man wey bi lepa kom mit Jisos, nil dan for en front dey beg am sey, "If yu wont, yu go fit mak mi wel."
Jisos sori for di man, so e tosh am kon sey, "I wont, so mak yu wel!"
At wons, di leprosi komot from di man bodi and e kon dey okay.
So Jisos warn di man wel-wel as e dey go sey,
"Mak yu nor tel enibodi abaut wetin hapun so, bot go show yorsef to di prist. And mak evribodi for no sey yu don klin, mak yu tak di ofrin wey Mosis komand, folo bodi."
Bot as di man dey go, e kon bigin shaut for evriwer dey spread di stori, sotey Jisos nor fit enta eni tawn again, so e kon dey stay wer pipol nor dey. Bot pipol stil dey kom mit am from evriwer.
Afta som days, wen Jisos go bak to Kapanum, news spread sey e dey haus.
Meni pipol kon gada and di haus ful sotey space nor dey to enta or stand near di door. So Jisos kon bigin prish God wod giv dem.
Som pipol kon kari won man wey paralaiz kom.
As dem nor si road pas kom mit Jisos, bikos pipol plenti der, dem kon rimov di zink on-top di haus for wer Jisos sidan, den dem kon smol-smol drop di bed wey di man laidan put til e rish groun.
Wen Jisos si as dia fate strong rish, e kon tel di man wey paralaiz, "My pikin, I forgiv yu all yor sins."
So som law tishas wey sidan der kon dey tink wetin Jisos tok for dia maind dey sey,
"Why dis man dey tok laik dis? E dey shalenge God! Hu fit forgiv sins esept God?"
At wons, Jisos no wetin dem dey tink for dia maind, so e kon ask dem, "Why una dey tink laik dis?
"Wish won eazi pas to tok? 'I forgiv yu yor sins,' or 'Get up, kari yor bed mak yu waka?'
"Bot mak dem for no sey Man Pikin get pawa for dis wold to forgiv sins, Jisos kon tel di man wey nor fit waka,
'I tel yu, get up, kari yor bed, mak yu go yor haus.'"
At wons, di man get up, kari en bed kon waka komot for dia front. Dem sopraiz wel-wel kon dey praiz God dey sey, "Wi neva si dis kaind tin bifor!"
Jisos kon go di wotasaid again and pipol kom mit am for der, so e kon start to tish dem.
As e dey waka for road, e kon si Levi, Afius pikin, sidan for wer dem dey kolet tax. E tel am, "Mak yu folo mi." So Levi get up kon folo Jisos.
As Jisos dey chop for Levi haus, meni tax koletors and sinas dey chop wit en and en disaipols, bikos di pipol wey folo am, plenti.
Wen di law tishas and di Farisi pipol si sey e dey chop wit sinas and tax koletors, dem kon ask en disaipols, "Why una oga dey chop wit tax koletors and sinas?"
Wen Jisos hear dis, e kon tel dem, "Pipol wey wel nor nid doktor, bot na doz wey nor wel nid am. Nor bi gud pipol I kom kol, bot na sinas I kom for."
Naw, Jon di Baptist disaipols and di Farisi pipol dey fast. So dem kom mit Jisos sey, "Why Jon disaipols and di Farisi pipol dey fast, bot yor disaipols nor dey fast?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Pipol wey kom marage nor sopoz to fast wen di man wey dey mari dey wit dem, abi dem sopoz to? So-far di man wey dey mari dey wit dem, dem nor nid to fast.
"Bot di taim dey kom wen dem go tak di man wey dey mari from dem, by dat taim, dem go fast.
"Nobodi dey tear new klot tak pash old won, oda-wise di pash go tear di klot more and di hol go big pas as e bi bifor.
"Nobodi dey pour new wine insaid wine bag wey don old; if not, di new wine go tear di bag, di wine go trowey and di bag go spoil. Insted, na insaid new wine bag dem dey pour new wine put."
Jisos kon dey waka pas di farm wer dem plant corn put for Sabat Day and en disaipols kon plok som corn as dem dey pas.
So di Farisi pipol kon tel am, "Si, why yor disaipols dey break awa law for Sabat Day?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Una neva read wetin David doh wen en and en men nor si fud chop?
"Haw en and en men enta God haus wen Abiata bi High Prist kon chop di holi bread wey onli prists sopoz chop?"
Jisos kon tel dem, "God mak Sabat Day to help pipol, bot nor bi sey mak Sabat kontrol pipol life.
So, na God Pikin bi Sabat Oga."
Wen Jisos enta di sinagog again, won man wey en hand die, dey der.
Di Farisi pipol kon dey luk Jisos wit kona eye weda e go heal di man for Sabat Day, so dat dem go si wetin dem go tak akuiz am.
So Jisos tel di man, "Mak yu stand for senta mak evribodi si yu."
Jisos kon ask, "E gud mak wi du gud or bad tin for Sabat Day? Mak wi save or distroi pesin?" Bot dem nor ansa.
So Jisos ves kon luk dem roun, bikos dia heart strong wel-wel, den e tel di man, "Stresh yor hand." So di man stresh en hand and di hand kon wel again.
Den di Farisi and Herod pipol kon kwik-kwik go outsaid go plan haw dem go tak kil Jisos.
Den Jisos komot wit en disaipols go di wotasaid and plenti pipol from Galili folo am. Pipol from Judea,
Jerusalem, Idumia, som from akros Jordan Riva and aroun Tyre and Sidon kom mit am wen dem hear abaut di tins wey e dey du.
Bikos of di pipol, Jisos kon tel en disaipols mak dem priper won smol boat for am, so dat pipol nor go push am enihaw.
Jisos kon heal meni pipol, so all di pipol wey nor wel kon dey push ish oda, so dat dem go fit tosh am.
And enitaim evil spirit wey dey insaid som pipol bodi si Jisos, dem go fal for en front dey shaut, "Yu bi God Pikin."
Bot Jisos kon warn dem wel-wel mak dem nor let pipol no hu e bi.
Jisos klimb go on-top mountin kon kol di pipol wey e wont, mak dem kom mit am for der.
E kon shuz twef (wey e kol apostols), so dat dem go dey wit am and e go fit send dem go prish.
E kon giv dem pawa to driv dimons komot.
Na di twef wey e shuz bi dis: Saimon wey e kol Pita,
James and en broda Jon wey bi Zebedi shildren wey Jisos dey kol "Boanerges (wey min 'Thunda shildren');"
plus Andru, Filip, Batlomi, Matiu, Tomas, James wey bi Afius pikin, Tadius, Saimon wey dem dey kol Zilot (pesin wey dey fite for en kontri),
and Judas Iskarot, wey sel Jisos giv en enimis.
Jisos go haus and plenti pipol kon gada am sotey en and en disaipols nor fit chop.
Wen Jisos famili hear wetin dey hapun, dem kon go hol am, bikos pipol dey sey, "E don dey krase."
Di law tishas wey kom from Jerusalem sey, "Belzibub dey insaid am" and "Na dimon pawa e tak dey driv dimons komot from pipol bodi."
So Jisos kon tok to di pipol for parabol sey: "Haw Satan go fit tak driv Satan komot?
"Eni kindom wer pipol dey fite ish oda, nor go fit stand.
"And eni famili wey dey fite demsef, go skata.
"So, if Satan kindom divide against ensef, e nor go fit stand and en end don rish.
"Nobodi go fit enta strong man haus tif en propati, unles e first tie di strong man, bifor e go fit tif en tins.
"I tel una tru wod, God go forgiv pipol di sins wey dem komit and all di bad wod wey dem tok.
"Bot enibodi wey tok bad wod against di Holi Spirit, God nor go eva forgiv am, bikos e don komit sin wey go last foreva."
Jisos tok so, bikos som pipol sey, "Evil spirit dey insaid am."
Jisos mama and en brodas kom mit am. Dem stand for outsaid kon send pesin go kol am.
Di pipol wey sidan near Jisos kon tel am, "Yor mama and yor brodas dey outsaid, dem won si yu."
Bot Jisos ansa dem, "Hu bi my mama and my brodas?"
Den e kon luk di pipol wey sidan roun am, tel dem, "Na my mama and my brodas bi dis pipol!
"Bikos enibodi wey du wetin God wont, na-im bi my broda, sista and mama."
Again, Jisos kon bigin tish pipol for di wotasaid. Since pipol wey gada roun am meni, e kon enta boat dey tish di pipol as dem sidan for groun near di wota.
E kon tish dem meni tins for parabol sey:
"Mak una Listin! Won farma go plant sid for en farm.
"As e dey plant, som sid fal for road and birds kom chop dem.
"Odas fal for wer stones and sand dey. Dem kwik grow kom out, bikos gud soil nor dey der.
"Wen sun kom out, e burn di plant, bikos dem nor get deep root, dem kon die.
"Odas fal for wer shuku-shuku dey and wen dem grow kom out, di shuku-shuku, shuk dem die.
"Bot odas fal for beta groun. Dem grow wel kon bear oda sids, som bear rish tati, som sisti and som ondred."
Jisos kon sey, "Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear wetin I dey tok!"
Wen Jisos dey alone, pipol wey dey wit am and en twef disaipols kon ask am abaut di parabol.
E kon tel dem, "God don show una di kindom sikrit. Bot doz wey dey outsaid God Kindom, na parabol e bi for dem,
so dat dem go dey luk, bot dem nor go si, dem go dey hear, bot dem nor go undastand and dem nor go fit turn from dia sin kom mit God mak E forgiv dem."
Jisos kon ask dem, "Una nor undastand dis parabol? Den haw una go tak undastand eni oda parabol?
"Na God wod di farma dey plant.
"Som pipol bi laik di sid wey fal for road: enitaim dem hear God wod, Satan go kom tif-am from dem kwik-kwik.
"Som bi laik di sids wey fal for wer stones and sand dey: as dem hear God wod, dem go risiv am wit hapines,
and bikos dem nor get root and patient, wen trobol or wahala kom bikos of di wod, dem go forget God wod.
"Odas bi laik di sids wey fal for wer shuku-shuku ful: dem hear di wod,
bot trobol for life, big eye for moni and di way dem dey run folo oda tins, go kon blok di wod and e nor go bear enitin for dia life.
"Bot di wons wey fal for beta groun, na doz wey hear di wod kon risiv am and bear meni fruts, som bear rish tati, som sisti and som ondred."
Jisos stil ask dem, "Pipol dey hide lamp for unda basket? Nor bi on-top di place wer dem dey kip lamp, dem sopoz put am?
"E nor get wetin pipol hide wey God nor go show and e nor get wetin dey for sikrit naw, wey nor go kom out for opun.
"If enibodi get ear, mak e hear wetin I dey tok!"
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una dey kareful for wetin una dey hear, bikos na wetin yu yuz tak measure giv oda pipol, na-im God go tak measure for yu tu and E go add join am.
"Bikos enibodi wey get, God go gi-am more, bot enibodi wey nor get, ivun di smol won wey e get, God go tak am from am."
Jisos kon sey, "God Kindom bi laik pesin wey skata sid for groun.
"Di pesin go dey slip and dey wak-up day and nite, di sid kon grow kom out, ivun doh di man nor no haw e hapun.
"As plant dey grow from groun, di bodi go first kom out, den di head go bear frut and sid go kom out from insaid.
"Wen e ripe, di farma go kut am, bikos di taim to plok wetin e plant, don rish."
Jisos kon ask dem, "Wetin wi go tak kompare God Kindom? Wish parabol wi go fit yuz tak show as e bi?
"E bi laik mustard sid wey bi di sid wey smol pas for di wold, wey pesin plant for groun.
"Afta dem don plant am, e go grow kon big pas all di oda plants and en bransh go big and birds go land kon build dia nest for der."
Na wit meni parabol laik dis won, Jisos tak prish God wod to dem, so dat dem go fit undastand.
E nor get wetin e tel dem wey e nor yuz parabol. Bot wen onli en and di disaipols dey, e dey explain evritin giv dem.
Wen evenin rish dat day, Jisos kon tel en disaipols, "Mak wi kros go di oda side for di riva."
So afta dem liv di pipol, dem kon enta di boat wey Jisos sidan and oda boats stil dey der wit dem.
Den, strong briz kon dey blow and wota dey enta di boat, so di boat kon dey won sink.
Bot Jisos put en head for pilow dey slip insaid di boat. Dem kon kol am dey sey, "Tisha, yu nor ivun kare sey wi won die?"
So Jisos get up kon komand di briz, den e tel di riva, "Mak yu kwayet!" Di briz stop and evriwer kon kwayet at wons.
Den Jisos tel dem, "Why una dey fear? Una stil nor get fate?"
Fear kash dem wel-wel and dem kon dey ask ish oda, "Hu dis man bi sef? Ivun briz and riva dey obey am!"
So Jisos and en disaipols kon kros go di oda side for di riva for Gerasenes aria.
As Jisos jos dey kom dan from di boat, won man wey get evil spirit kon kom out from di beria groun, run kom mit am.
Na insaid beria groun di man dey stay and nobodi dey fit tie am, ivun wit chain.
Bikos dem don tie en hand and leg meni taims wit chain and handkoff, bot e kut dem trowey. Nobodi strong rish to hol am.
Evriday and nite for di beria groun near wer mountin dey, e dey shaut, dey yuz stone dey kut en bodi.
Wen e si Jisos dey kom from far, e run go mit am kon bow dan for en front.
Den e kon shaut, "Mak yu liv mi, Jisos, yu wey bi Almighti God Pikin! I tak God beg yu, nor sofa mi!"
(Bikos Jisos don tel di dimon bifor sey, "Komot from dat man bodi!")
Jisos ask am, "Wetin bi yor name?" E ansa, "My name na 'Legion,' bikos wi plenti."
E kon beg Jisos mak e nor driv dem komot from di aria.
For di mountin-side, plenti pig dey der dey chop.
So di dimon kon beg Jisos sey, "Oga, mak yu alow us enta di pig dem bodi."
So Jisos kon alow dem. So di evil spirit kom out from di man kon enta di pig dem. Den di pig dem run pas won low place enta di riva and dem rish tu tazon (2000) wey die insaid di wota.
So, di men wey dey gaid di pigs for der kon run go spread di news for di tawn and pipol for di aria kon go luk wetin hapun.
Wen dem kom mit Jisos, dem kon si di man wey dimon dey insaid am bifor sidan for der, e wear klot and en head koret, so fear kash dem.
Pipol wey si wetin hapun to di man wey get dimon bifor kon tel odas wey kom.
Den dem beg Jisos mak e komot for dia aria.
As Jisos dey enta boat, di man wey get dimon bifor kon ask weda e fit folo am.
Bot Jisos nor gri mak di man folo dem. Insted e tel am, "Go yor haus go mit yor pipol and mak yu tel dem wetin God don doh for yu, bikos God don sori for yu."
So di man kon go, bigin tok for di hol vilage abaut wetin God du for am and evribodi wey hear am, sopraiz wel-wel.
Wen Jisos don kros go di oda side wit boat, plenti pipol kon gada roun am for di wotasaid.
Den, won oga for di sinagog wey en name bi Jairus kon kom and wen e si Jisos, e fal for en front
dey beg am sey, "My smol dota don nearli die. Mak yu kom tosh am, so dat e go wel again."
Jisos and plenti pipol kon folo am and di pipol dey push Jisos from evri kona.
E get won wuman among dem wey don dey mestrate for twef years naw.
Dis wuman don sofa wel-wel for meni doktor hand and e don spend all di moni wey e get, bot insted of am to wel, di siknes kon dey wos more-more.
Wen e hear abaut Jisos, e waka go wer Jisos dey kon manage tosh en klot.
Bikos e tok for en maind sey, "If I go fit tosh en klot, I go wel."
At wons, di blood kon stop and e feel am for en bodi sey e don wel.
Na wons, Jisos no sey pawa komot for en bodi. E kon turn roun ask di pipol, "Hu tosh my klot?"
En disaipols kon ansa am, "Yu si all dis plenti pipol dey push yu and yu dey ask, 'Hu tosh mi?'"
Bot e kon dey luk evriwer mak e for si di pesin wey tosh am.
Fear kash di wuman wen e no wetin hapun to am, so e kom mit Jisos, nil dan for en front kon tel am evritin wey hapun.
So Jisos tel am, "My pikin, yor fate don mak yu wel. Mak peace folo yu and mak yu wel finish."
As Jisos stil dey tok, pipol from Jairus haus kon kom, tel am sey, "Yor dota don die. Why yu stil dey wori di Tisha?"
Jisos nor listin to dem, bot e kon tel di man, "Mak yu nor fear, bot mak yu jos biliv."
Jisos nor let enibodi folo am esept Pita, James and Jon, wey bi James broda.
Dem kon rish Jairus haus kon si plenti pipol dey mak nois, dey krai.
Wen Jisos enta, e tel dem, "Why una dey krai laik dis? Di pikin neva die, e jos dey slip."
Dem kon dey laff am. Jisos driv dem go outsaid, kon tak di pikin mama and papa wit di disaipols wey folo am, go insaid di room wer di pikin dead-bodi dey.
Den e hol di pikin hand smol-smol, kon tel am, "Talita kumi," wey min "Smol girl, get up."
Di girl (wey bi twef years dat taim) kon get up at wons bigin waka roun di haus. Evribodi sopraiz for wetin hapun.
Bot Jisos warm dem wel-wel sey, mak dem nor let enibodi no wetin hapun so, den e kon tel dem mak dem giv di pikin fud chop.
Jisos kon komot for dat place go en home tawn wit en disaipols.

Wen Sabat Day rish, e kon start to tish for di sinagog. Meni pipol wey hear am sopraiz, dey sey, "Wer e for get dis kaind sense? Wish kaind wisdom God gi-am? And wetin bi all dis mirakol wey e dey doh so?
"Nor bi di kapinta pikin, wey bi James, Joses, Judas and Saimon broda? Nor bi en sistas dey wit us so? Nor bi Mary bi dia mama?" So dem kon dey ves for am.
Den Jisos kon tel dem, "Na onli for profet tawn, among en own pipol and for en own famili na-im di profet nor dey get respet."
Jisos nor fit doh eni mirakol for der, so e onli tosh som sik pipol kon heal dem.
Jisos sopraiz, bikos dem nor biliv am. So e komot from der go oda vilage wey near der kon tish dem.
Jisos kol di twef disaipols kon send dem tu-tu go out. E giv dem pawa to driv evil spirits komot from pipol bodi.
E tel dem mak dem onli tak dia wokin stick for di joni. E sey mak dem nor kari bread, bag or moni folo bodi.
E stil sey, "Una fit wear shu, bot mak una nor kari extra klot
and eni haus wey una enta, mak una stay der ontil una komot for di place.
"If dem nor welkom una or listin to wetin una dey tok for eni place, mak una shake di sand komot from una leg as una dey liv der, to show sey dem rejet di mesage."
So, dem go out kon prish sey mak evribodi turn from sin kom mit God .
Dem driv meni dimon komot from pipol bodi and pour oil for meni pipol wey nor wel head kon heal dem.
King Herod kon hear wetin dey hapun, bikos pipol don no Jisos name wel-wel. Som pipol sey, "Jon wey dey baptaiz don wak-up from deat and bikos of dis, e don get pawa to doh mirakols."
Odas sey, "Na Elija e bi." Som kon sey, "E bi laik won profet wey dey bifor."
Bot wen Herod hear am, e sey, "Jon wey I sey mak dem kut en head komot, don wak-up from deat!"
Na Herod send men go arres Jon put for prizin, bikos of Herodias, en broda Filip wife wey e mari.
Bikos Jon don tel Herod plenti taims sey, "E nor gud as yu mari yor broda wife."
So Herodias kon get bad bele for Jon and e won kil-am, bot e nor fit.

Herod dey fear Jon wel-wel, so e dey protet am, bikos e no sey Jon na holi man wey dey du wetin God laik. Enitaim Herod hear Jon dey prish, en maind go dey wori am, bot e stil dey laik to listin to am.
Bot won day wen Herod dey du en betday, en ofisas, en sojas oga dem and di lidas for Galili, dey der wit am.
Wen Herodias dota kom dance, Herod and di pipol wey e invait kon dey hapi wel-wel. So di king kon tel di girl, "Mak yu ask mi for enitin wey yu wont and I go giv yu."
Herod kon swear sey, "Mak yu ask mi for enitin wey yu wont and I go giv yu, ivun if e go rish haf of my kindom."
So di girl go outsaid go ask en mama, "Wetin I go ask for?" Di mama ansa am, "Mak yu ask for Jon di Baptist head."
Kwik-kwik e rush go mit di king kon tel am wetin e wont, "I wont Jon di Baptist head for plate naw."
Ivun doh e pain di king wel-wel, e nor won rejet wetin di girl ask, bikos e don swear for di present of di pipol wey e invait.
So di king send di soja wey dey kil kriminas, mak e go bring Jon head kom. So di man go insaid di prizin, go kut Jon head komot.
E put di head for plate kon giv di girl and di girl go gi-am to en mama.
Wen Jon disaipols hear wetin hapun, dem kom kari en bodi go bere.
Den di disaipols gada roun Jisos kon tel am evritin wey dem don du and tish.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una folo mi mak wi go res for somtaim", (Bikos meni pipol dey-kom-dey-go and taim nor dey to chop).
So onli dem kon enta boat go won place wer pipol nor dey.
Bot meni pipol si dem wen dem dey go, so di pipol kon run wit leg from all di tawns kon first Jisos and en disaipols rish di place.
Wen Jisos kom dan from di boat, e si plenti pipol and e kon sori for dem, bikos dem bi laik anima wey nor get hu dey luk afta dem. So e kon tish dem meni tins.
Wen day don dey dak, en disaipols kom mit am sey, "Dis na place wey pipol nor dey stay and day don dey dak.
"Mak yu send dis pipol go buy wetin dem go chop for di tawn and vilage wey near here."
Bot Jisos ansa, "Mak una giv dem somtin chop." Dem kon sey, "Mak wi go tak tu ondred silva koins buy bread giv dem chop?"
Jisos kon ask dem, "Haw meni bread una get? Mak una go shek." Wen dem don shek, dem kon ansa, "Na faiv bread wit tu fish."
Jisos kon tel di pipol mak dem share diasef into grup, sidan for grass.
So dem sidan for difren-difren grup, ondred-ondred, fifti-fifti.
Jisos tak di faiv bread and tu fish, e luk hevun kon tank God, den e divide di bread. E giv en disaipols mak dem-share am for di pipol and e kon divide di tu fish among dem tu.
All of dem chop beleful
and wen dem gada di fish and bread wey rimain, twef basket ful.
Di pipol wey chop di bread, rish faiv tazon men.
So Jisos tel en disaipols mak dem enta boat kros go di oda side for Betsaida, den e send di pipol go haus.
Afta e don tel dem bye-bye, e kon go pray for won mountin.
Wen evenin rish, di boat don rish di sea senta, bot Jisos stil dey alone for land.
E si en disaipols dey yuz all dia pawa dey padol di boat, bikos di briz strong wel-wel. As mornin won rish, Jisos waka kom mit dem, laik sey e won pas dem.
Wen dem si-am dey waka on-top di wota, dem tink sey na ghost. Dem kon dey shaut,
bikos as dem si-am, fear kash dem. Bot Jisos tel dem, "Mak una heart nor shake! Na mi. Mak una nor fear."
Den Jisos enta di boat wit dem, den di briz kon stop. Dem kon sopraiz wel-wel,
bikos dem konfuz and dem nor undastand haw Jisos tak fid faiv tazon pipol.
Afta Jisos and en disaipols don kros di riva, dem kon rish Genesaret, den dem tie dia boat for der.
As dem kom dan from di boat, pipol kon si sey na Jisos bi dat.
Di pipol run pas all di aria, kari di pipol wey nor wel for mat go wer dem hear sey Jisos dey.
Eniwer wey Jisos go, weda na vilage or tawn or farm, dem go kari di pipol wey nor wel for dia market place kon ask Jisos weda dem go fit tosh en klot and evribodi wey tosh am, kon wel.
Di Farisi pipol and som law tishas, wey kom from Jerusalem gada for wer Jisos dey.
Dem kon si sey Jisos disaipols dey chop bread wen dem neva wosh dia hand.
(Bikos di Farisi and Ju pipol, nor dey chop unles dem wosh dia hand akordin to dia tradishon.
And wen dem kom bak from market, dem nor dey chop unles dem first wosh dia hand. Dem stil dey folo meni oda tradishons, laik to wosh cup, ketol and chair wey dem dey sidan put chop.)
Di Farisi pipol and di law tishas kon ask Jisos, "Why yor disaipols nor dey du akordin to awa tradishon, bot insted dem dey chop wit dirti hand?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Di tin wey Isaia profesai abaut una, na tru, bikos una dey pritend, as dem rite for God wod, 'Dis pipol dey praiz Mi wit dia mout, bot dia heart dey far from Mi.
'Dem dey woship Mi for nor-tin, dey tish sey mak pipol obey humanbin law.
'Dem nor dey respet God law, bot dem dey obey humanbin law.'"
Jisos stil tel dem, "Una rejet God komandment, so dat una go fit kip una own.
"Bikos Mosis sey, 'Mak yu respet yor papa and mama' and 'Enibodi wey kos en papa or mama, dem must kil-am.'
"Bot if enibodi tel en papa and mama sey, 'Di moni wey I sopoz giv yu, I don giv God,'
so una nor go let di pesin du gud tin for en mama or papa.
"Na so una dey yuz una tradishon wey una dey tish pipol tak dey spoil God wod. And una stil dey du meni tins laik dis."
Den Jisos kol di pipol again sey, "Evribodi, listin to mi mak una for undastand wetin I dey tok.
"Nor bi wetin enta insaid pesin bodi go mak am dirti for God eye, insted na wetin kom out from en mout, dey mak am dirti.
"Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear wetin I dey tok."
Wen Jisos liv di pipol enta haus, en disaipols kon ask am abaut di parabol.
E kon tel dem, "Na so una fool rish? Una nor no sey enitin wey from outsaid enta pesin bele nor go fit mak am dirti for God eye?
"Bikos nor bi di pesin heart e dey enta, na en bele and e go shit am komot. (Dis won min sey all fud dey klin.)"
Jisos kon sey, "Wetin kom out from insaid pesin, naim dey mak am dirti.
"Bikos to slip wit hu yu nor mari, to tif, to kil pesin,

to slip wit anoda pesin husban or wife, longtrot, evil tins, to disiv pesin, to dey misbihav, jelosi, to spoil anoda pesin, to kari bodi up and to du foolish tins, na from insaid pesin heart all dis bad-bad tins dey from kom.
"All dis evil tins dey kom from insaid pesin and na dem dey mak pesin dirti for God eye."
Afta Jisos komot from der, e kon go di aria wey dem dey kol Tyre. Wen e enta won haus, e nor wont mak enibodi no sey e dey der, bot e nor fit hide.
Won wuman wey evil spirit dey wori en dota kon hear abaut Jisos and e kom mit am kon fal for en front.
Di wuman na Greek wey kom from Fonicia for Syria. E kon beg Jisos mak e driv di dimon komot from en pikin bodi.
Bot Jisos tel am, "Mak di shildren chop beleful first, bikos e nor gud to tak shildren fud giv dog."
Di wuman ansa, "Yes, Oga, bot ivun dogs dey chop di smol-smol fud wey dey fal from shildren plate."
Jisos kon tel am, "Since yor fate strong rish to tok laik dis, mak yu dey go. Di dimon don komot from yor pikin bodi."
Wen di wuman rish haus, e kon si en pikin slip for bed and di dimon don liv am.
Den Jisos komot from Tyre kon pas Sidon go Galili Sea for Decapolis aria.
Som pipol kari won man wey nor dey hear or tok kom mit am sey mak e tosh di man wit en hand.
Wen Jisos don tak di man go kona for wer pipol nor dey, e kon put en tu fingas insaid di man ear, e spit for en hand kon tosh di man tongue.
Den e luk hevun kon sey, "Effata" (wey min, "Mak yu opun").
At wons, di man ear opun, en tongue luz and e kon start to tok.
Jisos kon sey mak dem nor tel enibodi wetin hapun. Bot dem kon dey tok am for evriwer.
Pipol sopraiz wel-wel dey sey, "Jisos don du evritin wel. E ivun mak di pipol wey nor dey hear, hear and pipol wey nor fit tok, e don mak dem dey tok."
Dat taim, plenti pipol gada and nor-tin dey for dem to chop. So Jisos kon kol en disaipols tel dem,
"I dey sori for dis pipol, bikos dem don dey here wit mi for tiri days naw and dem nor get enitin to chop.
"If I send dem go wit hunga, dem go faint for road and som of dem kom from far place."
Jisos disaipols kon sey, "Wer pesin go fit si bread buy wey go rish dis pipol chop, since pipol nor dey stay dis place wey bi desert?"
Jisos ask dem, "Haw meni bread una get?" Dem ansa, "Na sevun."
Den Jisos sey mak di pipol sidan for groun. Afta e tak di sevun bread tank God, e kon divide am giv en disaipols, sey mak dem share am for di pipol.
Dem stil get som smol-smol fish tu and afta Jisos don tank God, e kon tel en disaipols mak dem share am for di pipol tu.
Evribodi chop beleful and di won wey dem gada, ful sevun basket.
All di pipol wey chop rish for tazon men. Den, Jisos kon send dem go haus.
En and en disaipols kon enta boat go Dalmanuta aria.
Di Farisi pipol kon dey argue wit Jisos sey mak e show dem sign from hevun, bikos dem won trai am.
Jisos kon ask dem, "Why pipol for dis wold naw dey ask for sign? Mak I tel una tru wod, dem nor go get eni sign".
Den e kon liv dem enta boat go di oda side.
Jisos disaipols forget to tak bread join di wons wey dey wit dem insaid di boat.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una shine una eye, so dat una go gaid unasef against di Farisi pipol and Herod yist!"
So, dem kon dey tok to ish oda abaut di bread wey dem nor tak folo bodi.
Wen Jisos no wetin dem dey tok, e kon tel dem, "Why una dey tok abaut bread wey una nor tak? Una nor dey si or undastand? Na so una foolish rish?
"Una get eye, bot una nor fit tak am si? Una get ear, bot una nor fit tak am hear? Una nor dey rimemba enitin at-all?
"Wen I divide faiv bread for faiv tazon pipol, haw meni basket una gada wen di pipol don chop finish?" Dem ansa, "Na twef."
"Den, wen I divide sevun bread for for tazon pipol, haw meni basket una gada wen di pipol don chop finish?" Dem ansa, "Na sevun."
Den Jisos tel dem, "Una neva stil undastand?"
Wen dem rish Betsaida, dem bring won man wey nor dey si kom mit Jisos mak e tosh am.
E hol di man for hand kon tak am go outsaid di vilage. Jisos spit for di man eye kon tosh am, den ask am, "Yu dey si enitin?"
Di man luk up kon sey, "Yes, I dey si pipol, bot dem bi laik tri wey dey waka abaut."
Jisos tosh di man eye again. Di man eye kon opun and e kon dey si wel-wel.
E kon tel di man mak e dey go en haus, bot e warn am sey, "Mak yu nor go insaid di vilage again."
Jisos and en disaipols kon go di vilage dem wey dey Sizeria Filipai. As dem dey go for road, e kon ask en disaipols, "Na hu pipol dey sey I bi sef?"
Dem kon sey, "Som sey yu bi Jon di Baptist, odas sey, yu bi Elija and som stil sey, yu bi won for di profets."
Jisos kon ask dem, "Bot hu una sey I bi?" Pita kon ansa, "Yu bi di Mezaya."
Den e warn dem mak dem nor tel enibodi hu e bi.
Den Jisos bigin tish dem sey, "Man Pikin must sofa meni tins, bikos di eldas, prist oga dem and di law tishas go kil-am and afta tiri days, e go wak-up from deat.
As e nor hide dis tins from dem, Pita kol am go kona kon tel am, "Wetin yu dey tok so nor gud o-o."
Bot Jisos turn luk en disaipols kon shaut for Pita, "Satan! Mak yu go my bak, bikos yu nor put yor maind for wetin God wont. Na wetin humanbin wont, na der yor maind dey."
Den Jisos kol di pipol wit en disaipols kon tel dem, "If enibodi won folo mi, e must denai ensef, kari en kros, den kon folo mi.
"Bikos enibodi wey won save en life, go luz am and enibodi wey luz en life bikos of mi and dis gospol, go save am.
"Wetin pesin go gain if e get di hol wold and e luz en soul?
"Wetin pesin fit yuz tak eshange en life?
"If enibodi shame for mi and wetin I dey tish for dis wold wey wiked and ashawo pipol dey, Man Pikin go shame for am tu, wen e go kom bak for en Papa and en holi angels glori.
Jisos kon tel dem, "I tel una tru wod, som pipol dey here wey nor go die ontil dem don si God Kindom and en pawa."
Afta sis days, Jisos, Pita, James and Jon kon go won high mountin. E kon shange for dia front,
en klot kon dey shine wel-wel and e white pas haw eni dry-klina go fit wosh am.
Den Elija and Mosis kon apier for dia front dey tok wit Jisos.
So, Pita tel Jisos, "Tisha, e gud mak wi stay here. Mak wi build tiri canopi, won for yu, won for Mosis and won for Elija."
(Dem dey fear and dem nor no wetin to tok.)
Den, kloud kon kova dem and won vois kon tok from di kloud sey, "Dis na My onli pikin wey I luv. Mak una listin to am!"
Wen dem luk roun, dem nor si enibodi esept Jisos.
As dem dey kom dan from di mountin, Jisos kon tel dem mak dem nor tel enibodi wetin dem si, ontil Man Pikin go don wak-up from deat.
Den dem kon dey tok wit ish oda abaut wetin dis "Wak-up from deat" min.
Dem kon ask Jisos, "Wetin mak di law tishas dey sey Elija go first kom?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Tru-tru, Elija go first kom, mak e for priper evritin. Naim mak dem rite for God wod sey, 'Man Pikin must sofa meni tins and dem must hate am?'
"Bot I dey tel una naw sey, Elija don kom tru-tru and dem don du-am wetin dem laik, jos as God tok for en wod.
Wen Jisos, Pita, James and Jon kom mit di oda disaipols, dem si meni pipol and di law tishas gada, dey argue wit dem.
Wen di pipol si Jisos, dem sopraiz kon run kwik-kwik go grit am.
Jisos ask dem, "Wetin una dey argue abaut?"
Won pesin among di pipol kon ansa, "Tisha, I bring my pikin wey get dimon wey dey mak am nor fit tok, kom mit yu.
"Enitaim di spirit seize am, e go trow am dan and e go dey bring foam from en mout, dey grind en tit and en bodi go kon strate. I tel yor disaipols mak dem driv di dimon komot, bot dem nor fit."
Jisos kon ask en disaipols, "Una wey nor biliv! Haw long I go stay wit una? Haw long I go dey bear wit una? Mak una bring di boy kom mit mi."
So, dem tak di boy go mit am. Wen di spirit si Jisos, e kwik-kwik trow di boy for groun kon mak am dey shake. Di boy fal for groun, dey rol and foam dey komot from en mout.
Jisos ask di boy papa, "Since wen dis tin don dey du-am?" Di papa kon ansa, "Na since e bi smol pikin.
"Di spirit dey always trow am insaid fire or wota mak e for die. Bot if yu go fit du enitin, mak yu sori for am and help us."
Den Jisos ask am, "Yu min, 'If I fit?' Evritin dey posibol for di pesin wey biliv."
Kwik-kwik di boy papa kon shaut, "I biliv o-o! Help mi mak I biliv more-more!"
Wen Jisos si sey pipol dey gada, e kon tel di evil spirit, "Yu deaf and dumb spirit, I komand mak yu kom out from di boy and nor enta en bodi again."
Di dimon shaut, shake di boy wel-wel kon komot from en bodi. Di boy slip for groun sotey meni pipol kon dey sey, "E don die!"
Bot Jisos hol di boy hand smol-smol, kari am up and di boy kon stand-up.
Wen e enta haus, en disaipols kon ask am, "Why wi nor fit driv di dimon komot?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Na onli wit praya and fastin dis kaind won dey tak komot."
Jisos and en disaipols kon komot from der pas Galili. Bot Jisos nor wont mak enibodi no,
bikos e dey tish and tel en disaipols sey, "Dem go sel Man Pikin giv humanbin. Dem go kil-am and afta tiri days, e go wak-up again."
Bot di disaipols nor undastand wetin Jisos tok and fear nor let dem ask am wetin e min.
Dem kon rish Kapanum. So, wen Jisos don enta haus, e kon ask en disaipols, "Wetin una dey tok for road?"
Bot dem nor ansa, bikos wen dem dey kom for road, na hu big pas among dem, dem dey argue abaut.
Afta Jisos sidan, e kol en twef disaipols kon tel dem, "If enibodi among una won bi first, e go bi di last and e go bi evribodi savant."
E kon kol won smol pikin stand for dia front. Den e hol di pikin hand, kon sey,
"Enibodi wey welkom won of dis smol pikin bikos of mi, na mi e welkom and enibodi wey welkom mi, nor bi mi alone e welkom, bot na my Papa wey send mi."
Jon kon tel am, "Tisha, wi si won man wey yuz yor name dey driv dimon komot from insaid pipol bodi and wi kon trai to stop am, bikos e nor dey folo us waka."
Bot Jisos ansa dem, "Mak una nor stop am, bikos nobodi wey yuz my name du mirakol go fit tok bad tin abaut mi.
"Bikos enibodi wey nor dey against us, dey for awa side.
"I tel una tru wod, enibodi wey giv yu cup of wota bikos yu dey folo mi, nor go eva luz en riwod.
"If enibodi mak won of dis smol pikin wey biliv mi komit sin, e go beta mak dem tie big stone for en neck kon trow am insaid riva.
"If yor hand go mak yu sin, mak yu kut am komot! E beta mak yu enta insaid God Kindom wit won hand, dan to get tu hand kon enta hell fire wey nor go eva kwensh,
di place wey get worm wey nor dey die and di fire nor dey kwensh.
"If yor leg go mak yu sin, mak yu kut am komot. E beta mak yu enta God Kindom wit won leg, dan to get tu leg kon enta hell fire wey nor dey eva kwensh,
di place wey get worm wey nor dey die and di fire nor dey kwensh.
"If yor eye go mak yu sin, mak yu pul am komot! E beta mak yu enta God Kindom wit won eye, dan to get tu eye kon enta hell fire wey nor dey eva kwensh,
di place wey get worm wey nor dey die and di fire nor dey kwensh.
"God go trai evribodi wit fire.
"Salt gud, bot if e nor get taste again, haw pesin go fit tak mak am swit? Mak una get salt insaid una and mak una dey liv for peace wit ish oda."
Jisos kon komot for dat place go Judea and Jordan Riva aria. Plenti pipol stil gada kom mit am. E kon bigin tish dem as e dey du evritaim.
Den, som Farisi pipol wey won test am kon ask am, "E bad mak man driv en wife at-all?"
Jisos ask dem, "Wetin Mosis komand una?"
Dem ansa, "Mosis sey mak man rite leta to daivos en wife."
Bot Jisos tel dem, "E tel una to du so, bikos una heart strong wel-wel.
"Bot from di taim God kreate di wold, na man and wuman naim E mak.
"Na dis mak man dey liv en papa and mama go join en wife
and di tu of dem go bikom won. So dem nor go bi tu again, bot dem go bi won bodi.
"So, wetin God don join togeda, mak nobodi seprate am."
Wen dem enta di haus again, en disaipols kon ask am abaut di mata.
Jisos ansa dem, "Enibodi wey driv en wife, den e go mari anoda wuman, don komit adultri.
"And eni wuman wey liv en husban, den e go mari anoda man, don komit adultri tu."
Pipol kon dey bring shildren kom mit Jisos mak e tosh dem, bot en disaipols dey shaut for di pipol wey bring dem kom.
Bot wen Jisos si wetin dey hapun, e ves kon tel en disaipols, "Mak una alow smol-smol shildren kom mit mi, nor stop dem, bikos na pipol laik dem, go enta God Kindom.
"I tel una tru wod, enibodi wey nor risiv God Kindom laik smol shildren, nor go eva enta insaid."
Afta, Jisos draw di shildren near bodi kon bless dem.
As Jisos dey waka for road, won man run kom mit am sey, "Gud Tisha, wetin I go du mak I for get life wey nor dey end?"
Jisos ansa am, "Why yu dey kol mi gud? Nobodi gud esept God.
"Yu no di komandment; nor kil pesin, nor slip wit pesin wey yu nor mari, nor tif, nor lai for pesin head, nor shit pesin, respet yor papa and mama."
Di man kon tel Jisos, "Tisha, I dey obey all dis law wit all my heart since I bi smol pikin."
As Jisos luk am, e kon feel for am, den e tel am, "E get won tin wey yu neva du. Go sel all wetin yu get, giv poor pipol di moni and yu go get plenti propati for hevun. Den mak yu kom folo mi."
Wen di man hear dis wod, e ves komot der, bikos e get plenti moni.
Den Jisos luk roun kon tel en disaipols, "E go hard wel-wel for pipol wey get moni wel-wel to enta God Kindom!"
Di disaipol sopraiz for wetin Jisos tok. Bot Jisos tel dem again, "My shildren, e go hard wel-wel to enta God Kindom o-o!
"E go dey eazi for kamel to pas needo hol, dan for pipol wey get moni wel-wel to enta God Kindom."
Dem sopraiz more-more kon dey ask ish oda, "Den, hu God go save?"
Jisos luk dem kon ansa, "Dis tins hard wel-wel for humanbin, bot nor bi for God, bikos evritin dey posibol for God."
Pita kon tel am, "Si! Wot of wi wey don liv evritin wey wi get, kon folo yu?"
Jisos ansa, "I tel una tru wod, e nor get enibodi wey liv en haus, brodas, sistas, papa, mama, shildren or land bikos of di gospol,

wey nor go risiv ondred taims more dan di haus, brodas, sistas, papa, mama, shildren and land wey e liv for dis wold. Aldoh e nor go eazi for dem, bot di life wey nor go end for di wold wey dey kom, go bi dia own.
"Bot meni pipol wey bi first naw, go bi last and pipol wey bi last naw, go bi first."

Jisos and en disaipols kon dey go Jerusalem. As Jisos dey waka for dia front, di disaipols konfuz and doz wey dey folo dem kon dey fear, bikos dem nor no wetin go hapun for der. Jisos kol en twef disaipols go kona again kon bigin tel dem wetin go hapun to am.
"Si, wi dey go Jerusalem and dem go sel Man Pikn giv di prist oga dem and di law tishas. Dem go kondem am and dem go giv am to di Gentai pipol.
"Dem go laff am, spit for en bodi, flog am wel-wel kon kil-am, bot afta tiri days, e go wak-up."
Zebedi shildren, James and Jon, kom mit Jisos sey, "Tisha, wi wont mak yu du wetin wi won beg yu."
Jisos kon ask dem, "Wetin una wont mak I du for una?"
Dem ansa, "Mak yu alow us sidan wit yu for yor kindom, won for yor rite and di oda for yor left hand."
Jisos ask dem, "Una no wetin una dey ask for so? Una go fit drink from di cup wey I go drink from? Abi una go fit bear di baptism wey dem go baptaiz mi?"
Dem ansa, "Wi go fit." Den Jisos tel dem, "Una go rili drink from di cup wey I go drink from and una go fit bear di baptism wey dem go baptaiz mi,
bot nor bi mi go tok hu go sidan for my left or rite side, bikos e get di pipol wey God priper am for."
Wen di oda ten disaipols hear wetin Zebedi shildren tel Jisos, dem kon dey ves for dem.
Jisos kon kol and tel dem, "Una no sey pipol wey dey rule di Gentai pipol dey du oga for dem and pipol wey dey high place dey yuz dia posishon dey opres pipol.
"Bot nor bi so e sopoz bi among una. Enibodi wey won bi oga among una, must bi una savant
and enibodi wey won bi first among una, must bi evribodi savant.
"Bikos ivun Man Pikin nor kom mak dem serv am, bot e kom serv pipol and to giv en life mak meni pipol for dey save."
Dem kon go Jeriko. As Jisos and en disaipols wit plenti pipol dey komot for der, Bartimaeus wey bi Timaeus pikin, won begga wey blind, sidan for road dey beg.
Wen e hear sey na Jisos wey kom from Nazaret dey pas, e kon bigin shaut, "Jisos Kraist, David pikin, mak yu sori for mi o-o!"
Meni pipol kon dey shaut for am mak e kwayet, bot e kon dey shaut more-more sey, "David pikin, sori for mi o-o!"
Jisos stop kon sey, "Kol am kom." So, dem tel di blind man, "Mak yu hapi! Get up bikos Jisos dey kol yu."
Bartimaeus trowey di klot wey e tak kova bodi kon jump-up go mit Jisos.
Den Jisos ask am, "Wetin yu wont mak I du for yu?" Di blind man ansa, "Tisha, mak my eye opun, mak I for fit si again."
So, Jisos tel am, "Go, yor fate don heal yu." At wons, di man kon dey si and e kon folo Jisos.
As Jisos and en disaipols won enta Jerusalem, dem kon rish Betpage and Betani wey near Mount Olives, so Jisos send en tu disaipols go for dia front
kon tel dem, "Mak una go di vilage wey dey for front. As una enta, una go si won smol donkey wey dem tie for der, wey enibodi neva ride bifor. Mak una luz am kom.
"If enibodi ask una, 'Why una dey luz am?' Mak una sey, 'Di oga nid am naw. Wi go bring am bak leta.'"
So dem go kon si smol donkey wey dem tie near won door for road and dem kon luz am.
Som pipol wey stand for der kon ask dem, "Why una dey luz dat smol donkey?"
Dem kon tok as Jisos sey mak dem tok, so di pipol kon let dem go.
Dem bring di smol donkey kom mit Jisos kon spread dia klot on-top am, den Jisos kon sidan put.
Meni pipol spread dia klot for road and som oda pipol spread palm leafs wey dem kut from bush.
Di pipol wey dey front and di wons wey dey folo am for bak kon dey shaut, "Hosanna! God don bless di King wey dey kom wit en name.
"God don bless awa papa David kindom wey dey kom. Hosanna, wi hail o-o!"
Jisos enta Jerusalem kon go insaid di Tempol. Afta e don luk evritin wey dey der, e kon go Betani wit en twef disaipols, bikos day don dey dak.
Di next day, as dem dey komot for Betani, Jisos kon dey hungri.
E si won fig tri from far wey get plenti leafs, so e kon waka go luk weda frut dey for di tri. Wen e rish der, e si sey nor-tin dey di tri, na onli leafs e get, bikos fig season neva rish.
E kon tel di tri, "Pipol nor go eva chop yor frut again." And en disaipols hear wetin e tok.

Wen dem rish Jerusalem, Jisos enta di Tempol kon driv all di pipol wey dey sel and buy for di Tempol varanda. E trowey di pipol wey dey shange moni tabol and di pipol wey dey sel bird, e trowey dia chair tu.
Jisos nor let enibodi tak enitin wey dem dey sel pas di Tempol varanda.
Den e tel dem, "Dem rite am sey; 'Pipol go kol My haus, "Praya haus" for di hol wold. Bot una don turn am to tifi-tifi haus.'"
Wen di prist oga dem and di law tishas hear wetin e tok, dem kon dey plan haw dem go tak kil Jisos, bot dem dey fear, bikos di pipol sopraiz for wetin e dey tish dem.
Wen evenin rish, Jisos and en disaipols kon komot for di tawn.
For mornin, wen Jisos and en disaipols dey pas, dem kon si sey di fig tri don dey die from en root.
Pita rimemba kon tel Jisos, "Tisha, luk! Di fig tri wey yu kos yestiday don dey die."
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una get fate for God.
"I tel una tru wod, if enibodi tel dis mountin, 'Komot from here go enta di sea' and di pesin nor get doubol maind, bot biliv sey wetin e tok go hapun, God go du-am for am.
"Na dis mak mi dey tel una sey, enitin wey una pray and ask God for, mak una biliv sey una don get-am and e go bi una own.
"Enitaim una dey pray, if una get enitin for maind against enibodi, mak una forgiv am, so dat una Papa wey dey hevun go forgiv una tu.
"Bot if una nor gri forgiv oda pipol, una Papa wey dey hevun nor go forgiv una."
Jisos and en disaipols go Jerusalem again. Wen Jisos dey waka for di Tempol varanda, di prist oga dem, di law tishas and di eldas kom mit am sey,
"Na wish rite yu get to tak dey du all dis tins? Hu giv yu di pawa?"
Jisos ansa dem, "I go ask una won kweshon. If una ansa mi, den I go tel una wish rite I get to dey du dis tins.
"Jon baptism, na from God, abi na from pipol e from kom? Mak una ansa mi."
Dem kon dey tok to ish oda, "If wi sey, 'Na from God,' e go sey, 'Den why una nor biliv am?'
"Bot wi nor fit sey, 'Na from pipol', bikos wi dey fear dis pipol, (since dem biliv sey Jon na profet)".'
So dem ansa Jisos, "Wi nor no." Den, Jisos sey, "Mi tu nor go tel una hu giv mi di pawa to du all dis tins."

Jisos kon tok to dem wit parabol: "Won man plant grape for en farm. E fence am roun, dig wer dem go dey press di wine put, den kon build big haus wey gaid go dey stay. E haya am giv tenants wey go dey kare for di place kon travol go far.
"Wen havest taim rish, e send won of en savant go mit di tenants mak dem gi-am en own share for di havest.
"Bot di tenants seize di savant, beat am kon send am go bak wit empti hand.
"Di man stil send anoda savant go mit dem. Dem nak en head kon beat am enihaw.
"E send anoda won again, dem kon kil-am. Na so dem beat and kil oda savants wey e send tu.
"Di man get won pikin wey e luv wel-wel and na dis won rimain for am to send. At last, e kon send am go mit dem dey tok for en maind sey, 'As dis won bi my pikin, dem go respet am.'
"Bot wen di tenants si-am dey kom, dem kon sey, 'Na di owna pikin dey kom so. Mak wi kil-am, so dat wi go get all di propati for awasef.'
"So dem seize am, kil-am kon trow en bodi outsaid di farm.
"Na wetin una tink sey di farm owna go du? E go distroi doz tenant kon giv di farm to oda pipol.
"Una neva read God wod wey sey, 'Di stone wey di buildas rejet, don turn to di main stone?'
"Dis na wetin God du and e gud for awa eye wel-wel.'"
Naw, dem won kon arres am, bot dem dey fear di pipol, bikos dem no sey Jisos tok dis parabol against dem. So dem kon waka liv am.
Dem send som Farisi and Herod pipol, mak dem faind way to kash Jisos wit wetin e go tok.
Wen dem mit am, dem kon ask am, "Tisha, wi no sey yu dey tok trut, yu nor dey du wayo and yu dey tish di trut abaut God way. E gud mak wi dey pay tax giv Caesar, abi mak wi nor pay?"
Bot Jisos no dia wayo, so e tel dem, "Why una dey test mi? Mak una bring won koin mak I si."
So dem bring won koin and Jisos ask dem, "Wish pesin face and name dey di moni so?" Dem ansa, "Na Caesar own."
Jisos tel dem, "Mak una giv Caesar di tins wey bi Caesar own and mak una giv God di tins wey bi God own." Dem sopraiz wel-wel for wetin Jisos tok.
Di Sadusi pipol (wey nor biliv sey pipol go wak-up from deat) kom mit Jisos tel am,
"Tisha, Mosis rite giv us sey: 'If man broda die and en wife nor born for am, en broda must mari di wuman, mak dem for born shildren for di broda wey don die.'
"E get sevun brodas. Di first won mari and wen e die, e nor get shildren.
"Di sekon won kon mari di wuman and e nor stil get pikin bifor e die and na so e hapun for di ted won.
"No won for di sevun brodas wey mari di wuman get pikin. At last, di wuman tu kon die.
"For di taim wey pipol go wak-up from deat, na wish pesin wife di wuman go kon bi, as e bi sey all di sevun brodas mari am?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Una nor no sey una dey disiv unasef, bikos una nor no God wod and en pawa.
"Wen pipol wak-up from deat, dem nor go mari again, insted dem go bi laik angels for hevun.
"Naw, for di mata abaut pipol wey go wak-up, una neva read for di book wey Mosis rite abaut di bush wey fire dey burn and haw God tel Mosis, 'Na Mi bi Abraham, Izik and Jakob God'?
"God nor bi God for di pipol wey don die, bot na for di pipol wey dey alaif. Na big mistak una dey mak so!"
So, won man wey sabi di law kon dey hear dem dey argue. Wen e si sey Jisos dey ansa dem wel, e kon ask am, "Wish komandment big pas?"
Jisos ansa am, "Na dis bi di komandment wey big pas: 'Mak una listin, Izrel pipol, di Oga, awa God na won e bi.
'Mak una luv God una Oga wit all una heart, soul and all una pawa.'
"Di sekon won na, 'Mak una luv una nebor as una luv unasef.' E nor get eni komandment wey big pas dis tu."
Di man wey dey tish di law kon tel Jisos, "Na tru, Tisha. Yu dey koret for wetin yu tok, na onli God bi Oga and no oda god dey apart from am.
"To luv God wit all awa heart, maind and pawa and to luv awa nebor as awasef big pas all di sakrifais and ofrins wey pesin fit giv God."
