Wen Jisos si sey di man tink wel bifor e ansa, e kon tel di man, "Yu nor dey far from God Kindom." From dat taim, nobodi get di maind to ask am eni kweshon again.
As Jisos dey tish for di Tempol varanda, e kon sey, "Why e bi sey di law tishas dey sey Kraist na David pikin?
"Di Holi Spirit pawa mak David tok sey, 'God tel my Oga, sidan for my rite hand ontil I go put yor enimis unda yor leg.'
"If David ensef kol Kraist, 'Oga,' haw Kraist go kon tak bi en pikin again?" Di pipol wey gada kon dey listin to am wit hapines.
Wen Jisos dey tish, e kon sey, 'Mak una dey kareful abaut di pipol wey sabi di law. Dem laik to dey waka abaut wit long klot and dem laik loud gritin for market,
di chair wey beta pas for sinagog and high tabol for parti, na der dem dey laik sidan put.
"Wuman wey en husban don die, dem dey kolet en propati and dem dey pray long praya mak pipol for si dem. Na dia ponishment go wos pas."
Den, Jisos sidan face di ofrin box, dey luk as pipol dey put moni insaid. Meni rish pipol kon dey put plenti moni insaid.
Won poor wuman wey e husban don die kon kom, put tu koins wey nor rish won penni for insaid di box.
Jisos kon kol en disaipols sey, "I tel una tru wod, dis poor wuman wey e husban don die put moni wey pas di oda pipol own.
"Bikos di oda pipol giv dia ofrin from di plenti moni wey dem get, bot dis wuman, as e poor rish, put evritin wey e get for life."
As Jisos dey komot from di Tempol varanda, won of en disaipol kon sey. "Tisha, si dis fain-fain stone wey dem tak build dis haus!"
Jisos kon ansa, "Una dey si all dis big haus? Dem nor go ivun liv won stone on-top anoda. All of dem go skata!"
As Jisos sidan for Mount Olives wey face di Tempol, Pita, James, Jon and Andru kom mit am wen odas nor dey and dem kon sey,
"Mak yu tel us wish taim dis tins go hapun and wetin go bi di sign to show sey di taim for dis tins to hapun, don rish?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Mak una tak kare, so dat nobodi go disiv una.
"Meni pipol go kom wit my name sey dem bi Jisos and dem go disiv meni pipol.
"Wen una hear abaut war wey dey hapun and rumor sey war won hapun, mak una nor fear. All dis tins must hapun, bot di end for di wold neva rish.
"Difren kontris and kindoms go fite ish oda. Eartquake and hunga go dey for meni place. Bot wen di wahala won start, e go bi laik wen wuman won born.
"Mak una shine una eye. Dem go tak una go kourt and dem go beat una for sinagog. Bikos of mi, una go stand for front of govnors and kings mak una for fit tel dem abaut mi.
"Bifor di wold go end, pipol must first prish di gospol for evri kontri for dis wold.
"Wen dem arres una kari go kourt, mak una nor wori abaut wetin una go tok. God go giv una wetin to tok for dat taim, bikos nor bi una go tok, bot na di Holi Spirit go du-am.
"Broda go betray en broda mak dem kil-am. Papa go sel en pikin giv dem tu. Shildren go betray dia papa and mama and dem go kil dem.
"Evribodi go hate una bikos of my name. Bot di pesin wey go fit bear rish end, go dey save."
"Wen una si wetin nor sopoz hapun dey hapun for di Holi Place (mak di pesin wey dey read, no wetin dis wod min), den doz wey dey Judea, must run go mountin.
"Mak di pesin wey dey on-top haus nor kom dan or go insaid en haus go kolet enitin.
"Mak di pesin wey dey farm nor go bak to en haus go kolet klot.
"For dat taim, e go bad wel-wel for wimen wey get bele and doz wit pikin wey stil dey suck breast!
"Mak una pray sey dis tins nor go hapun for di taim wen kold dey wel-wel.
"Bikos wen dis tins go dey hapun, di kaind sofa wey go dey, neva dey since wen God kreate dis wold and dat kaind sofa, nor go dey again.
"If God nor kut doz days short, nobodi go save. Bot bikos of di pipol wey God don shuz, E don mak doz days short.
"Dat taim, if enibodi tel una, 'Luk! Mak una si Jisos for here!' or 'Si-am for der!', mak una nor biliv dem.
"Bikos fake kraists and profets go kom and dem go du signs and mirakols wey bi laik majik to disiv pipol. If to sey e posibol, dem go disiv di pipol wey God don shuz.
"Mak una tak kare! I don tel una evritin bifor di taim go rish."
"Bot for dat taim, afta di sofa, di sun go dak and di moon nor go shine again.
"Di stars go fal from hevun and di pawa wey dey hol di skai, go shake.
"Den evribodi go si Man Pikin dey kom from insaid kloud wit strong pawa and glori.
"Den, God go send en angels go gada di pipol wey E don shuz from di for kona for di wold go rish hevun."
"Mak una learn wetin dis fig tri parabol min: Wen en bransh don dey soft and en leaf dey fal komot, mak una no sey dry season don near.
"So wen unasef si dis tins dey hapun, mak una no sey di taim wey Man Pikin go kom, don near.
"I tel una tru wod, di pipol for dis taim nor go die finish bifor all dis tins go hapun.
"Hevun and eart go vanish, bot my wod go dey foreva."
"Di day or di taim wen dis tins go hapun, nobodi no am, ivun angels for hevun nor no and God Pikin sef nor no tu. Na onli di Papa, for hevun no am.
"Mak una dey wosh and shine una eye, bikos una nor no wen di taim go rish.
"E go bi laik wen man dey travol go far. E liv en haus mak en savant luk am, giv dem wok to du kon tel di gateman mak e wosh en haus.
"So mak una shine una eye, bikos una nor no wen di haus owna go kom bak- weda na for evenin, nite, mornin or wen day don break.
"If not, e go fit kom bak wen una nor espet and e go mit una dey slip.
"Wetin I dey tel una so, I dey tel evribodi. So mak una shine una eye!"
Tu days bifor Passova and di Bread wey nor get yist Fist, di prist oga dem and di law tishas kon dey faind as dem go tak arres Jisos, mak dem for kil-am.
Dem sey, "Mak wi nor du-am naw wen dem dey du di Fist, so dat pipol nor go rayot."

Wen Jisos dey Betani for Saimon haus (wey get leprosi bifor), e sidan wit dem to chop, naim won wuman bring oil insaid alabasta box kom, di oil dear wel-wel and dey sent fine. Afta e don opun di kontena, e pour di oil for Jisos head.
Bot som pipol wey dey der kon dey ves, dey tel ish oda, "Why dis wuman dey waste oil wey dear wel-wel laik dis?
"Dem for sel am pas tiri ondred (300) silva koins and giv di moni to poor pipol!" So, dem kon ves dey tok to di wuman enihaw.
Bot Jisos ansa dem, "Mak una liv di wuman alone. Why una dey wori-am? Na gud tin e du for mi so -o-o!
"Poor pipol go always dey wit una and una go fit du gud for dem enitaim una laik. Bot mi, I nor go dey wit una always!
"Dis wuman don du wetin e fit du. E anoint my bodi to priper mi for beria, bifor di taim go rish.
"I tel una tru wod, eniwer wey dem go prish dis gospol for di hol wold, pipol go tok abaut dis tin wey dis wuman don du so."
Den Judas Iskarot, wey dey among Jisos disaipols, kon go mit di prist oga dem sey e won sel Jisos giv dem.
Wen dem hear am, dem hapi wel-wel kon promis am moni. So, Judas kon bigin faind haw e go fit tak sel Jisos giv dem.
Di day wen dem start di Bread wey nor get yist fist and wey dem dey sakrifais smol ship, Jisos disaipols kon ask am, "Wer yu wont mak wi priper for yu to chop Passova fud?"
Jisos send tu disaipols go for front kon tel dem, "Wen una enta di tawn, una go si won man wey kari wota kontena. Mak una folo am.
"Di haus wey e go enta, mak una tel di pesin wey get-am sey, 'Di Tisha sey mak wi ask, "Wer di room wey mi and my disaipols go for chop Passova fud?"'
"E go show una won big room for upstair wer tabol and chairs dey. Mak una priper evritin for der."
So en disapols go di tawn and dem si evritin jos as Jisos tel dem sey e go bi, dem kon priper di Passova fud for der.
Wen evenin rish, Jisos kon go di haus wit en twef disaipols.
As dem dey chop for di tabol, Jisos kon sey, "I tel una tru wod, won of una wey dey chop wit mi, go sel mi giv my enimis."
Wetin Jisos tok kon dey wori di disaipols for maind, so dem kon dey ask am won by won, "Oga! Na mi?"
Jisos ansa, "Na won of una wey dey folo mi chop for di same plate.
"Man Pikin go die as dem rite for God wod abaut am, bot kos dey di pesin head wey go sel am. E for beta sey dem nor born dat pesin at-all."
As dem dey chop, Jisos tak bread, tank God, den divide am giv en disaipols kon sey, "Mak una tak and chop, bikos dis na my bodi."
Afta, e tak cup, tank God, den e giv en disaipols and all of dem, drink from insaid.
E kon tel dem, "Dis na my blood, di kovenant blood wey I pour for evribodi.
"I tel una tru wod, I nor go drink wine again, ontil di day wen I go drink di new wine for God Kindom."
Afta dem don sing won hymn, dem kon enta insaid Mount Olives.
Jisos kon tel en disaipols, "Una go run liv mi, bikos God wod sey, 'I go kil di pesin wey dey luk di ship and di ship go skata.'
"Bot afta God don wak mi up from deat, I go-go una front, go wait una for Galili."
Pita kon sey, "Ivun if odas run liv yu, I nor go run liv yu-o-o!"
Jisos ansa am, "I tel yu di trut, today, for dis nite, bifor fawo go du 'Kukuruku' tu taims, yu go don denai mi tiri taims."
Bot Pita stil sey, "Ivun if I go die wit yu, I nor go eva denai yu." All of dem stil tok di same tin.
Jisos and en disaipols kon go won place wey dem dey kol Getsemani and Jisos tel dem, "Mak una sidan for here, bikos I won go pray."
E tak Pita, James and Jon folo bodi. E maind kon dey trobol am and e nor dey hapi.
E kon tel dem, "My heart dey heavi wel-wel laik sey I won die. So, mak una stay here dey wosh."
E waka go front smol kon fal face groun, bigin pray, "Papa! If yu wont, mak yu let dis sofa pas mi."
Jisos kon pray, "My Papa, e nor get wetin Yu nor fit du. Mak Yu tak dis sofa cup from mi. Bot nor bi as I wont am, bot na as Yu wont."
Wen Jisos kom bak, e mit en disaipols dey slip, so e tel Pita, "Saimon, yu dey slip? Yu nor fit stay mak yu nor slip for won hour?
"Mak yu nor slip, bot dey pray mak yu nor for fal enta temtashon. Man spirit won pray, bot en bodi dey wik."
E komot again, go pray as e pray bifor.
Wen e kom bak again, e si sey dem stil dey slip; dem nor dey pray, so dem nor no wetin to tel am.
E kom di ted taim kon ask dem, "Una stil dey slip? Di slip don du, bikos taim don rish! Mak una si, dem don sel Man Pikin giv sinas.
"Mak una get up mak wi dey go. Si, di pesin wey won sel mi, dey kom!"
As Jisos stil dey tok, Judas, won of di twef disaipols, kon kom wit plenti pipol wey di prist oga dem, di law tishas and di eldas send and all of dem kari sword and big-big stik.
(By dis taim, di man wey won sel Jisos don giv dem sign sey, "Di pesin wey I go kiss, naim bi di man. Mak una arres and hol am wel-wel.")
Wen Judas kom, e go mit Jisos kon sey, "Tisha!", Den e kiss am.
So, di pipol kon seize and arres Jisos.
Won pesin wey stand for der kon tak en sword kut di High Prist savant ear komot.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Na mi una kari sword and big-big stik kom arres laik sey I bi tif?
"I dey wit una evriday for di Tempol dey tish, bot una nor arres mi den." Dis tin hapun so dat wetin dem rite for God wod, go bi tru.
Den all en disaipols kon run liv am.
Won young man wey tie smol klot for waist, dey folo Jisos. So dem won kon arres di man join,
bot e kon run komot wit nakednes and liv en klot for der.
Den, dem tak Jisos go mit di High Prist, so all di prist oga dem, di eldas and di law tishas kon gada.
Pita folo Jisos from far til e rish di High Prist varanda. E sidan wit di gaids dey warm en bodi near fire.
Di prist oga dem and di Sanhedrin dey faind wetin dem go tak akuiz Jisos, so dat dem go fit kil-am, bot dem nor si enitin.
Meni pipol lai for Jisos head and dem dey tok difren-difren tins, bot dia stori nor agri wit ish oda.
Som pipol stand-up kon lai against am sey,
"Wi hear wen e sey, 'I go distroi dis Tempol wey dem build wit hand and afta tiri days, I go build anoda won wey dem nor yuz hand build.'"
All dia stori nor mak sense, bikos dem nor agri wit ish oda.
Den di High Prist stand for dia front kon ask Jisos, "Yu nor get ansa? Wetin bi dis wey dem dey tok against yu so?"
Bot Jisos kwayet and e nor ansa dem. Den di High Prist kon ask am again, "Na yu bi Kraist wey bi God Pikin?"
Jisos ansa, "Na mi and yu go si Man Pikin sidan for God rite hand, wen e dey kom insaid di kloud from hevun."
Den di High Prist tear en own klot kon sey, "Why wi dey faind more pipol to tok for dis mata?
"Una don hear di wod wey e tok against God! Wetin una tink sey mak wi du-am?" Dem kon ansa, "E sopoz to die."
Den som bigin spit for Jisos bodi, dem tie en eye kon dey nak am dey sey, "Profesai naw!" Di pipol wey dey gaid di place stil join beat am.
For dis taim, Pita dey for di varanda, den di High Prist girl savant kom der.
Wen e si Pita sidan dey warm ensef, e luk am wel-wel kon sey, "Yu sef dey folo dat man wey kom from Nazaret, wey dem dey kol Jisos Kraist."
Bot Pita denai kon sey, "I nor ivun no wetin yu dey tok abaut!" Den e waka go di gate and fawo kon du, 'Kukuruku'
Wen di savant girl si-am, e kon dey tel di pipol wey stand der sey, "Dis man dey among dem."
Bot e denai again. Smol taim, di pipol wey stand for kona kon tel Pita, "Tru-tru, yu dey among dem, bikos na Galili yu from kom."
Pita kon bigin kos and swear sey. "I nor no dis man wey una dey tok abaut so-o-o!"
At wons, fawo kon du, 'Kukuruku' di sekon taim. So Pita kon rimemba wetin Jisos tel am sey: "Bifor fawo go du 'Kukuruku' tu taims, yu go denai mi tiri taims." Den Pita kon bigin krai wel-wel.
For earli mornin afta dem don plan wetin dem go du Jisos, di prist oga dem wit di law tishas and di Sanhedrin, tie am kon tak am go mit Pilate.
So Pilate ask Jisos, "Na yu bi di Ju pipol king?" Jisos ansa, "Na as yu tok."
Den di prist oga dem stil dey akuiz am,
so Pilate ask Jisos again, "Yu nor get enitin to tok? Yu dey hear all dis tins wey dem sey yu du?"
Bot Jisos nor tok enitin and dis tin kon sopraiz Pilate wel-wel.
Enitaim wen dem dey du di Passova Fist, Pilate always dey fri won prizina wey di pipol ask for.
Barabbas, won man wey kil pesin for di taim wey dem dey rayot, dey prizin wit pipol wey nor dey obey govment law.
Den di pipol kom mit Pilate kon ask am sey, mak e fri won prizina for dem, as e dey du bifor.
So Pilate ask dem, "Una wont mak I fri Ju pipol king for una?"
( Pilate no sey di prist oga dem bring Jisos to am, bikos dem dey jelos).
Bot di prist oga dem tel di pipol mak dem ask Pilate mak e fri Barabbas.
So Pilate ask dem again, "Den wetin una wont mak I du to dis man wey una kol Ju pipol king?"
Dem kon shaut, "Kil am trowey!"
Pilate ask dem, "Why? Wish bad tin e du?" Bot dem kon dey shaut more-more, "Kil am trowey"
Bikos Pilate won du wetin di pipol wont, e kon fri Barabbas for dem, den afta e tel en sojas mak dem flog Jisos, e kon giv Jisos to di pipol mak dem go kil-am.
So di sojas push Jisos enta di varanda for di govnor palise kon kol evribodi gada.
Dem wear am purpol klot kon tak shuku-shuku mak krawn wear for en head.
Dem kon dey salot am, "Wi hail yu o-o, Ju pipol king!"
Dem tak stik nak am for head kon spit for en bodi. Dem kon nil dan for en front dey bow for am.
Wen dem don laff am finish, dem pul di purpol klot komot from en bodi kon wear am en own klot. Den, dem kon go kil-am.
Di sojas kon fos Saimon, won man from Syrene, wey jos dey enta di tawn, mak e kari Jisos kros. (Di man na Alexander and Rufus papa.)
Dem tak Jisos go di place wey dem dey kol Golgota (wey min, "Skul Place").
Dem gi-am wine wey dem mix wit myrrh, bot Jisos nor gri drink am.
Dem nail am for kros kon divide en klot, dey trow dice mak dem for no wetin go rish ish pesin.
Na nain o' klok for mornin dem nail Jisos for kros.
Dem kon rite sey, "Dis na Ju pipol king."
Dem nail tu tif wit am for kros, won for en left and di oda for en rite side.
Wetin dem rite for God wod kon hapun sey, "Dem kount Jisos join bad pipol."
Pipol wey dey waka pas kon dey shake dia head and dey tok bad abaut am sey, "Eehen! Yu wey sey, yu go fit distroi di Tempol kon build am again for tiri days.
"O-ya! Save yorsef mak yu kom dan from di kros!"
Ivun di prist oga dem and di law tishas dey laff Jisos for wer dem sidan, dey sey, "E save oda pipol, bot e nor fit save ensef!
"Kraist, wey sey e bi Izrel king, mak e kom dan from di kros naw mak wi si-am, so dat wi go biliv!" Doz wey dem nail for kros wit am kon dey kos am tu.
Wen twef o' klok for aftanoon rish, daknes kon kova di kontri ontil tiri o' klok for aftanoon.
Aroun tiri o' klok, Jisos kon shaut sey, "Eloi! Eloi! Lama Sabaktani?" Wey min, "My God! My God! Wetin mak Yu abandon mi?"
Wen som pipol wey stand near der hear wetin e tok, dem kon sey, "Listin. E dey kol Elija!"
Den won pesin run kom wit foam kon soak am insaid bita wine, den e put am for stik giv Jisos mak e drink, den e kon sey, "Mak una liv am! Mak wi si weda Elija go kom save am."
Bot Jisos shaut again, den e kon die.
So di kurtain for di Tempol kon tear into tu from top go rish botom.
Wen di soja wey stand for Jisos front si haw e tak die, e kon sey, "Tru-tru dis man na God Pikin!"
Som wimen dey der dey luk from far. Dem bi Mary Magdalene, Mary wey bi Joses, James and Salome mama.
For di taim wen Jisos dey Galili, dis wimen dey folo and help am. Meni oda wimen wey folo am kom from Jerusalem, dey der tu.
Wen evenin don rish for di day bifor di Sabat,
Josef wey kom from Arimatia, wey bi Ju kansol memba, wey dey wait for God Kindom and pipol dey respet am wel-wel, go mit Pilate kon ask for Jisos bodi.
Pilate sopraiz sey Jisos don die. So e kol di soja kon ask am weda e don tey wen Jisos die.
Wen Pilate hear wetin di soja tok, e kon sey mak Josef go kari di bodi.
Josef buy linen klot, bring Jisos bodi kom dan from di kros kon tak di klot rap am, den e put am for grave wey dem dig insaid rock. Den e rol big stone kova di grave mout.
Mary Magdalene and Mary wey bi Joses mama dey luk and dem si wer dem bere Jisos put.
Wen Sabat Day don pas, Mary Magdalene, Mary wey bi James and Salome mama kon buy spices wey dey sent wel-wel, mak dem go rub am for Jisos bodi, mak e nor for smel.
For earli mornin on Sunday, as sun jos dey kom out, dem kon go di place wey dem bere Jisos put.
Dem kon dey ask ish oda as dem dey go sey, "Hu go help us rol di stone komot from di grave mout?"
Bot wen dem luk, dem si sey, dem don alredi rol di stone komot.
As dem enta, dem si won man wey wear white klot sidan for di rite side and fear kon kash dem.
Bot e tel dem, "Mak una nor fear. Una dey faind Jisos wey kom from Nazaret, wey dem kil. God don raiz-am from deat! E nor dey here again. Mak una luk di place wey dem put am bifor.
"Mak una go tel en disaipols and Pita sey, Jisos don go Galili go wait for dem. Una go si-am for der, as e tel una bifor."
Dem kom out kon run from di grave side, bikos dem sopraiz and fear kon kash dem. Dem nor fit tel enibodi enitin, bikos dem stil dey fear.
[For earli mornin on Sunday, afta Jisos don wak-up, e first apier to Mary Magdalene wey e driv sevun dimon komot for en bodi.
For wer di pipol wey dey folo Jisos dey mourn and krai dey, Mary Magdalene kon go tel dem wetin hapun.
Wen dem hear sey Jisos don wak-up from deat and Mary Magdalene don si-am, dem nor biliv.
Afta, Jisos stil apier to tu pipol as dem dey waka go tawn.
Dem go bak go tel di res pipol, bot di pipol nor stil biliv dem.
Den Jisos kon apier to di ilevun disaipols wen dem dey chop. E kon shaut giv dem, since dem nor biliv, bikos of dia strong heart.
Jisos komand dem sey, "Mak una enta evriwer for di wold go prish di gospol giv evribodi.
"Enibodi wey biliv and dem baptize am, God go save am, bot enibodi wey nor biliv, God go kondem am.
"Dis signs go folo pipol wey biliv: Wit my name, dem go driv dimon komot from pipol bodi; dem go speak new language wey dem nor learn;
dem go fit hol snake and if dem drink poison, e nor go du dem enitin; dem go put dia hand for sik pipol bodi and di pipol go wel."
Afta Jisos don tok to dem finish, God kon kari am go hevun and e kon sidan for God rite side.
Den, di disaipols kon go evriwer for di aria dey prish di gospol and Jisos kon dey du meni mirakols tru dem, so dat pipol go no sey, wetin dem dey prish, na tru.]
Meni pipol don rite di stori abaut di tins wey hapun among us,
as di pipol wey si dem wen dem hapun, tel us.
My oga Teofilos, since I folo evritin from biginin, I kon tink am sey e gud mak I rite wetin rili hapun giv yu,
so dat yu go undastand di tins wey dem tish yu wel-wel.
For di taim wen Herod bi King for Judea, won prist dey wey en name na Zekaraya from Abija famili and en wife name na Elizabet, wey kom from Aaron famili.
Dem dey du wetin God laik, dey folo all di tins wey God tok for en wod.
Dem nor get pikin, bikos Elizabet nor fit get bele and dem don old wel-wel.
E kom rish Zekaraya famili turn to du prist wok for di Tempol
and as dia kustom bi, dem kon shuz Zekaraya mak e enta insaid God Tempol go burn insent.
Wen di taim to burn insent don rish, all di pipol kon gada for outsaid dey pray.
God angel apier to Zekaraya for di alta side wer dem dey burn insent.
As Zekaraya si di angel, fear kash am wel-wel and e kon dey shake.
Bot di angel tel am, "Mak yu nor fear Zekaraya, bikos God don hear yor praya. Yor wife Elizabet go born boy pikin for yu and yu go kol am, 'Jon.'
"Di pikin go bring joy and hapines for yu and meni pipol go hapi wel-wel wen dem born am,
bikos God go yuz am wel-wel. E nor go drink wine or strong drink, bot di Holi Spirit go dey insaid am, ivun bifor dem go born am.
"E go mak meni pipol folo God.

"E go first kom wit Elija spirit and pawa, bifor di Oga ensef go kom. E go mak papa setol wit dia shildren and pipol wey nor dey obey God bifor, e go mak dem obey am naw, so dat dem go dey redi to mit am for hevun."
Zekaraya ask di angel, "Haw I go tak no sey wetin yu tok so go hapun? Bikos mi and my wife don old wel-wel."
Di angel ansa, "I bi Gabriel, wey dey stand for God present and na-im send mi kom tel yu dis Gud News.
"Bot bikos yu nor biliv wetin I tok so, yu nor go fit tok again, ontil di day wen dis tins go hapun."
So di pipol wey dey wait for Zekaraya kon bigin wonda why e stay tey insaid di Tempol.
Wen e kom outsaid, e nor fit tok again. Dem kon no sey e don si vishon for insaid di Tempol, bikos e yuz hand tak mak sign for dem.
Wen en taim to wok insaid di Tempol finish, e kon go haus.
Wen e don tey smol, Elizabet, wey bi Zekaraya wife kon get bele and e kon hide ensef insaid haus for faiv monts.
So Elizabet kon sey, "God don du big tin for mi for my old age, E don favor mi for pipol present and E don komot shame for my face."
Wen Elizabet bele don rish sis monts, God kon send angel Gabriel go Nazaret, won smol tawn for Galili,
go mit Mary. Dis Mary neva eva slip wit man bifor and na-im Josef wey kom from David famili, won mari.
Di angel kon tel am, "I salot yu o-o! Yu wey God don favor, bikos E dey wit yu."
Bot Mary dey fear, bikos of wetin di angel tok and e bigin wonda wetin di gritin min.
Den di angel tel am, "Mak yu nor fear, Mary, bikos God don favor yu!
"Mak yu listin, yu go get bele kon born boy and yu go name am, 'Jisos.'
"E go big wel-wel and dem go kol am God wey dey for hevun pikin and God go gi-am en papa David throne.
"Na-im go rule Jakop haus foreva and en kindom nor go eva end."
Mary tel di angel, "Haw dis tins go fit hapun, as e bi sey I neva slip wit man bifor?"
Di angel ansa am, "Di Holi Spirit pawa go kova yu. So di pikin wey yu go born, go dey holi and dem go kol am God Pikin.
"Si, yor kozin Elizabet don get bele for sis monts naw and e go born boy for en old age, ivun doh dem tok sey e nor go fit get bele.
"Bikos e nor get enitin wey God nor fit du."
Mary kon sey, "Yes, I bi God savant, mak wetin yu tok so, hapun to mi." Den di angel kon liv am.
Afta tu days, Mary kon get up rush go Juda
and e enta Zekaraya haus go grit Elizabet.
Wen Elizabet hear as Mary dey grit am, di pikin for en bele jump and di Holi Spirit kon enta Elizabet bodi.
So Elizabet kon sey, "God don bless yu pas evri wuman and E don bless di pikin wey dey yor bele!
"Hu I bi wey mak my Oga mama kom visit mi?
"Bikos as yor gritin rish my ear, di pikin wey dey my bele kon hapi bigin jump.
"And God don bless yu, bikos yu biliv sey wetin E tok, go hapun."
Mary kon sey, "My heart go praiz God
and my spirit dey hapi bikos God, my Savior,
don si en savant kondishon. From today go, evribodi go sey God don blees mi,
bikos E don du big-big tins for mi and en name dey holi.
"E dey show en mesi to evribodi wey dey fear am for evri generashon.
"E don du meni big-big tins wit en pawa and E don skata proud pipol maind.
"E don rimov rulas from dia throne and pipol wey bring demsef dan, E don kari dem go up.
"E don mak doz wey dey hungri beleful wit gud fud and pipol wey get moni wel-wel, E don mak dem poor.
"E help en savants, Izrel pipol rimemba en mesi,
wey E promis awa gran-gran papa dem and E go show mesi to Abraham and en shildren foreva."
Mary stay wit Elizabet for abaut tiri monts, den e kon go bak to en haus.
Di taim kon rish for Elizabet to born, so e kon born boy.
En nebor and rilashons hear sey God don du big tin for am, so dem kom hapi wit am.
Wen di pikin rish ate days, dem sekonsaiz am won kon gi-am en papa name, Zekaraya.
Bot en mama sey, "No, dem must kol am Jon."
Dem kon sey, "Bot e nor get eni of una rilashon wey en name bi Jon."
So dem mak sign giv Zekaraya ask sey, "Wetin wi go kol di pikin."
Zekaraya ask for somtin mak e rite put, den e kon rite, "En name na Jon." So, all of dem kon sopraiz wel-wel.
Den Zekaraya mout opun and e kon bigin praiz God.
Fear kash all dia nebor and for evriwer for Judea, na di mata dem kon dey tok abaut.
So evribodi wey hear wetin hapun, kip am for insaid en maind dey sey, "Wish kaind pikin dis won go bi sef?" Bikos God dey wit am tru-tru.
Den di Holi Spirit enta Zekaraya and e kon bigin profesai, dey sey,
"Mak wi praiz Izrel God, bikos E don help and fri en pipol.
"E send di Savior wey get pawa kom mit us, from David famili.
"God promis en profet bifor-bifor
sey, wi go dey save from awa enimi and from pipol wey hate us.
"E du dis tins to show en luv for awa gran-gran papa dem and to rimemba di promis wey E giv dem.
"Ivun awa papa Abraham sey,
'E go save us from awa enimi hand, so dat wi go fit tak all awa heart serv am
and wi go dey holi and gud for en eye as long as wi dey for dis wold.'
"And yu, my pikin, pipol go kol yu God profet and na yu go-go priper di road for di Oga,
wey go mak pipol no sey, God go save dem, bikos E go forgiv dem dia sins.
"Since God luv and en kindnes strong wel-wel, E go let en salvashon rish us,
so lite go shine for di pipol wey sidan for daknes and wer deat dey and God go giv us peace."
Di pikin kon dey grow and strong for spirit. E stay for widanes ontil di day wen God show am to Izrel pipol.
Dat taim, Caesar Augustus kon giv orda mak evribodi wey dey Rome go regista dia name mak dem for pay tax.
Dis na di first taim wey pipol go regista, since di tiam wen Kwirinus bi govnor for Syria.
Evribodi kon go en home-tawn go regista.
So Josef wey dey stay for Nazaret for Galili kon travol go Betlehem, David tawn for Judea, bikos na David famili e from kom.
Josef and Mary, wey e won mari and wey get bele, go regista togeda.
As dem dey for Betlehem, taim kon rish for Mary to born.
So e born en first son, wrap am kon put am for wer dem dey kip anima, bikos no oda place dey for dem to stay.
Som shepads dey for dat aria, dey kare for dia ship for nite.
God angel apier to dem and God glori kon dey shine for evriwer, den fear kon dey kash dem.
Di angel tel dem, "Mak una nor fear! Mak una listin wel, bikos I kom tel una news wey go mak pipol hapi.
"Today, dem born una Savior for dis tawn wey David from kom, en name na Kraist, wey bi di Oga.
"Na dis go bi sign wey una go tak no am: Una go si pikin wey dem yuz klot wrap insaid wer dem dey kip anima."
At wons, meni angels apier for hevun kon stand wit di first angel dey praiz God sey,
"Na onli God get Glori for hevun and eart, mak peace and favor dey wit evribodi."
Wen di angels go bak to hevun, di shepads kon tel ish oda, "Mak wi go Betlehem go si wetin hapun, wey God don show us so."
Dem kon go si Mary, Josef and di pikin for insaid di anima haus.
Wen dem si-am, dem kon tok haw di angel tak tel dem abaut di pikin.
Evribodi wey hear wetin dem tok, sopraiz wel-wel.
Bot Mary kip wetin e hear for en maind kon dey tink abaut am.
So di shepads kon go bak, dey praiz God, bikos of all di tins wey dem hear and si. Evritin jos bi as di angel tel dem sey e go bi.
Wen di pikin rish ate days, dem sekonsaiz am kon kol am, 'Jisos', di name wey di angel tok bifor en mama ivun get bele.
Wen taim rish for Mary to present ensef to God, as Mosis law tok, Josef and Mary kon kari Jisos go Jerusalem, go dedikate am giv God,
(as dem rite am for God wod, "Evri first born wey bi boy, dem go gi-am to Mi"),
and dem go offa sakrifais wit tu dove or pigin.
Won man dey Jerusalem wey en name bi Simeon and di Holi Spirit dey insaid am. Di man dey fear God and dey du wetin God laik and e dey wait for di taim wen God go fri Izrel.
Di Holi Spirit don show am sey e nor go die bifor e go si di Mezaya wey God promis.
So di Spirit kon tak Simeon enta di Tempol and wen Jisos papa and mama bring am to du wetin Mosis law tok,
Simeon kon kari Jisos for en hand dey praiz God sey,
"Naw, as yor wod tok, Yu, God wey dey rule evritin, mak Yu let yor savant go res.
"Bikos my eye don si di pesin wey Yu won mak e save Izrel pipol,
di Won wey Yu don priper for evribodi present:
"Na-im bi di lite wey go show Gentai pipol road kon bring onor to yor pipol, Izrel."
So di pikin papa and mama kon sopraiz for wetin Simeon tok abaut am.
Den Simeon bless dem kon tel Mary, "Listin wel-wel: God don shuz dis pikin to mak som pipol for Izrel fal and raiz odas up and e go bi sign wey meni pipol nor go asept.
"Tru-tru, bikos of am, di sikrit tins for meni pipol maind go kom out and vesnashon, laik sword, go shuk dia yor heart!"
Won profetess dey, wey en name bi Anna, Fanuel dota, wey kom from Asher famili. E don old wel-wel and e mari en husban for sevun years, bifor di man die.
E don rish eti-for years since en husban die. E nor dey komot for di Tempol, e dey serv God and dey fast and pray day and nite.
For dat taim, e kom mit Josef, Mary, di pikin and Simeon kon bigin tank God, dey tok abaut di pikin giv evribodi wey dey wait for di taim wen God go fri Jerusalem.
So, wen Josef and Mary don du all di tins wey God law sey mak dem du, dem kon go bak to dia haus for Nazaret for Galili.
Di pikin kon grow, dey strong, e get sense and God favor, dey wit am.
Evri year, Jisos papa and mama dey go Jerusalem for Passova Fist.
Wen Jisos bi twef years, dem kon go as dem dey du bifor
and as dem dey go bak to dia haus, Jisos nor folo dem, bot en mama and papa nor no;
bikos dem tink sey e dey wit dem wey dey travol togeda. Wen dem don travol for won ful day, dem kon dey faind Jisos among dia rilashons and frends.
As dem nor si-am, dem kon go bak to Jerusalem go faind am.
Afta tiri days, dem kon si-am insaid di Tempol, wer e sidan wit di tishas dey listin and dey ask dem meni kweshon.
Evribodi wey hear wetin Jisos dey tok kon dey sopraiz for di way e undastand and di ansa wey e dey giv.
Wen en mama and papa si-am, dem sopraiz wel-wel. Naim en mama sey, "My pikin, why yu du us laik dis? Si, mi and yor papa dey faind yu for evriwer since."
Jisos ansa dem, "Why una dey faind mi? Una nor no sey I go dey my Papa haus?"
Bot en mama and papa nor undastand wetin Jisos min.
Den Jisos folo dem go Nazaret kon dey du wetin dem tel am. Bot en mama kip all dis tins for maind.
Jisos kon get sense more-more as e dey grow, so God and pipol kon laik am wel-wel.
Tiberius Caesar don dey rule for fiftin years wen Pontius Pilate bi govnor for Judea and Herod dey rule Galili, en broda Filip dey rule Iturea and Trakonitis aria and Lysanias dey rule Abilene.
For dat taim, na Annas and Kaifas bi di High Prists. So God kon tok to Jon, wey bi Zekaraya pikin, for insaid desert.
Jon kon go all di aria wey dey roun Jordan Riva dey prish sey mak pipol turn from dia sin kom mit God and mak dem baptaiz, so dat God go forgiv dem.
As Profet Isaia tok for di book wey e rite sey, "Won vois dey shaut for insaid desert sey: 'Priper di way for di Oga and mak en road strate.
"Evri place wey low, God go mak am high and evri place wey high, God go mak am low, ben-ben road go strate, di road wey bad, go gud
and evribodi for dis wold go si God savashon.'"
So Jon tel di pipol wey kom mak e for baptaiz dem sey, "Una wey bi snake shildren! Hu warn una mak una run komot from God ponishment wey dey kom?

"Naw, mak una bear frut wey go show sey una don rili turn from sin kom mit God, mak una nor start to sey, 'Abraham na awa papa.' Bikos God fit tak dis stones wey dey for groun tak mak pikin for Abraham!
"Ivun naw sef, di axe don redi to kut di tri wey nor dey bear beta frut, dem go kut am dan kon trow am insaid fire."
So di pipol kon ask am, "Wetin wi go du naw?"
Jon ansa dem, "Di pesin wey get tu klot must giv won to pesin wey nor get at-all and di pesin wey get fud must share wit pesin wey nor get."
Tax koletors tu waka kom mak Jon for baptaiz dem and dem kon ask am, "Tisha, wetin wi go du?"
Jon tel dem, "Mak una nor kolet moni pas di won wey di law tok."
Den som sojas kon stil ask am, "Wot of us? Wetin wi go du?" E tel dem, "Mak una nor yuz fos kolet moni from enibodi hand or lai for enibodi head and mak una salari, rish una."
All di pipol kon dey wonda weda Jon, naim bi di Mezaya wey dem dey wait for.
Jon ansa dem, "Na ordinari wota I tak dey baptaiz una, bot di pesin wey big pas mi, dey kom, I nor rish hu go luz di rope wey dey en shu. E go baptaiz una wit di Holi Spirit and fire.
"E hol shovel for hand to havest di corn kip for en store, bot e go burn di corn kanda wit fire wey nor dey kwensh."
Na so Jon prish di Gud News for di pipol.
Bot wen Jon tel Herod wey bi govnor sey, God dey ves wit am, bikos of en broda wife, Herodias, wey e mari and all di bad-bad tins wey e du,
Herod tak all dis join di vesnashon wey e get for Jon, so e kon lock am for prizin.
So wen all di pipol don baptaiz, Jisos ensef kon baptaiz tu. Wen e dey pray, hevun opun,
di Holi Spirit kon kom dan for en head laik dove. Den won vois tok from hevun sey, "Yu bi my Pikin wey I luv wel-wel and yu dey mak bele swit mi."
Jisos start en ministri wen e bi tati years. Evribodi no am as Josef pikin, wey Heli born.
Heli na Mattat pikin, wey Levi born. Levi na Melchi pikin, wey bi Jannai pikin and na Josef bi Jannai papa.
Josef na Mattatias pikin wey bi Amos pikin, wey bi Nahum pikin, wey bi Esli pikin, wey bi Naggai pikin.
Naggai na Maat pikin, wey bi Mattatias pikin, wey bi Semein pikin, wey bi Josec pikin, wey bi Joda pikin.
Joda na Joanan pikin, wey bi Rhesa pikin, wey bi Zerubabel pikin, wey bi Shealtiel pikin, wey bi Neri pikin.
Neri na Melchi pikin, wey bi Addi pikin, wey bi Kosam pikin, wey bi Elmadam pikin, wey bi Er pikin.
Er na Joshua pikin, wey bi Eliezer pikin, wey bi Jorim pikin, wey bi Mattat pikin, wey bi Levi pikin.
Levi na Simeon pikin, wey bi Juda pikin, wey bi Josef pikin, wey bi Jonam pikin, wey Eliakim born.
Eliakim na Melea pikin, wey bi Menna pikin, wey bi Mattata pikin, wey bi Natan pikin, wey bi David pikin.
Jesse wey Obed born, naim bi David papa. Obed papa na Boaz, wey bi Salmon pikin, wey bi Nashon pikin.
Aminadab wey bi Admin pikin, naim born Nashon. Admin papa na Arni, wey bi Hezron pikin, wey bi Perez pikin wey Juda born.
Jakop wey Izik born, naim bi Juda papa. Abraham born Izik and na Tera wey Nahor born, bi Abraham papa.
Nahor na Serug pikin, wey bi Reu pikin, wey bi Peleg pikin, wey bi Eber pikin, wey bi Shela pikin.
Kainan wey Afazad born, naim bi Shela papa. Afazad na Shem pikin, and Noah wey Lamek born, naim bi Shem papa.
Lamek na Metusela pikin, wey bi Enok pikin, wey bi Jared pikin and Mahalalel wey Kenan born, naim bi Jared papa.
Kenan na Enos pikin, wey bi Set pikin, wey bi Adam pikin and na God kreate Adam.
Di Holi Spirit enta Jisos bodi kon kari am from Jordan Riva go insaid widanes.
For der, devol kon tempt am for forti days. Dat taim, Jisos dey fast, so e nor chop fud, bot afta e fast finish, e kon dey hungri.
Devol kon tel am, "If na tru sey yu bi God Pikin, mak yu komand dis stone mak e turn to fud."
Den Jisos ansa, "God wod sey, 'Nor bi onli fud man sopoz to chop for dis wold, bot na evri wod wey God tok.'"
Den devol tak Jisos go on-top won mountin kon show am all di kindom wey dey dis wold.
den e tel am, "I go giv yu all dis place and all di onor wey folo am as yor kindom, bikos dem don giv am to mi and I fit gi-am to enibodi wey I wont.
"So, if yu bow dan woship mi, I go giv yu evritin."
Jisos ansa, "God wod sey, 'Na onli God yu must woship and serv.'"
Den devol tak Jisos go Jerusalem kon mak am stand on-top di place wer high pas for di Tempol kon tel am, "If yu rili bi God Pikin, mak yu jump go dan,
bikos God wod sey, 'God go tel en angels mak dem gaid yu'
and, 'Dem go kari yu for dia hand, so dat yu nor go yuz yor leg nak stone.'"
Jisos ansa am, "God wod sey, 'Mak yu nor test God wey bi yor Oga.'"
So wen devol don tempt Jisos finish, e kon liv am ontil anoda taim.
As di Holi Spirit pawa ful Jisos bodi, e kon go bak to Galili and en stori bigin spread for di hol aria.
E bigin tish for dia sinagog and evribodi kon dey praiz God.
Afta, Jisos go Nazaret wer e for grow up, e enta di sinagog for Sabat Day as e dey always du and e kon get up mak e read.
Dem gi-am di book wey Profet Isaia rite. Jisos kon opun am rish di place wey dem rite sey,

"God Spirit dey my bodi, bikos E don anoint mi mak I prish Gud News giv poor pipol. E send mi mak I prish fridom giv pipol wey dey prizin and mak blind pipol for si. E stil sey mak I fri doz wey dem dey opres
and mak I annouce sey di taim wen God won save en pipol, don rish."
Jisos klose di book kon gi-am bak to di pesin wey dey hol am, den e go sidan. So evribodi wey dey di sinagog kon dey luk am.
Den Jisos tel dem, "Today, di tins wey dem rite for God wod for wer I read, don hapun, jos as una hear am wen I dey read am."
Evribodi dey tok gud abaut Jisos, dem sopraiz for di swit-swit wod wey kom out from en mout. So dem kon ask, "Dis nor bi Josef pikin?"
Jisos tel dem, "I no sey una go kwote proverb for mi sey, 'Doktor, mak yu kior yorsef!' And una go sey, 'For here wey bi yor home-tawn, wi won mak yu du wetin wi hear sey yu du for Kapanum.'"
Jisos stil sey, "Mak I tel una tru wod, profet nor dey get respet for en home-tawn.
"Bot I tel una di trut, wimen wey dia husban don die meni for Izrel for Elija taim, wen God stop rain for tiri and haf years and beta hunga kon dey evriwer.
"Bot God nor send Elija go mit eni of doz wimen, esept won wuman wey en husban die for Zarepat insaid Sidon.
"Pipol wey get leprosi meni for Izrel for profet Elisha taim, bot God nor heal eni won esept Naaman, wey kom from Syria."
Wen dem hear dis tins, all di pipol for di sinagog kon dey ves.
Dem push Jisos komot from di tawn kon tak am go di hil wey dia tawn dey on-top, mak dem for trow am dan.
Bot Jisos pas dia senta, waka komot.
So Jisos kon go Kapanum, wey dey Galili and e bigin tish pipol for Sabat Day.
Dem sopraiz wel-wel for en tishin, bikos e dey tok wit autoriti.
Insaid di sinagog, won man wey evil spirit dey en bodi kon dey shaut,
"Abeg, mak yu liv us alone, Jisos wey kom from Nazaret! Yu don kom distroi us? I no hu yu bi, yu bi God savant wey holi."
Bot Jisos tel am: "Mak yu shut up! Yu dimon, komot for en bodi." Di dimon trow di man for groun for dia front kon komot for en bodi, bot di man nor wound.
Di pipol sopraiz kon dey ask ish oda, "Wetin dey hapun so? Dis man dey yuz God pawa tak komand dimon and dem dey obey am!"
So di news abaut Jisos kon spread enta di hol aria for Galili.
Afta Jisos komot for di sinagog, e enta Saimon haus. Saimon wife mama get fiva and dem kon beg Jisos make e heal am.
So Jisos stand near di wuman kon komand di fiva komot for en bodi. Kwik-kwik, di wuman get up, bigin kare for Jisos and di odas wey dey di haus.
As day dey dak, evribodi wey get pipol wey nor wel kon bring dem kom mit Jisos. E tosh dem for head and dem kon wel.
Dimons dey shaut dey komot from meni pipol bodi, dey sey, "Yu bi God Pikin!" Bot Jisos warn dem mak dem nor tok, bikos dem no sey, naim bi di Mezaya.
Wen day break, Jisos komot go won place wer nobodi dey. Bot pipol faind am rish der and dem kon dey trai to hol am mak e nor for liv dem.
Bot Jisos tel dem, "I must prish dis Gud News abaut God Kindom giv pipol wey dey oda tawns, bikos na wetin God send mi kom du, bi dat."
So e kontinu to prish for di sinagogs wey dey Judea.
Jisos stand near Genesaret and pipol gada mak dem for hear God wod.
E si tu kenu for di wotasaid, bot di fishamen wey get dem, don kom dan dey wosh dia net.
E enta insaid won kenu wey bi Saimon Pita own kon tel am mak e push di kenu enta wota smol. Den Jisos kon sidan dey tish di pipol from di kenu.
Wen e don tok finish, e kon tel Saimon, "Push di kenu go wer deep pas for di wota, mak una for fit kash fish."
Saimon ansa, "Oga, wi dey here from nite til day-break and wi nor kash enitin. Bot as yu tok, wi go put awa net insaid wota."
So, dem trow dia net insaid wota and dem kash meni fish sotey dia net kon start to tear.
So, dem kon du sign giv di oda pipol wey dey folo dem wok, mak dem kom help dem. Wen dem put all di fish insaid di tu kenu, di kenu dem kon dey won sink.
Wen Saimon si wetin hapun, e kon nil dan for Jisos front dey sey, "Abeg, nor near mi Oga, bikos I bi sina."
Pita and all di pipol wey dey wit am sopraiz wel-wel wen dem si all di fish wey dem kash.
James and Jon, wey bi Zebedi shildren, wey dey folo Pita wok, sopraiz tu. Den Jisos tel Saimon Pita, "Mak yu nor wori, from today go, na pipol yu go dey kash."
So wen dem don push dia kenu rish groun for di wotasaid, dem liv evritin kon folo Jisos.
Wen Jisos dey for won tawn, won man wey get leprosi kom mit am. Wen di man si Jisos, e fal face groun kon beg-am sey, "Oga, if yu laik to du-am, yu go fit heal mi."
So Jisos tosh di man kon sey, "I laik to du-am. 'Oya! Mak yor bodi klin naw!'" At wons, di leprosi komot for di man bodi.

Jisos tel di man, "Mak yu nor tel enibodi, bot go show yorsef to di prist and pay di ofrin wey Mosis komand sey, pipol wey dia leprosi don komot for dia bodi go bring, so dat di prist go no sey yu don rili wel."
Bot di news abaut Jisos kon spread pas bifor and meni pipol kom mit am mak dem for fit hear en wod and mak e for heal dem.
Bot Jisos komot go pray for widanes, wer pipol nor dey.
Won day, wen Jisos dey tish, som Farisi pipol and di law tishas kon kom from all di vilage wey dey Galili, Judea and Jerusalem, dem sidan near Jisos and God pawa dey wit am to heal pipol.
Som men kari won man for bed wey nor fit waka, kom. Dem kon dey trai to kari am enta di haus kom mit Jisos,
bot bikos pipol meni, dem nor fit kari am pas, so dem kon opun di zink for di haus top, drop di man wit di bed smol-smol, til e rish Jisos front for di pipol senta.
Wen Jisos si haw dia fate big rish, e kon tel di man, "My frend, I forgiv yu all yor sins."
So di law tishas and di Farisi pipol kon dey tink for dia maind sey, "Hu bi dis man wey dey shalenge God laik dis? Hu fit forgiv sin esept God?"
Jisos no wetin dem dey tink, so e ask dem, "Why una dey tink laik dis sef?
"Wish won eazi to tok? 'I forgiv yu yor sin?' or 'Get up mak yu waka?'
"Bot mak una for no sey Man Pikin get pawa for dis wold to forgiv sin, e kon tel di man wey nor fit waka, 'I tel yu, get up, kari yor bed mak yu dey go haus.'"
At wons, di man kon get up for dia present, kari di bed wey e laidan put bifor kon dey praiz God as e dey go haus.
Evribodi for der sopraiz wel-wel. Fear kash dem and dem kon dey wonda dey sey, "Na wondaful tin awa eye si today so -o-o!"
Afta dis won, Jisos go out and e kon si won tax koletor sidan for wer e for dey kolet tax, en name na Levi. Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu folo mi."
Levi get up, liv evritin kon folo am.
Den Levi du parti for en haus bikos of Jisos, so meni tax koletors and oda pipol kom chop wit dem for di parti.
Bot di Farisi pipol and som law tishas kon dey ves for Jisos disaipols sey, "Why una dey chop and drink wit tax koletors and sinas?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Pipol wey wel nor nid doktor, na onli doz wey nor wel, nid am.
"I nor kom kol gud pipol to turn from sin kom mit God, bot na sinas, I kom kol."
Den som pipol kon tel Jisos, "Jon disaipols dey fast and pray and di Farisi disaipols dey du di same tin, bot yor own jos dey chop and drink enihaw."
So Jisos ansa dem, "Yu espet sey mak pipol wey kom marage dey hungri wen di man wey dey mari dey der?
Bot taim go rish wen di man wey dey mari nor go dey wit dem, dat taim, dem go fast."
E stil tel dem won parabol: "Nobodi dey tear new klot tak pash old won. If e du laik dat, e go fit spoil di new klot and di new klot pisis nor go mash di old won.
"And nobodi dey pour new wine insaid old wine bag. If e du laik dat, di new wine go tear di bag, di wine go trowey and di bag go skata.
"Insted, pipol sopoz pour new wine insaid new wine bag.
"Nobodi go laik to drink new wine afta e don drink old wine. Bikos e go sey, 'Na di old wine beta pas.'"
Jisos dey waka pas wer dem plant corn put and en disaipols kon plok som corn dey chop.
Som of di Farisi pipol kon sey, "Why una dey du wetin awa law tok sey mak wi nor du for Sabat Day?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Una neva read wetin David du wen en and en men dey hungri?
"E enta God haus kon tak di bread wey holi wey onli prists sopoz chop and en and en men chop am."
So Jisos kon tel dem, "Na Man Pikin bi Sabat Oga."
For anoda Sabat day, Jisos enta di sinagog dey tish. Won man wey en rite hand don die dey der.
Di law tishas and di Farisi pipol dey luk Jisos wit kona eye weda e go heal pipol for Sabat Day, so dat dem go si wetin dem go tak akiuz am.
Bot Jisos no wetin dem dey tink, so e kon tel di man wey en hand die, "Get up, mak yu kom stand for here", so di man get-up, go stand near am.
Den Jisos ask dem, "E dey rite to du gud for Sabat" or "to save or distroi enibodi life?"
Afta Jisos luk dem roun, e kon tel di man, "Stresh yor hand out." So di man stresh en hand and di hand kon wel.
Bot di Farisi pipol and di law tishas kon ves sotey dem nor dey si road again, so dem kon bigin tel diasef wetin dem go du Jisos Kraist.
Jisos go mountin go pray kon stay der til day break dey pray to God.
Wen day break, Jisos kol en disaipols kon shuz twef among dem wey e kol apostols:
Saimon (wey bi Pita) and en broda Andru and James, Jon, Filip, Batlomi
Matiu, Tomas, James (Afius pikin) Saimon wey bi Zilot, (pesin wey dey fite for en kontri).
Judas (James pikin) and Judas Iskarot wey leta sel Jisos giv en enimis.

Den Jisos kom dan wit en apostols kon stand for groun wey level. Meni disaipols from Judea, Jerusalem and all di smol tawns wey near Tyre and Sidon gada kon hear am dey prish and e heal doz wey nor wel
and odas wey evil spirit dey wori.
Evribodi dey trai to tosh am, bikos pawa wey dey komot from en bodi, dey heal pipol.
Den Jisos luk en disaipols, tel dem, "Mak una hapi, una wey dey poor, bikos na una get God Kindom.
"Mak una hapi, una wey dey hungri, bikos una go beleful. Mak una hapi, una wey dey krai naw, bikos una go laff.
"Una wey pipol hate, dey rejet, kos and dey kol bad pipol bikos of Man Pikin, God go blees una
and una go dey hapi for dat day. Mak una hapi wel-wel, bikos di riwod wey una go get for hevun, go big wel-wel. Na so dia gran-gran papa dem tok abaut di profets tu.
"Bot kos dey una head, una wey get moni wel-wel naw, bikos una don alredi get una riwod.
"Kos dey una head, una wey don ova beleful, bikos una go hungri. Kos dey una head, una wey dey laff naw, bikos una go krai wel-wel.
"Kos dey una head, una wey pipol dey tok gud tins abaut, bikos na so dia gran-gran papa dem tok abaut di fake profets tu.
"Bot I dey tel una wey dey listin, 'Mak una luv una enimi and du gud to pipol wey hate una.'
"Mak una bless doz wey kos una and pray for doz wey dey trit una enihaw.
"If enibodi slap una for face, mak una turn di oda side gi-am tu. If enibodi yuz fos kolet una koat, mak una gi-am una shirt join tu.
"Mak una giv evribodi wey ask una for somtin and if enibodi tak wetin bi una own, mak una nor ask for am bak.
"Mak una du for pipol as una wont mak dem du for una.
"If una luv onli di pipol wey luv una, wetin go mak God bless una? Ivun sinas sef luv doz wey luv dem.
"And if una du gud for onli doz wey dey du gud for una, wetin go mak God bless una? Ivun sinas dey du di same tin tu.
"And if una borow pesin moni wen una no sey e go fit pay una bak, wetin go mak God bless una? Sinas sef dey borow moni giv sinas, so dat dem go pay dem bak dia koret moni.

"Bot mak una luv una enimis kon du gud and mak una nor espet enitin bak wen una borow enibodi somtin. Na dis go mak God pay una bak and una go bi en shildren, bikos God ensef dey du gud for wiked pipol and doz wey nor dey sey tank yu.
"So, mak una dey show mesi, jos as una Papa dey show mesi.
Mak una nor joj oda pipol, so dat God nor go joj una. Mak una nor kondem odas, so dat God nor go kondem una. Mak una forgiv odas and God go forgiv una.

"Mak una giv pipol wey nor get and God go giv una wetin rili big, E go pack am wel-wel and di tins go ova ful. God go pour all dis tins for una life. Bot na as una tak giv odas, na so God go tak giv una tu."
Jisos stil tel dem anoda parabol, "Pesin wey blind nor dey fit show anoda blind man road, abi e go fit? No! If na so, dem tu go fal insaid gutta.
"No student go fit big pas en tisha, bot wen e don learn finish, e go bi laik en tisha.
"Why yu dey luk di smol dirti wey dey yor broda eye, bot yu nor dey si di big wud wey dey yor own eye.

"Haw yu go tak tel yor broda sey, 'Broda, mak I rimov di dirti wey dey yor eye, bot yu nor dey si di wud wey dey yor own eye? Yu wey dey pritend, mak yu first komot di wud for yor eye, den yu go si wel to fit rimov yor broda own.'
"Bikos no beta tri dey bear bad frut and no bad tri dey bear gud frut,
bikos na frut wey tri bear, naim pipol dey tak no di kaind tri wey e bi. Pipol nor dey plok fig or grape from shuku-shuku tri.

"Wen pesin dey gud, na di gud tins wey dey insaid am, dey mak am bear gud fruts, bot bad pesin, na di bad tins wey dey insaid am, dey mak am bear bad fruts, bikos na from wetin ful insaid pesin maind, naim en mout dey tok.
"Why una dey kol mi, 'Oga' and una nor dey du wetin I tel una?
"Enibodi wey kom mit mi and listin to my wod kon du-am; I go show una wetin di pesin bi laik.
"E bi laik man wey dey build haus, wey dig groun kon lay di foundashon on-top strong rock. Wen big wota rush kom, e nor go fit shake di haus, bikos dem build am for beta rock.
"Bot di pesin wey hear my wod and e nor du-am, e bi laik man wey build haus wey nor get strong foundashon. Wen big wota kom, di haus go fal skata."
Afta Jisos tish di pipol all dis tins, e kon go Kapanum.
For der, won Roman soja get won savant wey e laik wel-wel, bot di savant nor wel and e nearli die.
Wen di soja hear abaut Jisos, e kon send som Ju eldas go mit am sey, mak e kom heal en savant.
Wen dem si Jisos, dem beg am wel-wel sey, "E gud mak yu kom help am,
bikos e luv awa pipol and e ivun build sinagog for us."
So Jisos folo dem go. As Jisos near di haus, di soja kon send som of en frends go mit am sey, "Oga, nor trobol yorsef, bikos I nor big rish hu yu go enta en haus.
"Naim mak mi nor waka kom mit yu, insted, mak yu jos giv orda and my savant go wel.
"Bikos mi tu get pipol wey big pas mi and I get di won wey I big pas. If I tel won, 'Go!' E go-go' and anoda won, 'Kom!' E go kom and if I tel my savant, "Do dis tin!' E go du-am."
Wen Jisos hear dis, e sopraiz and bele swit am, naim e luk di pipol wey dey folo am kon tel dem, "I tel una tru wod, I neva si dis kaind fate bifor, ivun for Izrel."
So, wen doz wey di soja send go bak to di haus, dem kon si sey di savant don wel.
Afta, Jisos go won tawn wey dem dey kol Nain, en disaipols wit meni pipol folo am.
Near di tawn gate, dem mit pipol dey kari won deadbodi go bere. Di man mama na widow and naim bi di wuman onli pikin, so plenti pipol from di tawn kon folo am.
Wen Jisos si di wuman, e sori for am kon tel am, "Mak yu nor krai again."
Den e waka go tosh di kofin and di men wey kari am kon stop. Jisos kon sey, "Young-man, get up!"
So di young-man get up kon start to dey tok. Jisos kon gi-am bak to en mama.
Fear kash all of dem and dem kon dey praiz God sey, "Na big profet kom mit us so-o!" and "God don kom help en pipol!"
Di news abaut Jisos kon spread roun Judea and all di place wey near der.
Jon disaipols kon tel Jon abaut di tins wey dey hapun. So e kol tu of en disaipols
kon send dem go ask Jisos sey, "Na yu bi di pesin wey wi dey espet, abi mak wi wait for anoda pesin?"
Wen dem si Jisos, dem kon sey, "Jon di Baptist send us mak wi ask sey, 'Na yu bi di pesin wey wi dey espet, abi mak wi wait for anoda pesin?'"
For dat same taim, Jisos heal meni pipol wey get difren siknes, pipol wey get evil spirit and pipol wey nor fit si, kon dey si.

So, Jisos ansa dem, mak una go tel Jon wetin una don si and hear: "Blind pipol dey si, pipol wey nor fit waka bifor, dey waka, pipol wey get leprosi, dia bodi don klin, pipol wey nor dey hear, don dey hear naw, pipol wey don die, don wak-up and ivun poor pipol, don hear di Gud News.
"God go bless pipol wey nor dey doubt mi."
Wen Jon mesenjas don go, Jisos kon bigin tok to di pipol abaut Jon: "Wetin una go faind for insaid desert? Na grass wey briz dey blow?
"Wetin una go out go si? Na man wey wear fine klot? No! Bikos pipol wey dey wear fine klot and dey enjoy life, na king palise dem dey stay.
"Wetin una go out go si? Na profet? Yes! I tel una, e ivun big pas profet.
"Dis na wetin dem rite abaut am, 'I dey send my mesenja go yor front, wey go-go priper yor road for yu.'
"I tel una tru wod, among all di pipol wey wuman born, nobodi big rish Jon di Baptist, bot di pesin wey smol pas for God Kindom, big pas am."
(Naw, evribodi wey hear dis tins, ivun di tax koletors, no sey God dey du wetin dey rite, bikos Jon di Baptist baptaiz dem.
Bot di Farisi pipol and di law tishas rejet wetin God plan for dem, bikos Jon nor baptaiz dem.)
"Haw I won tak tok abaut pipol wey dey for dis wold naw?
"Dem bi laik shildren wey sidan for market dey tel ish oda, 'Wi play musik for una, bot una nor gri dance; wi sing beria song for una, bot una nor gri krai.'
"Wen Jon di Baptist kom, e nor chop fud or drink wine, bot una sey, 'E get dimon!'
"God Pikin kom, dey chop and drink and una sey, 'Si-am, longtrot, drunkad, na tax koletors and sinas bi en frend.'
"Bot doz wey get wisdom, no sey evritin abaut am, na trut."
Won Farisi kon invait Jisos kom chop for en haus, so Jisos enta di Farisi haus kon sidan.
Den, wen won wuman from dat tawn wey bi sina hear sey Jisos dey chop for di Farisi haus, e kon bring won fine oil botol, wey dey sent wel-wel, kom.
E nil dan for Jisos front dey krai and e kon dey wet Jisos leg wit di tears from en eye. E klin Jisos leg wit en hair kon kiss dem, den e pour di oil put.
Wen di Farisi wey invait Jisos si wetin dey hapun, e kon tok for en maind sey, "If dis man na profet tru-tru, e for no sey dis wuman wey dey tosh am so, na sina e bi."
Jisos kon tel di Farisi, "Saimon, e get wetin I won tel yu." Saimon kon sey, "Tisha, I dey listin."
"E get won man wey get tu savant wey dey hol am moni, won dey hol am faiv tazon and di oda won, faiv ondred.
"Wen tu of dem nor fit pay di moni bak, e kon sey mak dem forget abaut di moni. Afta dat, wish of dem go laik di man pas?"
Saimon ansa, "Na di won wey en moni big pas." Jisos kon tel am, "Wetin yu tok, koret."
Den Jisos luk di wuman kon ask Saimon, 'Yu dey si dis wuman? I enta yor haus, yu nor giv mi wota wosh leg, bot di wuman don wosh my leg wit en tears kon tak en hair klin am.
"Wen I enta yor haus, yu nor kiss or grit mi as awa tradishon bi, bot since I enta, dis wuman neva stop to kiss my leg.
"Yu nor pour oil for my head, bot dis wuman don anoint my leg wit oil wey dey sent wel-wel.
"Mak I tel yu, I don forgiv dis wuman en meni sins, so en luv don big wel-wel, bot di pesin wey dem forgiv smol sin, en luv go smol."
Den Jisos tel di wuman, "I forgiv yu all yor sins."
Bot di pipol wey sidan dey chop wit Jisos kon dey tel ish oda, "Hu bi dis man wey dey forgiv sin?"
So, Jisos tel di wuman, "Yor fate don save yu; mak peace folo yu go."
Afta som taim, Jisos kon travol go all di tawn and vilage dey prish di Gud News abaut God Kindom. Di twef apostols
and som wimen wey Jisos driv evil spirit and difren siknes komot for dia bodi, go wit am: Mary (wey dem dey kol Magdalene), wey Jisos driv sevun dimon komot for en bodi,
Joanna, Shuza wife (wey bi managa for Herod haus), Susanna and meni oda wimen wey dey yuz dia own moni sopot Jisos and en disaipols.
Meni pipol gada roun Jisos and som stil dey kom from difren place, so e kon tel dem dis parabol:
"Won man go plant sid for en farm. As e dey plant, som fal for road, pipol mash dem pas and birds kon chop dem.
"Som wey fal for wer stones dey kon grow and die, bikos wota nor dey dat groun.
"Odas fal for wer shuku-shuku dey and wen dem grow, di shuku-shuku grow tu, kon shuk dem die.
"Bot di wons wey fal for beta groun, grow kon bear pas ondred sid." Den Jisos sey, "Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear!"
Den en disaipols ask am wetin di parabol min.
Jisos ansa dem, "Una get di shanse to no God Kindom sikrit, bot dis oda pipol, na onli parabol dem go tak hear am, so dat as dem dey luk, dem nor go si and as dem hear, dem nor go undastand.
"Na wetin di parabol min bi dis: Di sid na God wod.
"Di won wey fal for road, na di pipol wey hear God wod, bot devol kon tif am from dia heart, so dat dem nor go biliv and God nor go save dem.
"Di won wey fal for wer stones dey, na di pipol wey hear God wod kon risiv am wit hapines, bot dem nor get root. Dem biliv smol, bot wen wahala kom, dem nor biliv again.
"Di sid wey fal for shuku-shuku, na di pipol wey hear God wod, bot wahala, plenti propati and jolli-jolli for dis wold kon shuk dem, so di frut nor ivun ripe.
"Bot di sid wey fal for beta groun, na di pipol wey hear God wod, hol am wit beta maind, dey obey God and bear wahala, so dem kon bear plenti frut."
"Pesin nor go lite kandol kon tak bucket kova am or hide am unda bed, bot e go put am for wer pipol go si-am wen dem enta di haus.
"Bikos e nor get wetin pipol hide naw, wey God nor go bring out and wetin dey sikrit naw, God go bring am out for wer lite dey.
"So mak una listin wel-wel, bikos pesin wey get, God go gi-am more, bot pesin wey nor get, ivun di smol won wey e tink sey e get, God go tak am from en hand."
Jisos mama and en brodas kom mit am, bot dem nor fit go near am, bikos pipol plenti for der.
So pipol tel am, "Yor mama and brodas dey outsaid, dem won si yu."
Jisos ansa, "My mama and brodas na pipol wey dey hear and obey God wod."
Won day, Jisos and en disaipols enta kenu, den e tel dem, "Mak wi kros go di oda side for di riva." So dem kon go.
As dia kenu dey move for di wota, Jisos dey slip den strong briz start to dey blow and dem kon dey fear, bikos wota dey enta di kenu.
Dem kon tel Jisos, "Oga! Oga! Na die wi dey so!" Jisos get up, kon komand di briz mak e stop and di wota wey rof bifor, stop and evriwer kon kwayet.
Den Jisos ask dem, "Wer una fate dey?" Bot dem dey fear and sopraiz dey tel ish oda, "Wish kaind man bi dis sef? Ivun briz and wota dey obey am!"
Dem kon rish Gerasenes aria wey face Galili.
As Jisos kom dan from di kenu, won man wey get dimon wey dey di tawn kom mit am. E don tey wen dis man stop to wear klot or stay insaid haus, bot e dey stay for beria groun.
Wen e si Jisos, e fal for en front kon shaut, "Mak yu liv mi! Jisos, God Pikin, I beg yu, nor ponish mi!"

E shaut, bikos Jisos don first komand di evil spirit mak e komot for en bodi (bikos di evil spirit don disturb di man wel-wel and dem dey chain and gaid am. Bot e dey break di chain and di dimon go driv am go insaid desert.)
Jisos ask am, "Wetin bi yor name?" E ansa, "Na Legion, bikos wi plenti insaid am."
Di dimons bigin beg Jisos mak e send dem go insaid di riva.
Near di riva, meni pig dey togeda dey chop and di evil spirits beg Jisos mak dem enta insaid di pigs. So Jisos alow dem.
Di dimons komot for di man bodi go enta di pigs and all of dem kon rush enta di riva go die.
Wen di pipol wey dey kip di pigs si wetin hapun, dem run go insaid tawn bigin spread di news.
So di pipol run kom si wetin dey hapun and dem mit Jisos for der. Di man wey Jisos driv dimon komot for en bodi, don wel and e wear klot sidan near Jisos leg, so fear kon kash di pipol.
Pipol wey si wetin hapun, tel di tawn pipol haw Jisos heal di man wey get dimon bifor.
Den all di pipol for Gerasenes and di aria wey near der, kon tel Jisos mak e liv dem, bikos dem dey fear wel-wel. So Jisos and en disaipols enta kenu kon komot for der.
Di man wey dimon komot for en bodi beg Jisos mak e folo am, bot Jisos tel am,
"Mak yu go yor haus go tel dem wetin God don du for yu." So di man kon go, dey tel pipol for di tawn wetin Jisos du for am.
Wen Jisos go bak for di oda side for di riva, pipol welkom am for der, bikos e don tey wey dem dey wait for am.
Den Jairus wey bi oga for di sinagog kon kom. E fal for groun near Jisos leg, dey beg am mak e kom en haus,
bikos e onli dota wey don rish twef years, dey die. As Jisos dey go di man haus, pipol kon dey waka jam am enihaw bikos dem plenti.
Won wuman dey among dem wey don dey mestrate for twef years naw, bikos nobodi fit heal am.
E waka kom Jisos bak kon tosh Jisos klot kona and at wons, di blood kon stop.
Den Jisos ask, "Na hu tosh mi?" Wen evribodi sey dem nor no, Pita kon tel Jisos, "Oga, plenti pipol gada roun yu and all of dem bodi dey tosh yu!"
Bot Jisos sey, "Sombodi tosh mi, bikos pawa komot for my bodi."
Wen di wuman si sey e nor go fit hide again, e kom out dey shake kon fal for Jisos front. For evribodi present, e tok wetin mak am tosh Jisos and haw e kon wel at wons.
Jisos kon tel di wuman, "My pikin, yor fate don heal yu. Mak peace folo yu."
As Jisos stil dey tok, sombodi run kom from Jairus haus, kon tel Jairus sey, "Yor pikin don die, so mak yu nor wori di tisha again."
Bot wen Jisos hear am, e tel Jairus, "Mak yu nor fear, jos biliv and yor pikin go wel."
Wen dem rish di haus, Jisos nor let enibodi folo am enta, esept Pita, Jon and James wit di pikin papa and mama.
Evribodi for der dey krai tak bodi nak groun, bot Jisos tel dem, "Mak una nor krai, bikos di girl neva die, na slip e dey slip."
Dem kon bigin laff am, bikos dem no sey di girl don die.
Bot Jisos hol di girl hand kon sey, "My pikin, get up."
Naim di girl spirit enta di bodi bak and e kon get up at wons. Den Jisos tel dem mak dem giv di pikin fud chop.
Di papa and mama sopraiz wel-wel, bot Jisos komand dem mak dem nor tel enibodi wetin hapun.
Afta Jisos don kol di twef disaipols togeda, e giv dem pawa and autoriti to driv dimon and to heal pipol wey nor wel.
Den e kon send dem go prish abaut God Kindom and heal pipol wey nor wel.
E tel dem, "Mak una nor tak wokin-stik, bag, bread, moni or extra klot folo bodi.
Mak una stay for eni haus wey una enta ontil una komot for dat aria.
Wer dem nor welkom una, mak una shake di sand from una leg as una dey komot and dis go bi witnes against dem."
Di disaipols kon travol go all di vilage dem, dey prish di Gud News and heal pipol for evriwer.
Wen Herod wey bi rula hear abaut evritin wey dey hapun, e konfuz, bikos som pipol sey Jon don wak-up from deat
and odas sey Elija don apier, som stil sey won old profet don wak-up.
Herod kon sey, "I orda mak dem kut Jon head komot, bot hu bi dis won wey I dey hear all dis tins abaut so?" Bikos of dat, Herod kon trai to faind out more abaut Jisos.
Wen di apostols kom bak, dem tel Jisos evritin wey dem don du. Den Jisos tak onli dem folo bodi go Betsaida.
Bot wen pipol no, dem kon folo Jisos and en disaipols go der. E welkom dem, den tel dem abaut God Kindom and e heal doz wey nor wel.
Wen day don dey dak, di disaipols kon tel Jisos, "Tel dis pipol mak dem go, so dat dem go-go di vilage and farm wey near dis aria go fine fud chop, kon slip for der, bikos dis place na desert."
Bot Jisos ansa, "Mak una giv dem fud chop." Dem kon sey, "Na onli faiv bread and tu fish wi get, unles yu wont mak wi go buy fud for all of dem.
(Di men wey dey der alone rish faiv tazon). Jisos tel en disaipols, "Tel di pipol mak dem sidan fifti-fifti."
Di disaipols du as Jisos tok and all di pipol kon sidan.
Den Jisos tak di faiv bread and tu fish, e luk hevun, tank God, den e kon divide dem. E giv di bread and fish to en disaipols, mak dem share am for di pipol.
Evribodi chop beleful and wen dem gada di fud wey rimain, e ful twef basket.
As Jisos dey pray alone and en disaipols dey near am, e kon ask dem, "Na hu pipol dey tok sey I bi?"
Dem ansa, "Som sey yu bi Jon di Baptist, odas sey yu bi Elija and odas stil sey yu bi won old profet wey wak-up from deat."
Den Jisos ask dem, "Bot hu una tok sey I bi?" Pita kon ansa, "Yu bi di Mezaya wey God send."
Bot Jisos warn dem wel-wel, mak dem nor tel enibodi abaut am.
Den Jisos tel dem, "God Pikin go sofa meni tins: di eldas, prist oga dem and di law tishas go rejet am, dem go kil-am and afta tiri days, God go wak-am up."
So Jisos tel all of dem, "If pesin won folo mi, e must forget ensef, kari en kros evriday, dey folo mi.
"Bikos enibodi wey won save en life, go luz am and enibodi wey luz en life bikos of mi, go save am.
"Wetin pesin go gain if e get di hol wold, bot e luz en soul?
"Enibodi wey dey shame for mi and my wod, Man Pikin go shame for am wen e go kom bak for en glori and di glori wey en Papa and di angels get.
"Bot I tel una tru wod, som pipol wey stand for here nor go die, bifor dem go si God Kindom."
Won wik afta Jisos tok all dis tins, e kon tak Pita, Jon and James go on-top won mountin go pray.
As e dey pray, en face shange and en klot kon dey shine laik lite.
At wons, Mosis and Elija kon dey tok wit am.
As dem apier wit glori, dem kon tel Jisos haw e go sofa and die for Jerusalem, as dem rite for God wod.
Pita and di odas wey dey wit am dey slip bifor, bot at wons slip komot from dia eye and dem si Jisos glori and di tu men wey stand wit am.
Den as Mosis and Elija won go, Pita kon tel Jisos, "Oga, e gud mak wi stay here. Mak wi build tiri kanopi, won for yu, won for Mosis and won for Elija.' (Pita nor ivun no wetin e dey tok.)
As e stil dey tok, won kaind kloud suroun dem, fear kon kash di disaipols, as Mosis and Elija enta di kloud.
Won vois from di kloud kon sey, "Dis na my pikin wey I shuz. Mak una listin to am!"
Afta di vois don tok finish, Jisos kon dey alone for di place, bot di disaipols kwayet and dem nor tel enibodi wetin dem si.
Di next day wen dem kom dan from di mountin, meni pipol kom mit Jisos.
Den won man among di pipol krai kom, "Tisha, I beg yu, si my pikin, na-im bi di onli boy wey I get!
"Evil spirit dey wori am and e dey mak am shaut. Di spirit dey mak am get konvoshon and foam dey komot for en mout. Di spirit nor gri liv am and e dey trobol am wel-wel.
"I beg yor disaipols mak dem driv di dimon komot, bot dem nor fit."
Jisos kon tel dem, "Una wey dey du bad tins and nor gri biliv, haw long I go stay wit una?" Den e tel di man, "Bring yor pikin kom here."
As di boy dey kom, di dimon trow am for groun and konvoshon kon hol am. Den Jisos komand di dimon mak e komot and e heal di boy, kon gi-am to en papa.
Den evribodi wey dey der kon sopraiz as dem si God pawa. Bot as di pipol stil dey sopraiz, Jisos kon tel en disaipols,
"Mak una nor forget wetin I won tel una, dem go sel God Pikin giv humanbin."
Bot dem nor undastand dis wod, bikos God hide am from dem mak dem for nor no wetin di wod min. Di disaipols demsef dey fear to ask Jisos abaut di mata.
Di disaipols kon dey ask demsef, "Hu big pas among us for God Kindom?"
Wen Jisos no wetin dem dey tok, e bring won smol pikin near am
kon tel dem, "Enibodi wey welkom dis smol pikin bikos of mi, don welkom mi and enibodi wey welkom mi, don welkom God wey send mi, bikos di pesin wey smol pas among una, na-im big pas for God Kindom."
Jon tel Jisos, "Oga, wi si won man dey driv dimon wit yor name and wi tel am mak e stop, bikos e nor dey wit us."
Jisos kon ansa am, "Nor stop am, bikos enibodi wey nor dey against us, dey awa side."
Wen di taim wey God go tak Jisos go hevun don near, Jisos tink for en maind sey, e go-go Jerusalem.
E kon send mesenjas go for front and dem enta won vilage for Samaria go priper evritin bifor e go rish der,
bot di villagas nor gri welkom am, bikos dem si sey, e won go Jerusalem.
Wen James and Jon si wetin hapun, dem kon sey, "Oga, yu wont mak wi kol fire dan from hevun kon kil dis pipol?"
Bot Jisos turn warn dem,
den en and dem kon go anoda vilage.
As Jisos dey go for road, won man kon tel am, "I won folo yu go eniwer wey u dey go."
Jisos kon tel am, "Rabbits get hol, birds get nest, bot Man Pikin nor get eniwer to put en head!"
Jisos kon tel anoda man, "Mak yu folo mi," bot di man sey, "Oga, mak I first go bere my papa."
Jisos kon tel am, "Mak doz wey don die, bere hu don die. Bot mak yu go prish abaut God Kindom."
Anoda pesin kon sey, "Oga! I go laik to folo yu, bot mak I first go tel my famili bye-bye."
Jisos tel am, "Pesin wey put hand for dis wok, den kon dey luk bak, nor get part for God Kindom."
Afta, Jisos shuz sevunti-tu men kon send dem tu by tu go all di tawn and oda place wer e won go leta.
E tel dem, "Di frut wey dem won plok, plenti, bot pipol wey go plok dem, nor plenti rish. Mak una pray mak di Oga wey get di farm send wokas kon gada en frut.
"Mak una go! I dey send una laik smol-smol ship go mit wiked anima.
"Mak una nor tak bag or shu and nor grit enibodi for road.
"Wen una enta eni haus, mak una first sey, 'Mak peace dey dis haus!'
"If enibodi wey wont peace dey der, una peace go stay wit am, bot if e nor dey, una peace go kom bak to una.
"Mak una stay for dat haus, chop and drink enitin wey dem giv una, bikos enibodi wey dey wok, sopoz to get en pay. Mak una nor dey waka from won haus go anoda.
"Wen una enta eni tawn and dem welkom una, mak una chop di fud wey dem giv una
and heal di sik pipol for dat tawn, den tel di pipol wey dey der sey, 'God Kindom don kom mit una.'
"Bot wen una enta eni tawn and dem nor welkom una, mak una go road kon sey,
'Ivun di sand for una tawn wey dey awa leg, wi shake am komot mak e bi witnes against una. Bot mak una no sey: God Kindom don kom mit una.'
"I tel una tru wod, e go beta for Sodom for jojment day pas dat tawn!

"Korazin and Betsaida pipol, kos dey una head! Bikos if to sey na for Tyre and Sidon dem for du di mirakols wey dem du for una tawn, di pipol der for don turn from sin kom mit God since, dem for don sidan, wear sack-klot and put ashes for dia head kon dey beg God mak E forgiv dem.
"Bot e go beta for Tyre and Sidon pipol pas una for jojment day!
"Una Kapanum pipol, una tink sey God go jos kari una go hevun? No, E go trow una for hell fire."
Jisos tel en disaipols, "Enibodi wey listin to una, don listin to mi and enibodi wey rejet una, don rejet mi and God wey send mi."
Di sevunti-tu men kon kom bak wit hapines, dey sey, "Oga, ivun dimons dey obey us wen wi komand dem wit yor name!"
Jisos tel dem, "I si Satan wen e fal laik tunda-lite from hevun.
"Mak una listin, I don giv una pawa to waka on-top snake and skorpion and to ova kom all di enimi pawa, so nor-tin go fit wound una.
"Mak una nor onli dey hapi sey evil spirit dey obey una, insted mak una hapi sey God rite una name for hevun."

For dat taim, di Holi Spirit kon mak Jisos dey hapi, so e kon sey, "I praiz Yu, Papa wey bi Oga for hevun and eart, bikos Yu don hide dis tins from pipol wey get sense and wise, bot Yu show dem to yor shildren. Yes, Papa, na so Yu wont mak e bi.
"My Papa don giv mi evritin. Nobodi no hu di pikin bi esept di Papa and nobodi no hu di Papa bi esept di pikin and pipol wey di pikin won show."
Den Jisos kon face en disaipols tel dem smol-smol, "God don bless di pesin wey en eye si wetin una dey si so -o -o!
"I tel una tru wod, 'Meni profets and kings don trai to si wetin una dey si so, bot dem nor fit si-am and dem don won hear wetin una dey hear so, bot dem nor fit hear-am."
Won man wey sabi di law wel-wel kon get up test Jisos, "Tisha, wetin I go du to tak get life wey nor dey end?"
Jisos kon ask am, "Wetin yu undastand abaut Mosis law?
Di man ansa, "Mak yu luv God yor Oga wit all yor heart, yor soul, yor pawa and maind, den luv yor nebor as yu luv yorsef."
Jisos kon tel am, "Yor ansa koret, mak yu du dem and yu go get koret life."
Bot di man won show sey en no wel-wel, so e kon ask Jisos, "Hu bi my nebor?"
Jisos tel am dis stori, "Won man dey travol from Jerusalem go Jeriko and tif kon atak am for road, dem naked am, beat am til e nearli die, den kon waka liv am.
"Afta, won prist dey pas der, wen e si di man, e waka pas for di oda side for di road.
"Na so tu, won woka for di tempol stil waka rish wer di man dey, bot e waka pas di oda side for di road.
"Bot won Samaria man wey dey travol for dat road kon rish wer di man dey, as e si di man, e sori for am.
"E waka go mit di man kon rob wine and olive oil for en sore and bandage am. Den e put di man on-top en horse kon kari am go won hotel and e kare for am dat nite.
"Di next day, di Samaria man giv di hotel manaja tu silva koins kon tel am, 'Mak yu kare for dis man, wen I kom bak, I go pay yu eni extra moni wey yu spend.'"
Jisos kon ask di man wey e dey folo tok sey, "Among dis tiri men, wish won yu tink sey bi nebor to di man wey tif atak?"
Di man wey sabi di law wel-wel kon ansa, "Na di won wey kare for di man." So, Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu go du di same tin."
As Jisos and en disaipols stil dey travol, dem rish won vilage and won wuman wey en name bi Marta kon welkom dem for en haus.
Mary, wey bi Marta sista, sidan near Jisos leg dey listin to wetin e dey tish.
Bot Marta nor hapi, bikos of all di wok wey e dey du, so e mit Jisos kon sey, "Oga! Si, my sista don liv all di wok for mi. Abeg, tel am mak e kom help mi."
Jisos ansa am, "Marta! Marta! Yu dey tu wahala yorsef abaut meni tins,
na onli won tin dey important and Mary don shuz di koret tin and nobodi go fit tak am from am."
Won day Jisos dey pray for won place. Wen e pray finish, won of en disaipols kon tel am, "Oga! Mak yu tish us haw to pray, jos as Jon tish en disaipols.
So Jisos kon tel dem, "Wen una dey pray, mak una sey: 'Awa Papa wey dey for hevun, wi grit Yu, Mak yor kindom kom.
'Giv us di bread wey wi go chop today,
Mak Yu forgiv us awa sins, as wi dey forgiv doz wey du us bad. Nor let us enta temtashon.'"
Den Jisos tel dem, "Laik sey won of una go mit en frend for mid-nite sey, 'My frend, abeg giv mi tiri bread,
bikos won of my frend wey dey travol stop for my place and I nor get enitin to giv am chop.'
"Den yor frend kon ansa from insaid haus, 'Mak yu nor disturb mi. I don lock my door and mi and my shildren dey slip. I nor go fit get up giv yu enitin naw.'
"I tel yu tru wod, ivun if di man insaid, nor won get up bikos yu bi en frend, e go get up giv yu enitin wey yu wont, bikos yu nor let am res.
"So, I tel yu tru wod: Mak yu ask and God go giv yu, faind and yu go si wetin yu dey luk for, mak yu nok and di door go opun for yu.
"Bikos pesin wey ask, go get, pesin wey faind, go si wetin e dey faind and di pesin wey nok, di door go opun for am.
"Wish of una wey bi papa go giv en pikin snake, if e ask for fish?
"Or if di pikin ask for egg, una go gi-am skorpion?
"Since una fit giv una pikin gud tins, as una bad rish, wot of una Papa for Hevun wey go giv di Holi Spirit to enibodi wey ask am!"
Won day, Jisos kon driv dimon wey dey mak pesin nor fit tok komot for won man bodi. Wen di dimon don komot, di man bigin tok and di pipol sopraiz wel-wel.
Bot som of dem sey, "Belzibub wey bi dimon oga, na en pawa Jisos dey yuz tak driv dimons."
Bot oda pipol kon dey ask for sign from hevun, bikos dem won test Jisos.
Jisos no wetin dey dia maind, so e kon tel dem, "Eni kindom wer pipol dey fite ish oda nor go last and famili wey divide, go fal.
"So, if Satan kindom divide, haw en kindom go tak last? I dey ask una dis tin, bikos una dey sey na Belzibub pawa I tak dey driv dimons.
"If na Belzibub pawa I tak dey driv dimons, den na wish pawa una pikin dem dey yuz? So, na una pikin go joj una.
"Bot if na God pawa I tak dey driv dimon komot, naim bi sey God Kindom don rish wer una dey.
"Wen pesin wey get pawa redi wel-wel gaid en own haus, all en tins go dey safe.
"Bot wen pesin wey get pawa pas am atak and win am, di pesin go kari all di tins wey di man tak dey protet ensef kon divide di propati wey rimain.
"Enibodi wey nor dey wit mi, dey against mi and enibodi wey nor dey help mi gada, dey skata.
"Wen evil spirit komot for pesin bodi, e go dey waka enihaw, dey fine wer e go res, bot e nor go si. Den e go tel ensef, 'Mak I go bak to di haus wey I from komot.'
"Wen e kom bak kon si sey dem swip evriwer klin, arange am and nobodi dey stay der.
"E go-go bring sevun oda spirits wey wiked pas am join ensef and dem go stay for der, so di pesin kondishon go wos pas as e bi bifor."
As Jisos tok dis tins, won wuman for der kon shaut, "God go bless di bele wey born yu and di breast wey yu sok!"
Den Jisos sey, "Pipol wey hear God wod and du wetin e tok, na dem God don bless!"
As pipol dey plenti more-more, Jisos kon sey, "Pipol wey dey dis wold naw wiked wel-wel; dem dey luk for sign, bot God nor go show dem eni sign, esept di tin wey hapun for Jona taim.
"Jos as Jona bi profet for Nineve pipol, na so Man Pikin go bi sign for di pipol wey dey dis wold naw.

For Jogment Day, Sheba Queen go bear witnes against pipol wey dey dis wold naw and God go kondem dem, bikos di queen travol from far place kom hear di wise tins wey Solomon tish. Bot naw, pesin wey big pas Solomon dey here!
For Jogment Day, na so tu Nineve pipol go bear witnes against pipol wey dey dis wold naw, bikos dem turn from sin kom mit God, wen Jona prish giv dem. Bot naw, pesin wey big pas Jona dey here."
"Nobodi dey lite lamp put for unda basket or for wer pipol nor go fit si-am, bot dem go put am for wer pipol go si-am wen dem enta di haus.
"Na eye bi di lamp wey bodi get. If yor eye wel, lite go ful yor hol bodi, bot wen yor eye nor wel, na daknes go ful yor bodi.
"So mak sure sey wetin dey insaid yu, na lite, nor bi daknes.
"If lite ful yor bodi and daknes nor dey insaid at-all, e go shine wel-wel laik wen lamp dey shine for yor face."
As Jisos dey tok, won Farisi kol am kom en haus kon chop, so Jisos go sidan for wer dem go for chop.
Di Farisi sopraiz wel-wel wen e si sey Jisos nor first wosh hand, bifor e bigin chop.
Bot Jisos tel am, "Una wey bi Farisi pipol dey wosh outsaid cup and plate, bot insaid una bele, longtrot and wikednes ful am.
"Una bi fool! Nor bi God wey mak di outsaid stil mak insaid?
"Bot mak una from una heart giv to pipol wey nor get, so dat evritin go dey klin for una.
"Kos dey una head! Una wey bi Farisi pipol! Una dey giv God won out of evri ten tins wey una get! "Bot una dey forget pipol wey nor get.
"Kos dey una head! Una wey bi Farisi pipol! Una dey won sidan for beta chair for sinagog and una dey laik mak pipol dey grit una for market.
"Kos dey una head! Una bi laik grave wey pipol dey mash pas and dem nor no sey na grave."
Won of di men wey no di law wel-wel kon ansa, "Tisha, yu dey kos us as yu dey tok laik dis so o-o."
Bot Jisos ansa am, "Kos dey una head! Una wey sabi di law wel-wel! Una kari heavi load put for pipol bak and una nor won ivun tak hand tosh di load!
"Kos dey una head! Una dey build profets grave, di profets wey una gran-gran papa kil.
"Dis show sey una sopot di tins wey una gran-gran papa dem du, bikos dem kil di profets and una build dia graves!
"Na dis won mak God tok wit en wisdom sey, 'I go send profets and apostols go mit dem and dem go sofa and kil som of dem.'
"So di profets blood wey dem don kil since di wold start, di pipol wey dey dis wold naw, go tak dia head kari am.
"From wen dem kil Abel go rish di taim wen dem kil Zekaraya for di alta insaid di Tempol, dia blood dey dis pipol head and God go joj dem.
"Kos dey una head! Una wey no di law wel-wel! Una don sieze di key wey dey mak pipol no di trut! Since una nor gri enta, una nor wont mak oda pipol enta tu."
Wen Jisos komot from der, di pipol wey no di law wel-wel and di Farisi pipol kon dey ves, so from dat taim, dem kon bigin ask Jisos yeye kweshon abaut meni tins
and dem kon dey plan, so dat dem go fit faind wod for en mout, wey dem go tak hol am.
