Plenti pipol gada aroun Jisos kon dey waka jam won anoda, so Jisos kon tel en disaipols, "Mak una shine una eye wel-wel, bikos of di Farisi pipol wey dey pritend.
"Enitin wey pipol hide naw, go kom out for publik and enitin wey dey sikrit naw, God go bring am out.
"So enitin wey pesin du for daknes, go kom out for lite and enitin wey pesin tok for sikrit, pipol go shaut am from on-top haus.
"I tel una wey bi my frends, mak una nor fear pipol wey fit kil pesin, bot dem nor fit du pas dat.
"Bot mak I tel una hu una must fear: Mak una fear di Pesin wey get pawa to trow una insaid hell fire afta E don kil una. Yes, I tel una tru wod, na-im una must fear!
"Nor bi tu koins dem dey sel faiv sparo bird? Bot God nor dey forget eni won of dem.
"Si, God no di numba of hair wey dey una head. So mak una nor fear, bikos una beta pas meni sparo bird.
"I tel una tru wod, enibodi wey stand-up for publik sey en no mi, mi tu go stand-up for am, for wer God angels dey.
"Bot pesin wey rejet mi for wer pipol dey, mi tu go rejet am for wer God angels dey.
"And enibodi wey tok bad abaut Man Pikin, God go fit forgiv am, bot pesin wey tok bad abaut di Holi Spirit, God nor go forgiv am.
"Wen dem kari una go sinagog or go mit govnors and pipol wey get pawa to joj una kase, mak una nor wori abaut haw una go difend unasef or wetin una go tok,
bikos di Holi Spirit go tel una wetin to tok, wen dat taim rish."
Den won pesin among di pipol kon sey, "Tisha, tel my broda mak e divide di propati wey awa papa die liv for us."
Bot Jisos ask am, "My frend, na hu mak mi joj for una tu mata?"
Den Jisos tel dem, "Mak una gaid against longtrot, bikos nor bi wetin pesin get for dis life go save am."
So Jisos kon tel dem won parabol: "Won rish man plok plenti fud from en farm,
so e kon tink for en maind sey, 'Wetin I go du naw? Bikos I nor get eniwer to kip all dis fud wey I plok so.'
'Den di man sey, 'I no wetin I go du: I go skata my stores kon build new big-big won wey I go kip all my fud and oda tins wey I plok.'
'Den I go tel mysef, "Yu get plenti fud wey go last yu for meni years, so mak yu go slip, chop and drink, dey enjoy yorsef!'"
"Bot God kon tel di man, 'Yu bi fool! Dis nite, yu go die, den hu go kon get all dis tins wey yu don gada for yorsef?'
"Na so e go bi wit pesin wey dey gada moni kip for ensef, bot en heart nor dey wit God."
Jisos tel en disaipols, "Naw I dey tel una, mak una nor wori abaut una life, wetin una go chop or klot wey una go wear for bodi.
"Bikos life gud pas fud and awa bodi beta pas klot.
"Mak una tink haw birds bi: Dem nor dey plant or plok, dem nor get wer dem dey kip fud put, bot God dey giv dem fud chop. If God dey kare for dem, wot abaut una wey beta pas dem?
"Wish of una go fit add won hour join en life, bikos e dey wori?
"So, if una nor fit du dis simpol tin, why una dey wori abaut di odas?
"Mak una tink of haw flawas dey grow: Dem nor dey wok or mak klot for demsef. Bot I tel una tru wod, ivun Solomon for all di glori wey e get, nor dress fine rish flawas!
"If God dey dress grass, wey dey today and pipol go kut am trow for fire tomoro, dat God nor go fit kare for una? Una fate smol wel-wel-o-o!
"Mak una nor dey wori abaut wetin una go chop or drink.
"Na bikos of all dis tins, pipol wey nor no God dey wori demsef, bot una Papa for hevun no sey una nid dem.
"Insted mak una first strogol to enta God Kindom and God go giv una all di oda tins."
"Mak una nor fear, una wey bi smol ships, bikos una Papa go hapi to giv una di kindom.
"Mak una sel evritin wey una get and giv di moni to poor pipol. Bag wey nor go tear, mak una tak am gada beta tins for hevun, wer tif nor go fit rish and ant nor go fit spoil dem.
"Bikos na wer yor propati dey, na der yor heart go dey tu.
"Mak una redi to serv God and mak una lite dey shine evritaim.
"Mak una bi laik pipol wey dey wait for dia oga to kom bak from parti, so dat wen e nok, una go kwik opun door for am.
"Di savant wey en oga go kom bak kon mit am dey wok, mak e hapi wel-wel bikos di oga go priper ensef mak e for serv di savant fud for tabol.
"Mak doz savant hapi wel-wel, ivun if di oga kom for nain or tiri o’klok for nite kon si sey dem neva slip.
"Bot mak una no dis. If di owna of di haus no wen tif dey kom, e nor go let di tif break enta en haus.
"Una must dey redi tu, bikos Man Pikin go kom wen nobodi dey espet am."
Den Pita kon ask, "Oga na onli wi yu dey tel dis parabol, abi na evribodi?"
Jisos ansa, "Hu bi di manaja wey get sense and nor dey du wayo? Na pesin wey di oga put mak e kare and giv di oda savants dia fud for di rite taim?
"Di savant wey en oga kom bak kon mit am dey du en wok, mak e hapi wel-wel.
"I tel una tru wod, di oga go sey make e kare for all en propati.
"Bot if dat savant tink for en maind sey, 'My oga go tey smol and e bigin beat di oda savants, weda na man or wuman; e kon dey chop, dey drink enihaw,
den di oga kon kom bak for di day wen di savant nor tink sey e go kom. Di oga go ponish di savant kon lock am for wer dem dey kip wiked pipol.'
"Di savant wey no wetin en oga wont and e nor du-am, dem go flog am wel-wel.

"Bot di savant wey nor no wetin en oga wont and e du tins wey go mak dem beat am, dem go beat am smol. Pesin wey God giv plenti tins to, E go ask plenti tins from am and di won wey God giv plenti, E go ask doubol from dem."
"I bring fire kom dis wold and I wish sey di fire don dey kash!
"E get won baptizim wey dem go baptaiz mi and my maind nor go fit res ontil e hapun!
"Una tink sey na peace I bring kom dis wold? No, I kom divide una!
"From naw go, famili wey bi faiv go divide, tiri go dey against tu, tu go dey against tiri.

"Papa go dey against en son and son go dey against en papa, mama go dey against en dota and dota go dey against en mama, husban-mama go dey against en pikin wife and wife go dey against en husban-mama."
Jisos tel di pipol, "Enitaim una si sey di kloud dey go West, una dey no sey, heavi rain won fal and tru-tru, e go fal.
"And wen una si briz dey blow from East, una go sey, 'Heat go dey today' and na so e go bi.
"Una wey dey pritend! Una fit tok haw di weda go bi, bot why una nor fit tok wetin dey hapun so?"
"Why una nor dey tok wetin dey gud for pipol to du?
"If yu and pesin get kase and una dey go kourt, mak yu trai setol wit am for road, so dat e nor go drag yu go mit di joj, wey go giv yu to polis and dem go trow yu insaid prizin.
"I tel una tru wod, yu nor go komot for der ontil yu pay all di moni wey yu dey hol!"
Som pipol wey dey der wen Jisos dey tok kon tel am haw Pilate kil som Galili pipol kon mix dia blood wit dia sakrifais.
Jisos ansa dem, "Una tink sey na doz Galili pipol sin pas evribodi, bikos dem sofa all dis tins?
"I tel una tru wod, nor bi so e bi! Unles una turn from sin kom mit God, all of una go die tu!
"Doz etin pipol wey die wen towa fal for dia head for Siloam, una tink sey na dia sin big pas for Jerusalem?
"I tel una tru wod, nor bi so e bi!? Unles una turn from sin kom mit God, all of una go die tu!"
Jisos tel dem dis parabol; "Won man plant fig tri for en farm, so e kon dey luk for frut from di tri, bot e nor si.
"Naim e kon tel doz wey dey wosh di farm sey, 'Since tiri years naw, I dey fine frut for dis tri, bot wen I luk, I nor dey si. So, mak una kut am dan! Why wi stil let am dey tak space?'
"Bot di farma ansa, 'Oga, stil liv am for dis year mak I put fertaliza,
"Den if e bear frut next year, wi go liv am, bot if e nor bear, yu fit kut am trowey.'"
Wen Jisos dey tish for won sinagog for Sabat Day,
won wuman wey evil spirit bend en bodi for etin years dey der.
Wen Jisos si-am, e kol di wuman kon tel am, "Wuman, yu don fri from yor trobol."
Jisos tosh di wuman and at wons, en bodi kon strate and e start to praiz God.

Bot di oga for di sinagog ves sey Jisos heal pesin for Sabat day, so e kon tel di pipol, "Wi get sis days wen pipol sopoz wok, so mak una kom mak dem heal una for doz sis days, bot nor bi for Sabat day."
Den Jisos ansa am, "Yu wey dey pritend! Una nor dey luz una melu or donkey from rope go drink wota for Sabat day?
So mak I nor fri dis wuman, wey bi Abraham pikin, wey dey Satan prizin for etin years, bikos today na Sabat?"
Wen Jisos tok dis tin, shame kon kash all en enimis, so di pipol kon dey hapi, bikos of wetin Jisos dey du.
Jisos ask di pipol, "Wetin God Kindom bi laik? Haw I won tak diskribe am?
"E bi laik mustard sid wey pesin plant for en farm. Di sid grow kon turn to big tri and birds build dia haus for di tri."
Jisos tok again sey, "Wetin I go tok sey God Kindom bi laik?
"E bi laik yist wey wuman mix wit tiri basket of flawa so dat di bread go raiz."
Jisos kon travol pas tawns and vilage dem dey tish as e dey go Jerusalem.
Sombodi kon ask am, "Oga, na onli few pipol God go save?" Jisos tel dem,
"Mak una strogol wel-wel so dat una go fit pas di smol door, bikos meni pipol go trai to enta God Kindom, bot dem nor go fit.
"If di Oga wey get di haus go lock di door, una go stand for outsaid dey nok and beg sey, "Oga, mak yu let us enta! Bot e go ansa, 'I nor no wer una from kom.'
"Den una go sey, 'Wi chop and drink wit yu and yu tish for awa tawns tu.'
"Bot e go sey, 'I nor no wer una from kom! Mak una nor near mi, una bi wiked pipol!'
"Una go krai dey grind tit wen una si Abraham, Izik, Jakop and all di profets insaid God Kindom, bot God go trow una for outsaid.
"Pipol go from east, west, nort and sout kon sidan for di parti for God Kindom.
"Den doz wey bi last, go bi first and doz wey bi first, go bi last."
Dat taim, som Farisi pipol kom mit Jisos tok sey, "Run komot for here, bikos Herod won kil yu."
Bot Jisos tel dem, "Mak una go mit dat yeye man tel am, 'Si, for today, tomoro and next tomoro, I go stil dey driv dimons dey heal pipol, ontil my wok go finish.
"Bot for today, tomoro and next tomoro, I go-go my way, bikos e nor fit hapun sey dem go kil profet outsaid Jerusalam.
Jerusalem pipol! Jerusalem pipol! Una wey kil profets and stone pipol wey God send kom mit una! E don tey wey I won gada una shildren as fawo dey gada en pikin unda en feda, bot una nor gri!
"Mak una luk, una shildren don skata! And I tel una tru wod, una nor go si mi again ontil una go sey, 'God don bless di pesin wey kom wit en name!'"
For won Sabat day, wen Jisos go chop for won Farisi oga haus, di pipol kon dey luk am,
bikos won man wey en hand and leg swel-up, stand for en front.
Jisos kon ask di pipol wey sabi di law wel-wel and di Farisi pipol sey, "E dey rite to heal for Sabat day?"
Dem nor tok enitin. Naim Jisos hol di man, heal am kon sey mak e dey go.
Den Jisos tel dem, "If eni of una get pikin or melu wey fal insaid wel for Sabat day, una nor go kwik-kwik draw am kom out?"
Bot dem nor fit ansa.
Wen Jisos si haw di pipol wey dem invait dey rush to sidan for beta chair, e kon tel dem won parabol:
"Wen dem invait yu go parti, nor rush go sidan for beta chair, bikos di pesin wey dey du di parti fit don invait pesin wey big pas yu.
"Den di pesin wey invait tu of una go tel yu, 'Get up mak dis man sidan.' Den wit shame, yu go-go sidan for bak.

"Bot wen dem invait yu, mak yu sidan for bak chair, so dat wen di pesin wey dey du di parti si yu, e go sey, 'My frend, kom sidan for dis beta place for front.' Den all di pipol wey dey folo yu chop, go giv yu respet.
"Enibodi wey dey kari bodi up, dem go bring am dan and enibodi wey put en bodi for groun, dem go kari am up."
Jisos stil tel di man wey invait am, "Wen yu dey du parti, nor invait yor frends, brodas, rilashons and nebors wey get moni, so dat wen dem dey du dia own parti, dem go invait yu tu.
"Insted wen yu dey du big parti, mak yu invait poor pipol, pipol wey dia leg or hand kut komot, pipol wey nor fit waka and pipol wey nor dey si.
"Den, God go bless yu, bikos dem nor go fit pay yu bak, bot na God go pay yu, wen E go raiz en pipol from deat; di pipol wey du wetin E laik.
Wen won of di pipol for di parti hear wetin Jisos tok, e kon tel Jisos, "God don bless evribodi wey go chop for di parti for en kindom!"
Bot Jisos tel am, "Won man du big parti kon invait meni pipol kom.
"Wen di parti taim rish, e kon tel en savant mak dem go tel evibodi wey e invait sey, 'Mak una kom, bikos evritin don redi.'
"Bot, all of dem kon dey komplain won by won. Di first won sey, 'I jos buy land and I won go si-am. Abeg, mak yu nor ves.'
"Anoda won sey, 'I jos buy faiv melu and I dey go luk haw dem bi. Abeg, mak yu nor ves.'
"Di last won kon sey, 'I nor go fit kom, bikos I jos mari new wife.'

"So di savant kom bak kon tel en oga evritin wey dem tok. Di oga ves wel-wel kon tel di savant, 'Mak yu go all di strit and kona-kona wey dey dis tawn, go bring poor pipol: pipol wey dia leg or hand kut komot and pipol wey nor fit waka kon di parti.'
'Afta, di savant sey, 'Oga, I don du wetin yu tok and di parti neva stil ful.'
"So di oga tel di savant, 'Mak yu go main road and enta evriwer for di aria, tel pipol mak dem kom, so dat my haus go ful.'
"Bikos I tel yu, non of doz pipol wey I first invait, go taste my fud!"
Plenti pipol dey waka folo Jisos for road, so e turn luk dem kon sey:
"If enibodi kom mit mi and e nor luv mi pas en papa, mama, wife, pikin, brodas and sistas, ivun en ownsef, e nor go fit bi my disaipol.
"Enibodi wey nor gri kari en kros folo mi, nor fit bi my disaipol.
"Wish of una wey won build big haus, nor go first kakulate weda di moni wey e get go rish to finish am?
"If e nor du so, wen e don lay di foundashon and e nor fit finish di haus, evribodi wey si wetin hapun, go kon dey laff am.
"Dem go sey, 'Dis man start to build haus and e nor fit finish am!'
"Abi wish king wey won go fite anoda king, nor go first sidan tink weda di ten tazon men wey e get go fit fite di twenti tazon wey di oda king get?
"If e si sey e nor go fit win, e go send mesenja wen di oda king stil dey far, go ask am haw dem go tak setol.
"Laik dis tu, nobodi fit bi my disaipol if e nor komot en maind from evritin wey e get.
"Salt gud, bot if e nor get taste, haw dem go fit mak am swit again?
"Pipol nor go fit yuz am du enitin, na trowey dem go trowey am. Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear wetin I dey tok!"
Enitaim Jisos dey prish, tax koletors and sinas dey kom listin to am.
Bot di Farisi pipol and di law tishas dey komplain sey, "Dis man dey folo sinas chop."
So, Jisos kon tel dem dis parabol:
"If yu get ondred ship and won kon loss, yu nor go liv di nainti-nain wey rimain go faind dat won til yu si-am?
"Den wen yu si-am, yu go kari am for shoulda, dey hapi.
"Wen yu rish haus, yu go kol yor frends and nebors sey, 'Mak una kom folo mi hapi, bikos I don si my ship wey loss bifor.'
"I tel una tru wod, na so hapines dey for hevun wen won sina turn from sin kom mit God, pas nainti-nain gud pipol wey don alredi dey wit God.
"Or, if won wuman get ten koins and won loss, wetin e go du? E nor go lite lamp, swip di hol haus ontil e si-am?
"Wen e don si-am, e go kol en frends and nebors gada kon sey, 'Mak una kom folo mi hapi, bikos I don si my moni wey loss bifor.'
"I tel una tru wod, na so God angels dey hapi, wen won sina turn from sin kom mit God."
Den Jisos sey, "Won man dey wey get tu sons.
Di younga won kon tel en papa, 'Giv mi my own share for awa propati.' So en papa kon gi-am.
"Afta som taim, di young boy kari evritin wey e get travol go won far kontri kon waste all en moni for yeye life.
"Wen e don finish all wetin e get, e nor si enitin to chop, bikos hunga dey for dat kontri, so e kon dey sofa.
"Naim e kon dey wok for won man for der, di man dey send am go en farm go giv pig fud.
"Di hunga kon mak am dey won chop di fud wey di pig dem dey chop, bikos nobodi gi-am fud.
"Bot wen en eye klear, e kon sey, 'All my papa wokas get fud wey dem nor fit chop finish, bot hungri don nearli kil mi for here!
'I go get up go mit my papa tel am, "Papa I don sin against hevun and against yu.
"I nor rish mak dem kol mi yor pikin again. Mak yu tak mi as won of yor wokas.'"
"So e get up kon go mit en papa. Bot wen en papa si-am dey kom from far, e sori for am, run go mit am, hol am near bodi kon kiss am.
"Den di pikin tel am, 'Papa, I don sin against hevun and yu. I nor rish mak dem kol mi yor pikin again. Mak yu tak mi as won of yor wokas.'
"Bot di papa kol en savants kon tel dem, 'Mak una bring di best klot, ring and shu and mak una wear dem for my pikin.
'Den, mak una go tak di melu wey fat pas, kil-am mak wi du parti,
bikos dis my pikin die bifor, bot naw, e don kom bak to life, e loss bifor, bot naw, I don si-am!' So di parti kon start.
"By dat taim, di senior son dey kom from farm wer e go wok. Wen e don near haus, e kon dey hear muzik and si pipol dey dance.
"So e kol won savant kon ask am, "Wetin dey hapun?'
"Di savant ansa, 'Yor broda don kom bak and yor papa don kil di melu wey fat pas, bikos e kom bak wel and nor-tin bad hapun to am.'
"Di senior broda kon dey ves and e nor gri enta haus, so en papa kon beg am mak e enta.
"So, e tel en papa, 'Si, all dis meni years I dey wok laik slave for yu and e nor get eni taim wey I disobey yu, bot yu neva giv mi ivun won smol goat mak I du parti wit my frends.
'Bot wen dis yor pikin kom bak afta e don waste all yor moni wit ashawo, yu kon kil di melu wey fat pas for am!'
"Den di papa tel am, 'My pikin, yu always dey here wit mi and evritin wey I get na yor own.
'Bot e gud mak I du parti, bikos yor broda die bifor, bot naw, e don kom bak to life, e loss bifor, bot naw, wi don si-am.'"
Jisos tel en disaipols, "E get won rish man wey hear sey en manaja dey waste en moni.
"So e kol di manaja kon tel am, 'I nor laik wetin I dey hear abaut yu. Mak yu go rite haw yu tak dey spend all my moni, bikos yu nor go bi my manaja again.'
"Den di manaja tel ensef, 'Wetin I go du naw? My oga won sack mi and I nor strong rish to dig and na shame for mi to go beg.
'I no wetin I go du, so dat wen my oga sack mi, I go get frends wey go welkom mi for dia haus.'
"So e gada all di pipol wey dey hol en oga moni. E kon ask di first won, 'Haw mush yu dey hol my oga?'
"Di man ansa, 'Won ondred gallon olive oil.' Di manaja kon sey, 'Tak dis paper, sidan kwik-kwik mak yu rite fifti.'
"Den e ask anoda won, 'Haw mush yu dey hol?' Di sekon man sey, 'Won ondred basket flawa.' Di manaja tel am, 'Tak dis paper, mak yu rite eti.'
"Di oga praiz di wayo manaja, bikos of di wayo sense wey e yuz. Bikos dis wold pipol sabi yuz dia wayo sense for biznes pas pipol wey dey for lite.
"So I tel una tru wod, mak una yuz una moni wel, so dat una go mak frends for unasef and wen di moni finish, God go welkom una for en kindom wey go dey foreva.
"Enibodi wey fit handol smol tins, go fit handol big tins tu and enibodi wey du wayo for smol tins, go stil du wayo for big wons tu.
"If pipol nor trust yu wit moni for dis wold, God nor go fit giv yu en rishis for hevun.
"And if pipol nor fit trust yu wit dia propati, na hu go giv yu yor own?
"No savant go fit serv tu oga, bikos e must hate won kon luv di oda won, or e go serv won wit all en bodi dan di oda won. So, yu nor go fit serv God and moni for di same taim."
Wen di Farisi pipol (wey laik moni) hear dis won, dem kon dey tak Jisos mak yeye.
Bot Jisos tel dem, "Na una dey mak unasef gud for pipol eye, bot God no una heart. Bikos wetin humanbin value wel-wel, naim God nor laik.
"Mosis law and di tins wey di profets rite, naim pipol dey folo, bifor Jon di Baptist kom. Bot since e kom, dem don dey prish di Gud News abaut God Kindom and evribodi won fos ensef enta.
"E beta mak hevun and eart vanish, dan mak ivun di smol-smol laws dey yuzles.
"Eni man wey driv en wife, den mari anoda wuman, don komit adoltri and di man wey mari wuman wey liv en husban, don komit adoltri tu."
"E get won rish man wey dey wear dear-dear klot and e dey enjoy life evriday.
"Bot for en gate, won poor man wey en name bi Lazarus and sore ful en bodi, laidan for der,
e dey wait to chop wetin fal from di rish man tabol. Dogs sef dey kom lick di sore for en bodi.
"Di poor man kon die and angels kari am go wer Abraham dey. Di rish man stil die tu and dem bere am.
"As di rish man dey for hell fire dey sofa, e kon luk up si Abraham for far wit Lazarus for en kona.
"Naim e shaut, 'Papa Abraham, mak yu sori for mi, abeg send Lazarus mak e put en finga for wota kon tosh my mout, bikos I dey sofa insaid dis fire.'
"Bot Abraham ansa, 'My pikin, rimemba sey wen yu dey alaif, yu dey enjoy gud tins, bot Lazarus nor enjoy at-all. Bot naw, e dey enjoy for here and yu dey sofa for der.
'Nor bi onli dat won sef, bot dem blok di senta, so dat pipol wey won kros from here go mit una, nor go fit and nobodi go fit from una side kros kom mit us.'
"So di rish man kon sey, "I beg yu papa, mak yu send Lazarus go my papa haus for di wold,
(bikos I get faiv brodas), so dat e go warn dem, mak dem nor for kom sofa for dis place.'
"Bot Abraham ansa, 'Mosis and di profets dey wit yor brodas for di wold, so mak dem listin to dia wod.'
"Di rish man kon sey, 'No, sir! Bot if pesin wey don die go mit dem, dem go turn from sin kom mit God.'
"Abraham ansa am, 'If dem nor gri listin to Mosis and di profets, dem nor go stil listin, ivun if pesin wey don die go bak go mit dem.'"
Jisos tel en disaipols, "Tins wey go mak pipol komit sin must hapun, bot e go bad wel-wel for di pesin wey go mak dem hapun!
"E beta mak dem tie big stone for di pesin neck, trow am for riva, dan sey e mak eni of dis smol-smol wons komit sin.
"Mak yu shine yor eye! If yor broda sin, mak yu tel am. If e turn from sin kom mit God, den, mak yu forgiv am.
"Ivun if e sin against yu sevun taims for won day and e kon tel yu sevun taims sey, 'I don shange', yu must forgiv am."
Di disaipols kon tel Jisos, "Wi beg! Mak yu mak awa fate strong."
Jisos ansa, "Ivun if una fate smol laik mustard sid, una go fit tel dis big tri sey, 'Mak yu komot from here go enta riva' and e go obey una.
"Wish of una go tel en savant wen e kom from farm afta e don fid di ship and melu finish sey, 'Kom sidan, mak yu folo mi chop'?
"No! Insted una go tel am, 'Priper my evenin fud and serv mi, mak I chop and drink. Wen I don finish, yu fit go chop yor own.'
"Di oga nor go tank di savant sey e du wetin e send am, abi e go du so?
"Na so tu e go bi wit una. Wen una don du all wetin dem send una, mak una sey, 'Na savant wi bi, wi nor rish mak dem praiz us, bikos wi jos du wetin wi sopoz to du.'"
As Jisos dey go Jerusalem, e kon pas di place wey divide Samaria and Galili.
As e dey enta won vilage, ten men wey get leprosi mit am for road. Dem stand for far,
kon dey shaut, "Oga Jisos! Wi beg, mak yu sori for us."
Wen Jisos si dem e kon sey, "Mak una go show unasef to di prists." And as dem dey go for road, dia bodi kon wel.
Wen won of dem si sey e don wel, e kon turn bak dey shaut dey praiz God.
E fal face groun for Jisos front kon dey tank am. (Di man na from Samaria.)
Den Jisos ask, "Nor bi ten pipol l heal? Wer di oda nain?
"Na onli dis man wey bi strenja fit kom bak kon praiz God?"
Den Jisos tel di man, "Get up mak yu dey go. Yor fate don mak yu wel."
Won day, di Farisi pipol kon ask Jisos wen God Kindom go kom. Jisos ansa, "God Kindom nor go kom wit sign wen pipol go si
and nobodi go fit sey, 'Si-am for here!' Or 'Si-am for der!' Bikos tru-tru, God Kindom don alredi dey wit una."
Den Jisos tel en disaipols, "Di taim dey kom wen una go won si Man Pikin, bot una nor go si-am.
"Dat taim, pipol go tel una, 'Si-am for der!' or 'Si-am for here!' Mak una nor folo dem.
"Bikos as thunda lite dey flash from won side go anoda for skai, na so Man Pikin go kom for en taim.
"Bot e must first sofa meni tins and di pipol for dis generashon go rejet am.
"As e bi for Noah taim, na so e go stil bi for Man Pikin taim.
"Dat taim, pipol dey chop and drink, ivun for di day wen Noah enta di ark, men and wimen stil dey mari, ontil wota kon distroi all of dem.
"Na so e stil bi for Lot taim, pipol dey chop and drink, dey buy and sel, dey plant and build haus;
bot di day wen Lot komot from Sodom, fire and sulfur fal laik rain from hevun kon kil all of dem.
"Na so e go bi for di day wen Man Pikin go show ensef.
"Dat day, enibodi wey dey on-top root for en haus, mak e nor go insaid haus go kari enitin and enibodi wey dey farm, mak e nor go bak to en haus.
"Mak una rimemba wetin hapun to Lot wife!
"Enibodi wey won kip en life, go luz am and enibodi wey luz en life, go save am .
"I tel una tru wod, dat nite, tu pipol go dey won bed, God go tak won kon liv di oda won.
"Tu wimen go dey grind pepper togeda; God go tak won kon liv di oda won.
"Tu pipol go dey farm dey wok; God go tak won kon liv di oda won."
Den di disaipols ask Jisos, "Oga, for wer dis tins go for hapun?" Jisos ansa, "Yu si, na wer dead bodi dey, na der vultures dey gada put."
Den Jisos tel dem won parabol to show sey, e gud mak pipol dey always pray.
E sey, "Won joj dey for won tawn wey nor dey fear God and e nor dey respet enibodi.
"For dat tawn, e get won wuman wey en husban don die. E kon go mit di joj kon beg am, 'Mak yu help mi, bikos som pipol dey shit mi.'
"Di joj nor first listin to am, bot afta, e tok for en maind sey, 'Aldoh I nor dey fear God and respet enibodi,
bot bikos dis wuman dey disturb mi, I go mak sure sey e get wetin e sopoz get, oda-wise e nor go let mi res wit dis en beggi-beggi wey nor dey finish.'"
Jisos sey, "If di wiked joj tok laik dis,
una nor tink sey God go help en pipol wey dey krai to am for day and nite? Abi, God go wait tey bifor E help dem?
"I tel una tru wod, God go help dem kwik-kwik. Bot, wen Man Pikin kom bak, e go si pipol wey get fate?"
Jisos kon tel dis parabol to som pipol wey biliv and feel sey, na dem holi pas and nobodi gud rish dem.
"Tu men go insaid Tempol go pray. Won na Farisi and di oda won na tax koletor.
"Di Farisi kon stand dey pray abaut ensef sey: 'God, I tank yu sey I nor bi laik oda pipol wey dey play wayo, dey sin, pipol wey dey komit adoltri or ivun laik dis tax koletor.
'I dey fast tu taims a wik and I dey pay won out of evri ten tins wey I get, giv Yu.'
"Bot di tax koletor stand for far place and e nor ivun luk hevun, bot kon nak en chest dey sey, 'God, mak yu sori for mi, bikos I bi sina!'
"I tel una tru wod, na di tax koletor God go forgiv, nor bi di Farisi. Bikos enibodi wey kari ensef go up, God go bring am dan, bot di pesin wey put ensef dan, God go kari am up."
Som pipol kon bring dia pikin mak Jisos tosh dem. Bot wen di disaipols si dem, dem kon bigin shaut for di pipol wey bring di shildren.
Bot Jisos kol di shildren kon sey, "Mak una alow di smol-smol shildren kom mit mi, nor stop dem, bikos na pipol laik dem get God Kindom.
"I tel una tru wod, enibodi wey nor risiv God Kindom laik smol pikin, nor go enta insaid."
Won day, won Ju oga ask Jisos, "Gud tisha, wetin I go du to get life wey nor dey end?"
Jisos kon tel am, "Why yu dey kol mi gud? Nobodi gud esept God.
"Yu no di komandment dem wey sey, 'Mak yu nor slip wit pesin wey nor bi yor husban or wife, nor kil pesin, nor tif, respet yor papa and mama.'"
Di man ansa Jisos, "I dey obey all dis law wit all my heart since I bi smol boy."

Wen Jisos hear wetin di man tok, e kon tel am, "E stil get won tin wey yu neva du, mak yu sel evritin wey yu get, giv di moni to poor pipol, den yu go get rishis for hevun. Afta dat, mak yu kom folo mi."
Wen di man hear dis won, e kon dey ves, bikos e rish wel-wel.
Wen Jisos no sey di man dey ves, e kon tel di pipol wey dey wit am, "E go hard wel-wel for pesin wey rish wel-wel to enta God Kindom!
E dey ezi for kamel to pas nido hol dan for pesin wey rish wel-wel to enta God Kindom."
Pipol wey hear dis wod kon sey, "Den hu God go save?"
Jisos ansa, "Wetin nor posibol for humanbin, dey posibol wit God."
Den Pita sey, "Oga, wi don liv evritin wey wi get kon folo yu!"
Jisos kon tel dem, "I tel una di trut, enibodi wey liv en haus, wife, brodas, papa, mama or pikin bikos of God Kindom,
God go bless am wit wetin pas all di tins wey e liv, both for dis wold and for di life wey dey kom."
Jisos kol di twef disaipols go kona kon tel dem, "Si, wi dey go Jerusalem and evritin wey di profets rite abaut Man Pikin go hapun for der.
"Bikos dem go gi-am to Gentai pipol and dem go laff, kos and spit for en bodi.
"Dem go flog am wel-wel and dem go kon kil-am. Bot for di ted day, e go wak-up."
Bot di twef disaipols nor undastand wetin Jisos tok, bikos God hide wetin e min from dem.
As Jisos near Jeriko, won man wey blind sidan for di road kona dey beg.
Wen e hear plenti pipol dey pas, e kon ask wetin dey hapun.
Dem kon tel am sey Jisos wey kom from Nazaret dey pas.
So di man kon dey shaut, "Jisos, David pikin, mak yu sori for mi -o-o!"
So di pipol wey dey en front kon dey shaut for am mak e kwayet, bot e kon dey shaut more-more, "David pikin, mak yu sori for mi -o-o!"
So Jisos stop kon sey mak dem bring di bega kom mit am. Wen di man kom, Jisos kon ask am,
"Wetin yu wont mak I du for yu?" Di man sey, "Oga, I won si again."
Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu si naw, yor fate don heal yu."
At wons, di man bigin si and e kon folo Jisos, dey praiz God. Wen di pipol si wetin hapun, dem kon bigin praiz God.
Jisos enta Jeriko kon waka go insaid di tawn.
For der, e get won man wey en name bi Zakius. E get moni wel-wel, bikos e bi tax koletors oga. E don tey wey e
dey won si Jisos, bot e nor fit si-am, bikos e bi short man and pipol too plenti.
So e run go klimb won sikamore tri mak e for fit si-am, bikos Jisos go pas dat road.
Wen Jisos rish dat place, e luk up kon sey, "Zakius, kom dan kwik-kwik, bikos I must stay for yor haus today."
So Zakius kom dan kon welkom Jisos wit hapines.
Wen di pipol si wetin hapun, dem kon dey komplain dey sey, "Jisos don go visit dat man wey bi sina."
Bot Zakius stop kon tel Jisos, "Oga si, I go giv haf of wetin I get to poor pipol and evribodi wey I don shit bifor, I go pay am bak for taims!"
Den Jisos sey, "Salvashon don kom dis haus today, bikos dis man na Abraham pikin tu.
"Man Pikin kom faind and save pipol wey loss bifor."
As Jisos dey waka near Jerusalem, e kon tel di pipol won parabol to show sey God Kindom nor go jos kom laik dat.
Jisos kon sey, "Won big man travol go won far kontri wer dem for won mak am king and afta, e kom bak.
Bifor e go, e kol ten of en savant kon giv ish won moni sey, 'Mak una tak dis moni trade and mak profit til I kom bak.'
"Bot e own pipol nor laik am, so dem kon send mesage folo am sey, 'Wi nor wont dis man to bi awa king!'
"Wen e kom bak afta e don get di kindom, e kon kol en savants wey e giv moni mak e for no haw mush dem don gain.
"So di first won stand for en front sey, 'Oga, I don gain ten koins join di wons wey yu giv mi.'
"Di oga kon tel am, 'Yu du wel, yu bi gud savant! Bikos yu dey fateful wit smol tin, I go mak yu oga ova ten tawns.'
"Den di sekon won sey, 'Oga, I don gain faiv koins join di wons wey yu giv mi.'
"So di oga tel am, 'Yu go bi oga for faiv tawns.'
"Den anoda savant kon sey, "Oga, si di moni wey yu giv mi. I kip am insaid klot.
"Bikos I dey fear and no sey yu hash wel-wel. Yu dey chop fud wey nor bi yor own and yu dey plok frut wey yu nor plant!'
"Di oga kon tel am, 'Na yor wod I go tak joj yu, yu wiked savant! So yu no sey, I bi hash man, dey chop fud wey nor bi my own and I dey plok frut wey I nor plant?
'Den why yu nor put my moni for bank, so dat wen I kom, I go kolet am wit intres wey go dey on-top?'
"Den di oga tel di oda savants, 'Mak una tak di moni from am, gi-am to di savant wey get ten.'
"Dem ansa, 'Oga, di man don alredi get ten!'
Di oga kon sey, "I tel una, enibodi wey get, God go gi-am more, bot di pesin wey nor get, ivun di smol won wey e get, God go tak am from am.'
"Bot doz my enimi wey nor wont mak I bi dia king, mak una go bring and kil dem for my front!"
Afta Jisos tok dis wod, e kon go Jerusalem.
Wen e rish Betpage and Betani, for di place wey dem dey kol Mount Olives, e kon send tu of en disaipols sey,
"Mak una go di vilage wey dey front. Wen una enta, una go si won smol donkey wey nobodi don sidan put bifor, wey dem tie for der. Mak una luz am kom giv mi.
"If enibodi ask una, 'Why una dey luz am?' Mak una ansa, 'Di oga nid am.'"
So di pipol wey dem send go, kon rish di place wey Jisos tel dem.
As dem dey luz di donkey, di owna kon ask dem, "Why una dey luz am?"
Dem kon ansa, "Di oga nid am."
Dem tak di donkey kon put dia klot on-top am, den Jisos sidan put.
As Jisos dey ride dey go, pipol kon spread dia klot for road.
As e dey enta di road wey go Mount Olives, all di disaipols kon dey hapi, dey praiz God wit loud vois for all di mirakols wey dem si.
"God don bless di king wey dey kom wit en name! Mak peace dey for hevun and mak all di glori bi God own!"
Bot som Farisi pipol wey dey among di pipol kon tel Jisos, "Tisha, mak yu tel yor disaipols mak dem kwayet."
Jisos kon ansa, I tel una tru wod, if dem kwayet, ivun stones go start to dey shaut!"
Wen Jisos near Jerusalem, e luk di tawn kon dey krai,
den e kon sey, "I wish sey una no wetin go giv una peace today! Bot naw, God don hide am from una.
"Taim go kom wen una enimis go suroun una for evri kona kon blok una road.
"Dem go distori una and una shildren and dem nor go liv won blok on-top anoda, bikos di taim wen God kom visit una, una nor no."
Jisos enta di Tempol kon driv all di pipol wey dey sel tins for der,
e kon sey, "God wod sey, 'My haus na praya haus', bot una don turn am to haus wer tif dey hide put!"
Jisos kon dey tish evriday for di Tempol. Di prist oga dem, di law tishas wit di big lidas among di pipol kon dey faind haw dem go tak kil Jisos.
Bot dem nor get eni shanse, bikos pipol dey listin to wetin Jisos dey tish.
Won day wen Jisos dey tish pipol for di Tempol, di prist oga dem and di law tishas kon mit am,
dey sey, "Mak yu tel us, na wish pawa yu tak dey du dis tins? Na hu giv yu di pawa sef?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Mak I stil ask una won kweshon and mak una ansa mi.
Jon baptism kom from hevun, abi na from pipol?"
Dem kon dey tok wit ish oda sey, "If wi sey na from hevun, e go sey, 'Den why una nor biliv am?'
"Bot if wi sey, 'Na from pipol', dis pipol go stone us, bikos dem biliv sey, Jon na profet."
So dem kon tel Jisos sey dem nor no wer di baptism from kom.
Den Jisos tel dem, "Mi tu nor go tel una hu giv mi di pawa to du all dis tins."
Jisos kon tel di pipol won parabol: "Won man rent en grape farm giv tenants, den e travol.
"Wen havest taim rish, e kon send won savant go mit di tenants mak dem gi-am en share from di havest. Bot di tenants beat di savant kon send am go bak wit empti hand.
"So e send anoda savant and dem stil beat and du-am enihaw, den dem kon send am bak wit empti hand.
"Di man kon send di ted savant go, bot di tenants wound am kon trow am outsaid tu.
"So di owna of di grape farm kon sey, 'Wetin I go du naw? I go send di onli pikin wey I get, may bi dem go respet am."
"Bot wen di tenant si di pikin, dem kon sey, 'Na di owna pikin dey kom so, mak wi kil-am, so dat-all di propati go bi awa own!'
"Dem kari di pikin go outsaid, kon kil-am. So, wetin una tink sey di owna go du di tenants?
"E go kom distroi all dis tenant, den giv di grape farm to new tanants. Wen di pipol hear dis, dem kon sey, 'Mak dis tin nor hapun o-o!'"
Bot Jisos luk dem for face kon ask, "Wetin God wod min wen e sey: 'Di stone wey di buildas rejet, don turn to di main stone?'
"Enibodi wey fal for dis stone, go break into pisis and di pesin wey di stone fal press, go die."
Den di Farisi pipol and di law tishas won kon arres Jisos for dat place, bikos dem no sey Jisos dey tok against dem. Bot dem dey fear di pipol.
Den di Farisi pipol and di law tishas kon dey wosh Jisos wel-wel. Dem send som pipol go pritend laik sey dem dey folo Jisos, so dat dem go fit yuz en wod against am, kon ripot am to di Roman Govnor.
So dem ask am, "Tisha, wi no sey wetin yu dey tok koret and yu nor dey du wayo, bikos yu dey tish di trut abaut God.
"Mak yu tel us, 'E gud mak wi pay tax giv Caesar?'"
Bot Jisos no sey na trap, so e kon tel dem,
"Mak una show mi di moni. Wish pesin face and name dey?" Dem ansa, "Na Caesar own."
So Jisos tel dem, "Den mak una giv Caesar wetin bi Caesar own and mak una giv God wetin bi God own."
So dem nor fit get-am wit en wod for di pipol present. Dem sopraiz for di ansa wey e giv and dem nor fit tok again.
Den som Sadusi pipol (wey nor biliv sey pipol go wak-up from deat) kom mit Jisos,
dey sey, "Tisha, Mosis law sey, 'If pesin die liv en wife and di wuman nor born for am, en broda must mari di wuman wey en husban don die, so dat e go born shildren for di broda wey don die.'
"E get won famlili wey get sevun brodas. Di first won mari, bot dem nor born bifor di man die.
"Den di sekon won kon mari di wuman,
den di ted won, ontil numba sevun die tu, bot di wuman nor stil born for eni of dem.
"At last, di wuman kon die tu.
"For di day wey pipol go wak-up from deat, wish pesin wife di wuman go bi, since all di sevun brodas mari am?"
So Jisos ansa dem, "Pipol for di wod naw dey mari.
"Bot di pipol wey God go wak-up from deat kari go hevun, nor go mari.
En short, dem go bi laik angels, dem nor go die again. Dem go bi God shildren, bikos dem don wak-up from deat.
"Bot ivun Mosis tok sey pipol wey don die go wak-up. Mosis tok laik dis wen e rite abaut haw e kol God, Abraham, Izik and Jakop God, wen e dey di bush wey dey burn.'
"Awa God nor bi God for dead pipol, bot na God wey dey alaif, bikos for God eye, evribodi dey alaif."
Den som law tishas ansa, "Tisha, yu don tok wel!"
So dem nor dare ask Jisos kweshon again.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Wetin mak dem sey Mezaya na David pikin?
"Bikos David ensef tok for Psalm Book sey, 'Di OGA tel my oga sey, "Sidan for my rite hand,
ontil I go put yor enimis unda yor leg. "'
"If David kol am 'Oga,' haw e kon tak bi David pikin?"
As all di pipol dey listin, Jisos kon tel en disaipols,
"Mak una gaid unasef from di law tishas. Dem laik to dey waka wit long klot mak pipol dey shaut dia name for market and chairs wey beta pas for singog, na der dem dey laik to sidan.
Dem dey sofa wimen wey dia husban don die and kolet dia tins kon dey pray long praya mak pipol for si dem. Na dia ponishment go big pas."
For insaid di Tempol, Jisos kon si rish pipol dey put dia moni for ofrin box.
E stil si won poor wuman wey en husban don die dey put tu koins insaid di box.
Jisos kon sey, "I tel una tru wod, di moni wey dis poor widow put so, big pas all di oda pipol own;
bikos di rish pipol giv dia ofrin from di plenti moni wey dem get, bot as dis wuman poor rish, e put evritin wey e get."
As som pipol dey tok abaut haw di Tempol fine rish, bikos of di stones wey dem tak build am and di ofrin wey pipol dey giv, Jisos kon sey,
"Di day dey kom wen all di stones wey una dey si so, go skata and won nor go dey on-top anoda again."
So, dem kon ask am, "Tisha, wen dis tins go hapun? And wetin go bi di sign sey di taim for dis tins to hapun don rish?"
Jisos ansa, "Mak una shine una eye, so dat nobodi go disiv una. Bikos meni pipol go kom prish wit my name sey, 'Na mi bi Jisos' or 'Di taim don near.' Mak una nor folo dem!
"And wen una hear rumor abaut war and wahala, mak una nor fear. Bikos all dis tins go first hapun, bot dat nor min sey di end don rish."
Den Jisos tel dem, "Kontri go fite kontri, kindom go fite kindom.
"Strong eartquake, hunga and siknes go dey evriwer; difren-difren tins and bad signs go dey hapun and fear go kash evribodi.

"Bot bifor dem go hapun, dem go arres and ponish una for wetin una nor du, dem go kari una go joj for insaid sinagog, den dem go trow una insaid prizin. Dem go kari una go mit kings and govnors, bikos of my name.
"Dis na di taim for una to spread di Gud News.
"So mak una redi una maind bifor di taim rish. Mak una nor tink haw una go tak difend unasef,
bikos I go giv una di wod wey una go tok and wisdom wey una enimi nor go fit opoz.
"Una papa, mama, brodas, rilashons and frends go sey dem nor no una and dem go ivun kil som of una.
"Evribodi go hate una bikos of my name.
"Bot God eye go always dey wosh una.
"So, if una stand rish di end, God go save una."
"Bot wen una si sey sojas don suroun Jerusalem, mak una no sey di taim wey dem go distroi Jerusalem, don near.
"So, mak di pipol wey dey Judea run go mountin and doz wey dey insaid tawn must komot der. Mak doz wey dey outsaid, nor enta di tawn again,
bikos na dat taim God go joj di wold, since evritin wey dem rite for God wod, must hapun.
"Dat taim, e go bad wel-wel for wimen wey get bele or get smol pikin for hand! Strong wahala go kom for dis land and God ponishment go fal for pipol head.
"Dem go yuz sword kil som, kari som as prizina go anoda kontri and di Gentai pipol go destroi Jerusalem, ontil di taim wey God sey Izrel must sofa, go end.
"Difren-difren signs go show for sun, moon and star. For insaid dis wold, pipol for difren kontris go dey wori and fear, bikos of di way rivas go dey move and wota go dey rush from sea enta land.
"Pipol go dey fent and fear go dey kash som, bikos of wetin dey hapun for di wold and difren pawas insaid di skai, go shake komot for wer dem dey.
"Den, dem go si Man Pikin dey kom insaid kloud wit pawa and glori.
"So, wen dis tins dey hapun, mak una stand and dey redi, bikos una salvashon don near."
Den, Jisos kon tel dem dis parabol: "Mak una tink abaut di fig tri and all di oda tris.
"Wen dia leaf start to fal komot, mak una no sey dry season don near.
"Na so una go stil no tu. Wen una si all dis tins dey hapun, una go no sey God Kindom don near.
"I tel una tru wod, di pipol for dis wold naw nor go die finish bifor all dis tins go hapun.
"Hevun and eart go vanish komot, bot my wod go dey foreva.
"So, mak una shine una eye! Nor let parti and wahala for dis life ful una maind, if not, dat Day go kom wen una nor espet,
bikos dat Day go sopraiz evribodi wey dey for dis wold.
"Bot mak una dey shine una eye evritiam, dey pray mak God giv una pawa tak pas all dis tests wey go hapun, so dat una go fit stand for Man Pikin front."
So, Jisos kon dey tish for di Tempol evriday, bot wen nite rish, e go-go Mount Olives.
For earli mornin, all di pipol dey go listin to am insaid di Tempol.
Taim kon rish for Bread (wey nor get yist) Fist, wey dem dey kol Passova.
Di prist oga dem and di law tishas dey fine haw dem go tak kil Jisos, bot dem dey fear di pipol.
So, Satan kon enta insaid Judas Iskarot, won of Jisos twef disaipols.
E kon go tel di ofisa wey dey gaid di Tempol sey e go sel Jisos giv dem.
Dem hapi wel-wel kon promis am sey dem go giv am moni.
Judas gri and e kon bigin faind sikrit way to sel Jisos giv dem, so dat pipol nor go no.
Di day for di Bread (wey nor get yist) Fist, wen dem dey kil ship for sakrifais, kon rish.
Jisos tel Pita and Jon, "Mak una go priper di Passova fud wey wi go chop."
Dem kon ask, "Na for wer yu wont mak wi priper am?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Listin, wen una enta di tawn, una go mit won man wey kari wota pot, mak una folo am enta di haus wey e go enta,
mak una tel di pesin wey get di haus sey, "Di Tisha sey mak wi ask yu, 'Wer di room wey mi and my disaipols go for chop di Passova fud?'
"E go show una won big room wer tabol and chair dey for upstairs. Mak una priper evritin for der."
Wen dem go, dem kon si evritin as Jisos tel dem sey e go bi, so dem priper di Passova fud for der.
Wen di taim rish, Jisos sidan for wer dem dey chop and en disaipols kon join am.
Jisos tel dem, "I rili won chop dis Passova fud wit una bifor I go sofa.
"Bikos I tel una, I nor go chop am again, ontil evritin don komplit for God Kindom."
Den Jisos tak won cup wey get wine, afta e tank God, e kon sey, "Mak una tak dis cup and divide am among unasef.
"Bikos I tel una, from naw go, I nor go drink dis wine again, ontil God Kindom go kom."
Den Jisos tak bread, afta e tank God, e divide am kon gi-am to dem sey, "Na my bodi bi dis, wey God don giv una. Mak una dey always du dis tin to tak rimemba mi."
Laik dat, Jisos stil tak di cup afta dem don chop finish kon sey, "Dis cup wey God giv una, na di new agriment wit my blood."
"Una si, di pesin wey go sel mi giv my enimi dey chop wit mi for dis tabol.
"Bikos Man Pikin go die as God plan am, bot kos dey for di pesin head wey go sel am!"
So di disaipols kon bigin ask ish oda wish of dem go sel Jisos.
Dem kon dey kworel among diasef sey wish of dem big pas.
So Jisos tel dem, "Gentai kings dey giv dia pipol orda, yet di pipol stil dey kol dem, 'Pipol Frends.'
"Bot una nor sopoz to bi laik dat; di pesin wey important among una, must du laik sey naim smol pas and di lida, go bi laik savant.
"Na hu big pas? Di pesin wey sidan for tabol dey chop or di pesin wey dey serv am? Nor bi di won wey sidan for tabol? Bot I dey du laik savant among una.
"Na una stay wit mi wen I dey pas tru wahala.
"So, I giv una pawa to rule, jos as my Papa don giv mi.
"For my kindom, una go sidan chop and drink for my tabol and una go sidan for difren thrones dey joj di twef tribes for Izrel.
"Saimon! Saimon! Mak yu listin! God don alow Satan mak e test all of una, so dat God go fit seprate bad pipol from di gud wons.
"Bot Saimon, I don pray for yu mak yor fate nor for fail. Wen yu don turn bak kom mit God, mak yu help yor brodas tu."
Pita kon ansa, "Oga, I dey redi to folo yu go prizin and ivun die wit yu."
Jisos sey, "Pita, mak I tel yu di trut, fawo nor go du 'Kukuruku' dis nite ontil yu don tok tiri taims sey yu nor no mi."
Den Jisos tel dem, "Wen I send una go out, witout moni, bag or sandals, e get enitin wey una nid wey una nor get?" Dem ansa, "No!"
E kon tel dem, "Bot naw, pesin wey get moni or travolin bag must kari am. And pesin wey nor get sword must sel en klot kon yuz di moni by won. .
"Bikos I tel una, wetin dem rite for God wod abaut mi must hapun sey, 'Dem kount am join kriminas.' Bikos wetin God rite abaut mi dey hapun naw."
Di disaipols kon sey, "Oga, si tu sword for here." Jisos ansa, "E don du."
Den Jisos komot, kon waka as e dey always du, go Mount Olives and en disaipols folo am.
Wen dem rish der, Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una pray so dat una nor go fal enta temtashon."
Den e liv dem, waka go far smol, kon nil dan dey pray,
"Papa, if Yu laik to du-am, mak Yu let dis sofa-cup pas mi. Bot mak e bi as Yu wont, nor bi as I wont am."
Won angel apier from hevun kon giv Jisos pawa.
Bikos Jisos dey strogol wel-wel for maind, e kon pray sotey en sweat kon bi laik blood.
Wen e pray finish, e go mit en disaipols kon si sey dem dey slip, bikos dem don taya wel-wel.
So Jisos tel dem, "Why una dey slip? Mak una get up pray, so dat una nor go fal enta temtashon!"
As Jisos stil dey tok, at wons som pipol kom and na Judas lid dem. E waka go mit Jisos kon kiss am for face.
So Jisos ask am, "Judas, na kiss yu tak sel Man Pikin?"
Wen doz wey dey near Jisos si wetin won hapun, dem ask, "Oga, mak wi yuz awa sword?"
Den won of dem atak di prist savant kon kut en rite ear komot.
Bot Jisos shaut for am mak e stop, den tosh di man ear kon heal am.
Den Jisos ask di prist oga dem, di offisas wey dey gaid di Tempol and di eldas wey kom mit am sey, "Una kari sword and wud laik sey una dey kom arres tif?
"Since wen I dey wit una for di Tempol una nor arres mi. Bot na una taim bi dis, di taim wey daknes pawa go rule."
Den dem arres Jisos, kari am go di High Prist haus. Bot Pita dey folo dem for bak-bak.
Wen dem don mak fire for di kompon senta kon sidan togada, Pita sidan wit di pipol tu.
Won savant girl si Pita sidan near di fire, e luk am for eye kon sey, "Dis man bin dey wit Jisos tu o-o.'
Bot Pita sey, "Wuman! Nor bi mi, I nor no am."
Afta somtaim, anoda pesin si-am kon sey, "Yu bi won of dem, nor bi so?" Bot Pita sey, "My frend! I nor bi won of dem o-o."
Wen won hour don pas, anoda pesin kon sey, "I sey dis man dey wit dem, bikos en tu kom from Galili."
Bot Pita sey, "Oga! I nor no wetin yu dey tok." At wons, as e stil dey tok, naim won fawo du, 'Kukuruku'.
Den Jisos turn luk Pita for eye and Pita kon rimemba di wod wey Jisos tel am, "Bifor fawo go du 'Kukuruku' dis nite, yu go don tok tiri taims sey yu nor no mi."
Den Pita kon go outsaid, bigin krai.
Di gaids bigin laff Jisos kon beat am enihaw.
Dem tie en eye kon dey ask am, "Oya profesai! Na hu nak yu so?"
Dem stil kos am wit difren wods.
Wen morinin rish, di eldas wit di prist oga dem and di law tishas kon gada. Den dem tak Jisos go dia kansol
kon tel am sey, "If yu no sey na yu bi Kraist, mak yu tel us." Bot Jisos ansa, "If I tel una, una nor go biliv mi
and if I ask una kweshon, una nor go gri ansa.
"Bot from naw go, Man Pikin go sidan for God rite hand wer pawa dey."
All of dem kon ask, "So, yu bi God Pikin?" Jisos ansa, "Na una tok am."
Den dem kon sey, "Why wi nid anoda witnes? Wi don hear am from en own mout!"
Den di Farisi pipol and di oda pipol tak Jisos go mit Pilate,
dey akius am sey, "Wi hear dis man wen e dey disiv and tel awa pipol sey mak dem nor pay tax giv Caesar and e dey tok sey naim bi Kraist, wey bi king."
Pilate kon ask Jisos, "Na yu bi di Ju pipol king?" Jisos ansa, "Na as yu tok."
Den Pilate tel di prist oga dem and di pipol, "I nor si enitin wey go mak mi kondem dis man."
Bot dem stil sey, "E dey kause wahala wit wetin e dey tish pipol for Judea. E start am for Galili and naw e don kom here!"
Wen Pilate hear dis won, e kon ask weda Jisos na Galili pesin.
Wen e hear sey Jisos kom from Jerusalem, wer Herod dey rule for dat taim, e kon sey mak dem tak Jisos go mit am.
Wen Herod si Jisos, e hapi wel-wel, bikos e don tey wen e won si-am since e hear abaut am. E dey hope sey Jisos go du mirakol for en present.
Herod kon ask Jisos meni kweshon, bot Jisos nor ansa am at-all.
Di prist oga dem and di law tishas dey akius Jisos wit vesnashon.
Herod wit en sojas tu dey tak Jisos mak yeye and dey laff am. Den Herod sey mak dem wear fine klot for Jisos bodi, den tak am go bak go mit Pilate.
Dat day, Herod and Pilate kon bi frends, bikos bifor dis taim dem bi strong enimi.
Den Pilate kol di prist oga dem, di eldas and di pipol for dat place
kon tel dem, "Una bring dis man kom mit mi sey e dey disiv pipol. Wen I ask am kweshon for una present, I nor si eni bad tin wey una sey e du.
"Ivun Herod nor stil si enitin tu, so e sey mak dem bring am kom mit us. Dis man nor du enitin wey go mak am die.
"So I go giv orda mak dem flog am, den I go fri am."
(Na dia tradishon sey Pilate must riliz won prizina enitaim wen dem dey du Passova Fist.)
Bot all of dem kon dey shaut, "Tak dis man komot! Na Barabbas wi wont!"
(Barabbas na pesin wey dem put for prizin bikos e kause wahala and kil pesin for di tawn.)
Pilate kon tok to dem again, bikos e won fri Jisos.
Bot dem stil dey shaut, "Kil-am trowey, Kil-am trowey!"
Again Pilate kon ask dem, "Why? Wish bad tin e du? I nor si eni bad tin wey e du wey go mak am die, so I go giv orda mak dem flog am, den I go fri am."
Bot dem kon shaut more-more dey sey, "Kil-am trowey." Dem shaut sotey Pilate kon du wetin dem wont.
So Palite kon orda mak en sojas giv Jisos to di pipol mak dem kil-am.
E kon fri Barabbas, wey di pipol wont, wey dem bin put for prizin, bikos e kause wahala and kil pesin for di tawn.
As dem dey tak Jisos komot, dem kon kash won man wey dey kom from Syrene and en name na Saimon. Dem put di kros for en bak mak e kari am folo Jisos.
Meni pipol folo Jisos and di wimen among dem kon dey krai.
Bot Jisos turn luk dem sey, "Jerusalem wimen, mak una nor krai bikos of mi, bot mak una krai for unasef and for una shildren.,
"Bikos tru-tru, di taim dey kom wen pipol go sey, 'E gud wel-wel for wimen wey nor born or fid pikin at-all!'
"Den, dem go tel di mountins, 'Mak yu fal on-top us!' And tel di hills, 'Mak yu kova us!'
"Bot if dem du dis kaind tin for wud wen e stil fresh, wetin go hapun wen di wud don dry?"
Dem stil tak tu oda men wey bi tif, wey dem wont kil, folo Jisos.
Wen dem rish di place wey dem dey kol, "Di Skul," dem kon nail Jisos for kros wit di tu tif, won for en left and di oda for en rite side.
(Den Jisos kon sey, "Papa, mak Yu forgiv dem, bikos dem nor no wetin dem dey du.") So, di sojas kon gambol to no hu go tak Jisos klot.
Di pipol stil stand der dey luk, bot dia ledas dey laff Jisos sey, "E save oda pipol. Mak e save ensef if e bi di Mezaya wey God shuz!"
Di sojas stil dey laff Jisos and dem kon gi-am wine wey don sawa mak e drink,
den sey, "If yu bi di Ju pipol king, mak yu save yorsef!"
Dem kon rite on-top en kros sey, "Dis na, 'Ju Pipol King.'"
Won of di tif dey shaut for Jisos, "Nor bi yu bi di Mezaya? Mak yu save yorsef and us naw!"
Bot di oda tif kon shaut for di first tif, "Yu nor dey fear God as e bi sey na di same ponishment wi dey sofa?
"Na dis ponishment fit us, bikos na wetin wi du naim mak dem dey ponish us so. Bot dis man nor du eni bad tin."
Den e kon tel Jisos, "Wen yu rish yur kindom, mak yu rimemba mi!"
Jisos ansa am, "I tel yu di trut, today yu go dey wit mi for paradaiz."
By naw, twef o' klok don nearli rish for aftanun and daknes kon kova di hol kontri ontil tiri o' klok for dat aftanun,
bikos sun stop to shine. Di Tempol kurtain kon tear into tu.
So, Jisos shaut, "Papa, I put my spirit for yor hand!" Afta e tok finish, e kon die.
Wen di soja oga si wetin hapun, e kon praiz God sey, "Tru-tru, dis man na gud pesin!"
So wen all di pipol wey gada dey luk si wetin hapun, dem kon dey krai go dia haus.
And evribodi wey no Jisos bifor, stand for far and di wimen wey folo Jisos kom from Galili, si di tins wey hapun.
E get won man for di kansol, wey bi Josef and e kom from Arimatia wey dey Judea. E bi beta pesin wey dey du wetin God laik and e dey wait for di taim wen God Kindom go kom.
(E nor gri wit di oda kansol membas wit dia plan and for wetin dem du so.)
E go mit Pilate kon ask for Jisos dead bodi.
Den e kari di bodi from di kros, wrap am wit linen klot kon put am for di grave wey e dig insaid rock and dem neva bere enibodi for der bifor.
Dat day na Friday wen dem dey redi for Sabat serimoni.
Di wimen wey folo Jisos from Galili kon folo Josef go si di grave. So dem put Jisos bodi insaid.
Den di wimen go haus go priper beta perfume. Bot for Sabat Day, dem kon res as Mosis law tok.
For earli mornin for di first day for di wik, di wimen kari di perfume wey dem priper go di grave wer dem bere Jisos put.
Dem kon si sey dem don rol di stone komot from di grave mout,
bot wen dem enta insaid, dem nor si Jisos bodi for der.
As dem dey konfuz bikos of dis tin, dem kon si tu men wey dia klot dey shine laik lite and dem stand for kona.
Fear kash di wimen and dem kon face groun. Bot di men tel dem, "Why una dey faind pesin wey dey aliaf for wer dead bodi dey?
"E nor dey here again, God don wak-am! Una rimemba wetin e tel una wen e dey Galili sey,
'Dem must sel Man Pikin giv wiked pipol and dem go kil-am trowey and for di ted day, e go wak-up.'"
Den di wimen kon rimemba wetin Jisos tel dem,
so dem komot from di grave kon go tel di ilevun apostols and di res pipol wetin hapun.
Na Mary Magdalene, Joana, Mary wey bi James mama and di oda wimen wey dey wit dem, na dem tel di apostols all dis tins.
Bot dia wod nor min enitin to di apostols, so dem nor biliv di wimen.
Bot Pita kon get-up, run go di grave. E ben-dan luk insaid and e si onli di klot, den e kon go haus dey wonda wetin hapun.
Dat day, tu Jisos disaipols dey waka go won vilage wey dem dey kol Emmaus, wey nor tu far from Jerusalem.
Dem dey tok to ish oda abaut di tins wey hapun.
As dem dey tok, Jisos kon bigin waka wit dem,
(bot Jisos nor let dem no hu e bi.)
Den Jisos kon ask dem, "Na wetin mak una dey tok laik dis for road?" Dem kon stand for won place, dey sopraiz for am.
Den won of dem, wey en name bi Kleopas, kon ask am, "Na onli yu bi strenja for Jerusalem wey nor no di tins wey dey hapun since?"
Jisos ansa dem,"Wish tins?" Dem ansa, "Di tins abaut Jisos wey kom from Nazaret, won man wey wetin e dey tok and du show sey en na God profet
and haw awa prist oga dem and di pipol wey dey rule us kil-am trowey.
"Bot wi bin hope sey naim go fri Izrel and dis tins don hapun for tiri days naw.
"Som wimen wey dey wit us kon ivun sopraiz us. Dem go wer dem bere am put dis mornin
and dem nor si en bodi for der. Dem kom bak dey tok sey dem si angels wey tel dem sey Jisos dey alaif.
"Den som pipol wey dey wit us kon go di grave and dem si evritin as di wimen tok, bot dem nor si Jisos."
So Jisos tel dem, "Una nor get sense and una nor dey kwik biliv wetin all di profets tok.
"Dem nor tok sey di Mezaya go must sofa all dis tins and den e go enta en glori?"
Den e kon yuz wetin Mosis and all di profets rite tak tel dem wetin God tok abaut am for en wod.
As dem near di vilage wey dem dey go, Jisos kon du laik sey e won waka go front,
bot dem kon tel am, "Mak yu stay wit us, bikos evenin don nearli rish and day go soon dak." So Jisos enta di vilage kon folo dem stay.
E sidan for wer dem dey chop, tak bread, bless am kon divide am giv dem.
At wons dia eye opun and dem kon no am. Den e vanish from dia front.
Dem kon tel ish oda, "No wonda e bi laik sey fire dey burn insaid awa heart wen e dey tok wit us for road abaut God!"
So dem get up at wons go bak to Jerusalem. Dem kon si di ilevun apostols and di oda pipol wey dey wit dem
kon tel dem, "Jisos don rili wak-up and e don apier to Saimon!"
Den dem kon tok wetin hapun for road and haw dem tak no Jisos wen e divide di bread.
As dem stil dey tok, Jisos kon stand wit dem, tel dem, "Mak peace dey wit una."
Bot dem shok and fear kash dem, bikos dem tink sey na spirit dem dey si.
Den Jisos kon sey, "Why una dey fear and nor biliv?
"Mak una luk my hand and leg and mak una tosh mi: spirit nor get flesh and bone as una si sey I get."
Wen Jisos don tok dis won, e kon show dem en hand and leg.
And as dem neva stil biliv (bikos of dia hapines) and stil dey sopraiz, Jisos ask dem, "Una get enitin to chop for here?"
So dem kon gi-am fish wey dem don kook,
e kon tak am chop for dia front.
Den Jisos tel dem, "Na di wod wey I tel una wen I stil dey wit una bi dis, evritin wey dem rite abaut mi for Mosis law, di profets books and Psalm, must hapun."
Den e opun dia maind so dat dem go fit undastand God wod
kon tel dem, "Na wetin dem rite bi dis, 'Di Mezaya go sofa and e go wak-up from deat for di ted day
and dem go yuz en name prish giv pipol mak dem for turn from dia sin kom mit God and di prishin go start from Jerusalem.
"Una bi witnes for dis tins.
"I dey send wetin my Papa promis kom mit una. So mak una stay for dis tawn ontil pawa go kom from hevun kon kova una."
Den Jisos tak dem go Betani kon lift en hand and bless dem.
As e dey bless dem, God kon kari-am go hevun.
So, dem woship am kon go bak to Jerusalem dey hapi wel-wel
and dem kon dey go di Tempol evritaim, dey praiz God.
From wen taim bigin naim di Wod dey and di Wod dey wit God and na God ensef bi di Wod.
Di Wod dey wit God from wen taim bigin.
Naim mak evritin and if to sey E nor mak dem, dem nor for dey dis wold at-all.
Na insaid am life dey and na dat life bi di lite wey pipol get.
Di lite dey shine insaid daknes, bot daknes nor gri wit am.
E get won man wey en name bi Jon, wey God send kom dis wold.
E kom bear witnes for di lite, mak evribodi for fit get di shanse to biliv wetin God tok tru en wod.
Nor bi Jon ensef bi di lite, bot e kom tel pipol abaut Jisos wey bi di lite.
Na Jisos bi di tru lite wey go shine for evribodi for dis wold.
E kom insaid di wold wey ensef mak, bot di pipol nor no am.
E kom mit en own pipol, bot dem nor wont am.
Bot evribodi wey risiv and biliv en name, e go giv dem di rite to bi God pikin.
Dem go bi God shildren, nor bi as dia mama and papa tak born dem from bele, or bikos sombodi mak dem so, bot bikos God ensef mak dem en own shildren.
Den di Wod kon shange to pesin and e stay wit us for dis wold. Wi si en glori wey show sey, naim bi di onli pikin wey get koret favor and trut, wey God send kom mit us.
Jon kon bigin shaut sey, "Dis na di pesin wey I tel una abaut sey, 'Di pesin wey go kom afta mi, big pas mi, bikos e dey bifor mi.'"
Evribodi for dis wold don risiv plenti gud tins from am.
Na tru Mosis God giv us di law, bot God giv us favor and trut, tru Jisos Kraist.
Nobodi don fit si God face bifor. Bot Jisos, wey bi God ensef, wey en and en Papa bi tait frend, na-im kom show us haw God bi.
Di Ju oga dem send prists and Levi pipol mak dem go ask Jon sey, "Hu yu bi sef?"
E ansa dem, "I nor dey lai, bikos nor bi mi bi di Kraist."
Den dem ask am, "So, na hu yu bi? Abi yu bi Elija?" E kon sey, "No, I nor bi Elija." Dem kon ask am again, "Yu bi di profet?" E ansa, "No-o-o!"
Again, dem ask am, "Hu yu bi sef? Mak yu tel us, so dat wi go no wetin to tel di pipol wey send us. Hu yu sey yu bi?"
Jon kon sey, "Na mi bi dat vois wey dey shaut insaid widanes sey, 'Mak una mak di road wey pipol go pas go mit God strate wel-wel', as Profet Isaia tok bifor.'"
(Na di Farisi pipol send dis pipol go mit Jon).
Dem kon ask Jon sey, "Why yu dey baptize pipol, if yu nor bi di Kraist or Elija or di Profet?"
Jon kon tel dem, "I dey baptize pipol wit wota, bot among una, won pesin dey wey una nor no.
"E go kom afta mi. I nor rish to luz di rope wey dey en shu."
All dis tins hapun for Betani wer pipol dey kros Jordan Riva kom mit Jon, mak e baptize dem.
Wen day break, Jon si Jisos dey waka kom mit am, den Jon sey, "Mak una luk! Dis na di Ship wey God send kom die, mak God for forgiv us awa sins".
Na dis pesin I tel una sey, "Afta mi, won man wey big pas mi go kom, bikos e dey bifor mi.
"Misef nor no am bifor, bot I dey baptize pipol wit wota, so dat God go show Izrel pipol hu Jisos bi."
Den Jon bear witnes sey, "I si God Spirit wey kom dan laik dove from hevun kon stay for Jisos head.
"I nor no am bifor, bot di pesin wey send mi kom baptize wit wota tel mi sey, 'Di pesin wey yu go si God Spirit kom stay on-top en head, na-im go baptize pipol wit Holi Spirit.'
"I don si-am and I bear witnes sey, 'Dis man na di pesin wey God shuz.'"
Wen day break, Jon wit en tu disaipol stand for outsaid.
Dem kon dey luk Jisos wen e dey waka pas, den Jon kon sey, "Mak una luk! Na dat pesin bi God Ship."
Wen Jon tu disaipols hear wetin e tok, dem kon folo Jisos.
Jisos luk bak kon si di disaipols dey folo am. Den e ask dem, "Wetin una wont?" Dem ansa am, "Oga, (wey min Tisha) wer yu dey stay?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Mak una kom si-am." So dem go si di place wey e dey stay kon stay wit am dat day. Dat taim na abaut for o' klok for aftanun.
Andru, Saimon Pita broda, na won of di disaipols wey hear wetin Jon tok and wey folo Jisos.
E first go faind en broda Saimon kon tel am, "Wi don si di Mezaya", (wey min Kraist).
Andru kon bring Saimon kom mit Jisos. Wen Jisos si-am, e kon tel am, "Yu bi Saimon, Jon pikin, na Sefas (wey min Pita) pipol go dey kol yu from today go."
Wen day break, Jisos kon plan to go Galili. Wen e si Fillip, e tel am, "Mak yu folo mi."
Fillip na from Betsaida, wey bi Andru and Pita home-tawn.
Wen Fillip si Nataniel, e tel am, "Wi don si di pesin wey Mosis and di profets rite abaut for dia book sey, 'En name na Jisos, wey en home-tawn bi Nazaret and na Josef pikin e bi.'"
Nataniel kon sey, "Beta tin go fit kom out from Nazaret?" Fillip ansa am, "Mak yu kom si."
Wen Jisos si Nataniel dey waka kom mit am, e kon sey, "Mak una luk! Dis na beta pesin wey kom from Izrel, wayo nor dey en bele."
Nataniel kon ask am, "Haw yu tak no mi." Jisos ansa, "Bifor Fillip kol yu wen yu dey unda di tri, I don si yu."
Nataniel sey, "Tisha, tru-tru, yu bi God Pikin and na yu bi Izrel king."
Jisos kon tel am, "Bikos I tel yu sey I si yu unda di fig tri, yu biliv wetin I tok? Bikos yu biliv, yu go si wetin big pas dis won."
Den e kon sey, "Wetin I dey tel una na tru wod, una go si hevun opun and God angels go dey waka up-and-dan on-top God Pikin."
Wen tiri days don pas, Mary, wey bi Jisos mama, go won marage for Kana, wey dey for Galili.
Dem invait Jisos and en disaipol for di marage tu.
Wen wine finish, Jisos mama kon tel am, "Dia wine don finish."
Jisos ansa am, "Mama, why yu dey tel mi dis? My taim neva rish."
So en mama kon tel di savants sey, "Enitin wey e tel una, mak una du-am."
For dat place, sis big wota pot dey and ish won fit kontain abaut twenti to tati gallon for wota, wey di Ju pipol dey yuz wosh leg as dia tradishon tok.
Jisos kon tel di savants, "Mak una ful di pots wit wota." So dem kon ful all di pot wit wota.
Jisos tel dem, "Mak una tak som wota from di pot go giv di chairman for di parti." So, dem kon du as e tok.
Wen di chairman taste di wota wey don turn to wine, bikos e nor no haw e hapun (bot di savants wey draw di wota no), e kon kol di man wey dey mari tel am sey,
"Wen pesin dey du parti, na beta wine e dey first serv pipol, den wen di pipol don drink taya, naim e dey serv cheap wine. Bot yu kon kip di gud wine ontil di parti don won finish."
Dis na di first mirakol wey Jisos du and e hapun for Kana wey dey Galili. Dis na haw e show en onor, so en disaipols kon biliv am.
Den Jisos wit en mama, brodas and en disaipols kon go Kapanum. Dem kon stay der for som days.
By dis taim, di Ju Passova Fist don near wel-wel, so Jisos kon go Jerusalem.
E si di pipol dey sel melu, ship and dove insaid di Tempol yard, e stil si pipol wey dey shange moni, sidan near dia tabol.
E yuz koboko wey e mak, tak driv dem wit dia ship and melu komot from di Tempol yard. E trowey di tabol wey di pipol dey tak shange moni and dia moni kon skata.
E kon tel di pipol wey dey sel dove, "Mak una kari all dis tins komot for here. Mak una nor turn my Papa haus to market."
Den en disaipols kon rimemba as den rite for Psalm Book sey, "Di luv wey e get for en Papa haus dey burn for en heart laik fire."
Di Ju oga dem kon ask am, "As yu dey du all dis tins, na wish sign yu go show us mak wi for fit biliv yu?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Ivun if una distroi dis Tempol, for tiri days taim, I go build am again."
Den di Ju oga dem tel am, "Na forti-sis years dem tak build dis Tempol and yu dey sey yu go fit build am for tiri days?"
Bot na di Tempol for Jisos bodi naim e dey tok abaut.
So wen Jisos don wak-up from deat, en disaipols kon rimemba sey, e tok so bifor. Den dem kon biliv wetin dem rite for God wod and wetin Jisos tel dem.
Jisos dey for Jerusalem by di taim wey dem dey du di Passova Fist. For der, meni pipol kon biliv am, bikos dem si di mirakols wey e du.
Bot Jisos nor gri opun en maind giv di pipol, bikos e no dem wel-wel.
E nor nid enibodi to tok abaut am, bikos e no wetin dey insaid pipol bele, so e nor fit trust dem.
E get won man wey bi Farisi, en name na Nikodimos and e bi memba for di konsol wey dey rule Ju pipol.
E hide go mit Jisos for nite kon tel am, "Tisha, wi no sey yu bi di pesin wey God send kon mit us, bikos nobodi fit du di mirakols wey yu dey du, unles God dey wit am."
Jisos tel am, "Mak I tel yu tru wod, unles dem born pesin di sekon taim, e nor go fit si God kindom."
Den Nikodimos kon ask am, "Haw dem go fit tak born pesin wey don old for di sekon taim? Abi di pesin go enta en mama bele mak di mama born am again? E fit hapun laik dat?"
Jisos ansa am, "I tel yu di trut, unles God born pesin wit wota and en Spirit, di pesin nor go fit enta God kindom.
"Wetin flesh born, na flesh e bi, bot wetin God Spirit born, na spirit e bi.
"So, mak yu nor konfuz bikos I tok sey, 'God go born yu for di sekon taim.'
"Wen briz dey blow, e dey go eniwer e wont, yu dey hear di sound wey e dey mak, bot yu nor fit no wer e dey kom from or wer e dey go. Na so e bi wit evribodi wey God Spirit born."
Nikodimos kon ask am, "Haw dis tins go fit hapun?"
Jisos ansa, "Yu bi tisha for Izrel, yet yu nor fit undastand dis tins?
"Mak I tel yu di trut, wi dey tok wetin wi sabi and dey bear witnes for wetin wi don si wit awa eyes, bot una nor gri asept wetin wi tok.
"Naw, if I dey tel una abaut di tins wey dey for dis wold and una nor fit biliv wetin I tok, haw una go fit tak biliv mi, if I bigin dey tel una abaut di tins wey dey for hevun?
"Nobodi don go hevun bifor, esept Man Pikin wey kom dan from hevun and e go-go bak der.
"Yu si, as Mosis kari di snake go up wen dem dey insaid desert, na so tu dem go kari Man Pikin up,
so dat enibodi wey go biliv am, go get life wey nor dey end.
"Bikos God luv di pipol wey dey dis wold wel-wel, E kon send di onli pikin wey E get to us, so dat enibodi wey biliv am, nor go die, bot e go get life wey nor dey end.
"God nor send en pikin kom kondem di pipol wey dey insaid di wold, bot mak e kom save dem.
"Enibodi wey biliv am, God nor go kondem am. Bot di pesin wey nor biliv am, God don kondem am alredi, bikos di pesin nor biliv God Pikin name.
"Na dis bi di rizin why God go joj di wold, bikos lite don kom insaid di wold, bot pipol laik to stay for daknes insted of lite, bikos dem dey du tins wey nor gud.
"Yu si, evribodi wey dey du bad tin dey hate lite and dem nor go gri kom out for wer lite dey, mak pipol nor for si di bad tins wey dem dey du.
"Bot di pesin wey dey du gud tins, dey kom out for lite, so dat pipol go si di tins wey e dey du, bikos na as God wont, naim e dey du.’’
Leta, Jisos and en disaipols go Judea aria and dem kon stay der for som taim dey baptize pipol.
Jon dey baptize for Aenon, won tawn wey near Salim, bikos plenti wota dey der and pipol dey kom mit am mak e baptize dem.
(For dis taim, dem neva put Jon for prizin).
Den won Ju man kon dey argue wit Jon disaipols abaut haw dem sopoz to wosh dia bodi as dia tradishon tok.
Som of dem go mit Jon kon tel am, "Oga, di pesin wey dey wit yu for di oda side for Jordan Riva, wey yu tok abaut bifor, en tu, dey baptize pipol and evribodi dey rush go mit am."
Jon ansa dem, "Nobodi go fit get enitin unles God wey dey hevun, gi-am."
Unasef go fit bear witnes sey, I tok sey I nor bi di Kraist, bot God send mi kom, bifor Kraist go kom.

"Di pesin wey won mari new wife naim bi di bridegroom. En frend, wey bi di bestman, dey listin to am. E go dey hapi wel-wel wen e hear di bridegroom dey tok. Na dis dey mak mi hapi and my joy don ful.
"Pipol must no Kraist pas as dem no mi.
"Di pesin wey kom from hevun beta pas evribodi wey dey for dis wold. And hu dey dis wold, dey tok abaut di tins wey dey insaid di wold.
"Bot di pesin wey kom from hevun dey tok abaut wetin e si and hear for hevun, bot pipol nor gri listin to am.
"Bot pesin wey biliv wetin e tok abaut God, biliv sey wetin God tok, na tru.
"Di pesin wey God send dey tok God wod, bikos God dey giv en Spirit to pipol.
"God luv en pikin wel-wel and E gi-am pawa to kontrol evritin.
"Pesin wey biliv di onli pikin wey God get, go get life wey nor dey end. Bot pesin wey nor biliv Man Pikin, nor go get life at-all. God go always dey ves wit dat kaind pesin.’’
Jisos kon no sey di Farisi pipol don hear sey e dey baptize plenti pipol pas Jon and di pipol dey folo am,
(aldo nor bi Jisos ensef dey baptize pipol, bot na en disaipols dey du-am).
Jisos kon komot for Judea dey go Galili.
For am to rish der, e go must pas tru Samaria.
E kon rish won tawn for Samaria wey dem dey kol Sykar, wey near di land wey Jakop giv Josef, wey bi en pikin.
Jakop wel dey der tu. Dat aftanun, bikos Jisos don taya to waka, e kon sidan near di wel.
So won wuman for di tawn kom draw wota for di wel. Jisos tel am, "Abeg giv mi wota mak I drink".
By dis taim, en disaipols don go insaid di tawn go buy fud.
Den di wuman kon tel Jisos, "Haw yu wey bi Ju kon dey ask mi wey bi Samaria pesin, sey, "Mak I giv yu wota drink?'" (E tok dis won bikos Ju and Samaria pipol nor dey agri at-all.)
Jisos ansa am, "If yu no wetin God gift bi and di pesin wey dey ask yu for wota so, yu for ask am and e go giv yu di wota wey dey mak pesin liv foreva."
Di wuman ask am, "Oga, yu nor get bucket and di wel deep wel-wel, wer yu go fit get dat kaind wota?"
"Yu big pas awa gran papa Jakop wey giv us dis wel, wer en famili and animas dey drink from?"
Jisos ansa, "Pesin wey drink from dis wota go always dey hungri for wota.

"Bot enibodi wey go drink from di wota wey I go gi-am, nor go hungri for wota again, bikos di wota wey I go gi-am, go turn to riva wey nor dey dry insaid en bele and di wota go gi-am life wey nor dey end."
Di wuman kon tel am, "Oga, giv mi dis wota, so dat I nor go hungri for wota or kom here kon draw wota again."
Jisos tel am, "Go kol yor husban, mak tu of una kom mit mi."
Di wuman ansa, "I nor get husban." Den Jisos kon tel am, "Yu tok tru wen yu sey 'I nor get husban.'
"Bikos yu don mari faiv husban bifor and di man wey yu dey stay wit naw, nor bi yor ril husban. Na tru yu tok."
Di wuman kon tel am, "Oga, I si sey yu bi profet wey dey tok wetin go hapun.
"Awa papa dem serv God for dis mountin, bot una kon tok sey, di place wey pipol sopoz to woship God, na Jerusalem e dey."
Jisos kon sey, "Wuman, mak u biliv mi, di taim dey kom, wen pipol go woship God for eniwer dem dey, nor bi onli for dis mountin or for Jerusalem.
"Una dey serv wetin una nor no, bot wi dey serv wetin wi no, bikos na Ju pipol, naim God first kol to ensef.
"Bot di taim dey kom and e don ivun rish, wen di pipol wey won rili serv God, go serv am for di tru way, wey God Spirit go show dem.
"God na Spirit and di pipol wey won serv am, must serv am for di tru way wey God Spirit go show dem."
Di wuman ansa, "I no sey di Mezaya (di won wey dem dey kol Kraist), wey go save evribodi, go kom and enitaim wen e kom, e go tel us evritin."
Jisos kon tel am, "Na mi wey dey tok to yu so, bi di Mezaya."
Wen Jisos dey tok to di wuman, en disaipols kon kom bak. Dem sopraiz sey e dey tok wit won wuman, bot dem nor fit ask am, "Wetin e wont?" or "Why e dey tok to di wuman?"
By dis taim, di wuman don liv en pot wey e tak kom draw wota kon run go insaid di tawn go tel pipol sey,
"Mak una kon si won man wey tel mi all di tins wey I don du. Dis man nor bi di Mezaya so?"
So di pipol kom out for di tawn go mit Jisos.
By dis taim, di disaipols kon beg am, "Tisha, mak yu chop somtin naw."
E tel dem, "I get fud wey I go chop wey una nor no abaut."
Di disaipols kon dey ask demsef, "Abi sombodi don bring somtin for am to chop wen wi nor dey here?"
Jisos kon tel dem, "My fud na to du wetin my Papa tok and mak I finish di wok wey E send mi.
"Nor bi una dey tok sey, 'Na for monts rimain bifor dem go plok frut wey dem plant for farm?' Mak una luk roun and una go si sey frut don ripe rish to plok.
"God go riword di pesin wey plok plenti frut from wetin odas plant and e go get life wey nor dey end. So, di pesin wey plant and di pesin wey plok wetin dem plant, go hapi togeda.
"Dis won show sey, di tin wey pipol dey tok sey, 'Won pesin plant and anoda pesin plok di friut', na tru wod.
"I send una go plok wetin una nor plant, oda pipol don sofa plant dem, bot una kon enjoy wetin dem sofa for."
By dis taim, meni pipol from Samaria tawn kon biliv am, bikos of di tins wey di wuman tok, "E tel mi all di tins wey I don du."
Wen Samaria pipol kom mit am, dem kon dey beg am sey, mak e stay wit dem. So e kon stay der for tu days,
and bikos of wetin e tok, meni pipol kon biliv am.
Den dem kon tel di wuman, "Nor bi wetin yu tel us mak us biliv, bot bikos wi don tak awa own ear hear and wi don no sey, dis pesin tru-tru, na-im go save all di pipol wey dey dis wold."
Wen tu days pas, Jisos komot from der go Galili.
(Bikos Jisos don tok am sey, "Pesin wey bi profet nor dey get respet for en home-tawn").
Wen e rish Galili, di pipol wey dey der kon welkom am, bikos dem don si all di tins wey e du for Jerusalem for di taim wen dem dey du Passova Fist.
Again, e go Kana wey dey Galili, for wer e first turn wota to wine. For Kapanum, won soja-man wey dey wok for di king palise dey der and en pikin wey nor wel.
Wen e hear sey Jisos don kom bak to Galili, e go mit am kon beg am sey mak e kom heal en pikin wey won die.
So Jisos ask am, "If una nor si signs and wondas una nor go biliv mi?"
Di man ansa, "Oga, abeg mak yu kom bifor my pikin go die."
Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu go haus, yor pikin nor go die." Di man biliv wetin Jisos tel am, so e kon komot go en haus.
Wen e don near haus, en savants kon mit, tel am sey, "Yor pikin don wel, e nor die."
So, e ask dem di taim wen di pikin bigin dey beta. Dem kon tel am, "Na yestaday for won o' klok for aftanun naim e wel."
Bikos of wetin dem tok, di pikin papa kon rimemba sey dat na di taim wen Jisos tel am sey, "Yor pikin nor go die." Bikos of dis, di man and evribodi wey dey en haus kon biliv Jisos.
Dis na di sekon mirakol wey Jisos du for Galili, afta e kom bak from Judea.
Jisos kon go won fist wey dem dey du for Jerusalem.
Won pool dey der wey near di Ship Gate, di name na Betsaida for Aramaic language. Na faiv roads pipol tak dey enta insaid.
Pipol wey nor wel, wey blind and wey nor fit waka dey laidan for di difren roads.
From taim-to-taim, won angel dey kom shake di wota and enibodi wey first enta di wota afta di angel don shake am, go wel.
Won man dey der wey nor fit waka for tati-ate years.
Wen Jisos si-am laidan for der, e kon no sey di man neva fit waka for long taim. So, Jisos kon ask am, "Yu won waka?"
Di man ansa am, "Oga, I nor get enibodi wey go put mi insaid di pool wen di wota dey shake. Enitaim I dey trai to enta di wota, anoda pesin go kwik enta bifor I rish der."
Jisos tel am, "Mak yu get up! Kari yor mat mak yu bigin waka."
At wons, di man get up, kari en mat kon bigin waka. (Dat day na Sabat).
Den di Ju oga dem kon tel di man wey dey waka naw sey, "Today na Sabat, yu nor sopoz to kari yor mat dey waka."
Naim e ansa dem, "Di man wey mak mi wel, tel mi sey, 'Mak I kari my mat and mak I bigin waka.'"
Dem kon ask am, "Hu bi di man wey sey, 'Mak yu kari yor mat, mak yu dey waka?'"
Bot di man nor no hu e bi, bikos Jisos don komot der and plenti pipol dey for dat place.
Afta dis, Jisos kon si di man insaid di Tempol. So e kon tel am, "Luk, yu don wel naw, mak yu nor komit sin again, oda-wise, di tin wey bad pas wetin du yu bifor, go hapun to yu."
Di man kon go tel di Ju oga dem sey, "Na Jisos bi di pesin wey mak mi wel."
Bikos Jisos dey du all dis tins for Sabat Day, di Ju oga dem kon dey mak trobol wit am.
So e tel dem, "My Papa dey wok evritaim and na so mi tu dey wok."
Bikos of dis, di Ju oga dem kon dey trai to kil-am, bikos dem sey e dey break di Sabat law and e dey kol God en papa, laik sey en and God na mate.
Naim Jisos ansa dem, "Mak I tel una tru wod, di Pikin nor fit du enitin wit en own maind, esept di tins wey e si en Papa dey du. And na enitin wey e si en Papa dey du, naim e dey du tu.
"Bikos di Papa get strong luv for en pikin, e dey always show am evritin wey e dey du and e go show am plenti tins wey pas dis won and una go sopraiz.
"As di Papa get pawa to tak wak pesin wey don die, na so tu di pikin get pawa to giv life to enibodi wey en won giv.
Di Papa nor dey joj enibodi, bot e don giv en pikin pawa to joj evribodi,
so dat evribodi go bow dan for di pikin as dem dey bow dan for di Papa. If enibodi nor bow show respet for di pikin, e nor go get di maind to respet di Papa wey send di pikin kom.
"I tel una tru wod, di pesin wey tak wetin I tok and biliv sey na di Papa send mi, go get life wey nor dey end and e nor go enta hell fire, bot e go get life wey nor dey end.
"I tel una tru wod, di taim dey kom and e don ivun rish groun naw, wen doz wey don die go hear Man Pikin vois and wen dem hear am, dem go wak-up and dem nor go die again.
"Bikos as di Papa get life for insaid am, na so e giv en pikin life tu.
"Di Papa don giv en pikin di pawa to joj pipol.
"So, mak dis wod nor sopraiz una, bikos di taim dey kom, wen all doz wey dey insaid grave go hear di pikin vois,
and di angels go kon seprate di pipol wey du gud tins, mak dem enta life wey nor dey end, bot God go kondem di pipol dem wey dey du bad tins.

"I nor go fit du enitin wit my own pawa, bot na wetin I dey hear from my Papa, naim I dey yuz tak joj. Eni jojment wey I giv, na tru won, bikos I nor dey du my own tin, bot I onli dey du as my Papa send mi.
"If I tok abaut mysef, e fit bi sey wetin I tok nor bi tru",
bikos anoda pesin dey wey go tok abaut mi and I no sey wetin e tok abaut mi, na tru.
"Una don send mesage go mit Jon and e don tel una tru wod.
"(I nor dey trust wetin pipol tok, bot I dey tel una dis wod mak God for save una.)
Jon lite shine wel-wel for smol taim and una hapi wen una si en lite."
Bot I get pesin wey go bear witnes abaut mi wey big pas Jon, bikos di wok wey my Papa giv mi mak I du, naim I dey du so; so di wok dey bear witnes sey, na my Papa send mi.
And my Papa wey send mi, en ensef don bear witnes abaut mi. Una neva hear my Papa vois or si-am bifor.
En wod neva stil dey insaid una, bikos una nor biliv sey na-im send mi.
