Una dey read God wod wel-wel, bikos una biliv sey na wetin una read go giv una life wey nor dey end and na dis same wod dey tok abaut mi,
bot una nor redi to kom mit mi, so dat una go get life wey nor dey end.
"I nor laik mak pipol dey praiz mi,
bikos I no sey, una nor luv God for insaid una heart.
"I kom wit my Papa name and una nor gri asept mi, bot if anoda pesin kom wit en own name, una go asept am.
"Haw una go fit biliv wen una dey praiz ish oda and una nor kare for di praiz wey onli God fit giv.
"Mak una nor tink sey I go akiuz una bifor my Papa. Di tin wey go stand against una na di law wey Mosis rite, wey una dey put hope for.
"If una biliv wetin Mosis rite for di law, una sopoz to biliv mi tu, bikos na mi e rite abaut.
"Bot if una nor biliv wetin Mosis rite, haw una go tak biliv wetin I dey tel una naw?"
Wen Jisos don tok finish, e kon kros go Tiberias wey dey di oda side for Galili wotasaid.
Plenti pipol kon dey folo am, bikos dem si wen e heal sik pipol.
Jisos kon komot for der go di mountin side kon sidan der wit en disaipols.
(Dat taim, Passova Fist don rish.)
And wen Jisos luk up, e si plenti pipol dey kom mit am. Den e kon ask Filip, "Na wer wi go fit si bread buy wey all dis pipol go chop?
Jisos tok dis won mak e for si wetin Filip go du, bikos en ensef no wetin e won du.
Filip ansa, "Ivun if wi buy bread wey rish tu ondred silva koins and if dem share am smol-smol, e nor go rish evribodi chop.".
Anoda disaipol wey en name bi Andru, wey bi Saimon Pita broda kon tel Jisos sey,
"Won boy dey here wey get faiv bread and tu fish, bot dis won nor go rish dis plenti pipol chop beleful?"
Jisos ansa, "Tel all di pipol mak dem sidan (as plenti grass dey di place wey dem go fit sidan put). Di men wey sidan, rish faiv tazon.
Jisos tak di bread kon tank God. Den e divide am giv di pipol wey sidan. E du di same tin wit di fish. All of dem chop as dem wont, kon beleful wel-wel.
Wen evribodi don beleful, Jisos kon tel en disaipols, "Mak una gada wetin rimain, mak enitin nor waste."
Wen dem gada wetin dem chop rimain for di faiv bread, e ful twef basket.
So wen di pipol si di mirakol wey Jisos du, dem kon dey tok among demsef sey, "Tru-tru, dis man na di profet wey God send kom dis wold."
Since Jisos no sey dem go won tak am by fos go mak am dia king, e kon komot go on-top di mountin alone.
Wen evenin rish, en disaipols kon go wotasaid go wait am,
dem enta won kenu, kros go Kapanum (by dis taim, evriwer don dey dak and Jisos neva kom mit dem.)
Den strong briz bigin blow and di riva kon dey ruff wel-wel.
Wen dem don padol di kenu go rish abaut tiri or for miles, dem si Jisos dey waka on-top di wota dey kom near dem. Fear kon kash dem wel-wel.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Na mi, mak una nor fear."
As dem dey trai mak e enta insaid di kenu, dem kon si sey di kenu don rish wer dem dey go.
Wen day don break, di pipol wey dey di oda side for di riva no sey na onli won smol kenu dey der. Dem stil no sey Jisos enta di kenu wit dem.
So som kenu wey kom from Tiberias kon rish di wotasaid near di place wey dem for chop bread, afta Jisos don pray.
So wen di pipol si sey Jisos and en disaipols nor dey der, dem enta di kenu kon go luk for Jisos for anoda tawn wey dem dey kol Kapanum.
Wen dem si Jisos for di oda side for di riva, dem ask am, "Tisha, wish taim yu kom here?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Mak I tel una tru wod, na bikos of di bread wey una chop naim mak una dey faind mi, nor bi bikos of di mirakols wey una si.
"Mak una nor wok for fud wey nor dey last, bot for fud wey go giv una life wey nor dey end and dat kaind fud, na onli Man Pikin go fit giv una, bikos na-im God send kom."
Dem kon ask am, "Wetin wi go du to mak God hapi wit us?"
Jisos ansa, "God wont sey mak una biliv di pesin wey E send."
Dem stil ask Jisos, "Wish kaind mirakol yu go du mak wi si, mak wi for biliv yu?
"Awa gran papa dem chop manna for widanes as dem rite for God wod sey, 'God giv dem bread from hevun to chop.'"
Den Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak I tel una tru wod, nor bi Mosis giv una bread from hevun, bot God, wey bi my Papa, na-im giv una di tru bread from hevun.
God bread na di pesin wey kom dan from hevun kon giv beta life to di pipol wey dey dis wold."
So dem tel am, "Oga, from naw go, mak yu giv us dis bread."
Jisos kon tel dem, Na mi bi di bread wey dey giv life. Pesin wey kom mit mi nor go hungri lia-lai and di pesin wey biliv mi, nor go hungri for wota again.
As I don tel una, una dey si mi, bot una nor biliv.
"Enibodi wey my Papa giv mi, go kom mit mi and wen e kom, I nor go eva driv am.
"Nor bi to du wetin I wont mak mi kom dan from hevun, bot na to du wetin my Papa wont.
"Wetin my Papa wey send mi wont, na mak I nor luz enibodi wey e giv mi, bot mak I for tak dem go up for di last day.
"Wetin my Papa wont bi sey, enibodi wey biliv en pikin, go get life wey nor dey end and I go wak-am up for di last day."
Den di Ju pipol bigin ves and komplian abaut Jisos, bikos e tok sey, "Na mi bi di bread wey kom dan from hevun."
Den dem kon sey, "Dis Jisos sef nor bi Josef pikin, wey wi no en papa and mama? Na haw e kon dey tok sey, 'I kom dan from hevun?'"
Jisos ansa, "Mak una nor komplain abaut mi to won anoda.
"Nobodi go fit kom mit mi wit en own pawa, unles my Papa wey send mi draw am kom mit mi and I go tak am go up for di last day.
"Na so di profets rite sey, 'God go tish evribodi.' Enibodi wey hear wetin my Papa tok, go kom mit mi.
(Nor bi sey enibodi don si di Papa bifor, esept mi wey kom from hevun).
"I dey tel una tru wod, enibodi wey biliv mi, don get life wey nor dey end.
"Na mi bi di bread wey dey giv pesin life.
"Una gran-gran papa dem chop manna for widanes, bot dem stil die.
"Dis na di bread wey kom from hevun, so dat enibodi wey chop am, go get life wey nor dey end.
"Na mi bi di bread wey kom dan from hevun. Enibodi wey chop dis bread go liv foreva. Na my flesh bi di bread wey I go giv di pipol wey dey for dis wold."
Den di Ju pipol wey dey ves wit Jisos kon bigin dey argue wit won anoda dey sey, "Haw dis man go giv us en flesh mak wi chop?"
Jisos tel dem, "I dey tel una tru wod, unles una chop Man Pikin flesh and drink en blood, una nor go get life for insaid una.
"Di pesin wey go chop my flesh and drink my blood, don get life wey nor dey end and I go tak am up for di last day.
"My flesh na di ril fud and my blood na di koret drink.
Di pesin wey chop my flesh and drink my blood, go stay insaid mi and I go dey insaid am tu.
"Na my Papa wey dey for hevun send mi and as I dey for dis life bikos of am, na so di pesin wey chop my flesh go get life, bikos of mi.
"Dis na di bread wey kom dan from hevun, e nor bi laik di bread wey una gran papa dem chop and afta, dem stil die. Di pesin wey go chop dis bread nor go eva die, bot e go liv foreva."
Jisos tok dis tins wen e dey tish dem for insaid di Tempol for Kapanum.
Wen Jisos meni disaipols hear wetin e tok, dem kon sey, "Dis tin wey Jisos dey tok so hard wel-wel-o-o! Na hu go fit undastand dem?"
Wen Jisos no sey en disaipols dey komplain abaut wetin e tok, e kon ask dem, "Wetin I tok so dey mak una ves tu?
"Wetin go hapun if una si Man Pikin go bak to hevun wer e dey bifor?
"Na di Spirit go fit giv pesin life; humanbin pawa nor fit du-am. All dis wod wey I dey tel una so, dem bi Spirit and dem dey giv pesin life.
"Bot som of una nor biliv." (From biginin, Jisos don no di pipol wey nor go biliv and di pesin wey go sel am giv en enemi.)
So Jisos kon sey, "Na bikos of dis I tel una sey, nobodi go fit kom mit mi wit en own pawa, unles my Papa let am kom."
Afta dis, Jisos meni disaipols kon stop to folo am.
Den Jisos kon ask en twef disaipols, "Una won go tu?"
Den Saimon Pita ansa am, "Oga, na hu wi go kon go mit? Na yu get di wod wey dey giv pipol di life wey nor dey end.
"Wi don biliv and no sey, 'Na yu bi di Holi Won wey God send kom mit us.'"
Jisos kon ansa, "Nor bi twef of una I shuz? Bot won pesin among una na devol pikin."
(E tok dis won abaut Judas, wey bi Saimon Iskarot pikin, bikos na dis Judas, wey bi won of en twef disaipols, naim go sel am giv en enemi.)
Afta, Jisos kon travol go evriwer for Galili. Den e komot for Judea, bikos di Ju oga dem won kil-am.
Di taim kon rish wen Ju pipol dey du dia fist wey dem dey kol Tabanakol Fist.
Jisos brodas kon dey tel am, "Komot for here go Judea, mak yor disaipols si di mirakols wey yu dey du.
"Bikos enibodi wey wont mak pipol sabi hu e bi, nor go du enitin for kona. Since yu dey du dis tins, e gud sey mak yu show yorsef to evribodi."
(Ivun en brodas nor biliv wetin Jisos dey du.)
Jisos ansa dem, "Taim neva rish for mi to go, bot una fit go enitaim una laik.
"Pipol laik una, bot dem nor laik mi, bikos I dey tel dem sey wetin dem dey du nor gud.
"Mak una go di fist, I nor go-go, bikos my taim neva rish."
Afta e don tok finish, e kon stay for Galili.
Bot wen en brodas don go di fist, Jisos kon go der tu, bot e nor let enibodi no sey e dey der.
Di Ju oga dem kon dey ask pipol, "Wer e dey?"
Dem kon dey tok among demsef. Som sey, "Jisos na gud pesin", bot odas sey, "E dey play pipol wayo."
Bot nobodi fit tok out, bikos dem dey fear di Ju oga dem.
Wen di fist don rish haf, Jisos enta di Tempol kon dey tish.
Di Ju oga dem sopraiz and dem kon dey sey, "Haw e tak no dis tins wey e dey tish so, as e bi sey e nor go school at-all?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Wetin I dey tish nor bi my own, bot na di Pesin wey send mi, na-im giv mi.
"Enibodi wey redi to du wetin God wont, di pesin go no weda wetin I dey tish na from God or na my own.
"Enibodi wey dey tok wit en own pawa, go wont mak pipol praiz am, bot di pesin wey won onor hu send am, naim dey du wetin koret and sin nor dey insaid am.
"Mosis nor giv una di law? Bot una nor gri obey am. Why e bi sey una won kil mi sef?"
Di pipol ansa Jisos, "Dimon don enta yor bodi! Hu won kil yu?"
Den Jisos ansa, "Na won mirakol wey I du so, mak una dey sopraiz?
"Na tru sey Mosis tel una to sekonsaiz una son, (nor bi Mosis start am, na from Abraham taim e start) and una dey sekonsaiz una son for Sabat Day.
"Since una dey sekonsaiz for Sabat so dat una nor go break Mosis law, why una dey ves wit mi, bikos I heal dis sik man for Sabat Day?
"Mak una nor dey joj pesin, bikos of wetin una si wit una eye, bot mak una giv koret jojment as e sopoz to bi."
Som pipol wey dey stay for Jerusalem kon dey sey, "Dis nor bi di man wey dem won kil?
"Naim dey here dey tok for publik so and dem nor fit tel am enitin. Abi di oga dem don gri sey naim bi di Kraist?
"Wi sef no di place wer dis man from kom and wi no sey enitaim wey Kraist go kom, nobodi go fit no wer e go kom from."
As Jisos dey tish for di Tempol, e kon shaut sey, "Una no mi and di place wey I from kom, nor bi my pawa I tak kom, na God wey send mi naim bi di koret Pesin. Bot una nor no am.
"Bot I no am wel-wel, bikos na from am, I kom and naim send mi."
Dem kon trai to kash Jisos, bot nobodi fit tosh am, bikos en taim neva rish.
Meni pipol for der biliv am kon sey, "Enitaim di pesin wey bi di Kraist kom, e go fit du mirakol wey pas wetin dis won dey du so?"
Wen di Farisi pipol hear pipol dey tok abaut Jisos, dia oga and di prists kon send sojas go arres am.
Jisos kon tel dem, "I go onli stay wit una for smol taim and afta, I go-go mit di Pesin wey send mi.
"Una go dey luk for mi, bot una nor go si mi and una nor go fit kom mit mi for wer I dey."
Den di Ju oga dem kon dey ask ish oda, "Wer e won go wey wi nor go fit si-am, abi e won go tish Ju pipol wey dey stay wit Greek pipol?
"Wetin e min wen e tok sey, 'Una go luk for mi, bot una nor go si mi and wer I dey, una nor go fit kom der?'"
For di last day for di fist, wey bi di biggest day, Jisos stand kon shaut, "If wota dey hungri enibodi, mak e kom mit mi.
"Di pesin wey biliv mi and wetin I tok, mak e kom drink, jos as God wod sey, 'Plenti wota wey dey giv life, go flow from insaid en bele.'"
(E tok dis tin abaut di Spirit wey di pipol wey biliv am go get, bikos by dis taim, God neva giv en Spirit to pipol, bikos E neva onor Jisos Kraist.)
Wen pipol hear wetin e tok, som of dem kon sey, "Tru-tru, dis man naim bi di Profet!"
Som stil sey, "Na-im bi di Kraist", bot odas sey, "Na lai, Kraist nor fit kom from Galili.
"Abi God wod nor sey, 'Kraist go kom from David famili wey dey Betlehem, di vilage wey David from kom?'"
So di pipol kon divide bikos of Jisos.
Som of dem kon dey trai to kash am, bot nobodi fit tak hand tosh am.
Wen di sojas go bak, di prist oga dem and Farisi pipol kon ask dem, "Why una nor kash Jisos kom?"
Di sojas ansa, "Wi neva si enibodi wey tok laik dis man bifor!"
Den di Farisi pipol kon ask di sojas, "Abi, e don disiv una tu?
"Abi eni of us wey bi Farisi pipol or prists don biliv Jisos?
"Kos dey dis pipol head, bikos dem nor no di law."
Den won man wey en name bi Nikodimos, wey don first go mit Jisos and wey bi won of di big oga dem kon sey,
"Awa law nor dey kondem pesin unles wi don hear wetin di pesin tok or si wetin e dey du, abi nor bi so?"
Dem kon ask am, "Abi na Galili yu tu from kom? If yu luk wel, yu go si sey no profet go fit kom from Galili."
Afta dis, evribodi bigin go en haus.
Den Jisos waka enta Mount Olives.
For earli mornin, e enta di Tempol. Plenti pipol gada for der and e kon sidan dey tish dem.
Di pipol wey sabi di law and di Farisi pipol kon bring won wuman wey dem kash, sey e slip wit man wey nor bi en husban. Dem kon mak am stand for dia front,
den dem tel Jisos, "Tisha, wi kash dis wuman wen e dey slip wit won man wey nor bi en husban.
"Mosis law sey, 'Mak dem stone dis kaind wuman til e die.' Wetin yu get to tok for dis mata?"
(Dem ask am dis kweshon to set trap for am, mak dem for fit kash am). Bot Jisos bend dan kon tak en finga dey rite somtin for groun.
Wen dem kontinu to dey wori am, e kon get up tel dem, "Eni of una wey neva komit sin bifor, mak e bi di first pesin to stone dis wuman."
E kon bend dan again bigin rite for groun.
Wen dem hear wetin e tok, dem kon dey komot for der won by won. Na di old pipol first start to komot, til e kon rimain onli Jisos and di wuman wey stand for en front.
Den Jisos stand-up kon ask am, "Wuman, wer di pipol wey bring yu? Nobodi rimain to kondem yu?"
Di wuman ansa, "Oga, nobodi rimain." Den Jisos tel am, "Mi tu nor go kondem yu. Bot from naw go, mak yu nor sin again."
Den Jisos kon sey, "Na mi bi di lite wey dey di wold, enibodi wey folo mi, nor go waka for daknes lai-lai, bot e go get di lite wey go gi-am life."
Di Farisi pipol kon dey argue wit am dey sey, "Yu dey tok abaut yorsef and wetin yu tok, nor bi tru".
Jisos ansa dem, "Ivun if I dey tok abaut mysef, wetin I dey tok na tru, bikos I no wer I from kom and wer I dey go. Bot una nor no wer I from kom or wer I dey go.
"Una dey joj pesin wit wetin una si wit una eye, bot I nor dey joj pipol laik dat.
"Bot, if I sey pesin du bad, di tins wey I si and tok abaut, na tru, as e bi sey nor bi onli mi dey tok am. Na mi and my Papa wey send mi, dey tok am togeda.
"God wod sey, 'Wetin tu pipol bear witnes abaut, na tru.'
"I dey bear witnes abaut mysef and my Papa wey send mi, dey bear witnes abaut mi tu."
Dem kon bigin kweshon am, "Hu bi yor Papa sef?" Jisos ansa dem, "Una nor no mi or my Papa, if to sey una no mi, una for no my Papa tu."
Jisos dey tok to dem near di box wer dem dey put ofrin moni, wey dey insaid di Tempol. Nobodi fit kash am, bikos en taim neva rish.
Den Jisos kon tel dem again, "I dey go and una go luk for mi, bot una go die insaid una sin. Wer I dey go, una nor go fit kom der."
So di Ju oga dem kon dey ask, "Abi e won go kil ensef? As e dey tok sey, 'Wer I dey go, una nor go fit kom der?'"
Jisos ansa dem, "Na groun una from kom, bot mi, na hevun I from kom. Una kom from dis wold, bot I nor kom from dis wold.
"Na dis mak mi sey una go die insaid una sin. Unles una biliv sey, 'Na mi bi di pesin wey I tok sey I bi', una go die insaid una sin."
Den dem ask am, "Hu yu bi sef?" Jisos ansa, "Na wetin I tel una from di biginin.
"I get plenti tins to tok abaut wetin una dey du, bot my Papa wey send mi, nor dey lai and na wetin E tel mi I dey tel pipol wey dey dis wold."
(Bot dem nor undastand sey e dey tok abaut en Papa for hevun).
Den Jisos sey, "Wen una don kari mi put for kros, una go no hu I bi. I nor jos dey du enitin wey I laik, bot I dey always du wetin my Papa tel mi.
"And di Pesin wey send mi dey wit mi. E nor dey liv mi, bikos I dey always dey du di tins wey E wont."
As e dey tok, meni pipol kon biliv am.
Jisos kon tel di pipol wey kom from Judea wey biliv am, "If una obey wetin I dey tish una, den una go bi my disaipols
and una go no di trut and di trut go fri una."
Dem tel am, "All of us na Abraham pikin, wi neva bi slave to enibodi bifor. Why yu dey sey, wi go dey fri?"
Jisos kon ansa dem, "Na tru wod I dey tel una, enibodi wey dey komit sin, na sin bi di masta wey dey rule am.
"Pesin wey bi slave nor dey stay for insaid dat famili foreva, bot pesin wey bi pikin for di famili, naim dey stay foreva.
"So wen Man Pikin fri una, una don dey fri bi dat.
"I no sey una kom from Abraham famili, bot una won kil mi bikos una nor won hear wetin I dey tok.
"Na wetin I si wen I dey wit my Papa, naim I dey tel una, so mak una dey du di tins wey una hear from my Papa."
Dem tel am, "Abraham naim bi awa papa." Den Jisos ansa dem, "If una bi Abraham pikin, una for dey du di tins wey Abraham du.
"Bot una won kil mi, bikos I tel una di ril trut wey I hear from God. Abraham nor du wetin una dey du so -o-o.
"Una dey du di tins wey una papa du." Dem kon tel Jisos, "Awa papa nor born us for outsaid marage. Na God ensef bi di papa wey wi get."
Den Jisos ansa, "If to sey na God bi una Papa, una for laik mi, bikos I kom from God and as I dey so, I nor kom du my own tins, bikos na-im send mi.
"Na bikos una nor won asept wetin I dey tish, naim mak una nor fit undastand wetin I dey tok.

"Na devol bi una papa and na di tin wey una papa wont, naim una dey du. E dey kil pipol from di biginin and e nor dey sopot wetin gud, as e nor get eni gud tin insaid am. Enitaim e dey tok, na di lai wey dey insaid am, na-im e dey tok, e bi lai-lai pesin, bikos naim bi lai-lai papa.
"Na bikos I dey tel una tru wod, naim mak una nor gri biliv mi.
"Eni of una go fit show sey I komit sin? Since I dey tel una tru wod, why una nor won biliv mi?
"Di pesin wey bi God pikin, dey listin and du wetin dem rite for God wod. Una nor dey listin and una nor dey du wetin dem rite for God wod, bikos una nor bi God Pikin."
So di pipol kon sey, "E bi laik sey yu bi Samaria pesin and dimon dey insaid yu."
Jisos kon tel dem, "I nor get dimon. I dey respet my Papa, bot una nor gri respet mi.
"I nor wont mak una praiz mi, bot God, di Won wey dey hevun, na-im wi sopoz praiz and E go joj evribodi for di koret way.
"I dey tel una tru wod, if enibodi folo wetin I dey tish, e nor go die again."
Den di pipol kon sey, "E-hen! Wi don no naw sey dimon dey insaid yu. Abraham and di profets don die, yu kon dey tel us sey, 'Enibodi wey folo wetin I dey tish nor go die.'
"Yu big pas awa papa Abraham and all di profets wey don die? Hu yu tink sey yu bi sef?"
Jisos ansa, "If I dey praiz mysef, my praiz na yeye won. Di pesin wey dey praiz mi na my Papa, wey una dey sey, 'Na-im bi awa God.'
"Una nor no am, bot I no am and if I sey I nor no am, I dey lai laik una. I no am and I dey folo wetin e dey tok.
"Una papa Abraham hapi wel-wel wen e hear sey I dey kom. E si-am and e hapi wel-wel."
Den di pipol ask am, "Yu neva old rish fifti years and yu sey yu don si Abraham?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Na tru wod I dey tel una so, bifor dem born Abraham, I don alredi dey!"
Den, dem kon dey pick stone to stone am, bot Jisos hide kon komot from di Tempol aria.
Wen Jisos dey waka pas, e kon si won man wey blind from di taim wey en mama born am.
Naim en disaipols ask am, "Tisha, na wish pesin sin, wey mak dis man blind since di taim en mama born am? Na di man or na en papa and mama?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Nor bi di man or en papa and mama sin, bot e blind since dem born am, bikos God won yuz dis won show en pawa wit wetin go hapun to am.
"I must du di wok for di Pesin wey send mi bifor day go dak, bikos nite dey kom wen nobodi go fit wok.
"As far as I dey insaid dis wold, na mi bi di lite for di wold.
Afta e tok finish, e spit for groun kon tak di san-san wey e spit put tak rub di blind man eye.
Den e tel am, "Mak yu go wosh yor face insaid di pond wey dem dey kol Siloam (dis name min 'Send'). So di blind man kon go wosh en face as Jisos tel am. As e dey kom bak, e kon bigin si.
Den en nebors and oda pipol wey dey si-am dey beg bifor, kon dey ask sey, "Dis nor bi di man wey dey sidan dey beg for moni?"
Som pipol ansa, "Na-im o-o!" Odas tok sey, "Nor bi en, bot e luk laik am." Di man ensef kon sey, "Na mi bi di pesin."
Dem ask am, "Wetin hapun wey mak yu bigin si?"
E kon ansa dem, "Na di man wey dem dey kol Jisos tak san-san wey e spit put rub my eye. Den e tel mi sey, 'Mak yu go Siloam go wosh yor face.' Afta I go wosh my face for di pond, I kon bigin si."'
Naim dem ask am, "Wer di man dey?" E kon ansa dem, "I nor no-o-o."
Dem kon tak di man wey blind bifor go mit di Farisi pipol.
(bikos na for Sabat Day Jisos spit for san-san tak rub di blind man eye).
Naim di Farisi pipol ask am again, "Haw yu tak bigin si?" E kon ansa dem, "E tak di san-san wey e spit put rub my eye and afta I don wosh my face, I kon bigin si."

Som Farisi pipol kon sey, "Nor bi God send dis man, bikos e nor sopoz to du eni wok for Sabat Day." Bot odas sey, "Haw pesin wey dey komit sin go fit du dis kaind mirakol?" Dis argument kon mak di pipol divide.
Dem kon ask di man wey blind bifor sey, "Wetin yu tink abaut di man wey mak yu dey si?" Di man ansa, "Na profet e bi."
Di Ju oga dem nor gri biliv sey, tru-tru di man blind bifor, so dem kon kol en papa and mama.
Dem kon ask dem, "Na una pikin bi dis? Na tru sey e blind wen una born am? Haw e kon tak dey si naw?"
So en papa and mama ansa, "Wi no sey dis na awa pikin and e blind wen wi born am.
"Bot wi nor no haw e tak bigin si or ivun hu opun en eye. Mak una ask am, e don big rish to tok for ensef."
(En papa and mama tok laik dis, bikos dem dey fear di Ju oga dem wey don tok sey, "Enibodi wey tok sey na Jisos bi di Kraist, dem go driv am komot from di sinagog."
Na dis won mak en papa and mama sey, "Mak dem ask am, bikos e don big rish to tok for ensef)".
So dem kol di man again kon tel am, "Mak yu promis bifor God sey yu go tok di trut, bikos wi no sey di man na sina."
E kon ansa dem, "Weda na sina e bi, I nor no! Bot wetin I no bi sey, bifor I blind, bot naw, I don dey si."
So dem ask am again, "Wetin e du? Haw e tak mak yu dey si sef?"
E kon ansa dem, "I don tel una bifor, bot una nor gri. Why una won hear am again? Abi, una won bi en disaipols tu?"
Dem shaut for di man kon sey, "Na yu bi en disaipol. Wi bi Mosis disaipols.
"Wi no sey God tok to Mosis, bot wi nor no wer dis man from kom."
Di man kon sey, "I sopraiz for una o-o. Una nor no wer e from kom, bot na-im opun my eye!
"Wi no sey God nor dey listin to enibodi wey dey sin, bot if pesin dey du wetin God tok, God go hear en praya.
"Wi neva hear bifor sey, enibodi don fit mak pesin wey blind si.
'If God nor send dis man, e nor go fit du dis kaind tin."
Dem kon tel di man, "Na for insaid sin dem born yu, yu tink sey yu go fit tish us enitin?" So dem driv am komot from di place.
Wen Jisos hear sey dem don driv di man komot, e go luk for am kon ask am, "Yu biliv hu Man Pikin bi?"
Di man kon sey, "Oga, tel mi hu e bi, mak I for fit biliv am?"
Jisos ansa am, "Na-im dey here dey tok to yu so."
Di man kon sey, "Oga, I biliv." Den e nil dan kon woship Jisos.
Jisos tel am, "I kon joj pipol for di wold, so dat di pipol wey nor dey si, go bigin si and doz wey tink sey dem dey si, dia eye go blind."
Wen di Farisi pipol wey dey der hear wetin Jisos tok, dem kon ask am, "Yu tink sey wi sef blind?"
Jisos ansa dem, "If una gri sey una blind, God nor go kondem una bikos of una sin, bot as una tok sey una dey si so, una sin dey for una head."
"Na tru wod I dey tel una, pesin wey nor pas door enta di place wey dem dey kip ship, bot klimb pas anoda side enta di place, na big tif.
"Di pesin wey pas di door enta, na-im bi di shepad wey dey gaid di ship.
"Di gateman go opun di door for am and en ship go hear en vois wen e kol dia name and e go lid dem kom out.
"Wen e don bring all en ship kom out, e go-go dia front and di ship go folo am, bikos dem no en vois.
"Dem nor go gri folo stranja, bot dem go run from am, bikos dem nor no di stranja vois."
Jisos tel dem dis parabol, bot dem nor undastand wetin e tok.
So Jisos kon tel dem again, "I dey tel una tru wod. Na mi bi di door wey di ship go must pas enta.
"All di pipol wey kom bifor mi, na big tif dem bi and di ship nor go gri listin to dem.
"Na mi bi di door, enibodi wey enta tru mi, God go save am. E go-go insaid and out and e go si beta grass chop.
"Di tin wey tif dey du, na to tif, kil and distroi pipol, bot mi, I kom so dat pipol go get life, di kaind life wey ful wel-wel.
"Na mi bi di gud shepad. Di gud shepad redi to die for di ship.
"Di pesin wey dem haya nor bi di shepad and bikos nor bi en get di ship, e go run wen e si lion dey kom, so di lion go skata di ship, kon kil di won wey e kash.
"Bikos di pesin nor kare for di ship, naim go mak am run liv dem.
"Na mi bi di gud shepad, I no di ship wey bi my own and dem no mi tu.
bikos my Papa no mi and I no am, naim mak mi redi to die for di ship.
"I get oda ship wey nor dey here. I must gada dem tu and dem go listin to my vois, all of dem go dey togeda and na won shepad go lid dem.
"Na dis bi di rizin wey mak my Papa laik mi, bikos I redi to sakrifais my life, so dat I go fit tak am bak again.
"Nobodi go fit tak my life from mi, bot na mi go put am dan by mysef and I get di pawa to tak am bak again. Dis na wetin God komand mi to du."
Anoda big kworel kon hapun bitwin di Ju pipol bikos of wetin Jisos tok.
Meni of dem kon dey sey, "Dimon dey insaid am and en head nor koret. Why una dey listin to am sef?"
Odas kon sey, "Di pesin wey get dimon nor go fit tok laik dis. No dimon fit mak blind pesin si."
Di taim for di Dedikeshon Fist for Jerusalem kon rish.
Dat na di taim wey rain dey fal (and kold dey strong wel-wel) and Jisos kon dey waka insaid di varanda wer Solomon for dey tak briz, wey dey insaid di Tempol yard.
Di Ju oga dem gada roun Jisos, kon ask am, "Haw long yu go mak us dey wait? If na yu bi di Kraist, mak yu tel us."
Jisos ansa dem, "I don tel una and una nor biliv. Di tin wey I tak my Papa name dey du, dey bear witnes for mi.
"Bot una nor biliv mi bikos una nor bi my ship.
"My ship dey hear my vois and I no dem and dem dey folo mi.
"I don giv dem life wey nor dey end and dem nor go eva die. Nobodi go fit tak dem komot from my hand.
"My Papa wey giv dem to mi big pas evribodi and nobodi go fit tak dem komot from my Papa hand,
bikos mi and my Papa, na won."
Di Ju oga dem kon pick stone again, to tak stone am.
So Jisos tel dem, "I don du meni gud tins wey una si from my Papa, wish won mak una won stone mi so?"
Di Ju oga dem kon ansa, "Wi nor won stone yu bikos of di gud tins, bot na bikos yu wey bi ordinari pesin, dey mak mout sey, yu bi God."
Jisos kon ansa dem, "Una law nor tok sey, I sey, 'Una bi gods?'
"If dem kol di pipol wey God send en wod go mit, sey, 'Dem bi gods' and God wod nor go eva shange,
'Why una dey tel di pesin wey God shuz for ensef and wey E send kom dis wold, "Yu dey tok against God", bikos I sey, "I bi God Pikin?'"
"If I nor du di tins wey my Papa send mi, mak una nor biliv mi.
"Bot if I dey du dem, ivun if una nor biliv mi, mak una biliv di tins wey I dey du, so dat una go no and undastand sey, I dey insaid my Papa and my Papa dey insaid mi tu."
So dem trai again to kash am, bot e kon waka liv dem.
Jisos go bak kon kros Jordan Riva, wer Jon for baptize pipol and e kon stay for der.
Meni pipol kon mit Jisos for di place. Dem bigin dey sey, "Ivun doh Jon nor du eni mirakol, bot evritin wey e tok abaut Jisos, na tru."
And meni pipol for di place kon biliv Jisos.
Won man wey en name bi Lazarus wey nor wel. En wit Mary and Marta, en sistas kom from Betani.
Dis Mary naim pour perfume for Jisos leg, kon klin dem wit en hair.
So di sistas kon send mesage go mit Jisos sey, Oga, yor frend wey yu luv wel-wel wey nor wel.
Wen Jisos hear di mesage, e kon sey, "Dis siknes nor go kil Lazarus. E go mak God and en pikin get onor."
(E klear sey Jisos luv Marta, Mary and Lazarus wel-wel.)
Afta e don hear sey Lazarus nor wel, e stay wer e dey for anoda tu days.
Den e kon tel en disaipols, "Mak wi go bak to Judea."
Bot en disaipols kon ask, 'Tisha, nor bi di place wer di Ju pipol won for kil us yu sey mak wi go again so?
Jisos ansa, "Evriday get twef hours wey lite dey tak shine, so pipol nor dey fear to waka, bikos dem dey si wel-wel, as e bi sey lite dey.
Bot pesin wey waka for nite, go fit fal, bikos e nor get lite to si road."
Den Jisos tel dem, "Awa frend Lazarus dey slip, bot I won go wak-am up."
Di disaipols sey, "Oga, if e jos dey slip, den e go wak-up."
(Dem tink sey, wetin Jisos min bi sey, Lazarus jos dey slip, bot wetin e min bi sey, Lazarus don die.)
So e kon tel dem sey, "Lazarus don die.
"I hapi sey I nor dey der, so dat una go get anoda shanse to biliv mi. Mak una kom mak wi go si-am."
So Tomas, (wey bi Twins) kon tel di oda disaipol, "Mak wi folo am go, so dat wi go die wit am."
Wen Jisos rish Betani, dem kon tel am sey e don rish for days wey dem bere Lazarus.
(Betani na abaut tu miles from Jerusalem,
and from der, meni Ju pipol kon salot Mary and Marta, bikos of dia broda wey die.)
So wen Marta hear sey Jisos dey kom, e kon waka go mit am, bot Mary sidan for haus.
Marta kon tel Jisos, "Oga, if to sey yu dey here, my broda for nor die."
Bot I no sey, "God go giv yu enitin wey yu ask am."
So Jisos tel am, "Yor broda go wak-up again."
Den Marta sey, I no sey e go wak-up again for di resureshon day."
Jisos ansa am, "Na mi bi di resureshon and na mi dey giv life. Enibodi wey biliv mi go get life ivun if e don die,
and di pesin wey biliv mi for dis life, nor go eva die. Marta, yu biliv wetin I tok so?"
Marta kon ansa, "Yes! Oga, I biliv sey yu bi Kraist, God Pikin, wey kom dis wold."
Den Marta go mit Mary, en sista, kon tok for en ear sey, "Di tisha dey here and e won si yu."
Wen Mary hear wetin e tok, e kon get up go mit Jisos.
Jisos stil dey outsaid di vilage wen Marta go mit am.
Di pipol wey kom salot Mary kon si haw e waka komot kwik-kwik, dem tink sey na Lazarus grave e for dey go krai, so dem folo am.
Wen Mary si Jisos, e fal for en front kon sey, "Oga, if to sey yu dey here, my broda nor for die."
Jisos kon si as Mary and di oda pipol dey krai. So e sori for dem and di tin pain am wel-wel.
E kon ask dem, "Wer una bere am?" Den dem tel am, "Oga, kom mak wi show yu."
Jisos kon krai.
Di pipol wey kom salot dem kon sey, "Jisos luv dis man wel-wel o-o."
Bot som of dem sey, "Dis man wey mak blind man si, e nor fit du mak Lazarus nor for die?"
Jisos kon sori for dem again, den e waka go di grave. (Dis grave na big hol insaid rock wey dem tak big stone kova).
Jisos kon sey, "Mak una rimov di stone." Marta wey bi Lazarus sista kon sey, Oga, by dis taim e go don dey smel, bikos e don rish for days wey dem bere am."
Jisos tel am, "I nor tel yu bifor sey, 'Yu go si God pawa, if yu biliv mi?'"
So, dem kon rol di stone komot from di grave mout. Den Jisos luk hevun, kon sey, "Papa, I tank yu sey Yu dey always hear mi and dey du di tins wey I ask from Yu."
I no sey Yu dey always hear mi, bot I dey tok laik dis, bikos of di pipol wey stand here naw, so dat dem go biliv sey na Yu send mi."
Wen e don tok dis finish, e kon shaut, "Lazarus, kom out!"
Den Lazarus kon kom out, bot di klot wey dem tak bere am stil kova en bodi. So, Jisos tel dem, "Mak una luz di klot komot for en bodi, mak e dey go."
Den meni of di Ju pipol wey folo Mary go di gravside biliv Jisos, wen dem si wetin hapun.
Bot som of dem go mit di Farisi pipol kon tel dem wetin Jisos du.
Den di prist oga dem and Farisi pipol kon kol di kansol memba dem togeda, ask dem, "Wetin wi go du, since di man dey du plenti mirakols?
"If wi let am kontinu laik dis, evribodi go biliv am and di Roman govnor go kom tak di place wey wi dey woship and awa kontri."
Den won of dem wey en name bi Kaifas, wey bi di High Prist dat year, kon sey, "Una bi fool wey nor undastand wetin dey hapun.
"Una nor no sey e beta mak won man die for evribodi, dan sey mak evribodi for dis kontri die?"
(Dis man tok laik dis, bikos naim bi di High Prist dat year. E tok tru sey, Jisos go die for di hol Ju pipol, bot e nor no wetin e tok,
and nor bi for onli di Ju pipol, bot mak all God shildren, wey dey di wold for gada togeda.)
So from dat day, dem kon dey plan to kil Jisos.
Bikos of dis, Jisos nor kon dey waka for Judea as e dey du bifor, bot en and en disaipols kon go stay for di tawn wey dem dey kol Efraim, wey near desert.
Wen Passova Fist don near, meni pipol for di kontri go Jerusalem, kon dey mak demsef klin for di fist, as dia tradishon tok.
Dem bigin dey luk for Jisos kon dey ask ish oda insaid di Tempol yard, "Wetin yu tink, e go kom for di fist?" Abi yu nor tink so?
(By dis taim, di prist oga dem and di Farisi pipol don giv orda sey, enibodi wey no wer Jisos dey, mak e kon tok, so dat dem go-go kash am).
Sis days bifor Passova Fist rish, Jisos go Betani, wer Lazarus, di pesin wey e wak-up from deat, dey stay.
So dem kon du parti for Jisos dat evenin. Marta kon dey serv dem fud and Lazarus dey among di pipol wey sidan for tabol wit Jisos.
Mary tak perfume wey dear wel-wel, wey plenti rish quota galon kon pour am for Jisos tu leg. Den e yuz en hair tak klin dem. (Di perfume sent kon ful evriwer for insaid di haus).
Bot Judas Iskarot, won of Jisos disaipol (di pesin wey go sel am giv en enemis), kon sey,
"Why wi nor sel dis perfume for tiri ondred koins (moni wey pas wetin wokas go get for won year) kon giv di moni to poor pipol?"
(Judas tok laik dis, nor bi sey e kare for poor pipol, bot bikos na tif e bi. As e bi sey naim dey kip di moni, e dey tif from am.)
Den Jisos ansa, "Mak yu nor trobol di wuman, e du dis tin dey wait di day wen dem go bere mi.
"Poor pipol go always dey wit una, bot I nor go dey wit una all di taim."
For dis taim, plenti pipol wey dey Judea hear sey Jisos dey for dia tawn, so dem kon gada, nor bi bikos of Jisos alone, bot dem won si Lazarus tu, di pesin wey die bifor, wey Jisos wak-up.
Di prist oga dem kon plan to kil Lazarus tu,
bikos naim mak plenti Ju pipol for Jerusalem, biliv Jisos.
Wen day break, plenti pipol wey kom di Fist kon hear sey Jisos dey kom Jerusalem.
Di pipol tak palm tri leaf go wait am for road. Dem kon bigin shaut, "Hosanna, mak God bless di pesin wey E send kom mit us. Mak God bless Izrel king!"
Jisos si won smol donkey and e kon sidan put, jos as God wod sey,
"Pipol wey dey Zion, mak una nor fear; mak una si una king sidan on-top donkey dey kom!"
(En disaipols nor undastand dis tins wey dey hapun, ontil wen Jisos don wak-up from grave, naim dem kon rimemba wetin God wod sey go hapun.)
So di pipol wey dey wit am wen e wak Lazarus from grave kon tel odas abaut am.
And dem gada go mit Jisos, bikos dem hear sey na-im wak Lazarus from grave.
Den di Farisi pipol kon tel ish oda, "Una dey si sey wetin wi dey du so nor get head! Si o-o, evribodi don bigin folo am."
Som Greek pipol go woship God for di fist for Jerusalem.
Dem kon mit Filip wey kom from Betsaida for Galili kon tel am, "Oga, wi go laik to si Jisos."
Filip tel Andru, den dem kon go tel Jisos.
Jisos tel dem, "Di taim don kom wen God go onor en own pikin.
"I tel una tru wod, if won corn sid fal for groun and e nor die, e nor go grow, bot if e die, e go grow kon bear plenti sid.
"Enibodi wey luv en life for dis wold, go luz am, bot di pesin wey nor luv en life for dis wold, go get life wey nor dey end.
"Enibodi wey redi to serv mi, go must folo mi and wer I dey, na der my savant go dey tu. Enibodi wey serv mi, my Papa go onor am.
"My heart heavi wel-wel. Wetin I go tok? 'Papa, mak yu save mi from dis tin wey won hapun'? No! Na dis tin mak mi kom dis wold.
"Papa, mak yu onor yor name." Den won vois tok from hevun sey, "I don onor am bifor and I go onor am again."
Wen di pipol wey dey di place hear di vois, som kon sey, "Di vois sound laik thunda", bot odas sey, "Na angel dey tok to am."
Jisos kon sey, "Dis vois nor tok bikos of mi, bot na bikos of una."
Di taim to joj di pipol for dis wold don rish and God go driv Satan, wey dey kontrol dis wold komot.
Bot as for mi, if una kari mi go up for kros, I go draw evribodi kom mit mi."
(E tok laik dis, mak pipol for no di way e go tak die).
Den di pipol ask, "Wi no sey God law sey, 'Kraist go liv foreva.' Why yu kon dey tok sey dem go kari Man Pikin put for kros? Na hu bi dis Man Pikin sef?"
Jisos ansa dem, "My lite nor go dey wit una tey. Naw wen di lite dey, mak una tak am waka, so dat daknes nor go kova una. Bikos di pesin wey dey waka for daknes, nor dey si wer e dey go.
"As una get di lite naw, mak una biliv am, so dat una go bi lite shildren. Wen Jisos don tok dis tin finish, e kon komot der go hide.
Aldoh Jisos don du meni mirakol for dia front, dem nor stil biliv am.
Dis mak wetin Profet Isaia tok hapun, wen e sey, "Oga, wish pipol don biliv wetin wi tok and hu God don show en pawa?"
As di pipol nor fit biliv, naim mak Isaia tok anoda wod sey,
"God don blind dia eye and mak dia heart strong laik stone, so dat dem nor go si wit dia eye and undastand wit dia heart, so dem nor go fit kom mit mi, mak I for heal dem."
Isaia tok dis tins, bikos e si haw God onor and tok abaut Kraist.
Meni pipol and meni Ju oga kon biliv Jisos, bot bikos of di Farisi pipol, doz wey biliv nor fit tok for publik abaut Jisos Kraist, so dat dem nor go driv dem komot for di sinagog.
Bikos Ju pipol laik mak pipol dey praiz dem pas wetin God tink abaut dem.
Jisos kon shaut sey, "Di pesin wey biliv mi, nor bi mi e biliv, bot na my Papa wey send mi.
"And di pesin wey si mi, don si God wey send mi.
"I kom as lite for dis wold, so dat enibodi wey go biliv mi nor go waka insaid daknes.
"Enibodi wey hear wetin I tok and nor obey am, nor bi mi go joj am, bikos I nor kom joj di wold, bot I kom save pipol for di wold.
"Enibodi wey rejet mi and nor du wetin I tok, God go yuz dis my wod joj am for di last day.
"Bikos nor bi my pawa I tak dey tok, bot na my Papa wey send mi dey tel mi wetin I dey tok.
"I no sey enitin wey God komand, dey giv life wey nor dey end, so I dey tok wetin E send mi."
Bifor dem du di Passova Fist, Jisos no sey en taim don rish wen e go komot for dis wold go mit en Papa. Bikos e luv di pipol wey dey di wold, e kon show dem haw en luv for dem strong rish.
Bifor dem start to chop evenin fud, devol don alredi enta Judas Iskarot maind, wey bi Saimon pikin, sey, mak e sel Jisos giv en enemi.
Bikos Jisos no sey en Papa don gi-am pawa to kontrol evritin and as e bi sey e kom from God and e dey go bak go mit am,
e kon stand-up for wer dem dey chop, rimov en big koat kon tie towel for en waist.
E kon pour wota for basin, bigin dey wosh en disaipols leg and dey dry dem wit di towel wey dey en waist.
Wen e rish Saimon Pita turn, Pita kon tel am, "Oga, yu won wosh my leg?"
Jisos ansa, "Yu nor go fit undastand wetin I dey du naw, bot yu go undastand am leta."
Pita kon tel am, "I nor go gri mak yu wosh my leg!" Den Jisos ansa, "If I nor wosh yor leg, mi and yu nor go get enitin togeda again."
So Saimon Pita tel am, "Oga, mak yu nor wosh onli my leg, bot mak yu wosh my hand and head tu!"
Jisos ansa, "Di pesin wey don baff, onli nid to wosh en leg, bikos e don dey klin. Una dey klin, bot nor bi all of una."
(Bikos Jisos no di pesin wey go sel am, naim mak am sey, "Nor bi all of una dey klin.")
So wen Jisos don wosh dia leg finish, e kon wear en big koat bak. Den e go sidan for di tabol kon ask dem, "Una undastand wetin I du for una so?
"Una dey kol mi 'Tisha' and 'Oga', una koret, bikos na so I bi.
"So, if mi, wey bi una oga and tisha, wosh una leg, e gud mak una wosh ish oda leg tu.
"I don giv una ezampol wey una go folo. So mak una du for ish oda as I don du for una."
"Mak I tel una tru wod, savant nor dey big pas en oga, jos as di pesin wey bi mesenga nor dey big pas di oga wey send am.
"Since una no wetin I dey tok, God go bless una, if una du dem."
"Wetin I dey tok so nor konsan all of una, bikos I no di pipol wey I shuz. Dis show sey God wod na tru, sey, 'Di pesin wey folo mi chop don turn to my enemi.'
"I don tel una bifor e go hapun, so dat wen e hapun, una go biliv sey na mi bi Kraist.
"I dey tel una tru wod, enibodi wey risiv di pesin wey I send, don risiv mi and enibodi wey risiv mi, don risiv God wey send mi kom."
Wen e don tok dis tin finish, en heart kon heavi wel-wel, den e sey, "I dey tel una tru wod, won of una go sel mi giv my enemi."
Di disaipols luk ish oda kon dey wori and tink for dia maind sey, "Wish pesin e dey tok abaut?"
Jon, di disaipol wey Jisos luv wel-wel, sidan for en rite hand wen dem dey chop.
So, Saimon Pita kon yuz eye tel am sey mak e ask Jisos wish pesin e dey tok abaut.
Den Jon bend en head near Jisos chest kon ask am, "Oga, hu yu dey tok abaut?"
Jisos ansa, "Na di pesin wey I go giv dis bread afta I don shuk-am insaid di pot." Den e shuk di bread insaid di pot kon gi-am to Judas Iskarot, wey bi Saimon pikin.
Afta Judas tak di bread, devol enta en maind. Jisos kon tel am, "Di tin wey yu won du, mak yu go du-am kwik-kwik."
(None of dem wey sidan for di tabol undastand why Jisos tok to Judas laik dat.
Som of dem tink sey, since na Judas dey kip di moni, Jisos tel am sey mak e go buy wetin dem go yuz for di fist or mak e giv poor pipol moni).
Wen Judas don tak di bread, e huri komot for di place. (By dis taim, day don dak.)
Wen e don komot, Jisos kon sey, "Naw, di taim don rish wen God go onor en pikin and en pikin go onor am tu.
"Wen di pikin don onor God, God sef go onor am bak.
"My shildren, na smol taim rimain wey I go dey wit una. Leta, una go dey faind mi and as I tel di Ju oga dem bifor sey, 'Wer I dey go una nor go fit kom der', na di same wod I dey tel una naw.
"I dey giv una new komand: Una must luv ish oda, as I luv una,
so dat evribodi go no sey una bi my disaipols, if una luv ish oda."
Saimon Pita kon tel am, "Oga, wer yu dey go?" Jisos ansa, "Una nor go fit folo mi go di place wey I dey go naw, bot una go kom mit mi for der leta."
Pita ask am, "Oga, why wi nor go fit folo yu naw? I redi to die bikos of yu!"
Jisos ansa am, "Yu rili redi to die for mi? Mak I tel yu tru wod, bifor fawo go du 'Kukuruku' dis nite, yu go tok tiri taims sey, yu no mi."
"Mak una nor let enitin wori una maind. Since una biliv God, mak una stil biliv mi.
"Meni rooms dey for my Papa haus and I dey go priper place for una to stay, if nor bi so, I for tel una.
"Wen I don finish, I go kom tak una, so dat una go stay wit mi for wer I dey.
"And una go no di place wey I dey go and haw una go tak rish der."
Tomas kon ask am, "Oga, wi nor no wer yu dey go, haw wi go tak no road?"
Jisos ansa am, "Na mi bi di road, di trut and life. Nobodi go fit go mit my Papa, unles e pas tru mi.
"Bot since una don no mi, una go no my Papa tu. Naw wey una don no am, una don si-am."
Filip kon sey, "Oga, show us yor Papa and wi go dey okay."
Jisos ansa am, "So Filip, I don dey wit una all dis taim and yu stil nor no mi? Di pesin wey don si mi, don si my Papa! Why yu kon dey sey, 'Show us yor Papa?'

"Yu nor biliv sey mi and my Papa na di same? As e dey insaid mi, na so I dey insaid am. Di wod wey I dey tel una so, I nor dey tok am wit my own pawa, bot na my Papa wey dey insaid mi, dey du all dis mirakol tru mi.
"Mak una biliv sey I dey insaid my Papa and my Papa dey insaid mi, bot if una nor fit biliv mi, mak una biliv bikos of di mirakols wey I dey du.
"I tel una tru wod, di pesin wey biliv mi, go du di kaind mirakol wey I dey du and e go ivun du di wons wey big pas dem, bikos I dey go mit my Papa.
"And enitin wey una yuz my name ask, I go du-am, so dat pipol go onor di Papa bikos of en pikin.
"If una ask enitin wit my name, I go du-am for una.
"If una luv mi, una go du wetin I tok.
"Den I go ask my Papa and E go send una anoda Pesin wey go help and stay wit una foreva.
"Naim bi di Spirit wey dey tok trut, wey pipol for dis wold nor go fit risiv, bikos dem nor fit si-am or no am, bot una no am, bikos e dey stay insaid una.
"I nor go liv una laik pikin wey nor get papa and mama, bikos I go kom mit una again.
"Afta somtaim, di pipol for dis wold nor go si mi, bot una go si mi and bikos I dey alaif, una go dey alaif tu.
"Dat taim, una go no sey I dey insaid my Papa and una dey insaid mi, as I dey insaid una.
"Enibodi wey hear and du wetin I tok, luv mi. Di pesin wey luv mi, mi and my Papa go luv am tu and I go show am hu I bi."
Judas (dis nor bi Judas Iskarot) kon sey, "Oga, why yu won show yorsef giv us and yu nor won show oda pipol for di wold?"
Jisos ansa am, "Enibodi wey luv mi, go du wetin I tok and my Papa go luv am, wi go kon mit and stay wit am.
"Di pesin wey nor luv mi, nor go du wetin I tok. Wetin una dey hear so nor bi my wod, bot na my Papa own.
"I don dey tel una all dis tins since I dey wit una.
"Bot di pesin wey go help una na di Holi Spirit, wey my Papa go send kom for my name. E go tish una evritin and e go help una rimemba evritin wey I don tel una.
"Mak una maind res, bikos na my peace I giv una. My peace difren from di won wey di wold dey giv. Mak una nor fear or alow enitin wori una maind.
"Una rimemba wen I tel una sey, 'I dey komot and I go kom bak kon mit una?' If una luv mi, una go hapi wen I tok sey, 'I dey go mit my Papa', bikos my Papa big pas mi.
"I don tel una naw bifor e hapun, so dat wen e hapun, una go biliv mi.
"I nor go tok tu mush naw, bikos di devol wey dey rule dis wold, dey kom and e nor get pawa for my bodi.
"Since I dey du wetin my Papa tel mi, di wold go no sey I luv my Papa. So mak una get up mak wi dey go."
"Na mi bi di koret vine and na my Papa bi di gardina.
"E dey kut evri bransh wey nor dey bear frut for my bodi komot and e dey ripair evri bransh for my bodi wey dey bear frut, so dat e go bear more frut.
"Una dey klin alredi, bikos of di wod wey I tel una.
"Mak una dey insaid mi, so dat I go dey insaid una tu. As di bransh nor fit bear frut wit en own pawa, unles e dey insaid di vine plant, na so una nor go fit bear frut, unles una dey insaid mi.
"Na mi bi di vine and na una bi di bransh dem. Di pesin wey stay insaid mi and I stay insaid am, go bear plenti frut, bikos witout mi, una nor go fit du enitin.
"Enibodi wey nor stay insaid mi, go dry and pipol go gada en bransh dem, trow dem insaid fire kon burn dem.
"If una stay insaid mi and my wod dey insaid una, enitin wey una ask, I go du-am for una.
"My Papa go get big onor if una bear plenti frut, wey go show sey una bi my disaipols.
"As my Papa luv mi, na so I luv una tu, so mak una liv di kaind life wey go let mi fit luv una more-more.
"If una du wetin I tok, I go luv una, jos as I dey obey wetin my Papa tok and E luv mi.
"I don tel una all dis tins, so dat my joy go dey insaid una and una joy go ful wel-wel.
"Dis na di komand wey I giv una sey, 'Mak una luv ish oda di way I luv una.'
"E nor get luv wey big rish di won wey mak pesin die for en frend.
"Una go bi my frend if una du wetin I tok.
"I nor go kol una savant again, bikos savant nor dey undastand wetin en oga dey du, bot I dey kol una my frend, bikos I don show una evritin wey I hear from my Papa.
"Nor bi una shuz mi, bot na mi shuz una. Bikos of dat, I don giv una pawa to bear frut wey go last, so dat my papa go giv una enitin wey una ask am for my name.
"Wetin I dey tel una bi sey, 'Mak una luv ish oda.'"
"If pipol for dis wold hate una, mak una rimemba sey na mi dem first hate.
"If una bi frend wit di pipol for dis wold, dem go luv una as dia own pipol. Bot una nor bi dia frend, bikos I don shuz una from di wold, naim mak dem nor laik una.
"Mak una rimemba wetin I tel una, 'Savant nor dey big pas en oga.' If dem sofa mi, den dem go sofa una tu. If to sey dem obey my wod, dem go obey una own tu.
"Since dem nor no di Pesin wey send mi kom, dem go du all dis tins to una bikos of my name.
"If to sey I nor kom tok to dem, dem for nor dey guilti for dia sin. Bot naw, dem nor get eni eskius for dia sin.
"Di pesin wey hate mi, hate my Papa tu.
"If to sey dem nor si di mirakol wey I du, wey nobodi don du bifor, dem nor for dey guilti for dia sin. Bot afta dem don si di mirakols, dem stil hate mi and my Papa.
"All dis tins hapun, so dat wetin God law tok, go bi tru sey, 'Dem nor get rizin to tak hate mi.'
"Bot wen di tru Spirit wey I go send from my Papa to help una don kom, e go tok abaut mi.
"And unasef go tok abaut mi, bikos una dey wit mi from di biginin."
"I dey tel una all dis tins, so dat nobodi go fit disiv una.
"Dem go driv una komot for di sinagog and di taim dey kom wen di pesin wey go kil una, go tink sey e dey du God wok.
"Dem go du all dis tins, bikos dem nor no mi and my Papa.
"Bot I tel una all dis tins, so dat wen di taim rish, una go rimemba sey I tel una abaut dem bifor. I jos dey tel una all dis tins, bikos I dey wit una since.
"Naw, I dey go mit di Pesin wey send mi kom, bot una dey ask mi, 'Wer yu dey go?'
"Bot una nor hapi as I dey tel una all dis tins.
"I tel una tru wod, na for una own gud naim mak mi won go, bikos if I nor go, di Pesin wey go help una nor go kom, bot if I go, I go send am kom mit una.
"Wen e kom, e go show pipol for dis wold wetin sin, God raitiousnes and God jojment, bi.
"Di Spirit go show dem sey dem dey wrong abaut sin, bikos dem nor biliv mi.
"Dem dey wrong abaut God raitiousnes, bikos I dey go mit my Papa and dem nor go si mi again.
"And dem dey wrong abaut jojment, bikos God don kondem di pesin wey dey rule dis wold.
"I get plenti tins wey I won tel una, bot una nor go fit bear dem naw.
"Bot wen God Spirit kom, e go show una di trut. E nor go tok wetin dey en maind, bot e go tok wetin e hear from God and wetin go hapun afta I don go.
"E go dey giv mi glori wen e dey tel una di tins wey e dey hear from mi.
"Evritin wey my Papa get, na my own, naim mak mi tok sey di Spirit go tel una wetin e dey hear from mi.
"Taim go soon kom wen una nor go si mi, bot afta som taim, una go si mi."
Den som of di disaipol kon dey ask ish oda, "Wetin e min wen e sey, 'Taim go soon kom wen una nor go si mi, bot afta som taim, una go si mi bikos I dey go mit my Papa?'"
Som of dem stil sey, "Wetin e get for maind wen e sey, 'Taim go soon kom?' Wi nor undastand wetin e dey tok."
Jisos si sey dem won ask am abaut wetin e tel dem, naim e ask dem, "Una dey ask ish oda wetin I min wen I sey, 'Taim go soon kom wen una nor go si mi, bot afta som taim, una go si mi?'
"I tel una tru wod, una go krai and mourn, bot di wold go dey hapi; una go dey sad wel-wel, bot una sadnes go turn to hapines.
"Wen wuman won born pikin, e dey sofa strong pain, bikos en taim to born don rish, bot wen e don born, e go hapi and e nor go rimemba di pain again, bikos e go si sey e don born pikin.
"Na so e bi to una naw, bikos una heart dey heavi, bot I go si una again and for dat taim, una go dey hapi and nobodi go fit tak di hapines from una.
"By dat taim, una nor go ask mi enitin again. I tel una tru wod sey, enitin wey una ask my Papa wit my name, E go giv una.
"Bifor naw, una neva tak my name ask for enitin. Naw mak una yuz my name ask for enitin wey una wont and una go get-am, so dat una joy go ful wel-wel.
"Since I dey yuz parabol tok to una; bot di taim dey kom wen I nor go yuz parabol again, bot I go tel una abaut my Papa for di way wey una go undastand.
"By dat taim, una go fit ask enitin wit my name and God go du-am for una.
"My Papa luv una, bikos una luv mi and biliv sey na-im send mi.
"Na my Papa send mi kom dis wold, bot naw, I dey go bak go mit am."
En disaipols kon sey, "Yu si, na naw yu dey tok for di way wey wi undastand and nor bi wit parabol.
"Naw wi no sey yu no evritin and yu nor nid enibodi to ask yu eni kweshon. Bikos of dis, wi biliv sey na God send yu kom."
Jisos kon tel dem, "So una don biliv naw?
"Luk, di taim dey kom and e don ivun rish, wen una go skata and evribodi go-go en own way and I go stay alone. Bot I nor dey alone, bikos my Papa dey wit mi.
"I don tel una all dis tins, so dat my peace go stay wit una. Wahala ful insaid di wold and sofa dey tu, bot mak una heart dey strong, bikos I don alredi win di wold."
Wen Jisos don tok all dis tins finish, e luk up go hevun kon sey, "My Papa, di taim don kom wen Yu go giv glori to yor pikin, so dat yor pikin go giv Yu glori tu.
"Jos as Yu don giv mi pawa ova all di pipol for di wold, na so tu I go giv life wey nor dey end to evribodi wey Yu giv mi.
"Life wey nor dey end, dis na wetin e min, 'Na mak pipol no yu wey bi di onli tru God and Jisos Kraist, wey Yu send.'
"I don giv Yu glori for dis wold and I don finish di wok wey Yu send mi.
"And naw, Papa onor mi, mak Yu draw mi near Yu, jos as wi dey bifor di wold start."
"I don mak di pipol wey Yu giv mi for dis wold no yor name. Na yor own dem bi bifor Yu giv dem to mi and dem don obey yor wod.
"Naw, dem don no sey evritin wey Yu giv mi kom from Yu,
bikos I don tel dem di mesage wey Yu giv mi. Dem don asept wetin I tel dem and dem no and biliv sey na Yu send mi.
"I dey pray for di pipol wey Yu giv mi, bikos dem bi yor own, bot I nor dey pray for di oda pipol wey dey insaid di wold.
"Evritin wey I get, na yor own and evritin wey Yu get, na my own and dem don onor mi.
"I nor go dey di wold again, bot dem go stil dey insaid di wold, since I won kom mit Yu. Holi Papa, mak yor name protet di pipol wey Yu giv mi, so dat dem go bi won, jos as mi and Yu na won.
"Wen I dey wit dem, I kip dem wit yor name. No won loss, esept di won wey yor wod sey e go perish.
"Since I dey kom mit Yu, I dey tok all dis tins for di wold, so dat dia joy go ful wel-wel.
"I don giv dem yor wod and bikos of dat, di pipol for wold hate dem, since dem nor bilong to di wold, as misef nor bilong to di wold.
"I nor sey mak Yu rimov dem from di wold, bot mak Yu protet dem from di devol.
"Dem nor bilong to di wold, jos as misef nor bilong to di wold.
"Mak Yu protet dem wit di trut, bikos na yor wod bi di trut.
"Jos as Yu send mi kom insaid dis wold, na so tu I send dem go insaid di wold.
"I don seprate mysef from di wold for dia sake, so dat dem go fit seprate diasef from di wold tu."
"I nor dey pray for dem alone, bot I also dey pray for oda pipol wey go biliv mi tru di wod wey dem go tok abaut mi.
"Papa, I dey pray, so dat all of dem go get won maind, jos as mi and Yu bi won. I stil dey pray mak dem dey wit us, so dat di wold go biliv sey na Yu send mi.
"I don giv dem di onor wey Yu giv mi, so dat dem go bi won jos as wi bi won:
"I dey wit dem and Yu dey wit mi, so dat dem go rili bi won, jos as wi bi won and di wold go no sey na Yu send mi and Yu luv dem, as Yu luv mi.
"Papa, I wont mak di pipol wey Yu giv mi stay wit mi for wer I dey, so dat dem go si di glori wey Yu giv mi, bikos Yu luv mi bifor Yu mak di wold.
"Holi Papa, ivun if di pipol for di wold nor no Yu, I no Yu and dis wons no sey na Yu send mi.
"I don help dem no yor name and I go dey trai to mak oda pipol no am tu, so dat di luv wey Yu get for mi, go dey wit dem, as I dey wit dem.
Afta e don tok finish, Jisos and en disaipols komot kros go Kidron Vali kon enta won big farm.
(Judas, wey sel Jisos, no di place, bikos Jisos don go der wit en disaipols meni taims).
So Judas kon eskot meni soja, som Tempol polish and Farisi pipol enta di farm. Dem hol lamp, tosh and som hol sword and stick for hand.
Bikos Jisos no evritin wey go hapun to am, e kon ask dem, "Hu una dey faind?"
Dem ansa am, "Na Jisos wey kom from Nazaret." E kon tel dem, "Na mi bi di pesin." (Judas wey sel am, stand der wit dem).
So wen Jisos don tel dem sey, "Na mi bi di pesin", dem dress go bak kon fal for groun.
Den Jisos ask dem again, "Hu una sey una dey faind?" Dem ansa, "Na Jisos wey kom from Nazaret."
Jisos kon sey, "I don tel una sey na mi bi di pesin. Since na mi una dey faind, mak una alow dis men go."
(E tok dis wod mak e bi sey wetin dem rite for God wod na tru, "I nor loss enibodi wey Yu giv mi.")
Den Saimon Pita bring en sword out kon kut di High Prist savant rite ear komot. (Di savant name na Malkus).
Jisos kon tel Pita, "Mak yu put yor sword bak for wer e dey bifor! Yu nor no sey I go drink from di sofa cup wey my Papa giv mi?"
Den di sojas wit dia oga and di Ju oga dem tak Jisos kon tie-am wit rope.
Dem tak am go mit Annas, Kaifas fada-en-law, wey bi di High Prist for dat year.
(Dis na di Kaifas wey advise di Ju oga dem sey, "E gud mak won man die for evribodi").
Saimon Pita wit anoda disaipol kon folo dem as dem dey tak Jisos go mit Annas. (Di oda disaipol no di High Prist wel-wel, so e folo Jisos enta insaid di High Prist kompoun).
Bot Saimon Pita stand outsaid di kompoun near di door. Den di oda disaipol wey no di High Prist kom out tok to di savant girl wey dey gaid di gate and e kon alow Pita enta insaid.
Di girl wey dey di gate kon ask Pita, "Yu nor bi won of dis man disaipol?" At wons, Pita kon ansa, "I nor bi won of dem."
For dis taim, all di savant and gaids gada roun shakol fire wey dem mak to warm demsef, bikos kold strong wel-wel. Pita folo dem stand der dey warm ensef tu.
As dem dey der, di High Prist bigin dey ask Jisos kweshon abaut en disaipols and wetin e tish.
Jisos kon ansa am, "Na for publik I tok wetin I tish. Na insaid sinagog and Tempol wer all di Ju pipol dey gada, na der I for dey tish. I nor tok enitin for sikrit.
"Why yu dey ask mi? Mak yu ask di pipol wey hear mi. Dem no wetin I tok."
Afta Jisos don tok finish, won of di High Prist savant, wey stand near am slap am for face kon ask am, "Na di High Prist yu dey tok to laik dis?"
Den Jisos sey, "If wetin I tok nor koret, mak yu tel mi, bot if e koret, why yu slap mi?"
Den Annas kon send am as dem stil tie am wit rope, go mit Kaifas, wey bi di High Prist.
As Saimon Pita stand for insaid di kompoun dey warm ensef, dem kon ask am, "Yu tu nor bi won of en disaipol?" Pita denai sey, "I nor dey among dem."
Won High Prist savant, wey bi di same famili wit di man wey Pita tak sword kut en ear kon sey, "I nor si yu wit am for insaid di farm?"
Pita denai again for dia front and fawo kon du "Kukuruku."

Den, dem tak Jisos komot from Kaifas place go di Roman Govnor palise. (By dis taim, mornin don rish). Dem nor gri enta insaid di govnor haus, mak dem nor for dirti as dia tradishon tok, so dat dem go fit chop di Passova fud.
So Pilate kom mit dem for outsaid kon ask dem, "Wetin una sey dis man du?"
Dem ansa, "If to sey dis man nor bi krimina, wi nor for bring am kom mit yu."
Den Pilate tel dem, "Mak una go joj am as una law tok." Di Ju Oga dem kon sey, "Awa law nor giv us pawa to kil enibodi."
(Dis tin hapun to show sey wetin Jisos tok abaut haw e go die, na tru).
So Pilate go insaid en haus for di palise, kon kol Jisos ask am, "Na yu bi di Ju pipol king?"
Jisos ansa am, "Na from yor maind yu ask dis kweshon, abi pipol don tel yu abaut mi?"
Pilate ansa am, "Yu no sey I nor bi Ju, abi? Na yor pipol and prist oga dem bring yu kom mit mi. Wetin yu du sef?"
Jisos ansa, "My kindom nor dey dis wold. If to sey my kindom dey dis wold, my savants for fite mak I nor for kom mit di Ju oga dem. Bot as e bi so, my kindom nor dey here."

Den Pilate ask am, "So yu bi king?" Jisos ansa, "Na yu tok so and yu dey koret sey, I bi king." Na dis mak dem born mi and naim mak mi kom dis wold kon tok di trut. Enibodi wey wont hear di trut, go listin to wetin I dey tok."
Pilate stil ask am, "Wetin bi di trut?" Den e go outsaid again go mit di Ju oga dem kon tel dem, "I nor si eni bad tin wey dis man du o-o.
"Bot as una kustom sey mak I fri won prizina for una for Passova, una wont mak I fri Jisos, wey bi di Ju king?"
Den, dem kon dey shaut, "Wi nor wont dis man, na Barabas wi wont." (Na krimina dis Barabas bi).
Den Pilate kon sey mak dem flog Jisos wit koboko.
Den di sojas go kut tri bransh wey get shuku-shuku mak krawn put for en head and dem kon wear am klot wey dear wel-wel.
Dem kon dey laff am, dey tak am mak ye-ye, dey sey, "Mak una kon si di Ju pipol king." Dem slap am for face meni taims.
Pilate kom out again kon tel di Ju oga dem sey, "I won bring am kom out for una, to let una no sey I nor si enitin bad wey e du."
So Jisos kom outsaid, wit di shuku-shuku krawn for en head and di fine klot wey dem gi-am wear. Den Pilate kon sey, "Na di man bi dis!"
Wen di prist oga dem and di Tempol polish dem si-am, dem kon dey shaut, "Nail am for kros! Nail am for kros!" Den Pilate sey, "Mak onli una go nail am. Bot as for mi, I nor si eni bad tin wey e du."
Di Ju oga dem ansa, "Wi get law and di law sey, e sopoz to die, bikos e sey en na God Pikin."
Wen Pilate hear wetin dem tok, fear kon kash am wel-wel.
So e enta di haus bak kon ask Jisos, "Na wer yu from kom sef?" Bot Jisos nor ansa am.
So Pilate kon sey, "Yu nor won tok to mi? Yu nor no sey I get pawa to fri or kil yu?"
Jisos ansa, "Yu nor get pawa at-all for my life, esept God gi-am to yu. So, na di pipol wey bring mi kom mit yu, na dia sin big pas yor own."
From dat taim, Pilate kon bigin faind way to fri Jisos, bot di Ju oga dem kon dey shaut, "If yu fri dis man, yu nor bi Caesar frend. Enibodi wey sey en bi king, na Caesar enimi e bi."
Wen Pilate hear wetin dem tok, e bring Jisos kom out kon sidan for di chair for wer e dey joj kase, (dem dey kol di chair, 'Di Stone Pavement', bot na Gabata dem dey kol am for Aramaic language.)
(Dat taim na aftanun for di day wen dem dey priper for Passova Fist). So, Pilate kon tel di Ju oga dem, "Mak una luk, na una king bi dis!"

Den, dem kon bigin dey shaut, "Kil am trowey! Kil am trowey! Mak yu kil-am!" Pilate kon ask dem, "Una wont mak I nail una king for kros?" Di High Prist dem kon sey, "Di onli king wey wi get na Caesar."
So Pilate kon gi-am to dem mak dem go kil-am. Den dem kon tak Jisos komot for der.
As Jisos kari en kros dey go, e kon rish di place wey dem dey kol "Di Skul" (na Golgota dem dey kol di place for Aramaic language.)
For der, dem kon nail Jisos for kros. Dem stil nail tu oda pipol for kros, won for en rite and di oda for en left.
Pilate kon rite for sign-board wey dem nail on-top Jisos kros, wey sey, "Dis na Jisos wey kom from Nazaret, wey bi di Ju pipol king."
Since di place wer dem kil Jisos near tawn, meni of di Ju pipol wey dey for Jerusalem kom read di sign-board, bikos dem rite am for tiri language wey bi Aramaic, Latin and Greek.
Den di chief prists kon tel Pilate, "Mak yu nor rite sey, dis na Ju pipol king", bot rite sey, dis man sey, 'I bi Ju pipol king.'"
Bot Pilate ansa dem, "Wetin I don rite finish, na so e go bi."
Wen di sojas don nail Jisos for kros, dem tear en klot and dem for kon divide am. Bot dem liv di fine koat (bikos e nor get wer dem join am, since dem weave-am from top go rish botom).

So di sojas tel ish oda sey, "Mak wi nor tear am, bot mak wi gambol to si hu go tak am. Dis tin hapun to show sey, wetin dem rite for God wod na tru sey, "Dem go divide my klot, afta dem don gambol for am".
By dis taim, di onli pipol wey stand near di kros wer dem nail Jisos, na-im mama; en aunti, Mary wey bi Klopas wife and Mary Magdalin.
So wen Jisos si en mama and Jon, di disaipol wey e luv wel-wel stand for der, e kon tel en mama, "Mama, luk, dis na yor pikin."
Den e tel di disaipol, "Mak yu luk, dis na yor mama." From dat taim, di disaipol kon tak Jisos mama go en own haus.
Wen Jisos si sey evritin don finish, e kon sey, "Wota dey hungri mi", (dis show sey wetin God tok, rili hapun).
Di sojas soak sponge insaid wine wey bita, wey dey won kontena for der kon put am for di bransh of won plant wey dem dey kol hyssop kon stresh am put for Jisos mout.
Wen e don taste di wine, Jisos kon sey, "Evritin don finish." Den e bend en head dan, kon die.

Dis tin hapun for di day wen dem dey priper for di Passova Fist and bikos dem nor wont mak di dead bodi dem stay for kros for Sabat Day, (bikos dat Sabat Day na special won for dem), di Ju oga dem kon tel Pilate mak dem break dia leg, to mak sure sey dem don die, so dat dem go fit bring dia dead bodi kom dan.
So di sojas break di oda tu pipol leg wey dem kil wit Jisos.
Bot wen dem rish di kros wey Jisos dey and si sey e don die, dem nor kon break en leg.
Bot won soja kon tak spear shuk di kona of en bele, den blood and wota kon dey rush kom out.
All dis stori na tru, (bikos na di pesin wey si dem hapun, naim tok abaut dem and wetin e tok na tru), so dat una go fit biliv.
All dis tin hapun to show sey, wetin dem rite for God wod na tru sey, "Dem nor go break won singol bone for en bodi."
And God wod stil sey, "Dem go stand dey sopraiz as dem dey luk di pesin wey dem shuk en bodi."

Afta dis taim, Josef wey kom from Arimatia, wey bi Jisos sikrit disaipol, (bikos e dey fear di oda Ju oga dem), kon ask Pilate mak e alow am kari Jisos dead bodi komot for der. Pilate gri for am and e go kari Jisos bodi komot.
Nikodimos, di man wey hide go si Jisos for nite, kon folo Josef. E kari perfume wey heavi rish sevunti-faiv pounds, wey dem tak myrrh and aloe spice mak.
Den dem pour di perfume for Jisos bodi kon rap am wit linen klot akordin to di way Ju pipol dey priper dead bodi for beria.
Won garden dey near di place wer dem kil Jisos and won new grave wey dem neva bere enibodi put bifor, dey insaid di garden.
Since dat day na di day wey Ju pipol dey priper for di Passova Fist and bikos di new grave dey near der, dem kon bere Jisos insaid di grave.
For di first day for di wik, wen day neva break wel, Mary Magdalin kon go wer di grave dey. E si sey dem don rimov di stone wey dem tak kova di grave mout.
Den e run go mit Saimon Pita and Jon kon tel dem, "Sombodi don kari Jisos bodi komot from di grave and wi nor no wer dem put am."
So Pita and Jon kon go wer di grave dey.
Di tu of dem kon dey run togeda, bot Jon run pas Pita kon first am rish di grave.
E nor enta insaid di grave, bot e bend dan kon si di linen klot wey dem tak wrap Jisos bodi for groun insaid di grave.
Wen Saimon Pita rish der, e enta insaid di grave kon si di linen klot for groun tu.
Bot di smol klot wey dey for Jisos head nor dey for di same place wer di oda klot dey, e dey on en own for won kona.
Den Jon kon enta insaid and wetin e si kon mak am biliv.
(Bikos dem undastand God wod wey sey, Jisos go wak-up afta e die).
So di tu disaipol kon go bak to dia haus.
Bot Mary stand for outsaid di grave dey krai. As e stil dey krai, e kon bend dan luk insaid di grave.
Den e si tu angel wey wear white klot sidan for wer dem put Jisos bodi. Won dey for wer di head dey and di oda dey for wer di leg dey.
Dem kon ask am, "Wuman, why yu dey krai?" Mary ansa, "Dem don kari my oga komot and I nor no wer dem kari am go."
Afta e tok finish, e turn roun kon si Jisos stand for der, bot e nor no sey na Jisos bi dat.
Jisos tel am, "Wuman, why yu dey krai? Na hu yu dey faind?" Bikos Mary tink sey naim bi di gardina, e kon sey, "Oga, if na yu kari am komot, mak yu tel mi wer yu kari am go, so dat I go-go kari am."
Den Jisos kon kol am, "Mary". So, Mary turn roun face am kon kol am for Hebrew language, "Raboni" (wey min Tisha).
Jisos ansa am, "Mak yu neva tosh mi, bikos I neva go mit my Papa for hevun. Go mit my brodas, tel dem sey, "I dey go hevun go mit my Papa, wey bi yor Papa tu, my God, wey bi yor God tu."
Den Mary Magdalin go mit di disaipols for wer dem dey kon tel dem, "I don si di Oga!" Den e tel dem wetin Jisos tel am.

Dat evenin, for di first day for di wik, en disaipols kon gada togeda. Dem lock di door for di haus wey dem dey, bikos dem dey fear di Ju oga dem. Jisos stand among dem kon sey, "Mak peace dey wit una."
Wen e don tok finish, e show dem en hand and di kona of en bele wey dem tak spear shuk. Den di disaipols kon hapi wel-wel, wen dem si Jisos.
Den Jisos tel dem again, "Mak peace dey wit una. As my Papa send mi, na so I send una tu."
Wen e tok finish, e breat for dia bodi kon sey, "Mak una risiv di Holi Spirit.
"If una forgiv enibodi en sin, God go forgiv am, bot if una nor forgiv enibodi en sin, God nor go forgiv am."
For dis taim, Tomas (wey bi twins), won of di twef disaipols, nor dey der wen Jisos show ensef to dem.

Di oda disaipols kon tel am, "Wi don si Jisos." Bot e ansa dem, "Unles I si en tu hand wey dem nail kon put my finga insaid di hol wey di nail mak and shuk my hand insaid di hol wey dey en bele, I nor go eva biliv una."
Afta ate days, wen all di disaipols gada again insaid di haus and Tomas dey der wit dem dis taim, aldo dem lock all di doors, Jisos show ensef stand among dem sey, "Mak peace dey wit una."
Den e tel Tomas, "Put yor finga for my hand, mak yu tosh am. Stresh yor hand put insaid di kona for my bele. Mak yu nor dey doubt again, bot mak yu biliv."
Tomas kon ansa am, "O! My Oga and my God."
Den Jisos tel am, "So yu biliv naw, bikos yu don si mi? God go bless pipol wey neva tak eye si mi, bot dem biliv mi."
Jisos du meni mirakols wen e dey wit en disaipols wey dem nor rite for dis book.
Bot dis tins wey dem rite so, na mak una for biliv sey na Jisos bi di Kraist and naim bi Man Pikin and if una biliv am, una go get life tru en name.
Afta dis, Jisos show ensef again to en disaipols near Tiberias Sea. Dis na haw e du-am.
Saimon Pita and Tomas (wey bi twins), wit Nataniel (wey en tawn bi Kana for Galili), wit Zebedi pikin and tu oda Jisos disaipols, kon gada togeda.
Saimon Pita kon tel dem, "I dey go kash fish." Dem sey, "Wi tu go folo yu go." Den dem komot go enta won kenu. Bot dat nite dem nor kash eni fish.
Wen day break, Jisos stand for di wotasaid, bot di disaipols nor no sey naim dey der.
Jisos kon ask dem, "My shildren, una kash eni fish?" Dem ansa, "No o-o."

E kon tel dem, "Mak una trow una net go di rite side for di kenu and una go kash som fish." Wen dem don trow dia net insaid di riva, dem nor fit draw am komot from di wota, bikos di fish wey dem kash, plenti wel-wel.

Den, Jon, di disaipol wey Jisos luv kon tel Pita, "Dis man na Jisos o-o." Wen Saimon Pita hear sey di man na Jisos, e kon kwik-kwik tie en klot wel (bikos e nor wear enitin unda), den e kon jump insaid di riva.
By dis taim, di oda disaipols dey insaid di kenu dey pul di net wit di plenti fish go rish groun for di wotasaid (bikos wer dem dey, na abaut won ondred yard from di wotasaid).
Wen dem don kom dan from di kenu, dem kon si shakol fire wit fish and som bread on-top am.
Jisos tel dem, "Mak una bring som of di fish wey una kash kom."
Den Saimon Pita enta di kenu kon pul di net kom groun. Di net kash plenti big-big fish wey rish won ondred and fifti-tiri and di net nor tear.
Jisos kon tel dem, "Mak una kom chop." Bot dem nor fit ask am, "Hu yu bi"? bikos dem biliv sey na Jisos e bi.
Den Jisos kon giv dem bread and fish.
Dis mak am di ted taim wen Jisos show ensef to en disaipols, afta e don kom out from grave.
Wen dem don chop finish, Jisos kon ask Saimon Pita, "Saimon, Jon pikin, yu luv mi pas all dis tins?" E ansa, "Yes, Oga! Yu no sey I luv yu". Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu fid my ship."
Jisos ask am again, "Saimon, Jon pikin, yu rili tink sey yu luv mi?" Pita ansa, "Yes, oga! Yu no sey I luv yu." Jisos kon tel am, "Mak yu kare for my ship."

Jisos ask am di ted taim, "Saimon, Jon pikin, yu sure sey yu luv mi so?" Pita heart kon heavi, bikos e pain am wel-wel, as Jisos ask am di same kweshon tiri taims, "Yu sure sey yu luv mi so?" Den Pita kon sey, "Oga, yu no evritin, yu no sey I rili luv yu." So, Jisos kon sey, "Mak yu fid my ship.

"I tel yu tru wod, wen yu dey smol, yu dey du as yu laik, dey dress as yu laik and dey go eniwer wey yu wont, bot wen yu go kon old, yu go spread yor hand and oda pipol go help yu tie yor klot and kari yu go wer yu nor won go."
(Jisos tok dis to show haw Pita go die, so dat God go get onor). Afta Jisos tok finish, e kon tel Pita, "Mak yu folo mi."

Wen Pita turn roun, e kon si Jon, (di disaipol wey Jisos luv wel-wel), dey folo dem. (Dis na di disaipol wey bend en head near Jisos chest wen dem dey chop kon ask am, "Oga, hu bi di pesin wey go sel yu giv yor enemi?")
Wen Pita si-am, e kon ask Jisos, "Oga, wot abaut dis man?"
Jisos ansa am, "Mak yu maind yor own biznes. If I wont sey mak e stay ontil I kom bak, wish won konsan yu insaid? Mak yu yorsef folo mi."

Den di rumor kon dey spread among di brodas and sistas sey, di disaipol nor go die. Bot Jisos nor rili tel Pita sey di oda disaipol nor go die, bot e tok sey, "If I wont sey mak e stay ontil I kom bak, wish won konsan yu insaid?"
Na dis bi di disaipol wey bear witnes abaut all dis tins and wey rite dem and wi no sey wetin e rite, na tru.
Jisos du meni oda tins wey dem nor rite dan. If to sey dem rite all of dem, di wold nor go get space wey go kontain all di books, wer dem rite dem put.
My frend Teofilos, for di book wey I first rite giv yu, I tok abaut all di tins wey Jisos Kraist start to dey du and tish,
ontil di day wen God kon kari am go hevun, afta e giv orda to di apostols, wey e shuz wit di Holi Spirit.
Na di same apostols e show ensef meni taim sey, e stil dey alaif, afta di sofa wey e sofa. Dem si-am for forti days and e tel dem abaut God kindom.
Den wen e folo dem sidan dey tok, e kon komand dem sey, "Mak una nor liv Jerusalem, bot mak una wait for di tin wey my Papa promis wey I don tel una bifor.
"Jon dey baptaiz wit wota, bot e nor go tey wen God go baptaiz una wit en Holi Spirit (wey go kontrol una life foreva)".
So wen dem gada, dem kon start to ask Jisos Kraist, "Oga! Na naw yu go start to rule Izrel?"
Jisos ansa dem, "Di taim wey God plan nor konsan una,
bot una go get pawa wen di Holi Spirit don enta una life and una go tel pipol abaut mi for Jerusalem, for evriwer for Judea and Samaria go rish all di far place wey dey dis wold."
So afta e don tok wit dem, God kon kari am up ontil kloud kova am and dem nor fit si-am again.
As dem stil dey luk up as e dey go, tu men wey wear white klot stand near dem
kon sey, "Galili pipol, na wetin mak una stand der dey luk hevun laik dat? Dis Jisos Kraist wey God don kari go hevun today, go stil kom bak di same way wey una si-am dey go hevun."
So dem waka go bak to Jerusalem from Mount Olives (wey dey near Jerusalem and di place wey dem waka so, far pas haw di law dey alow pipol waka for Sabat Day).

Wen dem enta Jerusalem, dem kon go di room for upstair wer dem dey stay. Pita and Jon; James and Andru; Filip and Tomas; Batlomi and Matiu; James wey bi Afius pikin, Saimon wey dem dey kol Zilot and Judas wey bi James pikin, na all of dem gada for der.
Dem kon dey pray togeda evriday wit won maind, wit all di wimen, plus Mary, Jisos Kraist mama and en brodas.
Di pipol wey dey pray, plenti rish won ondred and twenti. So Pita stand-up for di pipol front kon sey,
"My brodas, di wod wey di Holi Spirit yuz David tok abaut Judas, wey show road to di pipol wey arres Jisos Kraist, must hapun,
bikos e dey awa grup bifor and e dey folo us du di wok."
(Dis Judas buy won land wit di moni wey e kolet for di wiked tin wey e du and na der e hang ensef til en bele burst and all en intestine kon skata kom out,
sotey all di pipol for Jerusalem hear di stori and naim mak dem dey kol di place for dia language, 'Akeldama, wey min, Blood Land). '
"For Psalm book, God wod sey, 'Mak en haus empti, mak nobodi stay der again and mak anoda pesin tak en place. '
"So, mak won pesin from di men wey dey folo us since di taim wey Oga Jisos Kraist dey wit us,
from wen dem baptaiz am, ontil e go up liv us, mak e kon join us tel pipol di trut sey, Jisos Kraist don raiz-up from grave."
So dem shuz tu men, won na Josef wey dem dey kol Basabas (bot oda pipol dey kol am Justus) and di oda won, na Matias.
Den dem kon pray, "Oga Jisos Kraist, na yu no wetin dey insaid evribodi maind. Mak yu show us di pesin wey yu wont among dis tu pipol,
so dat e go tak Apostol Judas, wey kil ensef, place."
Naim dem kon vote to shuz bitwin di tu men and di pesin wey dem shuz, na Matias.
Wen Pentecost Day rish, di disaipols kon gada for won place.
At wons, won kaind nois wey bi laik heavi briz kom from hevun kon ful di hol haus wer dem sidan.
Dem kon si smol-smol fire wey bi laik kando lite dey fal kom from hevun on-top dia head, won-by-won.
Den di Holi Spirit enta dia bodi and as di Spirit giv dem pawa, dem kon start to tok for difren language.
Dat taim, Ju and oda pipol dey stay for Jerusalem.
Wen pipol hear di nois, dem sopraiz kon gada, bikos evribodi dey hear di disaipols dey tok wit difren language, wey demsef dey tok for dia kontri.
As di pipol dey sopraiz, dem kon dey ask ish oda, "All dis pipol wey dey tok so, nor bi Galili dem from kom?
"Haw e bi sey dem dey speak awa difren language?
"Wi wey kom from Partia, Medes, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Kapadosia Pontus and all di aria wey dey for Asia,
Frigia and Pamfilia, ivun di pipol from Egypt and di aria for Libya near Syrene, plus all di strenjas wey kom from Rome,
weda dem bi Ju or Gentai, wey dey serv God wit dem, laik pipol from Krete and Arabia, all of us dey hear, as dem dey yuz awa language praiz God!"
All of dem sopraiz and di tin konfuz dem wel-wel. So dem kon dey ask ish oda wetin dis kaind tin min.
Bot som of dem dey laff di pipol wey dey speak di difren language kon dey sey, "Dis pipol don drink wel-wel!"
Bot Pita stand-up wit di ilevun apostols kon shaut: "Judea pipol and una wey dey Jerusalem, mak una put ear dan for wetin I won tel una so. Mak una no sey
dis men neva drink enitin as una tink, bikos na jos nain o' klok for mornin and e tu earli to drink.
"Bot na as Profet Joel tok sey:

'Wen di last day don rish, God sey, "I go pour my Spirit insaid evribodi and all una shildren, both boys and girls go dey profesai, una young men go dey si vishon and una old men go dey dream plenti dreams.
"For dat taim, I go giv my Spirit to all di pipol wey dey serv mi and dem go dey profesai.
"I go show plenti wondas for hevun and meni mirakols for dis wold, blood and fire go apier for insaid di skai laik smoke.
"Di sun go blak and di moon go red laik blood, bifor di big day wen God tok abaut, go rish.
"For dat taim, evribodi wey kol God name, God go save am.'"

"Izrel pipol, mak una hear wetin I dey tok, Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret, di man wey God shuz and wey e send to una, wey God yuz du meni mirakols and oda wondaful signs for una front, as all of una no,
na Judas sel dis man giv Ju pipol, bikos na so God plan am from biginin. Una no sey una kil-am, wen una gi-am to di sojas mak dem nail am for kros.
"Bot God kon raiz-am up afta E don giv am pawa to konka deat, bikos deat nor get pawa to hol am.
"Dis na wetin David tok abaut sey, 'God always dey near mi and bikos e dey for my rite hand, I nor go fear enitin.'
"Bikos of dis, bele swit mi and my mout kon dey tok beta-beta tins and I kon get hope sey tins go rili gud for mi,
bikos I no sey God nor go alow mi stay for grave or mak my bodi rotin for groun.
"Tru-tru, Yu don show mi di way wey dey giv life and Yu go mak mi hapi wel-wel wen I dey for wer Yu dey."
My pipol, "Nor bi tru sey awa gran-gran papa David don die since, dem bere am and en grave dey awa land til today?
"Wi no sey en na profet, bikos God don promis am sey, naim pikin dem go always bi king for Izrel.
"Bikos of dis vishon wey David si, e kon sey, 'Di Mezaya go get up from grave, bikos God nor go liv am der mak en bodi rotin for groun.' As all of us no,
God don raiz dis Jisos Kraist up and evribodi si-am.
"Bikos God don promote am mak e dey en rite hand and e don risiv di Holi Spirit wey en Papa promis, e kon pour di Holi Spirit for awa bodi, as una si-am dey hapun so.
"Wi no sey David neva go hevun, bot onli en tok wit en mout sey, 'God tel Jisos Kraist sey, "Sidan for my rite hand,
ontil I go mak all yor enemis serv yu."'
"So Izrel pipol, mak una no sey, God don turn dis Jisos Kraist wey una kil, to bi Oga and Mezaya."
Wen di pipol hear dis prishin, e trobol dem for maind wel-wel and dem kon ask Pita and di res apostols, "Awa brodas, wetin wi go du naw?"
Pita ansa dem, "Mak una turn from sin kom mit God won-by-won and mak dem baptaiz una wit Jisos Kraist name, so dat God go forgiv una, den una go fit risiv di Holi Spirit.
"Bikos dis promis na for una, all una pikin, pipol wey dey far place and all di pipol wey God go draw near ensef."
