As Pita dey tok to di pipol, e kon warn dem, "Mak una save una head from di ponishment wey dey kom mit wiked pipol."
So, dem baptaiz all of dem wey biliv wetin e prish and dem rish tiri tazon pipol wey join dem dat day.
Dem kon dey yuz all dia taim dey learn wetin di apostols dey tish. Dem dey waka, help, chop and pray togeda.
Di apostols du meni wondas and mirakols and bikos of dis, pipol kon dey respet and fear God.
All di pipol wey biliv, dey share dia propati wit won anoda and stay togeda.
Dem dey sel wetin dem get kon yuz di moni dey help ish oda.
Dem dey stay togeda evriday laik won big famili. Dem dey gada go di Tempol togeda and dem dey go from haus to haus, dey chop togeda wit hapines.
Dem kon dey praiz God and dey feloship wit won anoda. So God kon dey add more pipol join dem evriday.
Won day, Pita and Jon dey go di Tempol go pray for tiri o' klok for aftanun.

Som pipol dey always kari won man, wey nor fit waka since en mama born am, kom di Tempol domot wey dem dey kol, "Beautiful Gate", so dat e go dey beg for moni from pipol, wey dey enta insaid di Tempol.
As di man si Pita and Jon wen dem won enta di Tempol, e kon dey beg dem for moni,
bot dem luk am strate for eye kon sey, "Mak yu luk us!"
So di man wey nor fit waka kon luk dem wel-wel, bikos e tink sey dem won gi-am moni.
Pita kon tel am, "I nor get silva or gold to giv yu: bot na wetin I get, I go giv yu. Wit Jisos Kraist name wey kom from Nazaret, stand-up mak yu bigin waka!"
Pita hol di man for en rite hand kon drag-am up and at wons, di man legs kon strong.
Di man jump up kon bigin waka, e folo dem enta di Tempol dey waka, dey jump up and dan, dey praiz God.
Pipol si-am dey waka dey praiz God
and dem rimemba en face kon sey, dis na di man wey dey sidan for di Tempol domot dey beg moni, bifor. Di pipol sopraiz wel-wel, bikos of wetin hapun.
Di man stil dey jump folo Pita and Jon wit hapines and di pipol stil dey sopraiz. Den di pipol run go mit Pita and Jon for di place wey dem dey kol "Solomon Porsh".

Wen Pita si sey all di pipol gada, e kon start to dey prish, "Izrel pipol, wetin mak dis mirakol dey sopraiz una laik dis? Why una dey luk us laik sey na wit awa own pawa or holines wi tak mak dis man waka?
"Na Abraham, Izik, Jakop and awa gran-gran papa dem God, naim kari en savant Jisos Kraist go up, di won wey una rejet kon gi-am to Pilate mak e joj am, ivun wen e won fri am.
"Una sey una nor wont Jisos Kraist, di Holi and Raitious Pesin, insted una sey mak dem riliz anoda pesin wey dey kil pipol giv una.
"Una kil di pesin wey dey giv pipol life, bot God raiz-am from deat and wi bear witnes sey dis na tru.
"Dat Jisos Kraist name wey wi biliv, naim mak dis man wey una dey si and no wel-wel, strong. Yes! Naim name don heal dis man as una dey si so.
"So my brodas, I no sey una and una oga dem nor no wetin una du.
"God don tok bifor-bifor tru all en profet sey, di Mezaya go sofa and E don mak am hapun, tru wetin una du.
"So mak una turn from sin kom mit God, mak E for forgiv una,
so dat una go fit get fridom wey God dey giv and E go send Jisos Kraist, di Mezaya wey E don priper dan, kom mit una.
"Dis Jisos Kraist go stay for hevun til di taim wey God go mak evritin beta again as E don tok tru en holi profets.
"Ivun Mosis sef tok bifor sey, "Jehova wey bi una God go send won profet to una, jos as E send mi and e go bi una famili memba. Una must obey evritin wey e sey mak una du.
"Enibodi wey nor obey dat profet, dem go distroi am and dem go rimov am from God famili.
"God don tok abaut all dis tins wey dey hapun so, from Profet Samuel taim go rish di profets wey kom afta am.

"All of una get share for insaid di promis wey God mak wit una gran-gran papa dem tru di profets. Na so E tel Abraham sey, 'Na tru di pikin wey yu go born, naim I go tak bless all di famili wey dey di wold.'
"So God don raiz en savant and E don send am giv una, mak e for bless and help una turn from sin kom mit am."
As Pita and Jon stil dey tok, di prists, di Tempol gaid oga and di Sadusi pipol waka kon mit dem.
Dem dey ves, bikos Pita and Jon dey tish di pipol sey, na onli tru Jisos Kraist, pipol go fit wak-up from deat.
So dem arres dem put for prizin til di next day, bikos nite don rish.
Bot pipol wey hear wetin dem tok kon biliv Jisos Kraist and di pipol wey biliv, rish faiv tazon.
Di next day, all di rulas, eldas and lawyas kon gada go Jerusalem.
Annas, wey bi di High Prist dey der wit Kaifas, Jon, Alexanda and som membas for di High Prist famili.
Dem drag Pita and Jon enta dia senta kon bigin ask dem, "Hu giv una pawa to du dis tins? Na wish pesin name una dey yuz so?"
Pita wey di Holi Spirit dey yuz wel-wel kon ansa, "Awa rulas and eldas,
na bikos of di gud wey wi du for dis pesin wey nor wel, naim mak una dey kweshon us today sey, 'Haw dis man tak wel?'
"My pipol and di oga dem for Izrel, mak una no sey, Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret, di pesin wey una kil and God raiz-am from deat, naim name mak dis man wey una dey si so, wel.
"Dis Jisos Kraist, di gud stone wey una trowey, God don mak am di main pila wey dey hol di haus.
"And na en pawa God dey yuz save pipol, bikos for di hol wold, e nor get eni oda name wey get pawa to save pipol, laik Jisos Kraist own."
Di oga dem sopraiz wen dem si haw Pita and Jon tak tok ivun doh dem nor go school. So dem kon no sey dis na di pipol wey don folo Jisos Kraist waka.
And as dem si sey di man wey God heal stand der wit Pita and Jon, dem nor fit denai wetin hapun.
So dem sey mak Pita and Jon komot for wer dem dey, den dem bigin ask ish oda,
"Wetin wi go du abaut dis pipol? Bikos evribodi wey dey for Jerusalem don no sey na big mirakol naim God yuz dem du so and wi nor go fit denai am.
"Bot mak di mata nor for kontinu dey spread among di pipol, mak wi warn dem mak dem nor tok abaut dis name again."
So dem kol dem go insaid kon tel dem mak dem nor tok or tish abaut Jisos Kraist name again.
Bot Pita and Jon ansa, "Mak una joj wetin gud pas for dis mata; mak wi obey una or mak wi obey God,
bikos wi nor go fit sey mak wi nor tok abaut wetin wi don si and hear."
Afta dem warn Pita and Jon wel-wel, di Ju pipol kon liv dem mak dem dey go, as dem nor fit ponish dem for di pipol front, bikos dem gada dey praiz God for wetin hapun so.
Di man wey risiv dis big mirakol, don pas forti years.
As dem fri dem, Pita and Jon go mit dia pipol kon tel dem evritin wey di High Prist and di eldas tok.
Wen dem hear wetin hapun, dem kon pray to God sey, "God wey dey for hevun, Yu wey mak hevun, eart, di sea and evritin wey dey insaid dem.
"Yor Spirit tok tru yor savant David, awa gran-gran papa dem sey, 'Wetin dey mak pipol wey dey woship juju dey mak nois? Wetin mak dem dey plan bad-bad tins?
"All di kings wey dey di wold stand and di rulas gada togeda against Jehova and di pesin wey E shuz.
"Tru-tru, Herod, Pontius Pilate, Izrel pipol and doz wey nor bi Ju kon gada for di tawn against Jisos Kraist, yor holi savant wey Yu shuz
and dem dey doh wetin yu don alredi plan sey go hapun.
"Papa God, mak Yu si haw dem dey treaten us. Wi wey bi yor savants, mak Yu giv us pawa to tak prish yor wod,
enitaim wen wi kol Yor holi pikin Jisos Kraist name, mak Yu heal pipol and du meni wondaful mirakols."
Wen dem pray finish, di place wey dem gada put kon dey shake. Di Holi Spirit enta all of dem and dem kon dey prish God Wod wit pawa.
All di pipol wey biliv Jisos Kraist kon dey du tins togeda wit won maind and nobodi sey e go yuz wetin e get for ensef alone, so dem kon dey share dia propati togeda.
Wit God pawa, di apostols kon dey bear witnes sey Jisos Kraist wak-up from deat and God favor kon dey show for dia life wel-wel.
Nobodi among dem sofa, bikos di rish pipol among dem wey get land and haus, dey sel dia propati and bring di moni wey dem sel
kon giv di apostols mak dem kip am, so dat dem go gi-am to enibodi to tak buy wetin e wont.
So Josef wey kom from Levi tribe and wey di apostols dey kol Banabas (wey min pesin wey dey enkorage pipol) and en hometawn na Syprus,
sel won land wey e get kon giv di moni to di apostol mak evribodi yuz.
Won man wey dem dey kol Ananias wit en wife Safaira kon sel dia land.
Dem kon gri sey dem go kip som of di moni for demsef. So Ananias tak di rimainin moni go giv di apostols.
Bot Pita tel am, "Ananias, why yu alow Satan enta yor heart and yu kon dey lai giv di Holi Spirit? Why yu kip som of di moni wey una sel di land, for unasef?

"Bifor una sel di land, nor bi una own propati? Naw wen una sel am finish di moni nor stil bi una own to spend as una laik? Wetin mak una get dis kaind maind? Dis lai wey yu tok so, nor bi pesin yu du-am to, bot na God!"
Wen Ananias hear di wod wey Pita tok, e fal for groun at wons kon die. Dis tin mak fear kash evribodi wey hear wetin hapun.
So di young men wey dey der tak rapa kova en bodi kon kari am go bere.
Wen tiri hours don pas, en wife, Safaira waka kom, bot e nor no wetin don hapun to en husban.
Den Pita ask am, "Madam, tel mi di trut. Na dis bi di price wey una sel di land? Safaira ansa, 'Yes, na-im.'"
So Pita tel am, "Wetin mak yu and yor husban decide to trai God Spirit laik dis? Luk! Na di pipol wey go bere yor husban dey kom so and dem go kari yu go bere tu!"
At wons, di wuman fal for groun kon die for Pita front. So wen di young men enta insaid di haus kon si sey di wuman don die, dem kari am go bere near wer dem bere en husban put.
Fear kash pipol for di shosh and odas wey hear wetin hapun.
Na dis kaind mirakol and wonda God du tru di apostols for di pipol front and dem kon dey mit for Solomon Porsh.
Fear nor let enibodi wey nor dey among dem go join dem enihaw and e kon mak all di pipol dey respet dem wel-wel.
Bot plenti men and wimen wey biliv Jisos Kraist kon join dem,
sotey dem ivun dey kari sik pipol put for bed and mat for road, so dat as Pita dey pas, en shadow go heal dem.
Dem bring sik pipol and doz wey get evil spirit from all di tawns and vilage wey near Jerusalem and God heal all of dem.
Bot jelosi kon ful di High Prist and di Sadusi pipol maind,
so dem kon arres di apostols put for prizin.
Bot for dat nite, God angel opun di prizin door kon bring dem kom out and tel dem,
"Mak una go stand for di Tempol varanda bigin prish God wod wey dey giv pipol life."

Afta dem hear dis, dem enta di Tempol varanda for mornin kon start to dey tish di pipol. Den di prist oga dem and di pipol wey dey folo am kon kol di Sanhedrin, wey bi di big kansol for Izrel pipol. Dem kon send pipol go di prizin mak dem go bring di apostols kom, bikos dem won joj dia kase.
Bot di savant wey dem send go, nor si dem for di prizin, so dem go bak go ripot sey,
"Wi si sey dem lock di prizin wel and all di sojas stand for di front, bot wen wi opun di gate, wi luk insaid, bot wi nor si enibodi."
So wen di soja oga wey dey di Tempol and di prist oga dem hear dis tin, dem kon sopraiz wel-wel kon dey wonda wetin hapun to di apostols.
Na dat taim won pesin kon tel dem sey, "Si o-o, di men wey una put for prizin dey for di Tempol varanda dey tish pipol!"
So di soja oga wey dey di Tempol kon eskot di savant go bring di apostols, bot dem nor yuz fos, bikos dem dey fear sey di pipol wey gada der, fit stone dem.
Wen dem don bring dem insaid, dem kon sey mak dem stand for di kansol front and di prist oga dem kon dey kweshon dem.
E ask dem, "Wi komand una sey mak una nor tish pipol abaut dis name, bot si naw, di hol Jerusalem don ful wit di tins wey una dey tish. Una won put dis man blood for awa head?"
Bot Pita and di apostols ansa, "Wi go must obey God insted of humanbin"
"Di God wey awa gran-gran papa dem serv naim raiz-up Jisos Kraist wey una hang for tri.
"Bot God don promote am sey mak e sidan for en rite hand kon gi-am big posishon as Oga and di Pesin wey go save di wold, so dat Izrel shildren go turn from dia sin kom mit God mak e forgiv dem.
"All of us no sey dis tin na tru and di Holi Spirit wey God don giv to pipol wey dey obey am, dey stil bear witnes sey, dis tin na tru."
Wen di prist oga dem hear dis tin, dem kon ves wel-wel and won kil di apostols.
Den won Farisi wey dem dey kol, Gamaliel, wey dey tish di law and wey di pipol dey respet wel-wel kon stand-up tok, "Mak una send dis men go outsaid first."
Den e kon tok to di kansol, "Una Izrel oga, mak una tink wel bifor una du enitin to dis men.
"Bikos na so Teudas stil kom up bifor, dey tok sey en na pesin wey dey impotant and na abaut for ondred pipol folo am. Wen dem kil-am, all di pipol wey dey folo am skata and evritin kon end.
"Afta am, Judas wey kom from Galili kom out wen dem dey du census. E push pipol to join am opoz wetin dem dey du. Dem stil kil-am and all di pipol wey dey folo am skata tu.
"Naim mak I sey for dis mata so, mak una rimov una hand and liv all dis men alone, bikos if all di tins wey dem dey plan and du, na from dia maind, dem nor go succeed,
bot if na from God, una nor go fit stop dem, esept una won fite God."
So dem bring di apostols kom bak kon tel dia savant mak dem flog dem. Afta dem riliz dem, dem kon warn dem sey mak dem nor yuz Jisos Kraist name tak prish again.
So di apostols komot from der dey hapi wel-wel sey God don giv dem di shanse to sofa, bikos of Jisos Kraist.
So evriday for di Tempol kompond and from haus to haus, dem kontinu to dey tish and prish di Gud News sey, "Jisos Kraist naim bi di Mezaya."

As taim dey go, wen di disaipols don plenti, di Ju pipol wey dey tok wit Greek language kon dey kworel wit di oda kontri men wey dey tok Hebrew. Dem kon dey komplain sey, "Wen dem dey share fud, di Hebrew men dey sofa wimen wey dia husban don die."
So di twef apostols gada evribodi kon sey, "E nor gud mak wi liv God wod wey wi dey prish kon put hand for fud mata.
"So mak una luk roun kon shuz among una, sevun men wey una no sey dey bihav wel, di Holi Spirit dey yuz wel-wel and wey get sense, so dat dem go du dis wok for us.
"So dat wi go fit put awa maind for praya, as wi dey prish God wod."

Evribodi laik wetin di apostols tok, so dem kon shuz won man wey en name na Steven, bikos di Holi Spirit dey yuz am wel-wel. Di odas wey dem shuz, na Filip, Prokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas and Nikolas wey kom from Antiok and e dey serv God laik Ju pipol.
Dem kon show dem to di apostols. Di apostols put hand for dia head kon pray for dem.
Na so God wod start to spread and di disaipols wey dey Jerusalem kon plenti wel-wel. And meni prists kon biliv Jisos Kraist.
God bless Steven wel-wel kon gi-am pawa to tak du meni wondas and mirakols among di pipol.
Bot som men kon dey argue wit am. Dis men dey woship God for won place wey dem dey kol "Di Freedmen Sinagog." Som of dem kom from Alexandria, Syrene, Silicia and Asia.
Bot dis pipol nor fit stand di wisdom and pawa wey Steven tak dey tok.
So, dem kon bribe som men mak dem lai sey, "Wi hear wen dis man tok tins wey dey against Mosis and God law."
Dem lai for Steven head, so di pipol, di eldas and di oga dem for di law kon hate am. So dem arres Steven kon kari am go di kansol.
Dem bring pipol kon lai sey, "E don tey wey dis man dey tok bad-bad tins abaut Mosis law and dis Tempol.
"Wi hear wen e dey tok sey Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret go skata dis place and e go shange all di tradishon wey Mosis giv us."
Evribodi wey dey di kansol dey luk Steven kon si sey en face dey shine laik angel own.
Di prist oga dem kon ask Steven, "All dis tins wey dem tok abaut yu so, na tru?"
Steven ansa, "My brodas and fadas, mak una listin to wetin I won tok so. Na wen Abraham, awa gran-gran papa dem dey for Mesopotamia, bifor e go stay for Haran, naim God wey get pawa, apier to am
kon tel am sey, "Mak yu liv yor kontri and yor pipol kon go di land wey I go show yu.
"So Abraham liv Kaldian kontri kon go stay for Haran. Afta en papa die, God kon tel am mak e stay for dis land wey una dey naw.
"Dat taim, God neva giv am eni part for di land and e neva born eni pikin, bot God promis am sey E go gi-am di land and en and en shildren go stay der foreva.
"God tel am, 'Di shildren wey yu go born go bi strenja for anoda kontri and di pipol for dat kontri go sofa dem kon yuz dem as slave for for ondred years.'
"Bot God sey, 'I go ponish di pipol wey go yuz dem as slave and afta all dis tins, dem go komot for der kon woship mi for dis place.'
"So God mak kovenant wit Abraham tru sekonsishon. Abraham kon born Izik and sekonsaiz am afta ate days. Izik born Jakop and Jakop born di twef brodas, wey bi awa gran-gran papa dem.
"Jakop shildren wey bi awa gran-gran papa dem, bikos dem dey jelos Josef dia broda, dem kon sel am as slave go Egypt, bot God dey wit am
kon save am from all en wahala and from Fero wey bi Egypt king, E gi-am favor wit wisdom and Fero kon mak am oga for di hol Egypt and ova evritin wey e get.
"Hunga kon dey for di hol Egypt and Kanan and awa gran-gran papa dem nor si fud chop.
"So wen Jakop hear sey fud dey for Egypt, e kon send awa gran-gran papa dem go shek if na tru.
"Afta dem don go tu taims, Josef show ensef giv en brodas and Fero kon no Josef famili.
"Josef send mesage go giv en papa Jakop sey mak en and all di pipol wey dey wit am kom Egypt and dem bi sevunti-faiv wey go.
"So Jakop and awa gran-gran papa dem go Eygpt and dem die for der.
"Dia bone dey der til dem kari dem go bere for Shekem for di grave wey Abraham buy from Hamor shildren.
"Bot as taim dey near wen God go fulfil di promis wey e mak wit Abraham; Izrel pipol kon dey meni insaid Egypt,
til anoda Fero wey nor no Josef kon dey rule.
"E disiv and sofa awa pipol sotey e fos dem to liv dia shildren mak dem die.
"Na dat taim dem born Mosis and God kon laik am wel-wel. Mosis stay for en papa haus for onli tiri monts
and wen dem trowey am for riva, Fero dota kon tak and train am as en own pikin.
"So dem tish Mosis all di wise tins wey Egypt pipol dey du and e kon get wisdom for haw e dey tok and wetin e dey du.
"Bot wen forti years don rish, e kon tink am sey e gud mak e go visit en own Izrel pipol.
"Wen e si won man from Egypt dey opres won Izrel pesin, Mosis kon difend and kil di Egypt man.
"E tink sey en own pipol go undastand sey God won yuz am tak save dem, bot dem nor undastand.
"Di next day, Mosis si tu Izrel men dey fite and e won trai setol dem. So e tel dem, 'My pipol, una bi brodas, why una kon dey fite unasef laik dis?'
"Bot di man wey dey opres en broda kon sey, 'Hu giv yu pawa to rule and joj us?
'Hope yu nor won kil mi di way yu kil dat Egypt man yestiday?'
"Wen di man tok laik dis, Mosis run go Midian, anoda land wer e stay as strenja kon born tu boys for der.
"Afta forti years don pas, won angel apier to am for insaid desert for Mount Sinai, wer won bush for dey burn.
"As Mosis si dis tins, e sopraiz wel-wel and wen e waka near mak e si-am wel, e hear God vois wey sey,
'Na mi bi di God wey yor gran-gran papa Abraham, Izik and Jakop dey woship.' Mosis start to shake and fear nor let am luk tu mush.
"Bot God tel am, 'Mak yu pul yor shu komot from yor leg, bikos di place wey yu stand so, na Holi Groun.
'I don si as my pipol dey sofa for Egypt and I don hear as dem dey krai, so I don kon save dem. Mak yu kom, bikos I won send yu go Egypt bak. '
"Dis Mosis wey dem rejet and ask sey, 'Hu mak yu awa oga and joj', naim God kon send mak e bi oga and savior tru di angel wey apier to am for bush.
"Na dis Mosis lid dem komot from Egypt. E stil du plenti mirakols for Egypt, di Red Sea and insaid di widanes for forti years.
"Na dis Mosis tel Izrel pipol sey, 'Na from among una God promis sey, E go raiz-up won profet wey go lid una. '
"Na dis same man dey wit di pipol for widanes, wit di angel wey tok to am for Mount Sinai, wit awa gran-gran papa dem and e kon risiv God wod for una.
"Bot una papa nor gri obey am. Insted, dem nor ansa am, bot dem shange dia maind sey dem won go Egypt bak.
"Dem kon tel Aaron, 'Mak yu du juju for us wey go lid us bikos, wi nor no wetin don hapun to Mosis!'
"So dem mak image wey bi laik melu, sakrifias gi-am kon bigin serv di melu wey dem tak dia own hand mak.
"God liv dem mak dem woship stars to mak wetin Profet Amos tok, hapun sey, 'Izrel pipol, una tink sey na mi una dey serv wen una dey sakrifais anima for insaid widanes for forti years? '
'Na bikos of di haus wey una build for "Molech and Refan", wey bi una god and juju wey una dey woship, naim mak mi send una go bi slave for Babylon. '
"God giv di tabanako to awa gran-gran papa dem, di haus wer dem go for woship am, jos as E sey mak Mosis build am.
"Afta, awa gran-gran papa dem kari di tabanako wey God giv dem wit Joshua kon driv all di oda tribes and tak dia land til di taim wey David bigin rule Izrel.
"God favor David wel-wel and e sey e go build haus for God
bot na Solomon en pikin kon build am.
"Wi no sey God nor dey stay for haus wey humanbin build, jos as di profet tok,
'Hevun na my chair and na di eart I dey put my leg, so wish kaind haus una go fit build for mi or wish kaind place I go stay?
'Nor bi mi mak all dis tins by mysef?'
"Si haw una stuborn! Jos as una gran-gran papa dem bi, na so una stil bi tu, bikos una don mak una heart strong to disobey God!
"E get eni profet wey una gran-gran papa dem nor kil? Dem ivun kil di mesenja wey tok bifor sey, 'Di Raitious Man go kom and una go gi-am to wiked pipol and dem go kil-am.
"Na una risiv God law wey E send tru en angels, bot una nor obey am."
As di kansol membas hear all di tins wey Steven tok, dem kon dey ves wel-wel.
Bot Steven, wey God dey yuz wel-wel, luk strate go hevun kon si God glori and Jisos Kraist wey stand for God rite hand.
Naim e shaut, "Luk! I si hevun wey opun and I si Jisos Kraist, God Pikin, stand for en rite hand."
Bot di pipol klose dia ear bigin shaut and all of dem kon rush am.
Wen dem don drag am go outsaid for di Tempol, dem kon start to dey stone am, den dem kon pul all dia klot giv won man wey dem dey kol Sol, mak e hol.
As dem dey stone Steven, e kon pray, "Oga, Jisos Kraist, mak yu risiv my spirit."
So e fal for groun kon shaut, "My Papa, abeg, mak Yu nor kount dis sin against dem." Wen e tok so finish, e kon die.
Sol hapi wen dem dey kil Steven. Na from dat day trobol start for di shosh wey dey Jerusalem and all di bilivas kon skata go Judea and Samaria, bot na onli di apostols nor run.
Som men wey dey holi, kari Steven go bere, afta dem don mourn am.
Bot Sol trai to distroi di shosh; e dey go from haus to haus dey arres men and wimen put for prizin.
So di pipol wey skata kon dey go from place to place dey prish di gospol.
Filip travol go Samaria main tawn kon dey prish abaut di Mezaya giv dem.
Di pipol wey gada, put dia maind for wetin Filip dey tok, bikos dem don hear and si all di mirakols wey e du.
Wiked spirit dey shaut and dey komot from pipol bodi as dem hear God wod and God heal meni pipol wey nor fit waka.
So all di pipol wey dey di tawn kon dey hapi wel-wel, bikos of wetin dey hapun.
E get won strong man for di tawn wey dem dey kol Saimon and e dey du magic wey dey mak Samaria pipol sopraiz.
Evribodi, both smol pikin and big pipol, dey biliv wetin e dey du and dem biliv sey, "Na God gi-am pawa!"
Dem dey listin to am bikos, e don tey wen e dey yuz magic tak dey du wondas.
Bot wen dem biliv di Gud News wey Filip prish abaut God Kindom and abaut Jisos Kraist, dem kon baptaiz di pipol wey biliv.
Ivun Saimon sef biliv and afta dem don baptaiz am, e kon dey waka wit Filip, bikos all di mirakols wey God dey du tru Filip, dey sopraiz am.
Wen di apostols wey dey Jerusalem hear sey Samaria pipol don risiv God wod, dem kon send Pita and Jon go mit dem,
so dat dem go pray for di pipol, mak dem for risiv di Holi Spirit.
Bikos for dat taim, dem neva risiv di Holi Spirit. Na onli Jisos name dem tak baptaiz dem.
Pita and Jon put hand for di pipol head and dem kon risiv di Holi Spirit.
Wen Saimon si sey pipol dey risiv di Holi Spirit as di apostols put hand for dia head, e kon giv di apostols moni
kon sey, "Abeg, mak una giv mi dis pawa mak I for fit put my hand for pipol head mak dem for risiv di Holi Spirit tu."
Bot Pita ansa am, "Mak yu and yor moni go die! Yu tink sey yu fit buy God gift wit moni?
"Yu nor get share for insaid dis tin wey God dey giv, bikos God don si sey na bad tin yu won tak am du.
"So mak yu turn from sin kom mit God and from di bad tins wey dey yor maind and pray mak God forgiv yu.
"Bikos I si sey na long-trot and bad bele dey wori yu and sin stil ful yor maind."
Saimon kon ansa, "Mak yu pray to God for mi, so dat di tin wey yu tok so, nor go hapun to mi."
Afta Pita and Jon don tel dia stori and prish God wod finish, dem kon go bak to Jerusalem, dey prish God wod for insaid Samaria, as dem dey go.
God angel kon tel Filip, "Get up mak yu waka for di desert road wey dem dey pas from Jerusalem go Gaza."
So Filip kon dey waka dey go wer di angel tel am. As e dey go, e mit won unok wey kom from Ethiopia, e bi ofisa for Kandace, Ethiopia queen and na-im dey kip dia moni. E kon woship God for Jerusalem
and e dey go haus bak. E sidan for en horse dey read di book wey Profet Isaia rite.
Naim di Holi Spirit tel Filip, "Mak yu waka go mit di man."
So Filip run go mit am kon hear am dey read wetin Profet Isaia rite. So e kon ask di man, "Yu undastand wetin yu dey read so."
Di man ansa, "Haw I won tak undastand, unles pesin tish mi!" E kon tel Filip sey mak e kom sidan wit am.
Na di place wey e dey read for God wod bi dis, "Dem lid am laik ship go kil and as ship pikin dey kwayet wen dem dey shave-am, na so tu e nor opun en mout.
"Dem disgrace am kon tak pawa from en hand. Nobodi go fit tok abaut en shildren or en gran shildren, bikos dem kil-am wen e stil dey young."
So di man ask Filip, "Abeg tel mi, na hu dis profet dey tok abaut? Na ensef, abi na anoda pesin?"
Filip kon start to prish di Gud News abaut Jisos Kraist giv di man from di place wey e dey read.
As dem dey go, dem kon rish wer wota dey, naim di man sey, "Si, wota dey here! Wetin go mak mi nor baptaiz naw?"
Filip ansa, "If yu biliv, I go baptaiz yu." Di man kon sey, "I biliv sey Jisos Kraist na God Pikin."
So e tel di driva mak e stop, Filip wit am waka go wer di wota dey and e kon baptaiz am.
Wen dem kom out from di wota, God Spirit kari Filip komot from der and di man nor si-am again, bot e kon dey hapi as e dey go.
Filip si ensef for Azotus and as e dey waka pas for di aria, e kon dey prish di Gud News for all di tawns til e rish Sizeria.
As all dis tins dey hapun, Sol stil dey tel di disaipols sey e go kil dem. E go mit di High Prist
kon tak pamishon to tak go Damaskus, so dat if e si enibodi wey dey folo Jisos Kraist wey bi di Way, weda na man or wuman, e go arres dem kom Jerusalem.
As e dey go, won lite from hevun kon shine roun wer e dey.
E fal for groun kon hear won vois wey kol en name, "Sol, Sol, wetin mak yu dey ponish mi?"
So e ansa, "Oga, na hu dey tok so?" Di vois ansa am, "I bi Jisos Kraist wey yu dey ponish!
"Naw, mak yu get up go insaid di tawn and dem go tel yu wetin yu go du."
Di men wey dey folo am travol, sopraiz dey luk, bikos dem hear vois dey tok, bot dem nor si enibodi.
So Sol get up from groun, en eye opun, bot e nor dey si. En frends hol en hand kon eskot am enta Damaskus.
E nor si at-all for tiri days and for dat taim, e nor chop or drink enitin.
Dat taim, e get won disaipol for Damaskus and en name na Ananias. God kol am for insaid vishon, "Ananias", e kon ansa, "Na mi bi dis, Oga."

God kon tel am, "Get-up mak yu go di strit wey dem dey kol 'Strate' and wen yu rish Judas haus wey dey der, mak yu luk for won man, en name na Sol and e kom from Tarsus. You go mit am dey pray for der.
"I don show am for vishon sey won man wey dem dey kol Ananias go kom mit am and e go put hand for en head, pray for am, mak e for fit si again."
Bot Ananias ansa, "Oga, meni pipol don tel mi abaut dis man and all di wiked tins wey e don du to yor pipol for Jerusalem.
"E ivun kolet leta from di prist oga dem, wey e go tak kash and trow pipol wey biliv yu, for prizin."
Bot God tel Ananias, "Mak yu go mit am, bikos I don shuz am mak e kari my name to Gentai pipol, kings and all Izrel pipol.
"Tru-tru I go show am haw e go sofa, bikos of my name."

So Ananias go di haus and wen e enta, e put en hand for Sol head kon sey, "Broda Sol, di Oga wey show ensef to yu for road wen yu dey kom here, na en send mi kom mit yu, so dat yu go fit si again kon risiv di Holi Spirit."
At wons, somtin wey bi laik fish scale fal komot from Sol eye and e kon dey si. E get up and dem kon baptaiz am.
Afta e chop finish, en bodi kon strong again.
At wons, e kon start to dey prish for di sinagog sey Jisos Kraist na God Pikin.
Evribodi wey hear am kon dey sopraiz dey ask demsef sey, "Dis nor bi di man wey dey kil pipol wey biliv Jisos Kraist? Wi tink sey e kom here kon arres pipol kari go giv di prist oga dem."
Bot Sol stil dey prish wit pawa. E dey show sey na Jisos Kraist bi di Mezaya and di Ju pipol wey dey for Damaskus, nor fit ansa am.
Afta som days, di Ju pipol kon dey plan to kil-am,
bot Sol hear wetin dem dey plan. Som pipol dey wosh for di tawn gate day and nite mak dem for fit kil-am wen dem si-am.
Bot won nite, di pipol wey dey folo Sol kon put am for basket, drop am dan smol-smol from won smol window wey dey near di tawn fence.
Wen e rish Jerusalem, e kon trai to join di disaipols, bot dem dey fear am, bikos dem nor biliv sey e don bi Jisos Kraist disaipol.
So Banabas tak Sol go mit di apostols, den e tel dem haw Sol tak si Jisos Kraist for vishon wen e dey go Damaskus and haw e bigin dey prish wit boldnes abaut Jisos Kraist.
Sol stay and waka wit dem for Jerusalem and e dey tok wit boldnes abaut Jisos Kraist.
E bigin dey tok and argue wit di Ju pipol wey dey speak Greek, bot som pipol kon dey trai to kil-am.
Wen di brodas no abaut wetin dem dey plan, dem kon tak am go Sizeria and from der, dem send am go Tarsus.

Dat taim, di shosh wey dey Judea, Galili and Samaria get res and dis kon mak dem strong as dem dey stay togeda, dey woship God wit all dia heart and as di Holi Spirit dey tok to dem. So pipol wey dey di shosh kon dey plenti more-more.
Pita dey travol from won place go anoda and e stil go wer di bilivas dey for Lydda.
E kon mit won man for der, en name na Aeneas wey nor fit waka since wen e bi ate years.
Pita kon tel am, "Aeneas, Jisos Kraist, wey bi di Mezaya, won heal yu naw. So mak yu stand-up, kari yor bed!" At wons, e get up kon kari en bed.
All di pipol wey dey Lydda and Sharon si wetin hapun and dem kon bigin folo Jisos Kraist.
Won wuman dey for Jopa wey bi Jisos Kraist disaipol and en name na Tabita (wey min Dorkas for Greek language). E dey du gud tins and dey help poor pipol.
E sik and e kon die. Wen di pipol don wosh en dead bodi, dem kon kari am put for won room for upstair.
Bikos Lydda dey near Jopa, so wen di disaipols hear sey Pita dey der, dem kon send tu men go kol am sey, "Mak yu kom mit us at wons."

So Pita get up folo dem and wen e rish der, dem kon tak am go di room for up. All di wimen wey dia husban don die stand near Pita dey krai and dey show am all di dress wey Dorkas mak for dem, wen e dey wit dem.
Bot Pita driv all of dem go outsaid, den e nil dan kon pray. E turn face di dead bodi kon sey, "Tabita, get up!" Naim di wuman opun en eye and wen e si Pita, e kon sidan.
Pita kon hol en hand stand-up. Den e kol di bilivas and all di wimen wey dia husban don die and e kon giv di wuman to dem.
Wen evribodi for Jopa hear dis tin wey hapun, meni of dem kon biliv Jisos Kraist.
Pita kon stay for Jopa for meni days wit won man wey dem dey kol Saimon, wey dey du leatha wok.
Won man wey en name bi Konilios dey stay for Sizeria and e bi ofisa for Itali armi.
E dey holi and en and en famili dey woship God. E dey help di pipol wel-wel and dey pray to God evritaim.
Won day, aroun tiri o' klok for aftanun, e kon si vishon and God angel kol am, "Konilios."
Fear kash am as e dey luk di angel, so e ansa, "Oga, Wetin yu wont?" Di angel tel am, "God don hear yor praya and si all di gud tins wey yu dey du for poor pipol.
"So, send som men go Jopa mak dem go kol won man wey en name bi Saimon Pita.
"Di man dey stay wit Saimon wey dey du leatha wok and di haus dey near di sea."
Wen di angel don go, Konilios kon kol tu of en haus boys wit won soja wey dey serv am
and wen e don tel dem evritin wey hapun, e kon send dem go Jopa.
For aftanun for di next day, as di men dey near di tawn, Pita kon go di haus top go pray,
afta som taim, e kon dey hungri, bot di fud neva redi. As e dey wait, e kon si vishon.
E si sey hevun opun and somtin wey bi laik tray, wey dem hol for en for kona kon dey kom dan smol-smol.
Difren-difren animas wey get for legs and di wons wey dey krip for groun and difren birds dey insaid di tray.
Den won vois tel am, "Pita, get up, kil mak yu chop."
Bot Pita ansa, "Oga, I nor go fit, bikos yu no sey since dem born mi, I neva chop enitin wey get blood or wey nor klin."
Bot di vois tel am, "Wetin God don mak klin, mak yu nor forbid am."
Dis tin hapun tiri taims and di tray kon go bak to hevun.
As Pita stil dey wonda wetin di vishon min, di men wey Konilios send kon rish Saimon haus.
Dem ask if enibodi wey bi Saimon Pita dey di haus.
As Pita stil dey tink abaut di vishon, di Holi Spirit kon tel am, "Luk!, tiri men dey faind yu.
"Mak yu get up go mit dem and mak yu folo dem, bikos na Mi send dem kom."
So Pita go dan go mit di men kon sey, "Na mi bi di pesin wey una dey luk for. Wetin bring una kom?"
Dem ansa, "Konilios, di armi ofisa, wey dey du gud tins and dey woship God wel-wel, wey all di Ju pipol dey respet, na-im send us kom. Won angel komand am sey mak e invait yu kom prish giv am."
So Pita sey mak dem enta haus and e welkom dem wel-wel. Di next day, e kon folo dem go and som brodas for Jopa, folo am go tu.
Afta dem don travol for won ful day, dem kon rish Sizeria. Konilios don gada all en famili and frends dey wait for dem.
So as Pita enta di kompound, Konilios nil dan for en front kon dey woship am.
Bot Pita hol am kon sey, "Stand up, bikos I bi ordinari humanbin laik yu."
As Pita stil dey folo am dey tok wen e enta di haus, e kon si sey meni pipol gada dey wait am.
E kon tel dem, "Una no sey di law nor alow us, wey bi Ju pipol, to visit Gentai pipol or folo dem du enitin, bot God don show mi sey mak I nor sey enibodi nor dey klin.
"Na dis mak wen una send pipol kom kol mi, I nor sey 'No'. So mak una tel mi, 'Why una kol mi?'"
Konilios ansa, "For days ago, for dis kaind taim for aftanun, as I dey pray for my haus, won man wey en dress dey shine kon stand for my front.
"E kon sey, 'Konilios, God don hear yor praya and E don rimemba all di gud tins wey yu dey du.
'So mak yu send pipol go Jopa go kol Saimon, wey dem dey kol Pita. E dey stay as visitor wit Saimon wey dey du leatha wok, wey e haus dey near di sea.'
"So, I kon send pipol go kol yu and yu du wel as yu kom. Na wi bi dis for God front, wi redi to hear wetin E sey mak yu tel us."
Den Pita tel dem, "Naw, I don undastand sey God nor dey opres enibodi,
bot for evri tribe, di pesin wey fear am and dey du wetin gud, na dat pesin, E dey laik.
"Una no di mesage wey E send to Izrel pipol, wen E tok abaut di Gud News wey dey giv peace, tru Jisos Kraist, di ril Oga.
"Una no wetin hapun from Galili go rish Judea afta Jon prish sey,
Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret, na-im God giv di Holi Spirit and pawa. Haw e kon du gud for evriwer kon heal pipol wey devol dey opres, bikos God dey wit am.
"All of us si di tins wey e du for Judea and Jerusalem. Dem hang am for tri kon kil-am,
bot God raiz-am for di ted day kon alow pipol si-am.
"Nor bi evribodi si-am, bot na di wons wey God don shuz, wey folo am chop and drink afta e don wak-up from deat.
"E kon komand us mak wi prish and warn pipol sey, na en ensef bi di Pesin wey God shuz mak e joj pipol wey dey alaif and di wons wey don die.
"All di profets tok abaut am sey, 'Evribodi wey biliv am, tru en name, God go forgiv dem.'"
As Pita stil dey tok, di Holi Spirit kon enta insaid all di pipol wey dey hear di mesage.
Di bilivas wey bi Ju wey folo Pita go Jopa kon sopraiz wel-wel sey Gentai pipol tu, fit risiv di Holi Spirit,
bikos dem dey hear wey dem dey yuz difren-difren language tak dey praiz God. Den Pita sey,
"Enibodi go fit sey mak wi nor baptaiz all dis pipol wey don risiv di Holi Spirit, jos laik di res of us?"
So e sey mak dem baptaiz dem for Jisos Kraist name. Den di pipol sey mak e stay wit dem for som days.
Di apostols and di brodas wey dey Judea kon hear sey Gentai pipol tu don risiv God wod.
So wen Pita rish Jerusalem, di bilivas wey bi Ju kon bigin argue wit am sey,
"Yu go chop wit pipol wey dem nor sekonsaiz."
Bot Pita tel dem evritin wey hapun. E kon sey,
"As I dey pray for Jopa I kon si vishon. For insaid di vishon, I si somtin wey bi laik tray dey kom dan smol-smol from hevun, dem hol am for for kona and e kon stop for my front.
"As I luk insaid, I kon si animas wey get for leg, bush meat, di wons wey dey krip and difren-difren birds.
"I stil hear won vois wey tel mi sey, 'Get up Pita, kil som, mak yu chop.'
"Bot I ansa, 'Oga, I nor fit, bikos since dem born mi, I neva chop enitin wey nor dey klin.'
"Bot di vois from hevun kon tel mi again, 'Wetin God don mak klin, mak yu nor forbid am!'
"Dis tin hapun tiri taims, den di tray kon go hevun bak.
"Na dat same taim tiri men wey dem send kom mit mi from Sizeria kon rish di haus wer wi dey stay.
"Di Holi Spirit kon tel mi sey mak I folo dem go. Sis brodas for Jopa folo mi go tu and wi kon enta di man haus.
"Di man tel us haw e si angel wey stand for en haus kon tel am, 'Send pipol go Jopa go kol Saimon wey dem dey kol Pita.
'Wen e kom, e go giv yu di mesage wey God go yuz tak save yu and yor famili.'
"And wen I start to tok, di Holi Spirit kon enta dem, jos as e enta us for di first taim.
"So I kon rimemba wetin di Oga don yuz en own mout tel us bifor sey, 'Jon yuz wota baptaiz pipol, bot God go baptaiz una wit di Holi Spirit.'
"So my pipol, if God fit giv doz Gentai pipol di same gift wey E giv us afta wi biliv Jisos Kraist, hu I bi to stop God?"

Wen dem hear wetin Pita tok, dem nor argue wit am again, so dem kon start to praiz God. Den dem sey, "Naim bi sey God don giv Gentai pipol di shanse to tak turn from sin kom mit am, so dat dem go get di life wey nor dey end."
All di pipol wey skata komot from Jerusalem di taim wey dem kil Steven kon travol go far place laik Fonicia, Syprus and Antiok, dey prish giv onli Ju pipol.
Bot som of dem wey kom from Syprus and Syrene kon go Antiok dey tok to di Greek pipol abaut di Gud News wey konsan Jisos Kraist.
God pawa dey wit dem and meni pipol wey biliv kon bigin dey folo Jisos Kraist.
Wen di pipol for di shosh wey dey Jerusalem hear di news, dem kon send Banabas go Antiok.
Wen e rish der kon si haw God don bless di pipol, e hapi wel-wel kon enkorage dem sey mak dem kontinu to woship God wit all dia heart.
Banabas na beta pesin, di Holi Spirit dey insaid am and e get fate wel-wel, so meni pipol kon bigin folo Jisos Kraist.
Banabas komot from der go faind Sol for Tarsus
and wen e si-am, e kon tak am go Antiok. Banabas and Sol stay der for one year dey tish di pipol wey dey di shosh and na for der dem for first kol di disaipols, "Kristens."
For di same taim, som profets kon go Jerusalem from Antiok.
Won of dem wey en name bi Agabush, get up and di Holi Spirit kon put wod for en mout sey, "Heavi hunga go hapun for di hol wold." Dis tin hapun di taim wen Klaudios dey rule.
So di disaipols, evribodi akodin to haw e fit du rish, kon sey dem go send moni go giv di brodas wey dey Judea.
Afta dem don kontribute, dem kon send Banabas and Sol go giv di eldas di moni wey dem gada.
For dat taim, King Herod kash som pipol wey dey go shosh kon sey e go kil dem.
E kil James, wey bi Jon broda, wit sword.
Wen e si sey di Ju pipol hapi wit wetin e du, e kon arres Pita tu. (Dis tin hapun for di taim wey dem dey du di bread wey nor get yist fist.)
Wen e don kash Pita put for prizin, e put for sojas for for difren grups, mak dem gaid am. Herod plan na to bring Pita out mak e joj am for di hol tawn front wen Passova don finish.
So as Pita dey prizin, di pipol wey dey di shosh dey pray to God for am, day and nite.
Bot for di nite bifor dem go joj am, dem tie Pita wit tu chains and e slip for tu sojas senta. Oda sojas stil dey di prizin front, dey gaid am.
God angel apier and lite kon shine for di prizin. Di angel wak Pita kon tel am, "Get up kwik-kwik!" At wons, di chains fal komot from Pita hand.
Di angel sey, "Wear yor klot and yor sandal." So Pita du wetin di angel tel am. Den di angel sey, "Wear yor koat mak yu folo mi."
Pita folo am go outsaid. E biliv sey wetin dey hapun so na tru, e tink sey na dream e dey dream.

Afta, en and di angel kon pas di first and di sekon sojas grup, den dem kon rish di iron gate wey go di tawn. Di gate opun by ensef and dem go outsaid kon waka pas won smol strit, den di angel kon liv am for der.
Wen Pita si sey all dis tins wey dey hapun, nor bi dream, e kon sey, "Naw I no sey, 'Tru-tru, God send en angel kon save mi from Herod hand and from all di tins wey di Ju pipol tink sey go hapun."
Wen Pita eye don klear, e kon waka face Mary haus wey bi Jon Mark mama, wer meni pipol gada dey pray for am.
Wen e nok di door, Rhoda, won savant girl, kon ansa.
Wen di girl hear Pita vois, e kon dey hapi sotey e nor rimemba to opun di door, bot e run go tel dem sey Pita dey for outsaid.
Dem ansa di girl, "Yu nor no wetin yu dey tok!" Bot di girl stil dey sey na Pita, so dem kon sey, "E go bi en spirit!"
Bot Pita stil dey nok and wen dem opun di door si-am, dem kon sopraiz.
E yuz en hand tak tel dem mak dem kwayet and e kon tel dem haw God tak fri am from prizin. E tel dem, "Mak una tel James and all di brodas dis stori," den e liv dem kon go anoda place.
Wen day break, di sojas wey dey gaid Pita sopraiz wel-wel and fear kash dem wen dem nor si-am again.
Wen Herod send pipol go faind am and dem nor si-am, e kweshon di sojas wey dey gaid Pita kon komand sey mak dem kil all of dem. Den Herod komot from Judea go Sizeria go stay.

Herod kon dey ves wel-wel for Tyre and Sidon pipol. So dem gada go si-am. Bot dem kon first beg Blastus wey bi di king ofisa, mak e help dem beg am, bikos na di king kontri dey suppli fud giv dia kontri.
Wen di day wey dem gri to mit am don rish, Herod kon wear en king dress and e kon sidan for en throne dey folo dem tok.
Bot as e dey tok, di pipol wey gada kon dey shaut, "Na god dey tok so-o, nor bi man!"
At wons God angel kon nak Herod fal for groun, bikos e nor giv God glori and plenti worm kon chop en bodi til e die.
Bot God wod kontinu to dey spread.
Banabas and Sol kon go bak to Jerusalem wen dem don finish dia wok and dem tak Jon Mark folo bodi.
Dis na di profets and tishas wey dey di shosh for Antiok: Banabas, Saimon wey dem dey kol Niger, Lucius wey kom from Syrene, Manaen (wey bi Herod di Tetrak frend from smol pikin) and Sol.
As dem dey fast and woship God, di Holi Spirit kon tel dem, "Mak una seprate Banabas and Sol for di wok wey I want mak dem du."
Afta dem don fast and pray finish, dem pray for Banabas and Sol kon send dem go.
So Banabas and Sol wey di Holi Spirit send kon go Seleucia and from der, dem enta ship go Syprus.
Wen dem rish Salamis, dem kon dey prish God wod for di Ju sinagog, (Jon dey der dey help dem.)
Wen dem don kros di hol Island go rish Pafos, dem kon si won magician wey bi Ju and na wayo profet. En name na Bar-Jisos,
e dey wit Sergius Paulus, wey bi Roman ofisa and e no book wel-wel. Di ofisa invait Banabas and Sol kom en haus, bikos e won hear God wod.
Bot "Elymas" wey bi magician, (bikos na wetin en name min bi dat) kon dey opoz dem, so dat di Roman ofisa nor go biliv wetin dem dey prish.
Bot Sol (wey dem dey kol Pol) wey get di Holi Spirit, luk Elymas for face
kon tel am, "Yu devol pikin wey nor laik gud tin, na so-so wayo and bad tins yu sabi du, yu nor go stop to dey opoz God?
"Naw, God don raiz en hand against yu. Yor eye go blind and yu nor go fit si for somtaim!" At wons, e eye jos blind and daknes kova en face and e kon dey tak hand faind pipol mak dem show am road.
So wen di Roman ofisa si wetin hapun, e kon biliv, bikos e sopraiz wel-wel for wetin dem tish abaut Jisos Kraist.
Pol and di pipol wey folo am kon travol from Pafos go rish Perga wey dey for Pamfilia, bot Jon Mark liv dem kon go bak to Jerusalem.
Wen dem komot for Perga, dem rish Antiok for Pisidia for Sabat Day kon enta di sinagog go sidan.
Afta dem don read from di law and di profets book, di oga for di sinagog kon send mesage go mit dem sey, "Awa brodas, if una get eni mesage to tak enkorage di pipol, mak una kon tok naw."
So, Pol stand-up raiz en hand kon sey, "Izrel and Gentai pipol wey dey fear God, mak una hear wetin I won tok:
"Na from Izrel pipol God shuz awa gran-gran papa dem and E kon mak dem great for di taim wey dem stay for Egypt as strenja and E kari dem komot from Egypt wit en own hand.
"For forti years, E stay wit dem for insaid widanes.
"Afta E don destroi sevun tribes for Kanan, E kon dash en pipol di land.
"All dis tins hapun for for ondred and fifti years. Afta dis, E kon giv dem profet wey go joj dem, ontil Profet Samuel taim rish.
"Di pipol kon ask for king and God giv dem Sol, wey bi Kish pikin, wey kom from Benjamin tribe and e rule dem for forti years.
"Afta God rimov am, E kon mak David dia king. Na dis man God tok abaut sey, 'I don si David, Jesse pikin, di man wey I laik wel-wel and e go du evritin wey I wont.'
"Na from dis man famili God giv Izrel, Jisos Kraist, di savior wey E promis dem bifor.
"Bifor Jisos kom, Jon don prish to all Izrel pipol sey mak dem turn from sin kom mit God and mak e baptaiz dem.
"Bot as Jon dey finish en wok, e kon tok meni taims sey, 'Wetin una tink sey I bi? Nor bi mi bi di Mezaya. Mak una si, sombodi dey kom afta mi. I nor rish to rimov shu from en leg!'
"So my brodas, wey bi Abraham shildren and una wey bi Gentai pipol wey dey fear God, na di mesage abaut haw God go tak save pipol, naim wi kom tel una so.
"Bikos di pipol wey dey stay for Jerusalem and all di rulas nor no am, so dem kon yuz wetin dem dey read for Sabat, wey di profets tok, tak kil-am.
"Dem nor si enitin wey go mak dem kondem am, bot dem stil tel Pilate mak e kil-am.
"Wen dem don du evritin wey Bibol tok abaut am, dem bring am dan from di kros kon put am for grave.
"Bot God raiz-am from deat
and for meni days, e apier to di pipol wey dey folo am from Galili go rish Jerusalem. Na dis pipol kon dey bear witnes sey, dis tins na tru.
"And wi dey tel una di Gud News abaut dis tins wey God promis awa gran-gran papa dem.
"E don du wetin E promis us and dia shildren, wen E raiz Jisos Kraist, as dem rite am for Psalm sey, 'Yu bi my Son and today, I don bi yor Papa.'
"Bot bikos E don raiz Jisos Kraist from deat mak e nor for rotin, God kon sey: 'I go giv yu di holi promis wey una fit trust, wey I promis David.'
"E stil tok for anoda Psalm sey, 'Yu nor go alow yor Pikin wey dey holi, mak e rotin.'
"Bikos David, afta e don du wetin God send am kon du among en pipol, e kon die and dem bere am wit en gran-gran papa dem and e rotin,
bot di pesin wey God raiz-up, nor rotin.
"So my pipol, mak una no sey, na tru dis Pesin wi dey prish sey, 'God go forgiv una.'
"Tru am, evribodi wey biliv, go dey fri from evritin wey Mosis law nor fit fri dem from.
"So mak una mak sure sey wetin di profets tok for groun, nor hapun to una:
"Una wey dey laff; mak una hear, una go sopraiz til una die! Bikos I go du somtin for una taim, somtin wey una nor go biliv ivun if dem tel una."
As Pol and Banabas dey komot, di pipol kon dey beg dem mak dem stil kon tok abaut all dis tins for di next Sabat Day.
Wen di mitin for di sinagog don finish, meni Ju and Gentai pipol wey dey fear God kon folo Pol and Banabas, dey enkorage dem sey, mak dem kontinu for di grace wey God giv dem.
Di next Sabat Day, nearli evribodi for di tawn gada mak dem for hear God wod.
Bot wen di Ju pipol si as di pipol plenti rish, jelosi kon ful dia maind, so dem start to opoz wetin Pol dey tok kon dey kos am.
Pol and Banabas kon yuz boldnes tak ansa dem, "E gud sey na una wi first prish God wod giv. Bot since una rejet am and una nor redi to get life wey nor dey end, wi go-go prish giv Gentai pipol.
"Bikos dis na wetin God don alredi komand us sey: 'I don shuz una to bi lite for Gentai pipol, mak una bring salvashon kom dis wold.'"
Wen di Gentai pipol hear wetin e tok, dem start to hapi kon dey tank God for en wod and evribodi wey God don shuz to get life wey nor dey end, kon biliv.
So God wod kon dey spread roun di hol kontri.
Bot di Ju pipol tok bad tins abaut Pol and Banabas giv all di big wimen wey dey fear God and di big-big men for di tawn, so dem sofa dem and driv dem komot from di aria.
So wen dem don shake di land san-san wey dey dia leg komot, dem kon go Ikonium.
So di disaipols begin hapi and di Holi Spirit kon ful dia life.
For Ikonium, Pol and Banabas go insaid di Ju sinagog and dem prish sotey meni Ju and Greek pipol kon biliv God wod.
Bot di Ju pipol wey nor gri biliv, gada di Gentai pipol kon spoil dia maind against Pol and Banabas.
Di apostols stay der tey wel-wel and dem tok wit boldnes abaut God, wey show sey dia mesage abaut en gudnes na tru, bikos E kon giv dem pawa to du meni mirakols and wondas.
Bot di pipol wey dey di tawn kon divide; som dey di Ju side and som dey di apostol side.
Wen di Gentai and di Ju pipol (wit di oga dem wey dey rule dem) kon trai to sofa and stone di disaipols,
Pol and Banabas kon no abaut am, so dem kon run go Lystra and Derbe wey dey for Lycaonia and all di aria wey dey near der
and dem kontinu to dey prish for der.
For Lystra, dem mit won man wey nor fit waka since wen dem born am.
Di man dey listin to Pol as e dey tok. Wen Pol kon luk am for eye kon si sey e get fate wey go fit heal am,
e tel am, "Stand up." Di man kon jump up and e bigin waka.
Wen di pipol si wetin Pol du, dem kon shaut for Lycaonian language sey, "Awa gods don turn to humanbin kom mit us."
Dem start to kol Banabas, "Zeus" and Pol, "Hermes", bikos na Pol dey lid dem.
Di prist wey dey woship di god wey dem dey kol Zeus wey en shrine dey outsaid di tawn kon bring melu and flawas kom di tawn gate; so dat en and all di pipol go sakrifais giv di apostols.
Wen Banabas and Pol hear abaut di tin wey di pipol won du, dem shaut, tear dia klot kon run go mit di pipol sey,
"Why una won du dis kaind tin? Wi tu na humanbin laik una! Wi kon tel una di Gud News, wey go mak una turn from sin kom mit God, wey mak hevun, eart, sea and all di tins wey dey insaid dem.
"Bifor-bifor, E let difren tribes dey du as dem laik,
bot E nor stop to du gud for una, E dey giv una rain from hevun and fud from groun, so dat una go chop and bele go swit una."
Upon all dis tins wey Pol and Banabas tok, dem nor fit stop di pipol mak dem nor du di sakrifias.
Bot afta som Ju pipol wey kom from Antiok and Ikonium don win di pipol maind, dem kon stone Pol, drag am komot from di tawn, bikos dem tink sey e don die.
And as di disaipols gada roun am, e get up kon waka go bak to di tawn. Di next day, en and Banabas kon komot go Derbe.
Afta dem don prish God wod for dat tawn and meni pipol don turn from sin kom mit God, dem kon go bak to Lystra, Ikonium and Antiok.
Dem enkorage di disaipols sey mak dem get heart and mak dem kontinu to dey biliv sey, "Wi go must sofa wel-wel for pipol hand, bifor wi go fit enta God Kindom."
Wen dem don shuz eldas wey go lid di bilivas for di difren-difren shosh, dem kon pray and fast sey, mak God protet dem.
Dem kon liv Pisidia go Pamfilia
and wen dem don prish for Perga, dem kon go Attalia.
From der, dem enta ship go Antiok, wer dem for first pray for dem, for di wok wey dem jos finish naw.
Wen dem rish Antiok, dem gada di pipol kon tel dem all di tins wey God yuz dem du and haw E opun road for Gentai pipol to biliv.
So dem stay der for somtaim wit di bilivas.
Som men kom from Judea kon dey tish di brodas sey, "Unles dem sekonsaiz una di way Mosis tok for di law, una nor go fit get salvashon."
Wen Pol and Banabas don argue wit di pipol wel-wel, di shosh pipol kon send Pol and Banabas wit som oda pipol go Jerusalem go mit di apostols and di eldas, so dat dem go ask dem abaut di mata.

So di shosh send dem go and as dem dey go, dem pas Fonicia and Samaria kon tel pipol wey dem mit for der haw Gentai pipol tak turn from dia sin kom mit God and di stori mak all di brodas wey hear am, hapi wel-wel.
Wen dem rish Jerusalem, di hol shosh wit di apostols and di eldas kon welkom dem, den dem tel dem evritin wey God don yuz dem du.
Bot som Farisi wey don biliv Kraist stand-up kon sey, "E gud mak wi tel Gentai pipol mak dem sekonsaiz and du evritin wey Mosis law tok."
Di apostols and di eldas kon hol mitin to tok abaut di mata.
Afta dem don argue wel-wel abaut di mata, Pita kon stand-up sey, "My brodas, una no sey bifor-bifor, na mi God shuz mak e go prish giv Gentai pipol mak dem hear and biliv en wod.
"And God, wey no wetin dey insaid pipol maind, don show ensef to dem wen E giv dem di Holi Spirit, jos as E giv us
and E nor du wayo bitwin wi and dem bikos, E mak dia heart klin by fate.
"So why una won kon trai God? Load wey wi and awa gran-gran papa dem nor fit kari, why una dey put am for dis disaipols head?
"Wi biliv sey God save us tru grace wey kom from Jisos Kraist, jos as E du for dis Gentai pipol tu."
Evribodi wey dey for der kon kwayet dey hear wetin Banabas and Pol dey tok and dem tel dem abaut di mirakols and wondas wey God yuz dem du among Gentai pipol.
Afta dem don tok finish, James ansa, "Awa brodas, mak una hear wetin I won tok.
"Simeon don tel us haw God first shuz som pipol from Gentai wey go dey tok abaut am.
"Dis tins gri wit wetin di profets tok bifor sey:
'Afta all dis tins, I go kom bak and I go build David haus wey don fal; I go build am wit all di sand wey skata for groun and e go strong again,
so evribodi go kom mit God, plus Gentai pipol wey I don kol to bi my pipol.' God wey mak all dis tins, na so E tok
and E no sey na so e go bi.'
"So, I go sey mak wi nor mak tins hard for Gentai pipol wey jos start to serv God,

bot insted, mak wi rite leta go giv dem sey, mak dem nor chop fud wey dem sakrifias giv juju and mak dem nor slip wit hu dem nor mari, anima wey dem kil and di blood nor tosh groun, mak dem nor chop or drink en blood.
"Bikos na since awa gran-gran papa dem taim dem don dey prish Mosis law for di sinagog for evri Sabat Day."
So di apostols, eldas and di hol shosh kon gri sey dem go send som men folo Pol and Banabas go Antiok. Den shuz Judas, wey dem dey kol Basabas and Silas and dem bi ledas among di brodas.
Na wetin dem rite for di leta, bi dis, "From di apostols and eldas wey bi una brodas, to all di brodas and sistas wey bi Gentai wey dey Antiok, Syria and Silicia. Wi grit una o-o!
"Wi hear sey som pipol kom mit una sey dem kom from us, ivun doh wi nor send dem. Dem dey konfuz and tel una wetin go disturb una maind.
"So all of us kon gri sey mak wi shuz pipol wey go folo Banabas and Pol, wey bi awa frend, kom mit una.
"Dis men dey risk dia life, bikos of awa Oga Jisos Kraist name.
"So wi send Judas and Silas wey go tel una all this tins by demsef.
"Bikos wi and di Holi Spirit nor won put heavi load for una head, so na dis smol advise wi dey giv una:

'Wi advise sey mak una forbid meat and blood wey dem don sakrifias giv juju and eni anima wey una kil wey en blood nor tosh groun. And mak una nor slip wit hu una nor mari.' If una forbid all dis tins, una go du wel!"
So wen dem don send dem go, dem kon go Antiok and afta dem gada evribodi, dem kon giv dem di leta.
Bikos of wetin dem rite put for di leta, all di pipol hapi wen dem read am out.
Bot Judas and Silas, wey bi profet, enkorage di pipol and wetin dem tok kon mak di pipol heart strong.
Afta dem don stay der tey smol, di brodas kon send dem bak wit peace to di pipol wey send dem kom.
Bot Silas sey e go stil stay der for somtaim.
Pol, Banabas and odas kon stil stay for Antiok dey tish and prish God wod.
Afta som days, Pol kon tel Banabas, "Mak wi go bak go visit di brodas for all di tawn wey wi for prish God wod, so dat wi go no haw dem dey."
Banabas won kon kari Jon Mark folo bodi,
bot Pol sey mak dem nor kari am, bikos na so e tak liv dem for Pamfilia bifor and e nor folo dem du di wok.
Dis mata kon kause serious kworel, sotey dem kon seprate. Banabas tak Mark folo bodi and dem kon enta ship go Syprus,
bot Pol shuz Silas and dem go mit di brodas and sistas kon pray mak God bless dem.
Pol pas tru Syria and Silicia dey enkorage di pipol wey dey di shosh dem for der.
Pol kon stil go Derbe and Lystra. Won disaipol wey dem dey kol Timoti dey der. En mama na Ju wey biliv Kraist, bot en papa, na Greek.
Di brodas wey dey Lystra and Ikonium dey tok gud abaut am.
Pol wont mak Timoti folo am, so e sekonsaiz am, bikos di Ju pipol wey dey for di aria, no sey en papa na Greek.
As dem dey go from tawn to tawn, dem kon dey pas di mesage wey di apostols and eldas for Jerusalem send to all di Gentai pipol wey biliv Kraist sey, mak dem obey.
So di pipol for di shosh dey strong more-more for fate and dem kon dey plenti evriday.
Dem pas tru Frigia and Galatia aria, bikos di Holi Spirit warn dem sey mak dem nor prish di mesage for Asia.
Wen dem rish Mysia, dem kon trai to enta insaid Bitinia, bot Jisos Kraist Spirit nor alow dem enta,
naim dem pas tru Mysia kon face Troas.
Pol si dis vishon for nite: Won man wey kom from Masidonia stand dey beg am sey, "Mak yu kom help us for Masidonia!"
Wen Pol si dis vishon finish, wi kon trai to go Masidonia. Wi kon biliv sey God don kol us mak wi go prish di Gud News to di pipol wey dey der.
Wi travol for wota from Troas and awa ship kon from der go Samotrace and di next day, wi go Neapolis
and from der, to Filipai wey bi numba won tawn for Masidonia, wey Rome dey rule. Wi stay for dis tawn for som days.
Wen Sabat Day rish, wi komot from di tawn go di wotasaid, wer wi tink sey wi go si wer dem for dey pray, naim wi sidan kon start to dey tok to di wimen wey gada for der.
E get won wuman wey dey listin to us, en name na Lydia and e kom from Tiatira. E dey fear God wel-wel and dey sel purpol klot. God opun en heart to biliv evritin wey Pol tok.
Afta en and en famili don baptize, e kon beg us sey, "If una don asept mi as pesin wey biliv Kraist, mak una kon stay for my haus." So e beg us ontil wi gri.
Won day, as wi dey go di place wer dem for dey pray, won slave girl wey get spirit wey dey mak am si vishon, kon si us. Di girl oga dey yuz am mak plenti moni, enitaim e tel pipol wetin go hapun.
Di girl kon dey folo mi and Pol for bak kon dey shaut sey, "Dis pipol na God savants -o-o, dem dey prish to una abaut haw una go tak dey save."

E kontinu to dey shaut laik dis for meni days. So di tin ves Pol wel-wel, naim e turn face di girl kon tel di spirit, "I komand yu wit Jisos Kraist name, komot for dis girl bodi!" At wons, di spirit komot from di girl bodi.
Bot wen di pipol wey get di girl si sey wetin dem tak dey mak moni done go, dem seize Pol and Silas kon drag dem go mit di tawn oga dem for di market senta.
Den dem drag dem go mit di joj dem kon sey, "All dis men dey kause wahala for dis tawn. Dem bi Ju
and dem dey tish law wey nor bi awa own, since wi bi Rome pipol."
All di pipol wey gada for der kon join put mout against dem and di joj dem kon giv orda sey, mak dem rimov Pol and Silas klot komot for dia bodi and flog dem wit heavi stick.
Afta dem don flog dem wel-wel, dem put dem for prizin kon tel di warda mak e gaid dem wel-wel.
Bikos of dis strong orda, di warda put dem for insaid-insaid di prizin kon hook dia leg wit big-big chains..
Wen mid nite rish, Pol and Silas kon dey pray and sing song giv God and all di pipol wey dey di prizin dey listin to dem.
At wons, di groun start to shake, sotey all di wall and pilas wey dey di prizin kon dey shake tu. Na wons di door opun and di chains wey dem tak hook di pipol wey dey di prizin, kon luz.
Wen di warda wak-up kon si sey all di doors for di prizin opun, e bring en sword kom out, won kon kil ensef, bikos e tink sey all di prizinas don run.
Bot Pol kon shaut, "Mak yu nor kil yorsef, all of us stil dey for here!"
Naim di warda sey mak dem bring lite and e rush enta insaid di prizin kon fal for Pol and Silas front dey shake.
E bring dem kom outsaid kon ask, "My oga dem, wetin I go du to dey save?"
Dem ansa am, "Biliv Jisos Kraist and yu go dey save, both yu and all yor famili."
Den, dem prish God wod giv en and all di pipol wey dey en haus.
Dat nite, di warda kon wosh all dia sore; den en and en famili kon baptaiz.
Di warda bring dem enta en haus kon put fud for tabol mak dem chop. E hapi wel-wel sey en and en famili don biliv God.
Wen day break, di joj dem kon send polis men sey, "Mak una go riliz doz men."
Di warda kon tel Pol, "Di joj dem don giv orda sey mak wi fri una. So mak una kon dey go."

Bot Pol tel di polis men, "Dem sey mak dem beat us for publik ivun wen dem neva joj awa kase, ivun doh sey wi bi Rome pipol, dem stil trow us for prizin. Naw, dem won fri us from bak mak pipol nor for no? Wi nor gri! Mak dem kom here by demsef kon riliz us!"
Di polis men kon ripot wetin Pol tok giv di joj dem. Fear kash dem wen dem hear sey Pol and Silas na Rome pipol,
so dem kon beg dem sey mak dem nor ves. Afta dem bring dem kom out, dem kon beg dem wel-wel sey mak dem liv di tawn.
Wen dem don komot for prizin, dem enta Lydia haus and wen dem si di brodas, dem enkorage dem bifor dem liv di tawn.
Afta dem pas Amfipolis and Apollonia, dem kon rish Tesalonika wer won Ju sinagog dey.
Pol go mit di Ju pipol for di sinagog as e dey du bifor and for tiri Sabat Day, e kon dey tish dem God wod,
dey show dem haw God wod sey Kraist must sofa and e go raiz from grave. E tel dem, "Dis Jisos Kraist wey I dey tel una abaut so, naim bi di Kraist."
Som of dem wey biliv kon join Pol and Silas and meni Greek pipol wey dey fear God and som big-big wimen, join dem tu.

Bot di Ju pipol kon dey jelos, naim dem gada aria boys wey dey waka abaut for market, tak form gang to skata di tawn. Dem atak Jason haus, bikos dem tink sey Pol and Silas dey der, so dat dem go bring dem out kon tak dem go di tawn hall.
Wen dem nor si dem, dem kon drag Jason and som of en brodas go mit di tawn oga, dey shaut, "All dis pipol wey don start wahala for di wold, don rish here tu
and Jason put dem for en haus laik visitor! Dem dey du wetin dey against Caesar law, dey tok sey anoda king dey wey en name bi Jisos Kraist!"
Dem kause konfushon among di pipol wey gada and di tawn oga dem wey hear all dis tins.
Afta di oga dem don kolet moni from Jason and di brodas, dem kon alow dem go.
At wons, di brodas send Pol and Silas go Berea for nite. Wen dem don rish der, dem kon go di Ju sinagog.
Dis Ju pipol get beta maind pas di wons wey dey for Tesalonika, bikos dem opun maind tak biliv di mesage and dem dey read God wod evriday to shek weda all di tins wey dem hear, na tru.
Na so meni of dem tak biliv, ivun wit som big-big men and wimen wey bi Greek.
Bot wen di Ju pipol wey dey for Tesalonika hear sey Pol don rish Berea dey prish God wod, dem kon go der go kause wahala and spoil di pipol maind.
Naim di brodas send Pol go di wotasaid, bot Silas and Timoti stil stay for Berea.
Di pipol wey folo Pol, eskot am go rish Atens and afta, e orda dem sey mak Silas and Timoti kom mit am kwik-kwik for der, so dem kon go bak.
As Pol dey Atens dey wait for dem, e kon dey ves for en spirit, bikos e si sey na so-so juju ful di tawn.
So e tok to di Ju and Gentai pipol wey dey fear God wey dey insaid di sinagog and e stil tok to evribodi wey dey di market.

Na so som wise men wey dey folo Epikorian and di wons wey bi Stoik dey folo am tok and som dey ask ish oda, "Wetin dis mumu and toku-toku tink sey e no wey e won tel us?" som stil sey, "E bi laik sey e dey prish abaut som gods from anoda tribe." (Dem tok so, bikos e dey prish di Gud News abaut Jisos Kraist and en resureshon.)
So dem tak Pol go Areopagus kon tel am, "Wi beg, mak yu tel us abaut dis new tin wey yu dey tish so?
"Bikos di tins wey yu dey tok, wi neva hear am bifor and wi laik to no wetin dem min."
(Atens pipol and odas wey dey der, nor get eni oda wok pas mak dem sidan dey tok stori abaut eni new tin wey dey hapun.)
So Pol stand for Areopagus front kon sey, "My pipol wey dey for Atens, I si sey una laik God mata wel-wel.

"Bikos as I waka roun dey luk all di tins wey una dey woship, I ivun si won shrine wey dem rite put sey: 'To di god wey pipol nor no.' So wetin una dey woship wey una nor no, naim I kon tel una abaut today.
"God wey mak di wold and evritin wey dey insaid, wey bi di Oga for hevun and eart, nor dey stay insaid haus wey humanbin build
and E nor wont mak humanbin gi-am somtin laik sey E nid enitin, bikos naim dey giv life and air wey wi dey breat.
"Na tru won man E mak all di tribes wey dey for di wold and E tok di taim and boundari wer dem go stay rish,
so dat dem go luk for God kon si-am, ivun doh E nor dey far from all of us.
"Bikos na insaid am wi dey liv, waka, get life and som of una wey dey rite poem tok sey, 'Wi tu na God pikin.'
"So, as e bi sey wi bi God pikin, mak wi nor tink sey God bi laik image wey humanbin yuz gold, siliva or stone tak mak.
"God don forgiv us for di taim wen wi nor no wetin wi dey du, bot naw, E dey komand pipol for evriwer sey mak dem turn from sin kom mit am,
bikos E don shuz won day wey E go tak joj di wold wit raitiousnes tru di man wey E shuz and show evribodi wen E raiz-am from deat."
Wen di pipol hear sey pipol go raiz from deat, som kon dey laff, bot odas kon sey, "Wi go hear dis mata from yu anoda day."
So Pol kon komot from Areopagus.
Bot som pipol wey biliv Kraist kon join am. Insaid dis pipol wey biliv so, na Dionysius wey bi memba for Areopagus and won wuman wey dem dey kol Damaris, wit oda pipol wey join dem.
Afta dis tins, Pol komot from Atens go Korint.
For der, e kon si won Ju wey dem dey kol Akwila, wey kom from Pontus and e jos kom bak from Itali wit en wife Prisila, bikos Klaudios orda sey mak all Ju pipol komot from Rome. Pol go mit dem
and bikos dem dey du di same wok, e kon stay wit dem dey folo dem wok (na tent dem dey mak sel).
E dey tok to both Ju and Greek pipol for di sinagog evri Sabat, so dat dem go biliv.
Wen Silas and Timoti kom from Masidonia, Pol kon yuz all en maind dey prish di wod, dey bear witnes giv di Ju sey, na Jisos bi di Kraist.
Wen dem opoz and kos am, e shake en dress kon sey, "Mak una blood dey una head, bikos I nor du eni bad tin and from today go, I go-go prish for Gentai pipol!"
Den Pol komot for di sinagog go Titus Justus haus; di man na Gentai wey dey woship God and en haus dey near di sinagog.
Krispus, di oga for di sinagog and en famili, plus meni Korint pipol wey hear abaut Jisos Kraist, biliv and dem kon baptaiz dem.
Jisos kon tel Pol for vishon for nite, "Mak yu nor kwayet bikos of fear, bot mak yu opun yor mout dey tok,
I dey for yor side and nobodi go fit du yu enitin, bikos I get plenti pipol for dis tawn."
So e stay der for won year and sis monts dey tish di pipol God wod.
Wen Gallio dey rule for Akaya, Ju pipol join togeda atak Pol kon kari am go di jojment seat.
Dem sey, "Dis man dey bribe pipol to woship God and dat tin dey against awa law!"
Bot jos as Pol won start to tok, Gallio kon tel di Ju pipol sey, "If na bikos of won offens or serious wayo, I for listin to una komplain,
bot since na mata abaut wod, name and una own law, mak una go setol am by unasef. I nor go joj all doz kaind tins!"
So e driv dem komot from di jojment seat.
Dem kon sieze Sostenes, wey bi oga for di sinagog kon start to beat am for di jojment seat front. Bot Gallio du laik sey all dis tins nor konsan am.
Afta e don stay meni days for Korint, Pol kon tel all di brodas bye-bye, den e enta ship go Syria and Prisila and Akwila folo am go. For Senkria, e kon kut en hair bikos e mak vow.
Wen dem rish Efisos, Pol kon liv Prisila and Akwila for der, bot en ensef enta di sinagog go folo di Ju pipol tok.
Wen dem sey mak e stay wit dem smol, e nor gri,
bot e tel dem bye-bye kon sey, "If God wont, I go kom again kon si una." Den e enta ship from Efisos
and wen e rish Sizeria, e pas go Jerusalem go salot di pipol for di shosh wey dey der, bifor e go Antiok.
Afta e don stay smol for der, Pol komot kon travol pas all di aria wey dey Galatia and Frigia, dey enkorage all di disaipols.
E get won Ju man, en name na Apollos and e from Alexendria go Efisos. Apollos sabi tok and e no di Bibol wel-wel.
Dem don tish am abaut Jisos and na wit high spirit e tak dey tok and tish abaut Jisos Kraist, bot na onli Jon baptism, e no rish.
E kon dey tok wit boldnes for di sinagog, bot wen Prisila and Akwila hear am dey tok, dem kol am go kona kon explain God wod giv am wel-wel.
Wen Apollos won kros go Akaya, di brodas enkorage am kon giv am leta mak e giv di disaipols, so dat dem go welkom am. Wen e rish der, e kon join dey help di bilivas,
bikos e nor gri wit wetin di Ju pipol dey tok for publik and e show dem from di Bibol sey na Jisos Kraist, bi di Mezaya.
For di same taim wen Apollos dey Korint, Pol travol pas insaid tawn ontil e rish Efisos. For der, e mit som disaipols
kon ask dem, "Una don risiv di Holi Spirit, since una don biliv Kraist?" Dem ansa, "No! Wi neva ivun hear sey Holi Spirit dey."
Pol ask dem, "Na haw dem kon tak baptaiz una?" Dem ansa, "Na Jon baptism."
Pol kon tel dem, "Jon baptaiz pipol wey turn from sin kom mit God wit wota kon tel dem mak dem biliv di pesin wey go kom afta am and na dat pesin, bi Jisos Kraist."
Wen dem hear wetin Pol tok, dem kon baptaiz dem wit Jisos Kraist name
and as Pol put hand for dia head, di Holi Spirit enta dem and dem kon start to speak difren language, dey profesai.
(Na twef disaipols Pol folo tok.)
So Pol enta di sinagog kon dey tok wit boldnes for tiri monts. E dey show di pipol haw dem go tak biliv God Kindom.

Bot wen som of di stuborn pipol nor gri biliv, dem kon dey spoil Jisos Kraist name for all di pipol front, so Pol wit en disaipols kon liv dem. Pol kon dey tak en disaipols folo bodi evriday, go tish for Tiranus Hall.
Dis tin kontinu for tu years ontil evribodi wey dey stay for Asia aria, weda na Ju or Greek, hear God wod.
Dat taim, God yuz Pol dey du meni wondaful mirakols,
ivun handkachef and klot wey dem tak tosh Pol bodi, dey heal sik pipol and driv evil spirit from pipol bodi, wen dem yuz am tosh dem.
Bot som Ju wey dey waka abaut kon trai to kol Jisos Kraist name for pipol wey evil spirit dey disturb dey sey, "I kommad yu wit Jisos Kraist name wey Pol dey prish."
(So, Skeva wey bi Ju prist, get sevun sons wey dey du dis kaind tin.)
Bot di evil spirit ansa dem, "Yes! I no hu Jisos Kraist bi, I stil no Pol tu, bot hu una bi?"
Naim di man wey di evil spirit dey insaid en bodi kon jump for dia bodi beat dem wel-wel, ontil dem start to beg. E beat dem til dem run komot from di haus wit nakednes and all dia bodi ful wit sore.
Wen evribodi wey dey stay Efisos, both Ju and Greek, hear di stori, fear kash dem and Jisos Kraist name kon dey reign.
Meni pipol wey nor biliv, kom out kon dey konfes all di bad tins wey dem dey du.
Som wey dey du magic, bring all dia books kon burn dem to ashes for evribodi front. Wen dem add di price for all di books, e rish fifti tazon silva koins (50,000).
So God wod kon dey grow more-more and dem kon dey win meni souls.
Afta all dis tins hapun, Pol kon sey e go-go Jerusalem tru Masidonia and Akaya. E plan sey, "Afta I don rish der, I go stil go Rome."
So, afta e send tu men wey dey help am, Timoti and Erastus go Masidonia, e kon stil stay Asia smol.
Dat taim serious wahala hapun bikos of "Kraist Way" wey dem dey prish.
E get won man, en name na Demetrius and e dey mod silva image. Na dis man mod Artemis shrine and dey help pipol wey dey mod, mak plenti moni.
Di man kon gada all di pipol wey dey mod, wit oda men wey dey du dat kaind wok, den e tel dem, "My pipol, una no sey na dis biznes wi tak dey chop.
And una don si and hear sey dis Pol don tak meni pipol komot from awa hand. Nor bi onli for dis Efisos, bot for di hol Asia, bikos e dey tel dem sey di gods wey dem mod, nor bi god at-all.

"So, if wi nor du somtin, awa biznes go spoil and nor bi onli dat won, bot pipol nor go respet di tempol wey awa juju, Artemis, dey stay again and dis wuman wey di hol Asia dey woship, nor go get pawa again."
Wen di pipol hear dis tins, dem ves wel-wel kon start to shaut, "Artemis wey dey Efisos, na yu bi awa god!"
Di hol tawn kon dey shake wit nois and all di pipol rush go di stadium dey drag Gaius and Aristakus and di Masidonia pipol wey dey eskot Pol.
Bot wen Pol won enta di stadium, di disaipols nor alow am.
Ivun som of di oga dem wey bi en frend, send mesage go mit am sey, mak e nor enta di stadium.
Na so all di pipol dey shaut enihaw and konfushon kon ful evriwer, meni pipol wey gada dey shaut, nor ivun no why dem gada.
Som pipol sey na abaut Alexander, bikos di Ju pipol don push am go front. Alexander wave en hand kon sey, mak dem kwayet, mak e for fit tok to difend di Ju pipol.
Bot wen dem si sey na Ju e bi, dem kon start to shaut again, "Artemis wey dey Efisos, na yu bi awa god!" Dem shaut laik dis rish tu hours."
Afta di tawn secretary don mak di pipol kwayet, e kon sey, "My pipol wey dey Efisos, wish pesin dey among una wey nor no sey na Artemis bi Efisos god wey fal from hevun?
"So bikos nobodi fit argue dis mata, mak una kwayet and mak una nor du enitin wey nor get head.
"Una don bring dis men kom here, nor bi bikos dem spoil di tempol or kos awa goddess.
"If Demetrius and di pipol wey dey wit am get eni komplain against enibodi, kourt dey and joj dem dey der tu. So mak dem tak dia kase go der.
"Bot if una wont enitin wey pas dis won, na kourt dem go for setol am.
"Bikos dem fit tak all of us go kourt today sey wi dey riot, bikos wi nor get eni rizin for dis konfushon wey dey hapun so."
Afta e tok finish, e kon sey mak evribodi go dia haus.
Afta di wahala for Efisos, Pol send for di disaipols and afta e enkorage dem, e tel dem bye-bye kon komot der go Masidonia.
Afta e waka roun di aria, e enkorage di bilivas wey dey der kon go Greece.
E stay for der for tiri monts. Bikos Ju pipol don plan to wait mak dem kash am, as e won enta ship go Syria, e kon go bak tru Masidonia.
Pipol wey folo Pol go, na Sopater, wey bi Frius pikin wey kom from Berea; Aristakus and Sekondus wey kom from Tesalonika; Gaius from Derbe; Timoti wit Tikikus and Trofimus wey kom from Asia.
All dis pipol don go for front go wait us for Troas.
Wi enta ship from Filipai afta di Passova Fist and afta faiv days, wi mit dem for Troas kon stay der for sevun days.
For di first day for di wik, wen wi hol mitin to break bread togeda, Pol kon start to tok wit di pipol and bikos e won go di next day, e kon prish til mid-nite.
(For di room for upstair wer wi for dey mit, lamp meni for der),
won boy wey dem dey kol Eutikus, sidan for di window kon dey slip as Pol dey prish. Di slip kari am go, so e fal from di tiri storey and wen dem rush go kari am, dem si sey e don die.
Bot Pol go dan, laidan on-top di boy, kon put en hand roun am sey, "Mak una nor wori, bikos e stil dey alaif!"
Den Pol go upstair and afta e don break bread wit dem, e folo dem tok til day break. Den e kon komot from der.
Dem tak di boy go haus kon dey hapi sey e dey alaif.
Wi waka go wer di ship dey kon go Assos, so dat wi go kari Pol for der, bikos e plan sey e go pas land go der.
Wen e mit us for Assos, wi kari am for di ship kon go Mitilene.
From der, wi move and di next day, wi kon rish Miletus.
Pol don sey e go travol pas Efisos mak e for nor spend taim for Asia, bikos e dey hurri mak e for kwik rish Jerusalem for Pentecost Day.
From Miletus, e send mesanga go Efisos sey mak di eldas wey dey di shosh kon mit am der.
Wen dem kom, e tel dem, "All of una no haw I dey liv my life since di taim wey I dey wit una and from di first day wey I enta Asia,
haw I nor dey kari bodi up as I dey serv Jisos wit pain and wahala wey I dey face, bikos of wiked plan wey Ju pipol get for mi.
"Una no sey I nor stop to dey tel una enitin wey go help una and I tish una for publik and for una haus.
"I dey prish giv Ju and Greek pipol sey mak dem turn from sin kom mit and serv God and put dia fate for awa Oga Jisos Kraist.
"Naw, di Spirit dey lid mi go Jerusalem, ivun doh I nor no wetin go hapun to mi for der,
esept sey di Holi Spirit dey warn mi sey, from tawn to tawn, na prizin and sofa dey wait for mi.
"Bot I nor kount my life to min enitin, so dat I go fit finish my wok and di ministri wey I risiv from Jisos Kraist, wey bi to prish abaut di Gud News wey go mak pipol undastand God grace.
"Naw, I no sey non of una wey I prish God kindom giv, go si mi again.
"So, I won tel una naw sey, nobodi blood dey for my head.
"Bikos I nor hide enitin from una, as I dey tel una abaut God plan.
"Mak una tak kare of unasef and all di pipol wey di Holi Spirit don put unda una, bikos na una bi di lidas for God shosh, wey E buy wit en onli pikin blood.
"I no sey afta I don go, wiked pipol wit bad maind go kom join una. Pipol wey nor go sori for di ship.
"Ivun among una, som men go stand dey tish lai-lai tins kon draw pipol folo bodi.
"So mak una shine una eye and rimemba sey, for day and nite for tiri years, I nor stop to dey krai, as I dey warn una.
"Naw, I liv una for God hand, so mak en wod wey get grace, kip una. Dis wod wey get grace fit mak una grow and get share wit all God pipol.
"Since una no mi, I nor put eye for enibodi gold, silva or koat.
"Una no sey na dis my hand I tak dey wok and get evritin wey I wont and ivun dey help pipol wey dey wit mi.
"Laik dis, I don show una sey wi must help oda pipol wey wik and una rimemba wetin Jisos Kraist tok, wen e sey, 'E beta mak pesin dey giv pipol tins, dan mak e dey kolet from dem.'"
Wen e tok all dis tins finish, e nil dan wit all of dem kon pray.
All of dem start to krai, as dem draw Pol near bodi kon dey kiss am.
Wetin Pol tok kon mak dem wik, bikos e sey, "Una nor go si mi again." So dem folo am go rish wer di ship dey.
Afta wi don liv dem, wi enta ship kon travol go Kos. Di next day, wi go Rhodes and from der, wi kon go Patara.
Wi si won ship dey kros go Fonicia, so wi kon enta am.
Afta wi rish Syprus, wi kon liv der travol go Syria, kom stop for Tyre, bikos di ship won put load dan.
Wi kon go faind di disaipols wey dey for di tawn, wen wi si dem, wi stay wit dem for sevun days. Dem kon tel Pol meni taims sey mak e nor go Jerusalem.
Wen wi don stay der for somtaim, wi kon travol komot der. All of dem wit dia wife and pikin eskot us go outsaid di tawn. Wi nil dan pray for di riva
kon tel dem bye-bye and as wi enta ship, dem kon go bak to dia haus.
Wi kontinu awa joni from Tyre go rish Ptolemais and wen wi don grit di brodas, wi stay wit dem for won day.
Di next day, wi liv der kon go Sizeria. For der, wi enta Filip haus. Dis Filip na evangelist and e dey among di sevun dikins wey dem shuz for Jerusalem, den wi kon stay der wit am.
(E get for dotas wey neva mari, wey dey profesai.)
As wi stay der for som days, won profet wey en name na Agabush kom from Judea.
E waka kon mit us, tak Pol belt tie en hand and leg kon sey, "Di Holi Spirit sey, 'Na so di Ju pipol wey dey Jerusalem go tie di man wey get dis belt kon kari am giv Gentai pipol.'"
Wen wi hear wetin e tok, wi and di pipol wey dey der kon beg Pol sey mak e nor go Jerusalem.
Bot Pol ansa, "Wetin una dey du so, una dey krai dey won break my heart? I redi, nor bi onli mak dem tie mi, bot to die for Jerusalem, bikos of Jisos Kraist name."
Bikos wi nor fit stop am again, wi kon kip kwayet and onli en kon sey, "Wetin God wont mak e hapun, go hapun."
Afta dat day, wi priper kon go Jerusalem.
Som disaipols from Sizeria folo us go, dem kon bring us kon Mnason for Syprus haus, wey bi won of di first disaipols and wi stay der wit am.
Wen wi rish Jerusalem, di brodas welkom us wit hapines.
Di next day, Pol kon folo us go si James and all di eldas wey dey der.
Wen Pol don grit dem, e kon start to tok di stori abaut wetin God don du for Gentai pipol tru en ministri.
Wen dem hear dis, dem kon dey praiz God. Den, dem tel am, "Yu si, awa broda, haw meni tazon Ju don biliv and dem stil dey obey di law?
"Dem hear sey yu dey tish Ju pipol wey dey stay wit Gentai pipol, sey mak dem trowey Mosis law; mak dem nor sekonsaiz dia shildren again and mak dem nor folo awa laws again.
