"So, wetin wi go du? Bikos dem go rili hear sey yu don kom.
"So mak yu du wetin wi won tel yu: For men dey wit us here wey mak vow;

tak dem folo bodi mak una go du wetin Mosis law tok and mak yu pay all di moni wey dem spend tak shave dia head. Den, evribodi go no sey all di stori wey dem hear abaut yu, nor bi tru and dem go si sey yu yorsef dey obey di law.

"Bot konsanin Gentai pipol wey don biliv, wi don rite leta go giv dem sey, mak dem forbid meat wey dem sakrifais giv juju, anima wey dem kil and e blood nor tosh groun and mak dem nor slip wit hu dem nor mari."
Di next day, Pol tak di men and afta e don join dem du wetin Mosis law tok, e go di Tempol kon sey, dem don obey di law and dem redi to offa di sakrifais.
Wen di sevun days don dey finish, di Ju pipol wey kom from Asia kon si-am for di Tempol, naim dem start wahala and pipol kon gada. Dem seize Pol

dey shaut sey, "Izrel pipol, mak una kom o-o! Dis na di man wey dey tish pipol for evriwer, abaut tins wey dey against awa pipol, awa law and against dis Tempol. Ivun sef e don bring Greek dem enta insaid di Tempol kon mak dis holi place dirti."
(Bikos dem si Trofimus wey kom from Efisos for di tawn wit am bifor, so dem kon tink sey, Pol don kari am enta di Tempol.)
Di hol tawn start to shake and all di pipol kon gada. Dem seize Pol, drag am komot from di Tempol kon klose di door.
As dem dey trai to kil-am, news kon rish di komandin ofisa for di Roman armi wey dey gaid di tawn sey, di hol Jerusalem don skata.
At wons, e kari plenti sojas and offisas kon run go wer di pipol gada. Wen dem si di komandin ofisa and di sojas, dem kon stop to beat Pol.
Den di komandin ofisa arres am kon giv orda sey mak dem tie am wit tu chain. E ask am hu e bi and wetin e du.
Som pipol for di crowd kon dey tok difren-difren tins and wen di komandin ofisa nor fit no wetin kause di wahala, e kon giv orda sey, mak dem kari Pol go barrak.
Wen e rish di step for di Tempol, di sojas kon kari Pol, bikos of di crowd wey won kil-am.
So dem folo di sojas for bak kon dey shaut, "Kil am!"
As dem won kari Pol enta di barrak, e kon ask di komandin ofisa, "I go fit tok to yu first?" Di ofisa ansa, "So yu dey hear Greek language?
"So nor bi yu bi dat Egypt man wey start wahala kon kari for tazon men wey dem dey kol 'Assasins' go insaid desert?"
Pol ansa, "I bi Ju wey kom from Tarsus wey dey Silicia. I bi citizin for dis tawn and dem no mi wel-wel. Abeg alow mi folo di pipol tok."
Wen di komandin ofisa alow am, Pol kon stand for di step, wave en hand sey mak dem kwayet. Wen evriwer don kwayet, e kon yuz Aramaic language folo dem tok.
"My brodas and fadas, mak una hear mi as I dey difend mysef."
(Wen dem hear sey e dey tok to dem wit Aramaic language, dem kon kwayet wel-wel.) Den Pol sey,

"I bi Ju wey dem born for Tarsus wey dey Silicia, bot na for dis tawn I for grow, I go school and learn awa gran-gran papa dem law wel-wel unda Gamaliel and I get maind to serv God wel-wel, jos as una bi today.
"I sofa Kristens and I dey kil pipol wey dey serv God, dey tie pipol trow for prizin, weda dem bi man or wuman

and ivun di High Prist and di kansol eldas no abaut mi. From dem, I kolet leta go giv dia brodas wey dey for Damaskus, so dat I go arres pipol wey biliv Kraist kon bring dem kom Jerusalem put for prizin.
"As I dey go, near Damaskus, aroun aftanun, won kaind lite from hevun kon shine roun mi.
"Den I fal for groun kon hear won vois wey sey, 'Sol, Sol, why yu dey ponish mi?'
"I ansa, 'Hu yu bi Oga?' E kon sey, 'I bi Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret, wey yu dey ponish.'
"Di pipol wey folo mi si di lite, bot dem nor undastand di vois wey dey tok to mi.
"So I ask am, 'Oga! Wetin yu wont mak I du?' Di Oga ansa, 'Get up mak yu go Damaskus; for der, dem go tel yu evritin wey God don shuz sey yu go du.'
"Bikos of haw di lite shine for my eye, I nor fit si again, so di pipol wey dey folo mi kon hol my hand go Damaskus.
"Won man wey dem dey kol Ananias, wey dey holi and dey serv God akordin to di law and di Ju pipol wey dey stay der, dey tok gud abaut am.
"Na di man kom mit mi, stand near mi sey, 'Broda Sol, mak yu bigin si again!' So for dat same taim, I luk up kon si-am.
"Den e sey, 'God wey awa gran-gran papa dem serv don alredi shuz yu to du wetin e wont and to tak yor eye si di Raitious Pesin. So mak yu hear and listin to am,
bikos yu go bi en witnes to all di pipol, abaut wetin yu don si and hear.
'Naw, wetin yu dey wait for? Get-up, mak dem baptaiz yu, so dat God go forgiv yu yor sin, as yu kol en name.
"Wen I go Jerusalem bak and dey pray for di Tempol, I kon si vishon
and Jisos Kraist sey, 'Mak yu komot for Jerusalem kwik-kwik, bikos dem nor go asept wetin yu dey tok abaut mi.'
"I ansa, 'Oga, dem diasef no sey I dey beat and trow pipol wey biliv yu put for prizin.
"And wen dem kil yor savant Steven, I stand der sopot dem kon kip dia klot for dem.'
"Bot di Oga sey, 'Go, bikos I go send yu go far-far go mit Gentai pipol.'"
As e tok finish, pipol wey gada dey listin to am kon dey shaut, "Kari dis man komot! Mak dem nor alow am liv!"
As dem dey shaut dey ves pul shirt and trowey san-san,
di komandin ofisa kon giv orda sey mak dem tak Pol go insaid barrak. E sey mak dem flog and ask Pol kweshon, so dat dem go fit no why di pipol dey shaut for Pol head laik dat.
Wen dem don put am for groun mak dem start to flog am, Pol kon ask di soja wey stand near am, "E dey rite mak una flog pesin wey bi Roman citizin, wen dem neva joj en kase?"
Wen di soja hear dis, e go tel di komandin ofisa, "Wetin yu won du so? Dis man kom from Rome o-o."
So di komandin ofisa ask Pol, "Tel mi, yu bi Roman citizin?" Pol ansa, "Yes."
Di komandin ofisa kon sey, "Na big moni I spend to bi Roman citizin." Pol ansa, "Bot dem born mi for Rome."
Den doz men wey bi won ask am kweshon kon komot and fear kash di komandin ofisa wen e no sey Pol, wey dem tie, na Roman citizin.
Di next day, bikos di komandin ofisa won no di rizin wey mak di Ju pipol dey akiuz Pol, e riliz am kon orda di prist oga dem and di hol kansol mak dem gada. So e bring Pol kon stand for dia front.
Pol luk di kansol pipol kon tel dem, "My brodas, I dey liv my life wit klin maind for God eye kon rish today."
Bikos of wetin e tok, Ananias wey bi di High Prist kon orda di pipol wey stand near Pol sey mak dem slap am for mout.
So Pol tel am, "God go slap yu tu, yu wey dey pritend! Yu sidan dey joj mi wit di law, yu nor dey disobey di law wen yu sey mak dem slap mi?"
Di pipol wey stand near am kon sey, "Yu dey kos God High Prist?"
Pol ansa, "I nor no bifor sey naim bi di High Prist, bikos God wod sey, 'Mak yu nor tok bad abaut di pesin wey dey rule yor pipol.'"

Den wen Pol no sey som pipol wey dey der na Sadusi and odas na Farisis, e kon shaut mak di hol kansol hear, "My brodas, I bi Farisi, na Farisi pesin born mi. Dem dey joj mi today, bikos I put hope sey pipol wey don die go wak again!"
Wen e tok dis tin, kworel kon start bitwin di Farisi and di Sadusi pipol and di kansol kon divide.
(Bikos Sadusi pipol biliv sey pipol wey don die, nor go wak again and dem nor biliv sey enitin laik angel or spirit dey sef, bot Farisi pipol biliv all dis tins.)
So kworel kon start bitwin dem and som oga for law mata wey bi Farisi pipol kon stand-up dey opoz di Sadusi pipol sey, "Wi nor si enitin bad wey dis man du. Una no weda na spirit or angel tok to am?"
Wen di arguement kon tu mush and di komandin ofisa dey fear sey dem go tear Pol to pisis, e kon orda en sojas mak dem enta di mitin and kari Pol komot for der by fos.
For nite for di next day, Jisos kon stand near Pol tel am for vishon, "Mak yu nor fear, bikos as yu don testifi abaut mi for Jerusalem, na so yu go stil du for Rome."
Wen mornin rish, som Ju pipol kon gada dey mak bad plan and dem swear sey dem nor go chop or drink enitin ontil dem kil Pol.
Di pipol wey mak dis bad plan pas forti.
Dem go mit di prist oga dem and di eldas tel dem sey, "Wi don swear sey wi nor go chop enitin ontil wi kil Pol.
So mak una and di kansol tel di komandin ofisa mak e bring Pol kom mit una, laik sey una won joj en kase again. Wi redi to kil-am, bifor e go rish dis place."
Bot wen Pol sista pikin hear abaut dis plan, e run go insaid di barrak go tel Pol.
Pol kon kol won soja oga tel am, "Tak dis boy go mit di komandin ofisa, bikos e get somtin wey e won tel am."
So di soja oga tak di boy go mit di komandin ofisa kon sey, "Pol, wey dey prizin, sey mak I bring dis boy kon mit yu, bikos e get somtin wey e won tel yu."
Di komandin ofisa hol di boy for hand go won kona kon ask am, "Wetin yu won tel mi?"
Di boy ansa, "Ju pipol dey plan sey dem go ask yu mak yu bring Pol kom di kansol tumoro, laik sey dem won ask am kweshon again.

"So mak yu nor alow dem disiv yu, bikos dem pas forti wey hide for bush won kil-am. Dem don swear sey dem nor go chop or drink enitin, ontil dem don kil Pol. Naw, dem dey wait for yu to gri for wetin dem won ask yu."
So di komandin ofisa tel di boy mak e dey go kon warn am sey, "Nor tel enibodi sey yu don ripot dis mata giv mi."
Den e kol tu soja oga kon tel dem, "For nain o' klok dis nite, mak una redi tu ondred sojas wey go-go Sizeria, plus sevunti, wey go ride horse and tu ondred, wey go kari spear.
"Mak una arange horse wey Pol go sidan put, so dat una go fit gaid am wel-wel go mit Felix wey bi di govnor.
E rite leta laik dis:
"From Klaudios Lysias to Govnor Felix, I salot yu!
"Di Ju pipol seize dis man and dem nearli kil-am bifor I rish der wit my sojas. Wi kon save am from dia hand, bikos I faind out sey, e bi Roman citizin.
"Bikos I won no di offence wey e komit, I kon kari am go dia kansol.
"I kon si sey en offence, na abaut wetin dem dey argue abaut for dia law, bot e nor du enitin wey rish to kil-am or put am for prizin.
"Wen won pesin tel mi sey dem dey plan to kil-am, naim I send am kon mit yu at wons and I stil orda di pipol wey dey akuiz am mak dem kom tok wetin e du for yor front."
So di sojas kari Pol for nite ontil dem rish Antipatris, jos as dia oga komand dem.
Di next day, di tu soja oga liv di men wey dey ride horse folo Pol and dem kon go dia barrak bak.
Wen di men wey dey ride horse rish Sizeria, dem kon tak Pol and di leta giv di govnor.
Wen di govnor don read di leta, e ask dem wer Pol from kom. Wen e hear sey e kom from Silicia,
e kon sey, "I go hear yor kase wen di pipol wey akuiz yu rish here." Den e orda sey mak dem gaid Pol for insaid Herod palise.
Wen faiv days don pas, Ananias, wey bi di High Prist, kom wit som eldas and won lawya wey dem dey kol Tertullus and dem read wetin dem sey Pol du, giv di govnor.
Wen dem orda mak dem bring Pol kom out, Tertullus tel di govnor sey, "E don tey wen wi dey enjoy peace, bikos of haw yu dey rule and all di beta-beta tins wey yu dey du tak shange di kontri.
"Oga Felix, wi dey si all dis tins wey yu dey du for evriwer. Na evriday wi dey tok abaut am and dey tank yu.
"Bot mak my stori for nor long tu mush, I beg mak yu hear us wel-wel as yu dey always du.
"Bikos wi don si dis man sey e faind trobol and kause wahala among all di Ju pipol for di wold and naim dey lid di gang wey dem dey kol, 'Di Nazarenes'.
"E ivun tak Greek pipol enta di Tempol, so wi kon arres am.
"Bot Lysias, di komandin ofisa kon tak am komot from awa hand wit fos.
"So wen yu ask am kweshon, yu go fit hear by yorsef all di tins wey wi sey e du."
As e dey tok, di Ju pipol tu dey sopot sey, wetin e tok, na tru.
Wen di govnor sey mak Pol tok, e kon sey, "I no sey yu don bi joj for dis kontri for meni years naw, so I nor go fear dey tok as I dey difend mysef.
"As yu go fit shek for yorsef, e neva pas twef days naw wey I go Jerusalem go woship.
"Dem nor si mi dey argue wit enibodi or dey gada crowd for di Tempol veranda or insaid di sinagog or ivun for di hol tawn,
dem nor fit show yu di offence wey dem akuiz mi sey I komit.

"Bot I go let yu no sey I dey woship di God wey awa gran-gran papa dem dey woship, as dia tradishon tok (wey dis pipol sey na won kaind gang). Dem biliv evritin wey di law tok and wey di profets rite dan.
"I get hope for God (di kaind won wey dis men get tu) sey won day, pipol wey don die, weda na bad or gud pipol, go wak-up.
"Na bikos of dis I dey always trai my best to get klin bele for God and pipol front.
"Afta meni years, I kom Jerusalem bak kon giv gift to poor pipol and offa sakrifas.
"Dis na wetin I dey du wen dem si mi for di Tempol; I dey klin and I nor gada eni crowd or disturb enibodi.
"Bot som Ju from Asia sopoz dey here dey tok di tin wey dem get against mi, if dem get enitin to tok at-all.
"Or mak dis men wey dey here tok di krime wey I komit as I face di kansol,
bikos if e pas dis won, I go shaut as I stand for dia front sey, 'Una dey joj mi today, bikos I biliv sey pipol wey don die, go wak-up.'"
Den Felix, wey bi sey e no di tru stori abaut di Way, prospone di kase kon sey, "Wen Lysias, di komandin ofisa kom, I go joj yor kase."
E kon orda di soja oga mak e gaid Pol, bot mak e gi-am smol fridom and mak e nor driv en frends if dem won gi-am enitin.
Afta somdays, wen Felix wit en wife Drusilia wey bi Ju, sidan togeda, dem kon sey mak dem bring Pol, so dat dem go listin to am, as e dey tok abaut haw pesin go fit tak biliv Jisos Kraist.
Fear kash Felix, as Pol dey tok abaut di Gud News, sef kontrol and haw God jojment go tak kom, so e kon tel Pol, "Mak yu go first, wen I get taim, I go sey mak dem bring yu kom again."
Bikos e dey hope sey Pol go bribe am, naim mak am sey mak dem bring Pol kom mit am meni taims.
Afta tu years, Porcius Festus tak ova from Felix and bikos Felix won mak di Ju pipol hapi, e kon liv Pol for prizin.
Wen tiri days don pas, Festus komot from Sizeria go Jerusalem.
So di prist oga dem and all di big men among di Ju pipol kon tel am wetin dem sey Pol du.
Dem beg am sey mak e giv orda sey mak dem bring Pol kom Jerusalem bak, bikos dem plan to atak and kil-am for road.
Den Festus ansa, Pol dey for Sizeria and mi mysef go soon go der.
So e sey, "Mak yor lidas folo mi go der and if dis man du enitin wey bad, mak dem akiuz am."
Festus nor stay rish ate or ten days wen e go Sizeria and di next day, e sidan for di jojment seat kon giv orda sey mak dem bring Pol kom.
Wen Pol rish der, di Ju pipol wey kom from Jerusalem kon stand roun am, dey akiuz am sey e komit sin wey dem nor fit show.
Pol difend ensef sey, "I nor komit eni offence against di Ju law or di Tempol or against Caesar."
Bikos Festus won mak di Ju pipol hapi, e kon ask Pol, "Yu redi to go Jerusalem mak I joj yor kase for der?"
Pol ansa, "I stand for Caesar jojment seat, na here dem go joj my kase. I nor komit eni offence to Ju pipol and ivun yu yorsef no.

"I nor du bad and I nor komit eni offence wey dem fit tak kil mi, I nor dey trai to run sey mak dem nor kil mi, bot if evritin wey dem tok against mi nor bi tru, nobodi go fit kari mi, giv dem. I sey mak dem kari my kase go giv Caesar!"
Festus kon sey, "Yu don tok sey mak Caesar joj yor kase, so, na Caesar yu go-go mit!"
Afta som days, King Agrippa and Bernice go Sizeria, go salot Festus.
As dem dey der for meni days, Festus kon tel dem abaut Pol kase, so dat e go hear wetin dem go tok abaut di mata, so e kol Agrippa kon sey, "Won man dey for here wey Felix liv for prizin.
"Wen I dey Jerusalem, di prist oga dem and di eldas kon tel mi abaut am sey mak I kil-am.
"Bot I ansa dem, 'Rome law nor gri mak dem kondem enibodi wen e neva face and difend ensef bifor pipol wey dey akiuz am.'
"So afta dem folo mi kom here, I kon prospone di kase, bot di next day I sidan for jojment seat kon orda mak dem bring di man kom.
"Wen pipol wey dey akiuz am stand-up, dem nor tok eni bad tin against am as I bin suspet.
"Insted, dem dey argue mata wit am, abaut haw dem dey serv God and won man wey dem dey kol Jisos Kraist wey don die, wey Pol sey e stil dey alaif.
"Bikos I nor no haw I go tak joj di mata, I kon ask am weda e go laik go Jerusalem mak dem joj am der.
"Bot Pol sey mak dem tak am go Rome, so dat Caesar go joj en kase, so I kon orda sey mak dem kip am for prizin, ontil I go fit send am go mit Caesar."
Agrippa kon tel Festus, "Mi tu go laik hear from di man." So Festus tel am, "Yu go hear from di man tumoro."
So di next day, Agrippa and Bernice kon dey mak yanga enta di hall, wit all di big men wey dey di tawn. Afta Festus don giv orda, dem kon bring Pol.
Den Festus sey, "King Agrippa and all of una wey dey here wit us, mak una si dis man wey di hol Ju pipol dey beg mi both for here and for Jerusalem sey, mak I kil.
"Bot I kon si sey e nor du enitin wey go mak dem kil-am and wen e sey e won mak di emperor joj en kase, I gri sey I go send am go mit Caesar.
"Bot I nor no wetin I go rite go giv di emperor abaut am. So naim mak mi bring am kom all of una and king Agrippa front, so dat afta una don kweshon am finish, I go get somtin wey I go fit rite.
"Bikos for my maind, e nor dey rite to send prizina go kourt, wen yu nor rite wetin e du."
So Agrippa tel Pol, "Mak yu tok for yorsef naw." Den Pol raiz en hand kon start to tok.
"King Agrippa, abaut all dis tins wey di Ju pipol dey akuiz mi sey I du, I tank God sey I won difend mysef giv yu today,
bikos yu no all awa tradishon and di mata wey di Ju pipol dey akuiz mi abaut. So, I beg, mak yu listin to wetin I won tok.
"Naw, all di Ju pipol no sey na from smol pikin I dey liv my life wit my own pipol for Jerusalem.
"Since dem no mi, if dem go gri kon tok, dem go gri sey na haw wi dey serv God, naim I tak liv as Farisi.
"Naw, I stand mak dem joj mi, bikos I put hope for di promis wey God mak giv awa gran-gran papa dem
sey, awa twef tribes go gain as dem dey yuz all dia maind dey serv God, both day and nite. My king, na bikos of dis hope wey I get, naim mak di Ju pipol dey akuiz mi so!
"Why una tink sey God nor fit raiz pipol wey don die?
"Ivun mi mysef, I biliv bifor sey mak wi fite Jisos Kraist wey kom from Nazaret.
"And na wetin I du for Jerusalem bi dat. Nor bi onli sey I put meni of di bilivas for prizin wit di pawa wey di prist oga dem giv mi, bot I ivun dey sopot wen dem sey mak dem kil dem.
"I ponish dem meni taims for all di sinagog and I trai to fos dem mak dem kos God. Bikos dat taim, I dey ves for dem wel-wel, I ivun travol go oda tawns go sofa dem, bikos of wetin dem biliv.
"Bot won day, as I dey du all dis tins, I kon dey go Damaskus wit ful pawa wey di prist oga dem giv mi.
"My king, aroun aftanun for road, I kon si won kaind lite from hevun wey shine pas di sun. Di lite shine roun mi and di pipol wey dey folo mi travol.
"Wen wi don fal for groun, I hear won vois wey yuz Aramaic language tel mi, 'Sol, Sol, why yu dey ponish mi? Yu dey fite yorsef, bikos na stone yu dey kick so.'
"So I ask am, 'Oga! Hu yu bi?' Di Oga ansa, 'I bi Jisos Kraist wey yu dey ponish.
'Bot mak yu get up, bikos I don show mysef to yu and don shuz yu as my savant and witnes to di tins wey yu don si and di wons wey I go show yu.
'I go save yu from yor own pipol and from Gentai pipol wey I dey send yu go mit, so dat

yu go opun dia eyes mak dem for waka komot from daknes enta lite. Mak dem komot from Satan hand, go mit God, so dat God go forgiv dem dia sins and dem go folo di pipol wey God don mak klin, bikos dem biliv am.'
"So King Agrippa, I nor du strong head wen I risiv dis vishon wey kom from hevun,

bot I first go Damaskus, go tel di pipol wey dey der and den, I kon go mit di pipol wey dey for Jerusalem and Judea. Afta, I go mit Gentai pipol sey, mak dem turn from sin kom mit God and mak dem du tins wey go show sey, dem don rili turn from sin kom mit God.
"Bikos of dis, di Ju pipol seize mi for di Tempol front, won kon kil mi.
"Bot God don dey help mi til today, so I stand dey tel evribodi, weda dem bi smol pikin or big pesin. So, wetin di profets and Mosis tok sey go hapun, naim I dey tel una so,
sey Kraist sofa and e go bi di first to raiz from deat, so dat e go show di lite to awa pipol and ivun Gentai pipol."
As Pol dey difend ensef, Festus kon shaut, "Yu dis Pol, yu don dey krase o! All di plenti book wey yu no don dey won mak yu mad!"
Bot Pol ansa am, "I nor dey mad oga Festus, bot na beta wod wey mak sense naim I dey tok so.
"Ivun di king wey I dey tok to so, I biliv sey e no abaut all dis tins, bikos dem nor hapun for sikrit.
"King Agrippa! Yu biliv di tin wey di profets tok?"
So Agrippa ask Pol, "So yu tink sey jos naw-naw, yu fit turn mi to Kristen?"
Pol ansa, "I pray to God sey, weda na naw or leta, nor bi onli yu, bot evribodi wey dey here, go bi laik mi, bot mak una nor sofa, as I dey sofa so."
So di king, di govnor and Bernice kon get up
and as dem dey go, dem kon tel ish oda, "Dis man nor du enitin wey go fit mak dem kil-am or put am for prizin."
Agrippa kon tel Festus, "Wi for fit riliz dis man, if to sey e nor sey mak Caesar joj en kase."
Wen dem don gri sey wi go travol insaid ship go Itali, dem kon kari Pol and som oda prizinas giv Julius, won komanda wey dey Augustan grup.
Wi enta won ship from Adramyttium wey won travol go difren place for Asia sea kon bigin travol go Aristakus and won Masidonia man wey dey stay Tesalonika, folo us.
Di next day, wi enta Sidon and Julius kon du gud giv Pol, e alow am go mit en frends mak dem giv am all di tins wey e nid.
From der, wi enta wota travol again face Syprus island, bikos briz dey blow di ship.
Afta wi don travol enta di opun sea wey dey insaid Silicia and Pamfilia, wi kon stop for Myra, wey dey Lycia.
For der, di soja komanda kon si won ship wey kom from Alexandria dey driv go Itali and e kon put us for insaid.
Wi dey go smol-smol for meni days and nor bi smol wahala bifor wi fit rish Cnidus. Bikos di briz nor mak us fit go front again, wi kon driv smol-smol dey go Krete, wey dey oposite Salmone.
Bifor wi rish Krete wotasaid, e hard us wel-wel and wi kon rish won place wey dem dey kol, "Fair Havens" wey dey near Lasea tawn.
As e bi sey taim don go wel-wel and di joni don hard laik dis, bikos di taim wey dem dey fast don pas, Pol kon advise dem sey,
"My pipol, I dey si sey dis joni na wit wahala e go tak end and nor bi onli di load and di ship go loss, bot meni pipol go die tu."
Bot di komanda nor listin to am and na wetin di kaptain and di ship owna tok, naim e biliv.

Bikos di place wer ship dey park put wen dem si, nor gud for kold weda; som of di pipol kon gri sey mak wi dey go. Dem dey hope sey wi go fit rish Finix, wey dey Krete, wey face soutwest and nortwest, so dat wi go fit spend kold season for der.
Wen won kaind kwayet briz blow kom from sout, dem tink sey dem go fit du wetin dem plan, so dem kon dey go smol-smol pas Krete wotasaid.
Afta di kold briz, won strong briz wey dem dey kol, "Hurricane", kon dey blow kom from di Island.
Wen dis briz trap di ship and wi nor fit si wel-wel again, wi liv di ship giv di briz and e kon dey kari us go wer e laik.
As wi dey run go hide unda won smol island wey dem dey kol Kauda, nor bi smol wahala, bifor wi fit kontrol di ship.
Afta dem don drag di ship komot from di wota, dem kon tak rope tie am. Wi dey fear sey wi go run aroun for Syrtis, so wi hook di ship for groun kon liv di briz mak e kari us go.
Di next day, bikos di briz wori us wel-wel, wi kon dey trow awa load put for wota
and wen di ted day rish, dem yuz dia hand trow wetin dem tak dey kontrol di ship put for wota.
Wen wi nor si sun or star for meni days and di briz stil dey wori us, wi kon luz hope sey wi don die bi dat.
Afta dem don stay witout fud for meni days, Pol stand for dia front kon sey, "My pipol, if to sey una listin to mi wen I sey mak wi nor komot for Krete, wi for nor si all dis wahala.
"Naw, I won mak una heart strong, bikos nobodi go die among us, bot na onli di ship go skata.
"Bikos yestiday nite, God wey I dey serv, en angel apier to mi
kon sey, 'Mak yu nor fear Pol! Yu must face Caesar and God go save yu and evribodi wey dey folo yu travol.'
"So, my pipol, mak una heart strong, bikos I biliv sey na as God tel mi, na so e go bi.
"Bot wi go sureli rish land."
Afta fortin days, as di briz dey kari us pas di Adriatic Sea for midnite, di sailors kon dey suspet sey wi don dey near land.

Dem trow long rope wey dem tie somtin put insaid di wota to measure haw e deep rish and dem si sey di wota stil deep rish 40 metres. Afta e don tey smol, dem trow am again kon si sey e don bi 30 metres.
Dem dey fear sey di ship go jam rock for di land, so dem trow for big-big chain from di ship bak kon dey pray mak day kwik break.
Den di sailor trai to run liv di ship, dem tak di smol boat for di ship, put am for wota kon dey play wayo sey dem won go put big chain dan for di ship front,
bot Pol tel di ofisa and sojas, "Unles all dis men stay insaid di ship, all of us go die."
So di sojas kon kut di rope for di boat mak e float go.
As day won break, Pol enkorage dem mak dem chop kon sey, "Today mak am fortin days wey una dey wori, sotey una nor gri chop.
"So naw, I dey beg una to chop, bikos una nid am to sovaiv. And nobodi among una go luz ivun won hair for en head."
Wen Pol tok finish, e tak bread kon tank God for dia front mak all of dem si and e start to chop.
All of dem get strong heart kon tak fud chop.
(Wi bi 276 wey dey insaid di ship.)
Wen dem don chop beleful, dem kon trowey all di rimainin bread insaid di wota mak di ship nor for heavi again.
Wen day break, dem nor no wer dem dey, bot dem si won smol land wey near di sea and dem tok for dia maind sey, if e dey posibol dem go yuz di ship tak enta.
So dem kut all di chains wey hol di ship kon let dem fal insaid di sea. Dem stil luz di wons wey dey hol wetin dey kontrol di ship. Dem let briz blow di ship go front and wi kon move face land.
Bot dem mit san-san for di sea. So di ship front kon hook and e nor fit move again, di bak skata, bikos of di way di wave dey blow am.
Di sojas kon plan to kil all di prizinas mak dem nor for fit swim kon eskape.
Bot bikos di soja ofisa won save Pol life, e nor kon let dem du wetin dem plan. E komand di pipol wey fit swim, mak dem first jump komot from di ship swim go land
and di res pipol kon folo for bak, som hol di wud and odas hol di ship bodi wey break. Na so all of dem tak rish land and nobodi die.
Afta wi don rish land and nobodi die, wi kon hear sey, na Malta dem dey kol di island.
Di pipol wey dey stay for der trit us wel. Dem mak fire for us, bikos rain don start to dey fal and kold dey kash us.
Wen Pol dey gada plenti stick mak e put insaid di fire, won snake wey dem dey kol, "Viper", kom out bikos of di heat kon put e mout for Pol hand.
Wen di pipol wey dey stay der si sey di snake put e mout for Pol hand, dem kon dey tel demsef, "E bi laik sey dis man hand nor klin! Ivun doh e nor die insaid sea, hand don stil tosh am for here!"
Bot Pol shake di snake komot from en hand enta di fire and nor-tin du-am at-all.
Bot dem dey tink sey en bodi go swel-up or e go fal for groun die. So afta dem don wait for somtaim kon si sey nor-tin hapun to am, dem kon shange maind sey, “Pol na god. ’’
Dat taim for dat aria, Publius, wey bi di oga, get som land. E welkom us kon giv us fud for tiri days.
Publius papa kon get fiva and en bele dey pain am. Pol go si-am kon heal am.
Afta dis don hapun, meni pipol wey nor wel for der kon stil kom and e heal dem.
Dem kon dey praiz us wel-wel and wen wi won go, dem giv us evritin wey wi nid.
Afta wi don dey der for tiri monts, wi kon enta ship from Alexandria wey stop for di island for kold taim and sign wey dey di ship front, na "Twins god".
Wi stop for Syracuse kon stay der for tiri days.
From der wi kon rish Regium and afta won day, won kaind briz from sout kon start to dey blow and di sekon day, wi kon rish Puteoli.
For der, wi si som brodas and dem kon beg us to stay wit dem for sevun days. Na so wi tak rish Rome.
Wen di brodas for Rome hear abaut us, dem waka ontil dem rish "Appius Forum" and di "Tiri Taverns" kom mit us. Wen Pol si dem, e tank God and di tin kon mak en heart strong wel-wel.
Wen e enta Rome, dem alow Pol stay e own haus wit di sojas wey dey gaid am.

Afta tiri days, Pol kol all di Ju pipol oga dem togeda. Wen dem don gada, e kon tel dem, "My pipol, ivun doh I nor du enitin against awa pipol or awa gran-gran papa dem tradishon, from Jerusalem naim dem turn mi to prizina kon kari mi giv Rome pipol.
"Wen dem don kweshon mi, dem won riliz mi, bikos dem nor si enitin wey go mak dem kil mi.
"Bot wen di Ju pipol nor gri mak dem fri mi, di tin kon mak mi sey, I won go Rome mak Caesar for joj my kase, nor bi bikos I get enitin wey I dey komplain against my pipol.
"Bikos of dis, I kon sey I won si and folo una tok first sey, na bikos of di hope wey Izrel get, naim mak dem yuz dis chain tie my hand so."
Di pipol ansa, "Dem nor send us eni leta abaut yu from Judea and no won for awa brodas don kom from der kon sey yu dey du bad tins.
"Bot wi go laik to hear wetin yu dey tish from yor own mout, bikos wi no sey evribodi for di hol wold dey tak mout kondem dis grup wey yu dey insaid."

Dem kon gri for di day wen dem go mit am and dem plenti wey kom en haus kon mit am. So, from mornin til evenin, Pol kon dey explain tins giv dem. E dey tok abaut God kindom and dey trai to show dem wetin Mosis law and di profets tok abaut Jisos Kraist.
Som of dem biliv wetin e tok, bot som nor biliv.
So dem kon go, bot dem nor gri among demsef afta Pol sey, "Di wod wey di Holi Spirit tok tru di Profet Isaia na tru
sey, 'Una go mit and tel dis pipol sey, "Una go dey hear, bot una nor go undastand, una go dey luk, bot una nor go fit si.

'Una heart nor dey undastand, una ear nor dey hear wel again. Devol don klose una eye, mak una nor for fit si; hear wit una ears or undastand wit una heart, so dat una nor go fit turn kom mit God, mak E for heal una.'
"So mak una no sey, dis salvashon wey God bring, dem don kari am go mit Gentai pipol, bikos dem go asept am!"
Wen e tok finish, di Ju pipol kon liv der dey ves among demsef.
So for tu ful years, Pol stay der for en own haus wey e rent and e welkom all di pipol wey kom mit am
kon dey tel dem abaut God Kindom. E tish dem wit strong heart abaut Oga Jisos Kraist and nobodi fit stop am.
Pol wey bi Jisos savant and apostol wey e shuz mak e prish God wod, na en rite dis leta.
Na dis gospol God promis us for en Holi Book tru en profets sey,
my Pikin kom dis wold from David famili
and naim bi my onli Pikin wey I wak-up from deat wit di Holi Spirit pawa.
Na tru am, God giv us favor and pawa to bi apostols and na dis pawa wi dey yuz tak dey kol Gentai pipol, mak dem obey and biliv en name.
Unasef dey among di pipol wey God kol to bi Jisos Kraist own.
Rome pipol wey God luv and kol mak dem bi en own, na una I dey rite dis leta giv. Mak God awa Papa for hevun and Jisos awa Oga giv una grace and peace.
Today, I tank my God tru en pikin Jisos Kraist for all of una, bikos na for di hol wold dem dey tok abaut haw una fate for God strong rish.
God wey I dey serv and prish en pikin gospol, na-im fit bear mi witnes sey I dey always rimemba una
and I always dey pray dey ask God if E go let mi kom si una again.
Bikos I dey hungri to si una, so dat I go giv una di Holi Spirit blessin wey go mak una strong,
so dat mi and una go dey hapi and Jisos Kraist wey wi biliv, go giv us res for awa maind.
My brodas and sistas, I wont mak una no sey I don plan to kom visit una meni taims, bot God nor let mi kom ontil naw. Bikos I won gain from una fate as I don du wit Gentai pipol.
Bikos God sey mak I prish to evribodi, weda na Greek or Gentai pipol or weda dem wise or foolish.
Na dis mak mi won kom prish God wod giv una wey dey Rome.
I nor dey shame to prish God wod, bikos na-im bi di pawa wey God tak dey save doz wey biliv am, weda dem bi Ju or Gentai pipol.
Bikos na di Gospol dey show haw God dey tak mak pipol klin for en eye. From di biginin go rish di end, God sey, "Na onli fate go mak pesin dey klin for my eye."
Bikos of all di sins and bad tins wey wiked pipol dey du, God vesnashon dey show from hevun and di sins dey kova di trut.
So God kon ponish dem, since dem no evritin wey dem sopoz to no abaut God, bikos na-im show dem.
From di taim wen God kreate di wold, E don show us di tins wey odinari eye nor dey fit si; en pawa and life, tru di tins wey E kreate. So wiked pipol nor get eskuze at-all.

Ivun doh dem no sey God dey, dem nor dey gri gi-am glori as God. Dem nor dey tank am for all di tins wey E dey du. Insted, na nonsense tins dem dey du and dia wiked maind nor fit undastand di trut again.
Ivun doh dem tink sey dem wise, dem bi fools;
bikos insted mak dem woship God wey dey hevun, dem kon dey woship image wey dem mold or karve laik pesin, bird, anima or snake.
So God don liv wiked pipol mak dem dey du di bad tins wey dia maind, wey bi sey man dey slip wit man and wuman dey slip wit wuman.
Dem don turn di trut abaut God to lai. Dem dey woship di tins wey E kreate, insted for dem to serv God wey deserv all di praiz foreva! Amen.
Bikos of dis, God liv dem for dia yeye life. Ivun di wimen shange and dem kon dey du tins wey nor gud.
And na so tu, men nor kon laik wimen again, bot dem kon dey laik to slip wit oda men. So, God kon ponish dem bikos of wetin dem dey du.
Since dem nor gri put God for maind and serv am, E kon liv dem mak dem yuz dia bad maind dey du tins wey dem nor sopoz du.~
Wetin ful dia maind na wikednes, evil tins, long-trot, bad bele, bad-bad tins; jelosi, to kil and fite, to lai, to kip enemi wit pipol, to joj pipol waka,
to tok bad abaut odas and hate God. Dem dey kari bodi up, dem nor get respet and na bad tins ful dia maind. Dem nor dey respet dia papa and mama.
Dem nor get sense, dem dey promis and fail, dem nor dey du gud or sori for pipol.
Aldoh dem no sey God law sey, pipol wey dey liv laik dat go die, yet dem nor onli dey du dis tins, bot dem ivun dey sopot pipol wey du-am.
Pesin wey dey joj odas nor get eskuze for wetin e dey du and e nor mata hu e bi. Bikos wen yu joj odas and yu dey du di same tin wey dem dey du, yu dey kondem yorsef.
Wi no sey God nor dey lai wen E dey joj pipol wey dey du bad tins.
Yu wey dey du tins wey yu sey mak odas nor du! Yu tink sey yu go eskape God jojment?.
May bi una dey tak God kindnes, patient and endurance as yeye tins. Una nor no sey God dey kaind, bikos E wont mak una turn from sin kom mit am?
Bot una stubornes and strong heart nor let una turn from sin kom mit God, so una dey mak una ponishment meni more-more, for di Day wen God go joj di wold, bikos en na joj wey nor dey sopot bad tins.
God go pay evri man akordin to wetin e du.
God go giv life wey nor dey end to di pipol wey dey du gud, wey wont glori, onor and long life.
Bot E go show en vesnashon and ponish doz wey bikos of long-trot rejet di trut kon dey du bad tins.
Enibodi wey dey du bad tin, weda e bi Ju or Gentai, must sofa and risiv ponishment.
Bot God go giv glori, onor and peace to enibodi wey dey du gud, weda e bi Ju or Gentai,
bikos God go joj evribodi di same way.
Ivun doh Gentai pipol nor get Mosis law, God stil dey ponish dem wen dem sin, so Ju pipol wey get di law, wen dem sin, na di law go joj dem.
Bikos yu dey hear di law nor min sey yu gud for God eye, bot na wen yu du wetin di law tok.
Gentai pipol nor get di law, bot dem dey yuz dia sense du wetin di law tok and dat won don turn law for dem, ivun doh dem nor no Mosis law.
Di way dem dey bihav show sey wetin Mosis rite for di law, dey dia heart and dia maind dey tel dem sey, "Dis tins dey rite and e go kondem or fri us from wetin wi du."
So jos as I prish giv una, na so e go bi for dat day, wen God go joj all di sikrit tins wey dey pipol heart tru Jisos Kraist wey bi en pikin.
Wot of yu wey sey yu bi Ju? Yu wey put yor hope for di law kon dey yuz God dey boast;
yu no wetin God wont mak yu du and yu don learn haw to du gud tins, bikos yu no di law.
Yu dey show blind pipol road and dey help doz wey dey for daknes si lite,
and yu dey tish foolish pipol and smol shildren wey nor no enitin, bikos yu no sey, di trut and evritin wey man nid to no, dey for di law.
Why e bi sey yu wey dey tish odas nor fit tish yorsef? Yu wey dey prish sey mak pipol nor tif, yu sure sey yu nor dey tif?
Yu wey sey mak pipol nor komit adultri, yu nor dey komit adultri? Yu wey sey yu hate juju, yu nor dey tak tins wey dem kip for juju haus?
Yu wey dey tak di law boast, yu dey bring shame to God name, bikos yu dey disobey di law!
Jos as God wod sey, "Bikos of una wey bi Ju pipol, Gentai pipol kon dey tak God name mak yeye."
Sekonsishon get value onli if yu dey du wetin di law tok, bot if yu nor dey obey di law, yu and di pesin wey dem neva sekonsaiz na di same.
So if Gentai pipol wey dem nor sekonsaiz dey obey evritin for di law, yu nor tink sey God go tak dem as pipol wey dem sekonsaiz?
Yu nor no sey di pesin wey dem nor sekonsaiz go joj yu wey bi Ju, since yu dey break di law?
Pesin nor bi Ju bikos of wetin pipol si from outsaid. Di ril sekonsishon nor bi wetin pipol dey si,

bot di ril Ju na pesin wey bi Ju for insaid en heart, bikos sekonsishon nor dey tosh pesin heart. Na di Holi Spirit dey du dis kaind wok, nor bi di law wey dem rite dan and dat pesin go dey risiv praiz from God, ivun doh humanbin nor praiz am.
Haw Ju pipol tak beta pas Gentai pipol sef? Or beta tin dey bikos dem sekonsaiz pesin?
E rili dey gud to sekonsaiz pesin! And wi no sey na Ju pipol God first giv en mesage.
Bot wot if som of dem nor gri biliv? Dat min sey God dey lai?
Ivun doh evri humanbin dey lai, God nor fit lai. God wod sey: "Mak yu dey tok wetin bi trut; so dat yu go fit win yor kase wen dem dey joj yu."
If God nor ponish us for di bad tins wey wi dey du, e min sey God dey sopot us? No! So if God ponish us, wi go sey E dey wiked? (Na so som pipol dey tok).
Wi nor fit tok so at-all! If God nor dey rite, na haw E go kon tak joj di wold?
If my lai-lai life dey show sey God wod na trut, wetin go mak am kondem mi sey I bi sina?
Den e go dey rite if wi sey, "Mak wi dey du bad tins so dat gud tins go kom out from wetin wi dey du?" Bot som pipol dey lai for my head, bikos of wetin I tok and God go ponish dem.
So wetin wi go tok? Wi go sey na wi wey bi Ju beta pas? Dat na lai! Bikos as I don alredi show una, Ju and Gentai pipol dey komit sin.
Jos as God wod sey, "Nobodi dey raitious.
"Nobodi dey wey wise or undastand God.
"Evribodi don turn liv God, all of dem don bi yeye for God eye. Nobodi dey du wetin gud at-all.
"Na lai wey fit kil pesin ful dia mout and wiked wods ful dia tongue.
"Bad bele dey dia maind and na so-so swear dem dey swear.
"Dem go fit kwik kil pesin.
"Eniwer dem go, dem must fite skata di place
and dem nor no haw to dey kwayet.
"Dem nor dey fear God at-all."
Wi no sey wetin di law tok, na for di pipol wey dey unda di law. Di law tok laik dis, so dat nobodi go get eskuze wen God go joj di wold.
Nobodi dey gud for God eye, bikos e dey obey di law. Bot na tru di law, wi tak no wetin sin min.
Naw, God don show us haw wi go tak dey gud for en eye and nor bi tru di law, ivun doh na so Mosis law and di profets tok.
Na di fate wey pesin get for Jisos Kraist go mak am dey gud for God eye. Enibodi wey biliv Jisos, God dey mak en fate strong, weda e bi Ju or Gentai pesin.
Evribodi don sin and wi don fal komot from God glori,
bot God don mak us dey rite wit am tru en fri gift wey E giv us, bikos of Jisos Kraist wey save us.
Na God giv us Jisos Kraist, so dat tru en blood, E go forgiv us awa sins wen wi biliv Kraist. God du dis to show sey bifor-bifor, E dey patient to forgiv pipol dia sins.

Dis stil show sey God dey rite wen E asept pipol wey biliv Jisos Kraist. E dey ponish sinas, so dat wi go no sey en na God wey nor laik sin. Laik dis, God show sey en dey rite and enibodi wey biliv Jisos Kraist, E dey mak dem dey rite tu.
So, wetin mak us dey boast? Wi nor fit boast at-all! Why e bi laik dis? Na bikos wi dey obey di law? No! Na bikos wi biliv Jisos Kraist.
So, na tru fate pesin go dey rite wit God, nor bi as e obey di law rish.
Abi na onli Ju pipol God dey dia side? E nor dey Gentai pipol side tu? Tru-tru, God dey Gentai pipol side.
Since na onli won God dey, E dey for Ju and Gentai pipol, bikos of dia fate.
So mak wi trowey di law bikos of fate? No way! E nor go wok! Insted, wi go mak di law strong wel-wel.
Na wetin Abraham awa gran papa learn from dis mata?
If na di gud tins wey e du mak am dey gud for God eye, den e sopoz to dey boast for pipol, bot e nor go eva fit boast for God.
Wetin dem rite for God wod? "Abraham biliv God tru fate and God kon si-am as raitious pesin."
Wen pesin wok, dem must pay am en moni, nor bi dash e bi, bot na moni wey e wok for.
Doz wey nor depend on wetin dem dey du, bot dem get fate and biliv sey God dey forgiv sinas, na dis fate God dey yuz tak forgiv dem dia sins.
David tok di same tin wen e tok abaut di blessin wey pesin dey get wen God don asept am, ivun doh dem nor deserv dat kaind blessin. David stil sey,
"God don bless pipol wey E forgiv kon tak dia sins komot.
"God don bless di pesin wey E don forgiv en sins!"

Dis blessin wey David dey tok abaut so, na onli Ju pipol e tok am for, bikos dem sekonsaiz dem? No! Na stil for Gentai pipol wey dem nor sekonsaiz. Bikos wi read for God wod sey, "Abraham biliv God and bikos of en fate, God kon asept am as raitious pesin."
Na wen all dis tins tak hapun? Na bifor dem sekonsaiz Abraham or afta dem sekonsaiz am? Na bifor, nor bi afta dem sekonsaiz am!

Bot lata, dem kon sekonsaiz am. Dis sign show sey, bikos of en fate, God don si-am as raitious pesin, so dat e go bi papa to evribodi wey biliv God, pipol wey God don asept, ivun doh dem neva sekonsaiz.
Doz wey don sekonsaiz, na Abraham bi dia papa and dia fate bi laik en own, afta dem sekonsaiz am.
Wen God promis Abraham and en shildren sey dem go inherit di hol wold, E du-am, nor bi bikos Abraham dey obey di law, bot bikos e biliv God and God si-am as raitious pesin.
If God promis na for onli doz wey dey obey di law, den fate nor min enitin and God promis go dey yuzles.
Di law dey bring God vesnashon, bikos wer sin nor dey, law nor go dey.

Na dis won mak God promis dey kom by fate and wi dey get-am tru favor. Nor bi onli pipol wey dey obey di law bi Abraham shildren, bot pipol wey biliv God laik Abraham, na en shildren dem bi tu, bikos na Abraham bi awa spiritual papa.

God wod sey, "I don mak yu papa for meni nashons." So for God eye, Abraham na awa papa, bikos e get fate for God wey get pawa to raiz pipol wey don die and to komand tins wey nor dey bifor, laik sey dem dey.

Ivun wen tins hard, Abraham stil biliv God and e hope sey God go du-am, ivun wen e bi laik sey, nor-tin go hapun. Bot naw, e don bikom, "Papa for meni nashons." Jos as God tel am, "Yor shildren go meni laik di stars wey dey hevun."
Abraham nor komplain for won day, ivun wen e don old nearli rish ondred years. Ivun doh E no sey en bodi don nearli die and en wife Sarah nor go fit born again,
e nor doubt God promis. En fate mak am strong and e tank God for evritin.
E dey sure sey God go du wetin E promis.
Na dis mak God kol am raitious pesin.
Ivun doh God kol am 'Raitious pesin', E tok dis wod bikos of onli Abraham?
No! E tok am for wi tu wey God go stil asept as raitious pipol; wi wey biliv sey God raiz Jisos Kraist from deat.
Na awa sins mak God giv Jisos Kraist to dem mak dem kil-am and God raiz-am from deat, so dat e go mak us raitious pipol.
Since fate don mak us dey gud for God eye, wi don get peace tru awa Oga Jisos Kraist.
Na fate e tak buy us so dat wi go enta God grace, di place wer wi dey naw. So wi fit boast wit God glori wey wi dey enjoy.
Wi stil dey hapi insaid di wahala wey wi dey face, bikos wi no sey trobol go mak us endure,
and endurance dey bring gud karata, wey go mak us get hope.
Dis hope nor dey disappoint pesin at-all, bikos God pour en luv laik riva wey dey flow insaid awa heart, tru di Holi Spirit wey E giv us.
For di taim wen wi nor fit help awasef, Kraist kon die for us wey bi sinas.
Nobodi go won die for anoda pesin wey dey gud for God eye, aldoh sombodi go fit die for pesin wey gud wel-wel.
Bot God show haw en luv for us big rish, wen E send Kraist kom die for us, ivun doh wi stil dey sin.
Naw, wi dey rite bikos of Kraist blood and na dis blood go save us from God vesnashon.
Wi bi God enimis bifor, bot E don mak us en frends tru en Pikin deat. Naw, since wi don bi God frends, E go save us tru di life wey en pikin get.
Nor bi onli dis won mak us dey hapi, bot wi stil dey hapi bikos of wetin God don du tru awa Oga Jisos Kraist wey mak us bi God frends.
Na tru won man sin enta dis wold and deat kom tru sin. So wi must die, bikos evribodi don sin.
Sin dey di wold bifor di law kom, bot if law nor dey, wi nor go fit joj pipol sin.
From Adam kon rish Mosis taim, na deat dey rule for dis wold, ivun doh nor bi evribodi disobey God komand laik Adam. Dis Adam bi laik Kraist wey kom leta.

Bot tu of dem nor bi di same, bikos God fri gift nor bi laik Adam sin. Na tru sey meni pipol die, bikos of won man sin. Bot God grace big wel-wel and e dey giv fri gift to pipol tru en pikin Jisos Kraist!
God gift and won man sin nor bi di same. Jojment folo di won man sin kon kondem evribodi, bot na God gift dey fri us, ivun doh wi bi sinas.
Bot if na bikos of won man sin deat kil evribodi, naim bi sey, doz wey don get favor and Kraist gift, dey gud for God eye and dem go enjoy life tru Jisos Kraist!
God go ponish evribodi bikos of Adam sin. Bot bikos of di gud tins wey Jisos du, God don asept and giv us di gift wey dey giv life.
Bikos Adam nor obey God, meni pipol bigin sin. Bot since Jisos obey God, meni pipol go obey God tu.
Di law kom so dat sin go inkrease, bot wer sin get pawa, God grace strong pas am
and as sin dey kontrol us tru deat, na so God grace dey rule tru raitiousnes wey dey bring life wey nor dey end, bikos of Jisos Kraist wey bi awa Oga.
So wetin wi go tok? Mak wi kontinu to dey sin so dat God grace go dey wit us?
No! Why wi wey don turn from sin go stil dey liv insaid am?
Abi una nor no sey all di pipol wey dem baptaiz insaid Kraist don die wit am?
Dem bere us wit am wen wi baptaiz, so as God raiz Kraist from deat tru en pawa wit glori, na so wi tu go get life wey nor dey end.
Bikos if wi don die wit Jisos Kraist tru baptism, God go raiz us up wit am.
Wi no sey di pesin wey wi bi bifor, dem don nail am for kros wit Jisos. So awa bodi nor bi sin savant again.
Bikos pesin wey don die, don fri from sin.
As wi die wit Kraist, wi biliv sey wi go liv wit am.
Wi no sey since God don raiz Kraist up, e nor go die and deat nor get pawa for en bodi again.
Bikos as e die, e don ovakom sin foreva, so di life wey e dey liv naw, e dey liv am for God.
So mak una no sey, una don ovakom sin tu and una get life tru Jisos Kraist.
Derfor, mak una nor alow sin kontrol una bodi again, so dat una nor go dey du bad tins.
Mak una nor let Satan yuz una bodi tak du bad tins, bot mak una kari unasef giv God as pipol wey don wak-up from deat, so dat una go dey du gud tins.
Sin nor go fit kontrol una, bikos una nor dey unda di law again, bot na God grace dey kontrol una naw.
So na wetin wi go tok? Mak wi stil dey sin, bikos wi get God grace and wi nor dey unda di law again? God forbid!
Yu nor no sey wetin yu giv yor bodi to, na-im go kontrol yu? If na sin, e go kause deat, bot if na God, E go mak yu dey liv raitious life.
Bot wi tank God sey, ivun doh una bi slave to sin bifor, una don yuz una heart dey obey all di tins wey wi dey tish una.
And as e bi sey una don fri from sin, una don bikom slave to gud tins.

(I dey tok wit humanbin sense, bikos I no sey una dey wik.) Bifor, una dey giv una bodi laik slave to bad tins, bot naw, una must yuz una ful bodi tak serv God, so dat una go dey du onli wetin God wont.
Bikos wen una bi sin savant, una nor nid to dey raitious.
So wetin una gain from all doz bad tins wey una du? Na shame and deat doz tins dey bring.
Bot naw, una don dey fri from sin kon bi God savant. Dis go mak una dey holi and God go giv una life wey nor dey end.
Bikos, di riwod for sin, na deat, bot God gift wey Jisos Kraist dey giv us, na life wey nor dey end.
My brodas and sistas, I no sey I dey tok to pipol wey no di law. Na onli wen pesin stil dey for life, naim di law dey get pawa for en bodi.
As di law tok, wuman wey don mari dey unda en husban as long as di man dey alaif. Bot if di man die, di wuman don fri.
So if wuman mari anoda man wen en husban stil dey alaif, e min sey e don komit adultri. Bot if en husban die, e don fri from wetin di law tok and e go fit mari anoda man again.

So my brodas and sistas, na so e bi wit una tu. Una don bikom part for Jisos Kraist bodi and una don die to di law pawa. Naw, una dey fri to bi Kraist own; di pesin wey God raiz from deat mak una for dey serv am.
Wen wi stil dey di wold, di law dey mak us du bad tins wey awa bodi wont and all dis tins dey bring deat.

Bot naw, wi don fri from di law. Wi bi laik deat bodi and di law nor get pawa for awa bodi again. Naw wi sopoz to serv God wit di new life wey di Spirit dey giv, nor bi di old life, wey bi to obey di law wey pesin rite.
Dis min sey di law nor gud? No! Bot na di law mak mi no wetin sin bi. If to sey di law nor sey, "Nor get long-trot for anoda man tin," I nor for no sey I nor sopoz to du dat kaind tin.
Bot bikos of di law, di sin pawa wey dey insaid mi kon dey mak mi tink abaut tins wey nor gud and if law nor dey, sin nor for get pawa for my life.
Bifor I no di law, I dey alaif, bot wen I hear God komandment, sin jos enta my life
and I kon die. So di law wey sopoz giv mi life, don kil mi!
Since sin pawa yuz di law disiv mi, I kon die.
Bot di law dey holi, rite and gud.
So dis min sey na wetin gud kil mi? No! Bot na sin pawa wey dey insaid mi, na-im kil mi; bikos e yuz wetin gud bring deat and naw, wi dey si haw sin bad and wiked rish.
Wi no sey di law dey spiritual. Bot I bi humanbin and dem don sel mi giv sin.
I nor undastand wetin I dey du; bikos I nor dey du wetin I won rili du. Insted na wetin I nor laik, I dey du.
Since I dey du wetin I hate to du, e show sey di law dey koret.
Nor bi mi rili dey du wetin I dey du, bot na di sin pawa wey dey insaid mi.
I no sey wetin dey insaid mi nor go let mi du gud. Ivun wen I won du gud, I nor dey fit.
Insted of mak I du wetin dey gud, na bad tins I dey du.
So if I du wetin I nor won du, e show sey nor bi mi dey du-am again, bot na di sin pawa wey dey insaid mi.
So I si sey dis law dey wok, bikos wen I won du gud, na onli bad tins dey enta my maind.
I dey laik to obey God law wit my hol maind,
bot insaid mi, I kon undastand sey somtin dey fite against my maind and e dey mak mi bi sin savant, bikos e dey kontrol my bodi.
I nor dey hapi at-all! Hu go save mi from dis bodi wey dey push mi go die?
Tank God! Jisos Kraist don save mi. So, I go obey God law wit my maind, ivun doh sin pawa stil dey insaid mi.
So, God nor go kondem pipol wey biliv Jisos Kraist.
Since di Holi Spirit don giv una life wey kom from Jisos Kraist, e go fri una from sin and deat.
Mosis law nor fit du dis tins, bikos di yeye life wey wi dey liv don mak di law wik. Bot God don fri us wen E send en pikin kom laik humanbin wey bi sina, mak e for sakrifais ensef for awa sins.
God du so, so dat wetin di law tok, go hapun wen wi obey di Spirit, insted of awa own maind.
Bikos pipol wey dey liv by dia own maind, dey tink of onli demsef. Bot evribodi wey di Holi Spirit dey rule, dey tink of tins wey di Spirit wont.
If wi let sin rule awa maind, wi go die. Bot if na di Spirit dey rule us, wi go get life and peace.
Pipol wey dey sin, na God enemi dem bi, bikos dem nor obey en law, since dem nor fit obey am.
Doz wey dey obey sin, nor go fit mak God hapi.
Bot una nor dey obey sin, insted, na as di Spirit sey mak una liv, na so una dey liv.
Kraist dey liv insaid una. So una dey alaif, bikos God don asept una, ivun doh una bodi must die, bikos of una sins.
If God Spirit wey raiz Jisos Kraist from deat dey insaid una, den en wey raiz Kraist from deat, go giv una bodi life, bikos of en Spirit wey dey insaid una.
So my brodas and sistas, wi get wok to du for God, so mak wi nor liv as awa bodi wont.
Bikos if una dey folo sin, una go die. Bot di Spirit pawa go kil all di bad tins wey una dey du, so dat una go get life.
Na doz wey God Spirit dey lid, bi God shildren.
Di Spirit wey God giv us nor go mak us fear laik slave, insted, wi bi God shildren and wi dey kol am, "Awa Papa!"
Na God Spirit mak us no sey wi bi God shildren.
And if wi bi God shildren, den wi go inherit God propati. Yes, wi go folo Kraist inherit God propati, bikos if rili wi sofa wit am, wi go folo am enjoy.
I dey sure sey, wi nor go fit kompare all di sofa wey wi dey sofa naw, wit di glori wey God go giv us.
Evritin wey God kreate for dis wold, dey wait for God to show en shildren to di wold.
Bikos of sin, di wold dey sofa from God kos naw and nor bi bikos dem wont am laik dat. Bot di wold dey hope
sey won day, God go fri dem from deat and wahala and dem go-go join en shildren wey E don save.
Wi no sey evritin wey God kreate, dey krai, jos laik di way wuman wey won born dey krai.
Di Holi Spirit don mak us dey sure of haw tumoro go bi. Bot naw, wi dey strogol as wi dey wait mak God show sey wi bi en shildren, den E go kon save us.
Na dis hope save us. Bot if wi don alredi get wetin wi dey hope for, den wi nor nid to dey hope again. Abi hu dey hope for wetin e don alredi get?
Bot if wi put hope for wetin wi nor fit si, wi go tak all awa maind wait for am wit patient.
Na so tu di Holi Spirit dey help us bikos wi dey wik. Bikos wi nor no wetin wi sopoz to pray for, di Spirit by ensef dey krai beg God, for di way awa wod nor go fit esplain.
And God wey dey si evritin insaid awa bele, no wetin dey di Spirit maind, bikos di Spirit dey pray for all God pipol, as God wont.
And wi no sey evritin dey wok for awa gud, bikos wi luv God and dey du wetin E wont.
God no doz wey E don shuz, so E don mak dem bi laik en Pikin, so dat en pikin go bi di first born.
Doz wey God don asept, na dem E kol; doz wey E kol, na dem E mak raitious and E kon share en glori wit dem.
Wetin wi go tok abaut all dis tins? If God dey for awa side, hu go fit dey against us?
Tru-tru, if E let dem kil en own pikin for awa sins, den E go fit giv us evritin wey wi ask from am fri of charge!
Hu go fit akiuz pesin wey God don shuz? Na God no hu gud or bad.
Hu bi di pesin wey go kondem us? Na Jisos Kraist wey die for us; di pesin wey God raiz from deat and naw, e dey for God rite hand side dey pray for us.
Na hu go fit seprate us from Kraist luv? Na trobol or opreshon; hunga or poverti; wahala or deat; or na bikos klot nor dey to wear?
As dem rite am, "Bikos of una, wi dey face deat from mornin go rish nite, wi bi laik ship wey dem won go kil."
Insaid all dis tins, awa joy don dey ful, bikos Jisos luv us!
Bot I dey sure sey, weda na deat or life; angels or wiked pawas; tins wey dey naw or di wons wey dey kom;
tins wey dey hevun; tins for unda dis eart or enitin wey God kreate, non of dem go fit seprate us from God luv, bikos of Jisos Kraist wey bi awa Oga.
Na di trut I dey tok, na Jisos get mi and di Holi Spirit dey bear witnes for my maind sey, I nor dey lai wen I sey,
e dey pain mi for maind and sorrow ful my heart,
bikos I for laik sey God go kos and seprate mi from Kraist, so dat my own flesh and blood,
wey bi Izrel pipol, go fit asept Kraist. Na dem God shuz as en own shildren, E mak agriment wit dem kon giv dem en law. Na dem get di Tempol and wetin God promis.
Awa gran-gran papa dem wey folo God waka bifor, na from dem dis pipol from kom. So I dey pray mak dem praiz God wey dey rule evritin foreva and eva! Amen.
Nor bi sey God promis don fail; bikos nor bi evribodi wey dey Izrel rili bi God pipol.
And nor bi all Abraham pikin bi God shildren. Insted, God tel Abraham, "Na tru Izik yu go get di shildren wey I promis yu."
Dis min sey di pikin wey Abraham born (Hagar pikin, Ishmael) bifor God promis am, nor bi di won wey God shuz. Insted, di pikin wey e born tru God promis, na dat won bi Abraham tru pikin.
Bikos na so God tok for en promis, "Wen di taim don rish, I go kom bak and Sarah go born boy."
Nor bi onli dat, bikos Rebeka shildren na won papa dem get and naim bi awa gran papa, Izik.
Ivun bifor dem born di shildren or sey dem du eni bad or gud tin, God tel Rebeka, "Di senior pikin go serv en junior broda, so dat my promis go stand:
nor bi bikos of wetin dem du, bot na as I wont mak e bi."
Jos as God wod sey, "I luv Jacob, bot I hate Esau."
Wetin wi go tok? God dey show parsha? No!
Bikos E tel Mosis sey, "I go sori for hu I won sori for and I go show mesi to hu I laik show mesi to."
Derfor, evritin dey for God hand, nor bi by wetin pipol won du.
God tel Fero for en wod sey, "I mak yu king, so dat I go yuz yu show my pawa and pipol go fear my name for di hol wold.
So, God dey sori for hu E won sori for and dey ponish hu E won ponish.
I no sey yu go ask sey, "Wetin mak God dey faind fault for pipol bodi, since na-im mak us dey du as wi dey du?"
Bot, my frend, I dey ask, "Hu yu tink sey yu bi, wey mak yu dey ask God kweshon? Pot wey dem mold fit ask di pesin wey dey mold am sey, 'Why yu dey mold mi laik dis?'"
Di man wey mold di pot fit yuz di clay as e laik. E fit yuz di clay mak tu pot, won for big parti and di oda won for haus.
Bot God won show sey E dey ves, so E kon yuz en pawa against doz wey E won ponish.
E dey du laik dis to show en glori wen E piti for pipol wey E shuz to show en glori.
Weda wi bi Ju or Gentai pipol, E don shuz us.
As E tok for Hosea book sey; "Doz wey nor bi my pipol bifor and di pipol wey nobodi luv bifor, I go kol dem, 'Di pipol wey I luv.'
"For wer God for tel dem sey, 'Una nor bi my pipol, na der dem go stil kol dem God shildren.'"
And dis na wetin Isaia tok abaut Izrel pipol, "Izrel shildren meni laik san-san wey dey wotasaid. Bot na few of dem, God go save.
"Bikos God go kwik du wetin E sey E wont du for dis wold, E go kom joj di wold."
Jos as Isaia tok bifor sey, "If to sey Almighti God nor save som for awa shildren, wi for don die finish laik Sodom and Gomora."
Wetin wi go tok? Ivun doh Gentai pipol nor dey raitious bifor, dem don dey raitious naw, bikos of fate.
And Izrel pipol wey dey trai to du wetin God wont, nor fit du-am.
Why dem nor fit du-am? Na bikos dem dey trai to du gud laik sey na by wok, nor bi wit fate. Na dis mak dem dey strogol kon dey fal on-top stone.
God wod sey, "Si, for Zion, I dey arange stones wey go mak pipol fal, yet doz wey biliv am, E nor go disapoint dem.
My brodas and sistas, I dey wish and pray to God from my heart evriday sey, mak God save dem wey kom from Izrel.
I no sey dem luv God, bot dem nor undastand am,
as e bi sey dem nor no haw God dey tak mak pipol gud, insted, dem dey trai to mak demsef gud by dia own pawa, since dem nor gri du wetin God wont.
Since Jisos Kraist kom, di law nor get pawa again and enibodi wey biliv God, go dey raitious.
Na dis raitiousnes wey di law tok, naim Mosis rite abaut sey: "Di pesin wey folo di law must du evritin wey di law tok."
Bot di raitiousnes wey fate dey giv pesin na sey: "Nor tok for yor maind sey, 'Hu go-go hevun go bring Jisos kraist kom dan?
or Hu go-go bring Kraist kom out from hell wer deat bodi dey?'"
Bot wetin e tok? "God wod dey near yu. Di wod wey wi dey prish near yu, e get fate and e dey yor mout and heart."
Bot if yu konfes wit yor mout sey, "Jisos Kraist na Oga and yu biliv for yor heart sey, God raiz-am from grave, yu go dey save."
If yu biliv and prish wit yor heart giv pipol sey Jisos Kraist na Oga, God go save yu.
Bikos God wod sey, "Enibodi wey biliv am, nor go shame."
Ju and Gentai pipol nor dey difren for God eye and E dey bless evribodi wey dey pray to am,
bikos E go save doz wey dey kol en name.
Haw dem won tak kol God mak E help dem, wen dem nor biliv am? And haw dem go fit biliv, wen dem neva hear abaut am? Haw dem go tak hear abaut am, if nobodi prish to dem?
Haw pesin go prish God wod wen God nor send am? As God wod sey, "Pipol wey dey prish di Gud News dey waka wel, bikos na gud tins dem dey bring!"
Bot nor bi evribodi gri asept di Gud News, ivun profet Isaia sey, "God, enibodi don biliv awa mesage?"
So, nobodi go fit get fate wen e neva hear di mesage and na tru Kraist wod, wi go fit hear am.
Bot mak I ask, dem neva hear di mesage bifor? Yes! Dem don hear am, bikos God wod sey, "Dem prish di mesage and dia vois rish evriwer for di wold."
I dey ask una again, "Izrel pipol nor undastand?" Mosis first tok sey, "I go yuz pipol wey nor bi enitin, so dat una go dey jelos dem. Na pipol wey nor get sense, na dem I go yuz tak mak una ves."
And profet Isaia ivun get strong heart to tel di pipol sey, "Pipol wey nor luk for mi, na dem si mi. Doz wey nor ask for mi, na dem kon no mi wel-wel."
Bot Profet Isaia stil tok abaut Izrel pipol sey, "I don dey kol dis my stuborn pipol, bot dem nor dey hear wod."
I dey ask, God don rejet Izrel, en pipol? No! Mi tu, na Izrel pesin, I bi Abraham pikin wey kom from Benjamin tribe.
God nor rejet en pipol wey E shuz from di biginin. Dem rite for God wod abaut haw Elija beg God for Izrel pipol sey,
"Oga, dem don kil all yor profets. Dem don skata yor alta, na onli mi rimain and dem dey trai to kil mi tu!"
Na wish ansa God gi-am? E tel am, "I stil get sevun tazon men wey neva woship Baal juju at-all."
Na so e bi naw tu, som Izrel pipol stil dey woship God bikos of en grace.
If na by grace God shuz dem, dat min sey, nor bi by pesin pawa: bikos if na by pesin pawa, den grace nor min enitin again.
Dis min sey, na onli few pipol for Izrel fit get wetin all of dem dey faind. Di res nor gri listin to God, bikos of dia stubornes,
jos as God wod sey, "God mak dem foolish sotey dia eye nor dey si and dia ear nor dey hear til today."
Bot David sey, "Mak di fud wey dem dey chop, kause trobol for dem kon fal laik stone for dia head and mak God ponish dem.
"Mak dia eye blind, so dat dem nor go fit si. Mak wahala bend dia bak foreva."
I dey ask again, Izrel pipol wey fal nor go get up again? No! Bot bikos of dia sins, Gentai pipol don get salvashon and dis tin, dey mak Izrel pipol jelos.
If Izrel pipol sin fit mak Gentai pipol dey save, dat min sey, wen Izrel pipol turn go mit God, pipol wey go dey save, go plenti wel-wel.
Naw, I dey tok to una wey bi Gentai pipol and as long as I bi una apostol, I dey hapi wit di wok wey I dey du,
so dat my pipol go dey jelos, bikos of wetin God dey du for Gentai pipol. Dis go mak dem turn from sin kom mit God and E go save dem.
Bikos wen God rejet Izrel pipol, di hol wold kon get savalshon. Na haw e go kon bi, wen God asept dem bak? E go giv life to pipol wey won die.
If dem giv God di first part for bread, den na God get all di bread and if dem giv God tri root, den di hol tri don bi en own tu.
Gentai pipol, una bi laik bransh wey dem add join olive tri. Una don tak di place for som bransh wey God first kut komot. So una dey enjoy di blessins, wey di root dey giv.
So mak una nor boast, bot mak una rimemba sey, nor bi una dey mak di root stand, bot na di root dey sopot una.
So una go sey, "God break di bransh komot, mak E for fit si place wey E go put us."
Tru-tru, God break Izrel pipol komot from di tri, bikos dem nor biliv am. Bot una dey wer una dey, bikos una get fate. So, mak una nor dey boast, insted, mak una dey fear wetin God fit du.
If God nor sori for Izrel pipol wey bi di natura bransh, una tink sey E go sori for una if una sin?

Naw, una don si haw God dey gud and harsh. Ivun doh E dey ves for doz wey fal, E stil dey kaind to una. And E go always dey kaind to una, as long as una dey du wetin E wont. If not, E go rejet una tu.
If Izrel pipol turn bak kon mit God, E go put dem bak for di tri, bikos E get pawa to du-am.

Una wey bi Gentai pipol bi laik olive tri bransh wey dem kut for bush kon go put for anoda beta olive tri (and e nor sopoz bi laik dat). Na Ju pipol bi di beta olive tri; so e go eazi for God to join dem bak to di origina tri again.

My frends, I nor won mak una dey boast abaut unasef. So I go tel una wetin hapun to Izrel pipol. Som of dem stuborn wel-wel and na so dem go bi ontil di numba of Gentai pipol wey God wont, don komplit.
Na so God go save all Izrel pipol jos as en wod sey, "Di pesin wey go save Izrel pipol go kom from Zion, den, Jacob shildren nor go dey du bad tins again.
"And na dis go bi my agriment wit dem wen I don forgiv dem dia sins."
As e bi sey Ju pipol rejet God wod, dem don turn to God enemi, bikos of una wey bi Gentai pipol. Bot as God wont am, dem bi pipol wey E luv, bikos of dia gran-gran papa dem.
God nor dey tak bak wetin e don alredi giv pipol or shange en maind abaut di pipol wey E don shuz.
As for una wey bi Gentai pipol, una don disobey God bifor, bot naw, God don sori for una, bikos Ju pipol nor gri obey am.
Bikos God don sori for una, E go stil sori for dem tu.
God trit evribodi as prizinas, bikos wi nor gri du wetin E tel us. Bot E du-am laik dat, so dat E go fit sori for all of us.
Hu fit no haw God big rish? Hu fit no haw God wisdom and undastandin bi? Hu fit esplain why God dey du wetin E dey du!
Na hu no wetin dey God maind? Hu go fit advise God?
Wish pesin don boro God somtin kon sey God go pay am bak?
Bikos na God kreate evritin and na tru am evritin dey. Mak praiz bi en own foreva and eva! Amen.

My brodas and sistas, God dey gud. So I beg, as una dey alaif, mak una dey offa una bodi giv am as sakrifais. Mak una dey du wetin E tok and wetin go mak bele swit am. Na dis bi di best way to serv God.
Mak una nor bi laik pipol for di wold, bot mak una alow God shange una maind, den una go no haw to serv God and du tins wey dey mak bele swit am.
By di grace wey God giv mi, I dey tel all of una, mak una nor tink sey una tu dey important. Insted, mak una yuz gud sense tink and undastand di fate wey God giv una.
Pesin bodi get difren parts and all di parts get dia own wok.
Na so e bi wit us. Wi meni, bot wi bi difren parts for Kraist bodi and wi bilong to ish oda.
Tru God grace, E don giv us difren-difren gift to yuz. If wi dey profesai, mak wi du-am akordin to di fate wey wi get.
If wi dey serv odas, mak wi serv dem wel. If wi dey tish, mak wi tish wel.
If wi dey prish, mak wi prish wel. If wi dey giv, mak wi du-am wit beta maind. If wi dey lid odas, mak wi du awa best. If wi dey du gud to odas, mak wi du-am wit hapines.
Mak wi luv ish oda wel-wel. Mak una hate enitin wey dey bad, bot una must luv enitin wey get trut.
Mak una luv ish oda laik brodas and sistas and mak una respet oda pipol pas unasef.
Mak una nor taya, bot wit di Holi Spirit help, mak una serv God wit beta maind.
Mak una let una hope giv una hapines. Mak una dey patient wen trobol kom and nor stop to pray.
Mak una giv fud to God pipol wey dey hungri and mak una dey welkom dem for una haus.
Mak una nor kos pipol wey dey opres una, bot mak una pray mak God bless dem.
Wen pipol dey hapi, mak una folo dem hapi and wen dem dey krai, mak una folo dem krai tu.
Mak una trai to bi frend wit evribodi. Mak una nor kari bodi up kon feel sey una wise pas evribodi, insted, mak una dey mak frend wit doz wey nor dey important.
Mak una nor pay evil for evil, bot mak sure sey wetin una dey du, gud for God and pipol eye
and mak una trai to liv for peace wit evribodi.
Mak una nor trai to pay enibodi for di bad tin wey dem du una, bot mak una liv am for God, bikos God wod sey, "Na mi go revenge for una. I go pay dem bak."
God wod stil sey, "If yor enemi dey hungri, mak yu gi-am fud chop, if en trot dry, mak yu gi-am wota drink, bikos as yu dey du so, na wahala yu dey kari put for en head."
So, mak una nor let bad tins kontrol una, bot mak una let di gud tins wey una dey du, plenti pas wikednes.
Mak evribodi obey di pipol wey dey rule dem. Bikos na onli God dey giv autoriti and put pipol for pawa.
So enibodi wey dey disobey dia rula, dey disobey God and God go ponish am.
Bikos doz wey dey du gud, nor go get problem wit dia rulas, so dem nor nid to fear. Mak una jos du wetin dey gud and dem go praiz una.
Bikos all rulas na God savant and na dia duti to help yu. If yu du bad, den mak yu fear, bikos dis rulas get pawa to ponish yu. Dem bi God savants wey dey ponish doz wey du wrong tins.
Bot yu must obey di rulas, bikos yu no sey naim bi di rite tin to du, nor bi bikos God go ves for yu.
Yu must stil pay yor tax tu. Di rulas na God savants and na dia wok to kare for all dis mata.
Mak yu pay evritin wey yu dey hol; weda na tax, respet or onor.
Mak luv bi di onli tin wey yu dey hol! If yu luv odas, yu don du evritin wey di law tok.
Di law get difren-difren komand laik, "Nor komit adultri; nor kil pesin; nor tif; nor put eye for anoda man propati." All dis na jos won komand wey sey, "Mak pipol luv odas, jos as dem luv diasef."
lf yu luv pesin, yu nor go du-am bad. So, na luv bi di main tin wey di law dey tok abaut.

Since una no di taim wey wi dey naw, mak una dey bihav wel, bikos di taim don rish wen una go wak-up from slip. Una no sey di day wey God go giv us salvashon, don near wel-wel pas as e bi wen wi first biliv.
Nite don nearli finish and day go soon break. So mak wi stop to bihav laik pipol wey dey daknes and mak wi redi to waka for lite.
So mak wi dey bihav wel as pipol dey du for day taim. Nor go enihaw parti or drink tu mush, den kon dey bihav enihaw. Nor kworel or joj pipol.
Insted, mak una wear Jisos Kraist laik klot for bodi. Den wi nor go du di tins wey awa bodi won t.
Mak una dey welkom God pipol. Ivun doh dia fate nor tu strong, mak una nor kos dem, bikos of wetin dem dey tink sey dey gud or bad.
Som pipol tink sey e dey rite to chop eni fud and odas wey dia fate dey wik, dey chop onli vegetabol.
Since God dey welkom evribodi, mak una nor kondem odas bikos dem chop or dem nor chop wetin una laik.
Wish rite yu get to kondem anoda pesin savant? Na onli dia oga fit tok weda dem dey du wel and e must mak sure sey, dem dey du di rite tin.
Som pipol tink sey won day beta pas anoda and som tink sey, evriday na di same. Bot mak evribodi biliv wetin dem won biliv.
Enibodi wey tink sey won day beta pas anoda, dey du so to onor God. And enibodi wey chop meat, dey tank God jos laik di pesin wey nor won chop.
Nobodi dey liv or die for ensef. Weda wi die or wi liv, na God stil get us.
If wi liv, na God wi dey liv for; if wi die, na God wi stil die for. So, weda wi die or wi liv, na God stil get us.
Dis na bikos Kraist die and e kom bak to life, so dat e go bi Oga to pipol wey don die and doz wey dey alaif.
Bot why yu dey kondem oda Kristains? Why yu dey si dem as smol shildren? Di day dey kom wen God go joj all of us.
God wod sey, "Weda dem laik am or not, evribodi go nil dan for my front kon sey na mi bi God."
So, all of us go tel God wetin wi du wit awa life.
So, mak wi nor dey joj won anoda and mak wi nor spoil anoda pesin fate.
As I don no Kraist, e don mak mi no sey all fud dey klin. Bot if yu tink sey e nor gud mak yu chop som fud, dat nor min sey, e nor gud for anoda pesin.
Bikos if di fud wey yu chop mak yor broda or sista ves for yu, den yu nor dey show luv again. So mak yu nor let di kaind fud wey yu dey chop, offend di pesin wey Jisos Kraist die for.
Nor let pipol kos Jisos Kraist, bikos of di fud wey yu dey chop.
Bikos God kindom nor bi fud and drink mata, bot na abaut raitiousnes, peace and joy wey di Holi Spirit dey giv pipol.
If yu serv Kraist laik dis, God go dey hapi wit yu and pipol go respet yu.
So, mak wi liv for peace, den wi go help ish oda grow as dem dey serv God.
Nor skata God wok bikos of fud. Evri fud dey okay, bot e nor gud mak yu chop wetin go spoil anoda pesin fate.
E beta mak yu nor chop meat, drink wine or du enitin wey fit spoil yor brodas fate.
Enitin wey yu biliv abaut dis mata, mak yu kip am to yorsef and God wey dey hevun, dey si-am. God don bless di pesin wey nor kondem ensef, bikos of wetin e du.
Bot if yu dey doubt wetin yu chop, den yu dey kondem yorsef and yu no sey dat nor gud, bikos enitin wey yu du against wetin yu biliv, na sin.
If awa fate dey strong, den mak wi dey patient wit doz wey get wik fate. Mak wi trai to mak dem hapi, insted of awasef.
Mak wi tink of tins wey gud for dem, den du wetin go mak dem grow.
Ivun Kraist nor du tins wey go jos mak ensef hapi, bot jos as dem rite for God wod, "Di pesin wey kos yu, don kos mi."
Bikos evritin wey dem rite from biginin, na to tish, enkorage and giv us hope.
So, I pray sey, God wey dey giv komfort and patient, go help una liv for peace wit won anoda as una dey folo Jisos Kraist.
So dat as una dey togeda, una go fit yuz won vois praiz God, wey bi awa Oga Jisos Kraist, Papa.
So mak una asept won anoda jos as Kraist asept una, so dat God go get all di glori.
Mak I tel una di trut, Kraist kom as Ju pipol savant to show sey, God don kip di promis wey E mak wit dia gran-gran papa dem. Kraist stil kom,
so dat Gentai pipol go praiz God sey e dey gud to dem. Jos as God wod sey, "I go tel Gentai pipol abaut Yu and I go sing, dey praiz yor name."
God wod stil sey, "Gentai pipol! Mak una hapi wit God pipol."
Dem rite am for God wod sey, "Una wey bi Gentai pipol, mak una praiz God. Mak evribodi praiz am."
Profet Isaia sey, "Sombodi dey kom from David famili (Jesse root). E go rule Gentai pipol and dem go biliv am."
I pray mak God wey dey giv hope, bless una wit joy and peace bikos of una fate. So mak di Holi Spirit pawa ful una bodi wit fate.
My frends, I dey sure abaut una sey una gud and una no God wel-wel and fit tish won anoda.
Bot for dis leta, I rite som tins wit boldnes, so dat una go rimemba dem we-wel. God dey gud to mi and
naim mak am shuz mi to bi Jisos Kraist savant for Gentai pipol and mak I for dey prish di Gud News. Dis tin hapun, so dat di Holi Spirit go mak God dey hapi wit Gentai pipol.
So I dey boast abaut di tins wey I dey du, bikos of Jisos Kraist.
Wit beta maind, evritin wey I dey tok abaut, na haw Kraist let mi tok and wok, so dat Gentai pipol go obey am.
Yes! I go tok haw Kraist tak du meni mirakols and wondas tru di Holi Spirit pawa. I don prish di Gud News from Jerusalem go rish Ilyrikum.
Bot I laik to prish di Gud News for wer pipol nor no Kraist, so dat I nor go build haus on-top anoda man foundashon,
jos as God wod sey; "Doz wey dem tel abaut am, go si-am and doz wey neva hear abaut am, dem go undastand."
My wok neva let mi kom si una.
Bot naw, nor-tin rimain wey I go du for dis part of di wold again and e don tey wey I dey plan to kom visit una.
I go plan to stop si una wen I dey go Spain, so dat una go help mi for di joni, afta I don stay wit una for somtaim.
Bot naw, I dey tak mesage go giv God pipol for Jerusalem,
bikos God pipol for Masidonia and Akaya giv mi moni mak I giv di poor Kristains for der.
Dis na wetin dem rili won du. Bikos wen den share di tins wey dem get wit Ju pipol, naim bi sey dem don folo Ju pipol share dia spiritual blessins tu.
So, afta I don finish dis wok kon dey sure sey di bilivas don get dia blessins for Jerusalem, I go visit una wen I dey go Spain.
And I no sey wen I kom visit una, I go bring plenti blessins from Kraist kon giv una.
My brodas and sistas, I dey beg una wit Jisos Kraist and di Holi Spirit luv; mak una help mi pray to God.
Mak una pray mak God save mi from pipol wey nor biliv am for Judea and mak di bilivas wey dey Jerusalem, asept wetin I dey prish.
Mak una pray giv God, so dat I go kom visit una wit hapines.
So mak God wey dey giv peace, dey wit all of un a. Amen.
I get beta tins to tok abaut awa sista, Fibi, wey bi lida for di shosh wey dey Senkria.
Mak una welkom am wit God name as God shildren sopoz du. And mak una giv am enitin wey e nid; bikos e don help mi and oda pipol bifor.
Mak una salot Prisila and Akwila for mi. Dem bi my co-wokas for awa Oga Jisos Kraist wok,
dem don ivun risk dia life bikos of mi. So, mi and di hol shosh dey tank dem wel-wel.
Mak una stil help mi salot di pipol for di shosh wey dey mit for dia haus. Salot Epaenetus, my gud frend (di first pesin to biliv Kraist for Asia).
Grit Mary wey don wok wel-wel wit una.
Mak una grit my kozin Andronikus and Junia wey dey prizin wit mi bifor. Di apostols dey respet dem and tu of dem don dey folo God, bifor I ivun no Kraist.
Grit Ampliatus, wey get fate and e bi my very gud frend.
Grit Urbanus wey folo us wok. Grit Stachys wey bi my gud frend.
Mak una grit Apelles for mi, bikos Jisos Kraist don shuz am. Den mak una stil grit Aristobulus famili for mi.
Mak una grit Herodion my kontriman and Narcissus and en famili wey don biliv God.
Grit Tryfana and Tryfosa, wey dey du Kraist wok.
Grit Rufus, di pesin wey di Oga don shuz and en mama wey trit mi laik sey e bi my mama.
Mak una grit Asynkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas and all di brodas and sistas wey dey wit dem.
Grit Filologus and Julia, Nereus and en sista, Olympas and all di bilivas wey dey wit dem.
Mak una salot won anoda wit kiss for jaw. All di shosh wey bi Kraist own, dey grit una.
Naw, my brodas and sistas, I dey beg una, mak una no di pipol wey dey kause wahala and opoz di tishin wey una don learn from us. Den mak una nor go near dem!
Bikos dis kaind pipol nor dey serv awa Oga Jisos Kraist, bot na dia bele dem dey kare for. Wit dia swit and wayo mout, dem go praiz and disiv pipol wey nor wise.
I dey hapi, bikos evribodi don no haw una dey obey God. Bot I wont mak una dey wise wen e rish mata wey dey gud or bad. Mak una nor du eni bad tin.
And God wey dey giv peace, go soon distroi Satan for una. Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una.
Timoti, my co-woka; Lucius, Jason and Sosipater my kontriman, all of dem dey grit una.
Ivun mi, Tertius wey rite dis leta, dey grit una wit Kraist name.
Gaius, wey dey kare for mi and di shosh, dey grit una. Erastus wey bi di tawn treasura and awa broda Kwatus, dey grit una.
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una!
Mak wi praiz God, bikos e don mak una strong tru dis Gud News wey I dey prish abaut en pikin, Jisos Kraist. For meni years naw, dem kip dis mesage for sikrit,
bot naw, dem don tok am at last. God wey nor dey die, komand en profets mak dem rite abaut di Gud News, so dat pipol for evriwer, go obey am and get fate.
Naw, bikos of Jisos Kraist, wi fit praiz di onli God wey dey wise foreva! Amen.
Na Pol, wey God kol to bi Jisos Kraist apostol and Sosthenes, awa broda, na dem rite dis leta.
To God holi pipol for di shosh wey dey Korint, wey bi en own bikos of Jisos Kraist and pipol for evriwer wey dey woship awa Oga Jisos Kraist as dia Oga and Savior.
Mak grace and peace wey God and Oga Jisos Kraist dey giv, bi una own!
I dey always tank God bikos of di grace wey E giv una, tru Jisos Kraist.
Bikos wi dey wit Kraist, God mak us dey rish for evri side, both for wisdom and undastandin,
bikos di mesage abaut Kraist dey insaid us,
so una nor go miss eni gift wey di Holi Spirit dey giv, as una dey wait for di day wen God go bring awa Oga Jisos Kraist kom bak.
God go help una rish di end, so dat E nor go si fault for una life for di day wen Jisos go kom bak.
God dey fateful, bikos na-im kol una to waka wit en pikin, Jisos Kraist, wey bi awa Oga.
My brodas and sistas, I dey beg una wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist name sey, mak una nor kworel, bot mak una get won maind for evritin wey una dey du.
Bikos I don hear tru Khloe famili sey, una dey kworel among unasef.
Wetin I hear bi sey, som of una dey sey, "Na Pol side I dey;" odas sey, "Na Apollos side I dey;" som stil sey, "Na Pita side I dey" or "Na Kraist side I dey."
Una hear sey dem divide Kraist? Na Pol dem hang kil for kros? Abi na Pol name dem tak baptaiz una?
I tank God sey I nor baptaiz eni of una esept Krispus and Gaius,
so nobodi go fit sey na my name dem tak baptaiz am.
(I rimemba sey I stil baptaiz Stephanas famili. Apart from dem, I nor rimemba eni oda pesin wey I baptaiz.
Bikos Kraist nor send mi go baptaiz, bot na to prish di gospol and nor bi wit ordinari wisdom wey go mak di sofa wey Kraist sofa for kros, yeye.
Di mesage abaut Kraist deat for kros bi laik foolish mata to pipol wey don loss, bot for wi wey God don save, di mesage na God pawa.
Bikos God wod sey, "I go distroi di wisdom wey wise pipol feel sey dem get. I go konfuz doz wey tink sey dem no tu mush."
Wetin hapun to di wise pipol? Wetin hapun to doz wey no Mosis law wel-wel? Wetin hapun to doz wey tink sey dem get all di ansa? Abi God nor sey dis wold wisdom, nor min enitin?
God wise wel-wel, so E nor let pipol for dis wold no-am wit di wisdom wey dem get. Insted, E save onli di pipol wey biliv di foolish mesage wey wi dey prish.
