Ju pipol won si mirakol bifor dem go biliv and Greek pipol, na wisdom dem won hear,
bot di tru mesage abaut Jisos wey dem kil for kros, naim wi dey prish and di mesage bi laik stone wey Ju pipol kick by mistak kon fal, bot to Gentai pipol, na yeye tin e bi.
Bot for wi wey God don kol, weda wi bi Ju or Greek; na Kraist bi God pawa and wisdom wey svae us.
Bikos God foolishnes wise pas all di sense wey humanbin get and God wiknes strong pas all di pawa wey dem get.
My brodas and sistas, mak una rimemba haw God kol una, nor bi bikos una wise, strong or get moni wel-wel.
Bot God shuz wetin di wold tink sey dey foolish and wik, so dat wise and strong pipol go shame.
Wetin di wold tink sey nor gud, naim God shuz; tins wey dem tink sey nor min enitin, na doz tins E mak important.
God du laik dis, so dat nobodi go fit boast for en front.
Una don bi Kraist frends bikos of God and na tru Kraist wi get wisdom, gudnes and holines wey kom from God;
bikos, God wod sey, "Enibodi wey won boast, mak e yuz Kraist tak boast."
My brodas and sistas, wen I kom tel una abaut God wod, I nor tok to una wit big-big wod or trai to show sey I get sense.
Bikos wen I dey wit una, I plan sey, Kraist wey dem kil for kros, na onli en mesage I go tok to una abaut.
So wen I kom mit una, I dey wik and dey fear.
Wen I dey tok and prish to una, I nor trai to show sey I get sense, bot I dey du evritin wit God pawa wey di Holi Spirit dey giv,
so dat una fate go dey for God pawa, nor bi humanbin wisdom.
Wi dey tok wit wisdom to doz wey rili no God wod, bot nor bi wit dis wold or eni rula wisdom, bikos dia wisdom nor min enitin.
Di tin wey I dey tok abaut, na God sikrit wisdom wey E shuz for us, ivun bifor E kreate di wold.
No rula for dis wold fit undastand God wisdom, bikos if to sey dem fit, dem for nor nail and kil Kraist wey get glori.
Bot God wod sey, "No eye don eva si; no ear don hear, ivun pesin maind nor fit tink abaut di tins wey God don priper for pipol wey luv am."
God show us dis tins tru en Spirit, bikos di Spirit dey faind evritin; ivun di deep tins wey dey God maind.
Na onli pesin spirit no wetin dey di pesin maind and na onli God Spirit no wetin dey God maind.
God giv us en Spirit, so wi nor dey tink as dis wold pipol dey tink and naim mak us no di blessins wey God don giv us.
Evri wod wey wi dey tok, na God Spirit tish us and nor bi human wisdom. And na dis same Spirit dey help us tish spiritual tins to pipol wey get God Spirit.
So, na onli hu get God Spirit fit unadastand spiritual blessins. Pesin wey nor get God Spirit, nor go fit undastand wetin di Spirit dey tok.
Pesin wey dey listin to di Spirit fit joj oda pipol, bot nobodi go fit joj dem:
bikos God wod sey, "Hu fit no wetin God dey tink so dat e go advise am?" Bot wi wey get di Spirit, undastand wetin Kraist dey tish.

My brodas and sistas, wen I dey wit una bifor, una dey bihav laik pipol for dis wold. Na dis mak mi nor fit tok to una as pipol wey get God Spirit. Dat taim, una fate for Kraist bi laik smol pikin own.
So I dey fid una wit milk laik smol pikin and as e bi naw, una neva stil fit chop strong fud,
bikos una neva get di Spirit since jelosi and kworel stil dey among una. Dis min sey una neva get di Spirit and una stil dey liv laik pipol wey dey di wold.
Som of una dey sey, "Na Pol I dey folo," odas sey, "Na Apollos bi awa lida." Na pipol wey nor no God dey du laik dat!
Mi and Apollos na God savant and E yuz us tak prish to una mak una for fit biliv and ish of us dey du di wok wey God sey mak wi du.
I dey plant di sid and Apollos dey wota dem, bot na God dey mak di sid grow.
Pesin wey plant and di won wey wota, nor min enitin, bikos na God dey mak di sid grow.
Di pesin wey plant di sid and di won wey wota am, na di same wok dem dey du, bot ish pesin go get en pay from God akordin to en wok.
All of us na co-wokas for God and na una bi God farm and en buildins.
Na God grace mak mi sabi build wel-wel. I lay foundashon wey anoda pesin build put. Bot mak wi tak kare as wi dey build,
bikos na Kraist bi di onli foundashon.
So if enibodi yuz gold, silva, fine stones, wud, or difren grass tak build on-top dis foundashon,
mak e no sey, God go expoz en wok, bikos E go test am wit fire for Jojment Day. Di fire go test di wok wey evribodi dey du.
God go riwod us if di fire nor burn wetin wi build.
Bot if di fire distroi am, wi nor go get enitin. Bot wi go dey save laik pesin wey dem drag komot from insaid fire.
Una nor no sey una bi God tempol and en Spirit dey insaid una?
So If enibodi distroi God tempol, God go distroi dat pesin tu, bikos God tempol dey holi and na una bi dat tempol.
Mak una nor let enibodi disiv una. If enibodi tink sey e get sense for dis life, mak e turn to fool, so dat e go rili get sense.
Dis wold wisdom, na foolishnes for God front. Bikos God wod sey, "God dey ponish pipol wey tink sey dem wise."
God no sey na yeye tins wise pipol dey tink,
so, mak wi stop to dey boast abaut wetin pesin du. Bikos both
Pol, Apollos, Pita, di wold, life or deat; tins wey dey naw or tins wey go dey tumoro, all of dem na una own.
So una bi Kraist own and Kraist na God own.
Mak una dey tink abaut us as Kraist savant wey God don show en sikrit.
God wont mak wi dey fateful to am.
So, e nor konsan mi if yu or eni human kourt dey joj mi. Ivun mi nor fit joj mysef.
My maind dey klear, bot dat nor min sey I dey inosent. Na onli God go fit joj mi.
So, mak una nor joj enibodi ontil Kraist go kom bak. E go expoz evritin wey dey daknes and di tins wey dey insaid pesin heart. Dat taim, na God go praiz evribodi akordin to wetin dem du.
My frends, I don yuz mysef and Apollos as ezampol for una, so dat tru us, una go no wetin e min to obey di law. I nor wont mak una dey sey won of us beta pas di oda pesin.
Wetin mak una tink sey, una beta pas anoda pesin? Nor bi God giv una evritin? So wetin mak una dey boast, wen e bi sey evritin wey una get, na God giv una?
Una don rili get evritin wey una nid! Una don get plenti moni! Una don turn king wit us! Haw I wish sey una rili bi king, so dat wi go dey rule wit una.
Bikos e klear sey, di place wey God giv us wey bi en apostols, na wer wos pas for di wold; wi bi laik prizinas wey dem dey go kil. Angels and dis wold pipol jos dey tak us mak yeye.
Bikos of Kraist, pipol dey si us as fools, bot God don mak us wise. Wi wik and dem hate us, bot dem dey respet una wey dey strong.
Ivun today, wi dey hungri for fud and wota, na onli rag wi get to wear. Dem dey trit us enihaw and wi nor get haus to stay.
Wi dey wok hard bifor wi go fit chop and as pipol dey kos us, na blessin wi dey giv dem bak. Wen wi dey sofa, wi dey-dey patient.
Wen pesin kos us, wi nor dey ansa bak wit kworel. So til today, dem dey si us as dirti for dis wold.
I nor dey rite dis tins mak una for shame, bot na to koret una as shildren wey I luv.
Bikos ivun if ten tazon pipol kon tish una abaut Kraist, na onli won papa una go stil get. Bikos una don turn to my pikin, wen una risiv di mesage abaut Kraist from mi.
So, I dey enkorage una sey, mak una bi laik mi.
Na to enkorage una mak mi send Timoti, my son wey I laik and wey luv Kraist kom mit una. E go tel una haw I dey folo Kraist and di tins wey I dey prish abaut Kraist, for evri shosh.
Som of una don dey kari bodi up, bikos una tink sey I nor go kom bak again.
Bot if God alow mi, I go soon kom mit una. Den I go no if pipol wey dey boast, rili get pawa.
Bikos God kindom mata, nor bi abaut ordinari tok, bot na abaut pawa.
Wish won una wont? Mak I kari cane kom mit una, or mak I kon show una di luv wey di Spirit dey giv pesin?
I don dey hear bad-bad tins abaut som of una. And una own ivun wos pas wetin doz wey nor no God dey du. Sotey man dey slip wit en papa wife.
And shame nor ivun dey kash una! Una sopoz to feel bad kon driv di pesin wey du dis kaind tin.
I no sey I nor dey der wit una naw, bot I dey wit una for spirit. And I don alredi joj di pesin, jos as I go du if I dey der.
Wen una gada togeda for awa Oga Jisos Kraist name, I dey wit una for spirit and Kraist pawa dey wit una tu.
So mak una giv am to Satan mak e ponish am, so dat en sin go komot for en bodi and Kraist go save am for di last day.
E nor gud mak una dey boast! Una nor no sey, smol yist wey dem put for bread, na-im dey mak di hol bread raiz?
Mak una rimov di old yist, den una go bi laik fresh bread wey nor get yist and dat na wetin una bi. Bikos awa Passova lamb, na Kraist wey dem don alredi sakrifais.
So wen wi dey celebrate Passova, mak wi nor du-am wit di old yist wey bi wikednes and bad bele, bot mak wi du-am wit di fresh bread wey nor get yist, wey bi trut and beta maind.
For di leta wey I first rite giv una, I sey mak una nor mak frend wit bad pipol.
Bot I nor dey tok abaut pipol wey bad, wiked, dey serv juju and get long-trot for dis wold. If to sey na dem I dey tok abaut, den una nid to komot for dis wold.
Bot naw, I dey rite to una sey, pipol wey sey dem bi Kristins and dem dey du bad tins, mak una nor folo dem mak frend. Mak una nor ivun chop wit dat kaind pesin.
Wetin go mak mi joj pipol wey nor dey di shosh? Nor bi doz wey dey insaid wi sopoz to joj?
Na God go joj doz wey dey outsaid, bikos en wod sey, "Mak una driv doz wey dey du wiked tins among una, komot for di shosh."
Wen pesin nor dey agri wit anoda pesin, una dey tak una kase go kourt wer sinas go joj di mata, abi una dey tak am go mit God pipol?
Una nor no sey na God pipol go joj di wold? And if na una go joj di wold, una nor fit setol smol-smol mata among unasef?
Una nor no sey wi go joj angels? Since na so, den wi sopoz to joj di tins wey dey dis wold!
So, na wetin mak us dey tak awa kase go giv joj wey nor no God?
I dey tok laik dis, so dat una go shame! So una nor get wise pesin among una wey fit joj bitwin una wey bi Kristens?
Wetin dey mak una kari unasef go mit joj wey nor no God?
Wen una tak unasef go kourt, dat min sey all of una don lose.
Insted, una dey play wayo among unasef!
Una nor no sey wiked pipol nor go enta God kindom? So mak una nor fool unasef! Pipol wey dey slip wit hu dem nor mari, doz wey dey serv juju, men wey dey slip wit oda men,
tif, long-trot, drunkard, doz wey dey kos pipol and doz wey dey play wayo; non of dem go enta God kindom.
Na so som of una bi bifor, bot naw, God don wosh una klin tru Jisos Kraist name and en Spirit pawa, don mak una klin for en eye.
Som of una sey, "Wi fit du enitin wey wi wont." Bot I dey tel una sey nor bi evritin dey gud for us. So I nor go gri mak enitin kontrol mi.
Una stil dey sey, "Fud dey gud for awa bodi and awa bodi nid fud." Bot I dey tel una, "God go distroi di tu of dem." So mak wi nor yuz awa bodi tak du yeye tins.
God go raiz us from deat wit di same pawa wey E yuz tak raiz Jisos.
Una nor no sey una bodi na part for Kraist bodi? So e dey gud mak wi put awa bodi for ashawo wok? God forbid!
Una nor no sey, pesin wey dey slip enihaw wit oda pipol, don bi part for di pipol bodi?
So enibodi wey join Kraist, don get won spirit wit am.
Mak una run liv ashawo life. Evri oda sin wey man dey komit na for outsaid en bodi, bot di pesin wey dey du ashawo, dey sin against en own bodi.
Abi una nor no sey una bodi na di tempol wer di Holi Spirit dey stay? So, nor bi una get unasef.
God don pay beta prize for una, so mak una onor am wit una bodi.
Naw I go ansa di kweshon wey una ask for una leta. Una ask sey, "E dey gud mak pesin nor mari?"
Bot mak una nor for dey du ashawo, e beta mak una mari.
Mak husban and wife du di rite tin wey dem sopoz du for won anoda.
Nor bi di wife get en own bodi, bot na di husban get am and na so tu di wife get en husban bodi.
Mak una nor refuse ish oda, esept una agri sey una go dey laik dat for somtaim, so dat una go fit pray. Den Satan nor go fit tempt una, bikos una go fit kontrol una bodi.
Na advise I dey giv una, nor bi komand.
Haw I wish sey all of una bi laik mi. Bot di gift wey God giv us nor bi di same.
Dis na di advise wey I go tel di pesin wey neva mari and doz wey dia husban or wife don die; mak una dey as una dey, jos as I bi.
Bot if dem nor fit kontrol demsef, mak dem mari, bikos e beta mak pesin mari, dan mak e dey tink bad tin for en maind.
Na doz wey don mari I won giv dis komand to (Nor bi mi, bot na God): Mak wife nor liv en husban.
Bot if e liv am, mak e nor mari again or mak e go bak go setol wit di man. And mak husban nor liv en wife tu.

Ivun doh I dey tok on my own, I nor tink sey God go tok enitin difren from wetin I dey tel una abaut marage. Di onli tin wey I fit du na to giv una my advise. If yor wife nor dey folo Kraist, bot e sey e go folo yu stay, mak yu nor driv am.
If yor husban nor dey folo Kraist, bot e sey e go folo yu stay, mak yu nor run liv am.
Bikos di husban wey nor biliv, God go save am, bikos of en wife wey biliv and di wife wey nor biliv, God go save am, bikos of en husban wey biliv.
Bot if di won wey nor biliv komot from di marage, mak e bi laik dat. For dis kaind kase, di broda or sista wey biliv, don dey fri; bikos God wont mak wi enjoy peace.
Yu wife! Haw yu tak no sey yu nor go fit save yor husaban? Yu husban! Haw yu tak no sey yu nor go fit save yor wife?
For evri shosh, I dey tel di pipol sey mak dem rimain as dem bi wen Oga Jisos shuz and kol dem to bi en own. Naw, na di same tin I dey tel una so.
If yu don alredi sekonsaiz, mak yu dey laik dat. If dem neva sekonsaiz yu, mak yu nor sekonsaiz.
Weda dem sekonsaiz yu or not, nor min enitin. Wetin dey important, na to obey God law.
So mak una nor trai to shange as una bi wen God shuz una.
If God kol yu wen yu bi slave, mak yu nor let am wori yu. Bot if yu fit get yor fridom, mak yu get-am.
Slave wey God shuz mak e folo Jisos, don bikom fri man tru Jisos Kraist. So fri man wey God shuz mak e folo Jisos, don turn to Kraist savant.
God pay big prize for una. So mak una nor bi slave to eni oda pesin.
Mak una stay as una bi wen God shuz and kol una.
Konsanin pipol wey neva mari bifor, I nor get eni komand from Kraist to giv una, bot I go advise una as pesin wey una fit trust, bikos God dey show mi mesi.
Dis taim wey wi dey nor eazi at-all and wetin I tink bi sey, e go gud mak una stay as una bi naw.
If yu don mari, nor liv yor marage. If yu neva mari, mak yu nor wori yorsef abaut am.
If pesin wey neva mari bifor kon mari, e nor sin. Bot, pipol wey don mari go face plenti wahala and I dey trai to help una, so dat una nor go face dat kaind wahala.
My frends, wetin I min bi sey Kraist go soon kom and e nor mata if yu don mari or not.
If yu dey krai or laff; dey buy somtin or yu nor get moni, all na di same tin.
E nor go mak eni difrens ivun if yu get all di tins for dis wold or sey yu laik di wold wel-wel, bikos as wi no, di wold go soon vanish komot.
And I nor wont mak enitin trobol una. Man wey neva mari, mak e dey du tins wey go mak Kraist hapi for am.
Bot man wey don mari get plenti tins to wori abaut. E go must wori abaut tins for dis wold, bikos e go wont mak bele dey swit en wife,

so e go dey tink abaut difren tins. Wuman wey neva mari dey onli tink of haw to mak bele swit Kraist and dia bodi and maind dey pure. Bot wuman wey don mari dey wori abaut dis wold tins, bikos e wont mak bele swit en husban.
Wetin I dey tok na for una own gud, nor bi to mak una slave. I wont help una to dey liv beta life and to luv Kraist pas eni oda tin.
Bot if yu dey engage and yu nor fit kontrol yorsef, den mak yu go mari. Nor tin dey bad for dat won.
Bot e beta, if yu fit kontrol yor bodi sey yu nor won mari naw.
E dey rite and okay to mari, bot e beta sey yu nor mari at-all.
Wife sopoz to stay wit en husban ontil di man die. Den e fit go mari again, bot di new husban must bi pesin wey dey folo Kraist.
Bot I biliv sey, I dey obey God Spirit wen I sey mak di wuman nor mari, so dat e go dey hapi wel-wel.
For di leta wey una rite, una ask mi abaut juju fud. And all of us no somtin konsanin dis mata. Bot if wetin wi no, dey mak us dey proud, den bikos of luv, wi sopoz help won anoda.
Di man wey tink sey e no som tin, neva stil no as e sopoz no.
Bot God no di pesin wey luv am.
So, ivun if pipol dey offa fud giv juju, all of us no sey di juju dem nor get life, bikos na onli won God dey.
Dem dey kol meni tin for hevun and eart, "gods and mastas," bot non of dem rili bi god or masta.
Bot wi (wey bi Kristen), na onli won God wi get and naim bi awa Papa. Na-im kreate evritin and wi dey liv for am. Na Jisos Kraist bi awa onli Oga. Na-im mak evritin and na tru am wi get life.
Nor bi evribodi no dis tins. Som pipol don grow wit di biliv sey juju dey alaif. So wen dem dey chop meat wey dem giv juju, dem go dey fear.
Bot wi no sey fud nor fit bring us klose to God. Wi nor go lose enitin if wi nor chop or sey wi gain enitin if wi chop.
Bot mak una dey kareful, so dat wik pesin among una nor go fal, bikos una don dey fri to chop enitin.
Bikos if wik pesin si yu wey no di wod dey chop juju fud, e go fit join yu chop di fud wey dem sakrifais giv juju.
Den wetin yu no don distroi pesin wey Kraist die for.
If yu sin against yor brodas or sistas wey nor get strong heart and fate, yu don sin against Kraist.
So, if fud wey I dey chop go wound pesin wey dey folo Kraist, I nor go eva chop meat again, so dat my brodas and sistas nor go sin.
I nor dey fri? I nor bi apostol? Abi I neva si awa Oga Jisos? Nor bi una dey show di wok wey I don du?
If I nor bi apostol to oda pipol, at list I bi apostol to una, bikos na una bi di sign wey show sey I bi Jisos Kraist apostol.
Wen pipol ask mi kweshon, I dey tel dem sey,
mi and Banabas fit chop and drink wetin wi laik,
abi wi nor get rite to mari biliva for Kraist?
Na onli wi must wok bifor wi go chop?
E get eni soja man wey dey pay ensef salari? Abi hu plant vegetabol, nor dey chop for insaid? Or hu dey kip ship nor dey drink from dia milk?
Una tink sey na onli kommon sense I tak dey tok all dis tins? Abi una don forget sey di law tok laik dis tu?
Mosis sey, "Mak una alow anima wey grind korn chop from wetin e dey grind." So, una tink sey na di melu God dey wori for?
No! Na wi God dey tok abaut. Dem rite all dis tins for di law, so dat evribodi wey wok, go fit chop for havest taim.
So if wi don plant spiritual sid among una, e go dey tu mush if wi ask for ordinari fud and drink from una?
If odas dey du laik dis, dat min sey wi ivun get beta rite to du laik dat tu. Bot, wi dey bear evritin, so dat wi nor go kause trobol for Kraist mesage.
Una nor no sey doz wey dey wok for di Tempol dey chop fud wey pipol bring kon giv God for der? Abi una nor no sey pesin wey dey serv for alta na from der e for dey chop?
Na so tu God komand sey, doz wey dey prish di gospol, go chop tru di gospol, wey dem dey prish.
Bot I nor dey yuz all dis rite and I nor dey rite dis tins, so dat pesin go giv mi somtin. E beta mak I die, dan mak enibodi kon mak mi stop to dey tok laik dis.
Bikos if I dey prish di gospol, I nor get eni reason to boast, bikos I nor fit du eni oda tin dan to dey prish di gospol! Na wahala for mi, if I nor prish di gospol!
If I prish bikos I wont prish, dem go pay mi, bot ivun if I nor wont prish, di prishin na wetin God send mi kom du.
Wetin kon bi my gain? Na to prish di gospol witout pay or na to yuz di rite wey I get, bikos I dey prish di gospol?
I nor bi enibodi savant. Bot I don turn savant to evribodi, so dat I go fit win meni pipol for Kraist.
Wen I dey wit Ju pipol, I dey liv laik dem, so dat I go win dem for Kraist. Na Mosis law dem dey folo, bot I nor dey folo dat won. Bot I dey liv as di law tok, so dat I go win souls kom mit Kraist.
And wen I dey wit pipol wey nor dey liv by di law, I nor dey yuz di law for dem, so dat I go fit win dem. Bot dat nor min sey, I go forget God law, bikos na Kraist law dey rule mi.
Wen I dey wit pipol wey get wik fate, I dey liv as dem dey liv, so dat I go fit win dem. I dey du evritin wey I fit du, so dat I go fit win evribodi wey I fit win, kom mit Kraist.
Na di gospol mak mi dey du all dis tins, so dat I go fit share for di blessins.
Una nor no sey, wen pipol dey run, na onli won pesin go win di race and di prize? So mak una run, so dat una go fit win!
Pipol wey dey run, dey train wel-wel, so dat dem go win krawn wey nor dey last, bot wi dey run for krawn wey go last foreva.
So I nor dey run for nor-tin and I nor dey folo briz fite.
Insted, I dey kontrol my bodi kon mak am my slave, so dat afta I don prish di Gud News giv odas, God nor go rejet mi.
My brodas, I wont mak una rimemba wetin hapun to awa papa dem wey folo Mosis. God kloud protet dem as dem dey waka pas di Red Sea.
Na der dem for baptize dem wen dem dey folo Mosis wey bi God savant.
All of dem chop and drink di same spiritual
bread and milk. Dem drink from di spiritual Rock wey folo dem go and dat Rock, na Jisos Kraist.
Bot den, God nor dey hapi wit som of dem, so meni of dem kon die for insaid desert.
Naw, all dis na ezampol for us, so dat wi nor go du bad tins as dem du,
or woship juju laik som of dem. Jos as God wod sey, "Di pipol sidan to chop and drink, den dem kon start to play."
Mak wi nor folo ashawo life laik som of dem, wey mak twenti-tiri tazon pipol die for won day.
So mak wi nor tempt Kraist as som of dem dey du bifor snake kon distroi dem.
Mak una nor komplain as som of dem dey du bifor distroshon angel kon distroi dem.
Dem rite dis tins wey hapun to dem to tish us lesson and na ezampol for doz wey go dey wen di wold go end.
So pesin wey tink sey e stand, mak e tak kare, if not, e go fal.
E nor get enitin wey dey hapun to una naw, wey neva hapun to odas bifor, bot God dey kip en promis and E nor go alow una pas tru wetin una nor go fit bear.
So my brodas, mak una run from bad tins.
I dey tok to pipol wey get sense. Mak una tink abaut wetin I dey tok.
Wen wi drink from di Lord Supa cup, dat min sey wi dey share from Kraist blood. Wen wi chop from di bread wey wi divide, dat min sey wi dey share from Kraist bodi.
Bikos wi dey chop from won bread, all of us don bi won bodi, ivun doh wi meni.
Izrel pipol dey chop juju fud, bot dem stil dey share for Kraist alta.
I nor dey sey juju fud or di won wey dem sakraifais min enitin.
Bot wetin I min bi sey, wetin bad pipol dey sakrifais, na for dimon, nor bi for God.
Yu nor fit drink from God cup and dimon cup for di same taim.
Abi wi dey trai to mak Kraist ves? Wi strong pas God?
Pipol sey, wi fit du evritin. Dat na tru, bot nor bi evritin dey gud. Wi fit du evritin, bot nor bi evritin dey gud for di bodi.
Mak pesin nor dey tink for ensef alone, bot for oda pipol tu.
Mak una maind dey okay as una dey chop eni meat wey dem dey sel for market.
Bikos God wod sey, "Di eart and evritin wey dey insaid, na di Oga own."
If pesin wey nor no God invait yu kom chop for en haus, mak yu chop wetin e giv yu, nor ask kweshon, bikos of wetin dey yor maind.
Bot if di pesin tel yu sey, "Dem sakrifais dis fud giv juju," mak yu nor chop am, bikos of di pesin wey tel yu and en konscience.
I nor min yor konscience, bot di oda pesin own. So bikos of wetin anoda pesin dey tink, I nor go fit du wetin I wont du?
If I tank God for my fud, wetin go mak enibodi fite mi bikos of di fud wey I tank God for?
Bot enitin wey una dey du, weda una dey chop or drink, mak una du-am to onor God.
Liv yor life so dat yu nor go kause trobol for Ju or Greek pipol or for pipol wey dey God shosh.
Mak una dey du as I dey du; bikos I dey always trai to please evribodi insted of mysef, bikos I wont mak God save dem.
Mak una folo mi as I dey folo Kraist.
I dey praiz una, bikos una always dey du di tins wey I tel una,
bot I wont mak una undastand sey as Kraist bi evribodi head, na so tu husban bi head for en haus and na God bi Kraist head.
So eni man wey dey pray or prish God mesage kon kova en head dey woship God, dey disgrace Kraist.
And eni wuman wey dey pray or prish God mesage and e nor kova en head, dey disgrace en head, wey bi en husban; e for beta sey di wuman shave en head.
If di wuman nor won kova en hair, den mak e go shave am.
Man nor nid to kova en head, bikos e dey show as God glori bi. Bot wuman dey show as man glori bi;
bikos God nor kreate di man from wuman, bot E kreate di wuman from man.
God nor kreate man bikos of wuman, bot E kreate wuman, bikos of man.
Bikos of di angels, di wuman must kova en head to show sey na en husban dey protet am.
As wi dey serv Kraist, di wuman and di man, dey togeda for Kraist bodi.
Aldoh God mak wuman from man, bot na wuman dey born evribodi, ivun doh na God kreate evribodi.
Mak una joj by unasef weda e dey gud for wuman to dey prish God wod wen e nor kova en head.
Wetin mak pipol for di wold dey sey, na disgrace for man to kari long hair?
Bot long hair dey mak wuman fine wel-wel. God giv di wuman di long hair, so dat di hair go kova di wuman head.
Dis na haw dem dey du tins for God shosh, so nobodi go fit folo mi kworel for wetin I dey tok.
Di way una dey woship God, dey kause wahala pas di gud wey E dey du for una. Bikos of dis, I nor go fit praiz una.
Bikos I hear sey wen una gada dey woship God for shosh, na so-so kworel una dey kworel and I biliv sey som of wetin I hear, na tru.
Bikos if una nor kworel, wi nor go no di gud wons among una.
Wen una dey togeda, nor bi di Lord Supa una dey chop?
Bot bifor evribodi go rish di mitin, som of una go don start to chop and drink, wen odas dey hungri.
Una nor get haus wey una go for chop and drink? Abi una hate God shosh? Una won disgrace pipol wey nor get enitin to chop? Wetin I go fit tel una naw? I nor go fit praiz una at-all.
I don alredi tel una wetin awa Oga Jisos du for di nite wen dem sel am. And na Kraist tok am by ensef. E tak som bread for en hand
and afta e don tank God, e divide am kon sey, "Dis na my bodi wey I dey giv una. Mak una always dey chop am to rimemba mi."
Afta dem chop finish, Jisos tak di cup kon sey, "Dis na my blood wey God tak mak new kovenant wit una. Mak una always dey drink am to rimemba mi."
Jisos min sey, wen una chop di bread kon drink from di cup, una dey tel odas abaut Kraist deat ontil e go kom bak.
Bikos of dis, enibodi wey chop di bread or drink di wine enihaw wey e laik, dat pesin don sin against Kraist bodi and en blood.
So mak evribodi shek ensef, bifor e chop di bread and drink from di cup.
Bot if una nor undastand sey na una bi Kraist bodi, una don alredi kondem unasef wit di way wey una dey chop and drink from di cup.
Na dis mak meni of una wey nor wel, wik and som among una don ivun die.
Bot if wi joj awasef, God nor go ponish us.
Bot wen God joj and ponish us, E dey du-am, so dat E nor go kondem us wit dis wold.
My brodas and sistas, mak una dey wait for evribodi, bifor una go start to chop di Lord Supa.
Bot if enibodi rili dey hungri, mak e chop kom from en haus. Den wen una dey togeda, una nor go kondem unasef. So wen I kom, I go tel una oda tins wey una sopoz no.
My frends, una bin ask mi abaut spiritual gifts.
I won mak una rimemba sey, bifor una bigin folo Kraist; na juju una dey serv.
Naw, I wont mak una no sey, enibodi wey God Spirit dey lid, go sey, Jisos naim bi Oga and e nor go eva kos am.
Na meni spiritual gifts God dey giv pipol, bot all of dem na from di same Spirit.
And wi get difren ways to serv God
and ish of us dey du difren tins. Bot na di same God dey wok for awa life and E dey help us du evritin.
Ish of us get difren gift wey di Spirit giv us and wi dey yuz am du gud.
Som of us dey fit speak wit wisdom and odas wit knowledge, bot na di same Spirit dey giv us all dis gifts.
To oda pipol, di same Spirit dey giv dem fate or di pawa to heal sik pipol.

Di Spirit dey giv odas di pawa to du mirakol and e mak som pipol profets and som of us dey fit no wen God Spirit dey among us. Odas dey tok wit difren-difren language and som of us go tel una wetin di tins wey dem dey tok min.
Bot na di same Spirit dey du all dis tins and e dey shuz di kaind gift wey e wont giv ish pesin.
Kraist bodi get difren part laik evri oda bodi.
Som of us na Ju and odas na Gentai. Som of us na slave and odas dey fri. Bot God Spirit baptiaz us kon mak us part for Jisos Kraist bodi. Naw, all of us dey drink from dat same Spirit.
Nor bi onli won part awa bodi get, bot dem meni.
If di leg for awa bodi sey, "I nor bi hand, so I nor bi part for di bodi." Nor bi di bodi di leg stil dey?
And if di ear sey, "I nor bi eye, so I nor bi part for di bodi." Nor bi di bodi di ear stil dey?
If to sey di hol bodi na eye, wi nor for fit hear enitin and if to sey all di bodi na ear, wi nor for fit smel enitin.
Bot God don put evri part for awa bodi, jos as E wont am.
If na onli won part dey di bodi, den di bodi nor go bi as e sopoz bi again.
Bot as e bi so, na meni parts dey mak won bodi.
So, di eye nor go fit tel di hand sey, "I nor nid yu" and di head nor go fit tel di leg sey, "I nor nid yu tu."
So, wi nor go fit du enitin wit awa bodi witout di part wey wi feel sey, e dey wik.
Di part wey wi tink sey dey important, wi dey trit dem wit respet and di part wey nor rili dey outsaid, wi dey trit dem wel.
Bot awa bodi nor nid all dis treatment. Bikos na God mak awa bodi, so di part wey wi fit sey nor dey important, dey important wel-wel.
God du-am laik dis, so dat all di parts for di bodi go dey wok togeda and ish part go dey kare for oda part.
If won part dey sofa, di oda parts dey sofa tu. Bot if dem praiz won part, di oda parts go dey hapi.
All of una dey Kraist bodi. And ish of una, na part for di bodi.
So for di shosh, God first shuz apostols, bifor profets and tishas. E stil shuz som wey dey du mirakol, odas wey dey heal sik pipol, som wey bi lidas and odas wey dey tok wit difren-difren language.
Nor bi evribodi bi apostol. Nor bi evribodi bi tisha. Nor bi evribodi fit du mirakol.
Nor bi evribodi fit heal sik pipol. Nor bi evribodi fit tok wetin dis language min.
Bot I wont mak una ask for di gift wey beta pas, so dat I go show una di way wey beta pas all dis tins.
If I dey tok di language wey humanbin and angels dey tok,
if I dey profesai and fit undastand evri sikrit and knowledge or if I get fate wey fit move mountins and I nor luv oda pipol, I go bi nor-tin.
If I giv pipol evritin wey I get kon sey mak dem burn mi alaif, bot I nor luv odas, I nor go gain enitin.
Luv dey kaind and patient, e nor dey jelos or boast
or dey proud. Luv nor get long-trot or dey ves. E nor dey rimemba di bad tins wey odas du.
E nor dey hapi wit wiked pipol, bot e dey hapi wit di trut.
Luv dey bear evritin and e get fate, hope and patient.
Luv nor dey fail and e go dey foreva. Pipol nor go profesai foreva and doz wey dey tok wit difren-difren language, go stop. For dat taim, wi go forget evritin wey wi no.
Naw, wi nor no evritin and awa profesi nor komplit.
Bot won day, wetin dey pafet go kom and wetin nor dey pafet, go vanish.
Wen wi neva no Kraist, wi dey tink and tok laik smol shildren. Bot naw wen wi don no am, wi nor dey du laik smol shildren again.
Evritin wey wi dey si naw bi laik ordinari image for mirror; bot for dat taim, wi go si-am, face to face. Naw wi nor no evritin, bot den wi go no, jos as God rili no us.
And naw wi get fate, hope and luv. Bot di won wey big pas for di tiri, na luv.
Na luv sopoz gaid una. So mak una dey fite to get di gift wey di Holi Spirit dey giv, especiali di gift to profesai.

Bikos if una dey tok wit difren-difren language wey odas nor undastand, God go undastand wetin una dey tok, aldoh no oda pesin go no wetin e min. Tins wey una go dey tok abaut, na onli di Spirit go fit undastand dem.
Bot wen una profesai, pipol go undastand una and odas go help una. Dem go get komfort kon dey okay.
Pesin wey dey tok wit difren language, dey help ensef. Bot di won wey dey profesai, dey help di shosh.

I for laik mak all of una dey tok wit difren language, bot I wont mak una dey profesai. Bikos profesi go du una more gud, dan sey una dey tok wit difren language wey pipol nor fit undastand, unles sombodi esplain di minin giv di pipol for di shosh.

My brodas and sistas, wetin una go gain if wen I kom, I dey tok wit difren language wey una nor undastand and I nor esplain am? Haw I go fit help una den, unles I tel una wetin God tel mi or mak una no wetin dem profesai and tish?
If all muzik instrument get di same sound, haw una go tak no di won wey bi trumpet or harp?
If trumpet mak sound wey pipol nor undastand, hu go dey redi to go fite war?
Na so e bi wen una dey tok wit difren-difren language wey pipol nor undastand. If nobodi fit undastand wetin una dey tok abaut, dat min sey na briz una dey folo tok.
Dis wold get difren language and all of dem dey mak sense.
Bot if odas nor undastand wetin una tok, den dem go bi laik stranjas to una.
Na so e bi wit una tu. If una rili wont di gift wey di Spirit dey giv, mak una shuz di won wey di shosh go gain from.
So wen wi tok wit difren-difren language wey odas nor undastand, mak wi pray mak God giv us di pawa to esplain wetin e min.
For ezampol, if I pray wit language wey nobodi undastand, my spirit dey pray, bot my maind nor undastand di tins wey I dey pray for.
So wetin I go du? Bikos e get taim wey I go pray wit my spirit and taim wey I sopoz pray wit my maind. Somtaims, I sopoz sing wit my spirit and oda taim, I go sing wit my maind.
If som stranjas dey for wer una for dey woship God for spirit and dem nor undastand una, haw dem go tak no wen to sey, "Amen"?
Una fit rili dey woship God wel-wel, bot nobodi go gain from am, bikos dem nor undastand wetin una dey tok.
I tank God sey I dey tok wit difren-difren language pas all of una.
Bot wen I dey shosh, e beta mak I speak faiv beta wods to tish odas, dan to speak ten tazon wods wey pipol nor undastand.
My brodas and sistas, mak una stop to tink laik smol shildren. Insted mak una dey tink laik mature pipol and inosent laik pikin wey dem jos born.
God wod sey: "I go yuz stranjas wey dey speak wetin odas nor undastand, tak tok to my pipol. Dem go tok to dem wit stranj language, bot my pipol nor go listin to mi."
So, language wey odas nor undastand, fit min somtin to pipol wey nor biliv, bot nor bi to pipol wey biliv.
So if di hol shosh bigin tok wit difren-difren language, den som pipol wey bi unbilivas or doz wey nor undastand kon waka enta di shosh, dem nor go tink sey all of una don dey krase?
Bot if evribodi dey profesai and unbilivas or pipol wi nor undastand enta di shosh, dem go no sey dem bi sinas and dem go won turn kom mit God, bikos of wetin una dey tok.
Den God go tel una di sikrit wey dey dia heart. Den dem go nil dan kon tel God sey, "Wi don rili biliv sey Yu dey wit dis pipol."
My frends, wen una gada to woship, una must du evritin to help won anoda. Na so e sopoz bi wen sombodi dey tish, sing, profesai, tok wit difren-difren language or dey esplain wetin di pesin tok.

Wen una dey togeda, mak e nor pas tu or tiri pipol wey go tok wit difren-difren language wey pipol nor undastand. Won pesin go tok, bifor anoda and mak pesin dey, wey go esplain giv odas wetin di pesin dey tok.
If nobodi dey wey go fit esplain wetin yu dey tok, mak yu nor tok at-all for di mitin, bot yu fit tok am bitwin yu and God.
Tu or tiri pesin fit profesai and evri oda pesin must listin wel-wel.
And if won among di pipol wey sidan risiv mesage from God, di pesin wey dey tish must stop mak di pesin for tok.
Mak di pipol nor tok at once, so dat all of una go learn somtin and una go dey okay.
Pesin wey bi profet must dey redi to stop, so dat anoda pesin go tok, bikos profet sopoz to fit kontrol en own spirit,
bikos God wont mak dem du evritin wel. Wen God pipol mit for shosh,
mak wimen nor dey tok. Mak dem kwayet dey listin, jos as Mosis law tish.
If dem won no abaut somtin, dem fit ask dia husban wen dem rish haus. Bikos na disgrace for wuman to tok for shosh.
God mesage nor start wit una and nor bi onli una don hear am.
If una dey tink of unasef as profet or pesin wey di Spirit dey yuz, den una go no sey I dey rite onli di tins wey God komand mi.
So mak una nor listin to enibodi wey nor biliv wetin I dey rite.
My frends, mak una dey trai to profesai and mak una nor stop enibodi wey dey tok wit difren-difren language ivun doh odas nor undastand wetin e dey tok.
Bot mak una dey du tins as e sopoz to bi.
My brodas and sistas, I wont mak una rimemba di gospol wey I prish giv una,
di won wey una asept and dey stand on. Na dis gospol go save una, if una hol di mesage wey I prish giv una wel-wel, unles una biliv nor strong.
Bikos na wetin I risiv, naim bi di first important tin wey I giv una; sey Kraist die for awa sins as dem rite for God wod
and dem bere am, den God raiz-am up afta tiri days as dem rite for God wod.
Kraist apier to Pita, den to di twef apostols.
Den e apier to more dan faiv ondred bilivas. Som of dem stil dey alaif, bot som don die.
Den e apier to James, den to all di apostols.
Finali, e apier to mi; ivun doh I bi laik pikin wey dem born last.
Na mi smol pas among di apostols. Bot, I kause meni wahala for God shosh, so dem nor sopoz kol mi apostol.
Bot God kaind! I bi wetin I bi and God mesi for mi, nor bi yeye tin. I dey wok pas eni oda apostol; aldoh na God grace dey help mi.
Bot e nor min enitin if I prish or dem prish, as long as all of una biliv di mesage wey wi dey prish.
Naw, if wi dey prish sey God raiz Jisos from deat, wetin mak som of una dey sey resureshon nor dey?
If resureshon nor dey, dat min sey Kraist nor raiz-up from grave.
And if Kraist nor raiz-up, den awa prishin and una fate nor min enitin.
So, if resureshon nor dey, dat min sey, evritin wey wi don tok abaut God, na lai, bikos wi sey E raiz Jisos from deat wen E nor raiz-am.
If resureshon nor dey, na-im bi sey Kraist nor raiz-up from deat.
If God nor raiz Kraist from grave, den una fate dey yuzles and una stil dey insaid una sin.
And doz wey biliv Kraist bifor dem die, don loss bi dat.
Bikos if na onli for dis life wi get hope for Kraist, den awa kase wos pas eni oda pesin own for dis wold.
Bot God don raiz Kraist from deat! And E mak us dey sure sey, oda pipol go raiz-up from deat tu.
Jos as pipol go die bikos of Adam, na so tu wi go raiz-up kom life, bikos of Kraist.
Adam bring deat kom mit all of us, bot Kraist bring life kom.
Bot all of us must wait for awa turn. Na Kraist God first raiz kom life and Kraist go raiz en pipol wen e kom bak.
Den afta Kraist don distroi all pawas, di wold go end and e go giv di kindom to God wey bi di Papa.
Kraist go rule ontil e don put all en enemis unda en pawa
and di last enemi wey e go distroi, na deat.
Wen God wod sey, e go put evritin unda en pawa, e nor min sey, God dey among dem. Bikos na God put evritin unda Jisos Kraist pawa.
And wen evritin don dey unda God pikin pawa, e go kon put ensef unda God wey put evritin unda en pikin pawa. Den God go kon bi evritin to evribodi.
If resureshon nor dey, wetin mak dem dey baptaiz pipol for kraist?
And wetin mak us dey risk awa life
kon dey face deat evriday? Na di pride wey I get for una, bikos of awa Oga Jisos Kraist, naim mak mi dey tok all dis tins.
If resureshon nor dey, wetin kon bi my gain, afta I don fite wiked anima for Efisos? Na bikos of pride mak mi du-am? If na so, e go gud mak wi dey chop and drink bikos tumoro wi go die.
Mak una nor let enibodi disiv una, "Bad frends dey spoil gud karata."
Mak una get sense and stop to dey komit sin. I stil dey sopraiz sey som of una nor no God.
Som of una dey ask sey, "Haw pipol wey don die go tak kom dis wold bak? Wish kaind bodi dem go get?
Una bi fool! Wetin pesin plant nor dey grow, unles di sid first die.
Wetin una plant, na ordinari sid, bot na di ful plant dey grow kom out.
Dis na bikos God dey giv dem di kaind bodi wey E wont mak di plant get.
Pipol, animas, birds and fish, na flesh God tak mak all of dem, bot all of dem get difren flesh.
As evritin for hevun get bodi, na so tu evritin for dis eart get bodi. Bot won bodi difren from di oda wons.
Di sun nor bi laik di moon; di moon nor bi laik di star and di stars difren from ish oda.
Na so e go bi afta wi don raiz-up from deat. Dis bodi wey wi get naw, go die, bot di bodi wey wi go tak raiz from deat, go dey foreva.
Dis awa bodi wey nor fine, dey wik and go rotin, go kon fine, strong and go dey foreva.
As fisica bodi dey, na so tu spiritual bodi dey. And awa fisica bodi go shange to spiritual bodi.
Di first man na Adam and God wod sey, "Dis Adam na pesin wey God kreate laik us." Bot Jisos, wey bi di last Adam, na pesin wey dey giv life to pipol."
Wi si sey di won wey get spiritual bodi nor first kom. E kom afta di won wey get fisica bodi.
Na sand God tak mak di first man, bot di sekon man kom from hevun.
Evribodi bodi for eart, bi laik di first man and evribodi bodi for hevun, bi laik di sekon man own.
Jos as wi bi laik di first man wey kom from eart, wi go bi laik di sekon man wey kom from hevun.
My frends, I wont mak una no sey awa bodi wey get blood go rotin. Dat min sey dis kaind bodi, nor go fit enta God kindom wey go dey foreva.
I won tel una won big sikrit: Nor bi all of us go die, bot all of us go shange.
Bifor wi klose awa eye opun am, e go don hapun. As dem dey blow di last trumpet, all doz wey don die go raiz. All of us go shange, so dat wi nor go die again.
Awa bodi wey don die and rotin go kon shange to bodi wey nor go eva die or rotin.
Di bodi wey wi get naw, dey wik and e go die. Bot God go shange am to bodi wey go dey foreva. So wetin dem rite for God wod go kon hapun sey, "Deat nor fit win di fite!
"Yu deat! Wer yor pawa? Yu deat! Haw yu go tak shaut sey yu win?"
Na sin dey mak deat win and na di law dey kause sin.
So, mak wi tank God wey giv us victori tru awa Oga Jisos Kraist.
So my frends, mak una dey strong and nor let enitin shake una. Mak una always dey du God wok, bikos una no sey, evritin wey una du for God, get gain.
Wen una kolet moni from God pipol, I wont mak una du as I tel di pipol wey dey di shosh for Galatia sey mak dem du.
Evri Sunday, mak ish pesin dey kip som moni for kona from di won wey e don wok, as God help am rish, so dat una nor go nid to kolet moni wen I kom.
Wen I kom, I go send pipol wey una shuz kon giv dem leta as dem dey kari una gifts go Jerusalem.
Bot if una sey mak I go tu, den, dem go folo mi go.
And afta I don finish for Masidonia, I hope to kom si
and stay wit una for somtaim. May-bi I fit stay til dry season finish, so dat una go fit help mi for eniwer wey I won go.
If God go let mi, I nor go won bransh si una for smol taim naw, bikos I go laik kom lata, so dat I go fit spend more taim wit una.
Bot I go stay for Efisos ontil Pentecost go finish,
bikos plenti wok dey wait for mi for der, ivun doh di shalenge strong wel-wel.
Wen Timoti kom, mak una nor mak am fear at-all, bikos na God wok wey I dey du, naim e dey du tu.
So mak evribodi respet am, den mak una send am kom mit mi wit peace, bikos I dey espet am wit di oda brodas.
I don trai wel-wel mak Apollos for fit folo oda bilivas kom visit una, e nor won kom naw, bot e go kom lata.
Mak una shine una eye and dey strong for fate and stand wit boldnes.
For evritin wey una dey du, mak una dey show luv.
Una no sey na Stefanas and en famili first biliv God for Akaya. Dem don du evritin wey dem fit du for God pipol. My frends, I wont mak una
dey obey dis lidas and doz wey dey folo una du God wok.
I dey hapi sey Stefanas, Fortunatus and Akaicus don kom; dem kom represent una
and dem don let bele swit mi, jos as dem mak bele swit una. E gud mak wi dey tok abaut pipol laik dem.
Pipol for di shosh wey dey Asia aria dey grit una; Akwila and Prisila wit di shosh pipol wey dey mit for dia haus, dey grit una tu.
All di brodas sey mak I grit una.
Na mi Pol, rite dis leta wit my own hand.
Enibodi wey nor luv Kraist, kos dey en head!
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una.
Mak my luv for Jisos Kraist, dey wit all of una tu.
Pol, wey bi Jisos Kraist apostol, bikos na so God wont am, naim and Timoti awa broda, rite dis leta go giv God pipol for di shosh wey dey Korint and to all di gud brodas for Akaya.
Mak God awa Papa and Oga Jisos Kraist giv una grace and peace.
Mak wi tank God wey bi awa Oga Jisos Kraist Papa, di God wey dey giv mesi and komfort,
E dey help us wen wi dey trobol, so dat wi go fit help odas tru di help wey E help us.
Jos as wi sofa wit Kraist, na so tu wi go get help from God tru Kraist.
If wi sofa, na for una gud and savashon; if wi dey okay, den una go fit bear di kaind sofa wey wi bear.
So, wi get hope abaut una, bikos wi no sey as una dey folo us sofa, na so una go stil folo us get komfort.
My brodas and sistas, wi wont mak una no abaut di wahala wey wi face for Asia aria. Di trobol wey wi face, heavi wel-wel and life kon taya us.
Tru-tru, wi tink sey wi go die. Bot dis hapun so dat wi nor go jos trust awasef, bot wi go trust God wey dey wak pipol from deat.
E save us from deat and E go diliva us. Wi don put awa hope for en hand sey E go diliva us again.
As una don join dey pray for us, na so tu God go ansa all di meni prayas wey una dey pray for us, den E go bless us and meni pipol go kon tank am, bikos of wetin E dey du for us.
Wi dey hapi, bikos wi no sey di way wi dey liv awa life for dis wold and haw wi dey bihav wit una, dey show sey na God send us tru en pawa, nor bi humanbin own.
Bikos evritin wey I rite, na wetin una go fit read and undastand. Bot I hope sey una go undastand am wel,
jos as una don undastand us rish and na wi mak una dey proud and na una go mak us proud tu, for di day wey Jisos go kom.
Na wit dis maind I bi won kom mit una bifor, so dat wi go bless una again.
Bikos I plan to visit una wen I dey go Masidonia and wen I dey kom bak, so dat una go help mi wen I dey travol go Judea.
So, wen I dey plan dis tins, I nor tink bifor I du-am? Wen I dey plan, I dey plan bikos of wetin I wont? Or na bikos I redi to sey, "Yes, yes" or "No, no" at wons?
Bot as God dey fateful, wetin wi dey prish giv una nor bi mak e for bi jos "Yes" or " No."
Bikos God Pikin, Jisos Kraist, di Won wey mi, Silvanus and Timoti dey prish giv una, nor bi "Yes" and "No". Bot from biginin, na Jisos bi God "Yes".
And evritin wey God promis us, na "Yes" tru Jisos Kraist. Dat na why awa "Amen" tru Jisos Kraist dey giv God glori.
Na God mak wi and una dey sure sey wi dey insaid Kraist. Na God shuz us from odas
and E don mark us as en own kon put en Spirit for awa heart, so dat wi go dey sure of all di oda tins wey E sey E go giv us.
Na God bi my witnes, bikos E no my heart! Na bikos I nor won disturb una naim mak mi nor go Korint again.
Wi nor dey trai to fos una to biliv us; wi no sey una fate strong wel-wel. Bot wi dey wok wit una so dat una go dey hapi wel-wel.
So I sey I nor go kom visit una, so dat una nor go ves again.
Bikos if I mak una ves, hu go mak mi dey hapi apart from una wey dey ves for mi?
Na dis mak mi rite dis tin giv una, so dat wen I kom, I nor go kon dey ves for di pipol wey sopoz mak mi hapi, bikos I no sey if I dey hapi, una go dey hapi tu.
Na pain for my heart I tak rite dis leta giv una, nor bi to mak una ves, bot na to let una no di kaind luv wey I get for una.
Naw if enibodi don mak pesin ves, nor bi onli mi e mak ves, bot na all of una.(I dey tok laik dis bikos I nor won tu ves for di pesin).
Di way wey una ponish dis pesin, don rish.
So mak una forgiv and help am, so dat e nor go luz hope and life nor go taya am.
So mak una let am no sey una rili luv am.
I rite dis leta giv una, so dat I go no weda una dey obey wetin I tel una.
Wen una forgiv pesin for wetin e du, misef go forgiv am. Bikos wen I forgiv (if I rili nid to forgiv), I du-am for Kraist present, bikos of una,
so dat Satan nor go disiv us, bikos wi no en wayo.
Wen I go prish di Gud News for Troas, ivun doh Kraist opun door for mi,
my maind nor res, bikos I nor si awa broda, Titus, for der. So I liv der kon go Masidonia.
Bot mak wi tank God wey mak us winnas insaid Kraist. Bikos tru us, meni pipol don no tins abaut Kraist, laik beta perfume wey dey smel for evriwer.
Bikos wi bi laik swit insent wey Kraist offa giv God wey dey spread among doz wey dey save and doz wey don lost.
To doz wey don lost, e bi laik somtin wey dey kil; bot for doz wey Kraist don save, e bi laik smel wey dey giv life. So, hu go fit handol all dis tins?
Wi nor bi laik odas wey dey du God wod laik sey na som tin wey dem fit sel; bot bikos na God sent us kom, wi dey tok di trut for en present, as Kraist savant.
Wi don dey boast abaut awasef again? Wi nor nid una to rite sey, wi dey gud, ivun doh odas dey wont am laik dat!
Na una bi di leta wey Kraist rite for awa heart, wey evribodi no and dey read.
E klear sey na Kraist rite dis leta by ensef kon send am tru us. Nor bi ink dem tak rite am, bot di God wey dey alaif, naim Spirit dem tak rite am, nor bi for paper, bot na for awa heart.
Wi get dis kaind maind for God, bikos of Jisos Kraist.
Wi nor dey sey wi go fit du all dis tins by awasef, bot na God giv us di pawa wey wi tak du dem.
Na God mak us fit du dem, so dat wi go serv di new kovenant; dis nor bi di law wey dem rite, bot na di won wey konsan God Spirit, bikos di law wey dem rite dey bring deat, bot di Spirit dey giv life.
Di ministri wey dem rite for slate bring deat kom and di glori wey folo am, nor let Izrel pipol fit luk Mosis face. If di glori wey dey Mosis face, fade bikos e dey unda di law,
den haw di Spirit ministri wey get glori, go kon bi, since e nor dey fade?
Bikos if glori dey for di law wey mak God kondem pipol, den di Spirit glori wey dey giv life, na haw E go beta rish?
Wetin get glori naw, nor get glori again, bikos di glori wey di Spirit wey dey kom afta am get, big wel-wel.
If Mosis face get glori, den haw di glori wey dey di Pesin face wey nor dey die, go bi?
Na dis hope wi get, naim dey mak us tok witout fear.
Wi nor bi laik Mosis wey tak klot kova en face, so dat Izrel pipol nor go si di glori wey go fade komot.
Bot dia maind dey klose. And til today, dia maind stil blok wen dem dey read di old kovenant. Dem neva rimov am, bikos na for onli Kraist bodi, dem go fit tak rimov am.
So til today, enitaim wey dem read wetin Mosis rite, somtin dey kova dia maind,
bot wen pesin turn kom mit God, dat tin go komot from en life.
Na God bi di Spirit and eniwer en Spirit dey, pipol go dey fri.
All of us wey don biliv Kraist, God glori dey show for awa face. So di Spirit dey help us shange, so dat wi go bi laik Kraist.
So as wi get dis ministri, jos as God don show us mesi, awa hope don strong wel-wel.

Bot wi don stop to dey du wiked tins wey pipol dey hide dey du; wi nor dey du wayo or lai join God wod, bot wit trut wey evribodi fit si, wi dey mak evribodi no for dia maind sey, wetin wi dey du, dey gud for God eye.
Bot ivun if dem yuz klot tak kova di gospol wey wi dey prish, doz wey don lost, na onli dem nor go si-am,
bikos doz wey nor biliv, di gods for dis taim don blind dia maind, so dem nor go si lite wey dey dis gospol wey get glori and dis gospol na Kraist wey bi God image.
Wi nor dey tok abaut awasef, bot wi dey prish sey, na Jisos Kraist bi Oga and wi bi una slave, bikos of am.
Bikos God wey sey, "Mak lite shine from daknes," Na-im dey shine insaid awa heart, so dat E go giv us di lite wey show us en glori wey dey Kraist face.
Bot dis beta tin wey God giv us, wi dey kari am for insaid awa bodi wey dey die laik clay pot wey dey break and na God giv us di pawa.
Wi dey face wahala for difren kona, bot awa bodi nor skata; wi dey konfuz somtaim, bot wi nor dey luz hope,
pipol dey ponish us, bot God nor let us die; dem dey nak us for groun, bot dem nor fit distroi us.
As wi dey waka, wi kari Kraist deat for awa bodi, so dat pipol go si Jisos life for awa bodi tu.
As wi dey alaif, dem always dey won kil us bikos of Jisos Kraist, so dat dem go si Jisos life for awa ordinari bodi.
Bikos of dis, deat dey wok insaid us, bot life dey wok insaid una.
Bot as e bi sey wi get di same spirit wey dey giv fate, jos as dem rite sey, "I biliv; naim mak mi dey tok." Derfor wi sef biliv, naim mak us dey tok tu.
Wi du laik dis, bikos wi no sey di Pesin wey raiz-up Jisos, go stil raiz us up wit Jisos and E go tak wi and una enta en kindom.
All dis tins na for una gud, so dat God grace wey dey rish meni pipol evriday, go mak pipol dey tank God more-more and all di glori go bi en own.
So, mak wi nor luz hope, bikos ivun if awa bodi dey die go smol-smol, di Pesin wey dey insaid us, dey fresh evriday.
Bikos di smol trobol wey wi dey face naw, go bring glori wey big wel-wel, wey go last foreva and wey beta pas enitin for dis wold.
Wi nor dey luk for wetin eye fit si, bot na wetin eye nor fit si. Bikos wetin eye fit si nor go last, bot di tins wey eye nor fit si, dey last foreva.
Wi no sey if dis awa haus for eart, wey bi awa bodi skata, God get di won wey wi go stay, wey e bi sey nor bi humanbin hand build am and e go last foreva for hevun.
Bikos for dis awa haus for eart, wi dey strogol, bikos wi nor fit wait to wear awa new bodi for hevun.
Afta wi don wear awa new bodi for hevun, wi nor go dey naked again.
Wi dey strogol as wi dey dis awa bodi. Wi dey kari heavi load, bikos wi nor won rimov di klot wey bi awa bodi, bot wi won wear hevun own join am, so dat life go swalow dis awa bodi wey fit die.
Naw, di Pesin wey priper us for dis tins, na God wey giv us di Spirit, so dat wi go dey sure of all di oda tins wey E get for us.
So, wi dey always get maind and wi no sey, as long as wi dey alaif for dis eart, wi nor dey wer God dey,
bikos wi dey liv awa life wit fate, nor bi wit wetin wi dey si.
So wi dey always get di maind sey wi go die komot from dis wold, so dat wi go-go stay wit Jisos Kraist for wer e dey.
So, weda wi dey alaif or wi don die, wi dey du evritin wey wi fit du to mak Kraist hapi.
Bikos all of us must stand for Kraist front and e go joj us akordin to di tins wey wi du wen wi dey dis eart; weda dem gud or bad.
So, bikos wi no wetin e min to fear God, naim mak us dey prish and beg pipol. Bot God no us wel-wel and I hope sey una no us wel-wel for una maind tu.
Wi nor dey trai to tok mak una for sey wi dey gud, bot wi dey giv una shanse to boast, so dat una go fit ansa pipol wey dey boast wit wetin eye fit si, bot nor bi wetin dey dia maind.
If wi dey krase, na bikos of God; bot if wi nor dey krase, na bikos of una.
Bikos na Kraist luv dey kontrol us since wi no sey, Kraist die for evribodi; so evribodi don die.
And e die for evribodi, so dat evribodi wey dey liv nor go liv for diasef again, bot for di Pesin wey die and wak-up afta tiri days.
So naw, wi nor dey luk enibodi laik odinari humanbin. Ivun doh wi bin no Kraist laik dat bifor, wi nor no am laik dat again.
So, if eni man dey insaid Kraist, e don dey new, Kraist don klin di bad tins wey e du bifor and evritin don turn to new won!
All dis tins dey kom from God wey mak us en frends bikos of Kraist and E stil giv us di ministri wey go mak pipol bi en frend.
So, bikos of Kraist, God dey turn di wold from en enimi, to en frend. E nor dey kount pipol sins against dem and E don giv us di mesage wey go mak pipol bi en frend.
Wi dey represent Kraist, so dat God go tok to una, tru us. Wi dey beg una bikos of Kraist sey, "Mak una shange kon bi God frend!"
Di Won wey nor dey sin, God mak am awa sin, so dat insaid am, wi go kon dey gud for God eye.
Naw, bikos wi bi felow wokas, wi dey beg una mak una nor waste God grace wey una don risiv.
Bikos E sey, "I hear una for di rite taim and wen di day for Mi to save una rish, I help una." Si, na di rite taim bi dis; na naw bi di day for salvashon!
Wi nor dey du enitin wey go mak enibodi ves, so dat nobodi go si eni fault for awa wok.
Bot wi dey show sey wi bi God savant for evritin wey wi dey du. Wi dey sofa wel-wel and face trobol for dis taim; ivun for wiked taims;
for di taim wey dem dey beat us and put us for prizin; for di taim wey dem dey fite; for wahala taim; for nite wey wi nor fit slip and for hungri taim.
Wi dey du all dis tins wit awa klin life, di tins wey wi no; di patient wey wi get; di gud wey wi dey du for pipol; di Holi Spirit wey wi get; beta luv wey wi show pipol;
tru di wod wey wi dey tish wit God pawa; wit wetin wi tak dey difend awa raitiousnes both for awa rite and left hand;
for di taim wey dem onor or disgrace us; for di taim wen dem tok bad abaut us or praiz us; di taim wey dem du us laik sey wi dey tok lai, bot wi dey tok trut.
Dat taim, e bi laik sey nobodi no us, bot evribodi no us; e bi laik sey wi dey die, bot wi dey alaif; wi stil dey alaif laik pipol wey dem dey ponish, bot dem nor fit kil us;
wi dey laik sey wi dey ves, bot wi dey always hapi; wi bi laik poor pipol, bot wi dey mak meni pipol rish; wi bi laik hu nor get enitin, bot wi get evritin.
So, una wey bi Korint pipol, wi don opun awa heart tel una evritin.
Wi nor dey hol awa luv from una, bot na una dey hol una luv from us.
So mak wi mak am equal. I dey tok to una laik sey una bi my shildren, so mak una opun una heart for us tu.
Mak una nor mak frend wit pipol wey nor biliv, bikos, na wish kaind frend raitiousnes and bad tin won bi, or na wetin lite and daknes get togeda?
And na wish kaind agriment Kraist and devol get? Wetin konsan pesin wey biliv and pesin wey nor biliv?
Wish kaind biznes God tempol and juju get? Bikos wi bi God tempol, jos as God sey, "I go stay insaid dem and waka among dem, den, I go bi dia God and dem go bi my pipol."
Kraist stil sey, "Mak una kom out and seprate unasef from dem," and "Mak una nor tosh enitin wey nor dey klin, den I go welkom una
kon bi una Papa and una go bi my shildren." Na so God wey get all di pawa, tok.
So, as God don promis us all dis tins, mak wi wosh awasef komot from evritin wey go fit mak awa bodi or awa soul dirti, so dat wi go dey holi as wi dey respet God.
Mak una alow di gospol enta una heart bikos wi nor du bad to enibodi or fal enibodi biznes or play enibodi wayo.
I nor dey tok dis won to kondem una, bikos I don tel una bifor sey, una dey awa maind and wi wit una go die and liv togeda wit Kraist.
For insaid all dis sofa wey wi dey sofa, I stil trust and dey boast wel-wel abaut una, bikos I get maind for una and my hapines ful dey trowey.
Ivun wen wi enta Masidonia, wi nor res at-all, bot dem trobol us from difren kona; wahala for outsaid, fear for insaid.
Bot God wey dey help pipol wey nor hapi, naim kon help us wen Titus kom.
Wi kon dey hapi, nor bi onli sey Titus kom, bot bikos of di advise wey una giv am, bikos e tel us haw una won si mi; haw una dey ves and wori for mi and my hapines kon pas as e bi bifor.
Bikos ivun if I mak una ves wit my leta, e nor pain mi sey I rite am (ivun doh e pain mi as I no sey e mak una ves, aldoh una vesnashon nor tey).

Naw I dey hapi, nor bi bikos una dey ves, bot bikos una vesnashon mak una turn from sin kom mit God. Na so God plan una vesnashon, so dat bad tins nor go hapun to una bikos of dis vesnashon wey wi kause for una.
Bikos wen God mak pipol sori for di sin wey dem komit, dem go turn kom mit am, den God go save dem and dem nor go rigret again. Bot di vesnashon wey dis wold dey bring, na deat dey end am.

Naw, mak una si wetin dis vesnashon wey God plan don du for una: si haw una wok for God bi naw; si haw una won show sey una hand klin; si as una dey ves bikos of di bad tin wey hapun; si haw una dey sopraiz; si as una dey won si and wori abaut us; si haw una redi to ponish enibodi wey du bad! For evritin, una don show sey una hand klin for dis mata.
I nor rite dis leta giv una bikos of di pesin wey du bad or di pesin wey dem du di bad to, bot na to show una haw una won wok for God bikos of us.
So, Kraist don mak awa maind strong. Ivun as awa heart don strong rish, wi dey hapi more-more, bikos of Titus wey kom, bikos all of una don let en maind res.
I don boast gi-am abaut una and una nor let mi shame, bot as evritin wey wi tel una na tru, na so all di boast wey wi boast abaut una giv Titus, na trut tu.
And wen e rimemba haw una obey and welkom am wit respet and fear, di luv wey e get for una, kon strong wel-wel.
Evritin dey mak mi hapi, bikos di trust wey I trust una, nor dey shake.
Awa brodas and sistas, wi don tel una abaut di grace wey God giv di pipol for di shosh for Masidonia sey,
ivun wen dia sofa strong wel-wel; dem stil dey hapi and wen dem nor get moni at-all; dem stil dey fine moni giv us.
I bi witnes sey dem dey giv akordin to wetin dem get. Somtaims, dem dey giv pas wetin dem get. Nobodi dey fos dem to du laik dat, bot dem dey du-am from dia own maind
and dem dey beg us mak wi let dem du-am, so dat dem go get di blessin wey dey folo pipol wey dey giv.
Dem dey du laik dis, nor bi onli as wi wont am, bot na bikos dem don first giv demsef to God, den dem kon giv demsef to us as God wont am.
Naim mak us beg Titus sey, as e don start, e gud mak e finish dis gud wok wey e dey du, bikos e luv una.
Bot as una dey du wel for evritin: for fate; for tok; for wetin una no and as una won du di wok wel, bikos una luv us, mak una mak sure sey una dey du dis gud wit all una heart.
Nor bi sey I dey komand una, bot I won si weda una luv na ril won laik di oda pipol own.
Una no di grace wey awa Oga Jisos Kraist get; ivun doh e dey rish, e kon turn poor man bikos of una, so dat tru en porvati, una go dey rish.
Na wetin I tink for di mata bi dis: Una start wel last year for haw una dey giv and haw una dey wont giv,
so e beta mak una jos finish wetin una start, so dat di way wey una tak start am, na so tu una go stil tak finish am as una pawa rish.
Bikos if e rili dey una maind to du-am, enitin wey una giv akordin to wetin una get, God go asept am, bot nor bi wetin una nor get.
I nor dey tok dis won, so dat wen una don giv oda pipol, dem go kon get and una go kon dey sofa, bot na to mak sure sey tins dey equal.
As tins bi naw, di moni wey una get go help dem as dem nor get, so dat won day, di moni wey dem go get go stil help una wen una nor get, dat taim evritin go kon dey equal, bikos
dem rite for God wod sey: "Di pesin wey gada plenti, nor go get plenti and di pesin wey gada smol, go get di won wey go rish am."
Wi tank God wey giv Titus di kaind maind wey I get to help una.
Bikos e nor onli gri for wetin wi ask am, bot e dey help una wel-wel and nobodi fos am kom mit una.
And di broda wey all di shosh dem dey praiz, bikos of haw e dey prish di gospol, wi dey send am folo Titus tu.
Bikos of di wok wey di broda dey du, di shosh don shuz am as di pesin wey go dey folo us travol as wi dey giv dis gud gift, so dat all di glori go bi God own and dis go show sey wi dey redi to help.
Wi dey du laik dis, so dat nobodi go komplain as wi dey share dis gift.
Bikos wi dey trai to du wetin dey rite, nor bi onli for God eye, bot for pipol eye tu.
So wi dey send awa broda folo dem; awa broda wey wi don test plenti taims kon si sey e get di maind to help and e redi to help naw, bikos e trust una wel-wel.

Bot for Titus, en na my patina and e dey folo mi wok to help una. As for di oda brodas wey dey folo am, na all di shosh sey mak dem kom mit una, so dat dem go tel una abaut di glori wey dey insaid Kraist.
So mak una show dem sey, una luv dem, so dat all di pipol for di shosh go no sey, di way wey wi dey boast abaut una, na tru.
I nor nid to rite to una abaut haw to help God pipol wey dey Jerusalem,

bikos I no sey una won help dem. I always dey boast giv Masidonia pipol sey, una wey dey Akaya, dey always won help and una don redi to giv moni since last year. And di way wey una dey won help, don mak som of dem won help tu.
Bot I dey send dis brodas kom mit una to mak sure sey una dey redi; as I don tel dem bifor sey, una don alredi kolet moni. So mak una nor let shame kash mi, as I dey boast abaut una.
Bot if enibodi for Masidonia folo mi kom mit una, den e si sey una neva redi to giv, shame go kash us, ( I nor go tok tu mush) bikos wi trust una.
Naim mak mi beg dis brodas mak dem go for my front bifor di taim go rish and mak dem help una arange di moni wey una promis, so dat una go du-am wit una maind and nobodi go fos una.
Na wetin I dey tok bi dis; Pesin wey plant smol, go havest smol, bot di pesin wey plant plenti, go havest plenti.
Mak ish of una giv as e plan for en maind; nor bi wit rigret or laik sey dem fos am, bikos God luv pesin wey dey giv wit hapines.
God go provide evritin wey una nid. Den, una go always get evritin wey una nid and di won wey una go fit giv odas.
Jos as dem rite for God wod, "E don skata for evriwer, e don giv to poor pipol and en raitiousnes, go dey foreva."
Bikos na God dey giv sid to farma and provide bread wey pipol go chop. Laik dis tu, E go provide and di tins wey una nid, go plenti wel-wel and dem go last foreva.
E go mak una get enof moni for evritin, so dat evritaim, una go fit dey giv wel-wel and di pipol wey una giv moni, go always dey tank God.
Bikos dis wok wey una dey du so, nor jos dey help onli God pipol, bot e dey always mak pipol, tank God.
Bikos of una wok, pipol go praiz God, bikos una dey obey Kraist wod wey una biliv and una dey share evritin wey una get wit gud maind.
So, bikos of God big grace wey E giv una, pipol dey pray for una wit strong luv.
Na dis mak us dey tank God for dis gift wey pesin mout nor fit tok.
Naw mi, Pol (I kwayet wen I dey wit una, bot my mout dey sharp naw wen I don liv una). Kraist wey nor dey kari bodi up, wey dey gentol,
I tak am beg una, so dat wen I kom, I nor nid to tok wit vesnashon abaut pipol wey si us laik yeye pipol (bikos I dey fear sey na so e go bi).
Bikos ivun doh wi dey for dis wold, wi nor dey fite as pipol wont am.
Di tins wey wi tak dey fite, nor bi dis wold own, bot na God mak am strong, so dat wi go fit skata all di strong place wer wiked pipol dey. Wi dey skata trobol;
pipol wey dey kari bodi up; doz wey nor wont mak odas no God and as wi dey du laik dis, pipol dey obey Kraist.
And wen una don show sey una dey fear God, wi go always dey redi to ponish doz wey dey disobey God.
Na onli tins wey eye fit si, naim una no. If enibodi dey sure sey e bilong to Kraist, mak e tink abaut am again: If e bilong to Kraist, den wi na Kraist own tu.
Bikos if I boast smol abaut di autoriti wey Jisos giv us mak wi tak build, insted of to distroi una, I nor go shame to du-am.
I nor wont mak una dey fear, bikos of wetin I rite,
bikos som pipol dey sey, "En letas dey heavi and get pawa wel-wel, bot if yu si-am for groun, e nor get pawa and e nor ivun fit tok wel."
Mak doz pipol no sey, "Wetin wi tok for leta wen wi nor dey wit una, wi dey du-am wen wi dey wit una."
Wi nor go kompare awasef wit doz wey sey dem gud wel-wel or kon put awasef for di same grup. Bot wen dem dey measure and kompare demsef wit demsef, e dey show sey dem nor get sense.
Bot wi nor go boast pas as wi sopoz boast; wi go boast akordin to di wok wey God giv us and una dey insaid dat wok tu.
Wi nor dey du awa wok pas as wi sopoz du-am wen wi dey wit una, bikos na wi bi first to bring Kraist mesage kom mit una.
Wi nor dey boast enihaw abaut di wok wey oda pipol du, bot wi dey hope sey as una fate dey grow wel-wel, awa wok among una go big, jos as God share am giv us,
so dat wi go fit prish di gospol for oda kontris wey far pas una own. So mak wi nor boast abaut di wok wey odas du for oda aria.
Bot pesin wey won boast, mak e boast abaut di wok wey Jisos du.
Bikos nor bi hu praiz ensef dey rite, bot na di pesin wey God decide to praiz.
For weitn I won tok naw, mak una bear wit mi laik sey I nor get sense!
I dey jelos for una wit God jelosi, bikos I promis sey na won man una go mari. Laik wuman wey nor no man, na so I won giv una to Kraist.
Bot I dey fear sey, jos as di snake disiv Eve wit en wayo, una maind fit spoil komot for di tru and di way wey una dey folo Kraist.
So, if enibodi kon prish anoda kraist wey wi nor prish for una and una risiv anoda spirit wey una nor risiv bifor, or anoda gospol wey una neva hear bifor, dat min sey, una don asept dem wel.
I nor tink sey doz "supa apostol" beta pas mi.
Bot ivun doh I nor no haw to tok, I no book. Tru-tru, wi don let una no dis tins wey hapun.
As I humbol mysef dey du di wok, na sin I komit? I dey du-am, so dat una go fit grow up and wen I prish giv una, I nor kolet moni.
I shit di oda shosh dem, bikos I dey kolet moni from dem, so dat I go dey wok wit una for fri!

Wen I nid enitin for di taim wen I dey wit una, I nor put my load for enibodi head, bikos awa brodas wey Masidonia dey giv mi evritin wey I nid. I nor alow mysef to bi problem for enibodi and I nor go eva du-am.
Tru-tru, as Kraist trut dey insaid mi, nobodi go fit stop mi for di way I dey boast for Akaya.
Why? Na bikos I nor luv una? No! God no sey I luv una!
And I go kontinu to du wetin I dey du, so dat doz apostols nor go get rizin to boast sey, dem dey du di same wok wit us.
Bikos dem bi fake apostols; pipol wey dey lai and pritend laik sey dem bi Jisos Kraist apostols.
E nor sopraiz us, bikos ivun Satan dey pritend sey en na angel wey get lite.
So e nor sopraiz us sey, en savants dey pritend tu laik sey dem bi savant wey dey du wetin gud for God eye. For di end, dem go gain wetin fit di tins wey dem dey du.
I dey tel una again, mak enibodi nor tink sey I bi fool. Bot if una tink so, den mak una asept mi as fool, so dat misef go boast smol.
Wetin I dey boast abaut so, nor bi as Kraist wont mak I boast, insted, I dey tok laik fool.
Since som pipol dey boast laik dis wold pipol, mak mi mysef stil boast.
Una sey una get sense wel-wel, yet una dey yuz hapines asept wetin fool dey tok.
Una laik mak pesin turn una to slave; yuz and shit una; tak evritin wey una get, den beat and slap una enihaw.
(Na shame for mi, bot I must tel una sey awa heart nor strong rish to du una doz kaind tins!) Bot enitin wey enibodi fit boast abaut (I dey tok laik fool naw o-o), misef fit boast abaut dat tin tu.
Na Hebrew pipol dem bi? Misef na Hebrew pesin tu. Dem bi Izrel pipol? Mi na Izrel pesin tu. Na Abraham bi dia gran papa? Na dat same Abraham bi my gran papa tu.

Na Kraist savant dem bi? (I don dey tok laik sey I dey krase again!) Misef na Kraist savant wey beta pas dem! I don wok hard pas dem, I don dey prizin plenti taims pas dem, dem don beat mi wel-wel pas dem, I don nearli die plenti taims.
Na faiv taims Ju pipol don kane mi tati-nain (39) taims.
Roman pipol don beat mi tiri taims. Dem stone mi wons ontil I nearli die. Ship wey I dey insaid, don spoil for wota tiri taims. I don float wons for wota from mornin go rish di next day.

I don travol meni taims wey I enta trobol for wota; for tif hand, ivun for my kontri pipol and Gentai pipol hand; both for insaid tawn; for desert and from pipol wey dey pritend sey dem bi awa brodas.
I don du hard wok; nor slip for meni nites; fud and wota go dey hungri mi; meni taims, I nor get fud to chop. I don dey for kold and I nor get klot to kova bodi.
Apart from dis tins, my maind dey heavi mi evriday as I dey tink of haw I go tak help all di pipol wey dey God shosh.
If pesin dey wik, misef dey wik tu. If dem disiv pesin enta sin, e dey pain mi wel-wel.
If I go must boast, den I go boast abaut di tins wey show sey I dey wik.
God wey bi awa Oga Jisos Kraist Papa, wey dem go praiz foreva, no sey nor bi lai I dey tok.
For Damaskus, King Aretas sey mak di govnor put sojas for di tawn gate, so dat dem go arres mi.
Bot awa pipol for der kon put mi for basket wey dem tie rope put kon drop mi smol-smol from di window and na so I tak eskape from di man hand.
E gud to dey boast, ivun doh gain nor dey insaid. I go stil dey tok abaut di vishon and revelashon wey Jisos Kraist show mi.
Fortin years ago, I no won man wey bi Kraist savant. Weda na for vishon or fisica, I nor no, bot God no. God kari am go di hevun wey high pas.
And I no dis man (bot na onli God no weda e dey for en bodi or for spirit).
God kari am go paradise and e hear tins wey dey tu holi to tok; tins wey God nor giv humanbin pawa to tok.
Na dat pesin mak mi dey boast and I nor go boast abaut mysef, esept di tins wey show sey, I nor dey strong.
Ivun if I won boast, I nor go bi fool, bikos na trut I go stil tok, bot I nor du-am mak enibodi for tink sey na mi no pas, bikos e si and hear mi dey tok
abaut di beta tins wey I si for vishon. Mak I for nor dey kari bodi up, God put somtin insaid mi, wey bi Satan mesenja, so dat e go dey trobol mi.
Na tiri taims I ask Kraist sey, mak e tak dis tin komot from my bodi.
Bot e tel mi, "Di grace wey I giv yu strong rish, bikos my pawa dey show wen yu dey wik." So, I go boast wel-wel abaut haw I nor dey strong, so dat Kraist pawa go dey show for my bodi.
I dey hapi as I dey wik wit all di kos, trobols, ponishment and wahala wey I dey sofa bikos of Kraist, bikos enitaim wey I dey wik, na dat taim, I dey-dey strong.
I don turn to fool! Na una fos mi, bikos una sopoz to praiz mi. Ivun if I nor bi enitin, e nor get enitin wey doz una "supa apostols" tak beta pas mi.
Tru-tru for una present, wi du mirakols and wondas to show sey wi bi apostols tu.
Bikos di way wey dem trit us wos pas di oda shosh, esept sey I nor dey put my load for una head. Mak una forgiv mi for dis tins wey I du!

Si, for di ted taim, I don redi to kom visit una and I nor go put my load for una head, bikos na una I wont and nor bi wetin una get. Nor bi pikin sopoz pay for dia papa and mama fud, bot na papa and mama, dey pay for dia pikin fud.
I go dey hapi to spend all my moni and ivun my life, as long as una soul go dey save. Una luv for mi dey smol, bikos my luv for una plenti?
Ivun if e bi laik dat, I nor put my load for una head. Bot dem sey, bikos I bi wayo pesin, I dey disiv una!
I nor play enibodi wayo tru di pesin wen I send kom mit una, abi I dey lai?
I beg Titus mak e visit una and I send dat broda mak e folo am kom. Dem play una wayo? Nor bi di same maind wi awasef tak folo una? Abi nor bi di same way wi dey bihav?
May bi una dey tink sey wi dey tok dis tins to difend awasef. No! Wi dey tok to una laik dis as Kraist savant and na God bi awa witnes. Evritin wey wi dey du, na to mak una strong.

Bikos I dey fear sey wen I kom, I nor go laik wetin I go si and una nor go laik as I go tok. I dey fear sey una go dey kworel, dey jelos ish oda; dey ves; dey tink of onli unasef; dey tok bad abaut ish oda; dey du aproko; dey kari bodi up and dey bihav enihaw.

I dey fear sey wen I kom again, God go disgrace mi for una front. And I go krai, bikos meni of una stil dey sin. Una neva turn from sin kom mit God; una neva turn komot from di ashowo and yeye life wey una dey liv.
Na di ted taim wey I dey kom visit una bi dis. If dem sey pesin du bad, tu or tiri pipol must sey, na tru, bifor pipol go biliv am.
Wen I dey wit una for my sekon visit, I tel una dis tins. Ivun doh I nor dey wit una naw, I dey tok am again sey, if I kom again, I nor go sori for enibodi, bot I go ponish am,
bikos una sey mak I show sey Kraist dey tok tru mi. Kraist nor dey wik to una, bikos e show en pawa among una.

Tru-tru, bikos e nor show en pawa, na dat mak dem fit nail am for kros, bot e dey alaif naw, bikos of God pawa. Aldoh wi dey wik wit am, bot wi go dey alaif togeda wit am, bikos of God pawa wey wi get.
Mak una test unasef to no weda una stil dey insaid di fate; e gud mak una shek unasef wel-wel! Una nor no sey Kraist dey insaid una? May bi una don fail di test!
I hope sey una go no sey wi neva fail di test!
Wi dey pray to God mak una nor du enitin bad; wi nor dey du-am to show sey wi pas di test, bot mak una for du wetin gud, ivun if e bi laik sey wi fail di test.
Wi nor go fit du enitin against di trut, bot na di trut go mak us du evritin.
Bele dey swit us wen eva wi dey wik and una dey strong. And na wetin wi dey pray for bi dis, "Una go get evritin wey una sopoz get."
Na dis mak mi dey rite all dis tins since I nor dey wit una, so dat wen I kom, I nor go ves for una bikos of di autoriti wey I get and God giv mi dis autoriti to build; nor bi to distroi.
Finali my brodas and sistas, mak una dey hapi dey du tins as dem sopoz bi. Mak una tak heart, dey grit ish oda and liv togeda for peace and di God wey get luv and peace, go dey wit una.
Mak una grit ish oda for Kristen way.
All God pipol for here dey grit una.
Mak di grace wey awa Oga Jisos Kraist giv us and di luv wey God get for us, plus di Holi Spirit feloship, dey wit una.
Na mi Pol, rite dis leta, (nor bi humanbin mak mi apostol, bot na Jisos Kraist and God awa Papa wey raiz-am from deat).
Mi and di brodas wey dey here, dey grit una wey dey Galatia.
Mak God awa Papa and Oga Jisos Kraist grace and peace, dey wit una.
Na Jisos die for awa sins, bikos na so God awa Papa wont am.
Mak all glori bi en own foreva and eva! Amen.
I sopraiz sey una kwik turn bak from di Pesin wey kol una wit en grace kon bigin folo oda tishin.
Nor bi sey anoda gospol rili dey, bot som pipol dey disturb una, bikos dem won shange wetin wi prish abaut Kraist.
Bot if wi (or angels wey kom from hevun) tish una difren tins from di won wey wi prish giv una bifor, mak God distroi us wit fire!
As I tok bifor, I dey repeat am again, if enibodi dey tish difren tins from di wons wey wi prish giv una bifor, mak God trow dat pesin for hell!
Una tink sey, I dey trai to du tins mak pipol for laik mi? Abi I dey du wetin God wont? Or I dey trai to mak bele swit pipol? If I dey trai to mak bele swit pipol, den I nor bi Kraist savant again!
My brodas and sistas, I wont mak una no sey di gospol wey I dey prish, nor bi humanbin giv mi.
Bikos I nor get or learn am from enibodi, bot I get-am tru di revelashon wey Kraist giv mi.
Una don hear abaut di kaind life wey I dey liv bifor as Ju pesin; haw I trobol di shosh kon dey trai to distroi am.
I grow among Ju pipol kon no di religion pas meni of my mates for my kontri and I no my gran-gran papa dem tradishons.
Bot God kol mi wit en grace kon seprate mi ivun bifor dem born mi.
E show mi en pikin, so dat I go fit prish abaut am giv Gentai pipol. I nor go mit enibodi mak e advise mi
and I nor go Jerusalem go mit pipol wey bi apostol bifor mi, bot I komot der go Arabia, den I kon go bak to Damaskus.
Afta tiri years, I go visit Pita for Jerusalem, so dat e go tel mi wetin I go du and I stay wit am for fiftin days.
Bot I nor go si eni oda apostol apart from James, wey bi Jisos Kraist broda.
God dey si wetin I dey rite, bikos evritin wey I dey rite to una so, na tru!
Afta dis, I kon go Syria and Silicia aria.
Bot di pipol for di shosh wey dey Judea, nor no mi.
Dem onli dey hear sey, "Di pesin wey dey trobol us bifor, don dey prish di mesage wey e bin dey trai to distroi."
So dem kon dey praiz God bikos of mi.~
Afta fortin years, I kon go bak to Jerusalem wit Banabas and Titus.
I go der bikos of di revelashon wey I risiv, den I tel dem abaut wetin I dey prish giv Gentai pipol. Bot I tok wit di oga dem, so dat dem go dey sure sey, I dey prish Kraist mesage.
Titus dey wit mi; ivun doh en na Greek pesin, dem nor sey e must sekonsaiz.
Dem diskos dis mata, bikos of di fake brodas wit dia wayo, wey dem tak dey spy di fridom wey Kraist giv us, so dat dem go fit mak us dia slave.
Bot wi nor giv dem shanse, so dat di trut wey dey di gospol, go last for una.
Bot doz wey tink sey dem bi oga, (wetin dem bi, nor min enitin to mi; bikos God nor dey sopot bad tin); dem wey bi lidas for di shosh nor add enitin to my mesage.
Bot dem kon si sey na God sey mak I prish en wod to pipol wey dem nor sekonsaiz, jos as E sey mak Pita prish to doz wey dem sekonsaiz,
(Bikos na tru God pawa Pita tak prish to Ju pipol and na di same pawa I tak dey prish giv Gentai pipol tu),
so wen James, Pita and Jon wey bi lidas for di shosh, si sey God giv mi grace, dem kon dey sopot mi and Banabas sey, "Mak wi dey prish giv Gentai pipol and doz wey dem sekonsaiz."
Bot dem sey mak wi always rimemba poor pipol and na wetin ivun dey my maind to du, bi dat.
Bot wen Pita kom Antiok, I kon shalenge am, bikos wetin e du, nor gud.

Pita dey chop wit Gentai pipol ontil som pipol wey James send, kom rish der. As Pita si dem, e kon stop to chop wit Gentai pipol, bikos e dey fear di pipol wey kom, since dem biliv sey evribodi must sekonsaiz.
Oda Ju pipol kon dey pritend laik Pita, sotey Banabas join dem tu.
Bot wen I si sey dem nor dey du wetin dem rite for God wod, I kon tel Pita for dia front, "If yu wey bi Ju, dey du laik Gentai pipol, haw yu wont tak mak Gentai pipol liv laik Ju pipol?"
Wi bi Ju pipol bikos of haw dem born us and wi nor bi Gentai pipol wey bi sinas.

Wi no sey nobodi dey fri from God jojment, bikos na so di law tok and pipol go onli dey fri, if dem get fate for Kraist.
