Since wi don biliv Kraist, wi sopoz to dey du gud tru di fate wey wi get for Kraist and nor bi to dey du wetin di law tok and wi nor go dey fri from jojment, wen wi du onli wetin di law tok.
Mak wi dey komit sin, as wi dey trai to du gud, bikos wi get fate for Kraist? If na so, dat min sey Kraist don dey sopot sin!
Naw, if I dey ripair di law wey I don first skata, dat min sey I dey break God law.
As for di law, I don die to am, so dat I go fit dey alaif wit God.
I don die wit Kraist for kros, so nor bi mi dey liv again, bot na Kraist dey liv insaid mi. Di life wey I dey liv naw, na bikos of di gud tins wey God pikin du insaid mi, bikos e luv and die for mi.
I nor go trowey God grace; bikos if na wetin di law tok go mak pesin gud, den Kraist die for nor-tin!
Galatia pipol, una nor get sense at-all! Hu turn una to fool naw? Bikos na for una front wi for show sey Jisos Kraist die for kros!
Na di tin wey I won no from una, bi dis: Una risiv di Spirit, bikos una dey du wetin di law tok or na bikos una biliv wetin wi prish giv una?
Na so una mumu rish? Tru-tru, una start wit di Holi Spirit, bot naw, una won finish di wok wit human-bin pawa.
Una sofa dis meni tins for nor-tin? Tru-tru, una rili sofa for nor-tin.
Wetin mak God giv una di Spirit to du mirakol? Na bikos una du wetin di law tok or bikos una biliv wetin una hear?
Jos as Abraham biliv God and God kol am raitious man,
na so tu, doz wey biliv, go bi Abraham shildren.
Dem rite for God wod bifor sey, "E go asept Gentai pipol, wen dem get fate" and na dis mak am tel Abraham bifor di taim rish sey, "E go bless evribodi, bikos of am."
So pipol wey biliv, God go bless dem togeda wit Abraham, bikos dem biliv.
Pipol wey dey unda di law and dem nor dey du evritin wey di law tok, dey unda kos, bikos dem rite am sey, "E nor go beta for enibodi wey nor dey du evritin wey dey di law."
Dis won show sey, nobodi dey gud for God eye, bikos e dey obey di law. So enibodi wey dey raitious, must liv by fate.
Di law nor dey bring fate, bot di pesin wey dey du wetin di law tok, go liv by wetin e dey du.
Kraist don save us from di kos wey di law bring, bikos e die for kros for us (jos as dem rite am, "Enibodi wey dem hang for tri, kos dey en head"),
so tru Kraist, Abraham blessins go kom mit Gentai pipol and wi go risiv di Spirit wey God promis us, tru fate.
My brodas and sistas, mak I yuz wetin dey hapun evriday for life tak mak ezampol for una: Wen pipol don mak agriment, nobodi go fit trow di agriment for kona or add enitin join am.
Wi no sey God mak dis promis wit Abraham and en pikin. God wod nor sey, "to di shildren", bot e sey "and to yor pikin," and e min onli won and dat won, na Kraist.
Na wetin I dey tok bi dis: Di law wey kom afta 430 years, nor get pawa to break di agriment and promis wey God and Abraham don mak bifor.
Bikos if promis dey kom tru di law, den e nor bi promis again. Bot wi no sey, na tru promis, God tak bless Abraham.
Na awa sin mak law dey and na so e go bi, ontil di pikin wey God promis, go kom and na tru angels, God tak giv us di law tru en profet.
Wi no sey pesin wey bi middleman dey stand bitwin tu pipol, bot na onli won God dey.
So di law dey against God promis? No! Bikos if di law dey giv pesin life, den raitiousnes go must kom tru di law.
Bot God wod kondem evritin and evribodi unda sin, so dat wi; di pipol wey biliv, go get God promis tru Jisos Kraist.
Bifor fate kom, wi dey unda di law, bikos di law hol us laik prizinas.
So na di law bi awa tisha bifor Kraist kom, so dat wi go fit tok sey wi dey raitious tru fate.
Bot since fate don kom, wi nor dey unda eni tisha again.
Bikos tru Jisos Kraist, all of us don bikom God shildren by fate.
Una wey dem don baptaiz insaid Kraist, don wear Kraist for bodi laik klot.
E nor mata weda una bi Ju or Greek pipol, savant or fri pesin, man or wuman, bikos all of una dey insaid won bodi for Kraist.
And if e bi sey una bilong to Kraist, den una bi Abraham shildren and pipol wey go inherit wetin God promis.
Wetin I min bi sey, di pesin wey inherit en papa propati and e stil bi smol pikin, e nor dey difren from savant, ivun doh na en get evritin.
Bot e go dey unda hu dey gaid am, ontil di taim wey en papa tok, go rish.
Na so e bi wit us wen wi smol; wi dey unda di pawa wey dey kontrol dis wold,
bot wen di rite taim rish, God kon send en pikin wey wuman born unda di law,
mak e save pipol wey dey unda di law, so dat God go mak us en own shildren kon giv us awa own propati.
Since wi bi God shildren, E put en Holi Spirit insaid us and naim mak us dey fit kol am, "Abba! Fada!"
So, una nor bi slave again, bot una don bi God pikin and since una bi God shildren, una go get God propati tu.
Bifor-bifor, wen una nor no God, una dey du bad-bad tins.
Bot naw wey una don no am (or abi mak I sey God don no una), why una stil dey folo all dis wik and yeye pawas? Una won bi dia slave again?
Dat taim, una folo dia tradishon.
I dey fear sey mak di wok wey I du among una, nor waste.
My brodas and sistas, I beg, mak una bi laik mi, as I don bi laik una, bikos una nor du mi eni bad tin!
Bot wen I first prish di gospol giv una, una no sey I wey nor wel,
ivun doh my siknes na problem to una, una nor laff or driv mi. Insted, una welkom mi laik God angel; laik sey na mi bi Jisos Kraist!
Naw, na wetin don hapun to una hapines? I no sey, if to sey e dey posibol, una for pul una eye giv mi!
So, I don bikom una enemi, bikos I dey tel una di trut?
Di pipol wey won disiv una dey trit una wel, bot dem nor dey du-am wit beta maind; bikos dem wont mak una liv mi kon folo dem.
Bot e gud mak una dey trit odas wel, so-far na for gud rizin and nor bi onli wen I dey wit una.
My shildren! Jos laik wuman wey won born, I dey feel pain for una, ontil Kraist pawa go dey insaid una life!
Haw I wish sey I dey wit una naw, so dat I go no haw to trit una, bikos I dey wori abaut una wel-wel.
Mak una tel mi, wish of una won dey unda di law? Una nor no wetin di law tok?
Dem rite am sey, Abraham get tu boys, won wey di savant wuman born and di oda pikin, na di ril wife born am.
Di won wey savant born, na ordinari pikin e bi, bot na tru God promis di ril wife tak born.
Beta sense dey for dis stori, bikos dis tu wimen bi laik tu kovenant. Won na from Mount Sinai wey bi laik di shildren wey Hagar, di savant wuman, born.
Hagar bi laik Mount Sinai for Arabia kontri and na di same wit Jerusalem wey dey naw, bikos e dey insaid der as slave wit en pikin.
Bot di Jerusalem wey kom from hevun, dey fri and na-im bi awa mama.
Bikos dem rite am sey, "Wuman! Yu wey neva born, mak yu shaut dey hapi, bikos yu neva labor laik wuman wey won born. Di wuman wey neva born, get plenti shildren pas di wuman wey get husban."
Bot my brodas and sistas, una bi shildren wey get promis, jos as Izik bi.
For dat taim, di won wey dem born for normal way, trobol di won wey dem born wit di Spirit and na so e bi wit una naw.
Bot wetin dem rite for God wod? "Mak yu driv di savant wuman and en pikin komot, bikos di savant pikin nor go share wit di pikin wey di ril wife born."
So my brodas and sistas, wi nor bi savant shildren. Na di ril wuman shildren, wi bi.
Mak una nor dey kari load for head laik slave again, bot mak una stand strong for groun, bikos Kraist don mak us fri.
Una dey hear! Mi wey bi Pol dey tel una sey, if dem sekonsaiz una, den Kraist nor min enitin to una again.
And I dey warn evribodi; enibodi wey gri mak dem sekonsaiz am, must obey evri oda tin wey di law tok.
Pipol wey wont mak pipol no sey dem dey gud, bikos dem dey kip di law, dem don alredi fal komot from God grace.
Bikos na tru fate for God Spirit, naim wi hope sey, God go mak us dey gud for en eye.
For Kraist, e nor mata weda dem sekonsaiz pesin or not; di onli tin wey mata, na fate wey dey wok tru luv.
Bifor, una dey du wel; bot naw, hu sey mak una nor obey di trut?
Nor bi God wey kol una sey mak una dey du laik dis!
Na smol yist dey mak bread raiz!
I get maind sey, God nor go let una listin to anoda pesin. Bot di pesin wey dey konfuz una, go face jojment, no mata hu e bi.
Naw, my brodas and sistas, if I stil dey prish abaut haw dem go tak sekonsaiz una, why pipol dey trobol mi? If na so, my tishin abaut Kraist kros nor sopoz kause eni trobol.
I wish sey doz wey dey disturb una go-go sekonsaiz demsef!
My brodas and sistas, God don kol una mak una dey fri; bot mak una nor yuz di fridom wey God giv una enihaw, insted mak una luv ish oda.
Bikos if dem add di hol law togeda, dem go kon bi won komandment wey sey, "Mak yu luv yor nebor as yu luv yorsef."
Bot if una kontinu to kworel among unasef; una go fit wound or kil ish oda by mistak.
I tel una, mak una let di Spirit direct una life and una nor go du wetin di flesh wont.
Bikos di tins wey di bodi laik, difren from wetin di Spirit laik and wetin di Spirit wont, nor dey gri wit wetin di flesh wont.
Bot if una alow di Spirit kontrol una, den una nor dey unda di law again.
Na di tins wey di flesh dey du bi dis: to slip wit pesin wey yu nor mari; to get bad maind; to opres pipol;
to dey serv juju; dey du magic; kworel-kworel life; faiti-faiti; jelosi; enihaw vesnashon; long-trot; tins wey dey skata pipol;
bad bele; kili-kili; to dey drink enihaw and dey du oda tins laik all dis wons. I dey warn una naw as I don warn una bifor sey, pipol wey dey du dis kaind tins, nor go enta God kindom!
Bot di frut wey di Holi Spirit dey bear insaid us; na luv, joy, peace, patient, kindnes, gudnes, faithfulnes,
gentolnes and to kontrol awasef. Di law nor dey against all dis tins.
Pipol wey dey insaid Kraist don kil dia flesh wit all di bad tins wey di flesh dey laik to du.
If di Holi Spirit dey insaid us, den mak wi dey liv awa life as di Holi Spirit wont.
Mak wi nor dey kari bodi up and dey du wetin go ves pipol or dey jelos won anoda.
My brodas and sistas, if una si pesin dey sin, mak una wey dey spiritual, kol am bak. Bot mak una wosh unasef, so dat una nor go fal insaid temtashon tu.
Mak una help kari ish oda load and if una du laik dis, una dey obey Kraist.
Bikos if enibodi tink sey, en tu big wen e nor bi enitin, e dey disiv ensef.
Mak evribodi shek ensef, den e go fit tok abaut ensef, insted of am to dey kompare ensef wit anoda pesin.
Bikos ish pesin go kari en own load by ensef.
Di pesin wey dem dey tish God wod, must share di gud tins wey e get wit di pesin wey dey tish am.
Mak una nor let enibodi disiv una. Nobodi go fit disiv God. Enitin wey pesin plant, naim e go reap,
bikos di pesin wey dey liv akordin to en flesh, go reap bad tins, bot di pesin wey dey liv akordin to God Spirit, go reap life wey nor dey end.
So mak to du gud, nor taya us, bikos wen taim rish, wi go gain am.
So enitaim wey wi get shanse, mak wi dey du gud, especiali to pipol wey bi God shildren.
Mak una si as di wod wey I tak my hand rite giv una, big rish!
Pipol wey won show sey dem gud, dey trai to fos una to sekonsaiz. Dem dey du so, so dat dem nor go sofa, bikos of Kraist kros.
Pipol wey sekonsaiz nor dey obey di law, bot dem wont mak una sekonsaiz, so dat dem go fit yuz una tak boast.
I nor go boast abaut enitin esept for di sofa wey awa Oga Jisos Kraist sofa and bikos of dat sofa, di wold nor min enitin to mi and I don die to di wold tu.
Weda pesin sekonsaiz or not, e nor min enitin, di onli tin wey mata bi sey, una don turn to new pesin.
Una wey dey obey dis rule wey I dey giv so, mak peace and mesi dey wit una and all God pipol.
From naw go, mak nobodi wori mi, bikos I get Jisos Kraist mark for my bodi.
My brodas and sistas, mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una spirit. Amen!
Dis leta na from Pol, wey bi Jisos Kraist apostol, bikos na so God wont am. I dey rite to God pipol wey dey for Efisos, di wons wey dey folo Jisos Kraist wit fate.
Mak di grace and peace wey dey kom from God awa papa and from awa Oga Jisos Kraist, dey wit una.
I bless God wey bi awa Oga Jisos Kraist Papa; wey don bless us wit difren spiritual blessin from hevun, bikos of Kraist.
Bifor God kreate di wold, E shuz us tru Kraist bikos E luv us, so dat for en front, wi nor go get eni fault and wi go dey holi.
Bifor, God don alredi decide tru Jisos Kraist sey, wi go bi en shildren, bikos na so E wont am.
So, mak all praiz and glori bi en own, bikos of en fri grace wey E giv us, tru en pikin wey E luv wel-wel.
Na tru Kraist blood wi tak get salvashon and na dis blood mak God dey forgiv us awa sins, bikos en grace big wel-wel.
Di grace wey E giv us, get plenti wisdom, sense and undastandin.
E du laik dis wen E show us di sikrit plan wey E get and di gud maind wey E show evribodi, tru Kraist.
God go komplit en plan wen di taim don rish, den E go gada evritin wey dey hevun and eart togeda unda Kraist, wey bi di head.
All tins dey hapun as God wont am and tru Kraist, E shuz us to bi en own pipol, bikos na so E plan am from di taim wen E kreate di wold,
so dat wi wey first biliv Kraist, go dey giv am praiz and glori.
Since una don hear di trut kon biliv Kraist, God don giv una di Holi Spirit as special mark to show sey naim get una.
God deposit dis Holi Spirit for di tins wey wi go inherit, ontil di taim wen E go save en pipol, so dat all praiz and glori go bi en own.
So, since I hear abaut una fate for Kraist and haw una luv all God pipol,
I nor dey stop to tank God for una, wen eva I dey pray.
I pray mak God, awa Oga Jisos Kraist Papa wey get glori, giv una spiritual wisdom and revelashon, wey go mak una no am wel-wel.
Una eye don opun to undastand di grace wey God kol una kom enta and una don si haw di blessin wey E promis en pipol, plenti rish.
Una don si haw en pawa big rish, bikos una biliv am. Dis na di pawa wey dey du big-big tins for us.
E show dis pawa tru Kraist, wen E raiz-am from deat, kon mak am sidan for en rite hand for hevun;
di place wey far wel-wel, wey high pas wer wiked pipol dey rule; wey strong pas evri pawa wey dey dis wold; big pas evri name wey dey for dis wold and di wons wey dey kom.
God put evritin unda Kraist leg, kon mak am head for di shosh and Oga for evritin.
Na di shosh bi Kraist bodi and naim dey mak evritin for evriwer ful and komplit.
Bifor-bifor, na stubornes and sin dey kontrol una life,
bikos una dey du wetin di wold wont. Una dey obey wiked pawas wey dey rule di air and kontrol stuborn shildren.
All of us dey liv dis kaind life bifor. Wi dey du difren tins wey awa bodi and maind wont. Dat taim, wi bi shildren wey God won ponish laik oda sinas.
Bikos God luv us wel-wel, E don show us plenti mesi
(aldoh sin dey kontrol awa life bifor), E kon giv us life tru Kraist, den E save us wit en grace!
E raiz us up wit Kraist kon mak us sidan wit am for hevun.
E du dis, to show evribodi for di wold wey dey kom sey, en grace wey dey show us kaindnes tru Jisos Kraist, big wel-wel.
God save una wit en grace, bikos una get fate (as una don biliv Kraist), nor bi wit una own pawa, bot na God giv una.
E nor save una bikos of di wok wey una du, so mak nobodi dey boast.
God kreate us tru Jisos Kraist as di gud wok wey E don priper dan bifor, so dat wi go dey du as E plan.
Mak una rimemba sey bifor-bifor, una bi Gentai pipol wey dey du wetin di flesh wont and som pipol dey kol una, "pipol wey dem neva sekonsaiz" laik di way dem dey sekonsaiz humanbin.

Dat taim, una dey witout di Mezaya and una nor get share for Izrel blessins and since una nor get hope and una dey witout God for dis wold, una kon bi strenja to God kovenant wey E promis Izrel pipol.
Bot tru Jisos Kraist blood, una wey bin dey far, God don draw una near ensef,
bikos na Kraist bi awa peace. Na Kraist mak Ju and Gentai pipol bi won. E don break di wall wey divide and seprate dem as enimis.
E don kansol Ju pipol law wit all en komand and rules, so dat e go fit mak Ju and Gentai pipol to bi won wit am and laik dis, peace go dey among dem.
E yuz di sofa wey e sofa for kros tak end dia kworel kon mak dem won bodi as dem dey serv God.
And e prish peace to una wey dey far and near,
so dat tru am, all of us wit won Spirit, go fit rish wer awa Papa dey for hevun.
So, una nor go bi strenja and pipol wey nor get share for Izrel blessins again, bot una go bi God shildren wit all di pipol wey dey en haus.
Dis na bikos, God don build una on-top di apostols and profets foundashon and na Jisos Kraist bi di numba won stone wey God tak lay di foundashon.
Na for insaid Kraist di hol buildin for join togeda, kon grow as won Holi Tempol for God and
tru am, God don build una togeda as wer E go dey stay tru di Spirit.
Bikos of dis, mi, Pol wey bi prizina for Kraist, bikos of una wey bi Gentai pipol, dey pray giv God.
Tru-tru, una don hear sey na God giv mi dis wok tru en grace and na for una own gud.
God opun my eye to undastand en sikrit, as I rite to una bifor,
so dat wen una read am, una go fit undastand di sikrit wey God show mi.
Di pipol wey dey bifor nor no dis sikrit as God don show en holi apostols and profets wey dey naw, tru di Holi Spirit.
So, bikos of di gospol, Gentai pipol don folo Ju pipol get share for God blessin. Dem don bi membas for Kraist bodi and dem get share for God promis.
I bi dis gospol savant, bikos of God grace wey E giv mi tru di wok wey en pawa dey du.
Na mi smol pas for all God pipol, bot God don giv mi grace to prish di Gud News giv Gentai pipol and dis grace wey Kraist giv mi, nor dey finish.
Di grace na to mak evribodi undastand God sikrit plan. Na God kreate evritin and E hide di plan since e kreate di wold.
E mak dem undastand, so dat tru di shosh, all di rulas and pawas wey dey hevun go kon no God komplit wisdom, wey dey show ensef for difren ways.
Dis hapun akordin to en plan wey go stand foreva and E mak am hapun tru awa Oga Jisos Kraist
and na bikos Kraist dey fateful, naim mak us get di heart to fit rish wer God dey.
Na dis mak mi tel una sey, mak una nor fear bikos of di tins wey I dey sofa, bikos na for una own gud.
Bikos of dis, I dey nil dan for awa Papa front,
wer all di famili for hevun and eart from get dia names.
I dey pray sey as en glori big rish, E go mak una strong wel-wel wit pawa tru en Spirit wey bi di ril pesin insaid una.
So dat Kraist go dey insaid una heart tru fate and wen una don strong wel-wel insaid God luv,
una go fit join all God pipol undastand haw God luv wide, long, high and deep rish.
Den una go rili no di luv wey Kraist get, wey big pas evritin wey una go fit undastand and evritin insaid God, go ful una life.
So, mak all di glori bi God own; di Pesin wey dey du pas di tins wey wi go fit ask or tink, tru en pawa wey dey wok insaid us.
Mak all glori for Kraist shosh bi en own from generashon to generashon. Amen!
Mi wey bi prizina, bikos I dey serv di Oga; I dey beg una mak una dey liv una life as God wont.
Mak una dey get piti for won anoda wit quietnes, gentolnes and patient, bikos of di luv wey una get.
Mak una dey du evritin wey una fit du to kip di uniti wey di Spirit dey giv, as una dey liv togeda for peace.
Na won bodi and Spirit dey, bikos jos as all of una get won hope from God wen E kol una,
na so tu una get won Oga, won fate, won baptism,
won God and Papa wey dey above evribodi; dey yuz evribodi and dey insaid evribodi.
Bot God don giv grace to all of us akordin to haw Kraist gift plenti rish.
Na dis mak dem sey, "Wen e raiz-up go hevun, E kari meni prizinas wey E fri folo bodi and E giv plenti gift to pipol."
Na wetin dis wod, "E raiz-up," min? E min sey Kraist first die and dem bere am for di eart.
En wey dem bere, naim stil bi di pesin wey raiz-up pas di hevuns, so dat e go komplit evritin.
Na Kraist mak som of us apostols, profets, evangelist, pastors and tishas.
Kraist du laik dis to priper us for di ministri wok, wey go mak God shosh grow,
so dat wi go bi won for di tins wey wi biliv and wey go mak us rili no God Pikin. Den, wi go dey tink laik Kraist.
So mak wi nor bi laik shildren wey briz dey kari up and dan; shildren wey dey folo yeye tins wey humanbin dey tish and na dis tins dem dey tak disiv pipol.
Bot, as wi dey du wetin dey gud and koret wit luv, wi go dey grow for evri side kon mit Kraist wey bi di head.
Na from Kraist di hol bodi dey grow wel and join togeda tru di pawa wey dey sopot am. As ish part dey du en wok, na so di bodi go dey grow insaid God luv.
So, I dey yuz Kraist pawa tak tel una dis tins sey, mak una nor liv una life laik Gentai pipol wey dey tink onli bad and tins wey nor get sense.
Dia maind dey for daknes and dem nor get part for di life wey God dey giv, bikos dem stuborn and nor fit undastand.
Dem dey du wayo, dey giv dia bodi to yeye tins; tins wey nor dey pure and dey wiked.
Bot wi nor tish una laik dat abaut Kraist.
If na tru, den una don hear and learn di trut abaut am, jos as di trut dey insaid Kraist.
Konsanin di kaind life wey una dey liv bifor, wi sey mak una trowey dat bad spirit wey dey mak una du bad-bad tins
and mak una dey tink beta tins for una maind.
Den, tru raitiousnes and holines wey di trut dey bring, mak una wear di new man wey God don kreate laik ensef.
Since una don stop to lai, mak una start to tok trut giv una nebor, bikos all of us na membas for Kraist bodi.
If una dey ves, mak una nor sin and mak day nor dak stil mit una dey ves.
Mak una nor giv di devol eni shanse.
Pesin wey dey tif, mak e nor tif again. Insted, mak e wok hard and du gud wit en own hand, so dat e go fit giv pipol wey nor get.
Mak una nor alow eni bad wod kom out from una mout, bot mak una wod dey giv poor pipol hope, so dat e go bless pipol wey hear am.
Mak una nor du wetin go mak di Holi Spirit ves. Bikos na di Holi Spirit bi di mark wey God put for una bodi, so dat for jojment day, E go no doz wey E go save.
Una must stop to get bad bele, to dey ves, kworel and to dey tok bad-bad wod.
Mak una dey gud to won anoda; dey sori for pipol and dey forgiv ish oda, jos as God forgiv una tru Kraist.
So, mak una dey bihav laik shildren wey God luv wel-wel.
Mak wi luv won anoda, jos as Kraist luv and sakrifais ensef as ofrin wey get beta smel to God, bikos of us.
To dey slip wit pesin wey yu nor mari; dey du tins wey nor dey pure and get long-trot; mak una nor alow dis tins dey among una, bikos dem nor gud for God pipol.
Mak una nor alow yeye and foolish wod kom out from una mout. And mak una nor dey tok enihaw or yuz bad wod, bikos all dis tins nor gud. Insted, mak una dey tank God wit una mout.
Won tin wey una must no bi sey, pesin wey dey slip wit hu e nor mari, wey nor dey pure or wey get long-trot and dey serv juju, nor go enta Kraist and God kindom.
Mak una nor let enibodi disiv una wit yeye wod, na dis tins mak God dey ves for doz wey nor dey obey am.
So mak una nor join dem.
Bifor-bifor, una dey for daknes, bot naw, una bi lite wey dey shine insaid Kraist. So mak una dey du tins laik shildren wey get lite,
bikos di frut wey lite get, dey bring gudnes, raitiousnes and trut.
So, mak una always dey du tins wey go mak God hapi.
Mak una nor put hand for bad tins, insted, mak una dey expoz dem.
Shame nor go let wiked pipol tok abaut wetin dem dey du for sikrit.
Bot evribodi go si evritin wey kom out for lite.
Bikos na lite dey mak evritin shine kom out and na dis mak dem rite sey: "Wak-up; yu wey dey slip! Mak yu raiz from grave and Kraist go shine for yor life!"
Mak una dey kareful as una dey liv una life. Mak una nor bi laik pipol wey nor get sense.
Mak una yuz evri shanse wey una get wel, bikos dis taim wey wi dey so, dey evil and wiked.
Bikos of dis, mak una get sense to undastand wetin awa Oga wod tok and min.
Mak una nor dey drink strong drink, bikos e go distroi una. Bot mak una alow God Spirit fil una maind.
Mak una dey tok to unasef wit psalms, hymns and spiritual songs. For insaid una heart, mak una dey praiz God wit hymns and psalms.
Wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist name, mak una dey tank God awa papa for ish oda.
Bikos of di respet wey una get for Kraist, mak una dey respet won anoda.
Una wey bi wife, mak una dey respet una husban, jos as una dey respet Kraist,
bikos na di husban bi di wife head, jos as Kraist bi head for di shosh and naim en save di bodi.
As di shosh dey sumit to Kraist, na so tu, wife sopoz sumit to dia husban for evritin.
Husban, mak una luv una wife, jos as Kraist luv di shosh kon sakrifais en life for am,
so dat e go fit mak am klin, tru baptism and God wod.
E du laik dis, so dat di shosh go bi laik wife wey fine wel-wel, wey nor get eni stain, dey du enihaw or get eni oda tin wey fit spoil am.
Na so tu, husbans sopoz luv dia wife laik dia own bodi. Man wey luv en wife, luv ensef.
Nobodi don eva hate e own bodi, bot e dey fid and kare for am, jos as Kraist dey kare for di shosh,
bikos wi bi part for en bodi.
Na bikos of dis, man go liv en papa and mama go join en wife and di tu of dem, go bi won flesh.
Dis sikrit wey I dey tel una so big wel-wel, bot na di tin wey dey bitwin Kraist and di shosh, I dey tok abaut.
So, ish man sopoz luv en own wife, jos as e luv ensef and evri wife sopoz respet en husban.
Shildren, as una no God, mak una dey hear una papa and mama wod, bikos na wetin una sopoz du bi dat.
Mak una respet una papa and mama, bikos na dis bi di first komandment from God wey get promis.
So dat e go beta for una and una go get long life.
Una wey bi papa, mak una nor mak una shildren ves, bot mak una raiz dem to folo di tishin wey Kraist tish.
Una wey bi savant, mak una dey obey una masta wit fear, respet and wit klin maind laik sey, na Kraist una dey obey.
Mak una nor bi laik pipol wey dey du dia wok wen dem si sey, pesin dey luk dem; bikos dem dey fine gud face. Insted, as una bi Kraist savant, mak una dey du wetin God laik from una heart.
Mak una dey du una wok wit beta maind laik sey, na Kraist una dey du-am for and nor bi humanbin,
bikos una no sey, ish pesin; weda e bi slave or e dey fri, if e du wetin dey gud, Kraist go riwod am.
And una wey bi masta, mak una dey trit una savant wel. Mak una nor mak dem fear, bikos both yu and dem get di same masta for hevun and E nor dey favor enibodi enihaw.
Finali, mak una dey strong wit Kraist mighti pawa.
Mak una wear komplit soja uniform wey God dey giv, so dat una go fit stand fite di wayo wey devol dey yuz.
Bikos, wi nor dey fite against humanbin, bot na against di wiked rulas wey dey for dis wold, against evil spirits and pawas wey dey di hevuns.
Na dis mak mi sey, mak una wear komplit soja uniform wey God dey giv, so dat una go fit stand for groun wen trobol and wahala go kom and wen una don win, una go stil stand wel.
So, mak una stand wel-wel kon tie trut laik belt roun una waist, den wear bullet proof koat as raitiousnes for una bodi.
Mak una wear shu for leg wey go show sey, una dey redi to prish di Gud News wey dey giv pipol peace
and wit all dis, mak una kari fate wey go help una kwensh all di wiked arrows wey Satan dey trow.
Mak una wear salvashon laik cap for head kon hol di Spirit sword wey bi God wod.
Wit difren prayas, mak una dey ask God to help una. Mak una always dey pray wit di Spirit and dey shine una eyes wel-wel. Mak una nor giv up, bot mak una kontinu to pray for all God pipol.
Mak una pray for mi tu sey, mak God giv mi beta wod enitaim wen I opun my mout to tok and mak I fit esplain di sikrit wey dey di gospol.
I bi God mesenja, ivun doh I dey for prizin naw. Bot mak una pray sey, I go dey tok wit boldnes as I sopoz to tok.
Tikikus wey bi my special broda and fateful savant for God wok, go tel una evritin, so dat una go no wetin dey hapun to mi for here.
Na bikos of dis I send am kom mit una, mak una for no haw tins dey wit us for here and mak e for fit enkorage una heart.
I pray sey mak God, awa Papa and Oga Jisos Kraist giv all my felow Kristen brodas and sistas peace, luv and fate.
Mak God grace dey wit evribodi wey luv awa Oga Jisos Kraist wit di luv wey nor dey die.
Dis leta na from Pol and Timoti, wey bi Jisos Kraist savant. To all God pipol for Filipai, wit dia bishops and lidas.
Mak God awa papa and Oga Jisos Kraist giv una grace and peace.
I dey tank my God evritaim I rimemba una.
Evritaim wen I dey pray for una, I dey du-am wit hapines,
bikos of haw una dey help mi prish di gospol from di first day wey una hear am kon rish today.
I dey sure sey, di Pesin wey start dis gud wok for una life, go mak am pafet ontil di day wen Kraist go kom.
So e dey gud for mi to dey tink abaut una laik dis, bikos una dey my heart. Una don folo mi share from God favor, ivun wen I dey prizin and wen I dey prish di trut abaut di gospol.
God no sey, bikos of Kraist luv wey dey my heart, I dey miss una wel-wel.
I pray mak una luv dey strong more-more for God tins wey una learn and mak E help una undastand,
so dat una go fit shuz wetin beta pas and as una dey du so, una go dey redi for di day wen Kraist go kom.
Mak di wok wey Kraist du for us and haw to please God, ful una maind. Den all di glori and praiz go bi God own.
My brodas and sistas, I wont mak una no sey my sofa na to mak di gospol stand.
Di sojas wey dey gaid di prizin and all di oda pipol don no sey, na bikos of Kraist, I dey prizin
and bikos of di prizin wey dem put mi so, almost all di brodas and sistas fate for Kraist, don strong wel-wel. And naw, dem don dey prish God wod witout fear.
Tru-tru, na jelosi and kworel mak som dey prish abaut Kraist, bot odas dey du-am wit beta maind.
I no sey dis wons na luv mak dem dey du-am, bikos dem no sey I dey here to difend wetin dem dey prish.

Doz oda wons wey dey prish abaut Kraist dey du so, bikos dem dey tink abaut diasef and bikos of wetin dem go gain. Dem nor dey du tins wit klin maind and dem tink sey dem fit kos more trobol for mi, bikos I dey prizin.
Bot dat won nor mata to mi. So, weda dem dey pritend or du-am wit klin maind, di mesage abaut Kraist dey kontinu and na dat won dey mak mi hapi. I go kontinu to hapi,
bikos I no sey na una praya and di help wey Kraist Spirit dey giv, dey save mi.
Di hope wey I get bi sey, shame nor go eva fit kash mi; my heart go strong wel-wel and as I dey du naw, na so I go always dey du. Evritin for my bodi go praiz Kraist, weda I dey alaif or don die.
Bikos to mi, to dey dis life, na to liv for Kraist and to die insaid Kraist, na dat won beta pas.
If I kontinu to dey liv insaid dis bodi, e min sey I go du beta wok, bot I nor no wish won I go laik pas;
Naw, I no wish won I go shuz, bikos I won go dey wit Kraist and na dat won beta pas.
Bot e go gud for una as I stil dey for dis bodi.
I dey sure of dis tins: I no sey I nor go die naw, so dat I go kontinu wit una and as una dey insaid di fate, una life go dey beta more-more.
So wen I go kom mit una again as una dey serv Kraist, una go get more rizin to dey hapi bikos of mi.
Mak una life dey show sey una biliv Kraist mesage, so dat weda I kom si una or not, I go dey hear sey una dey strong wit won spirit, won maind and dey fite togeda mak di gospol for stand.
Mak una nor fear una enimis, bikos dem go soon skata and dat na sign to show sey God go save una.
God don giv una dis sign, nor bi onli mak una for biliv Kraist, bot mak una for stil sofa for am,
bikos una dey face di same sofa wey una si mi dey face. And I wont mak una no sey, ivun naw, I stil dey sofa di same tin.
Gain dey to serv Kraist? Komfort dey for en luv? Feloship dey bitwin pipol and God Spirit? Una heart gud rish to show pipol mesi?
Den, mak una let my joy dey komplit, as una dey agri wit ish oda and dey luv and wok togeda wit won maind.
Mak una nor dey kari bodi up, bot mak una trit ish oda laik unasef. Insted, una dey du wetin una laik, bikos of di tins wey una go gain, so dat una go fit boast.
Mak una nor dey tink abaut unsef alone and wetin una wont, bot mak una dey tink abaut wetin gud for odas tu.
Mak una get di same maind wey Kraist get,
wey bi sey, ivun doh en wit God na di same, e nor boast abaut am.
Bot e liv evritin wey e get for hevun kon bi laik savant. So e kom dis wold as humanbin.
E put en bodi dan kon obey God, ontil Ju pipol kil and nail am for kros!
Bikos of dis, God raiz-am up kon gi-am di name wey big pas evri oda name,
so dat wen dem kol Jisos name, evribodi and evritin must nil dan, weda dem dey hevun, eart or for unda di eart
and evri tongue go konfes sey, "Na Jisos Kraist bi di Oga." Den all di glori go bi God own.

So, my frends wey I luv; pipol wey dey always obey mi, (nor bi onli wen I dey wit una, bot una dey obey wel-wel, ivun wen I nor dey wit una). Mak una kontinu to du God wok wit all una heart, so dat una salvashon go ful wel-wel,
bikos na God dey wok insaid una, so dat una go fit du gud tins and get di pawa wey go mak una hapi.
Mak una nor yuz vesnashon tak wok for God,
so dat una nor go get eni blame and una go dey klin. God Pikin nor get fault; ivun doh una dey liv for di wold wey bad pipol dey, una go dey shine laik stars,
bikos una get God mesage wey dey giv life. So, di day wen Kraist go kom, I go get rizin to boast sey I nor run dis race or wok for nor-tin.
Bot ivun if dem tak mi offa sakrifais for una, I go dey hapi,
so mak una kom folo mi rejoice.
As Jisos Kraist wont am, I go send Timoti kom mit una, so dat my heart go strong smol, wit di news wey I go hear abaut una.
Among all di pipol for here, na onli Timoti get di kaind maind wey I get for una and naim dey mak mi tink of una and haw una dey manage.
Di odas dey bizi wit dia own mata, bot nor bi mata wey konsan Kraist.
Una no haw mi and Timoti bi, sey as pikin dey wok wit en papa, na so e dey folo mi wok, so dat di gospol go stand.
I go soon send am kom mit una, so dat una go no haw my kondishon bi.
Aldoh I biliv Kraist sey, e nor go tey, bifor mi mysef go kom visit una.
Bot bifor dat taim, I don tink am sey, e gud mak I send Epafroditus kom mit una. En na my broda, co-woka and soja. Na una mesenja e bi and e dey help mi enitaim wey I nid enitin.
Tru-tru, e miss all of una wel-wel and en maind dey wori am, bikos una hear sey e nor wel.
E sik wel-wel sotey e nearli die. Bot God get mesi for am; nor bi onli for am, bot for mi tu, so dat I nor go krai join di won wey I dey so.
Na dis mak mi won rili send am kom mit una, so dat wen una si-am, una go dey hapi again and I nor go dey wori abaut una.
So mak una welkom and respet am as una broda for Kraist wit hapines,
bikos e nearli die bikos of Kraist. E put en life for danga, so dat e go fit help mi du wetin una for du, since una nor dey here.
Finali, my brodas and sistas, mak una hapi bikos una get Kraist. I dey rite di same tin giv una again, bikos e go help una.
Mak una shine una eye, bikos of doz wey dey bihav laik dogs and wiked pipol wey dey ponish dia bodi!
Na wi bi di ril sekonsishon; di pipol wey dey woship God tru en Spirit; pipol wey dey hapi insaid Kraist and wi nor dey put awa hope for wetin pipol dey du.
Aldoh my own rizin important tu. If enibodi tink sey e get beta rizin to put hope for wetin humanbin dey du, mi Pol, get pas dem.
Dem sekonsaiz mi, ate days afta dem born mi. I kom from Izrel, Benjamin tribe and I bi Hebrew man. I bin dey liv akordin to di law, bikos I bi Farisi.
Bikos I rili won du God wok, I kon dey kause serious wahala for di pipol wey dey di shosh. I du evritin jos as di law sey mak wi du, so dat wi go dey gud for God eye. So, I nor get eni fault.
Bot all dis tins wey I si as gain, I kon kount dem to bi nor-tin, bikos of Kraist.

Nor bi onli doz wons, bot naw, I dey luk evritin as nor-tin, wen I kompare am wit Kraist, my Oga wey I no and I trowey evritin, bikos of am. Tru-tru, I dey luk all doz tins as yeye, so dat I go fit gain Kraist,
kon bi won wit am. My raitiousnes nor kom from di law, bot I dey raitious tru my fate for Kraist. Bikos na tru fate God tak mak us dey raitious wit am.
Wetin I wont na to no am and di pawa wey wak Kraist from deat; to sofa wetin e sofa; to bi as e bi wen e die,
so dat mi tu go stil wak-up from deat, as e wak.
Nor bi sey I don get evritin wey I wont or God don mak mi pafet, bot I dey trai mak I get di prize kon hol am as Jisos Kraist hol mi.
My brodas and sistas, I nor luk mysef laik sey I don get evritin wey I wont. Bikos I dey tink of onli won tin wey bi: to forget di tins wey don pas kon dey porshu di wons wey dey front
and as I put my maind for dis tins, I dey trai to get di prize wey bi life for hevun; prize wey mak God kol us tru en pikin, Jisos Kraist.
So doz of us wey don mature for Kraist, mak wi get dis kaind maind. Bot if una dey tink difren tins, I biliv sey God go show una di trut.
So, mak wi kontinu to folo di rules wey wi dey folo.
My brodas and sistas, mak una dey liv laik mi and dey learn from odas wey dey folo us as ezampol.
Bikos l don tel una bifor and I dey tok am again wit tears for my eye sey, di way meni pipol dey bihav, dey show sey dem bi enimis to Kraist kros.
Dem go end for hell; na dia bele bi di god wey dem dey serv. Tins wey sopoz mak dem shame, naim dey mak dem hapi and na onli tins for dis wold dem dey tink abaut.
Bot wi bilong to hevun and wi dey wait awa Savior wey kom from der, wey bi Oga Jisos Kraist.
E go yuz en pawa wey mak am Oga for evritin, tak shange dis awa ordinari bodi and awa bodi go kon bi laik en own wey get glori.
My brodas, sistas and frends wey I luv, I dey hungri to si una, bikos una dey mak mi proud. My frends wey I luv, mak una stand wel insaid Kraist!
I dey beg Udia and Sintike mak dem agri togeda insaid Kraist.
Yes, my gud frends, I stil dey tel una, mak una help dem. Dem trai as dem dey prish di gospol wit mi, both Klement and my oda co-wokas, wey dia name dey insaid Kraist Life Book.
Mak una always dey hapi insaid Kraist. I dey tok again sey, mak una dey hapi!
Mak evribodi no sey una nor laik wahala, bikos Jisos go soon kom.
Mak una nor let enitin wori una for maind. Insted, for evri kondishon wey una dey face, mak una ask God tru praya for evritin wey una nid and mak una always dey tank am, as una dey pray.
Den God peace wey pas wetin humanbin fit undastand, go gaid una heart and maind insaid Kraist.
Finali, my brodas and sistas, tins wey bi tru; wey get respet; wey fine; wey pipol dey tok gud abaut; wey gud wel-wel; wey rish to praiz; na dis kaind tins una sopoz to dey tink abaut.
So enitin wey una learn, hear and si mi dey du, mak una dey du dem tu. And di God wey dey giv us peace, go dey wit una.
I dey hapi wel-wel insaid Kraist, bikos una don finali show sey, una dey tink abaut haw I dey manage. (I no sey una get mi for maind bifor, bot una nor get shanse to du enitin for mi).
I nor dey tok dis won bikos I nid enitin, bot na bikos I don learn to dey okay for eni kondishon wey I si mysef.
E get somtaim wey I nor get and somtaims, I dey get plenti. Bot for evri kondishon, I don learn haw to dey okay; weda my bele ful or I dey hungri; weda I get plenti or I nor get enitin at-all.
I fit du evritin tru Kraist wey dey giv mi pawa.
Bot una trai wel-wel as una help mi wen I dey trobol.
Filipai pipol, una no sey, wen I komot from Masidonia, for di taim wen I jos start to prish di gospol, na una bi di onli shosh wey help mi and na onli una dey folo mi share for my hapines and sofa.
Bikos ivun for Tesalonika, una stil send tins kom giv mi.
I nor dey tok dis bikos I wont gift, bot mak una for gain from dis wok wey una dey du.
Naw, I get evritin wey I nid, bikos Epafroditus don giv mi di tins wey una send. And na dis bi di ofrins wey dey mak bele swit God.
My God go giv una evritin wey una nid, bikos of en glori and rishis wey dey insaid Jisos Kraist.
Mak evribodi giv glori to God awa Papa, foreva and eva. Amen.
Mak una grit God pipol wey dey for Kraist.
God pipol wey dey here dey grit una tu, especiali doz wons wey kom from Caesar haus.
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una spirit.
Dis leta na from mi Pol, Jisos Kraist apostol and Timoti my broda, bikos na so God wont am.
To all God pipol for Kolosey, wey bi awa brodas and sistas for Kraist. Mak God awa Papa giv una grace and peace.
Wi dey always tank God wey bi Jisos Kraist Papa, enitaim wen wi dey pray for una,
since wi hear abaut haw una biliv Kraist and di luv wey una get for God pipol.
Wen una first hear abaut di Gud News wey bring trut, una kon get luv and fate for wetin God priper for una for hevun and na dis gospol
kom mit una. Dis gospol dey bear frut for di hol wold and since di day wey una hear am, una don undastand as God grace big rish and e don dey bear frut and grow among una.
Awa broda Epafras, wey dey wok for Kraist wit all en maind, ivun doh wi nor dey der, na-im tish una di gospol
and e kon tel us abaut di luv wey di Spirit giv una.
Bikos of dis, wi tu, since wi hear abaut una, wi neva stop to dey pray for una. Wi dey tel God mak E show una wetin E wont, so dat una go dey wise and undastand God Spirit,
den una life go beta jos as Kraist wont. For all di gud tins wey una dey du, mak una dey bear frut and learn to no God more-more.
Wi stil dey pray sey una go dey strong wit God pawa wey get glori. Una go show sey una dey patient and get strong maind for God wok wit hapines.
Mak una dey tank God, bikos E don mak una share from wetin en pipol get for en kindom wey dey giv lite.
E save us from daknes pawa and put us for di kindom wey E giv di pikin wey E luv.
Dis na di pikin wey pay for us, so dat wi go dey fri and God go forgiv us awa sins.
God wey wi nor dey si, na Jisos bi en image and for evritin wey E kreate, na Jisos bi di first.
Bikos God kreate evritin for hevun and eart tru en pikin; both fisica and spiritual tins; weda dem get pawa or dey rule for difren-difren place; God kreate dem tru am and E kreate dem for am.
Kraist dey bifor evritin and bikos e dey, evritin stil dey wer dem dey.
Na-im bi head for di bodi wey bi di shosh and from di biginin, na-im bi di firstborn wey raiz-up from grave, so dat e go bi numba won for evritin.
God dey hapi sey evritin wey dey insaid am, dey insaid en pikin tu
and tru Kraist blood wey e pour out for us for di kros, God go draw evritin bak to ensef, afta E don mak peace wit tins for hevun and eart.
Bifor-bifor, bikos of di wiked tins wey una dey du and tink, una dey far from God and una bi en enemi.
Bot naw, wit en pikin blood, E don draw una klose kom en present, so dat E go mak una en frends wey nor get stain or fault and wey dey holi.
If tru-tru una get fate and una leg strong for groun, den una go get hope kon hol di gospol wey una hear. Dem don prish dis gospol giv evribodi for di wold and mi, Pol, I don kon bi di gospol savant.
I dey hapi for di sofa wey I dey sofa for una and for di shosh wey bi Kraist bodi, so I dey tak my bodi komplit wetin rimain for Kraist sofa.
I bi savant for di shosh, bikos of di wok wey God sey mak I du for una and I dey du-am to komplit God wok.
So di sikrit wey E hide from awa gran-gran papa dem and evribodi wey dey di wold bifor, E don opun am mak en pipol si.
God wont mak dem no di rishis wey dey en glori; wey di sikrit get for evribodi and na-im bi Kraist wey dey insaid una. So una get hope sey una go share for God glori.
As wi dey tel evribodi wetin dem go du, wi dey prish Kraist and tish wit wisdom, so dat wen wi go show una to Kraist, una go don dey pafet.
So na dis tins I dey strogol and wok for, akordin to en pawa wey dey wok insaid mi.
Pipol for Laodisia and doz wey neva si mi face to face, I wont mak una no haw I dey wok for una rish.
Wetin I wont bi sey, wen una don rili undastand God sikrit wey dey insaid Jisos Kraist, mak una heart dey strong wit luv, so dat una go get evritin wey una wont.
Bikos all di wisdom and knowledge wey God get, E hide dem insaid Kraist.
I dey tok all dis tins, so dat nobodi go dey disiv una wit argument.
And ivun if I nor dey der wit una, my spirit dey der and I dey hapi sey una maind nor dey shange and una fate for Kraist, stil strong wel-wel.
So, jos as una asept Jisos Kraist as una Oga, mak una kontinu to liv una life insaid am.
Mak una dey strong for groun and dey grow insaid Kraist, so dat una fate go strong as wi dey tish una and una go dey tank God wel-wel.
Mak una tak kare and nor let enibodi fool una wit wayo tok abaut humanbin wisdom and spiritual pawas wey dey rule di wold, bot mak una dey du as Kraist wont.
Bikos na Kraist dey show us evritin abaut God.
And una dey komplit insaid am; bikos na-im bi di head for all di pawas wey dey for hevun and eart.
Dem sekonsaiz una insaid am. Dis nor bi humanbin sekonsishon, bot na di spirit own, wey Kraist dey du.
Bikos wen dem baptaiz una, dem bere una wit am and una folo am raiz-up tru di fate wey God pawa dey giv and na dis God raiz-am up.
And ivun doh una bin don die insaid una sin bikos dem nor sekonsaiz una bodi, God kon mak una dey alaif wit am, bikos E don forgiv una sins.
E don distroi doz bad-bad tins wey una dey du and wetin dem rite abaut awa debt wey fit kil us, God rimov am kon nail dem for di kros.
God disgrace wiked and evil rulas for publik, wen E win dem for di kros.
So mak una nor let enibodi tak fud, drink, parti, new moon or Sabat mata, tak joj una.
Bikos all dis tins na shadow for di tins wey go kom, bot di ril tin, na Kraist!
Mak una nor let doz wey dey pritend and woship angels joj una. Dat kaind pesin dey tok enihaw abaut vishon wey e sey e si, bot na yeye tins and sin ful en maind.
Dat pesin nor dey wit Kraist wey bi di head. Bikos na Kraist join di hol bodi togeda, as dem dey grow insaid God.
Since una don die wit Kraist and e don fri una from wiked pipol, den why una stil dey bihav as pipol wey nor no God?
Wen dem sey, mak pipol nor hol, chop or tosh som tins, e nor min enitin.
All dis tins dey yuzles as pipol dey yuz dem, bikos na humanbin mak all dis rules.

E bi laik sey dis tins get wisdom, bikos pipol dey woship angels, dey pritend sey dem gud and dey sofa dia bodi; bot dis wisdom nor get value, bikos e nor fit stop pesin mak e nor du di yeye tins wey dey en maind.
So, if God raiz una wit Kraist, den mak una put maind for tins wey dey hevun; di place wer Kraist for sidan for God rite side.
Mak una dey tink abaut tins for hevun, nor bi tins for dis eart,
bikos una don die and una life dey safe wit Kraist for insaid God.
Wen Kraist (wey bi una life) go kom, una go folo am kom wit glori.
So mak una kil evri bad karata wey dis wold dey bring: laik to dey slip wit pesin wey una nor mari; dey bihav enihaw; folo dis wold tins; dey du bad tins; long-trot and to serv juju.
Na dis tins dey mak God ves for doz wey nor dey obey am.
Na so una dey liv una life bifor wen una bi sinas,
bot naw, to dey ves enihaw; to get bad maind for pesin; to tak mout spoil pesin and to dey kos pipol, mak una rimov dem from una life.
Since una don kil una old sef and di tins wey una dey du bifor, mak una nor dey lai giv ish oda.
Mak una wear di new pesin, so dat una go dey new as una dey learn to no and bi laik di Pesin wey kreate una.
For hevun, e nor get enitin laik Greek or Ju pesin; pesin wey dem sekonsaiz or not; bush pesin; pipol wey dey chop humanbin; slave or fri pesin, bot na Kraist bi all and e dey insaid all of us.
So, as pipol wey God don shuz, wey holi and wey E luv wel-wel, mak una kwik dey sori for pipol; dey gentol; nor dey kari bodi up and wear patient laik klot for bodi.
Mak una dey bear wit ish oda; dey forgiv ish oda; ivun doh una get wahala wit enibodi. Jos as Kraist don forgiv una, mak una forgiv odas tu.
Wit all dis gud tins, mak una luv won anoda, bikos na luv bi di best tin wey fit hol una togeda.
Mak Kraist peace dey rule una heart (bikos na tru dis peace, Kraist tak kol una as won bodi) and mak una dey tank God.

Mak Kraist wod stay insaid una and mak una dey tish ish oda wit wisdom wey go mak una heart strong. Mak una dey sing psalm, hymns and spiritual song and dey du all dis tins to rili tank God from una heart.
For enitin wey una dey du, weda una dey tok or du oda tins, mak una du-am wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist name and tank God tru am.
Una wey bi wife, mak una dey du wetin una husban wont, as Kraist pipol sopoz du.
Una wey bi husban, mak una luv una wife and nor dey wiked to dem.
Una wey bi pikin, mak una dey obey una papa and mama for evritin, (dey du evritin wey una papa and mama tok), bikos na wetin Kraist laik bi dat.
Una wey bi papa, mak una nor du wetin go mak una shildren ves, so dat life nor go taya dem.

Una wey bi savants, mak una obey una mastas (dey du wetin dem tok) for evritin and nor bi onli wen dem dey luk una. Mak una nor dey du laik pipol wey wont mak dem praiz dem, bot mak una dey obey wit beta maind, bikos una dey fear God.
Enitin wey una dey du, mak una du-am wit all una bodi, laik sey una dey du-am for Kraist and nor bi for pipol,
bikos una no sey God go giv una di gift wey E promis en pipol.
Pesin wey du bad, God go pay am bak for wetin e du, bikos God dey joj evribodi akordin to wetin dem du, since E nor dey sopot enibodi enihaw.
Una wey bi masta, mak una trit una savants wel and nor shit dem, bikos una no sey, unasef get masta for hevun.
Mak una dey serious for una praya. Mak una dey shine una eye as una dey tank God wen una dey pray.
Laik dis tu, mak una dey pray for us, so dat God go giv us beta shanse to tok abaut Kraist sikrit, wey I dey prish abaut.
Mak una pray mak I tok wel, so dat pipol go undastand mi.
Mak una dey wise as una dey tok wit pipol wey nor dey folo Kraist. Mak una yuz evri shanse wey una get wel.
Mak all of una wod dey gud and swit laik wetin dem put sugar, so dat una go no haw to ansa evribodi.
Tikikus, my broda wey I luv and awa Oga savant; wey dey wok wel-wel laik mi, go tel una evritin wey dey hapun to mi.
Na bikos of dis I send am kom mit una, so dat una go no haw tins bi for us and mak e for giv una heart.
Onesimus, di broda wey dey wit us, wey wi luv wel-wel, wey bi won of una, I dey send am folo Tikikus. Dem go tel una evritin wey dey hapun for here.
Aristakus, wey folo mi dey prizin dey grit una and Mark wey bi Banabas kozin (wey wi bin tel una sey, if e kom mit una, mak una welkom am) dey grit una tu.
Jisos wey dem stil dey kol Justus, dey grit una. Ju pipol wey bi Kristen and dey folo mi du God wok, na onli dem dey help mi.
Epafras, wey bi won of una and Kraist savant, dey grit una. E dey pray wel-wel for una, so dat una leg go strong for groun and una go grow as una dey learn di tins wey God wont.
Bikos I bi witnes sey, e don wok wel-wel for una and doz wey dey Laodisia and Hierapolis.
Awa frend Luke, wey wi luv wel-wel, wey bi doktor and Demas, dey grit una tu.
Mak una tel di brodas and sistas wey dey Laodisia, wit Nimfa and di shosh wey dey gada for en haus sey, I grit dem.
And afta una don read dis leta, mak una let di shosh wey dey Laodisia read am tu. Den mak una stil read di leta wey I rite giv dem.
Mak una tel Arkipus sey, mak e finish di wok wey Kraist gi-am.
Mi Pol, dey rite dis gritin wit my own hand. Mak una rimemba di chains wey dem tak tie mi and mak God grace dey wit una.
Na Pol, Silas and Timoti rite dis leta go giv God and Jisos Kraist pipol wey dey di shosh for Tesalonika. Mak God grace and peace dey wit una.
Wen eva wi dey pray, wi dey always tank God for all of una.
Wi rimemba di wok wey una don du tru fate and as una dey bear bikos of di hope wey una get abaut awa Oga Jisos Kraist.
Awa brodas and sistas wey God luv, wi no sey God don shuz una as en own.
Nor bi onli tru ordinari wod wi tak prish di gospol giv una, bot na wit di Holi Spirit pawa and wi show sey, evritin wey e tok, na tru. Una no haw wi dey liv and help una.
So, una kon bigin du as wi and Kraist dey du; ivun doh una sofa wel-wel, una risiv di mesage wit joy wey di Holi Spirit dey giv.
So una bi ezampol to all di pipol wey biliv Jisos for both Masidonia and Akaya.
Bikos nor bi onli sey di mesage abaut Kraist don rish evriwer for Masidonia and Akaya, bot dem don hear di news abaut una fate for evriwer. So wi nor ivun nid to tok abaut una again.
Pipol dey tok abaut haw una welkom us and liv di juju wey una dey serv bifor kon folo di tru God wey get life.
And una dey wait en pikin wey dey kom from hevun. En pikin, Jisos wey E wak from deat and na-im go save us from God vesnashon wey dey kom.
Awa brodas and sistas, una no sey awa visit nor dey yuzles.
Bifor wi kom mit una for Tesalonika, dem sofa and trit us enihaw for Filipai and meni pipol nor wont mak wi tok, bot awa God giv us pawa to prish en Gud News.
Bikos wetin wi dey prish nor bi wit mistak, dirti maind or wayo,
bot na God shuz us to prish di gospol and na so wi dey prish am. Wi nor dey du-am mak pipol for praiz us, bot mak God wey dey si awa heart, praiz us by ensef.
Wi nor eva trai to win una wit swit wods, as una no. And God na awa witnes sey wi nor dey pritend to bi una frends bikos of una moni.
Wi nor eva sey mak pipol praiz us; weda na una or odas.
Wen wi dey wit una, wi dey gentol laik as mama dey kare for en pikin, ivun doh wi for fit kolet moni from una since wi bi Kraist apostols.
Bikos wi luv una, wi dey hapi as wi dey share God wod and awa own life wit una.
Bot brodas and sistas, wi hope sey una rimemba as wi dey wok for both day and nite, so dat as wi dey prish di gospol, wi nor go bi problem to una.
As wi dey liv wit una wey biliv Kraist, una and God na awa witnes sey, wi dey holi and dey du gud tins for God eye witout fault.
As unasef no, wi dey trit una as papa dey trit en shildren.
Wi dey advise, beg and tok to una sey, una must liv una life as God wont, bikos na-im kol una enta en own kindom and glori.

Wi stil dey tank God evritaim, bikos wen una asept God mesage wey una hear from us, una nor asept am laik sey na humanbin mesage, bot una asept am as God mesage and tru-tru na God mesage e bi and God dey wok insaid una wey don biliv.
My brodas and sistas, na di same tin hapun to God shosh for Judea and una wey biliv Kraist for der don stil sofa pain from una kontri men wey bi Ju pipol.
Di same Ju pipol wey dey ponish us, na dem stil kil awa Oga Jisos Kraist and di profets. Dem dey wiked to evribodi and nor dey du wetin God wont.

Dem ivun trai to stop us, so dat wi nor go prish di mesage wey go giv salvashon to Gentai pipol. As dem dey du so, dia sins dey plenti more-more. Bot naw, God vesnashon wit ponishment dey kom mit dem.
My brodas and sistas, afta wi liv una (ivun doh wi stil dey tink abaut una), wi kon dey trai to mak sure sey wi si una again bikos of di luv wey wi get for una.
Wi bin won kom si una (mi, Pol don trai to kom meni taims), bot Satan spoil awa plan.
Nor bi una bi awa hope, joy and krawn wey wi go tak boast giv Jisos wen E kom? Yes! Na una!
Bikos na una bi awa joy and glori!
Wen wi nor fit bear am again, wi kon sey wi go stay for Atens by awasef.
So wi kon send Timoti, awa broda wey dey folo us du God wok sey, mak e kom enkorage una konsanin una fate,
so dat nobodi among una go dey fear, bikos of all dis sofa. Unasef no sey all wetin dey hapun, na as God plan am.
Wen wi dey wit una, wi dey tel una bifor di taim rish sey, wi go sofa wel-wel and e don dey hapun as una dey si-am.
So wen I nor fit bear again, I send pesin mak e help mi shek haw una fate bi, bikos I dey fear sey devol wey dey tempt pipol, don tempt una and all di wok wey wi du among una, don dey yuzles.

Bot naw, Timoti don kom mit us afta e si una and e tel us di Gud News abaut di fate and luv wey una get. E stil tel us sey, una dey always rimemba and dey hungri to si us, jos as wisef dey hungri to si una.
So, awa brodas and sistas, for all awa trobol and sofa, awa heart dey strong abaut una, bikos of una fate.
Naw, wi dey alaif again, bikos una stand wel for Kraist
and wi dey tank God for una. Wi dey tank am for di joy wey wi get for en present bikos of una.
Wi dey pray wit all awa maind for day and nite sey, mak God let us si una again kon let una no evritin wey una sopoz no abaut una fate.
Mak God awa papa and Oga Jisos priper road for us, so dat wi go si una again.
Mak Kraist mak una luv for ish oda and for evribodi, grow more-more and big, jos as awa luv for una bi,
so dat una heart go dey strong for holines. And for di taim wey Kraist go kom wit en pipol, una go dey witout fault for God present.
Finali, my brodas and sistas, wi dey ask and beg una bikos of Kraist sey, as una don hear from us abaut haw una sopoz liv as God wont (as una dey du naw), mak una kontinu to dey liv laik dat.
Una no di komands wey wi giv una tru Kraist.
Na wetin God wont bi dis: mak una dey holi; komot hand for bad tins; nor slip wit hu nor bi yor wife or husban.
Una wey bi man, mak una dey liv wit una wife for holines and wit respet,
nor bi to dey folo hu yu nor mari, jos as Gentai pipol wey nor no God dey du.
Mak nobodi shit en Kristen broda or mak am ves, bikos na God go fite for di pesin wey yu shit and wi don tel una bifor and wi stil dey warn una sey, God go rili ponish pipol wey dey du laik dat.
Bikos God nor kol us to liv yeye life, bot na to liv holi life.
So, enibodi wey rejet wetin wi tok; nor bi humanbin autoriti e rejet, bot na God wey giv una en Holi Spirit.
No nid to rite giv una abaut luv for una felow Kristens, bikos God ensef don tish una abaut haw una sopoz luv ish oda.
And una rili dey show luv to di Kristen brodas and sistas for Masidonia. My brodas and sistas, wi dey beg una sey, mak una kontinu to dey du laik dat.
Mak una dey du wel, so dat una go liv kwayet life and dey maind una own biznes; dey wok wit una hand as wi komand una bifor.
Laik dis, doz sinas go dey respet una and una go get evritin wey una nid.
Awa brodas and sistas, wi wont mak una no di trut abaut doz pipol wey don die, so dat una nor go dey sad laik pipol wey nor get hope.
Since wi biliv sey Jisos die and e wak-up; na so tu wi biliv sey, doz wey bi Kristens bifor dem die, God go raiz dem up.
Bikos wetin wi dey tish una naw, na wetin Kraist tish sey: wi wey dey alaif wen Jisos go kom, nor go folo am go kon liv doz wey don die bikos, all of us go-go wit am.
God big angel go shaut dey komand as Kraist dey kom dan from hevun; di angel vois go dey loud wit God trumpet and doz wey bi Kristens bifor dem die, go first go up.
God go kari wi wey rimain for dis wold go mit dem for skai, den all of us go-go mit Kraist for hevun.
So mak una dey enkorage ish oda wit all dis wod.
Brodas and sistas, konsanin di taim and season wen dis tins go hapun, wi nor nid to rite enitin giv una.
Bikos una rili no sey, di day wen Kraist go kom, e go bi laik wen tif dey kom for nite.
Wen pipol dey sey, "Evritin dey okay and peaceful," na dat taim wahala wey go skata evriwer go kom and e go bi laik di pain wey wuman dey face wen e won born and nobodi go eskape from am.
Bot una wey bi awa brodas and sistas, mak una komot from daknes, so dat, dat day nor go kom mit una as tif dey kom wen nobodi dey espet,
bikos all of una na lite shildren. Wi nor bi nite or daknes shildren,
so mak wi nor dey slip as odas dey du, bot mak wi shine awa eye wel-wel.
Na for nite pipol dey slip and dey drink enihaw.
Bot since wi bilong to lite, mak wi dey kwayet, yuz fate and luv tak protet awa chest, den wear di hope wey wi get, laik cap for head.
Bikos God nor shuz us to sofa en vesnashon, bot to get salvashon tru awa Oga Jisos Kraist
wey die for us, so dat weda wi dey alaif or wi don die wen e kom, wi go stay togeda wit am for hevun.
So mak una dey enkorage and help ish oda, jos as una dey du naw.
Naw wi dey beg una, awa brodas and sistas, mak una dey respet doz wey dey wok, gaid and tel una wetin to du abaut dis mata wey konsan Kraist.
Bikos of di wok wey dem dey du, mak una luv and respet dem wel-wel.
Wi dey beg una, awa brodas and sistas, mak una tel pipol wey dey bihav enihaw sey, wetin dem dey du nor gud, den mak una help doz wey dey wik, bot mak una dey patient wit evribodi.
Mak una dey sure sey nobodi pay bad for bad, bot for evritaim, mak una always dey du gud for ish oda and for evribodi.
Mak una dey hapi evritaim.
Mak una dey pray evritaim.
Mak una dey tank God for evritin, bikos na so God wont sey mak una wey dey insaid Kraist dey du.
Mak una nor driv God Spirit komot for una life.
Mak una nor tak God wod wey pesin tok as yeye tin.
Mak una test evritin kon dey du wetin gud.
Mak una nor put hand for wiked and evil tins.
Mak God wey dey giv peace, help una to dey holi go rish di end, so dat for di day wen Kraist go kom, una spirit, soul and maind go dey witout fault.
Di Pesin wey kol una to du en wok dey fateful.
My brodas and sistas, mak una pray for us.
Mak una grit all di brodas and sistas as God wont am.
I komand una wit Jisos name sey, mak una read dis leta giv all di brodas and sistas wey biliv.
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit una.
Na Pol, Silas and Timoti rite dis leta go giv God and Jisos Kraist pipol wey dey di shosh for Tesalonika.
Mak grace and peace wey God awa papa and Oga Jisos Kraist dey giv, dey wit una.
Wi get beta rizin to dey tank God evritaim for una, bikos una fate dey grow more-more and di luv wey una get for ish oda, dey grow tu.
So, bikos of una fate and haw una dey bear wahala and sofa, wi dey yuz una boast to all di pipol for God shosh.
Dis na sign sey God dey giv koret jojment. E wont mak una dey gud to inherit en kindom and na bikos of dis kindom, una dey sofa so.
E gud as God dey ponish di pipol wey dey trobol una.
And una wey dey sofa so, God go giv wi and una res wen Kraist go kom from hevun wit en mighti angels.
Den Kraist go yuz fire wey nor dey kwensh tak ponish doz wey nor no God and wey nor dey obey wetin wi dey prish abaut am.
God go distroi dem and dia ponishment nor go eva end. Wen Kraist go kom risiv glori from di pipol wey e shuz,
e go driv sinas komot from en present, en pawa and en glori. Dat day, evribodi wey biliv, go praiz am and tru-tru, una biliv evritin wey wi tel una.
Na dis mak us dey always pray for una sey, as God kol una, E go mak una dey gud and evri gud tin wey una wont, go hapun to una tru en pawa, so dat una wok wey una dey du wit fate, go komplit.
So, bikos of una, pipol go dey praiz awa Oga Jisos Kraist and akordin to awa God and Oga Jisos Kraist grace, unasef go dey risiv en blessin.
Naw my brodas and sistas, for di taim wen Jisos go kom and wen God go gada us go mit am, wi won tel una sey,
mak fear nor dey una maind or spirit; ivun doh wi tel or rite giv una sey Kraist go soon kom.
Mak nobodi disiv una. Bikos dat day nor go kom ontil trobol go first kom and tru-tru, di pesin wey God go distroi, go kom out.
E go opoz and kari ensef pas God and oda tins wey pipol dey woship. E go ivun sidan for God tempol dey tok sey e bi God.
Una rimemba sey wen I dey wit una bifor, I tel una all dis tins.
And una no wetin dey stop am, bikos e go onli kom out wen en taim don rish.
Dis wikednes don alredi dey wok for sikrit and dem go dey sikrit ontil di pesin, wey bi di Holi Spirit wey dey hol dem, go komot for road.
Den evribodi go no hu dis wiked man bi and God go distroi am wit briz from Kraist mout kon bere am wit di glori wey dey kom.
Di wiked man go kom wit Satan pawa and e go du difren mirakols and wondas.
E go yuz wayo disiv doz wey go perish, bikos dem nor won luv and respet di trut wey for save dem.
So God go mak dem disiv dis pipol wel-wel and dem go biliv dia lai-lai.
Den God go distroi dem, bikos dem enjoy sin insted of di trut.

Bot my brodas and sistas wey God luv, wi dey always tank God for una evritaim, bikos God don shuz una from di biginin sey, E go save una wit di Holi Spirit pawa wey go mak una dey holi, since una get fate and trut.
E kol una enta en salvashon tru awa mesage, so dat una go fit get share for Kraist glori.
So, my brodas and sistas, mak una stand wel for groun kon hol wetin wi tish una tait; weda na tru di wods wey wi tok or letas wey wi rite.
Naw I dey pray sey, God wey luv and giv us beta komfort tru en grace and hope,
go enkorage and giv una pawa for all di gud wok wey una dey du or di wods wey una dey tok.
Finali, my brodas and sistas, mak una pray for us, so dat Kraist mesage go kontinu to spread kon get glori jos as e rili get among una.
Mak God diliva us from wiked and evil pipol, bikos nor bi evribodi get fate.
Bot Kraist dey kip en promis and E go mak una strong.
Wi get maind sey Kraist go help una and una go du all di tins wey wi tel una.
I pray mak God gaid una heart to undastand en luv more-more, so dat una go get Kraist patient.
My brodas and sistas, wi dey komand una wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist name sey, mak una nor folo bilivas wey dey du enihaw and nor dey du as wi tel dem.
Una no sey una sopoz to dey imitate us, bikos wi nor bihav enihaw wen wi dey wit una.
Wi nor chop enibodi fud wey wi nor pay for. Insted, wi dey strogol and wok hard for day and nite, so dat wi nor go bi wahala to una.
Nor bi sey wi nor get rite to ask una, bot wi won yuz awasef as ezampol for una,
bikos ivun wen wi dey wit una, wi tel una sey, "Pesin wey nor redi to wok, mak e nor chop."
Wi hear sey som pipol among una dey liv enihaw and dem nor dey maind dia biznes, insted dem dey put eye for anoda pesin tin.
Wi dey komand and enkorage dis kaind pipol wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist name sey, mak dem du dia wok wel, so dat dem go fit fid demsef.
My brodas and sistas, mak e nor taya una to du gud.
Bot if enibodi nor obey awa mesage tru dis leta, mak una luk dat kaind pesin wel-wel and mak nobodi folo am waka or du enitin togeda, so dat shame go kash am.
Mak una nor si-am as enemi, bot mak una koret am as una broda.
Naw, mak Kraist wey dey giv peace, giv una en peace evritaim and mak di peace dey wit una always.
Na mi Pol dey rite and grit una wit my own hand, jos as I dey du for evri leta wey I don send kom mit una.
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit all of una.
Pol wey bi Jisos Kraist apostol tru God awa Savior komand, na-im rite dis leta and na Jisos Kraist bi di hope wey wi get:
To Timoti, my own pikin for di fate. Mak favor, mesi and peace wey dey kom from God awa papa and Jisos Kraist awa Oga, dey wit yu.
As I tel yu wen I dey go Masidonia, mak yu koret doz pipol for Efisos wey nor dey tish di trut.
Nor let dem waste oda pipol taim wit dia yeye tok, insted of God wod wey dey mak pesin fate strong.
Bot di rizin why I dey giv dis komand, na bikos I luv dem from my heart wit beta maind and fate.
Som disobey dis komand kon dey tok tins wey nor mak sense.
Dem wont tish pipol di law, bot dem nor undastand wetin dem dey tok, ivun doh dem dey tok wit strong heart.
Bot wi no sey di law dey gud wen pipol dey obey am.

God nor giv di law, bikos of gud pipol, bot na for pipol wey dey disobey and du enihaw. Dis kaind pipol dey laik to sin and nor dey fear God. Dem nor dey holi or get respet for enitin and dem fit kil dia papa, mama or enibodi.

Di law na for pipol wey dey slip wit hu dem nor mari; man wey dey slip wit man; wuman wey dey slip wit wuman; pesin wey dey sel pipol as slave; lai-lai pipol; doz wey dey promis and den nor fit du-am or enibodi wey nor dey obey di rite tishins
wey dey dis beta gospol, wey awa blessed God sey mak I dey prish.
I tank Kraist awa Oga, wey giv mi pawa to du en wok. Ivun doh I dey tok bad abaut am and dey opres en pipol bifor,
e si mi as gud pesin kon shuz mi to serv am. Bot God sori for mi, bikos den I nor no wetin I dey du and I nor biliv en gospol.
Bot God grace big wel-wel wit fate and luv wey dey for Jisos Kraist.
Dis na tru wod and e gud for evribodi to asept and biliv am sey: "Jisos Kraist kom dis wold kon save sinas" and na mi wos pas.
Bot God sori for mi, so dat Kraist go yuz mi as beta ezampol to show sey, e dey patient wit ivun di pesin wey sin pas. Den odas go no sey, demsef go fit biliv am kon get life wey nor dey end.
Mak all di onor and glori bi God own foreva and eva! Na-im bi di King wey nor dey die, di Won wey nobodi dey si and na onli en bi God. Amen!
Timoti my pikin, na as dem tok for di wod wey dem profesai abaut yu bifor, na-im mak mi giv yu dis komands. So mak dis wods mak yu strong as yu dey fite for Kraist.
Hol yor fate for Kraist wel and mak yor maind dey klear. Bikos som pipol nor dey yuz gud maind and bikos of dat, dia fate don skata.
Himenaeus and Alexander na ezampol of doz kaind pipol. I don giv dem to Satan, so dat dem go stop to dey tok enihaw abaut God.
First of all, I tel una mak una dey pray, ask and tank God for evribodi.
Mak una pray for kings and doz wey dey rule, so dat wi go fit liv for peace, get beta karata and gud life wit fear for God.
Dis kaind tin gud and na wetin God awa Savior dey laik,
bikos E wont mak evribodi dey save and undastand di trut.
Bikos na onli won God dey and na Jisos Kraist wey kom as humanbin, bi di pesin wey dey bring God and humanbin togeda.
E die so dat evribodi go dey fri. Na dis mesage God go giv di wold, wen di taim don rish.
Na dis tins mak God shuz mi as prisha, apostol and tisha to Gentai pipol, so dat I go prish fate and wetin bi trut (na tru wod I dey tel una so, I nor dey lai).
So, I wont mak evribodi dey pray for evriwer, dey raiz dia holi hand witout vesnashon or kowrel.
I wont mak wimen dey dress wel wit sef kontrol. Nor mak yeye hair style; nor wear tu mush gold or stones and klot wey dear wel-wel.
Insted, mak dem get gud karata as wimen wey dey fear God, sopoz bi.
Mak wimen dey kwayet and listin wel as dem dey learn.
I nor alow wuman tish or giv dem authoti ova men. Mak dem kwayet dey listin,
bikos na Adam God first kreate, nor bi Eve.
And nor bi Adam, Satan disiv. Satan disiv di wuman and na so sin tak kom dis wold.
Bot God go save di wuman wen e won born, so-far e kontinu to get fate, luv, holines and dey kontrol ensef.
Dis na tru wod: If eni man laik to bi lida, na beta wok e wont.
Leada for shosh must bi pesin wey nor get fault; wey get onli won wife; fit kontrol ensef; get sense and respet; dey welkom pipol and e bi gud tisha.
Mak e nor bi drunkard or pesin wey laik to fite; bot e must dey gentol. Mak e nor bi pesin wey laik to kowrel or luv moni.
E must bi pesin wey dey manage en own haus wel and dey mak en shildren obey and respet am.
If pesin nor fit manage en own haus, na haw e go tak manage God shosh?
Hu won bi lida must bi pesin wey get strong fate, bikos if e nor strong for fate, e go start to kari bodi up, den Satan go ponish am.
Pipol wey nor dey di shosh must dey tok wel abaut di pesin wey bi lida, so dat dem nor go disgrace and mak am fal enta devol trap.
Laik dis tu, dikins must bi pipol wey get gud karata; nor bi pipol wey dey play wayo; dey drink enihaw or luv moni.
Dem must bi pipol wey get maind and dey prish di trut abaut di fate wey God don show us.
Bifor dem go shuz dikins, mak dem test dem wel-wel. If dem pas di test, den dem fit serv as dikins.
Laik dis tu, dia wives must get gud karata, nor bi wives wey dey lai or gossip, bot dem must fit dey kontrol diasef and dey honest for evritin.
Dikin must dey fateful to en wife and must fit kontrol en shildren and evritin for en haus.
Doz wey don serv wel as dikins, pipol go respet dem wel-wel and di fate wey dem get for Kraist, go dey strong.
I dey rite all dis komand to una naw, ivun doh I dey hope to kom si una soon,
so dat if I nor kwik kom, una go no haw pipol sopoz bihav for God shosh, wey bi di tru pillar and foundashon.

Wi no sey God ways dey great wel-wel: Kraist kom as humanbin; di Spirit show sey e dey fri; angels si-am wen e kom prish among Gentai pipol; pipol biliv am for di wold and God kari am go hevun wit glori.
Di Spirit tok sey for di last days, som pipol go liv di fate kon dey biliv lai-lai spirits and folo wetin dimons dey tish.
Dis pipol dey lai and na wayo dem sabi du and dia maind don skata.
Dem dey tish sey, e nor gud to mari or chop som kaind fud. Bot na God kreate dis fud and E sey pipol wey biliv di trut fit chop am afta dem don tank am.
Bikos evritin wey God kreate, dey gud and wi nor sopoz rejet eni fud, so-far wi don tank God for am,
bikos God wod and praya don mak am klin.
If yu giv all dis komands to di brodas and sistas, yu go bi gud savant for Kraist, bikos yu don fid yorsef wit God wod, wey bi di spiritual fud and naim bi di gud tishin wey yu dey folo.
Bot mak una rejet lai-lai and yeye stori. Insted mak una dey train unasef wit beta wods from God.
Fisica tranin dey gud, bot na to no God gud pas, bikos yu go get riwod for dis life and di won wey dey kom.
Dis na tru wod and e gud mak evribodi asept am wit beta maind.
Na dis mak wi dey wok hard and dey strogol, bikos awa hope dey wit God wey dey alaif and E dey save evribodi, especiali doz wey biliv am.
Mak yu tish di pipol dis tins and mak sure sey, dem du dem.
Nor let enibodi opres yu bikos of yor age; bot mak yu show ezampol to doz wey biliv tru yor wod, karata, luv, fate and as yu gud rish.
Ontil I kom bak, mak yu dey read God Wod for shosh, dey enkorage di bilivas and tish dem.
Nor stop to dey yuz di spiritual gift wey yu get; bikos yu get am tru profesi, wen eldas put hand for yor head dey pray.
Mak yu dey learn dis tins; dey du-am wit all yor maind, so dat pipol go si as yu dey progress.
Mak yu wosh as yu dey liv yor life and di tins wey yu dey tish. Get patient, bikos if yu dey du laik dis, yu go save yorsef and doz wey dey listin to yu.
Mak yu nor tok enihaw to pesin wey old pas yu, bot dey tok to am wit respet laik sey yu dey tok to yor papa. Tok to young men as yu go tak tok to yor broda.
Mak yu trit wimen wey old pas yu laik sey dem bi yor mama and wimen wey yu senior, mak yu trit dem wit gud maind laik sey dem bi yor sistas.
Respet and kare for wimen wey dia husban don die.
Bot if di wuman get shildren or grand-shildren, di first tin wey dem go du for dia famili, na to show sey dem dey fear God, as dem dey kare for dia papa and mama. Dis na wetin dey mak bele swit God.
Naw, wuman wey en husban don die and e rili dey alone for dis wold, dey trust God. E dey pray for nite and day sey mak God help am.
Bot if e jos dey enjoy ensef enihaw for dis wold, dat min sey en spirit don die, ivun doh e stil dey alaif.
Mak yu always dey giv dis komand so dat dem nor go get fault.
Bot if enibodi nor fit kare for en pipol, especiali en famili membas, e don denai di fate bi dat and e wos pas sina.
Wuman wey don pas sisti years and e dey fateful to en husban bi for di man die, mak una put am join doz wey di shosh dey help.
Evribodi go no am for di gud wok wey e dey du sey: e don train shildren; dey welkom stranjas; dey serv God pipol; dey help doz wey nor get and e dey du difren gud wok.
Bot young wuman wey en husban jos die, mak una nor put am join doz wey di shosh dey help, bikos wen dem dey hungri to mari again, dem go fit liv Kraist kon bigin sin.
So God go joj dem, bikos dem don break dia promis.
For di same taim, dem go dey lazi, dey waka from haus to haus, dey du aproko and tok enihaw.
So I wont mak di young wimen mari; born shildren; dey gaid dia haus, so dat enemis nor go get shanse to akuiz dem.
Bikos som pipol don alredi dey folo Satan.
If enibodi wey biliv get relashons wey en husban don die, mak e help dem. Mak e nor wori di shosh abaut dem, so dat dem go fit help di oda wimen wey dia husban don die.
Doz wey dey lid wel, mak dem pay dem wel, especiali doz wey dey wok and tish wel-wel, so dat di gospol go stand.
Bikos God wod sey, "Anima wey dey havest korn, mak una nor tie en mout." Enibodi wey dey wok, sopoz get en pay.
Mak yu nor asept eni wods wey dem tok against eni lida, unles tu or tiri pipol bear witnes sey na tru.
Doz wey dey sin, mak yu koret dem for evribodi front, so dat e go bi warnin to odas.
For God, Jisos Kraist and di angels wey dey wit us, I dey enkorage yu mak yu obey all di komands witout wayo.
Mak yu nor huri to mak pesin lida and nor rush put hand for en head, so dat yu nor go kari anoda pesin sin for yor head. Mak yu kip yorsef pure.
Nor dey drink onli wota, bot mak yu stil drink smol wine bikos of yor bele wey dey mak yu sik enihaw.
Rimemba sey som pipol dey sin mak evribodi si-am and dis dey joj dem. Bot e get som wey yu nor go no dia sins naw, bot leta, e go kom out for publik.
Laik dis tu, pipol dey si di gud wok wey odas dey du and won day, di gud wok wey dem du for sikrit, go kom out for publik.
Una wey bi savants, mak una dey respet una masta, so dat nobodi go tok bad abaut God and wetin wi dey tish.

Mak una nor disobey una masta, bikos dem bi bilivas. Bot mak una serv and luv dem wel, bikos di mastas wey una dey serv, na Kristen dem bi. Timoti, mak yu tish dis tins and dey enkorage evribodi to obey am.
If enibodi dey tish wetin nor koret and nor agri wit awa Oga Jisos Kraist tishin and as God wont mak wi dey liv awa life,
dat pesin dey proud and na onli to dey argue and kworel, e no. Dis kaind tin nor gud, bikos jelosi, kworel, lai-lai, to dey suspect odas enihaw
and wahala, naim e dey kause. Dia maind don spoil and dem nor no di trut again, bikos dem tink sey dem fit yuz God wok tak mak moni.
To liv as God wont and dey hapi wit wetin E giv yu, dey bring beta riwod.
Bikos wi nor bring enitin kom dis wold and tru-tru, wi nor go tak won singol tin komot from dis wold afta wi don die.
Bot if wi get fud to chop and klot to wear, mak dem rish us.
Pipol wey won get moni by fos, dey fal enta temtashon and dem dey get trot for yeye tins wey go distroi and put dem for wahala.
Pesin wey luv moni, go get wahala, wiked and evil tins. Bikos som pipol won get moni by fos, dem don fal komot from di fate kon wound demsef enihaw.
Bot yu wey dey serv God, mak yu nor put hand for all dat kaind tin. Insted, mak yu dey strogol to du wetin dey rite and gud; dey kip yor promis, dey luv, get patient and dey gentol.
Mak yu fite di fite wey dey mak fate strong and hol di life wey nor dey end, wey go mak pipol praiz God, bikos na dis mak am kol yu.
Bifor God wey dey giv life to all tins and Jisos Kraist wey tok wel for Pontius Pilate front, I dey tel yu from my heart sey,
mak yu obey dia komands witout fault or blame, ontil awa Oga Jisos Kraist go kom.
Bikos wen di taim don rish, Kraist go kom from hevun wit God mighti pawa: Na God bi di King for all kings and Oga of all oga.
Dis God nor fit die and E dey stay for lite wey nobodi dey fit waka near. Lite wey humanbin neva fit si. Mak all onor and pawa bi en own foreva and eva. Amen!

Mak yu giv dis komand to rish pipol. Tel dem sey, mak dem nor dey kari bodi up kon dey trust dia moni wey nor get value and mak dem dey trust God wey dey giv us evritin wey wi nid to tak enjoy dis life.
Tel dem sey, mak dem yuz dia moni tak du gud. Mak dem dey du plenti gud woks kon dey giv doz wey nor get and mak dem always dey redi to share wit odas.
If dem dey du laik dis, dem go dey yuz dia moni and propati tak lay gud foundashon for dia future, so dat dem go get life wey nor dey end.
Timoti, mak yu gaid wetin God giv yu wel-wel. Nor put yor mout for yeye tins or mata wey pipol wey nor no God dey tok and du, bikos dem dey opoz yu wit wetin dem feel sey dem no.
Som pipol don fal komot from di fate, bikos dem dey listin to pipol wey dey du doz bad tins. Mak God grace dey wit all of una.
Na Pol, Jisos Kraist apostol rite dis leta, bikos na so God wont am, so dat I go prish abaut di life wey God promis us tru Kraist.
To Timoti, my pikin wey I luv. Mak grace, mesi and peace dey wit yu from God awa Papa and awa Oga Jisos Kraist.
Eni taim I rimemba yu for my praya, weda na for nite or day taim, I dey always tank God wey I dey serv wit beta maind, jos as my gran-gran papa dem serv am.
Wen I rimemba as yu tak krai, e dey hungri mi to kom si yu, so dat joy go ful my maind.
I always dey rimemba di fate wey yu first get from yor gran mama, Lois and from yor mama, Eunice. I dey sure sey e dey insaid yu.
Na dis mak mi dey rimaind yu sey, mak yu dey yuz God gift wey yu get wel and yu risiv dis gift afta I lay hand for yor head.
Bikos God nor giv us di spirit wey go mak us fear, bot di spirit wey E giv us, get pawa, luv and sef-kontrol.
So mak yu dey proud to tok abaut Kraist or abaut mi wey dey prizin bikos of am and mak yu yuz di pawa wey God giv yu, tak folo mi sofa for dis gospol.
Bikos God save and kol us to liv holi life. E du laik dis, nor bi sey wi deserve am bikos of wetin wi du, bot na so E plan am ivun bifor di wold start, so dat wi go no en grace tru Jisos Kraist.
Bot naw, E don bring all dis plan out wen awa Oga Jisos Kraist kom dis wold. E distroi deat pawa kon bring life wey nor dey end tru di gospol.
Na dis gospol mak God shuz mi as prisha, apostol and tisha.
And naim mak mi dey sofa wetin I dey sofa so. Bot I nor dey shame, bikos I no di Pesin wey I dey serv and I dey sure sey, E go gaid di tin wey I gi-am hol, ontil di day wey Kraist go kom.
Mak yu kontinu wit di wod wey I tel yu kon dey du-am wit di fate and luv wey dey insaid Kraist.
Mak yu gaid di gud tins wey God giv yu tru di Holi Spirit wey dey insaid us.
Yu no sey evribodi for Asia, Figelus and Hermogenes aria, don run liv mi.
