Mak God show en mesi to Onesiforus famili, bikos e dey always mak mi hapi and e nor dey shame sey I dey prizin.
Wen e kom Rome, e faind mi for evriwer ontil e si mi.
For di day wen Kraist go kom, mak e show am en mesi! And yu no haw e help mi wen I dey Efisos.
So yu, my pikin, mak yu dey strong for di grace wey Kraist dey giv.
Di tins wey yu hear mi tok for pipol present, mak yu tish oda pipol wey yu trust sey dem dey redi to tish odas.
Mak yu dey redi to sofa as mi and odas dey sofa, so dat yu go bi gud soja for Kraist.
Nor-tin konsan sojas wit tins wey ordinari pipol dey du; if not, e nor go du wetin en oga wont.
Bikos enibodi wey dey run race, nor go fit win unles e folo di rule wey dey di game.
Farma wey wok wel-wel, naim sopoz get di first share for di havest.
Mak yu tink abaut wetin I dey tok so and Kraist go help yu to undastand evritin.
Rimemba Jisos Kraist wey kom from David famili; di pesin wey God raiz from deat; bikos na so e bi for di mesage wey I dey prish
and na dis Gud News mak mi dey sofa, so-tey, dem kon put mi for prizin laik tif; bot dem nor fit put God wod for prizin!
So I dey redi to bear di sofa, as long as e go save doz wey God don shuz insaid Kraist, wit glori wey go dey foreva and eva.
Dis wod na tru: If wi die wit am, wi go liv wit am tu.
If wi bear wit am, den wi go reign wit am tu and if wi sey wi nor no am, en tu go sey, e nor no us.
Weda wi get fate for am or not, Kraist go stil bi hu e bi and e nor go shange.
Mak yu rimaind evribodi abaut dis tins, den mak yu komand dem for God present sey, mak dem nor dey argue abaut wods, bikos doz kaind tins nor dey gud and e fit konfuz doz wey dey listin.
Mak yu du evritin wey yu fit du, so dat God go si yu as beta pesin. Dey du yor wok wel as pesin wey nor dey shame, bot dey redi to esplain God wod wey bi trut.
Mak yu nor put mout for yeye tok, bikos pipol wey dey du doz tins, dey far from God.
Dia wod dey spread laik diziz and na dis tin hapun to Himenaeus and Filetus.
Dem liv di trut kon dey sey resurreshon don hapun alredi and laik dis, dem don mak som pipol fal from di fate.
Bot God strong foundashon stil stand and dem rite put sey, "God no en pipol" and "Evribodi wey bi Kraist own, must stop to du evil."
Wen yu go rish man haus, nor bi onli gold and silva tins dey der, bot tins wey dem yuz wud and clay tak mak stil dey der tu and som dey mak di haus fine and odas nor gud at-all.
So if yu kip yorsef witout fault, yu go bi beta pesin wey Kraist fit yuz as e dey du en gud wok.
Mak yu run from doz tins wey dey hungri young pipol to du, so dat yu go please God foreva. Den yu go fit luv and stay for peace wit odas wey dey serv God wit klin heart.
I dey tel yu again sey, mak yu nor put mout for yeye wod, bikos yu no sey dis kaind tin dey kause kworel.
Pesin wey bi Kraist savant nor dey kworel, insted e must dey gud wit evribodi, must sabi tish wel-wel and get patient wit stuborn pipol.
E must dey gentol as e dey koret pipol wey dey opoz en prishin. May bi God go let dem turn from sin kom mit am, so dat dem go no di trut.
Den dia sense go koret and dem nor go fal enta devol trap again. Bikos devol don kash dem put insaid en trap bifor and den dem dey du enitin wey e wont.
Mak yu undastand sey, for di last days bifor dis wold go end, tins go hard wel-wel.
Pipol go dey tink of diasef alone; dey laik moni; dey boast; dey kari bodi up; dey tok bad abaut God; dey disobey dia papa and mama and dem nor dey tank ivun pipol wey du gud for dem.
Dem nor get luv or forgivenes; dem go dey gossip odas and nor fit kontrol diasef. Dem go dey wiked and hate wetin gud.
Dem go betray dia frends; dey du tins bifor dem tink; dey feel sey dem dey important and dem go luv enjoyment pas God.
If yu luk dem wel-wel, dem bi laik God pipol, bot dem don rejet God pawa. So mak yu run from dis kaind pipol.
Bikos na dis pipol dey hide enta pipol haus kon slip wit wimen wey nor get sense; wey dey sin wel-wel and wetin dey swit dis wimen to du, na-im dey kontrol dem.
Doz kaind wimen dey trai to learn, bot dem nor dey fit no di trut.
Jos as Jannes and Jambres opoz Mosis; na so tu, dis pipol wey dia maind blok and nor get fate, dey opoz di trut.
Bot dem nor go du-am tey, bikos evribodi go si haw dem foolish rish, jos as e hapun to Jannes and Jambres.
Bot yu don no my tishins; di way I dey liv my life and why I dey du wetin I dey du: my fate, patient, luv and as I dey bear.
Yu no di wahala and sofa wey hapun to mi for Antiok, Ikonium and for Lystra. I bear all dis wahala and Kraist save mi from dem.
Tru-tru, enibodi wey won liv di kaind life wey God wont insaid Kraist, mak e no sey e must sofa.
Bot wiked and evil pipol nor go prospa. Dem go disiv odas and dem go disiv diasef tu.
Bot mak yu kontinu to du wetin yu learn. Yu no sey dis tins na tru and yu trust doz wey tish yu.
Dem don tish yu God wod since yu bi smol pikin and yu don get savashon to risiv di wisdom wey dey kom tru Kraist, wey yu trust.
Evri wod wey dey Bibol, kom from God and dem dey gud to tish us di trut and to no di tins wey dey wrong for awa life. God wod dey koret us wen wi dey wrong and e dey tish us to du gud tins,
so dat as wi dey du God wok, wi go fit du-am wel and wi go get evritin wey wi nid to tak du gud tins.
I dey tel yu wetin to du for God and Jisos Kraist present. Wen Kraist go apier to mak en kindom stand, e go joj pipol wey dey alaif and doz wey don die.
Mak yu dey prish God wod and dey redi, weda di taim dey okay or not. Mak yu yuz patient tak koret and enkorage yor pipol wit beta tishin.
Bikos taim dey kom wen pipol nor go won hear gud and beta tishin again. Insted, dem go dey folo wetin dey hungri dem to du kon dey faind tisha wey go tish dem wetin dem won hear.
Dem go rejet di trut and luv lai-lai stori.
Bot mak yu kontrol yorsef for evritin. Nor fear to sofa for Kraist. Dey du God wok and dey tel odas abaut di Gud News.
For mi, I don alredi yuz my life as ofrin for God wok, bikos di taim wey I go die, don near.
I don fite di gud fite for di fate wey I get; I don run di race finish; I don du wetin I promis sey I go du.

Naw, di prize for raitiousnes dey wait mi and na God wey dey joj rite go giv mi dis prize for di day wen Kraist go kom. Di prize nor bi for mi alone, bot na for evribodi wey dey wait for Kraist to kom bak.
Mak yu trai yor best to kom si mi soon.
Bikos Demas luv dis wold tins, e kon run liv mi go Tesalonika. Krescens don go Galatia and Titus go Dalmatia.
Na onli Luke dey wit mi. Mak yu kari Mark folo bodi wen yu dey kom, bikos e go fit help mi for di ministri wok.
I send Tikikus go Efisos.
Wen yu dey kom, bring di klot wey I liv wit Karpus for Troas. Mak yu bring my books, especiali my papers.
Alexander wey dey du iron wok, wiked mi wel-wel, bot Kraist go joj am for wetin e du.
Mak yu dey kareful wit am, bikos e fite against evritin wey wi tok.
Di first taim wen dem kari mi go kourt, evribodi abandon mi and all of dem run liv mi. Mak God nor joj dem bikos of wetin dem du!
Bot God dey for my side and E giv mi pawa, so dat tru mi, Gentai pipol go hear di Gud News and Kraist don save mi from lion mout!
And Kraist go stil save mi from evri evil plan ontil e tak mi enta en kindom. Mak glori bi en own foreva and eva. Amen!
Mak yu help mi grit Priska, Akwila and Onesiforus famili.
Erastus dey for Korint and bikos Trofimus wey nor wel, I kon liv am for Miletus.
Mak yu trai kom bifor kold season go rish. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Klaudia and all di brodas and sistas dey grit yu.
Mak Kraist dey wit yor spirit. Mak God grace and favor dey wit yu.
Na Pol, wey bi Jisos Kraist apostol and God savant rite dis leta to help pipol wey God don shuz, so dat dia fate go strong kon no di trut wey go help dem liv di kaind life wey God wont.
Di trut dey giv dem di maind sey dem get life wey nor dey end and na God wey nor fit lai promis dem dis life ivun bifor E kreate di wold.
As di taim don rish, E don giv us en mesage tru di wod wey wi dey prish giv evribodi and na God awa Savior giv mi pawa to du dis wok.
I dey rite to Titus, my own pikin for fate. Mak grace and peace wey dey kom from God awa Papa and from awa Savior Jisos Kraist, dey wit yu.
Titus! Na dis mesage mak mi liv yu for Krete, so dat yu go kontinu awa wok for der and pick new lidas for ish tawn, jos as I komand yu.
Enibodi wey won bi elda must dey gud. E must get onli won wife and en shildren must bi bilivas, dey gentol and dey respet demsef.
Mak pesin wey bi lida nor get fault, bikos na God wok e dey du. Mak e nor dey kari bodi up; dey kwik ves or drink enihaw; dey laik to beat pipol or luv moni.
Insted mak e dey welkom stranjas for en haus; luv wetin dey gud and e must get sense; mak e nor dey put hand for bad tin; e must dey holi and fit kontrol ensef.
E must biliv di mesage abaut God wey e dey tish, so dat e go fit tel pipol di trut and koret doz wey dey opoz am.
Meni pipol nor won du wetin God tok, insted, dem dey tok enihaw, dey disiv pipol and folo Ju pipol law wey sey, evribodi must sekonsaiz.
So wi must stop dem, bikos dem dey tish pipol tins wey go mak pipol komot from di trut and dem dey du laik dis, bikos of di moni wey dem go get.
Ivun won of dia own profets sey, "Krete pipol dey always tok lai, dem bi wiked animas and lazi pipol wey get long-trot."
Wetin di profet tok, na tru. So bikos of dis, mak yu stop dem, so dat di bilivas go strong for fate.
Mak dem stop to listin to Ju pipol lai-lai stori and nor dey bihav laik doz wey nor biliv.
Evritin dey pure to doz wey dia heart dey pure. Bot nor-tin dey pure to doz wey bad tins ful dia maind.
Dis kaind pipol dey sey dem no God, bot di way wey dem dey liv dia life, show sey dem nor no am, bikos dem get bad maind, dey disobey God and dem nor eva dey laik beta tin.~
Bot for yu Titus, yu must tish pipol haw to bihav wel.
Mak yu tish old men sey, mak dem nor dey bihav enihaw, so dat pipol go respet dem and mak dem dey kontrol demsef; get fate; dey show luv and dey patient.
Mak yu tish old wimen sey, mak dem liv life wey go mak God hapi. Mak dem nor tok bad abaut pipol; nor dey drink enihaw, insted mak dem tish oda wimen wetin dey gud.
So, mak di old wimen train and tish di young wons haw dem go tak luv dia husban and shildren;
to dey knotrol diasef; get pure maind; dey du dia haus wok wel; dey kare for pipol; dey du as dia husban wont, so dat pipol nor go tok enihaw abaut God wod wey wi dey prish so.
Mak yu tish young men to dey liv dia life wit beta sense
and mak yu yorsef bi gud ezampol to dem. Mak evritin wey yu dey du, show sey wetin yu dey tish, na trut.
Mak yu prish di trut, so dat pipol nor go get rizin to tok against yu. Den doz wey dey opoz yu, go shame and dem nor go get wod to tok abaut us.
Una wey bi savant, mak una dey du evritin wey una oga wont and wen una oga tok to una, mak una nor dey ansa am enihaw.
Mak una nor dey tif, insted mak una dey show sey una get fate, so dat evritin wey una dey du, go bring praiz to God awa Savior.
Bikos God grace wey bring salvashon, don kom out mak evribodi si-am.
Di grace dey tish us sey, mak wi nor liv laik pipol wey nor no God or dey bihav enihaw. So mak wi dey kontrol awasef; dey du gud and folo God for dis taim wey wi dey so,
bikos wi dey wait for di day wen God sey Kraist, wey bi awa Almighti God and Savior, go kom.
E die for us, so dat e go fri and klin us from wikednes kon turn us to en own pipol wey laik to du gud tins.
Mak yu tish dem dis tins and koret dem wit boldnes. So, mak yu nor let enibodi trit yu laik smol pikin.
Mak yu rimaind di bilivas sey, mak dem respet doz wey dey rule dem. Dem must obey and dey redi to du gud.
Mak dem nor eva tok bad abaut enibodi, insted mak dem dey liv for peace, dey gentol and dey bihav wel to evribodi.
Bifor naw, wi dey bihav laik fool; wi nor dey obey; wi dey disiv pipol; wi bi savant to tins wey dey swit us; wi dey du bad tins and dey jelos odas; pipol hate us and wi hate dem tu.
Bot wen God awa Savior show us di kiandnes and luv wey E get for us,
E kon save us. Nor bi bikos wi du gud, bot na bikos of en mesi. E forgiv awa sins and E mak us new shildren kon giv us new life tru di Holi Spirit.
God giv us dis Spirit for fri tru Jisos Kraist wey bi awa Savior.
Since Kraist grace don mak us klin for God eye, wi don bi pipol wey dey wait for di life wey nor go end and wi dey sure sey, wi go get am.
Dis wod wey I dey tok so na trut and I wont mak yu mak sure sey evribodi wey trust God dey du gud. Dis tishin dey gud and e go help evribodi.
Nor put mout for wod wey nor mak sense: laik mata wey konsan hu born hu and kworel or fite abaut Ju pipol law. All dis tin dey yuzles and dem nor min enitin.
If enibodi dey won kause kworel for di shosh and yu don warn am rish tu taims and e nor gri shange, den mak yu driv am.
Bikos dat kaind pesin don turn from di trut and en own sin go kondem am.
If I send Artemas or Tikikus kom mit yu, mak yu trai kom mit mi for Nikopolis, bikos I don diside sey, na der I go stay ontil kold season go end.
Mak yu du evritin wey yu fit du to help Zenas, wey bi lawya and Apollos for dia joni and mak sure sey dem get evritin wey dem nid.
Laik dis tu, awa pipol go learn haw to du gud and help pipol wey rili nid help. And as dem dey du laik dis, dem nor go liv yuzles life.
Evribodi wey dey wit mi dey grit yu! Mak yu grit all di pipol wey luv us. Mak God grace dey wit all of una.
Na Pol, wey bi prizina bikos of Jisos Kraist and awa broda Timoti rite dis leta to Filemon, awa dear broda and co-woka.
And to Afia awa sista, Arkippus awa felow soja and di shosh wey dey mit for en haus.
Mak God and awa Oga Jisos Kraist giv una grace and peace.
Evritaim wey I rimemba yu for my prayas, I dey tank my God,
bikos I don hear abaut di fate and luv wey yu get for awa Oga Jisos Kraist and all God pipol,
so I dey pray sey di fate wey yu get go mak yu undastand all di blessins wey bi yor own insaid Kraist.
I get joy and my heart dey strong bikos of yor luv and tru yu, all God pipol heart don strong tu.
Since I get strong biliv for Kraist sey, I fit tel yu mak yu du wetin dey rite,
mi, Pol, wey bi old man and prizina bikos of Kraist, won advise yu wit luv.
I beg, mak yu dey kaind to Onesimus, wey bi my pikin for God wok and e dey prizin wit mi.
Bifor, e nor dey yuzful to yu, bot naw, e dey yuzful to mi and yu.
I dey send am kom bak kom mit yu (ivun-doh I luv am wel-wel).
If to sey yu dey here, I for wont mak e help mi as I stil dey prizin bikos of di gospol wok.
Bot I nor won du enitin wey yu nor go laik, so dat di gud wey yu du, nor go bi by fos, bot e go kom from yor maind.
May bi na bikos of dis mak am nor dey wit yu since, bot naw, e go dey wit yu foreva.
Nor bi as slave, bot as broda wey wi luv, bikos e don big pas slave. E don bikom awa broda naw, bikos God don shange am.
So, if yu si mi as yor broda and patina, mak yu asept am as yu go tak asept mi.
If e tif or hol yu enitin bifor, mak yu tel mi and I go pay.
Na mi Pol tak my hand rite dis leta sey, I go pay bak, bot I fit stil sey, yu yorsef dey hol mi.
So my broda, mak yu du dis tin for mi bikos of Kraist, so dat bele go swit mi.
I dey sure sey yu go du wetin I ask yu, so I dey rite giv yu, bikos I no sey yu go du pas wetin I ask.
So, mak yu priper wer I go stay, bikos I no sey yor prayas go mak dem fri mi kom mit yu soon.
Epafras, wey dey prizin wit mi, bikos of Jisos Kraist, dey grit yu.
Mark, Aristakus, Demas and Luke, wey bi my co-wokas, dey grit yu tu.
Mak awa Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit yor spirit.
Bifor-bifor, God tok to awa gran-gran papa dem for meni ways, tru di profets,
bot naw, E dey tok to us tru en pikin wey get evritin and na tru am, E kreate di wold.
Na dis pikin bi God image and e dey show God glori. Naim dey kip evritin wey dey dis wold wit en pawa. Afta e don die mak God for forgiv evribodi dia sins, e kon go sidan for God rite side for hevun.
E big pas di angels, jos as di name wey God gi-am big pas angels own tu.
Na wish angel God tel sey, "Yu bi my pikin, today I don bikom yor Papa"? Or as E tok for anoda place sey, "I go bi yor Papa and yu go bi my pikin?"
Bot wen God won send en first born enta dis wold, E sey: "Mak all my angels woship am."
God tok abaut di angels sey, "I mak my angels and my savants spirit to dey burn laik fire,"
bot konsanin en pikin, E sey, "Yu bi God! Yor kindom go dey foreva and eva and yu go rule yor pipol wit autoriti.
"Yu luv to du gud and yu hate wikednes. So God, wey bi yor God don anoint yu wit oil wey dey bring joy and E mak yu dey above yor mates."
E stil tel di pikin sey, "For di biginin, na God kreate di eart and na wit en hand E tak mak di hevuns.
"Dem go skata, bot God go dey foreva. All of dem go grow kon old laik klot
and laik klot and koat, God go fold and shange dem, bot God nor dey shange and en life nor go eva end."
Na wish angel God tel, "Sidan for my rite hand ontil I go put all yor enemis unda yor leg"?
All di angels na savants and na dem God send go prish for pipol wey go get salvashon.
Mak wi listin to wetin wi don hear, so dat wi nor go fal komot from di rite road.
Bikos di mesage wey God tok tru en angels, na trut and enibodi wey disobey di law, God go ponish am.
Wetin mak us sey wi go dey fri if wi nor listin to dis koret salvashon mesage? Na God first tok am and pipol wey hear am kon show us sey na trut.
God yuz signs, mirakols and wetin di Holi Spirit du, tak show sey, dia wods na tru.
God nor sey mak en angels kontrol di wold wey dey kom and wey wi dey tok abaut so.
Insted, David tok for God wod sey: "Wetin humanbin bi wey mak Yu dey kare for am and hu bi yor pikin wey Yu dey kare for laik dis?
"Aldoh Yu mak angels high pas am smol. Bot Yu kon gi-am onor and glori.
"Yu don put evritin unda am sey mak e kontrol dem. Wen God sey na evritin E put unda am, E min sey na evritin and nor-tin rimain." And naw, wi neva si all dis tins dey hapun,
bot wi si Jisos wey angels big pas smol, bot e nor tu tey bifor God gi-am glori and onor, bikos e sofa and die for evribodi, jos as God plan am.
Dis na tru, bikos na from am and tru am evritin tak kom dis life, so dat salvashon go dey koret tru en sofa and e go kari meni pipol enta en glori.
Tru-tru, Jisos mak pipol dey holi, so en and di pipol wey e mak holi, na God kreate dem. Na dis mak am nor dey shame to kol dem en brodas and sistas.
Jisos tel God sey, "I go anounce yor name among pipol wey biliv and I go praiz Yu for dia present.
Kraist stil sey, "I go trust my God; both mi and di shildren wey E giv mi."
So as di shildren get flesh and blood, en tu get flesh and blood laik dem, so dat tru deat, e go fit distroi Satan wey get pawa to kil
and e go fri pipol wey deat don hol.
Jisos dey konsan abaut Abraham shildren and nor bi onli di angels.
So God mak Kraist laik us wey bi en brodas and sistas. Laik dis, Kraist go sori for us kon bi awa gud High Prist. And bikos Kraist dey konsan abaut God mata, e sakrifais ensef to rimov awa sins.
Bikos Jisos sofa and devol tempt am, e don get pawa to save pipol wey devol dey tempt.
My brodas and sistas wey God shuz, mak una tink abaut dis Jisos wey God send kom and na-im bi di High Prist wey wi biliv.
E obey God wey shuz am as High Prist, jos as Mosis obey God.
Jos as dem dey praiz pesin wey build fine haus, pas di haus wey e build, na so tu Jisos glori beta pas Mosis own wel-wel!
Na pesin build evri haus, bot di pesin wey build evritin, na God.
Tru-tru, Mosis rili obey God as savant and e tok abaut somtins wey God go tok abaut leta.
Bot as God Pikin, Jisos dey fateful for God haus. So wi tu go get share for di haus, if wi biliv and get kofident for awa hope wey dey insaid Kraist.
As di Holi Spirit tok, "If una hear God vois today, mak una listin to am!
"Mak una nor get strong heart for am, bikos na so Izrel pipol du wen God test dem for widanes.
"Na for di widanes una papa for test and trai mi for forti years, ivun doh dem si di mirakols wey I du.
"I ves wel-wel for dat generashon, so I kon tel dem, 'Una heart nor dey wit mi and una nor gri obey wetin I tok.
'So, una nor go eva get res.'"
Mak una mak sure sey non of una get bad maind wey go mak una nor biliv, so dat una nor go turn against God wey nor dey die.
Bot mak una dey enkorage won anoda evriday, so dat non of una go get bad maind, bikos of sin.
Bikos wi go bi Jisos Kraist frend, if wi hol awa fate strong go rish end.
Bot as dem rite am, "I wish sey una go du wetin e tok, so dat una nor go get strong heart laik Izrel pipol wen dem dey widanes."
Na hu bi di pipol wey nor listin to God, ivun doh dem hear en vois? Nor bi pipol wey Mosis lid kom out from Egypt?
Na hu mak God ves wel-wel for forti years? Nor bi doz sinas wey dia deat bodi skata for widanes?
Na hu God swear for sey, dem nor go eva get res of maind, nor bi doz wey disobey am?
So for dat taim, doz pipol nor enta di land wey God promis dem, bikos dem nor biliv am.
Ivun doh God promis us res, e gud mak wi dey kareful, so dat som of us nor go miss di promis.
Bikos dem prish God wod giv us, jos as dem prish am giv dem tu. Bot dem nor tak am serious, bikos wen dem hear am, dem nor gri biliv am.
Na onli wi wey biliv go fit enta di place wer God res dey, bikos God sey, "I ves kon swear for dem, so 'Dem nor go eva enta my place wer res dey!'"
Wi no sey God redi and dey wait, bikos Bibol sey, "Afta God don kreate evritin finish, E kon res for di sevunt day."
E stil sey, "Dem nor go eva enta my place wer res dey!"
God promis sey wi go enta di place wer en res dey, yet doz wey first hear di mesage, nor enta, bikos dem disobey am.
Bot God don plan anoda taim wen wi go enta en res and dat taim, "Na today", bikos E don tok am for en wod bifor tru David.
Bikos if to sey Joshua giv dem res of maind, God for nor tok abaut anoda day.
So, di ril "Sabat Day" res, stil dey kom for God pipol.
Bikos pesin wey enta God res, don res from all en wok, jos as God res from en own wok tu.
So mak wi trai wel-wel, so dat wi go enta dat place wer res dey and non of us go fal laik di odas wey nor obey.
God wod dey alaif, e get pawa and e sharp pas knife wey get tu mout. Di wod dey divide pesin soul from en spirit and e dey divide bone from bone; bikos God no wetin wi dey tink for awa maind.
Nor-tin wey God kreate fit hide from am and evritin dey naked to God, bikos wi go must tel am haw wi liv awa life.
Jisos wey bi God Pikin, na-im bi awa High Prist wey don go hevun. Mak wi hol am tait and always dey biliv am.
Dis awa High Prist undastand us wen wi dey wik, bikos all dis temtashon wey wi dey face so, e face dem tu, bot e nor sin.
Mak wi nor fear to enta wer God throne dey: di place wer grace dey, so dat wi go get mesi and God grace go help us wen wi nid help.
Na God dey shuz High Prist wey go represent pipol for en present. Di prist dey offa both gift and sakrifais for dia sins.
Di High Prist fit sori for doz wey sin, bikos dem nor no wetin dem sopoz no, since en ensef dey sin tu.
Bikos of dis, e dey offa sakrifais for en sin and di pipol own.
Nobodi dey fit bi High Prist wit en pawa bikos e wont mak pipol onor am, bot na onli doz wey God kol to bi prist, jos as E kol Aaron.
Kraist nor praiz ensef wen e bikom High Prist, bot na God praiz am wen E sey, "Yu bi my Pikin! Today, I don bikom yor Papa."
God stil sey, "Yu bi prist foreva as Melkizedek bi."
Wen Jisos stil dey dis eart, e pray and krai to God wey go save am from deat. God hear en prayas, bikos e obey God for evritin.
Ivun doh e bi God Pikin, na tru all di tins wey e sofa, e tak learn haw to obey.
Wen God don mak Kraist pafet finish, e kon save evribodi wey obey am.
God mak Kraist to bi High Prist laik Melkizedek.
Wi get meni tins to tok, bot dem nor eazi to esplain, bikos una nor dey gri obey.

E don tey wen una bi Kristen, so by naw, una sopoz to dey tish odas. Insted, una stil wont mak pesin kom tish una di first tin wey dey God wod. Una stil dey drink milk, insted of una to dey chop solid fud.
Enibodi wey stil dey drink milk, bi laik smol pikin wey nor no gud from bad.
Bot solid fud na for mature pipol and dem get beta sense to no wetin dey gud and bad.

E don rish wen wi go stop to learn onli di first tins wey Kraist tel us, so mak wi dey grow kon no Kraist more-more. Wi nor nid to stil dey tish una abaut tins wey dey kause deat; why wi must biliv God;
wetin baptism min; to put hand for pipol head; to wak pipol from deat and abaut God final jojment.
As God dey help us, na new-new tins wi go dey tish una abaut di fate.
Wen pesin don first no di trut; taste God gift from hevun; no di Holi Spirit;
don taste God gud wok and di beta wey dey kom,
den e kon start to sin, dat pesin nor go fit turn from sin kom mit God, since e don kil God Pikin for di sekond taim and disgrace am for publik.
Wen rain don sock groun and e bear beta fruts for di farma, dat min sey God don bless di man.
Bot if na so-so shuku-shuku and grass di groun dey bear, dat min sey e dey yuzles. So God go kos and distroi am wit fire.
Bot as for una wey bi my frends, ivun doh wi dey tok to una laik dis, wi no sey dis tins nor go hapun to una, bikos una don undastand God salvashon.
God nor dey sopot pipol enihaw. E go rimemba haw una help en pipol bifor-bifor and haw una stil dey help dem naw. Una bi God pipol and E nor go forget di luv wey una show en shildren.
As una stil dey dis wold, wi wont mak una kontinu to luv won anoda, so dat wetin una dey hope for, go kom.
So mak eni of una nor taya, bot mak una dey patient and biliv, so dat una go gain God promis.
Nobodi big pas God, bikos God swear wit en name wen E promis Abraham sey,
"Na mi bi Oga, I go bless yu wel-wel and yor shildren go plenti."
Bikos Abraham get patient, God kon gi-am wetin E promis am.
Wen pipol won setol mata, dem dey swear wit pesin wey big pas dem and di agriment wey dem mak, dey end di mata.
So wen God won show en pipol sey E nor go break en promis, E kon swear wit ensef.

God nor dey lai! So di promis wey E mak and ensef wey E tak swear, na tu tins wey nor go shange. Since wi don run go mit God mak E gaid us, e gud mak awa maind strong, so dat wi nor go fear as wi biliv en promis.

Dis hope strong for awa heart laik ship wey dem tie mak e nor for move, bikos di hope wey wi get dey kam-kpe and strong gidigba. Di promis go tak us pas di kurtain for hevun, ontil wi rish wer God dey;
di place wer Jisos don enta for us and don bikom High Prist foreva, jos as Melkizedek bi.
Melkizedek wey bi "Salem king" and "God prist", na-im bless Abraham, afta Abraham don win di kings for war.
So Abraham kon gi-am won from evri ten tin wey e bring kom bak from war. Melkizedek min, "King wey dey du wetin dey rite" and Salem min, "Peace."
E nor get papa or mama, e nor get stori at-all, en days nor get wer e for start or wer e go end, bot e bi laik Man Pikin and e bi prist foreva.
Bot si haw e big rish, bikos Abraham (awa gran papa wey evribodi no) gi-am won out of evri ten tins wey e bring from war.
Levi shildren wey bi prists, get pawa akordin to di law, to kolet won out of evri ten tins from dia own pipol, ivun doh di pipol demsef, na Abraham shildren tu.
Bot Melkizedek wey nor ivun relate to Levi pipol, stil kolet won out of evri ten tins from Abraham, den e kon bless Abraham wey God don promis.
Tru-tru, wi no sey pesin wey bless pesin, na-im big pas di pesin wey e bless.
Evri prists dey kolet won out of evri ten tins wey pipol bring, bot dem nor dey stay for di wold foreva, exept Melkizedek, bikos God wod tish us sey, e dey alaif.
Levi shildren dey kolet won out of evri ten tins from pipol, bot naw, wi go fit sey, wen Abraham giv won out of evri ten to Melkizedek, Levi pay tu,
bikos dat taim wen Abraham giv won out of evri ten tins wey e bring from war to Melkizedek, dem neva born Levi, bot Levi dey insaid am.
Ivun doh Mosis law sey prist must kom from Levi famili, dat kaind prist nor fit mak pesin dey pafet. So anoda prist laik Melkizedek must kom and e nor bi laik prist wey kom from Aaron famili.
Since dem don shange di rule to selet prist, di law must shange tu.
Di pesin wey wi dey tok abaut, na awa Oga wey kom from di tribe wer nobodi don eva serv as prist for alta bifor.
Evribodi no sey na from Juda tribe, Jisos from kom and Mosis law nor sey mak prist kom from dat tribe.
Dis mata klear wel-wel afta God selet anoda prist laik Melkizedek.
E nor selet dat pesin bikos of en gran-gran papa dem, bot na bikos en life nor go eva end.
God wod sey: "Yu bi prist foreva, jos as Melkizedek bi."
Bikos of dis, God put di old law for kona, since e dey wik and yuzles,
bikos di law nor fit mak enitin dey pafet. Bot naw, wi get beta hope wey go draw us near God.
God ensef mak promis wen E shuz dis prist, wey bi Jisos. E nor mak dis kaind promis wen E shuz di oda prists,
bot Jisos kon bi prist wen God sey, "I don swear and I nor go shange my maind sey yu go bi prist foreva."
Bikos God swear laik dis, Jisos don mak us dey sure of di new kovenant wey beta pas.
Meni prists don dey bifor and all of dem die,
bot Jisos nor go eva die. So, e go bi prist foreva.
So, di pipol wey Jisos tak go mit God, e go save dem for foreva and eva, bikos e dey alaif to pray for dem.
Na Jisos bi di High Prist wey wi nid. E nor dey du bad tin; e dey holi; nor dey mak mistak and e nor bi laik wi, wey bi sinas. God praiz am pas evritin wey dey hevun

and e beta pas eni oda high prists. Jisos nor nid to offa sakrifais evriday, laik di oda prists wey dey offa for dia own sins and for di pipol own. Bikos na wons and for all e sakrifais ensef for evribodi, wen e die for di kros.
Mosis law shuz humanbin wey get wiknes as High Prist, bot God promis wey kom afta di law, shuz di pikin and na-im bi di koret Prist foreva.
Wetin I min bi sey: Wi get High Prist wey sidan for God rite hand side for hevun.
Na-im bi di prist wey dey di Holi Tempol wey God build and na der dem for dey woship am.
Since all High Prist must offa gifts and sakrifais to God, Kraist tu must offa somtin.
If to sey e dey dis wold, e nor for bi prist at-all, since na tru Mosis law dem tak dey shuz prist wey go offa sakrifais.
Di prist wok for di Tempol bi laik wetin dey hapun for hevun. Bikos wen Mosis dey won build God haus, God tel am: "Mak sure sey evritin bi laik di design wey I show yu on-top di mountin."
Bot Kraist ministri big and beta pas dia own and na di new kovenant (wey bi di new agriment) beta pas. Bikos na tru God promis dis kovenant tak kom, so Kraist don bi di middo-man bitwin wi and God.
If to sey di first kovenant gud wel-wel, den wi nor for nid anoda won.
Bot God si fault for insaid, so E kon sey, "Di day wey I go mak new agriment wit Izrel and Juda haus, dey kom.
"E nor go bi laik di kovenant wey I mak wit dia gran-gran papa dem wen I tak dem komot from Egypt, bikos dem break dat kovenant and I kon turn against dem."
Bot naw, "Dis na my new kovenant (wey bi di new agriment): Di taim dey kom wen I go put my laws for dia mout and rite am for dia heart. I go bi dia God and dem go bi my pipol.
"Dem nor nid to tish won anoda abaut mi wey bi dia God, bikos all of dem, both smol and big, go no mi.
"I go forgiv dem for all di wiked tins wey dem don du and I nor go rimemba dia sins again."
Wen God tok abaut di new kovenant, E min sey di first won nor mata again. And enitin wey don old and nor get yuz again, go soon disapier.
Di first kovenant show how pipol go woship God for dis wold.
Di tent get tu rooms. Di first won wer lantan-stand dey, "Na di Holi Place." Won tabol and di bread wey dem offa giv God, dey der tu.
Anoda room wey dem rite, "Holi of Holis", dey for di kurtain bak.

Di gold alta wer dem dey burn insent and di kovenant box wey dem kova wit gold, dey der tu. Di gold jug wey dem put manna, Aaron rod wey grow leaf and di flat stone wey dem rite di law put, dey insaid dis box.
God angels wey kova di place wer God dey show mesi and forgiv sins, dey on-top dis box. Bot dis nor bi di taim for mi to esplain all dis tins giv una.
Wen all dis tins don redi, di prists dey enta di first room evriday go du dia wok.
Bot na onli di High Prist dey enta di Holi Place wons a year. For der, e go first offa blood for en sins, bifor e go offa for di pipol own, bikos dem nor no wetin dem sopoz to no.
Di Holi Spirit kon esplain sey, "Di way to rish di Holi Place neva opun as long as di old tent stil dey."
Dis na sign mak wi for fit undastand sey: Di gifts and sakrifais wey di prists dey offa for God pipol, nor fit mak dia maind klin.
To chop, drink and to du seremoni tak klin pesin bodi, na-im konsan dem. All dis won na rule for dis wold, ontil di taim wen God go bring di new law.
So Kraist don bi High Prist for di gud tins wey don kom. E don enta di Holi Place for hevun wey dey pafet. Nor bi humanbin mak di place and e nor dey among tins wey God kreate for dis wold.
Na wons Jisos enta di place wey holi pas. E nor enta wit goat or ram blood, bot na wit en own blood, so e don save us foreva and eva.
If goat or ram blood and ashes fit klin pesin akordin to di old tradishon,
wot of Kraist blood wey klin us from deat so dat wi go fit woship God? Dis na di Kraist wey offa ensef to God as di rite sakrifais for awa sins and e du-am wit di Holi Spirit pawa.

Na dis mak am bi middo-man for di new kovenant, so dat pipol wey e kol go fit risiv di inheritance wey go dey foreva. E promis us dis inheritance, wen e die to fri us from di bad-bad tins wey wi don du, wen di first kovenant stil dey.
Dis kaind agriment bi laik pesin wil. Di pesin must die first, bifor dem go fit yuz di wil.
Bikos pesin wil nor dey min enitin wen e stil dey alaif; e onli dey yuzful wen di pesin don die.
Na dis mak di first kovenant nor get pawa to save pipol, unles dem sakrifais blood.
Wen Mosis read all di komands giv Izrel pipol, e tak goat and ram blood wit wota and soap, kon sprinkle di blood on-top di law book and all di pipol bodi, den e kon sey,
"Na dis bi di blood for di kovenant wey God komand sey una must obey."
Mosis stil sprinkle di blood for di tent and all di plate wey dem dey yuz tak woship God.
Tru-tru, akordin to di law, na almost evritin blood dey mak klin and if dem neva pour blood, God nor go forgiv dem dia sins.
Na dis mak dem dey klin di holi place for dis eart wit anima blood, bikos e bi laik di won for hevun. Bot di tins wey dey for hevun, nid sakrifais wey beta pas dat won.
Kraist nor enta di holi place wey humanbin build laik di origina tent for hevun, bot na hevun e enta and naw, e stand for God front for awa sake.
Kraist nor nid to offa ensef evri year laik di high prists dey du for di Tempol wit anima blood,
bikos if na so, Kraist for dey kom die for us evri year since di taim wey God kreate di wold. Bot nor bi so! E die wons and for all, so dat awa sins go-go foreva.
Bikos God tok sey, na onli wons man go die and afta dat, jojment go kom,
na so tu Kraist die wons, as sakrifais to forgiv pipol foreva and naw, e go bring salvashon to doz wey dey wait for am.
Mosis law bi laik shadow wey dey show gud tins wey dey kom. Di shadow nor bi di tins, bikos di sikrifais wey dem dey offa evri year nor fit forgiv pipol dia sins.
If pipol wey dey woship God don fri from dia sins, dem nor for dey offa sakrifais again.
Doz sakrifais dey rimaind pipol of dia sins evri year,
since bull and goat blood nor fit rili klin pesin from all en sins.
So wen Kraist won kom dis wold, e tel God, "Nor bi sakrifais and ofrin Yu wont, bikos Yu don priper my bodi as ofrin,
since Yu nor laik anima blood as ofrin for sins again.
"Den I sey, 'Na mi bi dis, God na wetin Yu wont I kom du, jos as yor wod tok abaut mi for Mosis law.'"
Kraist first sey, "Yu nor wont anima or sin ofrin, (ivun wen dem dey offa am akordin to di law)".
Den e tok again sey, "Na mi bi dis, God na wetin Yu wont I kom du." So God rimov di first sakrifais, so dat E go fit bring di new won, wey bi Kraist.
Bikos Jisos du wetin God wont, all of us don dey holi tru di sakrifais wey e yuz en bodi mak for us.
Bifor-bifor, di prist dey serv evriday and dey offa di same sakrifais wey nor fit rimov sin.
Bot naw, Kraist offa onli won sakrifais for sin wons and for all, den e kon go sidan for God rite hand,
wer e dey wait ontil God go put en enemis unda en leg.
Na wit won sakrifais e tak klin pipol from dia sins and dem don dey klin foreva.
Di Holi Spirit dey bear witnes abaut dis tins sey,
"Dis na di kovenant wey I go mak wit una and afta dat taim,
e kon sey, 'I nor go rimemba dia sins and stubornes again.'"
Wen God don forgiv sins, e get eni nid to offa sakrifais again?
So my brodas and sistas, wi biliv sey wi go enta God Holi Tempol tru Jisos Kraist blood,
bikos e giv us dis new life and e go tak us pas di kurtain wey bi en bodi.
And wi get won High Prist wey dey kare for God Tempol.
So mak wi draw near God wit beta heart and strong fate, bikos God don wosh awa heart and bodi wit klin wota.
So mak wi hol di hope wey wi get strong wel-wel, bikos God wey promis us dey always kip en promis.
Mak wi always dey tink of haw wi go enkorage, luv and du gud for won anoda.
Mak wi nor stop to dey mit and feloship togeda, as som pipol dey du, bot mak wi enkorage won anoda more-more, since wi no sey, "Di Day wen Kraist go kom," don near.
If wi kontinu to sin afta God don show us di trut, e nor get eni oda sakrifais wey go fit forgiv us awa sins again.
Bot wetin wi go dey fear for na di Jojment Day wey dey kom and hell fire wey go distroi doz wey bi God enemis.
Wen tu or tiri pipol bi witnes sey sombodi rejet Mosis law, dem go kil-am witout sey dem sori for am.
If pipol wey nor dey obey Man Pikin; dey tak di kovenant blood mak yeye and dey kos di Spirit wey bring grace, na haw dia own ponishment go big rish?
Bikos God sey, "I go revenge, I go pay dem bak" and en wod stil sey, "God go joj en pipol."
Na big wahala if pesin fal enta God ponishment!
Bot mak una rimemba haw tins bi wit una bifor, haw una dey sofa afta una don risiv God lite, yet una nor alow di sofa shange una maind.
Dat taim, som pipol kos and sofa una and for oda taims, una dey help odas wey dey sofa laik una tu.
Tru-tru, una sofa laik oda prizinas and una dey hapi wen dem sieze all una propati, bikos una no sey una get beta tin wey go last foreva.
So mak una always dey strong, bikos una go get beta riwod.
Una nid to dey patient, so dat una go fit du wetin God wont and den, una go risiv en promis.
Bikos God wod sey: "E nor go tey again bifor di Pesin wey dey plan to kom, go kom.
"My raitious pipol go liv and biliv, bot if enibodi turn bak, I nor go dey hapi wit am."
Wi nor dey among pipol wey go turn bak kon perish, bot wi get fate wey go save us foreva.
Fate na wen wi dey sure sey wetin wi dey hope for go hapun and wi sure sey, di tins wey wi neva si, go kom.
Na fate awa gran-gran papa dem tak du tins wey mak God praiz dem.
Na tru fate wi tak undastand sey, God kreate evritin wit en wod. So di tins wey wi dey si so, na God mak dem from wetin dem nor dey si.

Na fate mak Abel giv God sakrifais wey beta pas Kain own and na tru dis fate Abel tak no sey God asept en ofrin, bikos God rili asept am. Ivun doh Abel don die, en blood stil dey tok for am, bikos of en fate.
Na fate nor let Enok die, bot God kari am tak and nobodi si-am. God wod sey, bifor God kari am, Enok don mak bele swit God.
Nobodi fit mak bele swit God witout fate, bikos enibodi wey dey kom mit am, must biliv sey, E dey alaif and E dey riwod pipol wey dey faind am si.

Na fate mak Noah build ark afta God warn am abaut wetin go hapun. E obey wetin God tok and na di ark save en and en famili. Na di same fate Noah tak kondem di wold, kon inherit di raitiousnes wey dey kom.
Na fate mak Abraham obey, wen God kol am mak e liv en haus, travol go anoda land wey God promis am, ivun doh e nor no wer e dey go.
Na fate mak am stay as stranja for di land wey God promis am. Na insaid canopi en, Izik and Jacob wey go inherit di same promis, stay.
Abraham du laik dis, bikos e dey wait for di tawn wey God ensef go build, wit strong foundashon.
Na fate mak Abraham born, ivun doh Sarah don tu old to get bele and Abraham don old tu, bot e no sey di Pesin wey promis am pikin, na Pesin wey e fit trust.
So from dis won man wey en bodi don die finish, shildren wey plenti rish stars for skai and sand for wotasaid kon ful evriwer.
All of dem fate stil strong wen dem die and dem nor get di tins wey God promis dem, bot dem si and welkom di tins from far and dem gri sey, dem diasef na strenja for dis wold.
Pipol wey tok laik dis, show evribodi sey dem dey espet dia own kontri.
Infact, if to-sey dem dey tink of di kontri wer dem from kom, dem for get maind to go bak.
Bot as tins bi so, dem dey espet kontri wey beta pas dia own and e dey kom from hevun. Naim mak God nor shame wen dem dey kol am dia God, bikos E don build big tawn for dem.
Na fate mak Abraham offa Izik wen God dey test am. Ivun doh na God gi-am di pikin, e stil redi to giv di onli pikin wey e get, bak to God.
God tel am bifor sey, "Tru Izik, yor famili go meni wel-wel."
Dis na bikos Abraham biliv sey, ivun if Izik die, God go raiz-am from deat and tru-tru Abraham rili kolet Izik bak from deat.
Na fate mak Izik bless Jacob and Esau abaut dia future.
Bifor Jacob die, na fate e tak bless Josef shildren and woship God as e res on-top en wokin stick.
Wen Josef life don dey end, na fate e tak tok abaut di long travol wey Izrel pipol go-go and e tel dem wetin dem go du wit en bones.
Na fate mak Mosis papa and mama hide am wen dem born am, bikos dem si sey di pikin fine and dem nor fear to disobey wetin di king komand.
Wen Mosis kon grow up, na fate mak am nor gri mak dem kol am Fero dota pikin.
Insted of am to enjoy tins wey go mak am sin, e kon shuz to sofa wit God shildren.
E feel sey e beta mak dem laff am, bikos of di Mezaya wey dey kom, insted of mak e dey enjoy di fain-fain tins for Egypt. E du laik dis, bikos e put en eye for God riwod.
Na di same fate mak Mosis komot from Egypt and e nor fear di king vesnashon, bikos e get hope for God wey ordinari eye nor fit si.
Na fate mak Mosis du di Passova and pour blood for pipol door-mot, so dat God angel wey dey kil all di first born for Egypt, nor go tosh dem.
Na fate mak Izrel pipol kros di Red Sea laik sey na dry land, bot wen Egypt pipol trai am, di wota swalow all of dem.
Na fate mak Jeriko wall fal afta Izrel pipol don mash roun am for sevun days.
Na fate mak Rahab, wey bi ashawo, eskape wen God distroi pipol wey nor obey am, bikos e welkom di pipol wey kom spy.
Wetin I go tok again? I nor get taim to tok abaut Gideon, Barak, Samson and di profets,
na fate dem tak win kindoms; du wetin gud for God eye; kon get di tins wey God promis dem; klose lion mout;
kwensh fire wey dey burn wel-wel and eskape wen dem won kil dem wit sword. God turn dia wiknes to pawa. Dem strong wel-wel for war front and sojas from oda kontris, dey run from dem.
Som wimen wey dia pipol don die, na fate mak dem risiv dem bak, alaif. Som pipol rejet fridom kon die for sofa, so dat dem go fit wak-up from deat and enta life wey beta pas dis won.
Pipol laff som; flog som; chain som and put odas for prizin.
Dem stone som; yuz saw kut som into tu; tak sword kil som; som dey hide waka insaid goat and ship skin wey dem wear and dem nor get enitin; dem sofa som and trit odas enihaw.
(Dis wold nor gud rish for dem); dem jos dey waka abaut for desert, on-top mountins, insaid rock and holes.
God praiz all of dem for dia fate, yet dem nor stil get wetin God promis.
Bikos God plan sey, witout us, dem nor go fit get di tins wey E promis dem.
Since wi get meni witnes wey soroun us, e gud mak wi drop evri load and sin wey dey mak us fal, so dat wi go yuz awa maind liv di life wey God wont.

Mak wi dey luk Jisos Kraist wey giv us awa fate and e go help us kip am. Bikos of di joy wey Jisos dey espet, e sofa for kros and nor maind di shame wey folo am. Bot naw, e don sidan for di rite hand side for God throne.
If una dey tink of haw Jisos sofa for wiked pipol hand and haw dem hate am, una maind go strong for fate.
As una dey strogol mak una nor for sin, una strogol neva rish to kil una, as Kraist die.
Abi una don forget di advise wey God tel una as en shildren? "My pikin, mak yu listin wel-wel wen God dey koret yu and nor ves wen God ponish yu.
"Bikos na di pesin wey God luv, na-im E dey koret and E dey ponish all di shildren wey bi en own."
So mak una bear as una dey sofa, since e bi sey na una Papa dey ponish una; dat won go show sey God dey trit una laik en shildren. Abi e get pikin wey en papa nor dey ponish?
Bot if God nor ponish yu as e dey ponish all en shildren, dat min sey yu nor bi beta pikin and yu nor get papa.
If awa papa for eart ponish us and wi dey respet dem, e nor gud mak God ponish us, so dat awa life go beta?
Awa papa dey ponish us for dis wold as e gud for dia eye, bot God dey ponish us for awa own gud, so dat wi go folo am share en holines.
No ponishment dey swit pesin wen dem dey ponish am, bikos e dey pain. Bot di pesin wey God ponish, go get life wey nor dey end.
So una hands and knees wey don taya, mak una mak dem strong.
And mak una waka for strate road, so dat una leg wey don taya, go strong.
Mak una trai to liv for peace wit evribodi and dey holi, bikos enibodi wey nor dey holi, nor go si God.
Mak una mak sure sey nobodi turn bak from God grace and mak nobodi get bad bele and kause trobol wey go mak pipol sin.
Mak una mak sure sey nobodi dey du bad tins or nor dey fear God, jos laik Esau wey sel en rite as first born, bikos of fud.
Una no haw e trai to get-am bak leta, bot e nor fit, ivun doh e beg and krai giv en papa.
Una don rish Mount Sinai, wer God for tok to Izrel pipol. For der, fire burn, daknes dey der and storm and
trumpet kon dey mak nois. Izrel pipol hear God vois, so dem beg am mak E stop,
bikos dem nor fit bear en komand wey sey, "Mak una kil eni anima wey tosh di mountin."
Wetin hapun dey mak pesin fear, so Mosis kon sey, "I dey fear and dey shake."
Insted, una don kom Mount Zion; di tawn wer God dey stay; di Jerusalem for hevun wer tazon angels dey. Una don enta di assembli,
di place wer all di first born gada and dis na di pipol wey God rite dia name for hevun. Una don kom mit God wey go joj evribodi and na-im dey mak pipol pafet.
Una don kom mit Jisos, di pesin wey God yuz tak start di new kovenant wit en pipol and una don kom mit di blood wey dem spray and dis blood dey tok beta wod wey pas Abel own.

Mak sure sey una dey obey di Pesin wey dey tok to una! Bikos if Izrel pipol, wey nor gri hear dia oga Mosis wod for eart nor eskape, haw wi go fit eskape, if wi nor gri hear di Pesin wey dey tok to us from hevun?
For dat taim, en vois dey shake di eart, bot naw, E don promis sey, "Nor bi onli dis eart I go shake, bot I go shake di hevuns tu."
Dis min sey di tins for eart go shake komot and na onli di tins wey God nor won shake, go rimain.
Since wi don risiv di kindom wey dem nor fit skata, mak wi tank and woship God wit respet and fear. Mak wi gi-am di kaind woship wey go mak bele swit am.
Bikos awa God na big and strong fire wey dey distroi tins.
Mak una dey luv ish oda laik Kristen brodas and sistas.
Mak una always dey welkom strenja for una haus, bikos laik dis, som pipol don welkom angel enta dia haus and dem nor no.
Mak una rimemba doz wey dey prizin, laik sey unasef dey der wit dem and mak una rimemba doz wey dey sofa, laik sey una dey sofa laik dem.

Mak evribodi respet marage: una must mak sure sey una nor slip wit hu nor bi una husban or wife, bikos God go joj pipol wey dey slip wit hu dem nor mari and pipol wey don mari, wey dey slip wit oda pipol.
Mak una nor luv moni and mak wetin una get rish una, bikos God sey, "I nor go eva liv or abandon yu."
So mak wi get maind wey go mak us fit sey, "Na God bi my helpa, so wi nor go fear. Wetin humanbin go fit du us?"
Mak una rimemba una lidas wey tish una God wod; mak una tink abaut di kaind life wey dem dey liv, den mak una folo dia fate.
Jisos Kraist na di same yestiday, today and foreva, e nor dey shange!
Mak una nor let difren-difren prishin wey una nor no turn una head. Una spiritual pawa dey kom from God grace, nor bi from fud wey dem sakrifais, bikos di sakrifais nor fit help pipol wey dey du-am.
Wi get alta wer di wokas for di tabanakol nor fit chop from.
Di High Prist dey kari anima blood enta di Holi Place as ofrin for sins, bot di anima bodi, na outsaid di camp dem for dey burn am.
Diafor, Jisos tak en own blood mak sakrifais, so dat en pipol go dey holi. So, Jisos Kraist kon sofa outsaid di camp tu.
Wi must go mit am for outsaid di camp kon share di shame wit am.
Bikos for here, wi nor get eni tawn wey go last, bot wi dey wait di tawn wey go kom.
Tru Kraist, mak wi kontinu to dey giv God praiz as awa sakrifais. So, mak wetin dey kom out from awa mout bi, "Na Jisos, bi Oga."
Mak una nor forget to du gud and to share wetin una get wit ish oda, bikos doz kaind sakrifais, dey mak bele swit God.

Mak una obey una lidas and du evritin wey dem tok, bikos na dem dey kare for una soul and dem go ansa God wen E ask dem haw dem du dia wok. Mak una let dem du-am wit hapines, nor bi wit komplain, bikos una nor go get eni beta tin from am.
Mak una pray for us, bikos wi dey sure sey awa maind klin and wi won liv awa life for di koret way.
I beg, mak una pray wel-wel, so dat dem go fri mi and I go fit kom mit una soon.
God wey get peace, di Pesin wey yuz di evalastin kovenant blood bring awa Oga Jisos Kraist kom bak from deat; awa Oga wey dey luk di ship,
mak E giv una evritin wey una nid to du wetin E wont. Enitin wey gud for en eye, mak E du-am insaid us tru Jisos Kraist. Mak all glori bi Jisos Kraist own foreva and eva. Amen!
My brodas and sistas, I dey beg una, mak una get patient and listin to di advise wey dey dis my leta, bikos wetin I rite, nor long.
Mak una no sey dem don riliz awa broda Timoti from prizin. If e kwik kom, e go folo mi kom si una.
Mak una grit all una lidas and all God pipol. God pipol for Itali dey grit una.
Mak God grace dey wit all of una.
Mi James, wey bi God and Jisos Kraist savant, dey grit una wey bi di twef tribes wey dey for evriwer for di wold.
My brodas and sistas, mak una dey hapi wen una dey face temtashon,
bikos una no sey, if una win di temtashon, una patient go strong.
And mak una let patient du en wok, so dat una go dey pafet and komplit, den una go gain evritin.
Bot if enibodi nid wisdom, mak e ask God wey dey giv am to evribodi. E nor go sey, "No," bot E go giv yu.
Di pesin wey dey ask, must get fate and mak en maind nor shake, bikos enibodi wey en maind dey shake, bi laik riva wey strong briz dey blow up and dan.
Mak dat pesin nor tink sey e go risiv enitin from God,
bikos e get doubol maind and e nor dey stabol for enitin wey e dey du.
Eni biliva wey poor, mak e hapi, bikos God don lift am up.
Bot pesin wey get moni, mak e nor proud, bikos e go soon perish laik flawa wey dey for bush.
As sun dey dry grass and flawa and dia beauti dey die foreva, na so rish pesin go dry, as e dey porshu and luv moni.
Di pesin wey fit bear wen problem kom mit am, mak e hapi, bikos e don show sey en fate strong and e go get di krawn wey get life, wey God don promis sey E go giv pipol wey luv am.
Mak nobodi tok wen temtashon kom mit am sey, "God dey test mi," bikos nor-tin fit tempt God and God ensef, nor dey tempt enibodi.
Bot temtashon dey kom mit pesin wey get bad tins for maind.
Wen di bad tins wey e won du, don mature, e go mak am sin and wen sin don grow wel-wel, e go kause deat.
My brodas and sistas, mak nor-tin disiv una,
bikos evri beta and pafet gift dey kom from God. E dey kom dan from di Papa wey kreate lite and E nor dey shange.
As God wont am, E kon born us wit di tru mesage, so dat wi go bi first among all wetin E kreate.
My brodas and sistas, mak una undastand dis tins: Mak una dey listin wel-wel and nor dey kwik tok or ves.
Humanbin vesnashon nor dey mak pipol liv di life wey God wont.
So mak una rimov una hand from evri dirti and wiked tins kon put una bodi dan to asept God wod wey dem don plant insaid una, bikos e get pawa to save una soul.
Mak una nor dey disiv unasef as una dey hear God wod, bot mak sure sey una dey du wetin en wod tok.
Pesin wey hear God wod and e nor dey du wetin e tok, bi laik pesin wey dey luk en face for mirror.
Wen di pesin luk ensef finish kon komot go out, e go kwik-kwik forget haw en face bi.
Bot di pesin wey dey luk God pafet law wey dey fri pipol, dey du wetin di wod tok and e nor dey listin and forget, God go bless am for evritin wey e dey du.
If enibodi tink sey en dey folo wetin wi dey tish and e nor fit kontrol en mout, dat pesin dey disiv ensef and en religion nor min enitin.

Bot beta religion wey nor get stain for God eye, naim bi dis: to kare for shildren wey nor get papa and mama and wimen wey dey sofa, bikos dia husban don die. So, mak una kip unasef, so dat dis wold nor go stain una.
My brodas and sistas, since una get fate for awa Oga Jisos Kraist, mak una nor dey du parsha.
If pesin wear gold ring and fine klot enta una shosh and poor pesin wit dirti klot enta tu
and una respet di won wey wear fine klot, kon tel am, "Sidan for beta place," bot una tel di poor pesin, "Stand der," or "Sidan for groun":
Dat min sey una dey du parsha and kondem pipol from una maind.
My brodas and sistas, mak una listin! God nor shuz poor pipol for dis wold sey, mak dem rish for fate and inherit di kindom wey E promis sey E go giv doz wey luv am?
Bot una nor dey respet poor pipol! Nor bi rish pipol dey opres and drag una go kourt?
Or dem nor dey tok bad abaut Jisos name wey una biliv?
Bot if una du wetin dem rite for God wod, "Mak yu luv yor nebor as yu luv yorsef," una don du gud bi dat.
Bot if una du parsha, una dey komit sin and di law don kondem una as pipol wey nor dey du wetin dey di law.
Di pesin wey dey du evritin wey dey di law and e break won, don break all of dem bi dat.
Bikos di same God wey sey, "Nor slip wit hu yu nor mari," naim stil sey, "Nor kil enibodi." If yu nor slip wit hu yu nor mari, bot yu kil pesin, yu don break di law bi dat.
Mak una tok and du laik pipol wey dem go joj wit di law wey go fri pipol.
Jojment nor get mesi for enibodi wey nor dey mesi for odas, bikos mesi beta pas jojment.
My brodas and sistas, wetin dey gud if pesin sey e get fate, bot e nor dey du enitin? Dat kaind fate go fit save am?
If won broda or sista nor get klot to wear or fud to chop
and won of una tel am, "Mak peace dey wit yu; mak kold nor kash yu and mak yu go chop beleful, bot yu nor gi-am wetin di bodi wont, na wish kiand gud bi dat?"
Na so fate bi tu, if yor fate nor dey produce beta result, e go die and dey yuzles.
If enibodi sey,"I get fate and yu get wok." I go sey, "Mak yu show mi yor fate wey nor get wok and I go show yu my fate tru my wok."
Yu biliv sey na onli won gud God dey. Dimons biliv so tu and fear dey kash dem wel-wel.
Foolish man! Yu wont mak I show yu sey fate wey nor get wok dey yuzles?
Wen awa papa Abraham put en pikin Izik for di alta, wetin e du dey gud for God eye?
Yu nor si sey en fate and wok dey togeda and na en wok mak en fate pafet?
And wetin dem rite for God wod kon hapun, "Abraham biliv wetin God tok and dat won mak am gud for God eye and God kol am en frend."
So, pesin wok dey mak am gud tu, nor bi onli en fate.
Nor bi so e bi for Rahab, wey bi ashawo, wen e welkom di mesenjas, kon show dem anoda road wey dem go pas run?
Bodi wey nor get spirit don die, na so tu, fate wey nor get wok, don die.
My brodas and sistas, evribodi nor go fit bi tisha, bikos yu no sey wi wey dey tish, na awa jojment go big pas,
bikos wi dey mak meni mistak. If pesin nor dey mak mistak for wetin e dey tok, dat min sey e dey pafet and e go fit kontrol en bodi.
If wi tie rope for horse mout mak e for obey us, dat min sey wi dey kontrol en bodi.
Luk ship for wota: E big wel-wel and na strong briz dey fit push am, bot na won smol wheel di pilot dey yuz tak kontrol am.
Na so di tongue bi tu: naim smol pas for di bodi, bot di tins wey e fit du big wel-wel. Mak una tink haw smol fire fit burn big fores rish groun.
Di tongue na fire! Na der bad tins ful pas for pesin bodi. E dey spoil di hol bodi and kause fire for pesin life and dis kaind fire dey kom from hell.
Humanbin dey fit kontrol bird, anima wey dey krip for groun and anima wey dey stay for wota.
Bot nobodi don eva fit kontrol en tongue wel. Di tongue na bad tin wey nor dey stay won place, bikos e get poison wey fit kil pesin.
Na di tongue wi tak dey praiz awa papa and Oga Jisos Kraist and naim wi stil dey yuz tak kos pipol wey God kreate laik ensef.
My brodas and sistas, na di same tongue wi dey yuz tak praiz and kos pipol. Bot e nor sopoz bi laik dat.
Spring wey dey kom out from groun, nor dey bring out fresh and bita wota from di same place, abi e dey du so?
My brodas and sistas, fig tri go fit bear olive, abi vine fit bear fig? So tu, spring wey dey bring out salt wota, nor go fit bring fresh wota at-all.
Hu get sense among una? Di way di pesin dey bihav go show di gentolnes wey wisdom dey bring.
Bot if jelosi and selfishnes dey en maind, mak e nor boast and lai against di trut.
Dat kaind wisdom nor kom from God, bot e kom from dis eart wey wiked wel-wel.
Bikos wer jelosi and selfishnes dey, wahala and bad tins wey pipol dey du, dey der tu.
Bot God wisdom dey pure; e get peace; dey gentol; dey asept pipol and gud frut and mesi ful am; e nor dey du wayo or pritend.
Pipol wey nor laik trobol, dey plant frut wey dey bring raitiousnes.
Wetin dey mak una kworel and fite? Nor bi di tins wey dey hungri una to du?
Yu wont somtin, bot yu nor get-am; yu dey kil, dey wont wetin oda pipol get and yu nor dey fit get-am; so yu go kon dey kworel and fite. Yu nor get, bikos yu nor ask God mak E giv yu.
Wen yu ask for somtin, yu nor risiv am, bikos yu nor ask wel and yu won tak am du wetin yu laik.
Una wey dey du bad tins for dis wold, una nor no sey to bi dis wold frend, min sey una bi God enimi? So enibodi wey gri sey en and dis wold na frend, don mak ensef God enimi.
Abi yu tink sey God nor min wetin E tok wen E sey, "Di Spirit wey I put insaid una dey jelos wel-wel"?
Bot E giv us plenti grace. Na dis mak God wod sey, "God dey against pesin wey dey kari bodi up, bot E dey giv grace to pipol wey dey put dia bodi dan."
So, mak yu giv yorsef to God. Bot rejet di devol and e go run komot from wer yu dey.
Draw near God and E go draw near yu. Una wey bi sina, mak una wosh una hand and una wey get doubol maind, mak una heart dey klin.
Mak una krai and mak sorrow dey una heart, den una go show sey una nor dey hapi.
If una put una bodi dan for God, E go kari una go up.

My brodas and sistas, mak una nor tok bad abaut ish oda. Enibodi wey tok bad or joj en broda or sista for Kraist, e dey tok bad abaut di law and e dey joj di law. Bot if una joj di law, naim bi sey una nor dey obey di law, bot una don bikom di law joj bi dat.
Na onli won Pesin giv di law and na-im bi joj. Na-im dey save and distroi. Yu wey dey joj yor nebor, na hu yu ivun tink sey yu bi?
Luk, yu wey dey sey, "Today or tumoro, wi go-go dis or dat tawn go stay der for won year and du biznes, kon get gain."
Bot yu nor no tumoro. Wetin yor life bi laik? Yu bi laik smoke wey dey kom out from fire. Pipol go si-am, den smol taim e go vanish.
Insted, yu sopoz to sey, "If God wont, wi go dey alaif and wi go du dis or dat tin."
Bot as e bi so, yu dey boast dey kari bodi up. All dat kaind boastin nor gud.
So enibodi wey no wetin gud and e nor du-am, don komit sin bi dat. James
Yu wey get moni, mak yu listin! Krai mak dem hear yor vois, bikos of di bad tins wey go hapun to yu.
Yor moni don rotin and ants don chop yor klot.
Yor gold and silva don rust, dia ashes go tok against yu and chop yor flesh laik fire. For di last days, yu don gada moni and fine tins for yorsef!
Si, di moni wey yu nor gri pay di wokas wey dey wok for yor farm, dey krai against yu and di pipol wey dey gada wetin yu plant, dia krai don rish God ear.
Yu dey liv life wey yu dey enjoy and yu dey enjoy for dis eart. Yu don mak yorsef fat, dey wait for di day wey dem go kil yu.
Yu don kondem and kil pipol wey nor du bad, bikos dem nor fit stop yu.

My brodas and sistas, mak una get patient til Kraist go kom bak. Tink haw farma dey wait for wetin e plant ontil e grow kon bring fud wey dear and e dey wait wit patient for am, ontil di first and di last rain go fal put.
So, mak una get patient tu and mak una heart strong, bikos di taim wen Kraist go kom bak, don near.
My brodas and sistas, mak una nor dey komplain abaut ish oda, so dat dem nor go joj una, bikos God wey bi di joj, stand near di gate.
Di profets wey God send kom tok to una, mak una yuz dem as ezampol to bear sofa and get patient.
Mak una tink of haw wi dey luk pipol wey get patient sey, God don bless dem. Una don hear of haw Job get patient and haw God bless am lata. God get mesi and E dey sori for pesin wel-wel.

My brodas and sistas, mak una rimemba dis komand pas oda wons; mak una nor swear, weda wit hevun or eart or eni oda tin. Bot mak una let una "Yes" bi yes, and una "No" bi no, so dat una nor go fal enta God jojment.
If enibodi dey sofa among una, mak e pray. If enibodi dey hapi among una, mak e sing dey praiz God.
If eni of una nor wel, mak e kol di eldas for di shosh, mak dem pray and yuz oil anoint am for Jisos name.
Di praya wey dem tak fate pray go save di pesin wey nor wel and God go mak am wel. And if e komit eni sin, God go forgiv am.
So mak una konfes una sin to ish oda. Mak una pray for ish oda, so dat God go heal una. Di praya wey pesin wey gud for God eye tak all en maind pray, dey wok wel-wel.
Elija na humanbin laik us and e pray wit all en maind mak rain nor fal, tru-tru, for tiri and half years, rain nor fal for dat place at-all.
Den e pray again and di skai kon bring rain and evritin wey dem plant, kon grow.
My brodas and sistas, if eni of una waka komot from di trut and pesin bring am kom bak,
mak yu no sey, di pesin wey bring yu wey bi sina kom bak from di bad way, don save yor soul from deat and e don mak Kraist forgiv yu all yor sins.
Na mi Pita wey bi Jisos Kraist apostol rite dis leta to di stranjas for Pontus, Galatia, Kapadosia, Asia aria and Bitinia wey God shuz sey,
mak dem dey holi tru en Spirit. Mak una dey obey Kraist for evritin and en blood go klin una. Mak grace and peace bi una own!
Wi tank God wey bi awa Oga Jisos Kraist Papa, for di mesi wey E dey show us. God giv us new life tru Jisos Kraist wey E wak from deat and naim bi di Pesin wey giv us hope.
Dem born us put for inheritance wey nor dey spoil, dirti or fade. God kip di inheritance for hevun for us
and en pawa dey protet am tru fate and wi dey wait for di salvashon wey go kom for di taim wen di wold go end.
Aldoh una go sofa smol, bot dis joy go bring hapines for una.

Dis kaind sofa go show sey una fate na ril won. Gold wey go spoil won day, dem stil dey test am for fire, tokles of una fate wey get value pas gold and e go bring praiz, glori and onor wen Jisos Kraist go kom.
Aldoh una neva si-am, bot una luv am. Una nor dey si-am naw, bot una biliv am, una get hapines and glori wey una nor go fit esplain.
Una stil get wetin mak una fate strong and na dis bi di salvashon wey una soul get.
For dis salvashon mata, di profets wey tok bifor abaut di grace wey go kom, trai wel-wel weda dem fit no wetin e min, bot dem nor fit.
Dem won no di taim and di pesin wey God Spirit dey tok abaut. God don tok bifor abaut di sofa wey E sey Kraist must sofa and di glori wey e go get.
Dem show sey nor bi demsef dem dey wok for, bot na for una, bikos una hear dis mata from di apostols tru di Holi Spirit pawa wey kom from hevun. Ivun angels dey wish sey dem no dis tins.
So, mak una always dey redi for ashon. Mak una shine una eye and put hope for di grace wey Jisos Kraist go bring.
Laik shildren wey dey obey, mak una stop di bad tins wey una dey du wen una neva no di trut.
Bot for evritin wey una dey du, mak una dey holi laik di Pesin wey kol una,
bikos God wod sey, "Mak una dey holi, bikos I dey Holi."
Since una dey kol God wey dey joj evribodi akordin to wetin e du, "Papa", mak una liv una life wit respet for am.
Una no sey, God fri una from di empti life wey una kolet from una gran-gran papa dem and E nor buy una wit somtin wey fit spoil laik silva or gold,
bot na wit Kraist blood, God lamb wey nor get eni mark or stain.
God shuz am bifor E kreate dis wold, bot na for dis last days E show am to una.
Tru am, una biliv God wey raiz-am from deat kon giv am glori. So, una fate and hope dey for God hand.
Una don klin una soul wit di trut wey una dey obey and as brodas and sistas, mak una luv ish oda wel-wel.
God nor save una wit humanbin bodi wey fit die, bot na tru en wod wey get life and dey foreva.
“Humanbin bi laik grass and wetin mak am fine, bi laik flawa; di grass go dry and di flawa go die,
bot God wod go last foreva.” And na dis wod bi di Gud News wey dem prish giv una.
Mak una stop to du bad tin; dey disiv pipol, pritend; dey jelos and tok bad abaut pipol.
Bot mak una dey hungri for spiritual milk laik pikin wey dem jos born, so dat una fate go strong wel-wel
and una go no haw God salvashon gud rish.
Una don kom mit Kraist, wey bi di stone wey dey alaif. Pipol rejet am, bot God shuz am and e dey important for God eye.
So unasef tu, don bi stone wey dey alaif and God dey build una as en spiritual haus, so dat una go bi prist wey dey holi and una go offa spiritual sakrifais wey E go asept tru Jisos Kraist.
God wod sey, "Naw, I don lay won stone for Zion; di main stone wey I shuz; no moni fit buy am and enibodi wey biliv am, nor go shame."
So, una wey biliv don no en value, bot for di pipol and buildas wey nor biliv, dat Stone don kon bi di main stone.
Na-im bi di rock wey dey fal pipol, bikos dem nor fit jump am pas. As dem nor biliv God wod, dem bigin fal, bikos na so E plan sey e go bi.
Bot God don shuz una to bi en prist and holi pipol, so dat una go prish di Gud News, bikos E kol una from daknes kon enta en brite lite.
Bifor-bifor, una nor bi God pipol, bot naw, una don bi en pipol. Dat taim, God nor get mesi for una, bot naw, una don get en mesi.
My frends, I dey beg una, since una bi strenjas for dis wold, mak una nor folo di tins wey pipol laik to du, bikos dem dey distroi pesin soul.
So mak una dey liv wel among pipol wey nor bi Kristen, so dat wen dem sey una du bad, dem go si di gud tins wey una dey du and dem go praiz God wen E won joj di wold.
Mak una dey obey una lidas bikos of Kraist. Weda dem bi kings wey get pawa
or govnors wey God shuz sey, mak dem ponish pipol wey du bad and praiz doz wey du gud.
Bikos God wont sey, wetin una dey du, go mak di pipol wey nor get sense shut-up dia mout.
Mak una liv as fri pipol and nor yuz una fridom as eskuze to du bad tins, bot mak una yuz am wel as God savant.
Mak una respet evribodi. Luv dis awa famili wey biliv Kraist. Mak una fear God and respet di king.
Una wey bi slave, mak una dey obey una oga, both di wons wey gud or gentol and doz wey nor gud.
If enibodi bear pain bikos of God and dey sofa for wetin e nor du, God go favor am.
Bot why pipol go praiz yu wen dem ponish yu, bikos of wetin yu du and yu bear am? Bot if yu sofa bikos yu du gud, God go favor yu,
bikos na wetin E kol yu to du, bi dat. Kraist sofa as ezampol wey una go folo
and e nor komit eni sin or lai.
Wen dem kos am, e nor ansa bak; wen e sofa, e nor treaten sey e go pay dem bak, bot e put ensef for God hand wey nor dey joj kase wit parsha.
E kari awa sin for kros, so dat wi go stop to sin and dey du gud for God eye. "Na di wound wey dem wound am, naim mak us wel."
Bifor-bifor, una waka komot for di rite road laik ship wey lost, bot naw, una don turn bak go mit di Shepad and Pesin wey dey gaid una soul.
Mak una wey bi wife, dey obey una husban. Ivun doh dem nor dey du wetin dem rite for God wod, di way una dey bihav, fit mak dem shange,
wen dem si una gud karata and haw una life pure rish.
Mak una beauti nor bi di won wey pipol dey onli si laik: to dey plait hair; dey wear gold or fine klot.
Insted mak e show sey Kraist dey insaid una and una don get gentol and kwayet spirit wey God go value.
Di wimen for olden days dey holi, bikos dem put dia hope for God hand and dem respet dia husban.
As Sarah obey Abraham kon kol am, "My oga," una go bi God pikin, if una dey du wetin gud.
Husbans, mak una dey trit una wife wit soft hand, bikos una no sey dem nor strong rish una; mak una respet dem as pipol wey get God grace and life. If una dey du laik dis, nor-tin go blok una prayas.
So, mak una liv for peace togeda, dey sori for ish oda; luv won anoda and nor dey kari bodi up.
Mak una nor tak bad pay di bad wey pesin du una, insted, mak una bless odas, bikos God kol una to bless pipol.
God wod sey, “enibodi wey won enjoy gud life, must kontrol en mout; mak e nor dey tok bad-bad tins or lai.
E must turn from di wikednes wey e dey du, kon start to du gud and mak e liv for peace wit evribodi.
God dey si di pipol wey dey du gud and en ear dey opun to hear dia prayas. Bot E dey against pipol wey dey du bad.”
Hu go fit du yu bad tin, if yu dey du gud?
Bot if yu sofa bikos yu dey du gud, mak yu nor fear doz wiked pipol, bikos God don bless yu bi dat.
For una heart, mak una mak Kraist una Oga and mak una redi to ansa enibodi wey ask una abaut di hope wey una get.
Bot mak una du-am wit gentolnes and respet, dey mak sure sey una maind klin, so dat pipol wey dey tok bad abaut di gud tins wey una dey du for Kraist, go shame for di bad wey dem dey tok.
E beta to sofa for wetin gud, dan for bad won if na so God wont am.
Bikos of sin, Kraist sofa. En wey nor du bad, sofa for doz wey du bad, so dat e go kari us go mit God. And wen dem kil-am, e wak-up as spirit.
As spirit, e kon go prish giv wiked pipol spirits wey dey prizin,
bikos dem nor du wetin God tok. God get patient for dem wen Noah dey build di ark, bot na onli di ate pipol wey dey insaid di ark save from di wota.
Dis show haw baptism go save us, nor bi jos to wosh dirti komot for pesin bodi, bot na to show sey wi get gud maind for God tru di way wey Jisos Kraist tak raiz-up
go hevun kon go sidan for God rite hand, wer e dey rule di angels and doz wey get pawa.
Since Kraist don sofa for us, mak wi du laik am, bikos di pesin wey sofa for us nor get enitin to du wit sin again,
bikos e don du wetin God wont and nor bi wetin pipol wont.
Di taim wey una dey bihav laik unbilivas, don pas. Dat taim una liv bad life; dey du bad tins; dey drink; dey du enihaw and serv juju.
Naw, doz unbilivas dey sopraiz and kos una, bikos una nor dey folo dem du bad and wiked tins again.
For di day wen Kraist go joj pipol wey dey alaif and doz wey don die, e go ponish dem.
Na dis mak Kraist prish di gospol for doz wey don die, so dat ivun doh e go joj dem as humanbin, dem go liv foreva as spirit tru God jojment.
Di taim wen evritin go end don near. So mak una dey kontrol unasef and shine una eye wen una dey pray.
As una dey du so, mak una luv for ish oda dey strong, bikos luv dey kova plenti sins.
Mak una welkom pipol for una haus witout komplain.
God don giv evribodi en own gift, so mak una yuz di gift tak help ish oda as gud savant wey get God grace.

Pesin wey dey prish; mak e prish God wod wel. Pesin wey dey help odas, mak e du-am wit di pawa wey God gi-am, so dat for evritin, God go get glori tru Jisos Kraist. Mak all glori and pawa bi Kraist own foreva and eva. Amen!
My frends, mak una nor sopraiz sey una dey pas tru trobol laik pesin wey fire dey burn, bikos tins wey go mak una fear, go must hapun.
Insted, mak una dey hapi as una dey sofa for Kraist, so dat wen God go show una en glori, bele go swit una.
If dem kos una bikos of Kraist, God don bless una bi dat, bikos God Spirit wey get glori, res on-top una life.
Bot mak eni of una nor sofa, bikos e kil, tif or kause trobol.
Bot if yu sofa bikos yu bi Kristen, mak yu nor shame, bot dey praiz God, bikos yu dey ansa Jisos name.
Di taim for jojment don rish and e go start wit God pipol. And if e start wit us, wetin go hapun to pipol wey nor dey obey God?
“If e go hard for God pipol to dey save, den e nor go eazi for doz wey nor dey fear God.”
So if yu dey sofa as God wont am, mak yu trust God wey kreate yu and E nor go eva fail yu.
Mi wey bi una felow elda, wey si haw Kraist sofa and go share for God glori wey go soon kom, dey beg di eldas among una sey:

Mak una kare for di ship wey God giv una hol, jos as shepad dey kare for dia ship. Mak e nor bi laik sey dem fos una du-am, bot na as God wont am. Una nor dey du-am bikos of moni, bot na bikos una won du-am.
And mak una nor dey opres God pipol wey dey unda una, insted mak una bi ezampol to dem.
So wen di big shepad, Jisos Kraist go kom, e go giv una krawn wey en glori nor go eva fade.
For di same way, mak una wey young put bodi dan for di eldas. Mak una nor dey kari bodi up for ish oda, bikos God dey opoz proud pipol, bot E dey favor doz wey dey humbol.
Mak una put una bodi for groun bikos of God and wen di rite taim rish, E go kari una up.
Mak una kari all una trobol giv God, bikos E kare for una.
Mak una shine una eye wel-wel, bikos devol wey bi una enimi, bi laik hungri lion wey dey shaut and dey faind hu e go chop.
Mak una nor gi-am shanse, bot mak una fate strong, bikos una no sey na di same tin una brodas and sistas for evriwer for dis wold, dey sofa.
Afta una don sofa smol, God wey kol una wit en grace enta en glori for Kraist, go mak una komplit, una leg go strong and una go get pawa.
Mak all pawa bi God own foreva and eva. Amen!
I tel my dear broda Silas sey, mak e help mi rite dis smol leta, so dat una heart go strong and mak e tel una sey, all wetin dey hapun to una, na as God wont am. So mak una stand strong wit en pawa.
God pipol for di shosh wey dey Babylon dey grit una and Mark, my pikin, dey grit una tu.
Mak una salot ish oda wit Jisos Kraist luv. Mak peace dey wit all of una wey dey insaid Kraist.

Na mi Pita wey bi Jisos Kraist savant and apostol, rite dis leta to di pipol wey get di same fate wey wi get. God giv una dis fate, bikos of en raitiousnes wey kom tru awa Oga and Savior, Jisos Kraist.
Mak God giv una beta peace and grace as una dey grow for en wod and insaid Jisos, wey bi awa Oga!
I pray mak God pawa giv us evritin wey wi nid, so dat wi go fit liv di kaind life wey E wont, as wi don no di trut abaut Jisos wey kol us wit en glori and gudnes.
Laik dis tu, wi don get beta promis and bikos of dat, wi go get God karata wey go fri us from di bad tins wey dey for dis wold.
So, mak una trai to mak una fate strong and no God wod. As una dey no God wod more-more,
una go fit kontrol unasef; get patient; dey liv holi life
and luv una brodas and sistas witout parsha.
Bikos if una rili get dis tins, dem go dey grow insaid una, so una nor go dey yuzles, bot una go bear gud fruts as una dey trai to no Kraist more-more.
Bot di pesin wey nor get dis tins, dey blind. Dis show sey, e nor dey si far and e don forget sey God don forgiv am en sins.
So my brodas and sistas, mak una du evritin to show sey, God kol and shuz una. As una dey du so, una nor go eva fal insaid sin.
Di door to enta awa Oga and Savior Jisos Kraist kindom, wey nor go eva end, go opun wide for una.
I go dey rimaind una dis tins evritaim, ivun doh I no sey una no dem and naw, una leg don strong for di trut wey una biliv.
As long as I dey alaif, I luk am sey e gud mak I dey rimaind una,
as I no sey di taim wey I go die don near, bikos awa Oga Jisos Kraist don show am to mi.
I go trai du evritin wey I fit du, so dat afta I don go, una go fit tok abaut dis tins.
Bikos, wi nor yuz awa brain tak tel una lai-lai stori abaut Kraist pawa and haw E go kom bak.
God giv am onor and glori wen di vois sey, "Dis na my Pikin wey I luv and e dey mak bele swit mi."
Wen dis vois tok from hevun, wi awasef hear am, bikos wi dey wit am on-top di mountin.
Afta dat won, wi biliv wetin di profets prish. Una go du wel if una hear and folo di lite wey dey shine for daknes and wen day break, di star wey dey kom for mornin, go shine for una heart.
Di won wey important pas bi sey, una no dis tins: e nor get enitin wey di profets tok for God wod wey jos kom out from dia own maind,
bikos no profesi don eva kom out from humanbin maind. Insted, na di Holi Spirit dey kontrol di pipol wey dey tok God wod.~

As fake profets dey among di pipol bifor, na so fake tishas go dey among una tu. Dis fake tishas go tish lai-lai tins wey fit distroi pesin and dem go sey dem nor no di Masta. Laik dis, dem go distroi demsef.
Meni pipol go folo dem liv dia yeye life. Pipol go tok bad abaut di trut, bikos of dis fake tishas
and dem go disiv una wit dia wayo. God don kondem dem tey-tey and Kraist wey go distroi dem, nor dey slip.
God nor sori for di angels wey sin, E trow dem for hell and tie dem for daknes ontil di day wen E go joj di wold.
God nor sori for di wold wey dey bifor and E distroi am wit wota, bot save Noah wey prish mak pipol du wetin gud for God eye and di sevun pipol wey dey wit am.
E stil turn Sodom and Gomora to ashes wen E distroi dem, den E yuz dem as ezampol for di pipol wey dey liv bad life,
bot E save Lot wey nor laik wiked pipol life,
(bikos di taim wey Lot dey dat tawn, e ves for di bad tins wey di pipol dey du).
If God du all dis tins, den E no haw to save en pipol from trobol kon tie wiked pipol kip, so dat E go ponish dem wen E go joj di wold.
Dis na di pipol wey dey du wetin dia bodi wont and dem nor dey respet pipol wey get autoriti. Dem nor dey fear; dem dey kari bodi up, dey tok bad abaut tins wey God kreate for hevun,
ivun angels wey get pawa pas dem, nor dey tok abaut dis tins for God present.
Bot dis men bi laik anima wey nor dey tink, animas wey pipol fit kil enihaw. Dem jos dey du as dem laik, pipol wey dey tok enihaw; na distroshon go end dia life.
Dem go sofa for dis tins wey dem dey du, bikos dem feel sey dem fit du enitin wey dia bodi wont for day taim and wen eva dem folo una chop, dem dey kause trobol among una.
Wetin dem laik pas, na to slip wit hu dem nor mari; dem nor dey taya to sin and dem dey draw doz wey dia fate nor strong, folo bodi. Dem don train dia maind to get long-trot and God don kos dem.
Since dem komot from di rite way, dem don miss road, bikos dem dey folo Balaam, Beor pikin, wey luv bad tins!
As God dey koret Balaam for en sin (donkey wey nor sopoz tok kon tok to di profet, so dat e go stop di bad tins wey e dey du).
Dis pipol bi laik spring wey nor get wota, dem bi laik kloud wey briz dey blow enihaw and na dem God dey kip di place wey dak pas, dey wait.
Dem dey yuz dia big-big grama wey nor min enitin, tak disiv pipol wey jos dey won komot hand for bad tins.
Ivun doh dis fake tishas dey promis dis pipol sey, dem go dey fri, di fake tisha na slave dem bi to sin. Bikos pesin na slave to enitin wey masta am.
Afta dem don fri from sin tru awa Oga and Savior Jisos Kraist and dem kon let sin masta dem again, dia kondishon for di end, go wos pas as e bi bifor.
Bikos e for beta sey, dem nor no God at-all, dan sey afta dem don no am, dem kon turn bak from di komandment wey God giv dem.
Na dem bi ezampol for dis wod wey pipol tok, "Dog dey go bak go chop en vomit," and "Pig wey dem don wosh en bodi, go stil go laidan for portor-portor."
My frends, dis na di sekon leta wey I dey rite to una, so dat una go dey tink abaut di tins wey I tel una.
I wont mak una rimemba all di wod wey di profets tok bifor and di komandment wey awa Oga and Savior giv us tru di apostols.
Afta dis, mak una undastand sey: for di last days, yeye pipol go kom and dem go dey du bad tins wey dey hungri dem.
Dem go sey, "I tink sey Jisos promis sey E go kom bak? Awa gran-gran papa dem don die since, bot evritin stil bi as dem bi since God kreate di wold."
Dem don forget sey, na wit wod God tak kreate di hevun bifor E kreate di eart from wota and na wit wota, E tak mak dis wold.
And na wit di same wota, E tak distroi di eart wey dey bifor.
Na di same wod God tak kip dis hevun and eart dey wait for fire wey go kom. E kip dem dey wait Jojment day. Di day wen E go distroi di pipol wey nor dey fear am.
Naw, my frends, mak una nor let dis tin pas una, bikos won day bi laik won tazon years for God eye and won tazon years bi laik won day.
Nor bi sey God nor fit du wetin E promis as som pipol dey tink, bot E dey patient dey wait for una, bikos E nor wont mak enibodi die trowey, bot E wont mak evribodi turn from sin kom mit am.
