Di day wen God go kom, go bi laik wen tif dey kom for nite. Wen E kom, di hevun go disapier wit loud nois and di stars for up go melt, di hol eart and evritin wey dey insaid, go vanish.
Since evritin go melt laik dis, wish kaind pipol wi sopoz to bi? E gud mak wi dey liv awa life for holines and dey du wetin God wont.
Since wi dey wait for di day wey Kraist go kom, mak wi dey du wetin wi fit du to mak Kraist kwik kom. Bikos for dat day, evritin wey dey for hevun go burn kon skata and di stars, go melt.
Bot as God promis, wi dey wait for di new hevun and eart, di place wer raitiousnes dey.
So, my frends, as una dey wait for dis tins, mak una du wetin una fit du, so dat una go get peace and una go dey witout stain or fault, wen una go enta en kindom.
God dey wait wit patient, so dat una go turn from sin kom mit am, jos as awa broda Pol rite giv una akordin to di wisdom wey God gi-am.

E tok abaut dis tins for all en letas. Aldoh somtins for di letas dey hard to undastand and doz wey nor no di trut or dey stabol, don turn dem to wetin go kil dem. Na so dem tak distroi all di oda part for God wod tu.
So, my frends, as una don no wetin go hapun, mak una shine una eye, so dat una nor go miss di way and fal from di trut wey una get, bikos na so pipol wey nor serious, dey du.
Bot mak una grow insaid di grace wey awa Oga and Savior, Jisos Kraist giv una, so dat una go no am more-more. Mak glori bi en own, naw and foreva! Amen.
Di tin wey dey from di biginin, wey wi don hear and si wit awa eye; wey awa hand don tosh (tins wey konsan di wod wey dey giv life
and dis life kom out and wi don si-am. Na dis tins wi dey tok abaut. Wi dey tel una abaut di life wey nor dey end, wey dey wit di Papa for hevun and E don show-am to us.
Na wetin wi don si and hear, wi dey tel una, so dat una go fit bi awa frend, jos as wi bi frend wit di Papa and en Pikin.)
Na dis mak us dey rite dis leta, so dat awa joy go ful wel-wel.
Na di mesage wey wi hear from am, naim wi dey tel una so: Na God bi lite and daknes nor dey insaid am at-all.
If wi sey wi bi en frend and wi stil dey insaid daknes, wi dey lai and trut nor dey awa mout.
Bot if wi dey insaid di lite as en ensef dey insaid lite, all of us go bi en frend and Jisos wey bi en pikin, go yuz en blood tak wosh all awa sins komot.
If wi sey wi nor get sin, wi dey disiv awasef and di trut nor dey insaid us.
Bot if wi konfes awa sin to am, e go forgiv us kon wosh evritin wey nor gud for God eye komot from awa life, bikos Kraist dey always du wetin e sey e go du, since e dey raitious.
If wi sey wi nor dey sin, dat min sey, God dey lai and di trut nor dey insaid us.
(My shildren, I dey rite abaut dis mata, so dat una nor go dey sin.) Bot if enibodi sin, wi get pesin wey dey beg di Papa for us, dat pesin, na Jisos Kraist wey dey raitious
and na en ensef bi di sakrifais wey God nid to forgiv us awa sins. Nor bi onli awa sin, bot di sin wey di hol wold dey komit.
Wen wi du wetin God sey mak wi du, den wi go dey sure sey wi no am.
Di pesin wey sey, "I no God and e nor dey du wetin God tok, dat pesin dey lai and di trut nor dey insaid am.
Bot enibodi wey du wetin dem rite for God wod, tru-tru, God wod rili dey insaid am. Na dis go mak us no sey wi dey insaid God.
Di pesin wey sey en wit God dey togeda foreva, dat pesin sopoz liv en life as Kraist liv en own.
Una wey bi my frends, I nor dey rite new komandment giv una, na di old won wey una get from di biginin, I stil dey rite and una don hear dem bifor.
Bot dis new komandment wey I dey rite giv una so, naim bi di trut wey dey show insaid Kraist and insaid una, bikos daknes don pas and di ril lite don dey shine.
Pesin wey sey e dey insaid di lite, bot e stil hate en broda or sista for Kraist, dat pesin stil dey insaid daknes.
Pesin wey luv en broda or sista for Kraist, dey liv insaid di lite and nor-tin go mak am fal.
Bot di won wey hate en broda or sista for Kraist, dey for daknes and e nor no wer e dey go, bikos daknes don blind en eye.
My shildren, I dey rite giv una sey God don forgiv una sins, bikos of Jisos name.
I dey rite giv una wey bi papa, bikos una no di pesin wey dey alaif since God kreate di wold. I dey rite giv una wey bi young pipol, bikos una don win Satan.

I don rite giv una, my shildren, bikos una don no God. I don rite giv una wey bi papa, bikos una don no di pesin wey dey alaif since God kreate di wold. I don rite giv una young pipol, bikos una dey strong and God wod dey insaid una, as una don win Satan.
Mak una nor luv dis wold or di tins wey dey insaid am. If enibodi luv dis wold, di Papa luv nor dey insaid am,
bikos evritin wey dey insaid di wold (tins wey humanbin bodi wont, tins wey dey hungri pesin to get and to dey kari bodi up), nor kom from di Papa, bot na dis wold dem from kom.
And dis wold don dey fade wit di tins wey pipol wont, bot di pesin wey dey du wetin God wont, go dey foreva.
My shildren, di wold don dey end and jos as una hear sey, anti-kraist dey kom, mak una no sey meni anti-kraist don alredi kom. And dis show us sey di wold go soon end.
Na from us dis pipol from komot, bot dem nor rili dey God famili bifor, bikos if to sey dem dey, dem for stay wit us. Bot dem liv us, so dat evribodi go no sey dem nor bi awa own.
Bot di pesin wey dey holi, don anoint una and all of una no sey na tru.
I nor rite giv una, bikos una nor no di trut, bot na bikos una no Kraist and di trut dey stay insaid am.
Na hu dey lai? Na di pesin wey sey Jisos nor bi di Mezaya! Di pesin wey rejet di Papa and en Pikin, na Kraist enimi.
Enibodi wey rejet di Pikin, nor get di Papa. Bot if pesin asept di Pikin, e don asept di Papa tu.
As for una, wetin una don hear from di biginin, mak una let am stay insaid una. If wetin una hear from di biginin stay insaid una, una go stay insaid di Pikin and en Papa.
Dis na di promis wey Kraist ensef promis us sey, di life wey e go giv, nor go eva end.
Na dis tins I dey rite giv una abaut pipol wey dey trai to disiv una.

As for una, di Holi Spirit wey Kraist giv una, dey stay insaid una, so una nor nid enibodi to tish una again. Evritin wey di Holi Spirit dey tish, na tru and lai nor dey insaid. Jos as e don tish una, mak una stay insaid am.
Naw my shildren, mak una stay insaid am, so dat wen E kom, awa heart go dey strong wel-wel and shame nor go mak us run from wer E dey.
If una no sey E dey raitious, den una go no sey, doz wey dey du wetin God wont, na en shildren dem bi.
Mak una si di kaind luv wey awa God get for us. And naw, pipol dey kol us God shildren and tru-tru, na God shildren wi bi. Di wold nor no us, bikos dem nor no am.
My frends, wi bi God shildren naw and wi neva no as wi go bi wen Kraist go kom bak. Bot wi no sey wi go bi laik am, bikos wi go si-am jos as E bi.
And evribodi wey get dis hope for Kraist, dey mak ensef pure, jos as Jisos dey pure.
Evribodi wey dey laik to sin, nor dey obey God law and to sin, na to disobey God law.
And una no sey God send Jisos kom, mak e for kari sin komot and no sin dey insaid Kraist.
Enibodi wey dey stay insaid am nor dey laik to sin, bot pesin wey dey komit sin, neva si or no am.
So my shildren, mak una nor let enibodi disiv una: If pesin dey du wetin gud for God eye, dat show sey dat pesin dey gud, jos as Kraist dey gud for God eye.
Bot pesin wey dey laik to sin, na devol pikin, bikos devol dey sin from di biginin. Na dis won mak God Pikin kom dis wold, so dat e go skata all di wok wey devol dey du.
Pesin wey bi God pikin, nor dey laik to sin, bikos God sid dey insaid am.
Na laik dis una go tak no God and devol shildren. Pesin wey nor dey du wetin gud for God eye and wey nor luv en broda or sista for Kraist, nor bi God pikin.
Dis na di Gud News wey una don hear from di biginin sey, mak wi luv ish oda as awasef.
Nor bi laik Kain wey bi devol pikin, wey kil en broda. And wetin mak am kil-am? Na bikos God nor asept en ofrin as E asept Abel own.
So my broda and sista, mak una nor sopraiz sey dis wold pipol hate una.
Wi no sey wi don kros from deat enta life, bikos wi dey luv and kare for awa brodas and sistas for Kraist.
Pesin wey hate en broda or sista for Kraist, fit kil pesin and di life wey nor go end, nor dey insaid am.
Dis na wetin mak us no wetin luv bi: Jisos Kraist die for us, so wi sopoz sakrifais awa life for awa felow Kristen brodas and sistas.
Bot pesin wey get enof tins and e nor sori for en broda or sista for Kraist wey nor get at-all, na haw God luv go tak dey insaid am?
My shildren, mak wi nor dey luv wit onli wod for mout, bot mak wetin wi dey du, show sey wi rili luv ish oda.
Wetin wi dey du go show sey wi dey liv for di trut, so wi go dey bold wen wi stand for God front.
So, ivun if awa maind kondem us, wi no sey God big pas awa maind and E no evritin.
My frends, if awa maind nor kondem us, awa heart go strong for God present
and enitin wey wi ask from am, E go giv us, bikos wi dey du wetin E wont and na dis tins dey mak bele swit am.
Na wetin E komand bi dis, "Mak wi biliv en pikin Jisos Kraist name and mak wi luv ish oda, ivun as E don komand us."
So enibodi wey du all wetin God tok, dey insaid am and God dey insaid dat pesin tu. Wi no sey E dey insaid us, bikos di Spirit wey E giv us, dey stay insaid us.
My frends, mak una nor biliv evribodi wey sey na God Spirit dey tok tru am. Una must test am to no weda na God Spirit e rili get. Bikos meni fake profets dey for dis wold.
Dis na haw una go tak no God Spirit: If pesin biliv sey na Jisos bi di Mezaya, wey kom as humanbin, dat pesin get God Spirit.
Bot evribodi wey nor gri sey Jisos na Oga, dat pesin spirit nor kom from God. Dat na di anti-kraist spirit wey una hear sey dey kom and e don alredi dey dis wold.
My shildren, una kom from God and una don get victori ova doz pipol, bikos di pesin wey dey insaid una, big pas di pesin wey dey di wold.
Dem kom from dis wold: so dem dey tink laik pipol for di wold and di pipol wey dey di wold, dey listin to dem.
Wi kom from God and di pesin wey no God dey listin to us, bot pesin wey nor no God, nor dey agri wit us. Dis na haw wi tak dey no di tru Spirit and di spirit wey dey disiv pipol.
My frends, mak wi luv won anoda, bikos luv kom from God and enibodi wey luv odas, na God pikin and e no God,
bot pesin wey nor luv en broda nor no God, bikos God na luv.
Dis na haw God luv dey show for awa life: God send en onli Pikin wey e born, mak e kom dis wold, so dat tru am, wi go get life wey nor dey end.
Na dis bi luv: nor bi sey wi first luv God, bot na-im first luv us wen E send en Pikin kom die for us as sakrifais wey mak am forgiv us awa sins.
My frends, if God luv us laik dis, den wi must luv ish oda.
Nobodi don eva si God bifor. If wi luv ish oda, God dey insaid us and en luv dey pafet insaid us.
God don giv us en Spirit to show sey wi dey insaid am and e dey insaid us.
Wi don si wit awa eye sey, di Papa send en Pikin to bi Savior for di wold.
If enibodi sey Jisos na God Pikin, dat show sey, God dey insaid am and e dey insaid God tu.
Wi no and biliv sey, God luv us and en luv dey insaid us.
And as wi dey stay insaid God, awa luv dey grow more-more. So wi nor go fear for jojment day, bot wi go face God wit konfident, bikos wi liv laik Jisos Kraist wen wi dey di wold.
Dis kaind luv nor get fear, bikos beta luv dey driv fear komot from pesin heart. If wi dey fear bikos wi nor wont mak God ponish us, dat show sey wi neva rili no haw en luv bi.
Bikos God first luv us, naim mak us dey fit luv ish oda.
If sombodi sey, "I luv God" and e hate en Kristen broda, e dey lai, bikos pesin wey nor luv en Kristen broda wey e dey si, haw e wont tak luv God wey e nor dey si?
God don komand us sey: "If enibodi luv mi, mak e luv en broda and sista for Kraist tu."
Enibodi wey biliv sey na Jisos bi Kraist, don bi God pikin and enibodi wey luv di Papa, luv di pikin wey E born.
Wi go no sey wi luv God shildren, wen wi luv God and obey en komandment.
To luv God, na to kip en komandment and en komandment nor dey hard.
Enibodi wey bi God pikin, don win di wold and na awa fate bi di pawa wey win di wold.
Pesin wey biliv sey Jisos Kraist na God Pikin, don win di wold.
Na Jisos Kraist kom dis wold wit wota and blood. Nor bi onli wit wota, bot na wit di wota and di blood. And God Spirit bear witnes sey dis na tru, bikos na God Spirit bi di trut.
Wi get tiri witnes to show sey wetin wi dey tok, na tru and dem bi:
God Spirit, di wota and di blood and dis tiri witnes dey tok di same tin.
If wi gri sey wetin humanbin tok na tru, den wetin God tok abaut en pikin, naim big pas.
(Di pesin wey biliv God Pikin, go no insaid ensef sey, dis tin na tru, bot pesin wey nor biliv God, dey sey God dey lai, bikos e nor biliv wetin God tok abaut en Pikin).
Dis na wetin God tok: God don giv us life wey nor dey end and dis life dey insaid en Pikin.
Enibodi wey get di Pikin, get di life wey nor go end, bot doz wey nor no God Pikin, go die.
I don rite all dis tins giv una wey biliv God Pikin, so dat una go no sey una get life wey nor go end.
Na dis tins dey mak awa maind strong enitaim wey wi kom mit God: bikos if wi ask am for enitin wey dey gud for en eye, E go giv us.
And if wi no sey E dey hear us, den wi biliv sey wi go get di tins wey wi ask from am.

If enibodi si en broda or sista for Kraist dey komit sin wey nor go kil-am, mak e ask God and God go giv life to dat pesin. E get di kaind sin wey dey kause deat and I nor sey mak una pray mak God forgiv di pesin wey dey komit dat sin.
Evritin wey nor gud for God eye, na sin, bot e get di sins wey nor dey kause deat.
Wi no sey enibodi wey bi God pikin, nor dey laik to sin, bot God dey kip en pikin, so dat devol nor go fit tosh am.
Wi no sey wi bi God shildren and dis wold wey wi dey so, na wiked pipol dey rule am.
Wi no sey God Pikin don kom and e don giv us sense to no di trut abaut God. And wi dey insaid en Pikin, Jisos Kraist. Na-im bi di ril God and na-im bi di life wey nor go end.
So my shildren, mak una mak sure sey una nor get enitin to du wit oda gods.
Mi wey bi elda dey rite dis leta to di wuman wey God shuz, wit en shildren wey I luv insaid di trut (nor bi onli mi, bot na evribodi wey no di trut).
Bikos di trut dey insaid us, e go stay insaid us foreva.
Mak God, awa Papa and Jisos Kraist, en pikin wey dey insaid trut and luv, giv us grace, mesi and peace.
I dey hapi wel-wel, wen I si sey som for yor shildren dey liv akordin to di trut, jos as di Papa komand us.
I dey rite to rimaind una sey, mak una luv won anoda. Dis nor bi new komandment, bot na di won wey dey from di biginin.
(Na wetin luv min bi dis: mak wi dey du wetin God wont.) Na di komandment bi dis and jos as wi hear am from di biginin; na so wi sopoz to folo am.
Bikos pipol wey dey disiv odas, don enta di wold; dem nor gri sey Jisos Kraist don kom dis wold as humanbin bifor. Dis kaind pipol dey disiv odas and na anti-kraist dem bi!
Mak una shine una eye, so dat di wok wey wi du among una, nor go loss, bot insted, wi go get komplit riwod.
Pesin wey nor dey folo wetin Kraist tish, bot dey faind oda yeye tishas, nor no God. Bot pesin wey dey obey dis tishin, get both di Papa and en Pikin.
If enibodi kom mit una and e nor asept wetin wi dey tish, mak una nor welkom or risiv am as una broda.
Bot pesin wey risiv am, go dey folo am du di wiked tins wey e dey du.
Ivun doh I get meni oda tins wey I won tel una, I nor won tak paper and biro rite dem, bot I hope sey I go kom visit una and I go tok to una face-to-face, so dat awa hapines go ful.
Una sista shildren wey God don shuz, dey grit una.
Mi wey bi elda dey rite dis leta to Gaius, my broda wey I luv wel-wel.
My frend, I dey pray sey mak evritin dey gud for yu and mak yor bodi wel, jos as yor soul wel tu.
I hapi wel-wel wen awa brodas kom tok abaut haw yu dey always liv for di trut.
Wetin mak mi hapi wel-wel na wen I hear sey my shildren dey liv akordin to di trut.
My frend, di tins wey yu dey du for awa brodas wey yu nor ivun no, gud wel-wel.
Dem don ivun tok abaut yor luv for insaid di shosh wer God pipol gada. E go gud sey wen dem kom yor side, mak yu help dem, so dat bele go swit God as dem dey kontinu dia joni.
Dem start dia joni bikos of "Kraist name" and dem nor gri tak enitin from pipol wey nor bi Kristen.
So wi sopoz to help doz pipol, so dat wi go bi dia co-woka wey go mak di trut stand.
I bin rite leta to di shosh pipol, bot Diotrephes, wey dey kari bodi up sey na-im bi dia lida, nor gri welkom us.

So, wen I kom, I go tel evribodi wetin e du; tins wey wi nor du and e sey wi du-am. Ivun doh e dey tok bad abaut us, dat won nor du for am; nor bi onli sey e nor dey welkom awa brodas, bot e dey mak odas nor welkom dem tu and e dey driv dem komot from di shosh.
My frend, mak yu nor folo bad tin, bot du wetin dey gud. Di pesin wey dey du gud, na God own and di pesin wey dey du wetin bad, neva no God.
Pipol don tok abaut Demetrius, bikos e dey du gud and ivun di trut wey e no, show sey e gud. Wi sef dey tok abaut haw e gud and yu no sey wetin wi dey tok, na tru.
I get meni tins wey I won tel yu, bot I nor won rite dem wit biro and paper.
I dey hope sey I go soon si yu and wi go tok face-to-face.
Mak peace dey wit yu. Awa frends for here dey salot yu tu. Mak yu grit all awa frends wey dey der.
Dis leta na from Jude, Jisos Kraist savant and James broda. To di pipol wey God don kol, wey Papa God luv don wrap laik klot for Jisos Kraist bodi.
Mak mesi, peace and luv dey wit una!

My frends, ivun doh e don dey hungri mi since to rite giv una abaut di salvashon wey wi dey share togeda, naw e strong wel-wel for my maind to rite, so dat una maind go dey strong. So una go fit stand fite for wetin wi biliv; di tins wey God don giv en pipol and nor-tin go fit shange am.

Som pipol don hide join una and God don mark dem for distroshon. So I won tel una abaut dis tins sey, dis pipol nor dey fear God. Dem don dey yuz God grace as eskuze to dey du bad-bad tins. Dis pipol nor gri asept Kraist as dia Masta and Oga.
So I won rimaind una ivun doh una don alredi no dis tins. Afta God don first save Izrel pipol from Egypt, e kon distroi doz wey nor biliv am.
And I stil dey rimaind una abaut di angels wey nor stay for wer God put dem, bot kon komot for wer dem sopoz dey. God don chain dem tie for daknes ontil wen E go joj di wold.

Mak una yuz Sodom and Gomora and di tawns wey dey near dem, as exampol. God ponish dem wit fire wey nor dey end, bikos both men and wimen dey slip wit ish oda enihaw, dem ivun dey slip wit animas and dem dey du oda wiked tins wey dey dia maind.
Laik dis tu, dis men wey sey dem dey dream, dey liv bad life, dem nor dey obey God autoriti and dem ivun dey kos angels wey get glori.
Bot wen Michael, di big angel dey kworel wit devol bikos of Mosis bodi, e nor kos am, bot insted, e sey, "Na God go joj yu!"
Bot dis pipol nor undastand wetin dem dey tok and dis na wetin dem sopoz to undastand witout sey pesin tish dem. As animas nor dey tink bifor dem du tins, na so dis pipol dey bihav.
Kos dey dia head! Bikos dem dey bihav laik Kain and bikos of long-trot, dem dey du di mistak wey Balaam du. So dem go must die laik Kora, wey disobey God.

Wen dis pipol dey folo una chop di feloship fud wey God don bless, dem bi laik shuku-shuku for una bodi. Dem bi laik shepad wey nor dey shame, wey kare for onli ensef. Dem bi laik kloud wey jos dey blow, bot rain nor dey fal. Dem bi laik tri wey nor get fruts and God don root dem komot from groun.
Dem bi laik wave for sea wey dey foam kom out. Dem bi laik star wey nor dey stay won place and God don kip di place wey deep pas for daknes, dey wait dem.
Enok wey bi di numba sevun pesin afta Adam, profesai abaut dis pipol. E sey, "Listin! Di Oga dey kom wit en holi pipol wey nobodi fit kount and
e dey kom joj evribodi, so dat pipol go no di bad tins wey dem dey du and di wiked wods wey sinas don tok against God.
Dis pipol dey komplain waka and dey faind fault. Dem dey go eni wer wey dia bodi kari dem go and dem dey boast. Dem dey tok wetin pipol laik to hear, so dat odas go praiz dem.
Bot my frends wey I luv, mak una rimemba wetin awa Oga Jisos apostols tel una.
Dem sey, "For di taim wen dis wold won end, som pipol go dey laff una and di tins wey God hate wey dey hungri dem to du, naim go dey push dem."
Dis kaind pipol dey divide God pipol; dem laik dis wold tins and dem nor get God Spirit.
My frends, mak una dey build unasef up wit fate wey holi wel-wel and dey pray wit di Holi Spirit.
Mak una kip unasef insaid God luv as una dey wait for awa Oga Jisos Kraist, wey go bring life wey nor go end.
And mak wi help doz wey dia fate dey shake.
Mak una help odas mak dem nor enta hell fire, so dat una go fit save dem and as una dey help odas, mak una dey fear God kon hate di tins wey go mak una sin.
Naw, mak all glori bi God own, bikos E nor let una fal and E go bring una kom en present wit beta joy and witout fault.
Mak all glori, majesti, pawa and autoriti, bi God own, naw and foreva tru Kraist wey bi awa Oga. Amen!
Dis vishon na from Kraist and na God sey mak e show en savants wetin go soon hapun. E mak am klear tru di angel wey E send kom mit Jon
and Jon bear witnes for evritin wey e si. Dis na wetin Jon tok konsanin God wod and abaut Jisos Kraist.
Di pesin wey go read dis profesi giv pipol, God go bless am. God go bless doz wey dey listin and du wetin dem rite for di profesi, bikos di taim don near.

Na Jon rite dis leta go giv di sevun shosh dem wey dey Asia aria. Mak grace and peace dey wit una from di Pesin wey dey since, wey dey naw and wey go stil kom. From di sevun spirits wey dey en throne front
and from Jisos Kraist, di witnes wey dey tok trut; di firstborn among doz wey God raiz from deat and naim bi di King of all kings. Kraist wey luv and fri us from awa sins wit en own blood;
di won wey giv us beta kindom kon mak us prist wey go dey serv God, en Papa, mak glori and pawa bi en own foreva and eva! Amen.
(Mak una luk! E dey kom bak insaid di kloud and evri eye go si-am. Ivun doz wey shuk am and all di tribes wey dey dis eart, go krai bikos of am. Dis tins go rili hapun! Amen.)
God sey, "Na mi bi di Alfa and Omega, di Won wey dey since, wey dey naw and wey go stil kom, na mi bi di Almighti God!

Mi, Jon, I bi una broda and I dey folo una share from di trobol bikos of di kindom and dey bear di sofa wey dey insaid Jisos. Dem porshu mi go Patmos Island, bikos I dey prish God wod and tok abaut Jisos Kraist.
On Sunday, God Spirit kon dey kontrol mi and from my bak, I kon hear won loud vois laik trumpet dey sey,
"Mak yu rite evritin wey yu dey si insaid dis book, den send dem go mit di pipol wey dey di sevun shosh dem wey dey for Efisos, Smirna, Pergamum, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia and Laodisia."
Wen I turn mak I si di pesin wey dey tok to mi, I kon si sevun lampstands wey dem tak gold mak.
And di pesin wey stand for di lampstand senta, bi laik Man Pikin. E wear long dress wit gold belt for en waist.
En head and hair white laik wool, dem ivun white rish snow and en eyes red laik fire wey dey burn wel-wel.
En legs bi laik bronze wey dem polish for fire and en vois bi laik di nois wey sea dey mak.
E hol sevun stars for en rite hand and sword wey get tu sharp side, dey kom out from en mout. En face dey shine laik sun.
Wen I si-am, I fal near en leg laik sey I don die. Bot E tosh mi wit en rite hand, kon sey: "Nor fear! Na mi bi di First and di Last,
di Won wey dey alaif! I die bifor, bot naw, I dey alaif foreva and eva. Deat and grave key dey my hand.
"So mak yu rite wetin yu si: both doz wey go hapun naw and di wons wey go hapun leta.
"Di sevun stars wey yu si for my rite hand, na dia sikrit bi dis: Di stars na di angels for di sevun shosh dem and di sevun lampstands, na di sevun shosh."

"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Efisos: 'Di Pesin wey hol di sevun stars for en rite hand and dey waka roun di sevun lampstands, dey tel di pipol for di shosh sey:

'I no yor wok. I don si evritin wey yu du and ivun as yu dey wait wit patient. I no sey yu nor laik wiked pipol. Yu don test pipol wey sey dem bi apostols, bot dem nor bi, bikos yu si sey, dem dey lai.
'I stil no sey yu don bear meni tins bikos of my name and stil, yu neva taya.
'Bot dis na wetin I get against yu: di way yu luv mi naw, nor strong rish as e bi bifor!
'So, mak yu rimemba wer yu from fal and turn from sin kom mit God, den bigin du di tins wey yu first dey du. If yu nor gri turn from sin kom mit God, I go rimov yor lampstand from wer e dey.
'Bot all dis tins dey hapun mak e for beta for yu, bikos yu hate di tins wey Nikolaitan pipol dey du and I hate doz tins tu.
'Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh. Enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, I go alow am chop from di tri for God Paradise and dis tri dey giv life.'"
"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Smirna: 'Dis mesage na from di Pesin wey bi di First and di Last, di Won wey die kon kom bak to life.
'I no di sofa wey yu sofa and haw yu nor get moni, bot yu get enof moni. I stil no di bad tins wey dem tok abaut yu. Dem sey dem bi Ju pipol, bot dem nor bi Ju, bikos dia sinagog, na Satan own.

'Mak yu nor fear di tins wey yu go soon sofa. Devol go trow som of una insaid prizin, so dat e go test una. Yu go sofa for ten days. Bot mak yu nor liv mi, ivun if e min sey yu go die. Bikos I go giv yu di krawn wey bi life.
'Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh. Enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, di sekon deat nor go kil-am.'"
"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Pergamum: 'Dis na di mesage from di Pesin wey hol di sword wey get tu sharp side.
'I no sey yu dey stay for wer Satan throne dey. Bot yu stil hol my name strong wel-wel and yu nor denai mi ivun wen dem kil my savant Antipas, for wer Satan dey stay.

'Bot dis na wetin I get against yu: Yu get som pipol wey dey folo wetin Balaam dey tish and na Balaam tel Balak sey mak e kause wahala for Izrel pipol. Na-im mak dem sin wen e sey mak dem chop juju fud kon slip wit hu nor bi dia husban or wife.
'Laik dis tu, som pipol among una dey folo wetin Nikolaitan pipol dey tish.
'So, mak yu turn from sin kom mit God! If not, I go kwik-kwik kom fite yu wit di sword wey dey my mout.

'Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh. Enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, I go gi-am som manna wey dem hide for hevun. I go giv am white stone and for dat stone, dem go rite new name put and nobodi go fit undastand am, esept di pesin wey I giv di stone."'

"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Tiatira: 'Dis mesage na from God Pikin wey en eye red laik fire wey dey burn wel-wel and en legs bi laik bronze wey dem polish:
'I no all di tins wey yu dey du. I don si yor luv, yor fate, yor wok and as yu dey wait wit patient. And I si as yu dey du wel for all dis tins.

'Bot dis na wetin I get against yu: Yu alow dat wuman, Jezebel, mak e dey du wetin e laik. Dat wuman wey kol ensef profet and di tins wey e dey tish dey mak my savants sin, bikos dem dey slip wit hu nor bi dia husban or wife and dem dey chop juju fud.
'I don giv am taim mak e turn from sin kom mit God, bot e nor gri stop to slip wit doz wey nor bi en husban.
'Si! I go trow am put for bed wer e go sofa and doz wey dey sin wit am, go sofa wel-wel, unles dem turn from sin kom mit God.
'I go kil all en shildren, den all di shosh pipol go no sey I no wetin dey for pipol maind and heart. I go riwod evribodi akordin to wetin e du.
'Bot una wey dey Tiatira, wey nor dey folo wetin Jezebel dey tish (wey neva learn di tins wey dem dey kol "Satan deep sikrit"), I dey tel una dis tins naw, bot I nor go ask una for enitin again.
'Mak una hol wetin una get ontil I kom.
'Enibodi wey fit bear and obey mi rish di end, I go giv am autoriti ova all di nashons.
'E go rule di nashons wit iron kon break dem to pisis laik pot.
'E go get di same autoriti wey I get from my papa and I go stil gi-am di star wey dey shine for mornin.
Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh.

"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Sardis: 'Di Pesin wey hol God sevun spirits and di sevun stars: I no wetin yu dey du; for pipol eye, yu dey alaif, bot tru-tru, yu don die.
'So mak yu raiz-up kon giv pawa to di rimainin tins wey don nearli die, bikos yor wok nor dey gud for God eye.
'Mak yu rimemba wetin yu don hear and risiv and mak yu obey dem kon turn from sin kom mit God. If yu nor shine yor eye wel, I go kom laik tif and yu nor go no di taim wen I go kom.
'Bot yu get som pipol for Sardis wey neva stain dia klot, dem go wear white klot folo mi waka, bikos dem deserve am.
'Enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, go wear white klot laik dem and I nor go rimov en name from my Life Book, bot I go tok abaut am for my Papa and en angels front.
'Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh.'"

"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Filadelfia: 'Di Pesin wey dey holi and tru, wey hol David key; wen dis pesin opun door, nobodi go fit klose am and wen e klose door, nobodi go fit opun am.
'I no evritin wey yu dey du. (Si, I don opun door for yu wey nobodi go fit klose.) I no sey yu nor tu get pawa, bot yu don obey my wod and yu nor denai mi at-all.
'Listin! Doz pipol from Satan sinagog wey lai sey dem bi Ju, I go mak dem bow for yor front, den dem go no sey I rili luv yu.
'Bikos yu don obey my komandment wey bi to get patient, I go protet yu wen I won test evribodi for dis wold.
'I go soon kom. Mak yu hol wetin yu get wel-wel, so dat nobodi go tak yor krawn from yu .

'Enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, I go mak am pillar for my Papa Tempol and e nor go eva komot from der. I go rite my Papa name; David tawn; di new Jerusalem wey dey kom from hevun and my own new name, put for en bodi.
'Enibodi wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh.'"
"Mak yu rite di tins wey I won tel yu naw, go giv di angel for di shosh wey dey Laodisia: 'Dis mesage na from di Pesin wey bi di Amen; di witnes wey dey obey God komandment since E kreate di wold.
'I no evritin wey yu du. Yu nor dey hot or kold. I wish sey yu hot or kold!
'Bot since yu jos dey warm and yu nor hot or kold, I go vomit yu komot from my mout!
'Bikos yu dey sey, "I get plenti moni and I nor nid enitin!" Bot yu nor no sey yor kondishon bad wel-wel, yu dey sofa; yu poor, blind and naked.

'So I advise yu sey mak yu buy gold; gold wey dem don polish wit fire. Den yu go get plenti moni. Mak yu stil buy white klot from mi kon wear am, so dat dem nor go si yor nakednes again, den buy medicine put for yor eye, so dat yu go fit si.
'I dey koret and ponish enibodi wey I luv. So mak yu dey serious kon turn from sin kom mit God!
'Listin! I stand for di door dey nok! If enibodi hear my vois, kon opun di door, I go enta go mit am, kon folo am chop and e go chop wit mi tu.
'Bikos I bear rish di end kon folo my Papa sidan for en throne, enibodi wey fit bear rish di end, go folo mi sidan for my throne tu.
'Pesin wey get ear, mak e hear wetin di Spirit dey tel di pipol for di shosh.'"

Afta all dis tins, I luk up kon si won door wey opun for hevun! Den di vois wey I first hear kon tok to mi laik loud trumpet dey sey: "Mak yu kom up, so dat I go show yu wetin go hapun afta dis tins."
So for di vishon, I si won throne for hevun wey pesin sidan put!
Di pesin wey sidan for di throne bi laik jasper and carnelian stone. Rainbow dey roun di throne and e bi laik sey dem mak am wit emerald stone.
Twenti-for oda thrones dey roun di first throne and twenti-for eldas sidan put for di thrones. Dem wear white klot and gold krawn dey dia head.
Lite dey shine kom out from di throne and thunda dey mak nois from am tu. For di throne front, sevun tosh wey get fire dey burn for der. Dis na God sevun spirit.
Di throne front dey shine laik mirror and e bi laik kristal. For senta and aroun di throne, for kreatures wey get eye ful bodi, dey for der tu.
Di first won bi laik lion, di sekon won bi laik melu, di ted won get humanbin face and di fort won bi laik eagle.

Ish for di for kreatures get sis feda and eye ful di fedas. Dem nor dey eva res for nite or day and dem dey always sey: “Holi! Holi! Holi! Na-im bi di God wey dey mighti. Di Pesin wey dey since, wey dey naw and wey go soon kom.”
Weneva di for kreatures dey tank, praiz and onor di Pesin wey sidan for di throne wey dey alaif foreva and eva,
di twenti-for eldas go bow woship di Pesin wey dey liv foreva and eva. Dem go rimov dia krawn put for en throne front kon sey,
"Awa Oga and God! Yu dey wordi to risiv glori, onor and pawa, bikos na yu kreate evritin as yu wont."
Den I si sey di Pesin wey sidan for di throne, hol won book for en rite hand. Dem rite somtin put for di front and bak kon lock-am wit sevun keys.
Den I si won strong angel dey shaut wit loud vois sey: "Na hu dey holi rish to break di keys and opun dis book?"
Bot nobodi for hevun, eart or unda eart fit opun di book or luk insaid.
So I start to krai, bikos nobodi dey holi rish to opun di book or luk insaid.
Den won of di eldas kon tel mi, "Mak yu nor krai again! Luk, di lion for Juda tribe, wey kom from David famili, don win. So e go opun di book and break di sevun keys.

Den I si won Lamb wey bi laik sey dem don kil-am, bot e stand for di throne senta wit di for kreatures and di twenti-for eldas. E get sevun horns and sevun eyes wey bi God sevun spirit, wey E send enta di eart.
Den e waka go kolet di book from di Pesin wey sidan for di throne.
And wen e tak di book, di for kreatures and di twenti-for eldas fal for di Lamb front. Ish of dem hol harp and basin wey insent ful. Dis insent na God pipol prayas.
Dem kon dey sing new song sey: “Yu holi rish to tak di book kon opun di keys, bikos dem kil yu and na yor blood save all God pipol from evri tribe, language, grup and kontri.
Yu don shuz dem as kings and prists wey go serv God and dem go rule for di eart.’’
As I dey luk, I kon hear meni tazon angels vois as dem stand roun di throne, di for kreatures and di eldas.
All of dem kon dey sing wit loud vois sey: Di Lamb wey dem kil, mak glori, pawa, propati, wisdom and onor, bi en own!

Den I hear evritin wey God kreate for hevun, eart, unda eart, sea and evritin wey dey insaid dem dey sing sey: "Mak praiz, onor, glori and pawa to rule, bi di Pesin wey sidan for di throne and di Lamb own, foreva and eva!"
And di for kreatures kon sey, "Amen!" Den di eldas fal face groun kon start to woship God.
As I dey luk, di Lamb kon opun won for di sevun keys and I hear won for di for kreatures dey shaut laik thunda sey, "Mak yu kom!"
So I luk kon si won white horse dey kom! Di pesin wey dey ride am hol bow and e wear krawn for en head. E go fite and win meni war and na champion e bi.
Wen di Lamb opun di sekon key, I kon hear di sekon kreature dey sey, "Mak yu kom!"
Den anoda red horse kom out. Dem giv di pesin wey dey ride am, big sword and pawa to tak rimov peace from dis eart. So pipol kon dey fite and kil ish oda for evriwer.
Den wen di Lamb opun di ted won, I hear di ted kreature dey sey, "Mak yu kom!" So I luk and I si won blak horse dey kom! Di pesin wey dey ride am hol rula for en hand.
Den I hear won vois among di for kreatures dey sey, "Dem dey sel sis pound for barley and won bread for onli won penni and mak yu nor spoil di olive oil and wine."
Wen di Lamb opun di fort key, I hear di fort kreature dey sey, "Mak yu kom!"

So I luk kon si won horse wey en color bi laik grin wey don dey fade! Di pesin wey dey ride am, na Deat dem dey kol am and en frend na di Grave. Wen dem divide di eart into for, dem giv di tu of dem pawa ova won part, so dat dem go kil pipol wit dia sword, wit honga, diziz and wit wiked animas.
Wen di Lamb opun di fift key, pipol wey dem don kil bikos of God wod and wetin dem dey tok abaut Kraist, I si dia soul for unda di alta.
Dem dey krai wit loud vois sey, "Oga wey get pawa, haw long e go tak bifor yu go joj doz wey dey liv for dis eart? Mak yu ponish dem, bikos na dem kil us!"
Den dem giv ish of dem long white klot kon sey, mak una res smol ontil di oda savants and una brodas for Kraist wey wiked pipol go kil, don komplit.
Den di Lamb opun di sist key and big eartquake kon hapun. Di sun kon dak laik blak klot and di moon kon dey red laik blood.
Di stars for skai fal kom groun laik di way fig tri frut wey ripe, dey fal wen strong briz dey blow.
Di skai kon dey fold laik paper and evri mountin and island move komot from wer dem dey bifor.
Den evribodi, bot di kings for di eart, di rulas, offisas, doz wey get moni, doz wey get pawa and evri slave and fri pesin kon hide demsef for holes and among di mountins.
Dem kon dey krai giv di mountin and di rock sey, "Mak yu fal on-top us and hide us from di Pesin wey sidan for di throne and mak yu hide us from di Lamb vesnashon."
Bikos di day to ponish dem, don kom and nobodi go sovaiv am.
Den, I si for angels stand for di for kona for di eart and dem hol di for briz, so dat e nor go blow for di eart, di sea or for eni tri.
Den I si anoda angel dey kom dan from di east. E kari God key, den e kon shaut giv doz for angels wey dem don giv pawa to ponish land and sea sey,
"Mak una wait! Mak una nor ponish di land, sea or di tris, ontil wi don put God mark for en savants forehead."
Den I hear di numba wey dem put God mark for dia forehead. Dem bi 144,000 from all di tribes for Izrel:
Dem mark 12,000 from Juda tribe, 12,000 from Ruben tribe, 12,000 from Gad tribe.
And from Asher tribe, na 12,000 dem mark, 12,000 from Naftali tribe, 12,000 from Manasseh tribe,
12,000 from Simeon tribe, 12,000 from Levi tribe, 12,000 from Isakar tribe,
12,000 from Zebulun tribe, 12,000 from Josef tribe and 12,000 from Benjamin tribe.

Afta all dis tins, I luk up kon si crowd wey nobodi fit kount. Dem kom from difren tribe, kontri, grup, language and dem stand for di throne and di Lamb front. Dem wear white klot kon hol palm tri bransh for hand
dey shaut sey, "Awa God wey sidan for di throne and di Lamb, na yu get pawa to save pipol!"
And all di angel stand roun di throne, di eldas and di for kreatures. Dem fal face groun kon bigin woship God.
Dem kon dey sey, "Mak praiz, glori, wisdom, tanks, onor, autoriti and pawa bi awa God own foreva and eva. Amen!"
Den won for di eldas kon ask mi sey, "Dis pipol wey wear long white klot so, wer dem from kom?"
I kon ansa, "My oga, na yu no di ansa." Den e sey, "Dis pipol die bikos of Kraist. Dem don yuz di Lamb blood tak wosh dia klot, naim mak am white laik dat!
"Dis na why dem stand for God throne front kon dey serv am for en Tempol, both for nite and day taim.
"Hungri nor go eva kash dem again. Dem go always get wota to drink; sun nor go eva beat dem again.
"Bikos di Lamb for di throne, go bi dia Shepad. E go tak dem go drink from di riva wey dey giv life. And evri tears wey dey dia eyes, God go klin am komot."
Wen di Lamb opun di sevunt key, evriwer for hevun kon kwayet for laik tati minutes.
Den I si sevun angels wey stand for God front and E giv dem sevun trumpets.
Den anoda angel hol gold pan for hand kon stand near di alta. And God sey mak e mix meni insent join God pipol prayas and e go bi ofrin bifor di gold alta.
Di smoke from di insent, plus God pipol prayas kon dey go up go mit God from di angel hand.
Di angel tak di basin wey dem dey burn insent put kon pack fire ful am from di alta, den e trow am kom di eart and thunda wit strong lite and heavi eartquake kon hapun.
Di sevun angels wey hol di sevun trumpets dey redi to blow dem.

Di first angel blow en own and dem kon trow stone wit fire wey mix wit blood kom di eart. So if dem divide di eart into tiri, won part burn finish. And if dem divide di tris wey dey di eart into tiri, won part wit all di grin grass, burn finish tu.
Den di sekon angel blow en trumpet and dem trow mountins wey fire dey, enta di sea. If dem divide di sea into tiri, won part kon turn to blood.
And wen dem divide evritin wey get life for di sea into tiri, won part die finish. Den wen dem divide all di ships for di wold into tiri, won part burn finish tu.
Den di ted angel blow en trumpet and won big star from di skai fal kom from hevun laik tosh wey dey bring fire. Wen dem divide evritin for di riva into tiri, e fal for won part.
Di star name na "Bitanes." So if dem divide di wota into tiri, won part bita and di wota kon kil pipol wey drink from am.

Den di fort angel blow en trumpet and wen dem divide di sun, moon and stars into tiri, dem fal for won part and di part kon dak. So if dem divide day and nite into tiri, won part for di day nor get sun again and won part for di nite, moon and star nor kon dey shine again.

Den I luk and I hear won eagle dey shaut as e dey flai for skai, "E go bad wel-wel! E go bad wel-wel! E go bad wel-wel for pipol wey dey dis eart, bikos of wetin go hapun wen di last tiri angels go blow dia trumpets."
Den di fift angel blow en trumpet and I si won star wey fal from hevun kom eart and dem giv am di key wey e go yuz tak opun di pit.
Wen e opun am, smoke kom out laik fire kon turn di sun and briz to daknes.
From insaid di smoke, grasshoppas bigin enta di eart and dem giv dem pawa laik skorpion own.
Di angel tel dem, "Mak una nor distroi di grass, plants and tris, bot distroi onli di pipol wey God mark nor dey dia forehead."
E stil tel dem, "Nor kil di pipol wey get God mark for dia forehead, bot mak una sofa dem for faiv monts wit pain wey bi laik skorpion own.
For dat taim, pipol go luk for deat, bot dem nor go si-am. Dem go won die, bot deat go run from dem.
Di grasshoppas bi laik horse wey dey redi for war. Wetin dey dia head, bi laik gold krawn and dia face bi laik humanbin own.
Dia hair bi laik wimen hair and dia tit bi laik lion own.
Wetin dem wear bi laik bulletproof wey dem mak wit iron and dia feda dey mak nois laik horse wey dey go fite.
Dia tail dey bite laik skorpion own and di angel giv dem pawa to sofa pipol for faiv monts.
Na dia king bi di angel wey kom from di pit and en name for Hebrew, na Abaddon and for Greek, na Apollion (pesin wey dey distroi).
Di first wahala don pas, bot tu oda won stil dey kom.
Den di sist angel blow en trumpet and I hear won vois dey tok from di for horns wey dey di gold alta for God front.
Di vois kon tel di angels wey hol di trumpets sey, "Mak yu riliz di for angels wey dem tie for Riva Euphrates!"
If dem divide di pipol for dis eart into tiri, dem riliz di angels wey dem don priper for dis hour, day, mont and year, sey mak dem go kil won part finish.
I hear as dia sojas meni rish and dem meni rish tu ondred tazon.

For my vishon, I stil si meni horse and doz wey dey ride dem: And di bullet proof wey dis pipol wear, red laik fire kon get dak blue and yellow color. Di horse dem head bi laik lion own and fire, smoke and sulphur, dey kom out from dia mout.
If dem divide di pipol for dis eart into tiri, di diziz wey bi laik fire, smoke and sulphur wey dey kom out from dia mout, kil won part finish.
Di horse dem pawa dey for dia mout and tail. Dia tail mout bi laik snake own and dem get pawa to wound and kil pipol.

Bot di pipol wey dis tins nor kil, nor stil gri turn kom mit God wey go save dem. Dem kontinu to serv dimon and juju wey dem mak wit gold, silva, bronze, stone and wud. Dis juju nor dey si, hear or waka.
And insted of dem to turn kom mit God, dem stil dey kil pipol; du majik; dey slip wit hu nor bi dia husban or wife and stil dey tif.
Den I si anoda angel wey get pawa dey kom dan from hevun insaid kloud and rainbow dey on-top en head. En face dey shine laik sun and en leg bi laik big fire.
E hol won smol book wey opun for en hand and e stand wit en rite leg on-top sea kon put en left leg for land.
Den e shaut wit loud vois laik lion own and sevun thundas ansa am.
I dey redi to rite wen di sevun thundas dey tok, bot I hear won vois from hevun dey sey, "Enitin wey di sevun thundas tok, mak yu kip am as sikrit and nor rite dem at-all."
Den di angel wey stand for di sea and land, raiz en rite hand go hevun.
E swear wit di Pesin name wey go dey foreva and eva. Na dis Pesin kreate di hevun, di eart, di sea and evritin wey dey insaid dem, den di angel kon sey, "Taim go soon rish!"
Wen di sevunt angel go blow en trumpet, God sikrit plan wey nobodi undastand, go kom out. E go hapun jos as E tel di profets, wey bi en savants.
Den di vois from hevun tel mi again, "Di angel wey stand for wota and land, mak yu go tak di book wey dey en hand."
So I go mit di angel sey mak e giv mi di book, bot e sey, "Tak am mak yu chop am." E stil sey, "As yu dey chop am, e go swit laik honey for yor mout, bot wen yu swalow am, e go mak yor bele bita."
So, I tak di book from di angel hand kon chop am. Tru-tru wen I dey chop am, e swit laik honey for my mout, bot wen I swalow am, e kon bita for my bele.
Den di angel tel mi, "Yu go stil profesai abaut meni pipol, kontri, language and kings."
Den, dem giv mi won rula wey bi laik wokin stik kon tel mi sey, "Get up mak yu measure God Tempol, di alta and di pipol wey dey woship for der.
Bot nor measure di tempol varanda, bikos God don giv am to Gentai pipol and dem go mash am for forti-tu monts.
I go giv my tu witnes autoriti to profesai for 1,260 days and na sack klot dem go wear. ’’
Na dem bi di tu olive tri and di tu lampstand wey stand bifor di Oga wey get di eart.
If enibodi dey plan bad for dem, fire go kom out from dia mout kon burn dia enimi finish. And if eni man dey plan bad for dem, na so tu E go tak die.
Dis tu men get di pawa to klose di skai, so dat rain nor go fal as dem dey profesai. Dem stil get di pawa to turn wota to blood and to kause bad tins to hapun for di eart.
And wen dem don tok finish, di beast wey kom out from di pit go folo dem fite kon win and kil dem.
Dia dead bodi go dey for di main strit for Jerusalem wey pipol dey kol "Sodom" and "Egypt" and dis na di tawn wer dem for nail Kraist for kros.
And for tiri and haf days, all di pipol, tribes, language and nashons go dey luk dia dead bodi. Dem nor go alow enibodi bere dem.
Sinas go dey hapi bikos of dem and dem go dey giv gift to ish-oda to celebrate di tu profet deat, bikos di profets trobol dem wel-wel.
Afta di tiri and haf days, God go breat life enta dia bodi and dem go wak-up! Fear go kash all doz wey dey luk dem.
Den won loud vois from hevun go tel di tu profet, "Mak una kom up!" And dem go-go hevun insaid kloud as dia enemis go dey luk dem.

For dat same taim, beta eartquake go hapun and if dem divide di tawn into ten, won part go distroi finish. Sevun tazon pipol go die for di eartquake and evri oda pesin go fear kon bigin tank God wey dey hevun.
Di sekon deat don pas, bot si, di ted won go soon kom.
Di sevunt angel blow en trumpet and won loud vois kon shaut from hevun: "All di kindom for di wold don bi God and Kraist own. E go rule foreva and eva."
Di twenti-for eldas wey sidan for di throne bifor God, go fal face groun kon woship God.
And dem go sey, "Awa Oga God wey dey mighti, wi dey tank yu. Di won wey dey since and wey go always dey, bikos naw, yu don show yor pawa kon start to rule.

"Di nashons dey ves, bot di taim wey yu go ponish dem, don rish. And na naw yu go joj doz wey don die kon riwod yor savants, di profets, doz wey dey gud and evribodi wey dey fear yor name, both smol and big. Dis na di taim to distroi doz wey dey kause wahala for di eart."
Den for hevun, God Tempol kon opun and en kovenant ark dey insaid di tempol. Thunda kon dey mak nois and spark, den strong eartquake hapun and big-big ice-blok kon dey fal.
Den won big sign kon apier for hevun: I si won wuman wey tak sun tie en bodi laik klot, di moon dey unda en leg and won krawn wit twef stars, dey for en head.
Di wuman get bele and e dey krai wel-wel, bikos e won born naw.
Den I si anoda sign for hevun: I si won big red dragon wit sevun heads and ten horns and sevun krawns, dey di heads.
If dem divide di skai into tiri, di dragon tail swip won part komot kon trow dem kom di eart. E stand for di wuman front as e won born and e dey wait to kil di pikin wey di wuman won born.
Di wuman born boy wey go rule di wold wit strong hand. Bot dem tak di pikin kon go giv am to God for en throne.
So di wuman run enta di widanes, di place wer God don priper to kare for am for 1,260 days.
Den big fite kon hapun for hevun. Michael and en angels kon fite againts di dragon and en angels.
Michael and en angels win di fite, so dem kon porshu di dargon and en angels komot from hevun by fos.
Dis dragon na di old snake wey bi di devol or Satan, wey dey disiv di wold. Dem trow am kom dan from hevun wit en angels.

Den I hear won loud vois for hevun dey sey, "Salvashon, pawa, autoriti wey Kraist get and God kindom, don kom at last. Bikos di pesin wey dey akuiz awa brodas and sistas evriday, God don trow am kom dan.
"God pipol don win Satan wit di Lamb blood and wit di wod wey dem tok abaut Kraist. Dem nor tu kare for dia laifs, so dem ivun dey redi to die.
"So, hevuns mak yu hapi! Bot wahala go hapun for di eart and sea, bikos di devol don kom mit una wit strong vesnashon and en taim tu short."
Wen di dragon no sey dem don trow am go di eart, e porshu di wuman wey born di boy.
Bot dem giv di wuman tu feda laik eagle own, so dat e go flai go di place wer dem priper for am for widanes. For der, dem go kare for am kon protet am from di dragon for tiri and haf years.
Den di dragon trai to kil di wuman wit plenti wota wey e spit kom out from en mout.
Bot di eart help di wuman bikos e swalow di wota wey kom out from di dragon mout.
Di dragon dey ves for di wuman, so e kon diside to fite all di shildren wey di wuman born, dat is, evribodi wey kip God komandment and biliv Jisos Kraist.
Den di dragon stand near di sea.
Den I si won beast dey kom out from di sea. E get ten horns, sevun head and ten krawns dey en horns. For en head, name wey dey kos God, naim dem rite put.
Di beast wey I si, bi laik leopard, bot en leg bi laik bear leg and en mout bi laik lion own. Di dragon kon gi-am pawa, en throne and strong autoriti to rule.
Won for di beast head bi laik wetin dem wound wel-wel, bot di wound don go. Di hol wold dey sopraiz kon dey folo di beast.
Dem dey woship di dragon, bikos na-im giv di beast pawa to tak rule. Dem dey woship di beast sey, "Hu bi laik di beast? Na hu fit folo am fite?"
Dem giv di beast mout wey dey tok bad-bad wods. Di beast dey kos God and e rule for forti-tu monts.
So di beast opun en mout dey kos God, en name, wer E dey stay and doz wey dey hevun.
Satan gi-am pawa to fite wit God pipol and to win dem. E stil gi-am autoriti to rule evri tribe, grup, language and kontris.
Evritin for dis eart go woship am, ivun doz wey dia name nor dey for God Lamb book wey dey giv life.
If enibodi get ear, mak e hear!
Enibodi wey dem sopoz to kash, dem go kash am. Enibodi wey sword go kil, dem go kil-am wit sword. So, God pipol must bear wel-wel and get fate.
Den I si anoda beast dey kom out from groun. E get tu horns laik smol ship own, bot e dey tok laik dragon.
E kolet all di pawa wey dey mak di eart and evribodi woship di first beast (wey en big wound don go).
E dey du big mirakols and e ivun dey send fire kom dan from hevun for di pipol front.
E disiv di pipol for dis eart wit di mirakols wey e dey du for di beast front and e tel di pipol sey, mak dem mak won image for di beast (wey wound bifor, bot stil dey alaif).
Di sekon beast stil get pawa to giv life to di first beast image, so dat e go fit tok and kil doz wey nor gri woship di first beast image.
E stil sey, mak evribodi, weda smol or big, rish or poor, fri pesin or slave, kolet di beast mark for dia rite hand or forehead
and mak nobodi buy or sel enitin, unles e get di beast mark, numba or name for en bodi.
Dis won nid wisdom; mak di pesin wey fit undastand kount di beast numba: bikos na humanbin numba e bi and di numba na sis ondred and sisti sis (666).
Den I si di Lamb stand on-top Mount Zion wit 144,000 pipol. Dem rite en name wit en Papa name for dia forehead.
And I hear won loud vois from hevun laik wave for sea or thunda for skai. I hear anoda sound laik harp wey dem dey play.
Dem kon dey sing new song for di throne, di for kreatures and di eldas front. Nobodi fit learn di song, esept di 144,000 pipol wey God save from eart.
Dis wons nor spoil demsef wit wimen, bikos dem bi virgin. Na dem dey folo di Lamb wen e dey go eniwer. God save dem as humanbin, so dat dem go bi di first frut wey en and di Lamb plok.
Lai-lai nor dey dia mout and dem nor get eni fault.
Den I si anoda angel dey flai for skai and e kari di Gud News wey go dey foreva dey kom prish giv di pipol for dis eart, kontris, tribes, language and grups.
Di angel kon shaut: "Mak una dey fear and giv God glori, bikos di taim wey E go joj di wold, don rish. And mak una woship di Pesin wey mak hevun, eart, sea and wer wota from dey flow!"
Anoda angel folo di first won kon sey: "E don fal! Babylon don fal! Babylon wey mak all di kontris drink di wine wey mak dem dey slip wit hu dem nor mari."
Di ted angel kon folo di first tu, dey shaut: "If enibodi woship di beast and en image kon kolet di mark for en forehead or hand,
e go drink from God vesnashon wey dey insaid en ponishment cup. God go ponish am wit fire and sulphur for en holi angels and Lamb front.
"Di smoke from dis sofa go dey go up foreva and eva. Doz wey dey woship di beast, en image and doz wey kolet di mark, nor go res for day or nite."
Dis min sey, God pipol go bear wel-wel, bikos dem dey obey en komandment and get fate for Kraist.

Den I hear won vois from hevun dey sey, "Mak yu rite dis tins; God don bless pipol wey biliv and obey Kraist bifor dem die!" Di Spirit sey, "Blessin go rili folo dis pipol and dem go res from dia hard wok, bikos of di gud wey dem du."
Den I luk kon si won white kloud and di pesin wey sidan on-top, bi laik Man Pikin! E wear gold krawn for head kon hol sharp knife for hand.
Den anoda angel kom out from di tempol kon tel di won wey sidan on-top di kloud, "Mak yu start to havest wit yor knife, bikos na di koret taim bi dis and di fruts for eart don ripe!"
So di pesin wey sidan on-top di kloud, tak en knife klear di eart kon havest evritin wey dey insaid.
Den anoda angel kom out from di tempol for hevun wit sharp knife for en hand.

Anoda angel stil kom out from di alta and e get pawa to kontrol di fire. Di angel kol di won wey hol di sharp knife kon tel am, "Mak yu yuz yor sharp knife gada di grapes for di vine for eart, bikos dem don ripe rish to plok."
So di angel klear di eart wit en knife, gada di grapes from di vine kon trow dem put for wer dem go press dem and dis na God serious vesnashon.
Den, dem press di grapes for outsaid di tawn and blood rush kom out from di place wer dem dey press dem. Di blood high rish faiv fit and e neali rush rish tu ondred miles.
Den I si anoda big sign for hevun wey nobodi go fit undastand: sevun angels wey hol di sevun last wahala and na dis wons go komplit God vesnashon.
I kon si anoda tin wey bi laik riva wey dem mix wit fire and I stil si di pipol wey konka di beast, en image and di numba for en name. Dem stand near di riva kon hol harp wey God giv dem.

Dem dey sing Mosis wey bi God savant and di Lamb song sey: "God wey dey mighti, si as di tins wey Yu dey du dey big and wondaful! Yu wey bi king for all nashons. Yu nor dey du parsha and evritin wey yu dey du, na tru.
"Na hu nor go fear and praiz yor name? Bikos na onli yu dey holi. Pipol from evriwer go kom woship yu, bikos dem dey si di gud tins wey yu dey du."
Afta all dis, I kon si di tempol for hevun opun and di kovenant tent dey insaid.
Den di sevun angels wey hol di sevun last wahala kon kom out from di tempol and dem wear klin klot wey dey shine wel-wel, kon tie gold belt for dia chest.
Den won from di for kreatures kon giv di sevun angels sevun gold basin wey ful wit God wey go liv foreva and eva, vesnashon.
Den, smoke kon ful di tempol wit God glori and pawa. And nobodi fit enta ontil di sevun wahala wey di angels bring, don komplit.
Den I hear won loud vois dey tok to di angels from di tempol sey: "Di sevun basins wey God vesnashon dey, mak una go pour dem for di eart."
So di first angel pour wetin dey en basin put for di eart. Den di pipol wey get di beast mark and doz wey dey woship en image, sore wey dey pain wel-wel kon ful dia bodi.
Di sekon angel pour wetin dey en basin put for di sea. Den di sea turn to blood and evritin wey dey insaid, kon die.
Di ted angel pour wetin dey en basin put for riva. Di riva and di spring wota kon turn to blood.
Den I hear di angel wey get pawa ova di wota dey sey: "Di Pesin wey dey since, wey dey naw, di Holi Won, na yu dey gud, bikos yu don joj wel.
"Bikos dis pipol kil yor pipol and profets, so yu don giv dem blood mak dem drink, bikos na wetin gud for dem bi dat!"
Den I hear won vois from di alta sey, "Yes, Oga God, yu wey get all pawa, yor jojment na tru and dem koret!"
Den di fort angel pour wetin dey en basin put for di sun and di sun kon dey shine wit heat wey bi laik fire,
den di heat kon dey burn pipol, yet dem stil dey kos God wey get pawa to stop dis sofa and dem nor gri turn from sin kom mit God or gi-am all di glori.
Den di fift angel pour wetin dey en basin put for di beast throne, at wons, daknes kova di beast kindom and di pain kon dey mak dem bite dia tongue.
Dem stil dey kos God wey dey hevun, bikos of di sofa and di sore wey ful dia bodi, bot dem nor stil gri turn from sin kom mit God.
Den di sist angel pour wetin dey en basin put for Riva Euphrates. Di riva kon dry, so dat road go dey for di kings wey dey kom from east.
Den, I si tiri evil spirit wey resembol frog dey kom out from di dragon, di beast and di fake profets mout.
Na dem bi dimon spirit wey dey du mirakol. Na dem dey go gada all di kings wey dey for di wold, so dat dem go fite di fite wey go hapun for di day wey God Almighti go joj di wold.
“Luk! I go kom laik tif! God don bless di pesin wey go shine en eye and wear en klot, so dat e nor go naked waka.”
Di dimon spirit gada di kings and dia sojas for di place wey Hebrew pipol dey kol, "Armageddon."
Finali, di sevunt angel kon pour wetin dey insaid en basin put for di air. Den won loud vois tok from di throne insaid di tempol sey, "Dem don du-am finish!"
Den thunda lite laik lion vois kon dey mak nois and strong eartquake kon hapun. Dis kaind eartquake neva hapun since wen God kreate di wold.
Den di big tawn divide into tiri and di nashons kon fal rish groun. So God rimemba Babylon wey big wel-wel and E gi-am di cup wey ful wit en vesnashon wine.
All di island and mountins skata finish.
Ice-blok wey heavi rish ondred pounds kon dey fal from hevun on-top pipol, bot dem stil dey kos God, bikos of dia sofa.
Den won from di sevun angel wey hol di sevun basin tel mi, "Kom mak I go show yu haw God go kondem and ponish dat ashawo wey sidan on-top plenti wota.
Di kings for eart dey slip wit am and en sin don shark dis wold pipol laik wine.”
So for di vishon, di angel kari mi go widanes and for der, I kon si won wuman sidan on-top won red beast and wetin dem rite for en bodi, na to kos God. Di beast get sevun heads and ten horns.
Di wuman wear purpol and red klot kon wear gold for neck. E wear stones and beads wey dear. E hol won gold cup for hand and na yeye tins wit sins ful insaid.
Dem rite won sikrit name for en forehead wey bi: "Babylon wey big wel-wel, ashawo pipol and yeye tins mama."
God pipol wey dem kil and doz wey prish abaut Kraist, I si di wuman wen e dey drink dia blood and di blood dey shark am laik wine. I sopraiz wel-wel wen I si di wuman.
Bot di angel tel mi, "Why yu dey sopraiz laik dis? I go tel yu di sikrit plan wey di wuman and di beast wey kari am, get. Dis na di beast wey get sevun heads and ten horns.
"Di beast wey yu si, dey bifor, bot e nor dey again and e go soon raiz kom from di pit kon start to distroi. Den doz pipol for eart wey dia name nor dey for di Life Book, go fear di beast.
"(Na onli pipol wey get wisdom go undastand dis tin.) Di sevun head na sevun mountin wey di wuman sidan put and dem stil bi sevun kings.
"Faiv don fal, won dey rule naw and won go stil kom, bot e nor go rule tey.
"Di beast wey dey bifor and nor dey again, en ensef na di numba ate beast, bot na stil won for di sevun and dem go distroi am.
"Di ten horns wey yu si, na ten kings wey neva get kindom yet, bot dem go giv dem autoriti to folo di beast rule as kings for won hour.
"Di kings get di same maind and na di same tin dem wont. And dem go giv di beast dia pawa and autoriti.
"Dem go folo di Lamb fite war, bot di Lamb go win dem, bikos na en bi Oga for all ogas, King for all kings and pipol wey dey folo di Lamb, na doz wey e kol, shuz and save."
Den di angel kon tel mi, "Di wota wey yu si, wey di ashawo sidan on-top, na meni pipol, tribe, kontri and language.
"Di ten horns wey yu si and di beast, go hate di ashawo kon kolet all wetin e get, den e go dey naked. Dem go chop en bodi kon burn am wit fire.
"Bikos God don put am for dia maind sey dem go du wetin E wont and dem go yuz won maind tak giv dia pawas to di beast, ontil God wod go komplit.
"And di wuman wey yu si, na Babylon, di big tawn wey get pawa to rule all di kings for di wold."
Afta all dis tins, I stil si anoda angel wey get beta autoriti, dey kom dan from hevun and di way e brite rish, kon mak di eart dey shine.
E shaut wit loud vois sey: "E don fal! E don fal! Babylon wey big wel-wel don fal! E don bikom di place wer dimons, evil spirits, bird and anima wey pipol hate, dey stay.

Bikos en sin bi laik drink wey dey shark pesin and na-im mak dem dey slip wit hu dem nor mari. Na dis mak am fal and all di kings for dis eart don slip wit am and meni tradas don get plenti moni, bikos of di yeye life wey e dey liv.
Den I hear anoda vois from hevun sey, "My pipol, mak una kom out from am, so dat una nor go folo am komit sin kon sofa di same ponishment.
Bikos en sins don high rish hevun and God go rimemba dem.
Mak yu pay am as e tak pay odas; pay am doubol for wetin e du. For di wine cup wey e mix, mak yu mix doubol for am.

As e kari ensef up, dey enjoy yeye life, na so di sofa and sadnes wey yu go gi-am, go plenti rish, bikos e tok for en maind sey, "I dey rule laik queen, my husban neva die and I nor go eva si sadnes again!"
Bikos of dis, na won day God go ponish am for all en sin wit diziz, mournin, honga and dem go burn am wit fire, bikos na Oga God wey go joj am, get all di pawa!
Den di kings for dis wold wey folo am komit sin and enjoy yeye life, go krai kon shaut for am wen dem si di smoke from di fire wey dey burn am.
Bikos di kings nor won join am sofa, dem go stand far dey sey, "E bad wel-wel! Babylon, di big tawn wey get pawa! E bad wel-wel for yu! Na for onli won hour God tak distroi yu finish!"
Den doz wey dey sel tins go krai and mourn for am, bikos nobodi go buy dia tins again.
Tins laik gold, silva, stone wey dear, beads, fine linen, purpol klot, silk material, red klot and difren tins wey dem tak wud wey dear, bronze, iron and marbol mak.
Cinnamon, spices, insent, pomade wey dey sent wel, frankincense, wine, olive oil, flawa wey dem tak dey mak bread, melu, ship, war horse, slaves and humanbin soul.
(Di ripe frut wey dey hungri yu wel-wel to enjoy and di tins wey dey swit yu, don liv yu and yu nor go eva si dem again!)
Doz wey dey sel and get moni from am, go stand far, bikos dem nor won join am sofa and dem go krai and mourn for am.
Dem go sey, "E bad wel-wel! Babylon, di big tawn wey wear fine linen, purpol and red klot, plus gold, stone wey dear and beads! E bad wel-wel for yu!
"Bikos na onli won hour God tak distroi dis big tawn finish!" And evri ship, dia captain and passenga, plus evribodi wey dey wok for sea, go stand far,
kon bigin shaut wen dem si di smoke from di fire wey dey burn di tawn dey sey, "Hu get pawa rish dis big tawn, Babylon?"

Den dem go pack dust for dia head kon dey krai and mourn, "E bad wel-wel! Babylon, di big tawn and wer all doz wey get ship for sea dey from get moni, bikos na onli won hour God tak distroi am!" E bad wel-wel for yu!
Evribodi wey dey hevun, God pipol, di apostols and profets, mak una hapi bikos God don joj and kondem am bikos of una!
Den won angel wey get pawa, pick won big stone, trow am insaid sea kon sey, "Na so dem go tak trowey Babylon di big tawn wit fos enta sea!

"So, di pipol wey dey play harp, sing muzik, blow flute and trumpet, dem nor go eva hear dia sound from yu again. Doz wey get handwork and biznes pipol, dem nor go eva si dem insaid yu agian. Pipol wey dey grind tins, dem nor go eva hear dia nois insaid yu again.

"Ivun lantan lite nor go eva shine insaid yu again! Dem nor go eva hear sey man and wuman dey mari insaid yu again. Na yor tradas get pawa pas for dis wold, bikos yu tak yor majik disiv all di oda kontris!
"God pipol, di profets and doz wey yu kil for dis wold, God don si dia blood insaid yu."
Afta dis tins, I hear wetin bi laik meni pipol vois for hevun dey sey, "Halleluya! Mak salvashon, glori and pawa bi awa God own,
bikos en jojment dey tru and koret. E don ponish dat ashawo wey spoil di wold wit en sins, as e dey slip wit hu e nor mari and God don revenge am for Kraist savants wey e kil!”
Den di pipol shaut again, "Halleluya! Di smoke from di fire wey burn am go dey go up foreva and eva!"
Di twenti-for eldas and di for kreatures kon bow and woship God wey sidan for di throne sey, "Amen! Halleluya!"
Den won vois tok from di throne sey: "Wi wey bi God savant, mak wi praiz am! All of una wey dey fear am, both smol and big, mak una praiz am!"
Den I hear meni pipol vois wey bi laik riva and thunda nois dey shaut: "Halleluya! Na awa Oga God wey get all pawa dey rule!
"Mak wi hapi wel-wel kon gi-am glori, bikos di Lamb marage don rish and di pesin wey E won mari, don redi tu."
Dem alow am wear klin linen wey dey shine, (Dis linen min di gud tins wey God pipol du).
Den di angel tel mi, "Rite dis tin wey I won tok naw: 'God don bless pipol wey en invait kom chop for di Lamb marage!'" E stil tel mi sey, "Dis na God tru wod."

So, I kon bow mak I for woship di angel, bot e sey, "Nor du dis tin! I bi savant and broda laik yu wey hol di trut abaut Jisos wel. Mak yu woship onli God, bikos na di profesi spirit bi di tru wod abaut Kraist."
Den I si hevun opun and won white horse dey kom out! Dem dey kol di Pesin wey dey ride di horse, "Fatefulnes and Trut." E dey joj wit out parsha or wayo ivun as E dey go fite war.
En eyes bi laik fire wey dey burn wel-wel and meni krawns dey en head. Di name wey dem rite for en head, nobodi no am, esept en ensef.
E wear klot wey dem soak insaid blood and di name wey dem dey kol am, na God Wod.
Di sojas wey dey hevun, wear white linen kon enta white horse dey folo am.

Won sharp sword dey kom out from en mout and e go tak am distroi all di kontris. E go rule dem wit strong hand and E go mash di grapes wey dey bring wine wit strong vesnashon, bikos na God get all di pawa.
For en klot and lap, wetin dem rite put na: "King and Oga wey big pas."
Den I si won angel stand for di sun and e shaut giv all di bird for skai sey: "Mak una kom, mak una gada roun kom chop for God parti.
"Mak una kom chop kings, offisas, sojas, dia horse, di drivas and all humanbin flesh: weda dem dey fri or dem bi slave, big or smol pipol, mak una kom chop beleful!"
Den I si di beast, di kings wey dey di wold, dia sojas, as all of dem gada to fite di Pesin wey dey ride di horse and en sojas.

So dem seize di beast and di fake profets wey dey help am du mirakols to disiv pipol wey kolet di beast mark and woship en image. Den dem trow dem tu insaid di fire wey sulphur dey and di fire burn dem alaif.
Dem tak di sword wey dey kom out from di Pesin wey dey ride di horse mout, tak kil di odas and birds kon chop dia bodi til di birds beleful.
Den I si won angel dey kom dan from hevun, e hol di pit key and won big chain.
E seize di dragon, dat old snake wey bi Satan di devol and dem don tie am der for laik won tazon years.
Den di angel trow am put for di pit kon lock di door wit key, so dat e nor go fit disiv pipol ontil di won tazon years don komplit. (Afta dis tins, dem must fri am for short taim.)

Den I si thrones and pipol wey God don giv autoriti to joj, sidan on-top di thrones. Doz wey dem kut dia head komot bikos of di trut abaut Kraist and God wod, I stil si dem tu. Dis wons nor woship di beast or en image and dem nor gri mak dem put en mark for dia forehead or hand. Dem raiz-up kom life kon rule wit Kraist for won tazon years.
(Bot di res pipol wey don die nor go liv again, ontil di won tazon years don komplit.) Dis na di first resurreshon.
God don bless di holi pipol wey join for di first resurreshon! And dis pipol nor go die again, bot dem go bi God and Kraist prists and dem go rule wit am for won tazon years.
Wen di won tazon years don finish, God go fri Satan from en prizin
and e go-go disiv pipol for di wold; e go bring Gog and Magog togeda kon fite di war and dem go meni laik san-san for sea.
Dem go waka roun di wold and wer God pipol dey stay and di tawn wey evribodi luv, fire go kom dan from hevun kon burn am finish.
Den, dem go trow di devol wey disiv pipol insaid God fire. Den di beast and en fake profets go sofa both day and nite foreva and eva.
Den I si won big white throne and di Pesin wey sidan put. Eart and hevun run komot from en present and dem nor si wer to hide put.

And I si di pipol wey don die, both big and smol, as dem stand for di throne front. Dem opun plenti books and den kon opun anoda book wey bi di Life Book. And dem joj doz wey don die akordin to wetin dem rite for di books sey dem du.
And doz wey don die insaid sea kon kom out. Deat and grave riliz di wons wey dey insaid dem and God joj dem akordin to wetin dem du.
Den dem trow deat and grave insaid di fire. Dis fire na di sekon deat.
Enibodi wey dem nor si en name insaid di Life Book, dem go trowey am insaid di big fire.
Den I si new hevun and new eart. Di first hevun and eart nor dey again and di sea vanish.
And I si di holi tawn, di new Jerusalem, dey kom dan from hevun from God and dem dress am laik wuman wey won go mit en husban.
And I hear won loud vois from di throne dey sey: "Mak yu luk! God haus don dey wit humanbins naw. E go stay wit dem and dem go bi en pipol. God ensef go dey wit dem.
"E go klin evri tears from dia eye and deat nor go dey again. To dey mourn, krai and pain nor go dey again, bikos di tins wey dey bifor, don vanish."
And di Pesin wey sidan for di throne kon sey: "mak yu luk! I dey mak evritin new!" Den E kon tel mi, "Mak yu rite all dis tins, bikos dis wod na wod wey pipol fit trust and na tru."
E stil tel mi, "God don du-am finish! Na mi bi di Alfa and Omega, di startin and di endin. Enibodi wey hungri for wota, I go giv am spring wota wey dey giv life and e nor go pay.
"Di pesin wey win, go inherit dis tins. I go bi en God and e go bi my pikin.

"Bot for pipol wey fear nor dey let dem du wetin gud; doz wey nor biliv mi, doz wey nor dey obey mi; doz wey kil odas; pipol wey dey slip wit hu dem nor mari; doz wey dey du majik; pipol wey dey serv juju and evribodi wey dey tok lai, na insaid di fire and sulphur dem go-go. And na dat bi di sekon deat."
Den won for di sevun angel wey bin hol di sevun basin wey di sevun last ponishment ful, waka kon tel mi sey, "Mak yu kom, so dat I go show yu di wuman wey won mari; di Lamb wife!"
So for di vishon, di angel kari mi go won big fine mountin and e show mi di holi tawn, di new Jerusalem as e dey kom out from hevun from God.
Di tawn get God glori and di way e dey shine, bi laik stone wey dear; laik jasper stone wey dey shine.
E get big wall wey high wit twef gate and dem rite di twef tribes for Izrel put.
Tiri gate dey for di east side, tiri dey for di nort, tiri dey for di sout and tiri dey for di west side.
Di tawn wall get twef foundashon and dem rite di Lamb twef apostol name put for di twef foundashon.
Di angel wey tok to mi, hol rula for hand wey e go tak measure di tawn, en foundashon stone and di wall.

Dem build di tawn laik square and as e long rish, na so e stil wide rish tu. E measure di tawn wit di rula and na won tazon for hundren miles e bi (as e long rish, na so e stil wide and high rish, all of dem dey equal).
E stil measure di wall and na won ondred and forti-for cubit e bi and na as humanbin dey measure, naim di angel tak measure.
Na jasper dem tak mak di tawn wall and na pure gold wey klear laik glass, dem tak mak di tawn ensef.
Dem tak difren stone wey dear tak design di wall. Di first foundashon stone wey dem yuz na jasper, den safire, agate, emerald,
onyx, karnelian, krisolite, beryl, topaz, krisoprase, jacint and ametist.
Di twef gate for di tawn na twef stones wey dear. Dem mak ish gate wit won stone! Na pure gold wey klear laik glass dem tak mak di tawn main road.
I nor si eni tempol for di tawn, bikos Oga God, di won wey get all pawa and di Lamb, na dem bi di tempol.
Di tawn nor nid sun or moon to shine, bikos God glori dey shine put and na di Lamb bi en lite.
Na di tawn lite go show pipol road and di kings wey dey for di wold go bring evritin wey dem get kom insaid.
Dem nor go eva klose di gate for day (and nite nor go dey der).
Dem go tak evritin wey di nashons get enta di tawn.
Bot no dirti or yeye tin go eva enta di tawn. Pesin wey dey du bad or dey lai, nor go eva enta der, bot na onli doz wey dem rite dia name for di Lamb Life Book, go enta.
Den di angel show mi di riva wey dey giv life. Di riva klear laik kristal and e dey pour kom from God and di Lamb throne.
E dey rush pas di tawn main road. For ish side for di riva, di tri wey dey giv life dey bear twef frut and e dey bear won evri mont. Di leaf for di tri na to heal evri nashon for di wold.
Enitin wey God don swear for, go vanish. God and di Lamb throne go dey for dat tawn and en savants go woship am for der foreva.
Dem go si en face and en name go dey dia forehead.
Nite nor go dey again and dem nor nid lantan or sun lite, bikos God go bi dia lite and dem go rule foreva and eva wit am.
Den di angel tel mi, "Pipol fit trust dis wod bikos na tru. God wey bi di profets spirit Oga, don send en angels kon show en savants wetin go soon hapun."
(Si! I go soon kom! God don bless di pesin wey go obey di profesi wey dey dis book.)
Na mi, Jon, hear and si dis tins. Wen I hear and si dem, I bow for groun to woship di angel wey dey show mi dis tins.
Bot e tel mi, "Nor du laik dat! I bi savant laik yu, laik yor brodas di profets and doz wey go obey di wods wey dey dis book. So mak wi woship onli God!"
Den e tel mi, "Nor klose di wods wey dey dis book, bikos di taim don near.

"Mak di pesin wey dey du bad, kontinu to dey du bad and doz wey get dirti life must kontinu to liv laik dat. Di pesin wey dey du wetin gud for God eye, mak e kontinu to du-am and di wons wey dey holi, must kontinu to dey holi.”
“(Si! I go soon kom and my riwod dey wit mi. I go pay evribodi akordin to wetin dem don du!
"Na mi bi di Alfa and Omega, di first and di last, di startin and di endin!)
"God don bless doz wey wosh dia klot klin, so dem go get autoriti to chop from di tri wey dey giv life and dem go fit pas di gate enta di tawn.
"Pipol wey dey du laik dogs, doz wey dey du majik and kil odas; doz wey dey serv juju and dey laik to lai, all of dem nor go enta di tawn.
"Mi, wey bi Kraist, I don send my angel mak e kom tel di pipol for di shosh di trut abaut dis tins. I kom from David famili and na mi bi di brite Star wey dey shine for mornin!"
Di Spirit and di Bride sey, "Kom!" Mak di pesin wey hear sey, "Kom!" And enibodi wey wota dey hungri, mak e kom; and di pesin wey wont di wota wey dey giv life, mak e drink from am fri of charge.
I dey warn evribodi wey dey read di profesi wey dem rite for dis book: If enibodi add join wetin dey dis book, di wahala wey dey dis book, God go add am join en life.
And if enibodi rimov eni wod from dis profesi book, wetin sopoz bi en own for di tri wey dey giv life and for di holi tawn wey dem diskribe for dis book, God go tak am from am.
Di Pesin wey dey tok dis tins, no sey dis tins na tru. Jisos Kraist sey "Tru-tru, I go soon kom!" Amen! Oga Jisos, mak yu kom!
Mak Oga Jisos Kraist grace dey wit all of una. Amen
